Omi nayi kwo zhin nyagyi nu ɓehin-hin omi ami njesun ɓa zhin nya sin-sin yi nu.
Oza nwa gyi mi nayi, wa sin omi ami njesun, wo zhin ozanu nwo sase dna nmi mi, Emihin ndna nwo mi.
Ngye shi Dada wye-wyei nya wa tnu n mi-i, mi n wye-wyei lo ntu wo ɓo. Elonu oza nwa gyi mi nayi wohin wo ɓa bwa wye-wyei ntu mi ɓo ce.
Eminu zhin buredi gaiciya nya nkwo gmi n ʼshe; kwo to wu lo ngye odo nu nfye azakwoyi ɓo gyi fi n zhabui, ɓa fi nyim. Oza nwa gyi deye wo ɓa bwa wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya”.
Yesu ɓo da aɓo deye dna n a Yahudiyi aduwa nyakun nu, n Kafarnahum.
Shi ɓa ɓo wo deye, owo avi-yi nmwa begye ɓa gna, wu-wu ye dnaɓo lo, nyikanl ɓa mi wa gwo kwoʼa?
Yesu wa ku kpe ge ɓa da gunnu-gunnu lo; wa nya ɓa ge, “Deye wun fye bugba ya lo?
Fye ɓei zhin wuna, shi fye ɓo gye Oza Nugun woi jeze lo ʼsheʼa?
Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi nu ga wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya, ama nayi nya ta ga za kwom. Mi ku wu fye shi fye ɓa bwa wye-wyeyi zafun nya.
Ama azaho nfye mi, ta gami gaiciya lon.” (Ntuge Yesu ɓo kukpe oza n wo to ɓo ga wo gaiciyam, n za yi nwo ɓo kun wo.)
Wa gyi abye wa gna, “Ntu cenu ma gna fye ge, ozaho to lo nwo ɓa mi wa ɓe mi abam, akpe Dada gni wo ɓe cei.”
Nsahi, owo aviyi nmwa begye ɓa jeze nnavun yi to ɓa je wo vim.
Yesu wa nya abara awo-cei-aba hi ge, fyehin ɓa lo ce?
Siman Bitrus wa dna wo ɓegbe wa gna, “Dagayi, yi ɓa lo da nyika? Oho nu gmanyi nna ɓeda yi nɓa ɓa mi ɓa ga wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya,
Njesun yi ku gaiciya ga yi kpe lo ge ho nu zhin Nugun gyi-gyi-yi Shekwoyi nya.”
Yesu wa gna ɓa ge, Mi la fye kni awo-cei-aba, ama oza gmanyi zhin shaitan nu.
Wo ɓo da Yahuda, Siman Iskariyoti nugun nu ɓo, gmanyi n awo-cei-aba hi, nwo ɓa kun Yesu nyi.
Ndeye avun, Yesu wa fa Yahudi ya wa lo Galili, woi zan nazhi aɓi-ɓi-yi, wo to ɓo ye wa dna n Yahudiya m, ntuge ɓa ɓo ye ɓa wu wo.
A Yahudiyayi awyefan, alubui nyagyi nya ʼsa ɓei la ga si.
Yesu amaje ɓa gna wo ge wo lo Yahudiya ntu awyefan ɓo. “Lo aba n aza lo, ntuge ho zhin aɓo wo-woyi nabai oho abara ɓa gye.
Ndei ho ye a kpe ho ye, sai ha hohin gmi wu, to zhin aɓo n so-son, shi ho mi lo hoi zhin aɓoye nyi, wu hohin n anyi vinya aba.”
Ntu ge ko owo amaje nɓahin, ɓa to ɓo ga wo gaiciya m.
Yesu wa ci ɓa ge, “Omi sa to si kpam, ama nfye aba esaho-sahoi wu lo dei-dei.
Anyi ta wun fye nu lom, ama ɓa ta ye mi lon, ntuge mi gna ge oɓa atnu-tnu zhin anukwoyi nu.
Fye lo fye nya awyefanhi, shi esa si mi nʼɓa ɓe.”
She wo ɓo ku da lo nu, wa wo nya ce dna n Galili.
Esa nwo amaje ɓo ku lo, wa kma ɓa nya lo n so-so.
Nna awye-fan ʼba a Yahudiyi ɓai zan wo shin ɓai nya ge, Zahi gni na?
Aza ɓai da aɓeda gbo-gbo tu nwo tukwo, azaho ɓa gna, Wo zhin oza manayi nu, azaho ɓa gna, awo, Wo zhin aza-kwoce-dnayi nu.
Ama zaho-zahoi to ɓo mi, wa da wo ɓo pei-pei m, ntuge ɓa wo a Yahudiyi edna.
Dna n awyefan atan-tasin, Yesu wa lo dna nu aduwa-nyakun, wa ya ɓa nya wu.
Ce awo a Yahudiyi, ɓa nya ge, “Oza deye wa bwa ɓeyekpe n na to woi lo makaranta ma?”
Yesu wa gna ɓa ge, “Omihin ɓeyekpe nu to nmi wu fyem, ama Shekwoyi nya, owo nu n wa tnu mi nyi.
Ndei oza la kni, wa zhin Shekwoyi ɓeye, wo ɓa kpe nya ye n mi wu nyi, ko kwo zhin Shekwoyi nya nu, ko omihin nya nu.
Oza nwa da ɓeda ntu wohin tukwo ɓo, wo ye mwa-mwa n wohin ɓo nu, ama, oza nwo zhin tnu-tnu ntu oza latu ɓo nwa tnu wo nyi, wo nu zhin oza gaiciya da nza manayi.
Musa to ɓo ga fye awyidnan? Zaho tolo n wo shi ɓa bwa lo nfyem. Knihi nu zhin fyei ye fya wu miʼa?”
Begyehi kwa ci wo ge, “Tukwo laho pmiya! Nyika nu ye wa wu hoʼa?”
Yesu wa dna ɓa ɓegbe wa ci ge, “Ma zhin ɓo wo-woyi gmanyi ca wo fye.”
Musa ɓo gna fye ge fye zhin aɓi kaciya, (yi kpe lo dei ko to ya nwo sa num, kwa ya n yi azakwoi sa nu) ama fye ta kni Satiwyim.
Ndei fye ɓa zhin kaciya n Satiwyi, ntuge fya nu Musa awyidna, ntu kniɓeyi nu fyei gyi minagyi ge, ma ka oza gna n Satiwyiʼa?
Nfya dnawye peceye, fye ɓa gye, ma zhin ɓe manayi nu.
Azaho nɓa fi n Urushelima mi, ɓa nya ɓo ge, “Ozaye nu to nɓa ye ɓa wu n?
Ai wo gni nyi woi daɓo pei-pei, zaho-zahoi ta da nya ho lon. Kwo atukwoda ɓa ku kpe nu ge Wo nu zhin Kristiʼa?
Ama yi kpe aba lo nzadeye gmi, esa Kristi ɓa ɓe, ai zaho-zahoi to ɓo kpe aba nwa gmim.”
Yesu woi gni woi wu ɓa nya, wa ci ɓa ge, “E fye kpe mi ye lo, fye kpe aba lo nmi gmi njesun. Ama mi zhin tnu-tnuyi nu, oza nwa tnu mi nyi wo zhin gaiciya nu. Fye ta kpe wo ye lo m.
Ama mi kpe wo ye lo, ntu ge ma gmi nwo aba nu, owo na tnu mi.”
A Yahudiyi atukwoda ɓai ye ɓa wan wo, ama zaho-zahoi to ɓo to wo bwam, ntuge owo sa to ɓei sim.
Ama aza nmwa begye n aduwa nyakunhi, ɓa ku gaiciya ga wo. Ɓa nya ge, “Esa n Kristi ɓa ɓe ncei, wo ɓo shan aɓo wo-woyi ho zhin ndu oza deye?”
Esanu Afarisiyi ɓo wo lo nu, ɓa tnu adogagyi ntuge ɓa wan Yesu ɓe cei.
Ama Yesu wa gna ɓa ge, “Esa ye mi ce lo fyewyi ma kun-sun nfyeyi, ma kpe je ze lo oza aba nwa tnu mi nyi.
Fye ɓo zan mi shin ama fye to ɓei gye mi wyem. Fyei to ɓo mi fye ɓe aba nmi nyi m.”
A Yahudiyi atukwoda ɓa nya aje ge, “Wo ye wa lo nna nu to ya gye wo wyem ma? Ko wo ye wa lo eyi azaje aba nu nɓa gnami fi nna abyedo, wo zhin abyedo waʼazi a?
Kniɓeyi nu nwo dage, ʼFye ɓo zan mi shin ama fye to ɓo gye mi wyem, njesun ge, ‘Aba mi nyi, fye ta mi fya ɓem ma’?”
N nyipyei kmaknayi awyefan nya, Yesu wa je ɓeda nazayi ge, Oza n nuwan mikun wo wolo, wo ɓe mi aba wa sin.
Ntuge Littafi Gyi-gyi-yi ku da ge, oza nwo ga mi gaiciya, nuwan ɓa kpe nwo mi ngye dnapa.
Wo ɓei da Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi nu ɓo, nna ɓa ga ozaho-zahoi nwa ga Yesu gaiciya nyi. Ama nsahi Zafun to ɓei ɓem, ntuge Yesu to ɓei jeze lo Dada aba n ʼshe min.
Sanu ɓa ɓo wo woi da lo nu, azaho ɓa ci ge, “Oza deye zhin anabi nu ɓehin-hin.”
Azaho ge, “Wo zhin Kristi nu.” Azaho ge. “Kristi ɓa gmi n Galili nu?”
Ntu ge Littafi Gyi-gyi-yi ku da pei-pei ge Yesu ɓa gmi n Esu Dauda ebye nu n Baitalami aba naɓo ma Dauda nyi.
Aza ɓo la gnaje ngun aba ntu wo ɓo.
Azaho ɓai ye ɓa wan Wo, ama zaho-zahoi to ɓo to wo bwam.
Adogagyi n na ɓei tnu, ɓa jeze ɓe ntna wo shi yi. Aduwa nyakun tukwoda ɓedo a Farisiyi ɓa nya ɓa ge, kninya zhin to fyei ɓe nwoi ma?
Adogagyi-hi ɓei gna ge, ɓa to shin oza wo woi daɓo ngye shi Yesu da nyi m.
Afarisiyi ɓa nya ɓa ge, “Aku fye dna kwoce nuce?”
Atukwoda ho lo ko a Farisiyi, nɓa ku gaiciya ga ge, wo zhin Gni-yi nu?
Aza nɓa ta kpe owa ye nyin, oɓa nu ku gaiciya ga, okni tu lo nɓa.
Nikodimu, nwo ɓo lo Yesu aba n sukwoyi nyl, wo ɓo dna nɓa, wa nya ge,
“Ko wu lo dei-dei a ga za laifi to ai da wo owa n?”
Ɓa nya wo ge, “Hohin gmi n Galili nu ce? Lo ho shan Shekwoyi ɓeda baba, ho ɓa gye ge anabi to lo nwo ɓa gmi n Galili m.”
Ɓa kuka, zaho-zahoi wa lo wo puwa.
Ama Yesu wa gun tu n Zaitun ʼpe.
N labmi-labmi yi, wa je aduwa nyakun lo, esa fyewyi aza ɓa yezhi n wo aba, wa sase wa ya ɓa nya wu.
Shi wo ɓei shi woi daɓo, a Yahudiyi atukwoda ɓedo na Farisiyi, ɓa ɓe n nyikwoza hoi nna ɓei wan wo dna n anagbai zhin, ɓa wo gni naza abye.
Ɓa gna, “Male, nyikwoza ye, ya wan wo dna nu anagbai zhin nu.
Musa ʼwa gna ge, ya wu wo, Ha gna ge na?”
Ɓa ɓo nya wo lonu, ntuge ɓa mwi wo gye nu. Ɓa ɓei ce pma wa da ɓo ho nabai ɓa wan wo nu. Ama Yesu wa yagni, wa ka nya zhi nkni nwo bwanyi yi.
Ɓa ku gnawo gna-gna ge wo dna ɓa ɓegbe, wa kpebye gni wa gna ɓa ge, “Oza nwo to zhin laifin, wo ya wo kuta ce.”
Wa je ya gni wa je nya ka zhi n kni.
Esa nu ɓa ɓo wo deye lo nu, ɓa ya kalaku gmanyi-gmanyi. Shi ɓa ɓo ya nzadnagmayi har kwa lo ɓinawyi. Ɓa ce Yesu ya gni n nyikwozahi yi.
Yesu wa kpebye gni wa nya nyikwozahi ge, “Azahi ma? Zaho to ce ho kutan?”
Nyikwozahi wa ci ge, “Awo” Yesu wa gna wo ge, “Mihin ta zun ho knim, lo ho nya, ama to je laifi zhin m.”
Yesu wa je gwodu n nyawuyi wa cige, “Omi nu zhin buzangna anyi nya, oza nwa vi mi wo ta zan-zan dna n wyegmam, ama wo ɓa bwa buzangna wye-wyeyi nya.”
Afarisiyi ɓa ciwo ge, “Ho mwa hohin tukwo nu, hoi ce akata njesun.”
Yesu wa gna ɓa ge, “Ko mi-i zhin saida tu n mihin tukwo ɓo, omi saida zhin gaiciya nu, ntuge mi kpe aba lo mi gmi, mi-i kpe aba lo n mi lo njesun, ama fye ta kpe ɓohoye lo tu nmi tukwom.
Fye da mi owa zanyikwoci nya pya nu, ama mi ta da zaho-zahoi owa m.
Ama kwo mi-i da, omi owa da ɓa zhin gaiciya nya nu, ntuge Dada nwa tnu mi nyi, wo kunsun lo n mi-i.
Ofye owa gnage, saida n aza ngun-aba gbe, a gwo kwo ge kwo zhin gaiciya nu.
Omi n mihin mi zhin mihin tukwo saida, omi Dada nwa tnu mi nyi, wo nu zhin mi saida-da bayi.”
Ɓa nya wo ge, “Oho Dada gni na?” Yesu wa gna ɓa ge, “Fye ta kpe oza ye nwo zhin omi Dada m, Fye ɓo kpe mi ye lo, fye kpe wo ye ce.”
Yesu ɓo da aɓeda deye, dna aduwa nyakun, n sopa nu a ya agyiwye fi. Zaho-zahoi to ɓo wan wom, ntuge owo sa to ɓei si m.
Wa gna ɓa njesun ge, “Mi ye ma fa fye ma lo minya, fye ɓa zan mi shin, fye ɓa fi fi n fye alaifi. Fye ta mi fya lo aba nmi ye ma lo nyi m.”
A Yahudiyi ɓa nya ge, “Wo ye wa wu wohin nu? Wo da kniɓei nu ge, aba nmi lo nyi, fye ta mi fya ɓe ma?”
Yesu wa gna ɓa ge. “Fye kun anyi ye nu, ama mi gmi n ʼshe nu. Fye zhin anyi nya nu, ama mi zhin ʼshe nya nu.
Ce na zhin mi-i gna fye ge, fye ɓa fi fi nfye alaifi. Nfye to ga gaiciya ge omi nu zhin Kristi m, tile fya fi fi n fye alaifi.”
Ɓa nya wo ge, “Ho nu zhin nyika?” Yesu wa gna ɓa ge, “Mi zhin oza nu nmi shin fye gna ci-ci ge mi zhin nyi.”
Aɓo lo mwa n mi ɓa da, har ma zun fye kni n owa yi, ama oza nwa tnu mi nyi wo zhin gaiciya da nu, aɓo nma wo nwo aba Imi ku gna anyi.
To ɓai kpe ge, wo gna ɓa Shekwoyi ɓo num.
Ntu cenu Yesu wa gna ɓa ge, Esa fye ɓo wu Kristi ncei, fye ɓo kpe nsahi nu ge omi nu zhin Wo. Njesun ge Mi ta da omihin ɓo num, ama oɓo n Dada wa wu mi.
Oza nwa tnu mi nyi wo kunsun lo nmiyi, wo ta ya min, ntuge mi zhin oɓo lo n wo ye nsaho-sahoi vinya.
Shi wo ɓo da lo nu, aza nmwa begye ɓa ku gaiciya ga Wo.
Yesu wa gna aza nɓa ɓo ga Wo gaiciya nyi ge, “Nfya zhin ɓo n ma gna fye agye fye zhin Omi abara gaiciya nya nu.
Fye ɓa kpe gaiciya ye, gaiciyahi kwo ɓa lo fye ya.”
Ɓa gna wo ge, “Yi zhin Ibrahim aɓi nu, yi to shin zaho-zahoi bauta zhin m, ho ɓa gna nwuna nu ge gaiciya ɓa lo yi ya?”
Yesu wa gna ɓa ge, “Ma gna fye gaiciya, oza nwo zhin laifi, wo zhin laifi fyenu nu.
“Fye kpe ge fyenu to iko yi dna n puwan sai nugun.
Ntu cenu, oza n Nugun la wo loya, wo la ze lo-loiya nyalo-nyalo.
Mi kpe lo ge fye zhin Ibrahim ayawyi nu, ama fyei ye fya wu mi, ntuge omi aɓeda ta bwa asese ba lo nfye abugbam.
Mi gna fye aɓo nu nma gye nmi Dada, ofyehin ce fye zhin aɓo nu nfya gye nfye dada.”
Ɓa gna ge, “Ibrahim nu zhin eyi dada. Yesu wa ci ɓa ge, Awo! Ndei wo nu ɓo zhin fye dada, fye shan wo aɓemanayi zhin.
Ama fye ye fya wu mi, ntuge ma gna fye gaiciya nma wo nmi Shekwoyi. Ai Ibrahim to ɓo zhin aɓo nwu lonu m.
Fye zhin aɓo lo ngye of ye dada nu.” Ɓa gna ge, “Yi to zhin akaruwa ʼɓi num, Shekwoyi nu zhin eyi Dada nwohin tukwo.”
Yesu wa gna ɓa ge, Shekwoyi nu ɓei gna wo zhin fye Dada, fye ye mi, ntuge ma gmi n Shekwoyi aba nu. Mi to ɓe n mihin tukwo ɓo nu m, Owo na tnu n mi-i.
Knihin nu zhin to fyei kpe ɓo ye nmi da nyin ma? Ntuge fye to cei pma lo fya gwo mi ɓeda m.
Ntuge fye zhin ofye dada aɓi nu, shetan, ntu cenu fye cei pma fya zhin aɓo nukwoyi ngye wo. Wo ɓei zhin zawuyi nu tunyi nsapa, wo ta ye gaiciyam. Wo dami nna katayi, ntuge wo nu zhjn akata cei ʼsu.
Ntu cenu, shi mi gna fye gaiciya, fye ta ye lo fya ga kwo gaiciya m.
Nyikanu ku mi gye mi-i zhin laifiʼa? Ndei fye to gyen, knihin nu zhin to fyei ga mi gaiciyan ma?
Oza nwo zhin Shekwoyi nya, wo wo Shekwoyi ɓeda. Nya kwo zhin to fyei wo nyin, ntuge fye to zhin Shekwoyi anya nu m.
A Yahudiyi ɓa gna ge, Ai yi ku gaiciya da ge, Ho zhin Samariya yi zanu, Hoi nna aljanuyi lo?
Yesu wa gna ɓa ge, Awo! Mi to na aljanu yi lon. Mi ga mi Dada mwa-mwa, ama fye ci mi wyegba lo.
Mi ta ye ma ci mihin m, Shekwoyi nu ɓa ye kwo ga mi owo nu zhin wa dahi.
Ɓehin-hin ma gna fye. Oza nwa ga mi gaiciya wo ta fi m.
A Yahudiyi ɓa ci wo ge, lalei n sayi yi ku kpe ge Ho nna aljanu yi lo! Ibrahim ɓedo anabi adnagmayi ɓo ku fi, ama oho da gna ge Oza nwa ga ho aɓeda gaiciya wo ta fi m.
Ho du eyi dada Ibrahim lo? Wo ɓo la fi, elonu anabi aje. Ho gye ge ho zhin nyikana?
Yesu wa gna ɓa ge, nma ci mihin omi cici to zhin nyaho nun, ama Omi Dada nfye gna ge wo zhin fye Shekwoyi nyi, Owo nu ga mi mwa-mwa ye.
Fye ta kpe wo ye lom. Nma gna mi ta kpe wo ye lo cen, mi la ze zakata. Ama mi kpe wo ye lo, mi-i zhin ɓo wa gna mi jesun.
Ofye dada Ibrahim ɓo dagma wa gye omi nyipyeyi. Wo ɓo kpe ge mi ɓe lo ai da wo.
A Yahudiyi ɓa ci wo ge, “Ho to lo aye shitnu, hoi gna ge ho ɓo ku Ibrahim gyewye!”
Yesu wa gna ɓa ge, “aɓo sun nna ma Ibrahim nyi mi-i nyi!”
Shi ɓa ɓo wo lo nu, ɓa ku akuta ntuge ɓa kni wo, ama Yesu wa wyi ɓa ya, wa gmi ya nna aduwa nyakun.
Esa nu wo ɓei lo n zokwo, wa gye wyebua-yi ho, nna ɓei pma wo ma nna wyebua-yi.
Owo abara ɓa nya wo ɓo ge, “Male, nyikado laifi nu ɓo zhin a ma oza deye n zhin wyebua yiʼa? Owo azamayi, laifi na?”
Yesu wa gna ɓa ge, “Zaho-zahoi laifi nu to n, ko owo ko owa zamayi m, ama ntuge a wu Shekwoyi iko.
Tile ya zhin omi Dada tnu-tnu, nwa ga yi nyi, nyipyei ye tu sukwo la ga zhin n zaho-zahoi ta mi wa je tnu-tnu zhin m.
Mi ye dna anyi mi, omi nu zhin buzangna anyi nya.”
Shi wo ɓo zo da lonu, wa kni akni zhin nkni, wa fu owun wa pmiya wyebua-yi nawye,
Wa gna wo ge, “Lo Siluwan nuwan zundna ho fu nuwan.”
Wa jeze ɓe to aza ɓai kpe wo yem. Du nwo azajeyi to ɓai kpe wo yem. Ɓai nya aje ge, “wyebuayi, nyaɓayi hi nu bwa lo ya?”
Azaho ɓa gna ge, “Owo nu, azaho ge owonu to m, zadogbe nu,” ama wa gna a ge, “Omi nu.”
Ɓa nya wo ge, “Kwa ze wuna hoi gye wyeba?”
Wa gna ɓage, “Oza nna yi wo ge Yesu nyi, owo na fu amwi woi tna mi nawye woi gna mi ge mi lo Siluwan nuwan zundna mi fu nuwan, awye yi kpe mi ya, mi-i gye wyeba.”
Ɓa nya wo ge ozaho gni na? Wa gna ɓa ge, Mi takpe lo m.
Ɓa la wo lo cei, nna Afarisiyi aba.
Aɓo deye vinya ɓo zhin n Satiwyi nu.
Afarisiyi ɓa nya wo ɓo, shi kwa ze woi gye wyeba. Wohin wa wu a, shi Yesu Bo zhin wo n wu.

Azaho nɓa mi, ɓa gna ge, “Woto zhin oza nu n Shekwoyi wa tnu cei yim. Ntu kniɓeyi nu woi zhin tnu-tnu n nyipyeyi sun-sun yiʼa?” Azadoho ɓa gna, “Ai laifi da ta mi wa zhin aɓo wo-woyi yem.” Deye kwa ɓe ɓa n naje-gna-yi.
Ɓa nya wo ɓo ge, “Oza nwa kpe ho awye ya nyi ho gye ge wo zhin nyikanuʼa?” Wa gna ɓa ge, “Wo zhin anabi nu.”
To a Yahudiyi ɓa ga gaiciya ge wo ɓo zhin wyebuayi num. Ntu cenu ɓa yi wo azamayi, ɓa nya ɓa ɓo.
Ɓa nya ge, Ofye ɓi nu gni ya? Wo ɓo zhin wyebuayi nu? Kwa ze nwuna woi gye wyeba?
Ɓa gna ge, “Eyi ɓi nu gni, Wo ɓei zhin wyebuayi nu tunyi nwo mama-wyi.
Ama, shi kwa ze woi gni woi gye wyeba nyi, ko oza nwa kpe wo awyeya, yi ta kpe lo n. Wo la sun za, nwo ɓa daɓo n wohin, fye nya wo ɓo!”
Ɓa to ɓo ye ɓa da m, ntuge ɓa ɓo wo Ayahudiyi ʼdna nu, ntuge ɓa ɓo ku da ge, Oza nwa gna ge Yesu zhin Kristi nu, a ɓa wo gmi ya aduwa nyakun.
Ce nu ɓo zhin owo azamayi ɓa gna ge, ɓa ta kpe lon, wo la sun za, fye nya wo ɓo.
Ayahudiyi ɓa je zahi yi ɓa gna wo ge, “Ga Shekwoyi mwa-mwa, to ge Yesu m, yi kpe lo ge Yesu zhin laifi da nu.”
Wohin wa gna ɓa ge, “Mi ta kpe lo ko wo zhin laifi da nu ko oza manayi m. Ama onya gmanyi nmi kpe, okwo nu ge mi ɓei zhin wyebuayi nu, ama nsayi ye mi gye wyeba lo.”
Har sayi ye ɓa je wo ɓo nya, “Wa zhin ho wuna? Wa ka ho gna n wuna?”
Wa gna ɓa ge, “Ɓe ma shin fye gna nyi fye to won? Knihi nu zhin fyei je mi ɓo nya? Fye ye ge ma je da nu? Fye ye ge fya ze owo aviyi nu ce?”
Ɓa kni wo akmi, ɓa gna, Ho nu zhin wo viyi, ama yi zhin Musa aviyi nu.
Yi kpe lo ge Shekwoyi ɓo ku ɓoda n Musa yi, ama oza deye da yita kpe aba lo n wo gmi m.
Ozahi wa ci ɓa ge, “Ko zhin ɓo wowoyi nu! Fye ta kpe aba lo n wo gmi m. Ama wo la awye kpe mi ya.
“Yi kpe lo ge Shekwoyi ta wo laifi da aduwa m, ama oza n wo wo Shekwoyi dna, Shekwoyi zhin wa wo wo.
Shi Shekwoyi ɓo zhin anyi, fye shin gye ozaho woi kpe oza awyeya, nna ɓo ma wo nna wyeibua yi?
Wo to ɓei gna wo zhin Shekwoyi za nun, to wo mi wa zhin deye m.”
Ɓa kni wo akmi, “Oho n ho zhin laifi da, ho nu ɓa wu yi?”
Shi Yesu ɓei ku wo aɓo vinya nna ɓo zhin wo, wa gye wo wye, wa nya wo ge “Ho la gaiciya ga oza Nugun?”
Wa nya Yesu ɓo ge, “Nkanu n woiʼa? Mi cei pma ma ga wo gaiciya.”
Yesu wa ci wo ge, “Ho ku wo gye wye, owo nu daɓo n hoi.”
Wa gna wo, “E, Dagayi mi la gaiciya ga,” wa ya shi wa ga wo mwa-mwa.
Yesu wa gna wo ge, “Ma ɓe anyi ntuge ma ga aza wyeba gye Zafun nya. Aza nɓa gye lo ge ɓa gye wyeba lo, ma wu ɓa ge, ɓa zhin awyebuayi nu.”
Afarisiyi nɓa ɓo zhi ɓo, ɓa wo ɓa nya ge, “Ho gna nu ge yi zhin awyebuayi nu?”
Yesu wa gna ɓa ge, “Fye ɓo zhin awyebuayi nu, to fye n laifi yi lon. Ama fye gna ge fye gye wyeba lo, ntu cenu fye n laifi yi lo.”
“Ma gna fye gaiciya, oza nwo to lo aknigbe nna bokunmin, ama wa gun nyakunpa nu wa lo dna fye-a, wo zhin evi nu.
Oza nwo zhin kniknayi, wo zhin wa lo dna nna bokunmi nu.
“Abokunmi guyi zhin wa gu wo aba ya, akni zhin ɓa wo ʼwo begye, ɓa ɓe dawo wa yi ɓa nɓa aye yi, wa kna ɓa njesun.
Wa duya gyi nɓa bye, ɓa vi wo, ntuge ɓa kpe wo begye ye.
Ɓa ta vi zhiɓeyi m, ama sai ɓa bu wosi, ntuge ɓa to shin wo begye wom.”
Aza nɓa ɓei wo ɓeda ye nyi, ɓa to ɓei kpe kwo awyegam, ntuge Yesu ɓo da ɓeye n nanyiɓesi-siyi nu.
Ntu cenu, Yesu wa kna ɓa awyeya, wa gna ɓa ge, Omi nu zhin abokun-mi akni nya.
Aza vinya nɓa ɓo ɓe nmi abye nyi, ɓa zhin avi nu. Ama omi aknigaiciya nya to wo ɓam.
Omi nu zhin abokunmi. Zaho-zahoi nwa lo nna bokunmi ye wo a pwo, wo ɓa gmi woi lo, woi ɓa bwa nyagyi manayi wa gyi.
Evi zhin wa lo oza puwa ntuge wa wyi vi, wa wu za, wa wun anyaya. Ama ma ɓe ge ɓa bwa wye-wyeyi, ɓa bwa ko nmwa.
Omi nu zhin kniknayi Manayi, Kniknayi Manayi zhin wa ga Wohin wye-wyeyi ntu nakni ɓo.

Oza nwo kna akni, ntu lada ɓo nu kawai, wo to zhin kniknayi num. Esa nu wa gye cam-cam kwoi ɓe ntuge kwa wan akni, wo zhin wa busi, wa fa akni ntuge ɓa to zhin ʼwa nya num, woi to zhin ɓa knayi num. Cam-cam hi ɓa mi kwa lo dna ɓa, kwa gna ɓa miya.
Wo zhin wa busi, ntuge wo zhin tnu-tnu lada nya nu. Wo ta gye wo anuwan nna kni yim.
Omi nu zhin Kniknayi Manayi, Mi kpe omi akni ye, omi akni ɓai kpe mi ye.
Ngye shi Dada kpe mi ye nyi Mihin ce mi-i kpe Dada ye, Mi la mihin wye-wyeyi ga ntu akni ɓo.
Mi akni do yi lo, nɓa to fi lo n gwodo yem. Tile nu ma ɓe nɓai, ntuge ɓa wo mi begye, ɓa ze gwodo gmanyi, Kniknayi gmanyi.
Dada wo ye mi, ntuge mi la mihin wye-wyeyi ga, Ma je kwo bwa njesun.
Zaho-zahoi ta mi wa wu mim, akpe ma ye. Omi nu ga mihin tukwo. Ntuge mi iko yi lo ma ga kwo esa nma ye njesun ma gwo kwo esa nma ye. Gama, Dada la iko ye ga mi.
Shi wo ɓo da lo nu, Ayahudiyi ɓa gnaje ngun aba dna nɓa shawara tu nwo tukwo.
Azaho ɓa gna, wo na zafun nukwoyi lo ko wo la cenya nu. Fye ze nwuna fyei kna oza deye pya ɓeda tnubua?
Ama azaho ɓa gna ge, “aɓede ye to wo lo ngye oza nu nwo nazafun nukwoyi m. Zafun nukwoyi ɓa mi kwa kpe wyebuayi awye ya?”
Nsayi awyefan tukwoga nya kwoi la si dna n Urushelima. Vinyiko sa nu ɓei.
Yesu woi gni woi zan nna aduwa nyakun n Solomon a shiragyi.
Ayahudiyi ɓa ɓe ɓa ku she wo gun, ɓa ci ge, “Har knisayi nu n ho ɓa fa yi fi n jejeʼa? Ngye ho zhin Kristi nu, gna yi pei-pei.”
Yesu wa dna ɓa begbe wa gna ge, “Mi ku gaiciya gna fye ama fye to ga gaiciyam. Aɓo wo-woyi n mi zhin dna nmi Dada eye nyi, oɓa nu ci mi saida.
Ama fye ta ga mi gaiciya lon, ntuge fye to zhin omi akni num.
Omi akni kpe mi begye ye, Mihin mi kpe ɓa ye, ɓa zhin ɓa vi mi.
Mi ga ɓa wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya. Ɓa ta bwi m. Njesun zaho to iko yi lo wa gwo ɓa nmi akun m.
Omi Dada nwa ga mi ɓa nyi, wo du Zaho-zahoi lo. Zaho ta mi wa fan mi ɓa m.
Omi n Dada yi, yi zhin gmanyi nu.”
Anyhudiyi ɓa ku akuta ntuge ɓa kni wo.
Ama Yesu wa gna ɓa ge, Mi ku aɓo wo-woyi zhin nmwa ga fye, ngye shi Dada wa wu mi, fye ye fya wu mi ntu knidoyi ɓo nu nɓa miʼa?
Ɓa gna ge, “Oho aɓo manayi zhin nu ta gna yi gna-gna m. Ama ntuge ho kpe Shekwoyi agye. Ho zhin zanyikwoci nu, ntu kni ɓei nu hoi yi hohin ge Shekwoyiʼa?”
Yesu wa ye wa gna, “Acei ka dna lo nfye owa ge, ʼfye zhin ashekwoyi nu?”
A ku aza yi ge ashekwoyi, oɓa nu n Shekwoyi ɓeda ɓe ɓa ɓa, Shekwoyi ɓeda kwo ta ce akatan.
Ama Omi da, Dada la mi ze gyi-gyi-yi. Owo nu na tnu nmi yi. Mi kpe wo agye nwuna? Shi ma yi Mihin ge Shekwoyi Nugun?
Ngye mi ta zhin omi Dada tnu-tnu num, fye to ga mi gaiciyam.
Ama ngye mi zhin Owo atnu-tnu nu, fye ga atnu-tnu ho gaiciya, ko fye to ga mi gaiciya m, fye ɓa kpe ge, Dada dna lo nmi, Mihin ce mi dna lo n Dada.
Ɓa ɓei ye ɓa wan wo njesun, ama wa busiya.
Yesu wa piya lo Urdun kma, wa lo wa dna nwu vivi aba yi n Yohanna ɓo zhin batizma nyi.
Aza nmwa begye ɓa vi wo, ɓa gna ge “Yohanna to ɓo zhin aɓo wowoyi deye pyam. Ama aɓo nwo ɓo da tu n za deye tukwo nyi ɓa ku nu.”
Aza nmwa begye ɓa ga gaiciya ge Yesu nu zhin Gniyi.
Oza ɓei nyi ai yi wo ge Liyazaru nyasan san wo. Wo ɓei dna n Baitanya nu ɓedo nwo amapui yi, Maryamu n Marita yi.
Maryamu ye nwo mapui ɓei shi n nyasan yi nyi, owo nu ɓo ze omi sin-dayi ya kpe n Yesu apita, wa wun kwo ya nwo tukwo yi-i.
Ntu cenu, Liyazaru mapui ɓa tnu tnu-tnu ga Yesu ge, “Dagayi gye nyasan oho ʼza ye-ye-yi lo.”
Shi Yesu ɓo wo lonu, wa gna ge, “Ai Liyazaru nyasan to zhin efi nya num, ama ntu Shekwoyi latu ɓo nu; njesun Shekwoyi Nugun ɓa bwa latu.”
Yesu ɓo zhin woi ye a Marita n, Maryamu yi ɓedo n Liyazaru yi.
Esa Yesu ɓo wo Liyazaru nyasan ɓo ncei, wa dna nnaba nwo ɓo dnanyi anyipyei ngun aba kpa to wa lo Baitanya m.
Avun wa gna wo abara ge, “Yi lo Yahudiya kni.”
Ama owo abara to ɓo ce pma ɓa lo m. Ɓa gna wo ge, “Dagayi nbwasun n yahoi nu to, nɓa ɓo ye ɓa kni ho akuta n Yahudiya kni n, Hoi ye ha je lo ɓo?”
Yesu wa ci ɓa ge, “Awa to nyi awo-cei-aba nu nyipyei buzangna nyan? Zan-zan yi ta ce bwonyi m, ntuge wo gye wyeba lo sarai.
Ama n Sukwoyi oza zhin wa cbwonyi ntuge wyegma dna lo.”
Wa gna ɓa ge, “Eyi nugundo Liyazaru la wangye, ama mi ɓa lo mi kun wo agyewyi ya.”
Owo abara ɓa ci ge, “ngye wo wan egye nu ai wo ɓa kun agyewyi.”
Yesu ɓo da efi nu ɓo, owo abara ɓai gye ngye egye gam nu.
Ntu ce Yesu wa gna ɓa pei-pei ge, “Liyazaru lafi.”
A da mi lo ntu fye ɓo, shi mi to ɓo gni nwo afi bam, deye ɓa ga fye sa fya ga mi gaiciya.
Toma, nna ɓei zhin ai je wo yi ge aza-aba nyi, wa gna wo abara aje ge, “Yi lo yo fi nknusun nwoi.”
Shi ɓa ɓo si Baitanya, a gna ɓa ge, Liyazaru ku anyipyei bwa ngun-anyi dna nvingwo.
Baitanya ɓei bwasun ngye mil ngun-aba nu n Urushelima yi.
A Yahudiyi nmwa begye ɓa ɓe ɓa gye Marita n Maryamu yi ntu oɓa mapui fi ɓo.
Esa nu Marita ɓo wo ge Yesu ɓe lo n zokwo, wa lo shegun Wo, ama Maryamu wa ce dna napi.
Marita wa ci Yesu ge, “Ho ɓei gna ho gni, omi mapui to ɓei ɓa fi m.
Ama mi kpe lo ge kwo nsaiye Shekwoyi ɓa ga ho nyaho-nyahoi nha gyi wo wye.”
Yesu wa gna wo ge, Oho mapui ɓa laka njesun.
Marita wa dna wo ɓegbe wa ci ge, “E mi kpe lo ge wo ɓo laka n nyippyei kmaknayi.
Yesu wa gna wo ge, Mi zhin maku aza fi ka, ma je a wye-wyeyi ga, oza nwa ga mi gaiciya kwo woi fi, wo ɓa je wye-wyeyi bwa;
Oza nwo n wye-wyeyi, wa ga mi gaiciya wo ta shan fim. Ho la gaiciya ga deye?”
Marita wa ci ge, Dagayi mi la gaiciya ga ge, Ho nu zhin Kristi Shekwoyi Nugun nwo ɓe anyi ye lo nyi.
Marita wa lo da Maryamu nnapi, wa yi wo gni fya-a, wa gna wo ge, “Dagayi la ɓe, woi nya ho ɓo lo.”
Nsayi-sayi, Maryamu wa lo da Wo.
Yesu to ɓei lo dna n zhinmin, ama wo ɓei ye gni nnaba nu Marita ɓo shegun wo nyi.
Shi abwiwanyi ɓo gye Maryamu woi gmiya lo nnawyei ya, ɓa gye ge wo lo wo cibwi nu n Liyazaru vingwo. Ntu cenu ɓa vi wo lo.
Shi Maryamu ɓo si Yesu aba, wa ya shi n Yesu apita ʼba, wa gna wo ge, “Dagayi ho ɓo gna ge ho gni omi mapui to ɓei ɓa fim.”
Esa wo ɓo gye Maryamu ɓedo na Yahudiyi ɓai ci bwi, bugba wun wohin n kalayi.
Wa nya ɓa ge, “Fye woi ɓi shi nna?” Ɓa gna wo ge, “Dagayi ɓe ha gye.”
Yesu wa ci bwi.
A Yahudiyi ɓa ci ge, “Ai owo nugundo nu sosai, ɓo kwo la sun woi ci bwi nyi.”
Azaho ɓa ci ge, “Ashe oza nwo ɓo kpe wyebuayi awye ya, to ɓo ɓa mi wa zhin ozaye to wa fim?”
Yesu nsun-sungye yi mwa, wa lo vingwo aba. Vingwohi ɓo zhin kuta-bmi nu, nkuta dnagmayi gu nkwo egbe.
Yesu wa gna ɓa ge, “Fye kpe kuta ya!” Ama Marita wa ci ge, “Dagayi aɓa gye wo la casin, ntuge nyipyei nyihi nu nyi shi wo ɓo fi.”
Yesu wa gna wo ge, “Mi to ku gna ho ge ndei ha ga gaiciya ho ɓa gye Shekwoyi mwa-mwa wye m?”
Aza ɓa kpe kuta ya. Yesu wa kpe awye wu ʼshe wa zhin aduwa, “Dada ma gode shi ho wo mi aduwa.
Mikpe lo ge ho zhin ha wo mi cici, ama mi da deye lonu, ntu aza ɓo nu nɓa zhi ya nyi, ntuge ɓa ga gaiciya ge oho na tnu mi.
She wo ɓo ku da lonu, wa yi nbegye kalayi ge, ‘Liyazuru gmiɓe.’ ”
Nsayi-sayi, Liyazuru wa gmi ɓe, n papyi, dna na zafi aje, Yesu wa gna ɓa ge “fye lo wo ya, fya ga wo zokwo wa duya.”
A Yahudiyi nmwa begye, nɓa ɓo ɓe Maryamu gye, ɓa gye oɓo n Yesu ɓo zhin, ɓa ku gaiciya ga wo.
Ama azadoho ɓa kuka ɓa lo ɓa gna Afarisiyi ɓo Yesu ɓo zhin.
Ntucenu, amalami dnagmayi nna Farisiyi ɓa yezhi ntuge ɓa dna aɓo wye. Ɓa nya aje ge, “Yi ɓa zhin wuna? Ntuge Ozadeye zhin aɓo wo-woyi lo.
N ya fawo wa gyi abye, aza ɓa ku zo wo vi. A Romayi ɓo ɓe ɓa la yi aduwa nyakun ya, ɓo wu yi vinya.”
Ama ozadoho nɓa mi ai yi wo ge, Kayafa, Malami Dnagmayi nu, wa gna ge “Fye zhin atukwo gbolo danu, fye ta kpe ɓo ye lom.”
Gwoma zaknayi wo fi, cei ya cici ge begye kwo bwi. Tile zaknayi ye wa fi ntu yi ɓo.
Oɓo n Kayafa ɓo da ge Yesu ɓa fi ntu aza vinya ɓo nyi, Wo ɓo da kwo ntuge wo nu ɓo zhin Malami dnagmayi, ama Shekwoyi nu ɓo wu wo kwo, wo to ɓo da kwo n wohin nubo zhin num.
Shekwoyi ɓo ku lu da ge Yesu ta-a fi, ntu a Israilayi ɓo nu gmanyim, ama ntu nna aza vinya ɓo.
Tunyi nwyihiyi a Yahudiyi atukwoda ɓa ya wo zan shin ntuge ɓa wu wo.
Yesu to ɓo je zan dna n Yahudiya knin Wo ɓei la Urushelima fa wa lo wa dna n zhi ɓiyi ho Ifraimu nya ɓedo nwo abara yi.
Paskasa kwa wu vi, begye kwa ɓe Urushelima sapa to wyihi kwoi sim, ntuge ɓa ze ɓahin gyi-gyi-yi, paska wyi kwa kpesi.
A Yahudiyi atukwoda ɓa ya Yesu zan shin, esa ɓa ɓo fi n aduwa nyakun, ɓa nya aje ɓo ge, “Fye gye lo ngye wo ɓa ɓe paska ye.”
A Malami dnagmayi ɓedo a Farisi yi ɓei la egbe lu ga ge zahozahoi nwa gye Yesu wa da npye, ntuge ɓa wan Wo.
Paska kwoi ce anyipyei ngun tnanyi, Yesu wa lo Baitanya, Liyazaru ayi, oza n Yesu ɓo la wo kala n vingwo nyi.
Ɓa ku nyagyi zhin ntu Yesu ɓo. Marita woi gni woi zhin nyagyi ɓo, Liyazaru wa sase shi na nyagyi ɓa n Yesu yi.
Maryamu wa la omi sundayi wa zekpe Yesu nna pita, wa wun kwo ya nwo tukwoyi-i.
Ama gmanyi nwo abara, wato Yahuda Iskariyoti, nwo ɓo kun Yesu nyi to ca da wom, wa ci ge,
“Ai omi ye ɓa ku lo a naira tagyi-tagyi. A ɓei ɓa kun kwo nnabai a ce agyiwye a ga awyekwoyi.”
Yahuda to ɓo da lo nu ge, wo ye wa ku awyekwoyi nu bmazhin m, ama ntuge wo nu ɓei zhin woi shi agyiwye, wo ɓei zhin woi kni fya-fya.
Yesu wa ci ge, fa wo, wa zhin kwo ntu nyipyeyi ɓo nu nna ɓei bi mi ncei nyi.
Fye ɓa mi fya bma awyekwoyi zhin nɓa kunsun nfyei cici nyi, ama fye ta bwa mi cicim.
Eas nu aza ɓo wo ge, Yesu la ɓe zhimi, yewa kwa knaɓe ntu ge kwa gye wo njesun ɓa gye Liyazaru n Yesu ɓo la wo kala n vingwo nyi.
Amalami adnagmanyi ɓa zhin shaula ntuge ɓa wu Liyazaru ce.
Gama ntu wo ɓo nu Ayahudiyi ɓa fa ɓa kunnu ɓa ga Yesu gaiciya ge owo nu zhin Gniyi.
Shi efye ɓo gyi, aza begye nɓa ɓei ku ɓe ntu Paska ɓo nyi, ɓa wo ge Yesu ɓe Urushelima lo, woi ɓe lo n zokwo.
Ɓa ku abala afintolo, ɓa shegun wo n zokwo, ɓai ɓowyi ɓai gna, Hosanna! Anabarkada nu oza nwo ɓe dna Dagayi eye! Anabarkada nu Esu a Israilayi nya.
Yesu wa gun Zhagawyi ɓiyi, ntu ge Shekwoyi ɓeda kwa nu ge,
“Fye to wo Ofye Esu dnam a Israilayi, gama wo ɓa ɓe n tukwo-gbayi, n sase tu n zhagawyi ɓiyi.”
Nsahi owo abara to ɓei kpe aɓo nɓa ka fi n Littafi Gyi-gyi-yi ge ɓa nu num. Sai sanu Yesu ɓola jeze lo eshe ai la wo latu, ɓai kpe ge aɓo nmwa begye ɓei ku nu nɓa wye.
Aza nɓa zhi n vingwo aba, ɓa gye ngye shi Yesu la Liyazaru kala nyi, ɓa ɓo laɓa ɓai gna azaje aɓo nwo ɓo zhin.
Ntu deye ɓo aza nmwa begye ɓa kun lo ntu ge ɓo gye wo, ntu aɓo wo-woyi ɓo nɓa wo ge wo ku zhin nyi.
A Farisiyi ɓa gna aje ge, “Wo ku nasara zhin n yi tukwo, gye aza vinya du dawo.”
A Helleniyi ho nɓa ɓo ɓe Urushelima ntu Paska ɓo,
Ɓa lo Filibbus aba, nwo gmi n Baiseda nyi n Galili kni, ɓa gna wo ge, “Male yi ye ya gye Yesu.”
Filibbus wa gna Andarawus, ɓa kuka ɓa gni lo ɓa gna Yesu.
Yesu wa gna ɓa ge, “Esa la si nna ɓa ga Oza Nugun mwa-mwa.
Ma gna fye gaiciya, ndei Owyibyegye to kaya dna nkni kwa fim, kwo ɓa bwa kwo nya shi lo nu gmanyi, ama nkwa fi, kwo zhin kwa ga wyishin nmwa.
Oza nwo ye wohin wye-wyeyi wo ɓa bwi, ama oza nwo wun wohin wye-wyeyi nu, wo nu ɓa pwo.
“Oza nu nwo ye wa ze mi ʼbaratile wa vi mi n saho-sahoi. Oza nu nwo ɓa ze mi bara, Dada ɓa ga wo mwa-mwa.
Bugba wun mi lo nmwa sosai, nɓa gna Dada nu wa gni mi n wahala nu n kwo ɓelo nmiyi dna anyi.
Dada la oho ye tu!” Ɓa wo begye nshe kwoi gna, “Mi la mi ye latu, Mi-i ɓa la kwo tu njesun.”
Esanu aza ɓo wo begye ɓa wo ngye ogma na jewyi, azaho ɓa ci ge malaika ku ɓo da nwoi.
Yesu wa gna ɓa ge, “Begye nfya wo nyi kwa ɓe ntu fye apma ɓo nu, to ge ntu nmi ɓo m.
Esa la si ada anyi owa. Esa la si a wan shetan, yerima anyi ye nya, a she wo ya nbmi.
Esa nu aɓo la mi tu nshe (tu n zundu) nɓo yi aza vinya ɓe cei nmi aba.”
Wo ɓo da lo nu, ntu ge wa wu shi wo ɓa fi nwu.
Aza yezhi ɓa dna ɓegbe ɓa gna, “Ya kpe lo ge Kristi ta fim. Wo zhin wye-wyeyi da nu nyalo-nyalo. Knihi nu zhin hoi gna ge wo ɓa fi-a? Kristi knidoyi nu n ho da wo ɓo a?”
Yesu wa gna ɓa ge, “Emi buzangna ɓo kunsun nfyei nsai fyewyi. Fye zan-zan dna nkwo, ntu ge esa ɓe lo, wyegma ɓa dna, fye to ɓo je zokwo wyegyem.
Fye ga buzangna ye gaiciya, kwo kunsun nfyei, ntu ge fya ze abuzangna aɓi.” Shi Yesu ɓo ku aɓo deye zo da vinya wa laka wa lo bwaho, to ɓa je wo wyegyem.
Yesu ɓo ku aɓo wo-wo-yi zhin ɓai gye, dudu lo nu, aza nmwa begye to ɓa ga gaiciya ge wo nu zhin Kristi m.
Anabi Ishaya ɓeda ɓo ku nu, nwo ɓo gna ge, “N nyika ba nu Dagayi wa wu wo iko-a?”
Ɓa to ɓo mi ɓa ga gaiciya m, gama ntu ge Ishaya ɓo ku je da ge,
“Shekwoyi ku awye bua ɓa. Woi la bugba dna ɓa kala, ntu ge, to ɓa mi ɓa gye wyeba ko ɓa bwa awyega dna nɓa bugba ko ɓa ɓe mi aba, ma ka ɓa gnam.”
Ishaya ɓo da lo nu, ntu ge wo ɓo ku gye Yesu mwa-mwa, wa da ɓeda tu nwo tukwo.
Dudu lo nu a Yahudiyi atukwoda nmwa begye ɓei ku gaiciya ga ge Owo nu zhin Kristi. Ama ɓa to ɓo ye ɓa wu ɓahin tukwo pei-pei m, ntu odna ɓo ge kada Afarisiyi ɓa nya ɓa ya nna duwa nyakun;
Ɓa ɓo zhin ɓai gna ye aza nu ɓa ci ɓa, to ge Shekwoyi m.
Yesu wa daɓo n begye kalayi wa gna “Oza nwa ga mi gaiciya wo ga Shekwoyi nu gaiciya nwa tnu nmi-i nyi.
Oza nwo ku mi gye, wo ku Oza gye nwa tnu mi nyi.
Ma ɓe ngye buzangna anyi nya, ntu ge Ozaho-zahoi nwa ga mi gaiciya wo ta zan-zan dna nwyegmam.
Oza nwo wo mi ɓeda to woi ga gaiciya m, mita da wo owam, ntu ge ma ɓe ma gni anyi nu, to ge ma da anyi owam.
Ama oza nwo na mi aɓo, to woi gwo mi ɓeda m, aɓo da wo owa nʼwadawyi.
Gama ɓeda nmi da nyi omi ɓeda nu tom, Mi da ɓo nu n Dada wa tnu mi ge mi da.
Mi kpe lo ge Owo ɓeda ɓa ga za wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya. Ntu ce nu, Enya wa gna mi ge mi da, ma da.”
Nwyesheyi ai gna a ɓei zhin Paska nsu, Yesu wa ku kpe ge owo sukwo pmaknayi nu, wa kpe jeze lo wo Dada aba nshe. Wa ku ye-ye wu ɓa nɓa zhin owo anya nnanyi, nsahi wa wu ɓa owo ye-ye dei-dei.
Bai kpe n tebur ɓai gyi wyeshe-nyagyi, shetan woi la lo dna n Yahuda-Iskariyoti Siman nugun bugba, ntu ge wa kun Yesu.
Yesu ɓo ku kpe ge, Dada ku anya vinya fa fi nwo akun, njesun shi wa gmi Shekwoyi aba nu nyi, wo ɓa je ze lo Shekwoyi aba n njesun.
Esa nu ɓa ɓo kpe ɓai gyi nyagyi, Yesu wa laka wa kma aje zhi, wa ku tawal wa pa nshin.
Wa la nuwan wa sin fi n kwanu, wa zhan wo abara apita, wa wun ɓa apita ya n tawal yi nwo ɓo cei pa nyi.
Shi wo ɓo si Bitrus aba, Bitrus wa nya wo ge, “Dagayi ho nu ye ha zhan mi apita?”
Yesu wa gna wo ge, “Ho ta kpe ɓe ye lo nmi zhin nyin, ama ho ɓo kpe ye nwyihoi.”
Bitrus wa gna, “To omi apita nu nho ɓa zhan.” Yesu wa gna wo ge, Nmi to zhan ho apitam, agye ho to zhin mi bara num.
Bitrus wa gna Yesu ge, Omi apita nu to kawai n ho ɓa zhan ama zhan mi abwa ɓedo nmi tukwoyi.
Yesu wa gna wo ge, “Oza nwo la nuwan fu, aɓa bwa wo apita nu zhan, owo nayi gyi-gyi-yi lo. Fye gyi-gyi-yi lo, ama ofye vinya nu tom.”
Wo ɓo da lo nu ntuge, wo kpe oza ye lo nwo ɓa kun wo, ce nu ɓo zhin wa ci ge, ʼofye vinya nu to gyi-gyi-yi lo m.
Esa nu wo ɓei la apita zo ɓa zhan, wa ku je kpe, Wa sase, Wa nya ɓa ge, “fye kpe ɓo ye lo nma zhin fye nyi?”
“Fye yi mi ge malami, njesun ge Dagayi, gaiciya nu, ntu ge mi zhin kwo nu.”
Shi emi nmi zhin Dagayi n Malami yi mi la apita zhan fye nyi, fyehin fye zhan aje apita.
Mi la of ye manayi ya shi fye, fye zhin lo nu ngye shi ma zhin fye nyi.
Ɓehin-hin ma gna fye, fyenu ta du puwadam, tnu-tnuyi ta du oza nwo tnu wo tnu-tnu nyim.
Shi fye ku kpe lo nu nyi, fye ɓa bwa anabarka ndei fya zhin lo nu.
“Mi ta da ɓe ye nfyei vinya num; Mi kpe aza ye lo nmi la kni. Littafi ku da ge, ‘Zaho lo woi gyi nyagyi nkunsun nmi yi, Wo nu ɓa kun mi.’
Mi pma fye gna nu, n nabai shi kwo zhin, fye ga mi gaiciya ge mi nu zhin Kristi.
Behin-hin ma gna fye, oza nwa gwo mi tnu-tnuyi, wo la mi gwo, oza nwa gwo mi, wo la Shekwoyi gwo nwa tnu mi nyi.”
Shi Yesu ɓo ku dalo nu, bugba wun wo, wa gna ɓa ge, “Ma gna fye gaiciya, oza ho lo nfye mi nwo ɓa kun mi”
Owo abara ɓa shi aje awye, to ɓa kpe oza ye nwo da wo ɓo m.
Bara-ho ɓo sase tu vi-vi n Yesu yi, Yesu ɓo zhin woi ye wo nmwa.
Siman Bitrus wa yi barahi ge, “nya Yesu oza nwo da wo ɓo.”
Wa lo vi-vi n Yesu yi, wa nya wo ge, “Dagayi nyikado nu-a?”
Yesu wa gna ge, “Owo nu zhin oza nmi ɓa ga wo ezhegma, mi-i la kwo dna nna anyi.” Wa da dna wa ga Yahuda Iskariyoti Siman nugun.
Shi Yahuda ɓo gwo buredi, shetan wa lo dna nwo bugba. Yesu wa ci wo ge, “Bo ho ye ha zhin, zhin kwo npye.”
Ozaho-zahoi nwo ɓo tu nna nyagyi ba to ɓo kpe ɓeye n Yesu dam.
Shi Yahuda nu ɓo zhin oɓa gyiwyeshiyi nyi, azaho ɓa gye ge Yesu ɓo tnu wo nyagyi si nu, ko ge wo ga awyekwoi gyiwye.
Yahuda wa pye ngmiya loi, dna nsukwo wyegmahi.
Esa nu Yahuda ɓo zo gmiya, Yesu wa gna ge, “Esa la si a la Oza Nugun tu, aga Shekwoyi mwa-mwa njesun.
Ndei ala Shekwoyi latu dna nwo, (Yesu) Shekwoyi nwohin ɓa la Nugun tu, Woi ɓa zhin ce lo nu safyewyi.
Omi aɓi nawyi, esa fyewyi nɓa fa fye, fye ɓo zan mi shin, mi gna fye nu ngye shi mi ku gna a Yahudiyi nyi, aba nmi lo nyi fye ta mi fya ɓe m.
“Wyidna woi-woi nu nmi ga fye, fye ye najeyi, shi mihin ma ye nfyei nyi, Nlo nu fye ye najeyi.
Nfye ye aje lo, zaho-zahoi ɓa kpe ge fye zhin omi abara nu.”
Siman Bitrus wa nya ge, “Dagayi ho lo nna?” Yesu wa gna wo ge, “Aba nmi lo nyi ho ta mi ha gni lo nmi yi m, ama ho ɓo ɓe da mi n sahoi.”
Bitrus wa je nya ge, “Dagayi knihi nu ɓa zhin to ma gni lo nhoi nsayi yem ma?” Gama mi la ye ma fi ntu ho ɓo.
Yesu wa nya wo ge, “Ha fi ntu mi ɓo? Ma gna ho gaiciya, ho ɓa na mi ye kpe ɓo har abwa ngun ata, pise-nugba kwa kpe ku ce.”
A Bugba kwo to wun fyem. Fye ga Shekwoyi gaiciya, fya ga mi gaiciya njesun.
Anyakun lo nmwa begye nmi dada puwa. Kwo to ɓo lo nlo num, mo gna fye ge nɓa lo mi zhin aba ba ga fye.
Esa nu mi la pwo nɓa jeze ɓe ma ku fye lo ncei Nʼshe mi, ntuge aba n mi nyi fyehin fya sase ɓo.
Fyei kpe zokwo lo nkwo lo aba nmi lo nyi.
Toma wa ci ge, “Dagayi yi ta kpe aba lo nho lon, yi ɓa kpe zokwo nwuna?”
Yesu wa gna wo ge, “Omi nu zhin zokwo, n gaiciya yi n wye-wyeyi. Zaho-zahoi ta mi wa lo Dada abam, sai wa e mi aba kpa.
Fye ɓo gna fye kpe mi ye lo, fye kpe mi Dada ye lo, nsayi ye fye kpe wo ye lo, fyei ku wo gye wye.”
Filibbus wa gna wo ge, “Dagayi wu yi Dada kwo ɓa yi kun.”
Yesu wa gna wo ge, “Filibbus? Esa la mwa, yi kunsun na jeyi, Knihin nu zhin to hoi kpe Dada ye ma? Oza nwo ku mi gyewye, wo ku Dada gyewye. Knihin nu zhin hoi nya mi Dada ɓo njesun-a?
Ho to ga gaiciya ge, mi dna lo n Dada, Dada njesun wo dna lo nmi m? Aɓeda nmi da nyi, Omi nya nu to m, ama Dada nu nwo dna n mi nyi. Wo nu zhin wo tnu-tnu.
La gaiciya ga ge mi dna lo n Dada. Dada njesun n dna lo n mi. Kwo kwa ha gami gaiciya ntu aɓo wo-woyi ɓo nfye ku gye mi-i zhin nyi.
“Behin-hin ma gna fye, Oza nwa ga mi gaiciya wo ɓa zhin aɓo wo-woyi shi ma zhin nyi, wo ɓa zhin aɓo ndu manya, ntu ge mi lo Dada ʼba nu.
Fye nya Dada nyaho-nyahoi ɓo dna nmi eye, nɓa ga fye, ntu ge a la Dada tu n Nugun aba.
Fye ɓa mi fya nya nyaho-nyahoi ɓo dna nmi eye mɓa zhin kwo.
“Ndei fye ye mi lo, fye ɓa shi mi awyidna bwa.
Nɓa gyi Dada wye wa ga fye bmazhinyi nwo ta shan fye fwam.

Owo nu zhin Zafun Gaiciya nya. Wo ɓa kunsun nfyei har nyalo-nyalo. Anyi ta mi ɓa gwo wom, ntu ge ɓa ta gye wo wyem, ai gna ge ɓa kpe wo yem. Ama fye kpe wo ye lo ntu ge wo sase nfyei nu, woi ɓa dna nfye mi nu.
Mi ta fwa fye ngye akuwyim, nɓa jeze ɓe da fye.
Esa fyewyi nɓa fwa anyi, ama mi kunsun lo nfyei, ntu ge nɓo je wye-wyeyi bwa. Fye ɓa bwa wye-wyeyi ce ngye mi.
Nwyihi-i fye ɓo kpe ge mi dna lo n Dada, efyehin ce nfi lo nmi, omihin njesun n dna lo n fye.
Oza nwo zhin ɓo n mi ye, wo nu zhin mi yehi. Oza nwo ye mi, Dada nwohin wo ɓa ye wo. Mihin nɓa ye wo. Njesun ma wu zahi nwo ye mi nyi, mihin tukwo.”
Yahuda (to ge Iskariyoti m) wa nya wo ge “Dagayi, ntu kni ɓei nu ha wu hohin tukwo n yi aba, to ha wu azajem ma?”
Yesu wa dna wo ɓegbe wa ci ge, nɓa wu mihin tukwo nnaza ba nɓa ye mi nyi. Dada ɓa ye nɓai ce. Yi ɓa ɓe ya sase nɓai.
Oza nwo taye mi m, wo ta vi mi ɓedam, ɓeda ye nmi da nyi Dada nya nu nwa tnu mi nyi.
Mi gna fye aɓo deye, tunyi mi-i ye kunsun nfyei.
Ama shi Dada ɓo tnu n Bmazhinyi, wato Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi wo ɓo wu fye aɓo vinya. Njesun wo ɓo pa fye aɓo n mi ku gna fye nyi.
Kyauta asese-lafiya nyami la fwa nfye aba; Omi asese-lafiya nya nu nmi ga fye, kwo kakayi lo nnanyi nya. Ntu ce nu bugba to wun fyem, fyei to wo edna m.
Fye pa aɓo n mi ku gna fye, mi fwa fye nu ama nɓa jeze ɓe da fye njesun. Ndei fe ye mi lo ɓehin-hin nya, fye ɓa dagma, ntu ge mi lo Dada aba nu nwo du mi nyi.
Mi ku aɓeye pma fye gna, tunyi to ɓai zhin m, nabai shi ɓa ɓei zhin fye ɓo ga mi gaiciya.
Mi to nsa yi lo, ma da ɓo nfyei m, ntu ge oza nukwoyi anyi nya ɓe lo, ama wo to n iko lo, tu nmi tukwo m.
Ama, nɓa zhin ɓo Dada wa gna mi ge mi zhin. Ntu ge anyi ɓa kpe ge mi ye Dada lo. Fye kukala ya lo.
Omi nu zhin anab wunuyi gaiciya nya, omi Dada nu zhin of wa-da woi zhin kwa ba.
Wo zhin wa gbe abwala ya nɓa ta ga gyi-gyi m. Njesun wa zhin abwala manayi aba, ntu ge ɓa ga gyi-gyi ndudu.
Wo la fye zhin aba nmi ɓeda yi, nmi da nfyei cici nyi.
Fye sase fi nmi, omihin nfye mi. Ntu ge bwala ta mi kwa ga gyi-gyi to kwoi kpegyi n shinwan-gnai num. Fyehin ta mi fya ga gyi-gyi, to fyei sase fi nmi m.
Omi nu zhin shinwan-gnai, fya zhin abwala. Oza nwo sase dna nmi, omihin ndna nwo, wo ɓa ga gyi-gyi nmwa, ntu ge ntna mi, fye ta mi fya zhin nyaho-nyaho yi m.
Oza nwa kpeya nmi, a ɓa she wo ya ngye bwala ntna apma, nkwo zhin kwa wo akawu, abwala ye pya a zhin a ye ɓa zhin a dna ɓa ʼna, ɓa gyi ʼna.
Ndei fye sase fi nmi, fyei vi mi aɓeda, fye nya nyaho-nyahoi ɓo nfye ye aɓa ga fye kwo.
Omi abara gaiciya nya, zhin ɓa ga gyi-gyi dei-dei, Deye zhin kwa e Dada n latu yi.
Mi ku fye ye, ngye shi Dada wa ye mi. Ntu ce nu fye ku sase fi nmi ye-ye.
Esa fya vi mi aɓeda, fye sase fi nu nmi ye-ye, ngye shi mihin mi ye Dada mi-i sase dna nwo ye.
Ma gna fye aɓo deye nabai, fya bwa omi agmada, efye agmada njesun ɓa nu.
Mi ye fya ye najeyi, ngye shi mi ye fye nyi.
Yeye dnagmayi to lo kwa du deye m, shi oza ga wohin wye-wyeyi ntu wo anugundo ɓo m;
Fye zhin omi anugundo nu, ndei fya zhin ɓo nmi ye.
Mi to yi fye lo ge afyenu m, ntu ge puwada to zhin wa zhin shaula nfyenu yim, Fye zhin mi anugundo nu, ntu ge mi ku aɓo gna fye vinya n Dada wa gna mi nyi.
Ofye ye nu to kni mi m! Omi nakni fye! Nabai fya lo fye ga gyi-gyi manayi. Nabai nyaho-nyahoi nfya gyiwye dna nmi eye, Dada ɓa ga fye kwo.
Mi cei pma fya ye najeyi.
Ndei anyi wun fye nu, fye kpe ge a ku mi nu wunnu nnabye.
Fye ɓo gna fye zhin anyi nya nu, ɓo ye nfyei, ama fye to zhin anyi nyanu m, ntu ge mi la fye kni nɓa. Ce nu zhin anyi ɓai wun fye nu.
Fye pa ɓo lo nma gna fye nyi? Fyenu ta du wo puwa da m. Shi ɓa ku wahala ga mi nyi, kwo wu nu ge, ɓa ɓa ga fye wahala ce. Ɓa gna ɓa mi aɓeda gwo, ɓo la ofye aɓeda gwo.
Aza n anyi ɓa ga fye wahala, ntu ge fye zhin oma nya nu, gama ɓa takpe Shekwoyi ye lo, nwa tnu nmi nyim.
Mi to gna ma ɓe ma daɓo nɓa yim, to ɓo n laifi lo m. Ama nsayi ye, ɓa to nna gma kun yi lo, ntu ɓa laifi ɓom.
Oza nwo wun mi nu, wo wun mi Dada nu lo ce.
Mi to gna ma zhin aɓo wo-wo-yi, naza to shin zhin, to ɓo n laifi lo n. Ama ɓaku gye aɓo wo-woyi ye wye, ɓai du-du ɓai wun mi nu ɓedo nmi Dada yi.
Deye ku ɓeda nu, n anabi ɓei da tu Masihu tukwo ge, ɓa ɓo wun mi nu ntna dalili.
Ama nɓa tnu fye n Tnazhinyi, wato Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi, Wo ɓa gmi n Dada aba nu, Wo nu zhin Zafun gaiciya nya, Wo ɓo gna fye aɓo vinya n mi tukwo.
Tile, fya gna zaho-zahoi omi nabari, ntu ge fye ku kunsun n miyi tunyi n kmisunyi.
“Mi gna fye aɓeye vinya, nabai to fya ku jeje fi nna ɓo nɓa ɓe lo nabye nyim.
Ɓa ɓo nya fye ya nu aduwa-nyakun. Har esa ɓe lo aza ɓa wu fye, ɓai gye ngye ɓa zhin Shekwoyi ɓe ye nu.
Ɓa ɓo zhin nu, ntu ge ɓa ta kpe Dada ye lo kwo omi m.
Mi pma fye aɓeye gna nu, nabai ge esa nɓa ɓe ncei, fya pa ge nɓo ku pma fye gna. Mi to ɓo shir fye gnam, ntu ge mi ɓei ye kunsun n fyei.
“Nsayi mi lo oza aba nu nwa tnu mi nyi, Ozahoi ta shan mi nya lo ge, ‘Ho lo nana?’
Ntu ge fye zhi nbugba wun yi nu, shi ma gna fye ɓeye.
Ama ma gna fye gaiciya, kwo gna bmiya lo nfye aba ma lo, nmi to lo n Bmazhinyi ta ɓe fye abam; ama nma lo nɓa tnu nwoi wa ɓe fye aba.
“Esa nwa ɓe, wo ɓa wu anyi ɓa laifi pei-pei, wo ɓa wu ɓa Shekwoyi ɓefyece, nwo wada yi.
Anyi laifi nu nyi, ntu ge ɓa to ga mi gaiciyam.
N ɓefyece ɓo, ntu ge mi lo Dada ba nu to fya je mi wyegye m.
N wada ɓo, ntu ge aku owa pma anyi-su da, wato Shetan.
“Aɓeda lo nmwa nmi ye ma gna fye, ama fye ta kpe ɓa ye nsayi yem.
Esa nu Zafun Gaiciya nya ɓa ɓe, wo ɓa dna fye n zokwo gaiciya nya. Wo ta gna fye owohin ɓeda nu m. Ama nya nu nwo ku wo. Wo ɓo gna fye aɓo nɓa ɓe lo nabye.
Wo ɓa la mi tu, wa wu fye omi mwa-mwa.
Omi Dada mwa-mwa zhin omi nya nu; Ce na zhin mi-i gna fye ge, esa Zafun ɓa ɓe ncei wo ɓa wu fye omi mwa-mwa.
Esa fyewyi fye ta je mi wyegyem, ama esa fyewyi njesun fye bagye mi wye.”
Owo abara ho ɓanya ge, “Wo da kniɓei nu ge, esa fyewyi fye ta je mi wyegyen, esa fyewyi fye ɓa je mi wyegye n jesun; Woi je da ge, ‘ntu ge mi lo Dada aba’?”
Ɓai nyaɓo, “Wo da kniɓei nu ge esa fyewyi a? Yi ta kpe ɓe ye lo nwo dam.”
Yesu wa ku kpe ge, ɓa ye ɓa nya wo ɓo nu. Wa she sasa, wa nya ɓa ge, fye nya aje ɓo ntu ɓeda ɓo nu nma da nyi?
Ma gna fye gaiciya, fye ɓa cibwi fyei zhin bugba zhi-zhiyi, ama anyi ɓa dagma. Fye ɓa wun bugba, ama Ofye bugba wun ɓa ze fye agmada.
Kwo ɓo ze ngye shi nyikwoza ɓo yashi woi wo nyasan, ntu ge owo sa la si, ama esa wo zo ɓi ma, wa san-san ze amwi ntu agma da ɓo, ntu ge ala oza ma dna anyi.
Bugba wun fye lo nsayi ye. Ama esa nmi ɓa jeze ɓe nyi, fye ɓo nya agmada, zaho to lo nwo ɓo gwo fye agmadahim.
Nsahi fye to ɓo nya mi nyaho ɓo m. Gama enya nfya nya Dada kwo ɓo cewo, wo ɓo ga fye, nfya nya wo ɓo dna nmi ʼye wo ta wo fye ɓim.
Fye to shin nyaho wyegyi dna nmi eye m. Fye gyiwye, wo ɓa ga fye ntu ge, Ofye agmada ɓa nu har ɓai gyiya.
“Mi ku ɓeda da n nanyi-ɓesisi yi, ama esa ɓe lo nmi ta je da lo nu m, sai dai ma gna fye Dada ɓo pei-pei.
Dna n nyipyeyi-hi fye ɓo gyiwye dna nmiʼye. Mi ta da ge mi ɓei gyi Dada wye ntu fye ɓo nu m.
Ntu ge Dada ye fye lo, gama fye ku gaiciya ga mi ge ma gmi n Dada aba nu.
Ma gmi n Dada aba nu, mi-i ɓe anyi, mɓa fa anyi, ma jeze lo Dada aba.”
Owo abara ɓa gna wo ge, “Ho ku ɓo da nsayi cewo to ge n nanyi-ɓesisi yim.
Yi kpe lo ge ho kpe aɓo ye lo vinya, Zaho to lo nwo ɓa wu ho ɓohom, ntu deye ɓo, kwo ku zhin yi ku gaiciya ga ge ha gmi n Dada aba nu.”
Yesu wa nya ɓa ge, “Fye ku gaiciya ga nhayi!”
“Ama esa ɓelo, kwoi la lu ɓe, nfye ɓa gnamiya zaho-zahoi wa lo wo puwa, fya ce mi gni nmi gmanyi yi, ama mi to gni nmi gmanyi yi nnum, gama Dada kunsun lo nmi-i.
Ma gna fye deye, ntu ge fya bwa bugbafu nu. Fye ɓa bwa wahala dna nanyi ye. Ama agu-tu-fye ngye apma, Miku nasara zhin n nanyi yi.”
Esa nu wo ɓo la pwo aɓeda ye da ɓo, Wa kpe awye shi nshe wa gna, “Dada! Esa la si ha la ho Nugun tu. Nabai, Nugun nwohin wa la ho tu.
Gama Ho la iko ga wo tu naza tukwo vinya, ntu ge wa ga wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya nna aza ba nho ku ɓa ga wo nyi.
Zokwo wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya nu nyi, ɓa kpe ge ho nu zhin Shekwoyi gaiciya nya gmanyi, ɓedo n Yesu Kristi yi n ha tnu nwoi dna anyi nyi.
Mi la ho latu dna nanyi, ngye shi mi ku aɓo zhin vinya nha tnu mi ge mi zhin nyi.
Nsaiye, Dada, la mi tu nho aba, n latu pyai nmi ɓei cei shin sun nhoi, tunyi to ai zhin anyi nyim.
“Mi ku ho ɓo gna aza vinya nha ga mi fi nanyi nyi. Ɓa ɓei zhin ha nyanu, hoi ga mi ɓa, ɓai ku gaiciya gaho ɓeda.
Nsaiye ɓa kpe lo ge, anya vinya nmi cei lo, ho naga mi.
Ntu ge mi ku ho awyidna ga ɓa vinya, ɓai la gwo. Ɓa kpe lo ge ma gmi nho aba nu, Oho na tnu mi.
“Mita gyiwye ntu aza vinya ɓo nu m. Ama mi gyiwye ntu naza ɓo nu nha ga mi nyi. Ntu ge ɓa nu zhin oha nya.
Anya vinyan n mi cei, ɓa zhin oha nya nu, Oho anya omi anya nu, Mi-i la latu bwa nɓa aba.
Miye ma fa anyi nu, ma ce ɓa fi ʼya, ma ɓe ho aba. Dada Gyi-gyi-yi, oɓa nu nho ku ga mi nyi, mi ye ha kna ɓa nho ikoyi, ntu ge ɓa ze gmanyi, ngye shi yi zhin gmanyi nyi.
Esa nu mi ɓei dna cei nanyi nyi mi ɓei la ɓa kna, mi-i gu ɓa, dna n eyehi n ho ɓei ga mi nyi. Nabai to ɓa bwim akpe ena ɓi ntu ge wanu Littafi Gyi-gyi-yi ɓeda.
“Nsaiye, mi ɓe ho aba nu, esa nmi ɓei kunsun nɓai, ma ku aɓo gna ɓa n mwa ntu ge oɓa agmada kwa nu.
Mi ku ho ɓeda ga ɓa, anyi wun ɓa nu, ntu ge ɓa to zhin anyi nya nu m, ngye shi mihin to zhin anyi nya nu nyim.
Mi ta zhin aduwa ge ɓa kun ɓa nanyi num, ama ha kna ɓa n shetan iko.
Ɓa to zhin anyi nya nu m, ngye shi mi to zhin anyi nya nu nyi m.
Ze ɓa gyi-gyi-yi n gaiciya yi, oho ɓeda nu zhin gaiciya.
Ngye shi ha tnu mi dna nanyi nyi, elo nu mihin mi tnu ɓai fi nanyi.
Mi la mihin ze gyi-gyi-yi ntu ɓa ɓo, nnabai ɓahin ɓa ze gyi-gyi-yi dna n gaiciya.
“Mi ta zhin aduwa ntu aza deye ɓo nu gmanyin, ama mi zhin aduwa ntu ɓa ɓo nɓa ɓa ga mi gaiciya ntu aza deye saida zhin ɓo nyi.
Mi zhin aduwa ge ɓa ze gmanyi, Dada, ngye shi mi dna nho, ohohin ndna nmi. N lo nu ɓa fi n yi mi, ntu ge anyi ɓa ga gaiciya ge oho na nu mi.
“Mwa-mwa nha ga mi nyi mi la ga ɓa. Mwa-mwa gmanyi ze nya, ntu ge ɓa ze gmanyi.
Omi ndna nɓa mi, ohohin ndna nmi. Fwa ɓa ze gmanyi dei-dei, anyi ɓa kpe ge oho na tnu nmi-i, Mi ku ye nɓai ngye shi hohin ha ye mi nyi.
Dada, mi ye aza no ku ga mi nyi, ɓa sase aba nmi nyi, ɓa gye mi mwa-mwa wye, mwa-mwa n ha ga mi ntu ge, ho ye mi tunyi to ai zhin anyi m.
“O, Dada ɓefyeceyi, anyi ta kpe ho ye lo m. Ama mi da kpe ho ye lo, abara ye njesun ɓa kpe lo ge ho na tnu nmi yi dna na nyi.
Mi ku ho wu ɓa, mi-i ɓo wu ho ɓa, n nabai yeye dnagmayi nho cei nmi aba nyi kwa dna nɓa mi, omihin njesun nɓa mi.”
Esa nu Yesu ɓo la pwo aɓeda ye daɓo, wa pi Kidron nuwan ya, ɓedo n wo abara yi, ɓa lo fi n ofwa ho ɓo.
Yahuda, nwo ɓo kun Yesu nyi, wo ɓei kpe abahi aba, ntu ge Yesu ɓei zhin woi lo ɓo cici nwo abara yi.
A malami dnagmayi ɓedo a Farisiyi, ɓa ku asoja ga ɓa gni lo n Yahuda yi. Ɓa lo n na fitila yi, n anabwi-yi, n nanyagalayi ɓa lo ofwahi.
Shi Yesu ɓo ku kpe ɓoye nkwo ɓa zhin wo, wa gmi lo wa nya ɓa ɓo ge, “Fye ye nyika na?”
Ɓa ci wo ge, “Yesu” wa gna ɓa ge, Omi nu zhin wo. (Yahuda zabwi za ɓo gni ngnisun nɓai).
She wo ɓo gna ɓa ge, “Omi nu zhin wo,” ɓa ce ɓa miya zhi nkni navun yi gbudu-gbudu.
Wa je ɓa ɓo nya ge, “fye ye nyika?” Ɓa ci ge, “Yesu n wo gmi n Nazarati nyi.”
Yesu wagna ɓa ge, “Mi ku gna fye ge omi nu gni nyi,” shi fye bwa mi nu ye nyi, fye fwa aza deye ɓa lo ɓa nya.
Wo ɓo da deye, nabai owo i ɓeda kwa nu nu ge, “Aza nha ga mi nyi, kwo gmanyi kwo to bwi m.”
Bitrus wa wa obe-yakwo, wa ka Malkus tnubua bwai-zhe-nya ya n i cei. Wo ɓo zhin malami dnagmanyi fyenu nu.
Yesu wa gna Bitrus ge, “La ho beyakwo ya dna n kwo apui. Kwo to zhin tile nu ma sin wahala n Dada la ga mi nyin?”
Elo nu, abusi-ɓiyida, nna sojayi nɓa tukwoda yi, ɓa wan Yesu ɓa pa wo nna wun yi.
Ɓa lo n woi n Hannana aba, Kayafas yezhi nwo nu ɓo zhin malami dnagmayi dna eyehi.
Kayafa nu ɓo gna a Yahudiyi atukwoda ge, “Kwo bmiya lo zaknayi wa fi ntu azaje ɓo.”
Siman Bitrus wa vi lo n navun, ngnisun n bara dohoyi. Barahi ɓei dami n malami dnagmayihi, ntu ce nu a fwa wo wa lo dna ngnisun n Yesu yi n awada ʼba.
Ama Bitrus da wa kpegni n nabokunmi gbe. Bara dehi wa gmi lo, wa da ɓo n ɓinyikwoi bokunmi-guyi ge wo du ɓe n Bitrus yi.
Binyikwoihi wa nya Bitrus ge, “ho to zhin Yesu bara nu m?” Bitrus wa ci ge, “Awo, mi to zhin kwo num.”
Ese ɓeifu, ntu ce nu, aza ɓo zhi ɓai wye ona, a fyenu ɓedo a sojayi. Bitrus wa kpe gni n kunsun n ɓai woi wye ona.
Malami dnagmayi, wa ya Yesu aɓo nya, tu nwo abara tukwo ɓedo nwo nyawu yi.
Yesu wa dna ɓegbe wa ci ge, “Aza kpe mi nyawu ɓeye lo vinya, Ma ku waʼazi zhin dna nna duwa-nyakun, a Yahudiyi atukwoda ɓai wo. Mi to wu nyaho n vim, ma wu kwo pei-pei nu.
Ntu kniɓeyi hoi nya mi ɓo a? Nya aza ɓo nɓa ɓo wo mi nyi. Ba kpe ɓeye lo n mi ɓo da.”
Shi Yesu ɓo zo ɓeda lo nu, soja ho wa ce wo pmi, wa nya wo ge, “Beda pya nu nho ɓa dna Malami Dnagmayi ɓegbe ncei?”
Yesu wa ci ge, ngye mi ta da gaiciya nu m, ha da ma wo, ama ngye mi da gaiciya nu, knidonu ɓa zhin ha ce mi pmi a?
Hannana wa tnu n Yesu yi n Kayafa aba n pa-pa-yi, wo nu nwo ɓo zhin Malami dnagmayi nyi.
Siman Bitrus woi gni woi wye ʼna, Zaho wa nya wo ɓo njesun ge, “Ho to zhin zahi bara nu m? Wa ci ge, Awo.”
Ama Malami Dnagmayi fyenu ho wa nya wo ɓo ge, “Mi to ɓo ku gye ho, n kunsun Yesu yi dna n fwa n?” Fyenu hi ɓa ɓei zhin ʼbye nu n zahi n Bitrus ɓo ka wo tnubua ya nyi.
Bitrus wa aɓo na njesun, Nsa-sayi pise-nugba kwa ce ku.

Kayafa ɓo pwo Yesu owa da ɓo n labmiyi nu. Ɓa la wo ɓa lo nwoi n a Romayi gwamna garko. A Yahudiyi nɓa ɓo lo Yesu yi nyi, to ɓa ye ge ɓa lo fi n garko-him, ge kada ɓa tu cegye to ɓa mi ɓa gyi Paska nyagyi m.
Bilatus wa gmi ɓe, wa nya ɓa ge, “Oza deye, wa zhin fye knihi na?”
Ɓa ci ge, “Wo to ɓein laifi ye lon, to yo wan wo ɓe cei nho aba m.”
Bilatus wa gna ɓa ge, “fye da wo owa nfyehin yi.” A Yahudiyi ɓa ci ge, yi ta mi ya wu oza m, yi ye ha ga yi ʼgbe.
Deye ɓo zhin lo nu, ntu ge Yesu ɓeda kwa nu nu, esa nwo ɓo da efi pya cei nwo ɓa fi nyi.
Bilatus wa jeze lo wada-bokun, Wa gna ge aduɓe n Yesu yi, wa nya wo ge “ho nu zhin a Yahudiyi osu?”
Yesu wa nya wo ge, “ho nu nya ɓeye nhohin tukwo ko aza na gna ho a?”
Bilatus wa ci ge, Ho gye ge mi zhin Yahudiyi-za nu? Oho aza nu na ɓe nhoi, ɓedo nna malami dnagmayi. Ha zhin ɓa kni a?
Yesu wa ci ge, “Mi to zhin esu anyi nya nu n. Mi ɓo zhin esu anyi ye nya nu omi aviyi ɓo sunkun ga mi, esa nu a Yahudiyi ɓo wan mi nyi.”
Bilatus wa nya wo ge, “Ho zhin Esu nu?” Yesu wagna wo ge, “E, ntu ce nu a ma mi. Ma ɓe ntu ge ma wu gaiciya. Minu zhin gaiciya, aza nɓa da gaiciya ɓa nu zhin omi aviyi.”
Bilatus wa nya ge “Knidonu zhin gaiciya?” Wa gmiya lo bmi da a Yahudiyi wa gna ɓa ge, “Mi to bwa laifi ho nwo abam.”
Kwo zhin fye kun-nu, ma gmi oza gmanyi ya ga fye n kurkuku n Paska sayi. Fye ye lo ma lo a Yahudiyi esu ya ga fye?
Ɓa kni aku, “ɓai gna ge, awo a ga yi Barabbas nu.” Barabbas hi ɓeizhin evi nu n zaje yi.
Nsayi Bilatus wa la Yesu wa zhin wo bulala.
Asoja ɓa zhin lawanyi aknawuyi nya, ɓakun wo n tukwo; ɓa kep wo eje dnagmayi.
Ɓa lo ɓai ci wo ge, “Zaci saraci. A Yahudiyi ʼSu!” Ɓai kni Wo apmi nna wyeba.
Bilatus wa je gmiya lo bmi, wa gna a Yahudiyi ge, “Mɓe ga fye Yesu, ama fye kpe ge mi to sun wo n laifi ho yi m.”
Yesu wa gmiya lo n lawanyi aknawuyi nyai kun, n eje yakwoi kpe. Bilatus wa ci ɓa ge, “Ofye ʼza nfyei shi nyi.”
Shi amalami dnagmayi, ɓedo a Yahudiyi ɓo gye wo wye, ɓa ɓowyi, ɓai gnage, A zun-wo du! A zun-wo du! Ama Bilatus wa gna ɓa ge, fye la wo fya zun-wo du, ama mi to sun wonlaifiyim.
Ɓa ci ge, “Yi nna wyidnayi lo, n ya vi awyidnahi wo kunce lo wa fi, ntu ge wo yi wohin ge Shekwoyi Nugun nu.”
Shi Bilatus ɓo wo lo nu, wa wo dna ndu-du.
Wa jeze lo n Yesu yi, n wada-bokun, wa nya wo ge, “Ho gmi nna?” To Yesu wa dna wo ɓegbe m.
Bilatus wa ci wo ge, “Ho ta dna mi ɓogbe n? Ho ta kpe lo ge mi iko yi lo ma ya ho, njesun mi iko yi lo ma zun ho du n?”
Yesu wa gna wo ge, “Ho to ikoi lo tu nmi tukwo m, akpe a ga ho kwo nshe. Oza n wa ɓe n mi yi nho aba nyi wo du lo n laifi.”
Bilatus woi ye wa ya wo, ama a Yahudiyi atukwoda ɓa ci wo ge, N ha wo ya, agye ho to zhin Kaisar nugundo nu m. Oza nwa gna ge wo Izhin esu nu, wo zhin Kaisar nuwunyi nu.
Shi wo ɓo wo lo nu, wa gmi Yesu ɓe ɓa cei njesun, wa lo wa sase tu n shinkpegye-wada nya, aba aɓei cei lu-lu-yi na kutayi.
Nyipyei kwoi ye kwa gun atukwo, Paska yi ce shi ge nsu. Bilatus wa gna a Yahudiyi ge, “Fye gwoi fye ʼsu.”
Ɓa kni aku kpe wo, ɓai gna ge, “A lo nwoi, a lo nwoi, azun-wo du.” Ca wo Bilatus, wa nya ge, “Fyei wu ofye ʼsu?” Ɓa gna ge, “Yi to nsu yi lo m, sai Kaisar gmanyi.”
Bilatus wa Yesu ga ɓa ntu ge ɓa zun-wo du.
Ɓa lo n Yesu yi, woi la owohin zundu, ɓa lo aba a yi kwo, “Tukwo Bmila” n Yahudiyi ge Golgota.
Nɓo nu nɓa ɓo zun-wo du, nna zado yi ngun aba, gmanyi n bwapmi, gmanyi n bwai-zhe, n Yesu yi dna nna tasin.
Bilatus wa ku nya ka, wa ce kwo ma n zundu. Nyanyi nkwo ɓo ka kpe, “
Aba nna ɓo zun Yesu du nyi, kwo to ɓo mwakpa n zhimi yim. Aza nmwa begye ɓa rubutuhi ba, kwo ɓo kakpe nna-byei ngun ata nu. Helleni, n Roma yi ɓedo na Yahudiyi byei.
A Yahudiyi amalami adnagma yi, ɓa gna Bilatus ge wo la rubutuhi shan do, wa ci ge, Yesu a gna, “Omi nu zhin a Yahudiyi ʼSu.”
Bilatus wa gna ge, “Enya nmi ku ka, mi ka, kwo ɓa bwa kpe lo nu.”
Esa nu ɓa ɓo la wo zun-du, asoja ɓa ku wo aje ɓa kpa ɓa zhi aku ngun-anyi, ɓa ga zaho-zahoi wo nya. Ama ejekpe yakwo ho ɓo nyi to gun-gun yi m, n lu-luyi nya kwo laka nbegye har kwa lo sinta.

Ɓa gna aje ge, “Yi to sa kwo yam; ama yi she ca-ca n kwo tukwo agye oza nkwo ɓa zhin wo nya.” Deye ɓo ku Littafi Gyi-gyi-yi ɓeda nu nkwo kafi ge, “Ɓa gna mi aje ga aje tu nmi jekpe tukwo ɓa she ca-ca.” Enya nu na soja ɓo zhin.
N Yesu zundu aba, Maryamu, owo iya ɓei gni, ɓedo nwo iya mado yi, n Maryamu Kilyobas nyikwo yi, n Maryamu Magadaliya yi.
Esa Yesu ɓo gye wo iya gni ɓo, n bara hoi nwo ye wo n gni ɓo, Wa gna wo iya ge, “Oho nugun gninyi.”
Wa gna barahi ge, “Oho iya gninyi.” Tunyi nsahi, barahi wa la wo iya lo cei nwo puwa.
Shi Yesu ɓo ku kpe ge aɓo vinya nku nu njesun ntu ge Littafi Gyi-gyi-yi kwa nu, Yesu wa ci ge, “Nuwan mikun wo Milo.”
Nna bahi nuwan mamayi ɓo shi n nyikun yi, ɓa la soso ɓa da kwo dna, ɓa gyi soso hi n busi, ɓa lo nkwoi n Yesu ʼgbe.
Shi wo ɓo la nuwanhi gwo, Yesu wa ci ge, “Aku zo.” Wa ka tukwo dna wa fi.
A Yahudiyi to ɓei cei pma a ya aza kpe n zundu har Satiwyin. Ntu ge Satiwyin nu ɓei zhin Paska gyi nya. Ɓa lo ɓa gna Bilatus ge a bma ɓa apita-ya ntu ge ɓa da fi a bi ɓa.
Asoja ɓa ɓe ɓa bma avihi apita-ya, nna ɓo zun ɓa du ngnisun n Yesu yi nyi.
Ama esa nu ɓa ɓo ɓe Yesu aba, ɓa gye wo la fi, to ɓa bma wo apita-yam.
Sai soja gmanyi wa fin wo mashi nna-bmayi, ami n nuwan yi ɓa zeya nsayi-sahi yi.
Oza n wo ɓe gye ɓeye nyi, owo nu ga saida ge, owo saida zhin gaiciya nu. Wo kpe lo ge wo da gaiciya nu, woiga saida ye nnabai fya ga gaiciya nu njesun.
Aɓo deye ɓo zhin ntu ge Littafi Gyi-gyi-yi ɓeda kwa nu nu: “A to bma wo a sunkun yan kwo gmanyi.”
Littafi kwa je da nnabado ge, “Ba ɓei shi wo awye oza nɓa ɓo la wo fin mashi.”
Nna ɓedeye avun Yusufu Arimatiya nya, Yusufu ye ɓei zhin woi vi Yesu n so-so nu, ntu ge wo ɓei zhin woi wo a Yahudiyi dna. Wa lo Bilatus aba ge, wo ga wo iko wa shin Yesu nayi, wa ga wo.
Nikodimu nwo ɓo ɓe Yesu aba nkmisunyi nsukwoyi nyi, wa ɓe n kunsun n Yusufu yi. Nikodimu wa ɓe n omi sundayi shi, okwo Shanwo ɓei ɓa sun ngye pam tagyi.
Oɓa ʼngun aba ɓa la Yesu nayi ɓa kmi kwo dna naje, ngye shi a Yahudiyi kun-nu zabi nyanyi.
Vivi aba yi aɓo zun Yesu du, ofwa ho ɓei gni ɓo, n ofwa hi vingwo ɓo nyidna nna to ɓo shin ʼza bi nkwo m.
Ntu ge nyipyeyi shiri zhin nya nu ɓei ntu Paska ɓo, ɓa wo bi dna n vingwohi nkwo ɓei wu vivi nvi.
N Labmi-labmi yi, n Ladiwyi; Maryamu Magaliya wa lo vingwo aba, wa lo wa gye a la kuta kpeya a vingwo gbe.
Wa jeze ɓe woi busi, wa lo da Bitrus n bara do yi, n Yesu ɓo zhin woi ye nwoi nyi. Wa gna ɓa ge, “Ba la Yesu nayi gmi n vingwo, yi-i ta kpe aba lo nɓa woi ya shi m.”
Sai Bitrus ɓedo n bara dehi yi, ɓa kuka lo vingwo aba nsi.
Oɓa ngun aba ɓai busi, ama bara dehi wa du Bitrus ya wa si nabye.
Wa ya awyeshi, wa gye azafije nzhi, ama to wa lo dna nmin.
Shi Bitrus da nwo ɓo kma ɓe nyi, ɓo si ɓo wa ce wa lo dna nvingwo. Wa gye azafije n ya fi.
Eje nna ɓei cei puwo n tukwo nyi, n yazhi n tukwo bwa. Odo n na ɓei ce pawo n nayi nyi, n yazhi n kwo bwai.
Bara dehi ce wa lo dna n vingwo wa gye wa gaiciya ga.
Har nsayi to ɓai dudu ɓa pa Littafi ɓeda ɓo ge, Yesu ɓo je kala la n vingwo m.
Abarahi ɓa je ɓa nya ze lo ɓa puwa.
Maryamu woi gni woi cibwi. Shi wo ɓo ya awye fi n vingwo.
Wa gye amalaika zhi ngun-aba, n naje bui-bui kpe, n sase fi aba n Yesu nayi ɓo shi nyi, zaknayi n tukwo bwa, zaknayi njesun n apita bwa.
Ɓa nya wo ɓo ge, “Nyikwoza knihin nu zhin hoi cibwi a?” Wa gna ɓa ge, “Ɓa la mi Dagayi la, mi ta kpe aba lo nɓa woi ya shim.”
Wa bmiya awye wa gye za gni nwo avun, ama to wa kpe oza ye m, ashe Yesu nu gni.
Yesu wa nya wo ge, “Knihin nu zhin hoi ci bwi a? Ho ye nyikana?” Maryamu wa gye ngye lambu zhin yi ho nu dna, wa ci wo ge Puwada ngye ho la wo la ho la so, wu mi aba, ma lo mi la wo ɓe cei.
Yesu wa yi wo, “Marymu!” Maryamu wa lo da wo, wa yi wo n kala yi, “Malam.”
Yesu wa ci wo ge, to to mi bwa m, ntu ge mi to gun lo mi Dada aba kpam. Ama lo da omi azaje ho gna ɓa ge, mi du gun da mi Dada nfye Dadayi, omi Shekwoyi nfye Shekwoyi.
Maryamu wa gye Yesu abara, wa gna ɓa ge, “Mi la gye Dagayi wye,” wa pmi wa gna ɓa owo tnu-tnu.
Nwyeshe-bwai n Ladiwyihi, owo abara ɓai ye fi n nyakun, n na bai gu-gu-yi ntu ge ɓa ɓo wo a Yahudiyi atukwoda dna. Nwyekpatayi ɓa gye Yesu gni nɓa tasin. Wa sa ɓa mi wagna, “Bugbafu nfye aba.”
Shi wo ɓo ku ɓa sa mi, wa wu ɓa owo abwa, ɓedo n wo apita yi n nabmayi. Aɓo da ɓa n mwa shi ɓa ɓo je ɓa Dagayi wyegye.
Wa je ɓa ci ge, “Bugbafu kwo kunsun n fyei!” Ngye shi Dada wa tnu mi, mihin mi tnu fye.
Shi wo ɓo da lo nu, wa ya sun kpe ɓa, wa gna, “Fye gwo Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi.
Aza nfya zhin ɓa gafara, a ku gafara zhin ɓa ama aza nfye to zhin ɓa gafara m, a to zhin ɓam.”
Zaknayi nwo abara, ai yi wo Toma wo ɓo zhin aza ʼba nu, to woi da dna n na zaje yim.
Shi abara aje ɓo gna wo ge, “Yi ku gye Dagayi wye,” Wa gna ɓa ge, mi ta ga gaiciya m, sai mi ku gye akusa ci wye nwo abwada ma to bwa, ɓedo nwo abmayi ma to bwa njesun.
Anyipyeyi nyimwa-nyimwa avun, abara ɓai ye fi n nyakun, Toma ɓo dna nkunsun n ɓai i wyihi. Abokunmi ɓo gu-gu-yi, ɓa Igye Yesu dna gni n ɓa tantasin, wa sa ɓa mi, “Bugbafu kwo kunsun n fyei.”
Wagna Toma ge, Dna ho bwanyi n mi abwada. Ha to mi abmai bwa, to zhin shaka zhin m, la gaiciya ga.
Toma wa ci wo ge, “Omi Dagayi nmi Shekwoyi.”
Yesu wa gna wo ge, “Ho ga gaiciya shi ha gye mi wye. Anabarka da nu aza nɓa to gye mi wye nyin ama ɓai ga gaiciya.”
Yesu ɓeiku aɓo wo-wo-yi zhin nmwa nwo abara awyeba, nɓa to kafi lo n Littafi yem.
Ama aka adeye ntu ge, fya kpe ge, Yesu nu zhin Kristi Shekwoyi Nugun, nfya ga wo gaiciya fye ɓa bwa wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya dna nwo eye.
Nwyihoi Yesu wa je wohin tukwo wu nwo abara aba, ɓai zhi n nuwan zundna Galili nya ʼgbe.
Aza nyi nɓa ɓei gni zhi ɓo, Siman Bitrus, n Toma yi nna yi wo ge aza ʼba nyi, n Natanailu yi n wo gmi n Kana Galili nya nyi, n Zabadi anugun yi, ɓedo abara dohoi ngun-aba.
Siman Bitrus wa gna ɓa ge, “m ɓa lo abmiya wan.” Bahin ɓa gna ge, “Yi ɓa gni lo nhoi.” Ɓa kuka ɓa lo, ɓa lo fi n eya, sukwohi vinya to ɓa wan nyahom.
Nfyegyibwayi ɓa gye ozaho tu n kmahi ama to ɓa kpe za ye n wo tum, ashe Yesu nu.
Wa yi ɓa, “Omi anugundo fye ku abmiya wan?” Ɓa ci ge “awo.”
Wa gna ɓa ge, “fye she osa ya fi n eya bwaizhebwa, fye ɓa wan abmiya.” Shi ɓa ɓo she osa ya fi, ɓa wan abmiya n mwa har to ɓa shin esa gnim, ntu abmiya shanwo ɓo.
Bara n Yesu ye wo nyi wa gna Bitrus ge ai Dagayi nu gni! Shi wo ɓo wo ge Dagayi nu gni, wakpe wo je wolo-wolo wa she nuwan wa lo dawo nkma.
Abara je ɓa ku ce fi n eya, ɓai gni osa ɓe cei nna bmiyai nu, ntu ge ɓa to ɓo mwakpa n kmayim, kwo ɓo bwa ce ngye yadi tagyi nu.
She a ɓo wankma ɓa gye ena fin zhi n na bmiyai kpe ɓedo n bredi yi.
Yesu wa gna ɓa ge, “fye ɓe nna bmiyai nfya wan nsayi ye nyi.”
Sai Siman Bitrus wa lo dna ʼya, wa gni osa ɓe cei nkma. Abmiya adnagmayi ɓo nyi tagyi-cei-shitnu Icei-ata, ama osa to ɓo gbeya m.
Yesu wa gna ɓa ge, “Fye ɓe fya gyi nyagyi labmi nya.” To zaho-zahoi nwo abara wa nya wo ɓo ge, “Nyikado nu gni nhoi a?” Ntu ge ɓa ɓo ku kpe ge Dagayi nu gni.
Wa la bredi wa gna ɓa, wa je zhin lo nu n na bmiya yi.
Shi wo ɓo laka n vingwo, bwa tahi nu ɓo nu, woi wu wohin tukwo nwo abara aba.
Shi ɓa ɓo ku nyagyi gyi, Yesu wa nya Siman Bitrus ge, “Siman Yohanna nugun, ho ye mi lo ndu aza deye?” Wa gna, “E Dagayi ho kpe lo ge mi ye ho lo.” Yesu wa ciwo ge, “kpa oma kni.”
Yesu wa je wo ɓo nya, “Siman Yohanna nugun ho ku mi ye lo ɓehin-hin nya?” Wa ye wa ci ge, “E, Dagayi ho kpe lo ge mi ye ho.” Yesu wa gna wo ge “kpa oma kni.”

Waje wo bwa tahi nya ge, “Siman Yohanna nugun ho ye mi?” Bitrus bugba kwa wun ya ntu ge Yesu ɓo je wo ɓo bwa tahi nya ge, “Ho ye mi lo?” Wa ci ge “Dagayi ho kpe a ɓo ye lo vinya. Ho kpe lo ge mi ye ho lo. Yesu wa ci wo ge, kpa oma kni.”
Esa nu ho ɓei zhin ɓinawyi, ho ɓei zhin ha mi ha zhin ɓo nho ɓa zhin, ha lo aba n ho ye ha lo; ama esa nu ho ɓo kwo, ho ɓo tabwa ga za wa wu ho zokwo, aɓo lo n hoi aba nho ta yem.
Yesu ɓo gna wo deye nnabai wa wu wo efi pya nwo ɓo fi, kwo la Shekwoyi tu. Yesu wa gna wo ge, “vi mi.”
Bitrus wa bmiya-wye, wa gye bara n Yesu ye cei nyi woi ɓe, barahi nwo ɓo kpema n Yesu agu esa wo kma nyagyi gyi nwo abarai nyi, nwo ɓo nya Yesu ɓo ge, “nyikanu ye wa kun ho a?”
Shi Bitrus ɓo gye wo, wa nya Yesu ge, “Dagayi oza deye mwa?”
Yesu wa gna wo ge, “N ma ye wa gni n wye-wyeyi har ma jeze ɓe, oho anuwan lo? Hohin dai vi mi.”
Ɓedahi kwa gnami laɓa ge, gye Yesu wa gna ge, barahi ta fi m. Ama Yesu to ɓo da lo nu ge wo ta fim. Sai ge, “ndei ma ye ge wa gni n wye-wyeyi har ma ɓe.”
Baraye, owo nu ɓo ku gye aɓeye owo na ka ɓa. Yi kpe lo ge owo saida zhin gaiciya nu.
Aɓo do lo n mwa n Yesu ɓo zhin, N na gna aka ɓeho-ɓehoi vinya, mi gye kwo anyi ta bwa aba nna ɓa ya a takardai zhi m.
Emi nugundo nwo ye Shekwoyi nyi. Nɓo ku shin ho ka. Ma wu ho anya n Yesu ɓo wu aza. Wa wu wo abara kafin wo kpe eshe lo.
Shi wo ɓo laka evingwo wo ɓei bwa anyipyei shinyi woi wu wohin nwo wo abara aba. Ntu ge ɓa kpe ge wo wye-wyeyi lo. Woi da ɓo n ɓai tu Shekwoyi ebe ɓo.
N Wyihoi wagna ɓa ge, ɓa to kun n Urishelima m, ama ɓa pmi har Zafun Gyi-gyiyi wa ɓe, ntu ge alkawali Dada nya ɓa nu.
Yohanna ɓei zhin baptizma n nuwan yi amma a ɓa zhin fye n j Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi.
N Wyihoi wa je ɓa ba ɓe ɓa nya Yesu ge, “a ɓo gni a Yahudiyayi nkni sayi nuʼa? Wato a knu ɓa nu a Romayi aknu.”
Yesu ɓo gna ɓa ge, “Efya nuwan nu tom fya kpe anyipyei yem.”
Ama Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi ɓei ga fye iko esa n wa ɓe ncei, fye da mi nabari dna n Urishelima n Yahudiya yi n Samariya yi n na bai vinya. Fye da ʼmi kala-la ɓo n vingwo.
Safyewyi wa laka tulo ʼshe owo abara ɓa shi wo awye har wa bwi wye.
Ɓa zhi ɓai shi awye ʼshe ɓa gye aza ngun aba na je bui-bui kpe.
Aza n ɓa nu a gna “Agalili yi fye gye kniyi nu ʼshe a? She fye gye Yesu woi lo nyi elonu wo ɓa jeze ɓe.”
Aɓeye vinya ɓo zhin kpe a zaitun ʼpe nu. Ɓa jezelo Urishelima mi.
Ɓa lo ɓa ku fi n nyakun ʼshe ɓai zhin adduwa.
Aza nyi n ɓa ɓei fi ɓo. Bitrus, Yohanna, Yakub, Andrawus, Filibus Toma Bartalamawus, Matta, Yakub Halfa nugun, Siman owo ye bayi ge Zelotes ɓedo n Yesu azaje yi. Na anyikozayi n Yesu ʼya yi.
Wyiho ɓa ye zhi aza 120 ɓa zhin adduwa Bitrus wa laka gni wa da ɓo n ɓai.
Wa gna “Emi azaje dole Shekwoyi ɓeda kwa nu tu n Yahuda tukwo. Woɓo la Yesu kun aɓo ku anabci zhin tu wo tukwo kafin ama wo. Esu Dawuda nu ɓo da, shin Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi ɓei wu wo.
Yahuda ɓo gnisun n yi nu. Har ma n zhin bara.”
Amma wo ɓo la ekni si n na ʼgyiwye nukwoyi wa gyi wohin, Wa kaya har waɓaya.
Aɓo ku ce wo vinya n Urushelima. A aba ho tuye ge, “ami ʼba.”
Anabci ye dna n Zabura nu kwa da ge, “Fa owo puwa kwa wunya to oza wa dnam. ‘Njesun a lawo tnu-tnu ga ozado wa zhin.’
“Dole ozado n yi mi wa la Yahuda apita n wo ɓo gnisun n yi tunyi n Yesu baptisma zhin sa har esa n wo ɓo lo ʼshe nyi.”
A ɓe n na za aye yi ngun-aba Yusufu Jastis (ko Barsabas) ɓedo n Matiyas yi.
Ɓa zhin adduwa ntu ge Shekwoyi wa wu ɓa oza na ɓa kni. Ɓa gna, “O Dagayi ho kpe eyi abugba yelo, wuyi oza nu ho ye nɓa mi wa la Yahuda apita, owo nu n wo la wo zokwo kni nyi.”
N adduwa zhin avun ɓa she kuriʼa, Kuriʼa wan kpe n Mathias. A wo kni, wa ze bara ɓedo awocei-gmanyi yi.
A mako ɓo ku sun ngu shi. Yesu ɓei fi. Pentikos nyipyei koi la wu vi a Yesu viyi ɓa yezhi.
Sa fyewyi a wo aɓo ho ɓai ci ngye ogma jewyi, aɓo ci hi ɓa nu nyakun n ɓa ɓo fi nyi.
Ɓa gye ena anyitala kwoi yakpe ɓa na tukwo.
Oɓa vinya ɓa nu n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi. Ɓai da ɓeda n na byei gbo-gbo n ɓa ta shin da m. Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi nu ɓo ga ɓa iko ye.
A Yahudiyi yi ɓei fi n mwa n Urushelima n wyihi yi. Ntu ge ɓa la Shekwoyi tu n Urushelima mi.
Shi aza ɓo wo kasun, ɓa kun ɓe ntu ge ɓa gye ɓo kwo nyi, Sai ɓa wo abara ɓai da ɓa bye, ceʼa wo ɓa.
Ɓa nya ge, “Aza deye zhin a Galiliyi nu, ɓa mi n wuna ɓai da abye deyeʼa?
Ya wo ɓai da ɓeda n byei nu aba n ya kun nyi.
Eyi a Patiyayi Amidiyi, Alamitiyi, aza n ɓa kun n Mesopotamiya n Yahudayi, Kapadokiya, Pontus, Asiya.
Filijiya, Pamfiliya, Masar n na abyei n ɓa she Libya gun nyi. Aza n Roma n ɓa zhin a Yahudiyi ɓedo n ɓai n ɓa zhin a Yahudiyayi alaloi nyi.
Akaritayi ɓedo na, Larabawa yi. Ya wo ɓai da abye deye ɓai gna yi aɓo awo-woyi Shekwoyi nya.”
Ca wo aza n kalayi. Ɓa gna, “kniyi nu wu la yiʼa?”
Amma azaho ɓa kpe agye ɓa gna, “Ai ɓa ku nya nu sin.”
Sai Bitrus n abara awo cei gmanyi (11) ɓa gna, “Efye vinya fye kna tnubua, Yi ye ya da ɓo n fyei, azhiɓeyi du na pi dai.
Azaho n fye mi ku da ge, Yi ku onya nu sin. Ɓa to da gaiciyan sam. Aza ta sin nya n labmiyi la yim, wato karfe 9.
Ɓeye kwa zhin nyi Joel Anabi ɓo ku ce da tunyi.
Shekwoyi ɓo da ge, ‘Nna a nyipyeyi kmaknayi n ɓo ze omi Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi ya kpe aza, efye anugun n anyigun yi ɓa ɓo zhin anabci. Efye a samari ɓa ɓo gye aɓe-wyegye. Azakwoyi ɓo nu ana.
Emi Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi, ɓa ɓe tu emi abara anugbayi n anyikwoyi tukwo, ɓa ɓo zhin anabci.
N ɓo zhin aɓo awo-woyi n ʼshe n ʼkni yi, Aɓo gye ami nonayi ɓedo anyi, awu nya yi.
Npyei ɓo ze zhi-zhiyi, epya ko ze ami. Kafin Dagayi nyipyei dnawo nya ko ɓe.
Oza n wa ye sun-sungye wo ɓa bwa. Ai gni wo n jesun.’
“A Israilayi fye wo! Fye kpe la ge Shekwoyi nu ɓo zhin ama Yesu Nazaratiyi wa zhin aɓo wo-woyi n wo aba. Ama dna Shekwoyi shiri, wa fa fya zhin ampanyi na Roma yi, fya wu Yesu tu n zundu.
Amma Shekwoyi ɓo la wo gmi n wahala har wa wo laka n vingwo. Efi to zhinwo nyaho m.
“Esu Dawuda ɓo da Yesu ɓeda wa gna, ‘Mi kpe lo Dagayi kunsun n miyi cici, woi bma mi zhin. Iko Shekwoyi nya koi ce mi bwa.
Ce nu zhin mi yi dagma. Omi ʼgbe nunu yi n wo ciciyi. Mi kpe lo ge ko mi yi fi milo wo aba nu.
Ho ta fami dna ena m, Ho taye oho Nugun Gyi-gyi-yi nayi kwa buo m.
Ho ɓoje mi wye-wyei ga Ha ga mi agmada n ho abye.’
“Omi azaje Dawuda ta da wohin nu ɓo m. Dawuda ɓei la fi a wo bi, owo vingwo shi lo n ya ba.
Dawuda ɓo zhin anabci Shekwoyi nya nu. Woi kpe ge oza ɓe lo n wo ɓa zhin Kristi dna nwa a yawyi.
Wo ɓo gye nya ko ɓe lo nabye, wa da Kristi kalala ɓo evingwo. Wa gna Kristi wye-wyei ta dna e nam Kwo kwa buo m
Wo ɓei da Yesu nu ɓo, yi zhin aseda da nu ge Yesu la laka evingwo.
“Wo lo n gnisun n Shekwoyi, Dada n la iko gawo wa tnu n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi, Elonu n fye gye n naiye.
“Dawuda ta da wohin nu ɓo m. Woto shin gun lo ʼshen. Wa da ge, Shekwoyi wa da ɓo n mi Dagayi yi wato Kristi, wa gna, la sase nwu viyi nmiyi n latu aba.
Har maze oho anuwuyi, oho apita kpe ʼba.
“Ntu ce nu mi gna a Israilayi ge Yesu n fye ɓo wu nyi, Shekwoyi la wo ze Dagayi n Masihu yi.”
Bitrus ɓeda ɓo ku lo aza sosai. Har ɓa gna, “eyi azaje, yi ɓa zhin wuna?”
Bitrus wa gna, “Fye fa alaifi, fya yi Shekwoyi a zhin fye baptisma dna Kristi ye.
Kristi ɓo ku alkawali zhin ga fye. Ofye n Shekwoyi la fye yi nyi, duk n fye aɓi yi, nge woɓa ga fye Zafun Gyi-gyiyi.”
Bitrus ɓei zhin waʼazi Yesu nya wa gna ge ɓa ye abui ɓa vi Shekwoyi.
Aza 3,000 ɓei ku gaiciya ga aku baptisma zhin ɓa.
Ɓa ye ɓedo a Yesu viyi, abara ɓai wu ɓa nya, ɓai zhin zumun ta, ɓai zhin aduwa n gnisun.
Ɓa ɓo wo edna n mwa cei wo ɓa. Abara n jesun ɓa zhin aɓo wo-woyi n mwa.
A Yesu viyi ɓei zhin ɓai yezhi cici, ɓai gna anya n gnisun.
Ɓa ɓo kun ɓa nyabwa, ɓa gna ngnisun, n aza yi n ɓa gyisan.
Ɓai ga mwa-mwa nu aduwa nyakun, ɓai yezhi n aje puwa ntu zumunta ɓo. Ɓai gyi nyagyi ngnisun nagmadai.
Ɓai ci Shekwoyi, Har ezhi vinya kwa dagma nɓai, har Shekwoyi woi ɓe ɓa begye fyegyi-fyegyi.
Nwyihoyi n wyeshe yi, Bitrus n Yohanna yi, ɓa lo aduwa zhin ngnisun na za yi.
Vivi n aduwa nyakun yi, ɓa gye za-bmazhi shi. A ɓo ma wo lo nu nu. Cici ai ɓe n woi n abwokumin manayi ʼgbe, vivi n aduwa nyakun yi.
Shi Bitrus n Yohanna yi ɓei duya, wa ɓa sadaka.
Ɓa shi wo awye, Bitrus wa ciwo ge ʼshi awye ya.
Wa gye ngye ɓaye ɓa ga wo nya ho nu.
Amma Bitrus wa ciwo ge, “Yito nagyiwye yi lo ya gahon, Amma miɓa ga ho nyado. Dna Yesu Kristi Nazarati eye laka ha zan-zan.”
Bitrus wa shiwo bwa wa laka owo apita bwa lafiya wa gye agna. Wa zan woi gye agna. Wa kwo anyi woi ci Shekwoyi. Wa lo aduwa nyakun wa ci Shekwoyi.
Aza gye wo dna aduwa nyakun woi zan-zan, ɓa ci Shekwoyi.
Ɓa kpe ge wo zhin nyaɓayi nu, n wo shi abwokunmi manayi gbe cici nyi. To ɓa kpe shi kwa ze woi zan-zan m.
Ɓa busi lo Solomon ashiragyi, aba n wo ɓo gni n Yohanna n Bitrus shibwa, ce a wo ɓa vinya ntu ɓo wo-woyi ye ɓo.
Bitrus wa gna, “A Israilayi kniyi nu zhin cei wo fya? Fyei shi yi awye ngye ya zhin deye n yihin iko yiʼa?

Shekwoyi Ibrahim nya, n Ishaku yi, n Yakub yi ɓedo n yi azakwoyi nyayi na zhin deye, wo la Yesu ga mwa-mwa ntu aɓeye ɓo. Yesu n fye ɓo na wo aɓo n Bilatus abye nyi kwo shi ko nyi Bilatus ɓo la ye wa lo wo ya nyi.
Fye to ɓo ye a lo oza Gyi-gyi-yi yam, sai ʼzawuyi.
Fye ɓo la wye-wyei Dagayi wu, ama Shekwoyi ɓo la wye-wyei gawo njesun. Yohanna n mihin yi zhin aseda da nu gama yi ɓei ku wo gye n wye-wyeyi.
“Gaiciya ga, dna Yesu eye okwo na ka oza deye gna.
“Fye ɓei zhin Yesu aɓe deye dna n wyegma nu elonu ofye abyeda.
Ama anabci nu ɓo nu. Gama dole Kristi wa sin wahala ye.
Ko bmiya fya shan bugba do, fya ɓe Dagayi aba, Fye ye abui a zhan fye ya, fye ɓa bwa agmada m Shekwoyi aba.
Shekwoyi wo ɓa je fye tnu n fye Masihu yi.
Gama woɓa sase n ʼshe har anya vinya la kun n laifi, ɓo nu aɓo ku da n kwo-kwoyi. Musa ɓo da ge Dagayi ɓa ga fye anabi nfye mi ngye mihin, sai fya wo wo.
Oza n wo to wo won, aɓa wu wo.
“Samuila n Anabi yi, ɓei ku aɓe ye da nɓa zhin n anyipyei ye nyi.
Fyei ɓedo lo nu alkawali n Shekwoyi ɓo ga Ibrahim nyi. Nge ntu na a Israila yi ɓo, anyi vinya ɓa bwa Shekwoyi anabarka. Fyehin kwa fye zhin anabi nu.
Shi Shekwoyi ɓo ga wo abara wye-wyei n jesun wo ɓo tnu n wo yi n fye aba a Israila yi. Ntu ge wa tu fye anabarka. Wa pmi fye awye ya n fye alaifi.”
Amma sanu ɓa ɓei zhi ɓai daɓo na zayi nyi, a priest a dan-doka aduwa nyakun nya, n Assadukiyayi ɓa ɓe da ɓa.
Ɓa gyi minagyi, Nge Bitrus n Yohanna yi ɓa fa waʼazi zhin Yesu kala-ka nya evingwo.
Ɓa wan ɓa, ɓa ku ɓa gu fi n kurkuku, har efye a gyi.
Amma aza nɓa ɓei wo Bitrus waʼazi nyi ɓa ga gaiciya. A Yesu viyi ɓa ku mwa begye har aza ɓa ku sun 5,000 (dubu ngun atnu).
A ɓeye ɓo zhin, a Yahudiyi atukwoda, ɓai ye zhi n Urishelima n sayi.
Annas Pirist dnagmayi ɓo nyi n Kayafa yi, Yohanna, Alekzanda n na zajeyi n ɓa nyi n prist bwa.
A ɓe n Bitrus n Yohanna yi n ɓa ʼbye. Ɓa nya ɓa ge, “Fya bwa iko n na? Nyika ga fye izni fyei zhin ɓeyeʼa?”
Bitrus n nunuyi n Zafun Gyi-gyi yi wa gna, “Eyi abye atukwoda dnagmayi.
Fye daɓe manayi ye nu n na zhin zabmazhi nyi?
Ya zhin deye dna Yesu ye nu, Wo nu zhin Kristi n fye ɓo zundu nyi. Amma Shekwoyi ɓei la wye-wyei gawo, owo iko na zhin ce, ko kunce lo fya kpe lo nu.
Yesu Masihu nu n na daɓo ge, kuta n na nyamiyi na ko aɓo, oko nu la ze kuta kusurwa nya.
Gni-gni to lo n na babaho yin, n Eshe sinta, eye do to lo n aza ɓa yi ɓa pwo nkwo aba m.”
Shi ɓa ɓo gye Bitrus n Yohanna yi n bugba kala yi, ce a wo ɓa ntuge ɓa to zhin aza nu nɓa zhin makaranta m. Amma ɓa gye n sayi ge ɓa ɓo ku gnisun n Yesu yi.
A shaula zhin yi to ɓo mi, ɓa na zabmazhi kagna ɓo m, ntu ge wo ɓo gni ɓo n wohin.
Ɓa kun ɓa ya zhi ebmi.
Ɓa nya aje ge, “Yi ɓa zhin wuna naza deye yiʼa? Yi ta mi ya na aɓo wo-woyi ye ɓom, aku ce kpe n Urushelima vinya.
Amma yi ɓa mi ya hana nɓai to ɓa gyi abye m, ɓa ku ce pi. Ko kwa ɓa sin wahala.”
Shi ɓa ɓo ku da lonu ɓa yi ɓa, ɓa gna ʼfye to je nyaho da tu n Yesu tukwon.
Bitrus n Yohanna yi ɓa gna ge, fye gna yi kwo Shekwoyi ye ya vi oza ɓena nu kwo owo nya!
Yi ta mi ya fa aɓo wo-woyi da ɓo, na yi ɓo gye Yesu woi zhin woi da njesun nyi m.
A shaula zhinyi to ɓo mi ɓa ta ɓa m. Amma ɓa gna kni ɓa, ɓa fa ɓa lo. Ɓa ɓo gna ɓa ta ɓa, wahala ɓei ɓa laka, ntuge aza ɓo ci Shekwoyi ntu aɓo wo-woyi ɓo.
Zabmazhi ye ɓo ku aye bwa ngun-shinyi.
Bitrus n Yohanna yi ɓa kuka ɓa lo ɓa da abara je enya n ko ku zhin.
A Yesu viyi vinya ɓa yezhi, Ɓa zhin aduwa. Ɓa gna “O Dagayi n ha zhin eshe n ʼkni, a nuwan yi, n anya yi vinya n ɓa fi n ɓa nyi.

Sapai ho ɓo da ɓo eyi zakwoyi gbe Esu Dawuda, she Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi ɓei wu wo. Knihi nu zhin abyedo gyi minagyi n Dagayi, amama ɓai pa kulu tu Shekwoyi dnagmayi tukwo a? Asu anyi nya ɓa ku gbe gun ntu ge ɓa sun kun n Shekwoyi Nugun yi!
“Enya nu n kwa zhin n naiye! Hirudus n Bilatus gwamna yi ɓedo n a Israilayi yi ɓa la ʼgbe dnado gabna n Shekwoyi nugun yi, oho nugun kni-kniyi, oho fyenu gyi-gyi-yi.
Ɓa ta fa ɓo zhin ɓo n ho iko ye ɓa zhin.
O Dagayi wo ɓa shaula nukwoyi, ha ga ho a fyenubugba kala ɓa zhin waʼazi.
Tnu ho iko kagna nya yi, fa ya zhin aɓo wo-woyi dna n Yesu eye, oho fyenu gyi-gyi-yi.”
Shi ɓa ɓei zo aduwa zhin, nyakun kwa shan-shan, oɓa vinya ɓa nu n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi ɓa zhin waʼazi ntna edna.
A Yesu viyi bugba vinya ɓei nyi gmanyi nu. Ozaho-zahoi to ɓo shi nyanyaho yi n wo gmanyi ɓo nun, ɓa ɓo ce ga aje.
Abara ɓa zhin waʼazi Yesu kalala nya evingwo. Zumunta ɓei nyi nna a Yesu viyi mi dei-dei.
San-gyi to ɓe nyi nɓa ba m. Ntu ge afwaiza ɓei ku oɓa afan kun ɓa ɓe nagyiwye yi n abara aba, ɓa zhin ampanyi cei gnisun.
Misali Yusufu (aje wo yi nugun waʼazi zhin yi) wo bi Saiprus wo zhin Levi bye nu.
Wo ɓei la owo fwa knu, wa ɓe nnagyiwyei n aba, a gna aza n ɓa gyisan nyi.
Amma ozaho ɓo nyi ai yi wo ge Hananiya, owo nyikwo Safiratu. Wo ɓ o la owo ʼkni kun ce.
Ɓa kni agyiwye ɓa ɓe n cei ngye nya ɓa kun nu.
Amma Bitrus wa gna wo, “Hananiya, Shetan la nu ho bugba har hoi ce akata fi Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi.
Ofwa oho nya nu ho ɓei n dama yi ha kun, ko kwa to ha kun m. Esa hola kun agyiwye zhin ho nya nu ha ga kwo shi ho ye. Kni a zhin hoi zhin nlaiʼa?”
Hananiya n wo-woyi lo nu wa miya wa fi. Edna kwa wo azaho-zahoi.
A samari ɓa ku aje puwo ɓa lo ɓa wo bi.
Esa fyewyi owo nyikwo wa lo ɓe, to woi kpe enya nkwo ku zhin m.
Bitrus wa nya wo ɓo. “Fya kun ofwa na gyiwyei layi nu?” Wa ye ge “Eh”.
Bitrus wa gna wo, “Kni yi a zhin oho n ho ɓai fyei zhin shiri deye, fya mwi Shekwoyi zafun ko? Aza n ɓa bi oho ɓa nyi ɓa ɓe nyi ɓakaho bi.”
N sayi-sayi wa fi. A samari ɓa ɓe ɓa wo lafi ɓa lawo ɓa biwo vivi nwo ɓai.
Edna kwa wo ikklisiya vinya, du aza yi n ɓa ɓo ku ce wo.
Abara ɓa gyi abye dna Solomon ashiragyi, n yezhi cici ɓai zhin aɓo wo-woyi n mwa.
Azadoho to ɓei lo da ɓam, ama aza ɓei zhin ɓai gye ɓa mwa-mwa.
Aza n mwa begye ɓa ga gaiciya anugbayi du na nyikwoza yi.
A nyasan yi mwa begye, aɓe n ɓai nbmi ntuge Bitrus ofun kwa to ɓa, ɓa gwo kagna.
Aza ɓa kun n Urushelima a kauye, ɓa ɓe nna nyasan yi du nna za yi nɓa ɓei n alijenu yi, a ɓa ka gna vinya.
Amma pirist dnagmayi n asadukiyi ɓa wo she ntu atnu-tnu manayi ɓo.
Ba wan abara ɓa fi ɓa n kurkuku.
Amma nsukwoyi Malaika ɓe wa gu ɓa abaya ɓa kun. Wa gna ɓa ge.
“Fye lo aduwa nyakun fye zhin waʼazi wye-wyei nya.”
N labmi yi, ɓa lo aduwa nyakun ɓa zhin waʼazi. Amma pirist dnagmayi n wo atukoda aje yi, ɓa ye zhi na shaula zhinyi. Ɓa yi abara ɓe cei.
Dan-sanda wa lo kurkuku to wa gye ɓa fi m. Ɓa lo ɓa da atukwoda nya ɓa gye.
“Kurkuku abokunmi ɓo guguyi aza n ɓa gu aba nyi n zhi, amma esa ya guya, yi to gye zaho-zahoi n dna m.”
Ce awo ɓa vinya, to ɓa kpe nya nɓa ɓa zhin.
Ozaho wa ɓe wa da ge ai aza nfye zanshi nyi, ɓa fi nu n aduwa nyakun ɓai zhin waʼazi.
Yan-sanda tukwoda, ɓa lo ɓa wan abara, ɓai zhin ɓa peceye, ntuge ɓa ɓo wo aza dna. Har ɓa ɓe n ɓai n ashaula zhinyi aba.
Pirist dnaygmayi wa nya ɓa ge, “Kni a zhin to fyei vi eyi wyidna ma? Yi ku gna fye ge fye to je waʼazi zhin. Amma Urushelima la nu n fye wu-wu yi. Fye ye a gye eyi laifi nu dna oza deye fi ko?”
Bitrus wa gna ɓa ge, “Yi vi Shekwoyi ɓeda nu ndu oza nya.
Fye ɓo la esu gyi to nshiwan, fya wo wu. Amma Shekwoyi eyi azakwoyi nya ɓo la wo laka evingwo.
Shekwoyi lawo ze yerima ɓedo n gniyi. Wa zhin ce lo nu ntu ge a Israilayi ɓa ya bui, a zhin ɓa laifi gafara.
Eyihin ɓedo n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi n Shekwoyi ga zaho-zahoi n ya, yi zhin aseda da nu.”
Shi a shaula zhin yi ɓo wo lonu, ɓa gyi minagyi har ɓa ye ɓa wu ɓa.
Amma Gamaliel wa da ɓo ge, “A la abara kun ya zhin n bmi kpa.” Gamaliel ɓo zhin ilimi da nu. Aza mwa ɓai kpe lonu.
Wa gna wo azaje ge, “A Israilayi fye zhin peceiye enya yi nfye ye fya zhin aza ye nyi.
Fye ku ze amui enya Theudas ɓo zhin? Wo ɓo ɓe n gye oza dnagmayi nu. Har aza 400 ɓa viwo. Amma shi aɓo wuwo owo aviyi ɓa gnami.
“Elonu Yahuda Galili nya, ngadu sayi, wo ɓo ku aza bwi n mwa. Amma shi wo ɓo fi aza gna mi.
“Ntu ce nu mi ye fya fa ɓa. Nɓa zhin n ɓahin tukwo nu sa fyewyi ko ɓa ze gboloyi.
Amma ngye ɓa zhin Shekwoyi nya nu, fye ta mi fya hana ɓai m. Kada fya gye fyei zhin gaba n Shekwoyi.”
A shaula zhin yi ɓa yi abara ɓa lu ɓa. Ba gna ɓa ge ɓa to je Yesu ɓeda da m.
Abara kun ɓai dagma gama ɓa ku kunce ɓa sun wahala ntu Yesu ɓo.
Ɓa gyi abye fyegyi-fyegyi n aduwa nyakun ɓai wu nya ɓai zhin waʼazi ge Yesu nu zhin Kristi.
Shi a Yesu-viyi ɓei ku mwa begye a wahala ya kala ku. A Helleniyi ɓai gna, ata gye ɓa nuwan lo n ɓa anyigbayi-yin. A gna a Ibraniyi anyi-gbayi nyagyi ga lo.
Abara ɓa yezhi ɓa gna. “Waʼazi zhin yi tnu-tnu nu. Yi ta wun esa ya ntu nya gyi gna ɓo m.
Fa ya kni aza tnaba eyi m. Aza nɓa nunuyi n Zafun yi! N nyagyi ɓo.
Ntu ge ya mi ya bwa sa ya zhin aduwa n waʼazi ɓedo n wu-wu yi.”

Shaula ye kwa da ɓa, ɓa kni Istifanus, (Istifanus ɓei nunuyi n Zafun yi sosai). Ɓa kni njesun Filibus, Buruhoris, Nikano, Timon, Barminas n Nikolawus, Antakiya nya. Wo ɓei zhin ebye do nu n wo ɓo ga gaiciya.
Abara ɓa zhin aduwa ntu ɓa ɓo, ɓa kpe ɓa abwa tukwo.
A da Shekwoyi nabari abaho-bahoi. Aza n mwa ɓai ga gaiciya n Urushelima har du Ayahudiya yi aprist yi.
Istifanus ɓei nu Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi iko yi. Ntu ce nu wa mi wa zhin aɓo wo-woyi.
N wyihoi a Yahudiyi ɓa na ɓo n woi har a Yahudiyi n ɓa kun n Sirine, Alekzanda n Masar. Tarki Silisiya nya Asiya yi ɓa ʼgbe dna do.
Amma ɓa to ɓo min n Istifanus ɓo m. Gama wo ɓei nunuyi n ɓeyekpe yi, ɓedo n Zafun yi.
Sai ɓa ɓe aza yi ɓa ce akata fi Istifanus. Ɓa gna ge wa da Musa ɓenukwoyi woi ce akata njesun.
Deye kwa ga aza minagyi, A Yahudiyi atukwoda ɓa wan wo ɓa ɓe n woi n a shaula zhinyi aba.
Aseda katai da ɓa gna, “Istifanu wa da ɓeda nukwoyi ntu aduwa nyakun tukwo ɓedo n Musa owa yi.
“Yi ku wo woi da ge, Yesu ɓa la aduwa nyakun ya, wa she Musa owa ya.”
Aza vinya n ɓa ɓei fi ɓo nyi ɓa gye Istifanus awyeba la shando ngye malaika nya!
Pirist dnagmayi wa nya wo ge, “Aɓe ye wu lo nu.”
Istifanus wa gna ge, “Shekwoyi ɓei wu wohin tukwo eyi dada Ibrahim aba n Irak kafin wo lo Suriya.
Shekwoyi ɓei gna wo ge wo fa ʼkni, n wo azayi wa lo aba n wo ɓa wu wo.
Wa fa Kaldiya ʼkni wa lo Haran. Wa sase ɓo har owo dada wa fi, Shekwoyi wa gna ge wo lo Israila kni.
Shekwoyi to ɓo sa ekni gawo m, amma wo ɓei zhin wo Alkawali ekniyi nya vinya. Alkawali ye ɓo nu peceiye nu.
“Shekwoyi ɓo gna wo ge owo ayawyi ɓo fa ekniye ɓo zhin bauta ekni do har aye 400.
Amma Shekwoyi alkawali nu ge, wo ɓei kun ɓa n bauta. Wa ta ekni n kwa fi ɓa n bauta nyi.

“N sahi nu n Shekwoyi ɓo gna Ibrahim wa zhin kachiya. Deye zhin tuze nu Shekwoyi alkawali nya. A zhin Ishaku kaciya woi na anyipyei nymwa-nyimwa. Ishaku wa ma Yakub, Yakub wa ma eyi azakwoi awo-cei-aba a Yahudiyi bye.
Aza deye ɓa wo she n Yusufu yi, ɓa wo kun

wa ze fyenu dna n Masar ʼkni. Amma Shekwoyi ɓei kunsun nwoi, wa gni wo nwo awahala vinya, wa zhin Firʼauna Sa-Masar yi wa ye wo. Shekwoyi wa ga Yusufu ɓeyekpe, kwa zhin Firʼauna wa gwamna ga wo n Masarʼkni, wa wo ze tukwoda n garukwo.
“Sa fyewyi mikun laka n Kanʼana. Eyi adada to ɓa bwa nyagyi m.
Shi Yakub ɓo wo ge nyagyi lo n Masar, wa tnu n wo aɓi ɓa lo ɓa si.
Ba je bwa ɓayi lo, Yusufu wa wu ɓa wohin tukwo. A lo n ɓai n Firʼauna ba.
Sai Yusuf il wa tnu wo dada ɓo ɓedo n wo azaje yi, oɓa vinya ɓa ɓei nyi 70 nu.
