Eyi azaje nɓa ɓei fi n Roma nyi, ɓa ku wo ge yi ɓe lo, ɓa ɓe shegun yi n Abiyu gnikwo. Azado ɓa shegun yi n Ashiragyi ngun-ata. Shi Bulus ɓo gye ɓa, wa zhin Shekwoyi godiya, wa bwa bugba kala.
Shi yi ɓo si Roma, a ye Bulus ge wo dna wo nya abaho-baho n wo ɓa dna, sai dai soja ɓei zhin woi gu wo.

Shi wo ɓo si wa bwa anyipyei ngun ata, wa yi a Yahudiyi atukwoda wa da ɓo nɓai wa gna, “Omi azaje, a Yahudiyi nɓa fi n Urushelima nyi, ɓa na wan mi ɓai dna mi a Romayi akun, ko shi ko nyi mi to zhin nyaho-nyaho yi m, ko ma zhi za wuya kwo ɓo n kwo zhin kunnu eyi azakwoyi nya m.
“A Romayi ɓa ku owa da mi, ɓai ye ɓa ya mi, ntu ge ɓa to sun nyaho n mi aba nkwo kunce lo nfi yi, ngye shi a Yahudiyi atukwoda ɓei gna ge awu mi nyi m.
Shi a Yahudiyi atukwoda to ɓo ye a shaula yi m, to a wun aje bugba m, ma gye ko la mi ze tile ma gyi abye n ɓeda yi kwa lo Kaisar aba.
Ma yi fye ge fye ɓe n naiye ge ya kpe ajeye, magna fye ge, mi dna n agma ye ge, mi n gaiciya ga yi lo ge Masihu wa ɓe nu.”
ʼBa ye ɓa gna wo ge, “Yi to wo ɓoho tu nho tukwo m! Yi to bwa wasika n Yahudiya, ko naza nɓa kun lo n Urushelima, ɓai ɓe iya nyi m.
Ama yi ce pma ya wo enya ho gaiciya yi ga, enya dei n yi kpe lo, okwo nu ge abaho-bahoi vinya, aza ta ye a Yesu viyi lo m.”

Ɓa esa shi, nwyihi aza nmwa begye ɓa yezhi n wo puwa. Wa daɓo n ɓai tu Shekwoyi ebemi ɓo, woi wu ɓa aɓo ntu Yesu ɓo ngye shi aka fi n Littafi Gyi-gyi-yi, wa ya ɓa wu n attaura Musa nya ɓedo anabi yi, Wa ya ɓa wu n labmi yi har wyeshe!
Azaho ɓa ku gaiciya ga, ama azaho to ɓa gaiciya m.
Ɓa na Bo aje yi n mwa, ɓa kuka n ɓeda gmanyi shi n Bulus ɓo da ge, “Zafun Gyi-gyiyi ɓo ku ɓeda da cewo n anabi Ishaya gbe ge,
“Wa gna a Yahudiyi ge, ‘Fye ɓa wo fyei gye ama fye ta bwa awyega m,
ntu ge ofye abugba shin-shin lo, ofye atnubua ta ye lo ɓa wo m, fyei ku fye awye kpe to fya bwa awye gam, ntu ge fye ta ye lo fya gye, fya wo, fya bwa awye ga, fya ɓe ma ka fye gna m.’
Mi ye fya kpe ge, gni-gni Shekwoyi nya ye, kwo nyi ntu abyedo ɓo nu ce, ɓai ɓa gwo kwo.”
Bulus wa wo nya dna n wohin haya nyakun har aye ngun aba, woi gwo azhiɓeyi doho-doho nɓa ɓei ɓe wo wyegye.
Woi gna ɓa Shekwoyi ebe mi ɓo, n Dagayi Yesu Kristi yi, zaho-zaho yi to ɓo wo wo ɓi m.
Anugundo ye-yeyi n fye fi n Roma nyi, Wasikaye gmi n Bulus akun nu, Yesu Kristi bara kni-kniyi ntuge wa zhi waʼazi, Shekwoyi Nabari manayi nya.
Shekwoyi ɓei zhin nabari manayi ye alkawali tunyi nsapai, nwo anabi akun dna Alkawali kwo-kwoyi.
Kwo zhin nabari manayi nwo Nugun tukwonu, Yesu Kristi eyi Dagayi n wo ɓei ɓe ngye oɓi a mawo dna Dawuda Esu abe ɓi fye.
Owo kalala n efi kwo wu ge wo zhin Shekwoyi ikoda Nugun nu, n Shekwoyi nayi Gyi-gyi-yi.

Nsayi ye dna n Kristi, ala Shekwoyi alheri zeya pu eyi alaifi da n yi to kunce lo yagwo kwo gmanyi n amin. Nsayi ye wo tnuyi nge yi lo anyi, yi gna aza vinya n na bai vinya, aɓo ayakwo n Shekwoyi ku zhin ɓa nabai ɓa ga gaiciya ɓa vi wo ɓo.

Ofye, anugundo ye-yeyi nfye fi n Roma nyi, fye filo n na aza n wo ye, Yesu Kristi n la fye yi fya ze Shekwoyi anya, owo aza Gyi-gyi-yi. Shekwoyi sun-sun-gye n bugba fuyi vinya n ɓakun n Shekwoyi eyi Dada n Yesu Kristi, eyi Dagayi yi aba ɓa ze fye nya.

Ma gna fye kmisunyi aba vinya n ma lo, mawo ai dafye gaiciya ga ɓo. Ntuge akpe fye gaiciya ga dna n Shekwoyi yelo n anyi vinya. Misa Shekwoyi ami dna n Yesu Kristi n tu nabari manayi ye ɓo, n zaho-zahoi n fye mi.
Shekwoyi kpelo shi mi zhin ma zhin aduwa, ntu fye ɓo cici. Nyipyeyi n sukwoyi mi-i ɓe nfyei n fya bukatai, n za aba n mi zhin wo tnu-tnu n mi kalayi vinya, miyi gna aza nabari manayi owo nugun nya.
Mi zhin aduwa ma bwa esa n Shekwoyi ɓeye nu, ma gye fye njesun, nkwa yezhin omi zan kwa ze lafiya nya.

Ntuge a wo mi pwa ma ɓe fya ba n nabai ma ɓe fye gaiciya ga, n ko ɓa zhi ofye ikklisiya kwa mwa dna n Dagayi. Miye fye bmazhin lo ce, ntuge mita ye ma ɓe fye gaiciya ga nu gmanyin, amma ofye nya kwa ɓe mi kala. Zaho-i zahoi n yi mi wa bwa anabarka n na aje aba.
Mi n cei pmalo fya kpe omi azaje, nge mi ɓei ku shiri zhin n na bwai mwa-begye ma ɓe fye aba, (ama to ayen) n na abai ma zhin tnu-tnu n fye aba omi bwa apma, shi mi zhin n ikklisiya aje.
Ntuge mi n ta yakwoyi shi fye lo n azayi vinya, n na zayi n ɓala awye kna n na zayi n awye to kna ɓan, eh, n na ɓeyekpe yi n na azayi n ɓa ta kpe ɓeho yen.
Ntu lonu shi mi ɓa mi n sun, mi n mihin yeye yilo ma ɓe f a ba n Roma, ma zhin Shekwoyi nabari manayi waʼazi.

Nabari manayi Kristi nya vinyiko ta wo milon, Shekwoyi ikoda zokwonu n wo ɓe n na zayi ri Shemi n ɓa gwo ko. Aɓei zhin nabari ye waʼazi n kmisun na Yahudiyi aba nu, amma n sayiye ala aza vinya yi ɓa ɓe Shekwoyi aba n zokwo yeyi.

Nabari manayi ye gna yi ge, Shekwoyi zhin yi shiri ntu she ɓo, woi zeyi aza manayi n Shekwoyi awyeba. Esa n ya ga gaiciya ya kpema Yesu wa gniyi, nkwo ya-yai har okwo zo-zo, gaiciya ga nu gakwo. Shi a cei kafi dna n littafi “Oza n wa bwa wye-wyeyi woɓa bwa kwo dna n gaiciya ga n Shekwoyi aba nu.”
Amma Shekwoyi wu wo minagyi, n kwo gmi n she n na a laifida, n na ɓenukwoyi zhiyi tukwo, aza nukwoyi nɓa ce gaiciya abwa ya,
gama ɓa kpe Shekwoyi gaiciya ga ye lo kwo to ai wu ɓam, Shekwoyi la ɓeyekpeye dna ɓa n ɓa bugba mi.
Tunyi sapa, aza ɓei ku eshe gye n kniyi n Shekwoyi ɓei zhin, ɓai kpege wo lo n iko nyalo-nyalo nyayi. Ntu cenu ɓato naɓezeyi lo lon sanu ɓa ɓei gni agni zhi n Shekwoyi abye n wada wyi yin.

E, ɓa kpe owo ɓe yelo, amma ɓato yen, ko ɓa gawo mwa-mwan, ko ɓa zhin wo godiya n tu nwo bmazhin ɓo fyegyi-fyegyin. Safyewyi, ɓaya a nubwozhin abanza nya shi Shekwoyi wu, n nyayi nwo ye ɓa zhin. Oɓa bugba tnaceyi kwa ze wyegma kwa ku jeje.
Ɓai gyege ɓa ce-cei lo n tna Shekwoyi, ɓaku ze aza mama.
Nnavun, maimako ɓa ga Shekwoyi ikoda nyalo-nyalo mwa-mwa, ɓaku ashinwa, na kutayi ɓa zela ashan ɓa gyiɓa wye, alu, anya fanya, awa n na gbayizanyi-kwo-ciyi.
Ntuce nu Shekwoyi wa faɓa ɓa zhin anagbayi doho-dohoi nɓa ceyi pma, e, awye bwo ɓo n naɓo nukwoyi ɓai zhin nnajeyi nanyi.

Maimakon ɓa ga enya gaiciya, n ɓa kpe ge ko zhin gaiciya nu n Shekwoyi tukwo, ɓa kni a nya ɓai gwo kpe, ɓa ga akata gaiciya. Ntu lonu ɓa zhin aduwa ga anya n Shekwoyi azhin, amma to ɓa vi n Shekwoyi anabarkada ɓo, n wonu na zhin anya vinya nyin.
Cenu ɓei zhin Shekwoyi wa yaɓa bwa, ɓa zhin aɓo nukwoyi ye vinya. Har oɓa nyikwo ɓa fa zokwo n Shekwoyi wa zhin gaɓa, ɓa ce ɓai zhin a nagbayi n na jeyi.
Aza nugbayi, maimako ɓa zhin ɓo n kwo kunce n na nyikwozayi, shakpe kwa ɓa duwyi ɓahin-ɓahin, azanugbayi wangye n na jeyi, ntuce nu ɓa gwo ɓa lada dna n ɓa wye-wyeyi, tata n kwo kunce ɓa gwo.
Ntu lonu sanu n ɓa ɓei ya Shekwoyi bwa to ɓaye a kpewoyen, Shekwoyi wa ya ɓa bwa ɓa zhin aɓe awyebwo nya, n ɓa bugba nukwoyi zhin nubwo n cei.
Oɓa wye-wyeyi ɓa ku nu n na ɓe nukwoyi n laifiyi, shakpe, n na je bmiyi, eshe, zawu, gusun, akatace, bugba nukwoyi, n na aje ɓedayi.
Ɓa ɓei zhin aza ɓetuyi nu, ɓai wun Shekwoyi nu, awyegba-ciyi, a tukwo-mwayi, cici ɓai zhin azokwo woi-woyi nubwo shi ɓa ɓa zhin ɓenukwoyi, to ɓai vi oɓa zakwoyi ɓom.
Ɓa ta ye awyegan, to ɓai nu alkawali n, n tna ye-ye, n tna sun-sun gye.
Ɓa ɓei kpe Shekwoyi tata, tu aɓeye tukwo ofi nu, amma ɓa gyi abye n zhin yi har, ɓai dna aza kwoce nge ɓa zhin lonu ce.

To, kpesun, ho cilo ge, ʼaza, ukwoyi nu n na daɓo n ya. Amma lapmi, ho zhin oza laifi da nuce. Sanu n ha ci n cei ge ɓa zhin aza nukwoyi nu, kwoi bmiya lo a gaba tata, ho da hohin tukwo ɓo nu ce, ntuge ho zhin aɓeye lo ce.
Yi kpelo ge, Shekwoyi ɓei da wa woi zun aza kni n ɓa zhin aɓeye pya.
Ho gye ngye Shekwoyi ɓei da aza owa, Wo la hoi da fwa, hoi zhin aɓoho lo n hohin?
Hota gye lo shi Shekwoyi zhin hakuri n hoi m? Ko ho ta kula lo ma? Hota gye lon, esaye vinya woi pmi ho to woi tahon, woi gaho sa ha pmi avun wu ho a laifin. Wo wuho alheri deye ntu ge haye abui nu.
Amma, fyeta kna tnubua lo n, fye ye minagyi nukwoyi zhi fyehin ntu fye abugba kala kpe ɓo, n ge fyeta pmi avun wu of ye alaifin. Minagyi nyipyei ɓelo n Shekwoyi ɓei da anyi vinya wa.
Wo ɓei ga oza shi owa tnu-tnu a mu gawo n sun.
Wo ɓei ga aza n ɓa zhin Shekwoyi ɓeye n hakuri yi, Wye-wyei nyalo-nyalo nya, ɓai zan mwa-mwa n latu yi shin n wyewye yi nyalo-nyalo nyai nwo ganyi.
Ama wo ɓei ga aza tata n ɓa gni a papa n Shekwoyi gaiciya yi, ɓai zan-zan fi n na zokwo nukwoyi, aɓei ze Shekwoyi minagyi ya kpe ɓa.

Bugba wun, n na zhingye yi, ɓei bwa a Yahudiyi. Na a zayi n ɓato zhin a Yahudiyi m vinya, n ɓa gyi abye n ɓenukwoyi zhin yi. Amma aza nɓa vi wo ɓo, ɓa ɓei bwa mwa-mwa n bugba fu yi, ko Yahudiyi nu kwo aza nɓato zhin a Yahudiyim.
Ntuge Shekwoyi zhin zaho-zahoyi ɓo n tna awyekwo.

Wo ɓei ta laifi aba n kwo nyi vinya. Wo ɓei ta ashan-gbayi, koda-yake, ɓato n Shekwoyi awyidna yi kashi lo n, gama nɓa bugba mi, ɓa kpe ɓe manayi yelo n nukwoyi. Shekwoyi awyidna kafi lo n ɓa bugba mi. Oɓa la-ami kwoi zunɓa kni. Ko kwoyi daɓa wa, Shekwoyi ɓei ta a Yahudiyi ntu ɓenukwoyi zhin ɓo, ntu ge ɓa n wo awyidna yi ka shi lo, ama to ɓai shi ɓa bwan. Ɓa kpe ɓe manayi ye, ama ɓata zhin kon. Ata ga aza gni-gni n ɓa kpeɓeye n naɓa zhin sai aza n ɓa zhin kwo.
Nyipyei ɓelo n Shekwoyi ɓei da aza nukwoyi wa, nɓa ɓemwi nukwoyi, dna n Yesu Kristi. Deye kwonu zhin Shekwoyi shiri n mi zhin waʼazi.
Ofye a Yahudiyi fye zhin nubwo ge ɓeho to dnalo nfye a tasin n Shekwoyi n, ntuge wo ɓei ga fye owo wyidna fyei zhin a ɓokwo, fyei gna n ge fye zhin owa nugundo manayi nu.
Fye kpeɓeye lo nwo ye, fye kpe ɓe nukwoyi yelo n ɓe manayi fyei gna manayi ye, ntuge aɓe ku wyidna wufye, fyei n na ɓinayi.
Fye kpe Shekwoyi zokwo ye lo har nfye ɓawu wyebuayi ko n bwanyi yi. Fye gye fyehin nge a fitila nu fyei wu aza zokwo n ɓa fi n wyegma, n ɓata kpe Shekwoyi ye n.
Fye gye ge fye ɓa mi, fya wu aza n na ɓi yi Shekwoyi zokwo, ntu ge fye kpe owo wyidna yelo n ɓa zhin ɓeyekpe n gaiciya yi nyi.
E, fyewu aza knunu zhin, kninu zhin to fyei wu fyehin ma? Fye gla aza ge ɓato wyivi m, fyehin fyei wyivi?
Fye gna ko to bmiya aza zhin anagbayi n, fyei zhin n fyehin? Fye gna ato gba ashan fyei ze agyiwye efye Shekwoyi.
Fye zhin aɓekwo n ge fyekpe Shekwoyi awyidna ye, ama fyei dnawo vinyikwo to fyei shi ɓa bwan.
Gaiciya nu n littafi a da, nge Anyi da ɓeda nukwoyi n Shekwoyi tukwo n tu n fye ɓo.
Ayi oza ye Yahudiyi nu kwo zhin ɓe manayi nu, n ho shi wo awyidna bwa. Ama n ho to shi ɓa bwan, ho to du aɓe nukwoyi zhinyi lo n. (Atna-kaciya zhinyi).
Ndei a shangbayi shi Shekwoyi awyidna bwa, Shekwoyi ta gaɓa mwa-mwa n yanci yi, n wa zhin shiri ge wa ga a Yahudiyi nyi n?
Ɓehin-hin ashan-gbayi ɓoku dufye a Yahudiyi, n fye kpe Shekwoyi ɓeye n mwanyi, n wo alkawali yi shinyi, to fyei shi owa wyidna bwanyin.
Fye to zhin a Yahudiyi hin-hin nu shifye azakwoyi zhin a Yahudiyin, kwo kuwa shifye zhin kaciyan.

Aʼa, Oza n wo bugba wulo cewo n Shekwoyi aba, wonu zhin Yahudiyi hin-hin. Ntuge Shewoyi ta dna aza wye nu n ɓa sa ɓa nayi yan n Kaciya zokwon, ama wo dna ozanu wye n wo bugba manayi. Oza n wo bugba do shanye kpe n wo wye-wyei mi wo ɓa bwa latu n Shekwoyi abanu, to ge n fye abam.
Mi gye ampanyi nza zhin Yahudiyi nyi? Gyiba manayi ho lo n Shekwoyi aba? Ampanyi ho lo n na Yahudiyi kaciya n ɓa zhin nyi?
E, ampanyi lo n oza ɓa n wo zhin Yahudiyi, Kmisunyi Shekwoyi ɓei gaɓa owo awyidna. (N nabai ɓa kpe, ɓa zhin wo ɓeye).
Gaiciya azaho n ɓa mi to ɓei n aminci yi n, ntuge ɓa ɓei bma alkawali ya n Shekwoyi yi, kwa wu nu ge Shekwoyi ɓa bma wo alkawaliya?

Aʼa, ko shi kwo nyi aza vinya n na anyi zhin aza kata nu, Shekwoyi to zhin zakatan nun. Ho pa enya lo n litafi n Zaburada n deye tukwo? Shekwoyi ɓeda ta shan don, ci-ci kwo zhin gaiciya nu. Ko nyikadonu nu na nya ɓa ɓo.

Ama, azaho ci ge, owo ɓeda n yi to shi bwa nyi n, kwo n na ampanyi yilo, eyi alaifi ku ampanyi zhin, ntu ge aza ɓa gye shi Shekwoyi yeye nyi, esa ɓa gye shi yi zhin aɓe nukwoyi zan. Kwo bmiya lo n wo aba wa tayi, esa ya zhin ɓe nikwoyi, eyi alaifi yi bwa wo go bmazhin?
Shekwo sauka. Kni Shekwoyi pya nu to woi ta laifin ma? Wo ɓa zun oza kni n wu na?
Ntuge wota mi wa da mi owa, wa zunmi kni ngye laifi da n, ndei omi tna gaiciya ɓe wolo n mwa-mwayi koi wuge wo zhin gaiciya da nun.
N ha vi kwo lo nu, ha gye shi yi gna ɓenukwoyi zhin nu dudu. Shekwoyi wa gna kwo ye. Amma aza n ɓa da abeye pya knizun kunce lo n ɓa aba. Dudu lonu aza ho gye ge nya nu n mi zhin waʼazi.
To, eyi a Yahudiyi du aza je lo? Ko fyewyi, ntuge, yi ku luwu ge aza vinya zhin a laifi danu. Ko a Yahudiyi ko aza nɓa to zhin a Yahjudiyin.
She littafi a da, za manayi to lo n, zaknayi to lon nna nyimi n wo to zhin laifi danu n.
Ozato lo n wo vi Shekwoyi zokwo cewo ko n wo n cei pma wa vin.
Zaho-zahoi la wonya pmiya, aza vinya nku ɓenukwoyi zhin, oza to lo n bwaho n wo zhin ɓe manayi ko zaknayin.
Oɓa ɓeda tucegye, n ce asin ngye vingwo nkwo gu-guyi ya gni. Oɓa nyitala nu-nuyi n na katayi. Ɓeda doho-dohoyi nɓa da kwo n mwi nukwoyi fi, n kwo ɓa wu oza.
Oɓa gbe, nu-nuyi n na aknikpe yi n minagyi yi.
Ba pye-pyeyi n za wu, ɓai wun za nu n wo to gwo ɓa ɓedan.
Abaho-bahoi n ɓa lo ɓa fa bugba wun n wahala yi n na azhingye yi.
Ɓa ta kpe enya ye n na yi ge, bugba fun kwo Shekwoyi anabarka m.
Ɓa ta gye ɓa nuwan n Shekwoyi, kwo enya n wo zhin nubo n ɓa tukwon.

Ntucenu Shekwoyi minagyi n wagyi tulo mwa n na Yahudiyi, ntu ge oɓa tnu-tnu nu, ɓa shi Shekwoyi awyidna bwa, ɓace ɓai zhin aɓo nukwoyi, zaknayi n ɓami to n na ɓenayi lo lon. Ɓehin-hin anyi vinya to n na gmiba yi lon n Shekwoyi ikoda abyen.

Nsayi ye, hoku gye? Za to lo n naɓa zewo oza manayi n Shekwoyi abam, ntuge wo zhin ɓo n na awyid-na da m. Ntuge yi kpe Shekwoyi awyidnaye, ya gye to yi gna ɓa bwa shin, owo awyidna wu yi ge, yi zhin aɓe nukwoyi zhin yi nu.

Amma nsayiye Shekwoyi ku eshe zokwo do wuyi, gbo, n na wyidna bwashi yi, amma n zokwo woyi (ko-daya-ke zokwo woyi nu to n, ntu ge Shekwoyi ɓeda ku gna yi tunyi n sapa). Nsaiye Shekwoyi wa gna ge woɓa gwo yi, wa zeyi a tna laifi da. N ya kpema Yesu Kristi wa zo yi a laifi, wa zhin yi gafara. Aɓa gni yi n zokwo deye n ya ɓe Kristi aba. Ko hoi zhin nyika donuʼa, Ko hoya zhin kni laifi nuʼa. Aza vinya nku laifi zhin ɓai ku gba kpekpe-gye n Shekwoyi mwa-mwa aba,
Ama nsayi yi ku ze aza akni-kni-yi, ntu wo alheli ɓo, nɓa ɓe dna n gni-gni n Yesu Kristi aba nyi.

Shekwoyi wa tnu n Yesu yi ntu ge, wa ze doshan nya nya ntu oyi alaifi ɓo, ozaho-zahoi nwa ga gaiciya aku gafara zhin wo. Shekwoyi wa shin deye ntu ge wa wu ge wo zhin ɓefyecei nu, nsa avun nya, wo ɓei la bugba bwa n laifi-i, to wa ga aza ta-ta m
wa zhin deye nsayi ye ntu ge, wa wu ge wo zhin oza kni-kni-yi nu, woi ɓa mi wa gmi oza ya tu nwa ga Yesu gaiciya, wohin ce wa ze oza kni-kni-yi.
Nyaho lo n zanyikwoci ɓa mwa wohin nkwo ɓo? Nge awo. Ntu kniɓehia? Ntu ge yi shi awyidna bwa? Awo, ama ntu gaiciya ga ɓo.
Onya gmanyi nu n yi kpe lo, okwo nu ge a ta bwa gni-gni n awyidna bwashi ɓo nu m, ama n gaiciya ga aba.
Mi nya ge, Shekwoyi zhin Ayahudiyi Shekwoyi nu gmanyi, Wo to zhin abyedo Shekwoyi nu ce n? Cewo wo zhin ɓa nya nu.
Shekwoyi gmanyi nu, owo nu ɓa gni Ayahudiyi ntu ɓa gaiciya ga ɓo, owo nu-i ɓa gni abyedo, ntu ba gaiciya ga ɓo.
Shi kwo wu lo nu nyi, ta gye yi ɓa ku awyidna ze gboloyi n? Nge awo, awyidna ze gboloyi n? Nge awo, awyidna nɓa apmayi lo.

Dna n nayi Ibrahim nu zhin eyi a Yahu-diyi dada. Ko ɓei wo n wuna dna nɓenya yemiʼa, gaiciya ga n gni-gni yiʼa? Ntu nwo atnu-tnu manayi ɓo nu n Shekwoyi ɓei gwo wo? Ngye lonu nu, yi n nyai lo n yi ɓa gma. Ama n Shekwoyi aba Ibrahim to n na abayi lo n wo ɓa gma kwo wa zhin aɓekwo n.
Ntuge, Littafi ku gna yi ge Ibrahim ɓei ga Shekwoyi gaiciya, ntuce nu Shekwoyi wa zo wo alaifi wa yi wo oza gyi-gyi-yi.

Ama wo to ɓei lo eshe ntu n wa aɓo amanayi ɓo nu n wo ɓei zhin nyin? Awo, gni-gni zhin Shekwoyi cauta nu. Aga aza nu n ɓa to zhin tnu-tnu n tu nkwo ɓo n. Ntuge Shekwoyi ze alaifi da a gyi-gyi-yi n wo awyeba, ɓai ya ga Kristi gaiciya, wa gni ɓa n Shekwoyi minagyi.
Dawuda Esuɓei ku oza agmada ɓeda wato laifida n Shekwoyi la wo ze oza gyi-gyi-yi ntna laifi nwo abye.
Anabarka da nu oza n Shekwoyi ku gafara zhin wo, wo la oza laifi kuya n wo awye ba.
E, agmada yakwo nu n za aba n na aku abui zowo, to Dagayi shan wo alaifi ba m.

Nsaiye ɓonya nyi ge; aga aza nu anabarka n ɓa ga Kristi gaiciya ɓai shi a Yahudiyi awyidna bwa, ko aga aza nu anabarka n ɓata shi a Yahudiyi awyi-dna bwan, amma ɓai kpe ma Kristi a? Ibrahim ma, n ya gna ge wo ɓei gwo anabarka ntu wo gaiciya gaɓonu. Gaiciya ga nu gmanyi? Ko ntu ge wo ɓei shi a Yahudiyi awyidna bwa nuʼa?
Ntu ge aga ɓonya deye amsa, sai a ga deye amsa kpa. Shekwoyi ɓei ga Ibrahim owo anabarka n kni sayiʼa? Tun kafin wo ze Yahudiyi, kalm wo zhin kaciya.

Nna avun nu n Shekwoyi ɓei zhin wo alkawali ntu n wo gaiciya ga ɓo, a zhin wo kaciya. Kaciya zhin ɓei wuge Ibrahim n gaiciya ga yi lo, njesun ge Shekwoyi ɓei lawo lu gwo wa zewo tna-laifi da, oza manayi nwo awyeba kafin a zhin wo kaciya. Ntu lo nu Ibrahim nu zhin dada, zafun nya, n aza aba nɓa ku gaiciya ga, ai la ɓa gni to ɓai shi Yahudiyi awyidna bwan. Yi ku gye nu aza nɓa ta shi awyidna bwan, Shekwoyi nu gniɓa ntu ɓa gaiciya ɓo.

Ibrahim nu zhin a Yahudiyi dada dna n zafun n na ku kaciya zhin ɓa. Ɓa ɓa gye n wo ɓesisi nge kaciya zhin nu tagni ɓa m, ntu ge Ibrahim ɓei bwa Shekwoyi alheri ntu wo gaiciya ga ɓonu gmanyi, kafin azhin wo kaciya.

Kwa wunu cewo ngye Shekwoyi alkawali, nwo ɓei zhin Ibrahim nwo byei nyi, nge wo ɓa gawo anyi vinya nyi. Woto ɓei zhin wo alkawali ye ntu ge wo ɓei shi Shekwoyi awyidna bwa nun, ama ntuge wo ɓei ga wo gaiciya.
Ntuce nu n dei hoye gnalo ge Shekwoyi anabarka lo aza banu n ɓa zhin ɓemana, ho gna nu ge, Shekwoyi alkawali n na a gaiciya gayi aba kwo zhin gbeloyi nu, gaiciya ga n la ze nyaze.

Ama gaiciya ɓeda ye nya nu nyi. Sa nu n ya zhin atna ge ya bwa Shekwoyi anabarka n gni-gni yi, n na ɓemanayi zhin ɓo, n wo awyidna bwa shi yi, yi zhin ya zo fi n wo minagyi nu, ntuge ci-ci yi ta mi nɓa bwa shin. Zokwo gmanyi n yi ɓa fa awyidna bmaya ɓo, yito bwa wyidna kwo gmanyin.

Ntu lonu, agayi Shekwoyi anabarka ntu gaiciya ga ɓo nu. Cauta nu yi ɓa gwo kwo to yi ya vi a Yahudiyi kunun, n yi n gaiciya gayi lo ngye Ibrahim. Ntuge Ibrahim nu zhin yi dada sa n kwa ɓe gaiciya ga aba.

Nya nu n littafi a da, sa n kwo ciyi ge Shekwoyi ɓei la Ibrahim ze oda aza begye nya. Shekwoyi ɓa gwo aza vinya n ɓa ga Shekwoyi gaiciya shi Ibrahim ɓei zhin nyi. Alkawali deye gmi n Shekwoyi aba nu, n wo zhin a zafi ɓai bwa wye-wyeyi n jesun nyi, woi da aɓo ɓo n ɓa ɓei zhin n abye n gyeɓaku luzhin.
Ntu lo nu, sa n Shekwoyi ɓei gna Ibrahim nge, wo ɓa gawo ɓi n wo ɓa bwa ebye gawo n mwa, waze ebye yakwo, Ibrahim ʼbei la Shekwoyi ga gaciya ko shi ko nyi kwo ɓei zhin ɓo ɓedna yi nu.
Ntuge, owo gaiciya ga ɓei n kalayi, wo to ɓei damu ge wola kwo n, nna ɓa yi wo ge oda nyin. Woi aye yi tagyi, Saratu owo nyikwo aye ce Shi-ciwa-gmanyi, wo ɓei la du aɓima saya.
Ama Ibrahim to ɓei zhin Shekwoyi shakan, wa ga Shekwoyi gaiciya ntuge, owo gaiciya ga nwo awyetu yi ɓei n kalayi. Wa ci Shekwoyi ntu anabarka ye ɓo, to woi lu ɓa bwan.
Wo ɓei n gaiciyai ga ge Shekwoyi ɓa mi wa nu ɓo n wa da.
Ntu Ibrahim gaiciya ga ɓo, Shekwoyi wa zhin wo alaifi gafara, wa ze oza ntna laifi.
Nsaiye, ɓeda wo-wo yi ye nge aɓei gwo wo ntu nwo gaiciya ga ɓo nu, ko to ɓei zhin ntu Ibrahim gyi ba ɓo nu gmanyin.
Kwo zhin eyi nyanu, kwo wuyi ge Shekwoyi ɓa gwo yi n zokwo gmanyi, shi wo ɓei gwo Ibrahim nyi–sanu n ya ga Shekwoyi alkawali gaiciya, n wo ɓei la Yesu eyi Dagayi kala n efi nyi.
Wo ɓei fi ntu yi alaifi ɓo wa laka n vingwo ntu ge wa ze yi aza ye-ye yi n Shekwoyi aba. Woi nu yi n Shekwoyi ɓe manayi.
Ntu lonu, nsayi ye shi aku yi ze abefyecezhin yi n Shekwoyi abye nyi, ntu yi gaiciya ga ɓo n wo alkawali. Yi ɓa bwa bugba fu hin-hin nsaiyi ntu n ɓo n Yesu Kristi eyi Dagayi ku zhin ga yi nyi.
Ntuge, ntu n yi gaiciya ga ɓo nu n wa ɓe n yi n aba n yi gni-agni zhin n saiye nyi. Yi n bugba kalayi n agmadayi, yi shiwye ya ze enya n Shekwoyi n ceyi dna n bugba ntu yi ɓo ya ze.
Yi ɓa dagma ce sanu n ya lo wahala ncei, ntu ge yi kpe ge ko n na pmayi lo-lo n yi aba, ɓa wu yi shi yi ɓa zhin hankuri.
Hankuri zhin kwa ɓe n kala yi kwa bma yi zhin ya kpema Shekwoyi esayi vinya, ya zhin apma n kwoi har esa n yi awyetu n gaiciya gai ɓa bwa kala n mi gni yi.

Nnavun, sanu n kwo zhin lonu, yiɓa mi ya bwa bugba kala ko knidonu na zhin yiʼa, yi kpe ge nyaho ta zhin ntuge yi kpelo shi Shekwoyi yeyi, yi wo ye-ye yi lo n yi abugba mi, ntuge Shekwoyi zafun dnalo n yi mi, woi nuyi a bugba n wo yeye yi.
Sanu n yi to ɓei n bmazhin yi, n tna gni-gni zokwo, Yesu wa ɓedna n sai dai-dai wafi ntu n yi alaifi ɓo, eyi n yi to ɓei n na pmayin.
Ko yi n na pmayi, yi to ɓei dnace nge ozaho ɓa fi n yi ɓon, ko shiko nyi kpekni ko ɓei ɓa yezhin lonu.
Ama, Shekwoyi wa wuyi owo yeye shiwa tnu n Kristi yi, wa fi tu n yi ɓo, tunyi yi ye zhin a laifi da.
Shi kwo nyi nwo ami yi nu, nwa zhin aɓedeye gayi, yi ye zhin alaifi da, ai, woɓa gna zhin-zhin gayi nu n sayi, shi wo layi gni nyi. Nsayi wo ɓa gni yi n Shekwoyi minagyi vinya n kwo ɓelo nyi.
Tunyi, yi ye zhin wo anuɓayi, a jeze ɓe n yi n Shekwoyi aba, ntu n wo Nugun efi ɓo. Anabarka yakwo nu, n yi ɓa gna bwa n sayi n yi ku zhin wo anugundo nyi, woi dna lo n yi mi.
Nsayi ye, yi dagma ntu jedoɓe woi-woi ɓo n Shekwoyi, ntu nya ɓo n yi Dagayi Yesu Kristi wa zhin gayi, nwa fi ntu yi alaifi ɓo nyi, woi zeyi Shekwoyi a nugundo.
Sanu Adamu ɓei zhin laifi, ɓenukwoyi zhin a lo anyi vinya. Owo laifi kwoi gna efi laɓa n na anyi vinya, ntucenu anya vinya ɓai kwo, ɓai fi, ntuge aza vinya n ku laifi zhin.

Yi kpelo ge Adamu laifi nu na ɓe nɓe deye yi, ntuge kodayake, aza ɓei zhin ɓai zhin Benukwoyi tun Adamu sa, har Musasa, Shekwoyi to ɓei zhin woi daɓa ofi wa ntuge ɓa bma wo a wyidna yan, gama woto ɓei gaɓa owo awyidnan, kwo wo gna ɓa enya n wo ye ɓa zhin.

Ntu lonu sanu n ɓa nayi ɓei zhin kwoi fi, kwo to ɓei fi ntu n ɓa laifi ɓo nun, ntuge, ɓa to ɓei zun Shekwoyi owa gna, shi Adamu ɓei zhin nyi m. Dogbe lo n Adamu a tasin n Kristi yi n wo to ɓei lu ɓe nyin.

Doshan lo dna oza laifi n Shekwoyi gafara zhin yi. Ntuge zaknayi ye, Adamu ɓei ɓe aza mwa begye n fiyi ntu nwo laifi ɓo, Ama zaknayi ye, Yesu Kristi woi ɓe aza n mwa begye a gafara zhinyi dna n Shekwoyi sun-sun-gye.
Adamu laifi gmanyi ɓei ɓe aza nfi lada yin n mwa. Ama Kristi woi ku alaifi n mwa woi ga wye-wyeyi manayi nfi aba.
Zaknayi laifi Adamu, kwo la zhin esu tu n na aza tukwo vinya, ama oza n wa gwo Shekwoyi cauta, gafara zhin n lo-lo, ɓaku zhin wye-wyeyi asu ntu zaknanyi ɓo, Yesu Kristi.
E, Adamu laifi ɓei ɓe n tata yi n na aza tukwo vinya, ama Kristi ɓe manayi zhin kwa ze aza aɓe-fyece zhinyi n Shekwoyi abye, n na bai ɓa pwo.
Adamu wa zhin aza n mwa begye, ɓa ze alaifi da, ɓai zun Shekwoyi ɓeda gna, ama Kristi wa zhin Shekwoyi woi gwo aza n mwa begye ntuge wo ɓei vi ɓo.
Aɓei ga awyidna ngun awo, n nabai zahozahoi wa gye aba nwa kaya n Shekwoyi awyidna bwashi. Ama, sanu ya gye eyi alaifi, ya gye Shekwoyi alheri dna ngafara zhin mi n mwa.

Nsapai, laifi ɓei gyi ʼbe tu n aza tukwo vinya kwoi ɓe n ɓai nfi, ama nsayi ye Shekwoyi alheri nu gyi be, kwoi gayi a gni-gni manayi n Shekwoyi abye, n wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nyayi n Yesu Kristi eyi Dagayi.
To, yi ɓa gyi abye n ɓenukwoyi zhin yi, n nabai Shekwoyi wa gyi abye n yi alheri wuyi n gafara zhin yi?

Awo, yiɓa gyi abye n laifi zhinyi to kwoi zhin dole nu? Ntuge aɓei la laifi iko bmaya n yi tukwo, sanu n yi ɓe ze a Yesu viyi nyi, a zhin yi baptisma ya ze gmanyi n Yesu yi, ntu nwo efi ɓo, aɓei la ofye nanyi laifi zhin nya iko bmaya.
Aɓei la of ye nayi laifi nya bi dna n baptisma sanu n woi ɓei fi, sanu Dada Shekwoyi n wo iko dnagmayi, ɓei jeze ɓe n Yesu yi n wye-wyeyi n efi, aɓei la owo wye-wyeyi woi-woyi ga yi ya dagma.
Ntuge fyeku ze nayi gmanyi n woi, ntu cenu fyeku fi n woi sanu n wo ɓei fi nyi, nsayi wo ga fye owo wye-wyei woi-woyi, fye ɓei kukala evingwo shi wo ɓei lakala.
Aɓei la ofye a shakpe nukwoyi zundu n gnisun n woi, ofye nayi n kwo ye laifi nyi, aɓei lakwo gwoya a tu kwo eci nukwoyi n nabai ofye laifi nayi to kwo shan dna n laifi sirtan, to kwa ze laifi baran.
Sanu, nfye ku fi n laifi aba fyeku pwo nkwo kwocedna n kwo ikoyi nfye tukwo.
Tunda of ye nanyi kwo-kwoyi laifi ye nya ɓei lafi n Yesu yi, yi kpelo ge wo ɓa gayi owo wyewyeyi.
Kristi la laka n vingwo wo ta shan fi n jesun, efi to n iko dohoi shan sun lo n wo tukwon.
Wo ɓei fi bwazun gmanyi wa zo laifi iko, ama n sayiye wo n vrye-wyei lo n sase n Shekwoyi nyalo-nyalo.
Ntu lonu fye ze of yehin aza fi-fiyi n laifi aba, to fya ye laifi ayin fya ku ze awye-wyei da n Shekwoyi aba fyei wo-wo dna n Yesu Kristi eyi Dagayi.
Fyeto ye laifi kwa bwa iko tu nfye nanyi tukwo n shan sun, fye to ye okwo ashakpe nukwoyi n.

Fye to ye ega doho nfye nanyi kwa ze ɓenukwoyi zhin nyan, kwa ze laifi zhinya, ama fye ga fyehin tukwo vinya n Shekwoyi akun nfye aga yi vinya, ntu ge fye la kun n efi, fye ku ze apmanya n Shekwoyi akun, wa zhin apma n fyei n wo ɓeye gmanyi.
Laifi to shan fye tukwo da zen, ntuge fye to ye filo n ewa suntan, aba n laifi ɓa zefye owo baran. Ai fye n yanci yi lo dna n Shekwoyi alheri n sun-sun gyei.
Kwo wunu ge yi ɓa gyi abye n ɓenukwoyi zhin yi to ya gye yi anuwan n kwo ɓeyin? (Ntuge eyi gni-gni to lo n ge sai ya shi awyidna bwanun, ama Shekwoyi alheri nu), awo.
Fye ta kpe lon nge fye ɓa mi fya kni fye dagayin? Fye ɓa mi fya kni laifi (n fiyi) ko, ɓovi (n gyi-gyi-yi) oza nfya ga fyehin tukwo n wo a kun wonu ɓa lafye wa ze of ye dagayi fya zewo afyenu.
Fye gode n Shekwoyi, ntu ge fye ɓei zhin laifi abara nu, nsaiye fyeku ɓovi n fye abugbayi vinya, enya n Shekwoyi wa wufye.
Nsayi ye, fyela kun n ifye dagayi kwo-kwoyi akun, laifi, fyei ku ze ofye dagayi woi-woyi abara, ɓefyece.

Mi daɓo n layi mi-i zhin apma n ɓesisi abara nya n na dagayi nyayi, ntuge fya bwa awyega n pye. Shi fye ɓei zhin abara laifi gbo-gbo nya nyi, ntu lonu, nsaiye fye fa fyehin fya ze abara aɓe manayi nya nɓeyi vinya n kwo gyi-gyi-yi.
Nsapai n fye ɓei zhin laifi bara, fye to ɓei gye fye anuwan n ɓe manayi zhin yin.
Fya bwa kni gyiba yiʼa? Gyiba to ɓei bmiyam, tunda vinyikwo wo fyelo fyei ya zhin aɓo nubo n fyeɓei zhin fyei zhin nyi. Ntuge aɓeye zofi n anapi nu n Shekwoyi minagyi yi.
Ama n sayi ye fye la kun n laifi iko, fye ku zhin Shekwoyi abara, owo gyiba nwo ga fye okwo nu gyi-gyi n wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya yi.
Gama laifi lada ofi nu, amma Shekwoyi cauta wye-wyei nyalo-nyalo nya nu dna n Yesu Kristi eyi Dagayi.
Fye ta kpelon omi azaje aye-yei, a Yahudiyi dna n Kristi sanu n oza lafi owa to n iko yi shan sun lo n wo aban?
Ma ga ɓesisi; sanu nyikoza pamula owa n lawo pa gyi nwo ɓa har ewyi n wa fi ncei. Ama n wa fi owa to n ikoyi shan sun lo n wo tukwon. Mula owa ta shan wo knizun.
Nsayi, woɓa mi wa se enu do, n wa ye kwo ɓei ɓa zhin nukwoyi owo ɓa wo n wye-wyei, ama, kwo to zhin nukwoyi nu woi la fin.

Ofye ɓa, ofye tukwo da kwo nu ɓei zhin owa a Yahudiyi nya, ama, fya ku fi n Kristi yi n zundu, tunda fye ku fi, fye to ye shan owa se lon, kohin to n ikoyi shan sun lo n fye tukwon. Fye a jeze ɓe wye-wyei sa n Kristi a laka n vingwo fyei ku ze aza woi-woyi Nsaiye, fye ku se oza nwa laka la n efi n nabai fya zhin a tnu-tnu a manayi, a tnu-tnu amanayi Shekwoyi nya.
Sanu, n oza kwo-kwoyi ɓei zhin woi ye lo tnu-tnu n fye mi aɓo nukwoyi zhin pwa ɓei zhin ɓai wo fye, fyei zhin oɓo n Shekwoyi a gna nge fye to zhin, fyei zhin aɓo anukwoyi a tnu-tnu efi nya.

Ama nsaiye fye to gye fye anuwan n na Yahudiyi owa yin n ɓa knunu yin. Ntuge fyeɓo ku fi, fyei fi n ɓa bauta zhin, nsaiye, fye ɓa zhin Shekwoyi bauta to ge dna n zokwo kwo-kwoyi, fyei shi awyidna bwan, ama n zokwo woyi, (nfye abugbai vinya n fye awye-wyei vinya.)

To, mi wu nu nge Shekwoyi owa zhin nukwoi nu? Awo, owa to zhin nyanukwoyi nun, owa nu ɓei wumi omi laifi, mi to ɓei ɓa kpe laifi ye n kwo dna n mi bugban, aɓo pwa wo nukwoi n ɓa ɓe fi n mi bugba min, to owai a gna n ge, “To wo aɓo nukwoi shakpe n ho bugba min.”
Ama, laifi zhin a pma n owa yi, kwoi wumi nge shakpe deye pya to bmiyam, kwoi ku anya pwawo nukwoi kala n mi-mi. To owa ɓei lo n na ɓa zun gnana, to ɓenukwoyi zhin yi yelon.
Cenu ɓei zhin to ma gye mi anuwan sanu n mi to ɓei kpe nya ye n owa yen. Ama sa n mi ɓei kpe gaiciya ye, ma kpe ge mi la owa zungna, mi la ze laifi da n kunce n fiyi.
Nmi aba, manayi n kwo ɓei kunce kwa wu mi wye-wyei zokwo, kwo nu a zhin a gami efi lada nu.
Laifi ɓei dna mi kwoce kwoi la owa manayi Shekwoyi nya kwoi zhin apma n kwoi, kwoi zemi oza n wo kunce n ofi yi.
Ama owa n kwohin tukwo kwo zhin nya manayi nu n bmiya.

Ama kwo ɓa ze nwuna? Owa nu to bwi min? Kwo ɓa ze manayi n wuna? Awo, laifi nu. Nya kasa–nu ɓei zhin apma n nyai n kwo bmiya, kwa zun mi kni ntu lonu fye gye, kwo zhin nya kasa nya nukwoyi. Ntu ge kwo zhin apma n Shekwoyi owa manayi kwa nu kwo ɓeye.
Ntu lonu owa bmiya, wahala to! Lo n kwoi nun, ama n mihin nu, ntuge mi kundna gni nu nbauta zhin, n laifi yi n ze omi tukwoda.
Mi ta kpe, omihin tukwo ɓe ganyi lon, ntuge, mi ye ma zhin oɓo n kwo bmiya, ama mi ta min. Mi zhin oɓo n mi to cei pman, enya n mi ta yen.
Mi kpelo sarai enya n mi zhin nyi kwo to bmiya lon, emi nubo zhin wumi nge, mila ye n owa yei n mi zungna nyi.
Ama mi ta mi ma bma mihin zhin, ntuge mi to ye zhin celon, laifi nu n kwo dna n mi, n du mi kala nyi, kwoi zhin mi mi-i zhin aɓo a nukwoyi.
Mi kpelo nge mi la bwo n mi nai kwo-kwoyi, kwo n miya pmi lo n kni bwai nuʼa, mi ta mi ma zhin mihin ma zhin ɓe manan, mi n cei pmalo ama mita min.
Sa n mi cei pma ma zhin ɓe manayi, mi ta min, n ma zhin atna to ma zhin ɓenukwoyin, ma zhin kwonu.
Ama ngye mi zhin ɓo lo n mi to n cei pman, kwo wunu ge laifi ye n mii shilo n kwo akun.
Kwa wunu ge owa ye zhin tnutnu lo n mi, sanu n mi cei pma ma zhin oɓo n kwo bmiya ma ze ma zhin nukwoyi nu.
Miye ma zhin Shekwoyi ɓeye, shi emi zawoi-woi ncei pma.

Ama nyalo n dna n mi mi, n mi oza kninya kwoi sun kun lo nmi-i, kwoi gyi nasara n mi-i, kwoi zemi laifi bara n kwo ye dnalo n mi. Nmi mi, mi cei pma ma ze bara Shekwoyi ɓeye zhin yi. Ama ma gye mi ye zhin laifi bauta.

Omi za woi-woi gnami ge mi zhin ɓe manayi, ama oza kwo-kwoyi nkwo dna nmi mi n cei pmalo kwa zhin ɓenukwoyi. Ewuyi emi, mi la ze sun-sun nya. Nyi kadonu ɓa gni mi n nai efi nya yeʼa? Ma gode n Shekwoyi, Yesu Kristi eyi Dagayi n lami gni woi la mi loya.
Ntu cenu, knizun to lo nna aza ba, n ɓa zhin Kristi Yesu nya n.
Ntuge iko Zafun wye-wyei ga nyaiko ye zhin mi nya nu dna Kristi Yesu-kwo la mi loya n laifi awun n ofiyi.

Ato gni yi, n laifi akun ntuge yi kpe Shekwoyi awyidna ye lo nun, ntuge yita mi n ɓa kni ya shi bwan, ama Shekwoyi wa zhin zokwo do wa gni yi, wa tnu n wo Nugun yi dna n Zanyikwoci nayi ngye eyi nya, ama eyi anya n laifi yi wa wun laifi iko ya n yi tukwo. Wa ga wohin tukwo hadaya ntu yi alaifi ɓo.
Ntu cenu, nsaiye yi ɓa mi ya vi Shekwoyi awyidna n ya vi Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi, to ya vi nayi kwo-kwoi n kwo dna n yi nyin.
Aza nɓa fa oɓa nayi kwo-kwoi kwoi bwa iko tu n ɓa tukwo, ɓa vi ɓahin ɓeye nu. Ama aza n ɓa vi Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi, ɓa nu zhin oɓo n kwo da Shekwoyi.
Oza n wo vi Zafun ɓeye wo ɓa bwa wye-wyeyi n bugba-fuyi. Ama oza nu wa vi nayi wo ɓa fi.
Ntuge eyi oza kwo-kwoyi n kwo dna yi nyi kwo zhin nuɓayi nu n Shekwoyi, kwo ta ye kwa shi Shekwoyi awyidna bwan, kwoi ta min.
Cenu zhin, aza n ɓa fi n ɓa nayi kwo-kwoyi iko sinta ɓai vi oɓa aɓo fawo n shakpe nukwoyi, ɓa ta mi ɓa zhin ɓo n kwo da Shekwoyin.
Ama fyeto wu lo nun oza woi-woi nu zhin iko n fyei, ngye fye, n Shekwoyi Zafun yi lo n dna n fye mi, (Fya pa oza n wo to n Kristi Zafun yi dnalo n wo min, wo to zhin Kristi viyi nun kwo fyewyi.)
Ko Idayake Kristi dnalo n mi ofya nayi ɓa fi ntu n laifi ɓo, ama of ya wyewyeyi ɓa pwo ntuge Kristi nku gafara zhin fye.
Ndei Shekwoyi Zafun nwa la Yesu kala n efi nyi, n dnalo n fyemi wo ɓa zhin ofye a nayi fifiyi, ɓa bwa wye-wyei nfye efi avun, ntu n zafun ye ɓo n wo dna n fye nyi.
Ntu cenu, omi azaje yeyeyi kwo to zhin tilas nu nge fya vi ofye za kwo-kwoi ɓo fya zhin ɓo nwa gna fyem.
Ntuge n fya vi kwo fye ku bwi, aɓa ta fye, ama dna n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi iko fya ɓakwoya n kwa ɓenukwoi zhin yi fye ɓa pwo.
Aza vinya n Shekwoyi Zafun wu ɓa zokwo ɓanu zhin Shekwoyi aɓi.
Nlonu yi to ze ngye afyenu, yi wo dna n, ama yi zhin aɓo n gye Shekwoyi aɓi nwa gwo ɓa fi n wo iyali ɓai yiwo “Dada, Dada”.
Ntuge owo Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi daɓo n yi n ya bugba mi n ge yi zhin Shekwoyi aɓi nu.
Shi yi zhin owo aɓi nu nyi, yi ɓei gyiwo gado – ntuge nya n Shekwoyi gawo Nugun Yesu kwo zhin eyi nyanu ce. Ama n yi ye owo mwa-mwa tilas ya gye azhin nkunsun nwoi.
Wahala n yi sin n saiye nyi kwo to kunce lo a mwi kwo do n mwa-mwai n wo ɓei gayi nyin.
Ntuge Shekwoyi anya zhin-zhin vinya zhi ɓai pmi nu, n hakuriyi, n awyetu yi nyipyei n Shekwoyi ɓei ku owo aɓi kala n fi.

Ntuge dna nyipyei hi, akna wuyi atakanda, laifi, efi, nbwo-bwoyi–anya vinya nɓa gyi nasara tu n na anyi tukwo to n kwo ɓeyei dna n Shekwoyi gbe ga–ɓa ɓei ku bwiwye- anyi vinya ɓei gwo mwa-mwa ɓai bwa loloya n laifi, n Shekwoyi aɓi bwa kwo agmada nyi.
Ntuge yi kpelo anya-zhin-zhin ngye anya-fanya n agbe-gbei na shinwa yi ɓa bwa nyasan ɓai fi nge ɓa pmi nyipyei ye.

Eyihin a Yesu viyi ko shiko nyi yi n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi dna lo n yi mi ngye tuze eyi mwamwa nya, yi do dna n yi wye-wyei mi, a lo yi ya n na azhin-gye n wahala yi, yihin ce yi pmi nyipyei, wyi n Shekwoyi ɓei gayi eyi loloya towo aɓi nya ɓedo n nayi woi-woyi n wa zhin yi alkawali nyi, anayi n nyasan ta shan ɓa san, ɓai ta shan fin.
A gniyi n gaiciya ga mi nu, gaiciya zhin awyetu nya n yi to ncei lo nsayi yen. Oza n wo n nyayi wota shan awye tun, waga gaiciya nge wo ɓa bwa kwon.
Ama ndei yi ga Shekwoyi gaiciya n nya tukwo n kwoto zhin, kwo wu yi nge yi pmi n hankuri yi n bugba kalai.

Dna n zokwo gmanyi Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi bmayi zhin n yi aɓesa yi fyegyi-fyegyi dna n yi aduwa zhin mi. Ntuge yi ta kpe nya ye lo n yi ɓa zhin aduwa n kwo tukwon, kwo n yi ɓa zhin cewon. Ama Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi zhin aduwa n tu yiɓo n bugba shanwo yi n na ta mi ada n gbeyi m.
Eyi dada, n wo kpe eyi abugba ye n yi, wo kpe nya ye n Zafun da, sanu nwo gyiwye gayi dna n Shekwoyi ɓeye nyi.
Yi kpelo ge aɓo vinya nɓa bwayi ɓa lo tnu-tnu manayi n yi aba, ndei yi ye Shekwoyi lo, yi-i kunce lo nwo shiri yi.
Ntuge, tunyi n kmisunyi, Shekwoyi ɓei ku da aza vinya n ɓa ɓe wo aba, wo ɓei n cei pma-kpe aza nɓa ɓa ɓe–ɓa ze ngye owo Nugun, n na bai owo Nugun wa ze oza kmisunyi dna nwo azaje.
Shi wa kni yi, wa yi yi nge yi ɓe dawo, sanu n ya ɓe ncei wa ze yi ge, “tna laifi da,” Wa nuyi n Kristi ɓemanayi wa gayi agni-gni manayi n wohin yi, wa zhin yi alkawali owo mwa-mwa nya.
Yi ɓa da gena tu aɓe a wo-woi ye tukwoʼa? Ndei Shekwoyi malo n yi bwa, nyikado nu ɓa zhin gaba n yiya?
Tunda wo to kni wo Nugun gnin, ama wa gawo ntu yi ɓo vinya, wota gayi anya vinya ngnisun nwoyin?
Nyikado ɓa da ɓeda nukwoyi tu n yi tukwo, Aza n Shekwoyi laɓa kni ɓa ze owo nya? Shekwoyi? Awo, owo nu na zhin yi gafara wa gayi agni-gni manayi n wohin yi.
Nyikado ɓa zunyi knia? Kristi nu ɓa zun yi kni? Awo, gama owo nu na fi n yi ɓo, wa la kala n efi ntu yi ɓo, woi sase tulo n Shekwoyi aba, n latu dnagmayi aba, woi gyi wye gayi n eshemi.

Nyikado nu ɓa gwo yi Kristi yeye ya? Sanu n ya sin wahala kwo a zhin, sanu n na zan yi shin kwo Zawuyi, ntuge wota ye yi lonu? Sanu mikun gunyi to yi ye n gyiwye yin, ko yi dna n na a-zhin-gye kwo aye awuyi, Shekwoyi n ku yi ya n nu?
Awo, gama littafi a gnayi, ntu n wo ɓo tilas ya zhin shiri ya sin wahala n saho-sahoyi, yi wu ngye akni nu n ɓa pmi a wuɓa.
Nna ɓeye vinya, Nasara zhin yi nyanu dna Kristi n wa ye yi wa fi ntu n yi ɓo nyi.

Ntuge mila gaiciya ga nyaho tami kwa gnayi aje n Shekwoyi yeye yi n. Efi ta min, wyewyei ta min, a malayika ta min, anapi kala vinya ta min kwa gwo yi Shekwoyi yeye yan, Eyi dnawo n naiye nya, n bugba wun yi nsu nya yi.
Kwo aba n yi nyi, n eshe bmana, dna n nuwan yakwo min, Nyaho ta mi kwa gnayi ajeya n Shekwoyi yeye yin n wa wuyi dna n Yesu Kristi, Sanu n wa fi n yi ɓo nyin.

O, omi aza a Israila yi! O, om azaje Yahudiyi, shi mi n cei pma lo n mwa fya ɓe Kristi aba. Omi bugba wo mi shan lo, bugba yi wun mi n nyipyei n sukwoyi ntu n fye ɓo. Kristi kpelo, Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi kpelo, nge mi ta da egbe ɓeda nun, Sanu n ma cige mi yelo a mi gmiya n Shekwoyi ebe mi, ngye deye ɓa zhin fye fya bwa gni-gni.

Shekwoyi ku anya ga fye n mwa, ama fye ta wo wo lon. Wa kni fye n gye owo aza yeyeyi, wa kni fye wa gni fye busi n wo buzagna mwamwai, wa wufye shiwo n cei pma wa tu fye anabarka, wa ga fye owo awyidna ntu n fye a sese ɓo n na bai fya kpe enya n wo ye fya zhin. Wa fa fye fya zhin wo sujada wa ga fye alkawali a adnagmai.
Aza dnagmayi Shekwoyi anya efye zakwoyi nu Kristi nwohin, ɓei gmi nfye nuwo zhin Yahudiyi nu dna n nayi owo nwo gyibe tu n na anya she vinya nsaiye nyi. Mwa-mwa n Shekwoyi aba nyalo-nyalo.

To, Shekwoyi ta mi lo nu wa nuwo alkawali n na Yahudiyi abarn? Awo: (Ntuge alkawaliye zhin aza nya nu nɓa zhin a Yahudiyi hin-hin nyi.) Aza vinya nu to n na maɓa fi n na Yahudiyi fye, n ɓa zhin a Yahudiyi hin-hin.
Oɓa kun-kun n Ibrahim, ta zhin ɓa ɓa ze Ibrahim aɓin, Shekwoyi ɓeda, nku da nge alkawali zhin Ishaku, Ibrahim nugun anyanu, n Ishaku ayawyi yi. Koda yake Ibrahim ɓei n na aɓi ajeyi.
Kwa wu nu ge Ibrahim aɓi vinya nu to zhin Shekwoyi aɓin, ama aza nɓa ga alkawali gni-gni nya gaiciya n wo ɓei zhin Ibrahim nyi.
Shekwoyi ku alkawali zhin nge, “Ntna, oho n Saratu yi n ɓei ga fye oɓi”.

Aye n mwa begye n navun sanu n wo nugun Ishaku ɓei la wo nyikwo la, owo nyikwo Rifkatu, woi la ga aɓi ma a-za-ba, Shekwoyi wa gna wo Isuwa oɓi n na ɓa ma kmisunyi nyi, wo ɓa zhin Yakubu owo mado bara. Dna n Shekwoyi ɓeda, “Mi la Yakubu kni ma tuwo anabarka to ge Isuwam”. Shekwoyi ɓei dace to ai ma aɓi yen, to ɓai kpe ɓemanayi ye n ɓenukwoyi n sapa. Wo to ɓei zhin ce ntu n naɓo nu n na ɓi ɓei zhin m, ama nya n Shekwoyi ɓei ye wa kni.
Shekwoyi ɓei zhin ɓenukwoyi nu? Awo.
Ntuge Shekwoyi ɓei ku gna Musa ge, n ɓa wu oza alheri n ma ye, magye oza sun-sun n ma ye.
Ntu lonu, Shekwoyi ta ga anabarka ntu ge oza kun ce wa bwa kwo nun, kwo wa zhin tnu-tnu n kala yi wa bwan, wo bwa ntuge, Shekwoyi gye oza sun-sun nu n wa ye ko n wa gye dama.
Firauna, Masar Esu ɓei zhin ɓesisi nu gaiciya ye nya. Ntuge Shekwoyi ɓei ku gnawo ge wo la Masar ebe ga wo ntuge wa wuwo Shekwoyi iko n wo tukwo. N nabai anyi vinya ɓa wo Shekwoyi eye mwa-mwa.
Ntu lonu fye gye, Shekwoyi wu azaho alheri ntu ge wo n cei pmanu, wa zhin azaho n na tukwoi kwa gnana to ɓa wo ɓon.
To, kni nu zhin Shekwoyi woi gye ɓa laifi, nge ɓata wo lo n ma? Ɓa to zhin oɓo n wa gna ɓa ge ɓa zhin?
Aʼa to dalo nun, Ho zhin kni nua ha zan Shekwoyi zanshin n laifi a? Enya n na zhin ko, kwo ɓa mi kwa gna oza n wa zhin kwo nyi ge kni na zhin hoi zhin mi n layia?
Sanu n oza mi shakun, wo to n ikoyi lo wa zhin apma n ezun yi gmanyi wa mi shakun manayi ntu n zhedu ɓo wa mido ntu n pashe fi ɓon?
Shekwoyi to n ikoyi lo wa wu wo minagyi n na aza tukwo n ɓa kuncelo a wuɓan, aza n wa zhin hakuri nɓai n sai mwa n?
Wo n zokwo yi lo-lo, nge eyi n na akuyi ze aza n wa ze owo mwa-mwa ya kpe ɓa, ko yi zhin a Yahudiyi nu, ko yi zhin abyedo nu, wa wuyi alheri n na bai aza vinya ɓa gye shi owo mwamwa nsun.
Fye pa lo enya n Hosia anabci a da? Shekwoyi wa cige, “Wo ɓa bwa abye do ga wohin (aza nɓa ta kun n na Yahudiyi byen) wa ye ɓa ko da yake oza to shin ɓa yen.”
Aza n na ɓei zhin ai ciɓa ge, “Fye to zhin omi aza nun,” aɓa yi ɓa nsai ge, Shekwoyi wye-wyei da aɓi.
Ishaya anabi ɓei da ɓo n na a Yahudiyi tukwo wa cige, Koda yake ɓa ɓa mwa begye ngye amwi n ela gbe, aza n bwasun ciwyi nu n ɓa ɓei pwo n ɓami.
“Ntuge Dagayi ɓei dawa n na anyi tukwo wa zo owo atnu-tnu n ɓai wa zun ɓa ya kpekpegye.”
Ishaya wa je gna n na abado nge nto n Shekwoyi sun-sun gyei nun, aɓei wu a Yahudiyi vinya, oɓa vinya shi aɓei wu aza vinya n ɓa ɓei fi n Sodon n Gomora zhimi nyi.
To, yi ɓa da ge nana n na ɓeye tukwoa? Yiɓa cige Shekwoyi la esa ga abye aje woi zhin ɓa gafara dna n gaiciya gami, ko da yake ɓa ta zan Shekwoyi zanshin.
Ama, a Yahudiyi n ɓa zhin atna ɓa bwa agni-gni manayi ntu n na awyidna bwashi ɓo, ɓato gyi nasaran.
Ntu n kniɓei nua? Ntuge ɓa ɓei zhin atna ɓa bwa gni-gni ntu n na awyidna bwashi n atnazhinyi ɓaze aza manayi maimakon ɓaga gaiciya, ɓaku ce bonyi n kuta bonyicenya dnagmayi.
Shekwoyi ɓo ku pma ɓa gna dna nwo ɓeda wa cige, “Mila Apma shi na a Yahudiyi zokwo, aza n mwa begye ɓa ce bonyi n wo (Yesu) aza n ɓa gawo gaiciya vinyikwo ta wo ɓam.”
Omi azaje omi bugba ɓeye n mi aduwa yi nu nyi nge a Yahudiyi ɓa bwa gni-gni.
Mi kpe ɓa bugbadna ye lo n ɓa cei lo ntu Shekwoyi latu ɓo, ama bugbadna deye zhin gbeloyi nu.

Ntuge ɓata kpe genyi lo nge Kristi la fi ntu ge wa zhin ɓa zhi n Shekwoyi aba, ama ɓai zeze ɓai zhin atna ɓa zhin ɓemana n na bai ɓa bwa Shekwoyi agmada dna n na Yahudiyi a wyidna n na knunu yi, ama ɓa nu to zhin Shekwoyi gni-gni zokwo m.
Ɓata kpe genyi lo ge, Kristi ga aza nu n ɓa ga gaiciya, anya vinya n ɓa zhin atna ɓa bwa, dna n na awyidna bwashin. Woɓo ku ce zo vinya.
Ntuge Musa ɓei ku ka, ge ngye oza ɓa mi wa zhin ɓemanayi, to wa zhin ɓenukwoyin, wa gyi nasara n jarabai dna n wo asese, n na ba yi nu, n naɓa zhin wo gafara wa pwo!
Ama gni-gni n kwo ɓe ntu gaiciya ga ɓo kwo cige, “Koto n na apmai lo ba zan nshemi ntuge ha gmi Kristi ɓe n cei n wa bma ho zhin.
Koto n na apmai lo ha lo ho zan wo shin dna n na azafin aba ha jewo ze ɓe ncei n efin.”
Ntuge gni-gni n kwo ɓe dna n gaiciya ga n Kristi, ekwo nu zhin nya n yi zhin waʼazi, kwo to mwa kpa lon n zaho-zaho yin, ɓehin-hin kwo wo viviyi lo n yi ngye, eyi abugba n yi agbei.
Ntuge n ha gna aza n ho gbeyi nge Kristi Yesu nu zhin ho Dagayi ha ga gaiciya nho bugbami nge Shekwoyi lawo laka n vingwo, ho ɓa pwo.
Gama dna n gaiciya ga nu nbugba n oza bwa gnigni manayi n Shekwoyi aba, n wo gbeyi nu njesun n wo gna aza owo gaiciya ga ɓo.
Gama Shekwoyi ɓeda gna yi ge, oza to lo n wo ga Kristi gaiciya vinyikwo kwa wo won.
A Yahudiyi n na tna kaciya zhinyi gmanyi nu, oɓa Dagayi gmanyi nu n wo gaɓa anya vinya, n ɓa nya wo n bugbai gmanyi nyi.
Oza n wa yi Shekwoyi eye wo ɓa pwo.
Ama ɓaɓa nya wo n wuna nge wo gniɓa a kpe baga gaiciya? Ɓai ɓa gawo gaiciya n wuna to ɓai wo wo ɓon ma? Ɓai ɓa wo wo ɓo n wuna to ozai gna ɓan ma?

Oza ɓa lo n wuna wo gna ɓa to ai tnu wo ma? Nya nu n Shekwoyi ɓeda da sanu n kwa ci n cei ge, “Gye shi oɓa apita bmiya oɓanu nɓa zhin bugba fun nabari manayi Shekwoyi nya waʼazi, ɓai ɓe n nabari a gmada nyai. Aza a yeyeyi nu aza n ɓa zhin Shekwoyi nabari manayi waʼazi nyi.”
Ama aza vinya nu to n ɓa wo nabari manayi ɓa gwon. Ntuge Anabi Ishaya ɓei ku da “Dagayi nyikado la gaiciya ga ɓo n ma gna ɓa nyiʼa?”
Ama gaiciya ga ɓe n Shekwoyi ɓeda wonu, Nabari manayi Kristi nya.
Ama a Yahudiyi ma? Ɓaku Shekwoyi ɓeda wo? E, gama kwola lo aba n ɓa nyi vinya. Aku nabari manayi zhin waʼazi har anyi ce zhi ba.

Ama ɓa ɓei ku awyega bwa (nge Shekwoyi ɓa ga aza je gni-gni to ɓai ya gwon?) E, ntuge tunyi n Musa sa, Shekwoyi ɓei ku gna ge, wo ɓa zhin owo aza ɓa wo oshe, wa zhin atna wa kun ɓa agyewyi n wa gni-gni ga abyedo atna cei.
Ishaya ɓei je da ntna edna ge, aza nɓa to zan Shekwoyi shin ɓa ɓa bwa wo.
Nsaiye, wo zhin atna lo wa si a Yahudiyi kpe, ama ɓa gyi abye na ɓenayi, to ɓai ye ge ɓa ɓem.
Ma nya ɓo, Shekwoyi ku owo aza a Yahudiyi yanu? Awo, ko fye wyi, Fye pa ge mi zhin Yahudiyi nu n mihin, Ibrahim yawyi n Banyami bye.

Awo, Shekwoyi to yawo aza n wakni tunyi n sapan, fye pa ɓolo n littafi a da tu ɓeye tukwo? Anabi Iliya ɓei cibwi kpe Shekwoyi ntu n na Yahudiyi tukwo, shi a ku Shekwoyi anabi wu, ai la Shekwoyi a bagadi ɓaya, Iliya ɓei gye ge owo nu bwa cedna n knihin n wo gmanyi woi ye Shekwoyi, ɓa zhin a tna ɓa wuwo n wohin.
Fye pa amsa lo n Shekwoyi ɓei gawo? “Shekwoyi ɓei ciwo ge, awo, oho nu to ce n ho gmanyi yin. Mi n na azayi lo lo dubu tnaba n ɓa yemi lo, bai to gba shan.”
Kwo wu lo lo nu n naiye. A Yahudiyi vinya nu to pmi avun wu Shekwoyin. Azalo fyewyi n na gniɓa ntu n Shekwoyi alheri ɓo n wa kniɓa.
Ngye Shekwoyi alheri nu agye oɓa ɓemana zhin nu ton, nzokwoye cauta to shan kyauta nu zhin, kwo to zhin cauta nu, zai ya zhin tnu-tnu nu wa bwan.
Kwo wulo n lonu, A Yahudiyi n mwa to bwa Shekwoyi alheri nɓa zanshin. Fyewyi n ku bwa aza n Shekwoyi wa kni-ama aza nɓa ce nyi awye n ku ɓa bua.
Nyanu n Shekwoyi ɓeda da sanu n kwo ci n cei ge, Shekwoyi laɓa shigye, woi guɓa awye n na tunbuayi n na bai to ɓa kpe oɓo ye n yi da, sa n ya gna ɓa Kristi ɓo n cei. Kwo wulo n lonu nu har naiye.

Dauda Esu ɓei ku ce da sanu n wo ɓei ci n cei ge, “Fwa oɓa nyagyi manayi n anabarka do yi kwo pi ɓa agam ɓagye nge ɓeho to lo n ɓa; tasin n Shekwoyin. Fa anya a manayi ye ɓa je zekpe ɓa, ɓa wuɓa, ɓa ɓa ɓaya.
Fa oɓa awye ɓa dna wyegma n na bai to ɓa gye wyeban, ɓa zan-zan n ya kpe ntu n na kaya shan wo ɓo.”
Kwa wunu, nge Shekwoyi ku owo aza ya har abada? Awo, Owo nufi n na bai abyedo ɓa bwa pwopwo. N na bai ɓa Yahudiyi ɓa wo she ɓa ya Shekwoyi gni-gni zanshin ga ɓahin.
Nsaiye, ndei anyi vinya ku nya bwa ntu Shekwoyi gni-gni ɓo, sanu n na Yahudiyi ɓa ce bonyi to ɓa ye kwom. Ai anyi ɓei gna anabarka bwa sanu n a Yahudiyi ɓa gwo Kristi.
Shi fye kpelo ge, Shekwoyi lami kni owo tnu-tnu yi nfye aba abyedo, mi gnafye, mi-i ce a Yahudiyi ɓepa shi mi ɓa mi nsun.
Nna bai n kwo yezhin ma zhin ɓa ɓa ye enya n fye abyedo n cei lo, n zokwoyi magni azaho nɓa mi.

Kwo ɓei ze ɓe wowo ɓai ya ze a Kristi viyi. Sa n Shekwoyi ɓei pmiya n ɓa aba kwa wunu nge wo ɓei pmida anyi wa gaɓa gni-gni. Nsai ye kwo dulo n ɓewowoyi a Yahudiyi ɓa ɓe da Kristi. Kwo ɓei ze ngye aza fi nu na je kukala n efi.
Shi Ibrahim n na anabi yi zhin Shekwoyi a zanu nyi, oɓa ɓi ɓa ze Shekwoyi aza ce, Ntuge n Shinwan gbegye gyi-gyi-yi okwa bwala ɓa ze a gyi-gyi-yi nu ce.

Ama a bwala ho n Ibrahim shinwa, a Yahudiyi ho, ala ɓa kaya, efye abyedo a bwala a bmana nya, ngye zaitun bmana nya bwala, a fyefyegyi. Nlonu n saiye fyei gwo anabarka n Shekwoyi ɓei ga Ibrahim n wo aɓiyi ɓai sin shinwa gma n Shekwoyi wa nu n wohin tukwoyi.
Fye zhin peceiye kada fya gma ntuge aku fye fi n ɓa apita nu. Fye pa nge a kpe fye ye ntuge fye filo n Shekwoyi shinwa nu, Fye zhin abwala nu fye to zhin a gbegye nun.
“To” ko yezhin lo ha cige aɓei ibma a bwalai ya ntuge a fyemi nu gyi, ntu cenu mi zhin ɓo lo n kwo kunce.

Fye zhin peceiye. Pa ge a bwala ho, a Yahudiyi a ɓei bma ɓa ya ntu ge ɓato ɓei ga Shekwoyi gaiciya nun, fye zhi n ya ntuge fya gawo gaiciya nu. Fyeto zhin aɓo-kwon, gye gba fyehin tukwo fya zhin igodiya, fya zhin peceiye.
Ntuge n Shekwoyi to fa abwala nwafi ɓa tunyi n sapan, wo ta fa fyehin.
Shi awye hagye shi Shekwoyi zhin alheri dna ɓo, wo gyiminagyi n na azai nɓa ta vi wo ɓon, ama wo zhin ɓemana ga fye fyei ya gyi abye fya yewo n gaiciya gayi, ama nfye to zhin lo nu m aɓa zun fye ya.
N zokwo do, Nna Yahudiyi fa ɓa tna gaiciya ga ɓa jeze ɓe da Shekwoyi, Shekwoyi ɓa je ɓa fyegyi n shinwa. Wo n ikoyi lo wa zhin lonu.

Ntu ge n gye shi Shekwoyi ɓei la ye wa gwo fye n fye ɓei mwa kpa n woi, n fye ɓei zhin zaitun bmana nya bwala, wa fye fyegyi n wo shinwa manayi onya nna ta shin zhin-fye gye ge woto gni n shiri yi nu zhin wa je a Yahudiyi gwo n jesun n ɓa ɓei shin fi n kmisunyi nyin?

Mi n cei pma fya kpe gaiciya ye n Shekwoyi aba, emi azaje yeyeyi n na bai nfye ta mwa fyehin tukwo fya ya abokwo zhin, E, kwo zhin gaiciya nu nge a Yahudiyi ho zhin gaba lo n Nabari Manayi-nsaiye, ama kwo ɓa bwa esanu la n fye abyedo fya ku ɓe Kristi aba vinya, efye n fya ye fya ɓe.
N navun Israila vinya ɓapwo. Fye pa oɓo lo n anabi ɓo da n ɓeye tukwo? “Gniyi ɓa gmi n Sihiyona, wa pmi a Yahudiyi awye ya n ɓenukwoyi zhin.
Nsayi mɓei kuɓa a laifi ya, she ma zhin ɓa alkawali”.

Nsaiye, a Yahudiyi n mwa begye zhin anuwuyi nu nabari manayi nya. Degye n la ze gyiba nfye aba, ntuge kola ɓe efye abyedo n Shekwoyi cauta yi, Har nsaiye a Yahudiyi zhin Shekwoyi aza yeyeyi nu, ntu n wo alkawali ɓo n wo ɓei zhin Ibrahim, Ishaku n Yakubu yi nyi.
Gama Shekwoyi cauta n wo yiyi-i kwo ta shan kman, wotajeze n na vunyi n wo alkawali n wa zhin nyin.
Nsapai, fye ɓei zhin Shekwoyi a nuɓai nu, ama sa n na Yahudiyi ɓei na Shekwoyi cauta aɓo wa gye fyenu sun-sun.
Nsayi ye a Yahudiyi nu zhin tawaye ama n wyihoi ɓa ɓei gni Shekwoyi sun-sun gye bwa n fyei.
Gama Shekwoyi ku ɓa ya ga ɓenukwoi zhin n nabai wa gye aza sun-sun vinya.
O, Shekwoyi, ɓo wo-woyi danu n yi n cei. Owo wyemwa, n wo ɓeyekpei n wo nyabwai kwo dna ɓo lo ya kpe owo shawara ye n wo azokwoi.
Nyikadonu n yi mi kpe Shekwoyi bugba yelo a? Nyikadonu n ɓeyekpei lo wa ga Shekwoyi shawara wa wu wo zokwo a?
Nyikado nu ɓa ga Shekwoyi nya kunce kwa zhin wo wa zhin ɓo a?
Gama anya vinya kun n Shekwoyi aba nu. Anya vinya bwa wye-wyei dna nwo ikonu. Anya vinya nyi ntu wo latu ɓo nu. Mwa-mwa nwo aba nyalo-nyalo Amin.
Ntu cenu mi gyi fye wye fya gafye anayi n Shekwoyi akun, ɓa ze hadaya wye-wyei gyi-gyi-yi nya, odo pya n wo ɓa gwo. Nfya pa oɓo ɓo n wa zhin fye, deye duwyi lo wa nya fye?
Fye to shan hali n na kunnu anyi nya yi n, ama fye ku ze aza woi-woi n naɓo nfye ɓa n zhin, nfye nubo zhinyi. Nlonu fye ɓa kpe nfye aɓo-mutu shiwo zokwo ɓa fu fye nubo.
Ngye Shekwoyi tnu-tnuyi mi ga zaho-zahoi nfye mi Shekwoyi pmagna: Fye zhin gaiciya n fyehin tukwo ɓo, fyei mwi shi Shekwoyi wa ga fye gaiciya-ga n sun.
Shi agalo n mwa begye n fye nayi n lo nu Kristi nayi. Yi zhin aga nu owo nayi nya, zaho-zahoi n yi mi woi nu kwo ntuge yi n na tnu-tnuyi lo gbo-gbo.

Shekwoyi, n gbai ga zaho-zahoi n yi mi nwo ɓa zhin ɓa n bmiya N Shekwoyi n la anabci zhin gba nu ga fye, zhin anabci nsai vinya n ho ɓa mi–n sai vinya, n ho gaiciya ga n kalai lo n ho ɓa gwo tnu-tnu-tnu Shekwoyi aba.
Ngye ho nyaga zhin aza bmazhin nyanu, bma ɓa zhin cewo. Ngye ho zhin malami nu wu nya n bmiya.

Ngye ho zhin waʼazi zhin yi nu kpe ge eho waʼazi n kalai lo n bmazhin yi dna. N Shekwoyi la gyiwye gaho, bma azaje zhin n cei. N Shekwoyi la aza bwashi tnu-tnu ga ho woi ku azafiho n nakun zhin tnu-tnu n ho kala yi. Aza n Ba zhin abugba zhi-zhi da a tna ɓa zhin kwo n bugba a Kristi yi nya yi.
To ye aza n gbeyin, yeɓa cewo. To ye enya n kwo to bmiyan, ye ɓemana ha zhin kwo.
Fye ye n na ajei ngye aya-ɓi, fya ga aje mwamwa n bugba buibui.
Fye to wo bwato nfye tnu-tnu yin, ama fye zhin Dagayi tnu-tnu n bugba bui, bui.
Dagma n tu nyaɓo n Shekwoyi z hin gaho, zhin hakuri n wahalai, ha zhin aduwa ci-ci.
Sanu Shekwoyi aɓi gyisan, bma ɓa zhin, zhin ha yi azhiɓei ɓa ɓe nyagyi nho puwa ko kwa nɓa ye agyewan aba n sukwoyi.
N oza zhin fye ɓenukwoyi ntuge fye zhin Kristi nya nu, to tu wo eknin, zhin adduwa Shekwoyi wa tuwo anabarka.
Sa n na aza dagma ha dagma n ɓai, n ɓa wun bugba ha bma ɓa bugba wun.
Fye zhin tnu-tnu n dagma ngnisun. To zhin n gye ho zhin zadnagmayin. To lodna n na aza yakwo aban, ama gnalo n ha sharayi. To ha ci a ɓo n gye ho kpe ɓeho ye lon.
To gba ɓenukwoyi ta n ɓenukwoyin. Zhin ɓeho-ɓehoyi cewo, aza kpe ge hoto zhin zakata nun.
To wu anya n zaho-zahoi. Bwa bugba buyi n na azai vinya ngye shi ho ɓa mi.
Emi anugundo ye-yeyi fyeto gba ɓe ta ga fyehin. Fa kwo ga Shekwoyi ntuge wo ku gna ge wo ɓa gba aza n kwo kunce. Fye to la owa dna n fye akun. (Wato fye to zun owa gnan).
Gaho nuwunyi nya gyi mikun ya gun wo, n nuwan mikun wo-wo gawo nuwan wa sin. Ho ye anakna nu kpe wo n tukwo, wato vinyikwo ɓa wo wo n ɓo woku zhin ho nyi.
To fya ye ɓenukwoyi kwa gyi ebe tu nfye tukwon, ama fye zun ɓenukwoyi kni dna a ɓemanayi Izhin.
Fye ku ze aɓo vi-yi n na aza ba nɓa gyi ebe nyi, ntuge Shekwoyi nu na kpe ɓa n ɓo. Ebe ho to lo n Shekwoyi nu to shi kwo n wo iko yin.
Ntu cenu aza n ɓata shi ekni awyidna bwan Shekwoyi nu n ɓa ta vi wo ɓom. Tata ɓa vi ɓa n na avun.
Gama abusi-ɓiyi-da ta wan aza n ɓa zhin ɓefyecen, ama oza n wo zhin ɓenukwoyi tilas nu wa wo wo dna. Shi awyi-dna bwa ɓoho ta bwa hon.
Shekwoyi tnu n na busi ɓiyi-da yi ɓa bma fye nu zhin. Ama n ho zhin ɓenukwoyi tilas ha wo wo dna ntuge wo ɓa wan ho. Shekwoyi wa tnu n woi n cenu.
Shi awyidna bwa ntu a ɓo ɓo ngun aba, kmisunyi, n na bai to a wan hon, bayi, ntuge ho kpe lo ge kwo kunce lo.
Fye gba gadu cewo, ntu aɓoye ɓo n gun aba. Ntuge a gba a tnu-tnu zhinyi n na bai ɓa gyi abye n Shekwoyi tnu-tnu zhin yi, ɓai zhin fye bauta.
Fye gba ozaho-zahoi nya n kwo kunce, fye gba ofye gadu n bugba bui-bui, fye vi aza ɓo nɓa kpe n fye she. Fye ga aza mwa-mwa n kwo kunce nɓayi.
Fye gba ofye ata vinya, a kpe yeye ta fye to zo kwo gban, ntuge n fya ye n ɓayi fye zhin Shekwoyi ɓeye nu, fyei shi wo awyidna bwa.

N ha ye n ho zado yi shi ho ye n hohin sun, hota ye ha gyi wo fin, ho taye ha wu won kwo ha wyiwo vim. Hoi ta zhin ɓe nukwoyi n wo nyikwo yin kwo ha ye enya n wo n ceyin, kwo ha zhin ɓe n na awyidna ngu n awo agna nge ato zhin. Ngun awo vinya pupuru fi n gmanyi ye nu. Ha ye n ho zado yi shi ho ye n hohin tukwoyi.
Yeye ta zhin za ɓenukwoyin. Cenu zhin Kwoi nu zfiin aɓo vinya n Shekwoyi ye, wyidna gmanyi nu n fyeye.
Asese n bmiya dalili nyi n jesun. Fye kpe shi esa n la gba, esa busilo. La kun a gyewyi ntuge, Dagayi ɓe ɓe la gnawo vivi n du esa n yi ɓei ga gaiciya n cei.

Sukwo n la duya, owo ɓe-ɓe nyipyeyi la ga ɓe, Ntuce, fye kma ɓe nukwoyi zhin ya, fya kpe ɓemana zhin. Shi kwo kunce a buzanga da sase. Fye zhin ɓemana fya zhin gaiciya n na aɓo vinya n fye ɓa zhin n na bai aza da fye ɓo manayi. Fye to wunsa ya n na gnikwo gniyi, n jesin yi, n na anagbayi zhinyi, n shakpeyi, n gu sun yi, kwo eshen.
Ama gyi Kristi wye wa bma ho zhin, ha sase shi kwo kunce, to ha zhin shaula ha dagma dna n ɓenukwoyi zhin m.
A Fye gwo oza n wo ye wa ɓe da fye kwo owo gaiciya ga kwoi gba kala. To zunwo kni ntuge owo aɓonubozhin wulo gbo n ho nyai, tu aɓo tukwo n kwo bmiya n doi n kwo to bmiyan.

Misali, to na aɓo n woi n na abugyi tukwo n na zun sha ga eshan. Ho ga gaiciya, nya ho to wunya lo nkwon, ama azaje gaiciyaga gba kala lo, ɓa gye kwo zhin nukwoyi nu, ɓata gyi abun sai dai ɓa gyi afintolo, cei ya cece ge ɓa gyi abuyi pya.
Aza n ɓa gye kwo to wunya lo ɓa gyi abuyi pyan, ɓato ci aza wyegba n ɓata gyin. Nho ta gyin to gye ɓa laifi n ɓa gyi nyin. Ntuge Shekwoyi la ɓa gwo ɓa ze owo aɓi.
Ɓa zhin Shekwoyi a bara nu, ofye nyanu ton oɓa nuwan lo n wo abanu toge nfye aban, Fye fa wa gna ɓa kwo kwo bmiya lo, kwo kwo to bmiya lon, Shekwoyi ɓami wa zhin ɓa ɓa zhin shi kwo kunce.

Azaho zhin nubo ge a Yesu viyi ɓa shi a Yahudiyi anyipyeyi asun-sun nya nu bwa, anyipyeyi n ɓa ɓa ga Shekwoyi mwa-mwa n cei, ama aza ho ci ge kwo zhin gbelohi nu nya zenu za zhin aɓei pya, ntuge anyipyeyi vinya zhin Shekwoyi anya nu. Nna beye pya ozaho-zahoi nu ɓa zhin oɓo n kwo kunce.

Nho n na anyipyeyi kni hoi ga Shekwoyi mwamwa, ho ye ha lawo tu ho zhin ɓe manayi nu. Nlo nunce oza n wo gyi abu n na zun sha ga eshan. Wo sa Shekwoyi ami ntu nkwo ɓo, wo zhin ɓe manayi nu, oza ce n wo ta to abuyi bwan, wo zhin atna nu wa zhin oɓo n kwo da Dagayi, Woi zhin godiya.
Yi to zhin eyihin tukwo adagayi nu n, n yi ɓami ya kni ge yi bwa wye-wyei ko ya fin.
Kwo yi n wye-wyei, kwo yi fi yi zhin Dagayi anya nu. Zokwo doho-dohoyi zhin wo anya nu.
Kristi ɓei fi wa laka njesun ntu n na aɓeye ɓo nu. N na bai wo ɓa zhin yi Dagayi kwo yi nwye-wyei, kwo yi ku fi.
Hoto n iko yi lo ha zun ho zado kni kwo ha ciwo wyegban. Pa ge, ozaho-zahoi n yi mi wo ɓei gni agni gni n Shekwoyi wada a sese ɓa n wada wyi yi.
Ntuge, a cei kafi “Shi mi nyi”, nyikutukwo dohodohoi ɓei ce a kwo-kwo n mi abye, nyitala doho-dohoi ɓei ye abui n Shekwoyi aba.
Behin-hin, zahozahoi ɓei ga wohin tukwo nyadoku n Shekwoyi aba.
Ntu cenu, fye to zhin aje laifi zanshin. Fye zhin atna fya sase, n fye ta zhin ofye do wa ce bwoyin, n na ɓo n wo ɓa gye ho hoi zhin n wo zhin nubwo ge ɓato bmiya lon.
Nmi aba, mi kpelo lalle dna n Dagayi Yesu iko, nyaho to wunya lon, n na abu gyi yi n na zun sha ga eshan. Ama, nza gna ge kwo zhin ɓenukwoyi nu, to, wo to zhin m, ntuge n wo aba kwoto bmiya lon.
Ngye oho zaho damu lon nyayi n ho gyi, hota zhin yeye ɓe zhin nun, n ha gyi abye n gyi yin. To fa oho nyagyi kwa zhin oza n Kristi wa fi n wo ɓo wa bwin.
To zhin oɓo n kwo ɓa ɓe ho n wyegba-ciyi, kwo hoi kpelo ge kwo bmiya lon.
Gama aɓo kpakaiayi n yi a Yesu viyi aba, kwo nu to zhin nyagyi n nyasin yi, ama ɓemana, bugba fu, n na agmada yi n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi aba.
Nfya fa Kristi wa zhin Dagayi dna n na ɓeye vinya, aɓa da Shekwoyi. N na azaje yi.
Yi zhin atna ya zhin aɓo nɓa ɓa ɓe nbugbafuyi, ya mi aje zhi.
Fye to wun Shekwoyi tnu-tnu ya ntu na abu ɓon. Fye pa nge nyaho towun ya lon, n na bugyi yin, ama kwo wunya lo sa nu n kwa zhin ozado wa ce bwonyi.
Oɓo n kwo bmiya okwo nu ha fa abugyi, ko jesin, kwo nya zhin n kwo ɓa zhin ohozado wa ce bonyi, wa zhin laifi.

Ho ɓami ha kpe ge nyaho to wunya lo n nya yi n ho zhin, kwo n Shekwoyi aba, ama kuce shin hohin, to wu ho gaiciya ga nza aba n kwo ɓa zhin wo wa ce bonyin. N na ɓeye pya, bugba bui-bui da nu oza n wota zhin laifi nɓe yi n wo kpe ge kwo bmiya n.

Ama nza kpe ge ɓo nwo ye wa zhin nyi kwoto bmiya lon, wo to zhin kwon wo zhin laifinu woi ya zhin, ntuge wo zhin nubo ge kwo zhin ɓenukwoi nu. Ntu cenu n wo aba kwo to bmiya lon. Nyaho-nyahoi nza zhin woi gye ge kwo to bmiya lon kwo zhin laifi nu.

Kwo yi-i gye ge aɓeye to zhin nyaho nu n Shekwoyi aba kwo yi ya zhin ɓan, yita mi ya gyi abye ya zhin ɓan, ntuge ya da yihin agman, tile ya pa azaje ɓo nɓa shakai n dna, nɓa gye ge aɓeye to bmiya lo nyin. Yi zhin ɓo n kwo ɓa da azaje to ge eyihin, ya zhin ɓo n kwo ɓa bma wo zhin kwa miwo gni dna n Dagayi.
Kristi to zhin ɓo n kwo dawo num, She, zabura ka yi wa da “Waɓe n tuge, wa sin wahala, n na za kun nɓa wun Dagayi nu nyi.”
Aɓeye n na cei kafi n litafi tunyi n sapa nyi, a kafi ntuge ɓa wuyi-atnazhin n bugba kala bwayi nu. Nnabayi ya pmi peceiye n hakuri yi har ewyi n Shekwoyi ɓe zun laifi kni n efiyi.
Shekwoyi n wo ga hakuri, n migniyi, n bugba kala yi, wo bma fye zhin fya sase n na jeyi n bugba dayi za-zai wuwo do Kristi hali.
Nsayi, eyi vinya yami ci Dagayi n begye yi gmanyi, yi ga Shekwoyi mwa-mwa, eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi Dada.
Ntu lonu fye ye, n na jeyi n ikklisiya, shi Kristi wa gwo fye n bugba bui-bui n na bai n Shekwoyi eye ɓa latu.
Fye pa ge, Yesu Kristi wa ɓe wa wu ge Shekwoyi ta daɓo wa pman, njesun wa bma a Yahudiyi zhin.
Njesun fye pa ge waɓe n na bai abyedo ɓa bwa gnigni, ɓa ga Shekwoyi mwa-mwa ntu wo sun-sun gye ɓo. Nyanu n Zabura kayi wa da, sanu n wo ɓei ka n cei ge, “Mba ciho dna n abyedo, ma la oho ye tu.”
Nna abado, “Fye dagma, ofye abyedo ngnisun nwo azayi a Yahudiyi.”
Njesun, “Fye ci Dagayi, ofye abyedo, fa aza vinya ɓa ciwo.”
Anabi Ishaya wa cige “Gado gyiyi ɓa gmi n Jese puwa, wa gyi be tu n abyedo tukwo, ɓa ɓei tu awye n wo nu vinya.”

Nlonu mi zhin aduwa ga fye abyedo, n na bai Shekwoyi n wo gafye awye tunyi, wa ga fye a gmada n bugbafu yi, shi fya gawo gaiciya. Mi zhin aduwa n Shekwoyi ɓa nu fye n awyetu yi dna n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi iko n wo dna n fye nyi.
Mi kpe lo fye zhin aza manayi nu n ceceyi, omi azaje, fye kpe aɓeye ye lo n fye ɓami fya wu azaje ɓa.

Ama mi n bugba kalayi lo ma je fye aɓeye gna, mi kpe lo fye ye ma pa fye ɓanu kawai, ntuge n Shekwoyi alheri yi, mi zhin tnutnuyi nu n Yesu Krisiti wa tnu fye n cei abyedo. Mi ɓefye n Nabari manayi mi-i ga fye ngye hadaya n Shekwoyi akun, ntuge ala fye zhanya, fyei zhin ɓo wo ye dna n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi.
Ntu lonu mi gye kwo bmiya lo ma gma, ntu anya ɓo vinya n Kristi Yesu ku zhin dna n mi nyi.
Mi ta ye ma daɓo shi wa zhin tnu-tnu n na azajeyi nun, ama n nya yi n mi kpelo, woku a pma zhin n miyi woi wan abyedo ɓe Shekwoyi n cei.

Ma wan ɓa n waʼazi yi nu, n mi zhin njesun n mi asese manayi nɓa abye, n na aɓo a wowoyi n wa zhin n mi abwai atuze n Shekwoyi aba, vinya n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi iko yi nu. Dna n Zokwo ye, miku waʼazi zhin nabari manayi Krisiti nya tunyi Urushelima har Ilirukum.
Ama omi ɓeye nu, miye lo abye mi zhin waʼazi aba n Kristi ye to si kpan, afa aba zado la ikklisiya shi.
Mi vi shiri nu, nna cei kafi n litafi, aba n Ishaya cige, “Aza n ɓa to shin Kristi ye won ɓaɓa gye ɓa bwa awye ga.”
Behin-hin enyanu n kwo zhin mi n cei pma ma ɓe fya ba.
Ama n na avun omi tnu-tnu ku zo n ya mi n shiri yi zhin lo ma ɓe n na aye awyekwo nya ye avun.
Gama mi zhin shiri lo malo Asbaniya n ma lo mi ɓei bma n Roma, bayan yiku esa manayi bwa n na jeyi fye ɓei gnami ami.
Ama kafin mi ɓe tilas malo Urushelima malo a Yesuviyi n cau-tai n ɓo.
Gama fye gye, a Yesuviyi n ɓa fi n Makidoniya n Akaya yi ɓaku enya ga ntu n na azaje ɓo n ɓa fi n Urushelima ɓai sin wahala nyi.

Ɓa ɓei zhin kwo n bugba bui-bui ntuge ɓa gyelo ɓa ntayi shi a Yesuviyi lo nɓafi n Urushelima. Ntu n kni ɓei ya? Ntuge nabari manayi Kristi nya kun n Urushelima nu kwoi lo abyedo aba. Tunda ɓa ɓei gwo cauta Zafun nya nabari manayi nya nɓenu ɓa gye ɓe n ɓa ɓa zhin ɓa, okwo nu ɓa gaɓa akaya nanyi nya.
Sanu n ma gaɓa agyiwye ye, ma zo n ɓatnu-tnu manayi yei, mi ɓei ɓe ma gye fye wye mi-i lo Asbaniya lo.
Mi kpe lo sanu n mabe, Dagayi ɓei gami anabarka ntu n fye ɓo, ma ɓefye n cei.
Fye ɓa zhin aduwa ngnisun n miyi? Ntu n Dagayi Yesu Kristi ɓo, ntu nfye yeye ɓo nfye yemi nyi, n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi ga fye-fye zhin aduwa n mwa n gnisun n miyi ntu mi tnu-tnu ɓo.
Fye zhin aduwa n nyaho ta bwami n na aza kun n ɓa ta vi Yesu Kristi nyin, n ɓa fi n Urushelima nyi. Fye zhin aduwa njesun n na Yesu viyi ɓei gwo agyiwye n mi lo ɓa n cei nyi.
Nnavun nmi ɓa mi ma ɓe of ye aba n bugba bui-bui dna n Shekwoyi ɓeye, yi ɓa gaje kala.
Nsayi ye, Shekwoyi n wo ga bugba fu nyi, wo kun sun n fyei.

Fibi nyikoza Yesu viyi n Kankriya zhimi ɓelo wa gye fye wye safyewyi. Woku tnu-tnu zhin n mwa n ikklisiya ye. Fye gwo wo n gye mapui dna n Dagayi. Fyawu wo a Yesu viyi yeye. Fye bma wo zhin n zokwo doho-dohoi n fye ɓami ntuge wo ku bma aza zhin n mwa dna n ɓa sangyi n mihin ɓe.
Gna Biriska n Akilayi nge mi ɓiɓa gnaio, Ɓa zhin omi atnu-tnu kun zhin yi nu dna Kristi Yesu.
Ɓehin-hin, har oɓa wye-wyei ye kwa bwi n miɓo. Omi gmayin nu ta saɓa amin, har n abyedo n ikklisiya yi.
Suku-suku fye ɓi aza gna n ɓa yezhi ɓa ci Shekwoyi n ɓa puwa. Fye ɓi omi nugundo manayi gna Abainatus. Owonu ɓei kmi Yesu vi n Asiya.
Fye ɓi Maryamu gna n wa zhin tnu-tnu n mwa n na bai wa bma yi zhin nyi.
Fye ɓi Andarinikus n Yunuyas yi gna, omi bye n ɓa ɓei kunsun n miyi fi n kurkuku nyi. Amanzani gaɓa mwa-mwa. Ɓa ɓei ku vi Yesu n mi abye.
Fya ɓi Ambiliyatus gna, oza n mi ye ngye Shekwoyi ɓi.
N Urbanus yi eyi tnutnu kunzhin yi, n Istakiyi oza yeye yi.
Fye ɓi Abalis gna gami oza n Dagayi ye, fya ɓi aza gna n ɓa fi ɓai zhin tnu-tnu n Aristo bulus puwa nyi.
Fye ɓi Harodiyana omi bye gna, fya ɓi a Yesuviyi gna n ɓa zhin afyenu fi n Narkissus puwa nyi.
Fye ɓi Tarifaina gna n Tarifusayi Dagayi a tnu-tnuyi, n Barsisa yi n wa zhin tnu-tnu mwa ga Dagayi nyi.
Fye ɓi Rufus gna gami oza n Dagayi a kni ga Wohin, wa ze wonya, n wo iya yeyeyi, n wo la ze omi iya yeyeyi nyi.
Suku-suku fya ɓi Asinkiritus gna n Filiguna, n Harmisayi n Batrubas yi n Harmasayi n na aza jeyi n ɓa kusun n ɓayi.
Fye ɓi Flubugusa gna n Juliya yi n Niriyus yi, n wo mapuiyi n Ulumbasayi, aza gyi-gyi-yi n ɓa kunsun n ɓai nyi.
Fye dna aje abwado, ikklisiya n ya vinya tnu fye n ɓa gnaɓiyi.
Nsaiye, ɓeda gmanyi n mi cei lo ma da kafin mi zo n wasika ye yi. Fye la pmiya n na aza n ɓaɓe n na ajegnayi ɓai shan aza gaiciya ga a shan. Ɓai ɓe n wuwuyi nkwo wu gbo, n doyi n aku wu fye.
A zayi pya ta zhin tnu-tnu ga eyi Dagayi Yesu nun, ama ɓaye gyiba ga ɓahin nu. Ɓa zhin a ɓeda kpedayi nu, aza nɓato ceceyin, ɓata wo ɓa kwoce dnan.
Ama zaho-zahoi kpelo nge fye gni-a-gni lo cewo dna n gaiciya. Deye dami a gmalo. Miye fya sase cewo dna n nya n kwo bmiya, fya abwa kunya n nya n kwo to bmiyan.
Safyewyi, Shekwoyi bugbafu nya wo ɓa bma shaitan ya n fya pita sin ta. Anaɓarka nɓa kun n yi Dagayi Yesu Kristi aba ɓa kun-sun n fyei.
Timatawus omi tnu-tnu kun zhinyi, n Lukiyus yi, n Yasunayi, n Susibatrus yi, omi ebye ɓa tnu fye n ɓa gna ɓiyi.
Omi Tartiyus n mi ka Bulus wasikaye nyi, mi tnu fye n mi gnaɓiyi ce n gye Yesu viyi do.
Gayus wa gna nge mi ɓi fye gna ga wo, mi zhin wo zhiɓeyi nu, ikklisiya yezhi lo nwo puwa nu n ya. Arastus maʼaji, tnu fye n wo gnaɓiyi n lonu Kawartus eyi zado.
Sai n wyihoi, Alheri Dagayi Yesu Kristi nya kwo kunsun n fyei vinya.

Mi fi fye n Shekwoyi akun, n wo ɓa mi wa ga fye kala, fya mizhi n Dagayi nyi shi Nabari Manayi da. Shi ma gna fye n wu nyi. Shekwoyi gni-gni shiri nyi ntu n fye ɓo abyedo n soshi tnuyi n sapa. Ama shi anabi ɓei ku pmada shi Shekwoyi wa gbe, a zhin Nabari ye waʼazi lo n na abaho-bahoi, n na bai aza vinya n na anyi, ɓa ga Kristi gaiciya ɓa vi wo ɓo. Shekwoyi gmanyi n cece wum wo nu nyi, mwa-mwa kunsun n woi ntu n Yesu Kristi ɓo. Har nyalo-nyalo Amin.
Wasika ye gmi n Bulus aba nu, n Shekwoyi ɓei yiwo ntuge wa ze aza tnu-tnu yi Yesu Kristi nya, ɓedo n ʼyi zado yi na yiwo ge Sastanisu nyi.
Kwoi lo Shekwoyi aza ʼba n Korinto, n Shekwoyi wa yiɓa ɓa ze Wa za, Woi la ɓa gwo dna n Yesu Kristi mi. Kwa lo aza ba vinya njesun nɓa yi Yesu Kristi, eyi Dagayi nɓa nya yi.
Shekwoyi eyi Dada ɓedo n ʼyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi yi, wo ga fye alheri n bugba fuyi.
Mi zhin ma sa Shekwoyi ami cici ntu alheri manayi ɓo n wa ga fye she fye ku ze Yesu aza nyi.
Wo ku fye ze anyabwayi n mwa. Wo ku bma fye zhin fyei da ɓo ga Wo, Woi la yekpe nunuyi ga fye dna gaiciya.
Nya mi ɓei gna fye ge Kristi ɓo mi Wa zhin ga fye, kwo ku zhin.
Fye la alheri doho-dohoi bwa nna anabarka yi n sayi; zafun nyaga doho-dohoi n iko yi fya zhin Wo ɓeye, ɓa zhin fye nya nu dna saye n na zhi ai pmi eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi Jezeɓe nyi.
Wo la ye har nyalonyalo ayi fye aza kni-kni-yi, tna laifi n ɓenukwoi yi dna Wo nyipyei jezezhi nya.
Shekwoyi ɓa zhin fye ɓeye ntna kma-kma, ntuge Wo zhin Wa zhin ɓo Wa da cim-cim. Owoi nu na yi fye ge fya zhin nugundo nwo nugun yi Yesu Kristi.

Ama, oma-zaje, mi gyi fye wye dna Dagayi Yesu Kristi ʼye, fye ku ɓeda ajegna nya ya nfya tasin. Fye ku ze gmanyi, to ajegna lo aduwa nyakun m. Fye la ye ɓedo, efye ɓo nubo-zhin gmanyi, ɓemwi gmanyi njesun.
Ntuge, omazaje, azaho n ɓa kun n Kuluwi Puwa ɓa ku gnami pei-pei nge fye wu anya lo n najeyi.
Ntuge azaho cige, “Mi zhin Bulus nya nu” Azaho cige, “Mi zhin Bitrus nya nu.” Azaho cige, “Mi zhin Bitrus nya nu.” Aza ho ge, “Mi zhin Apollos nya nu.” Azaho kwa ɓai cige, “Mi zhin Yesu nya nu.”
Fyela Yesu gnajeya wyiwo-wyiwo. Omi, Bulus, nu ɓei fi ntu fya laifi ɓo? A ɓei zhin fye batisma dna n Bulus eyenu?
Ma gode n Shekwoyi ntuge mi to ɓei zhin zaho batisma n fye m akpege Krisbus ɓedo n Gayus
Ntuce nu zaho-zaho yi ta mi wa cige gye mi ya oɓo woyi mi-i shi “Bulus aduwa nyakun m.”
E, kuwa, mi ɓei ku batisma zhin Istifanus a puwa da ama mi ta shan zaho ɓo palon n mi ɓei zhin wo batisma m.
Yesu to ɓei tnumi ma zhin batisma num, ama ma zhin waʼazi Nabari Manayi nya. Mi to zhin waʼazi n na ɓeda ayakwoi fi aza ɓeyekpe nyam, kada ko wun iko ya n ko dna n waʼazi fa-fayi Yesu zundu nya nyi.
Gama Yesu fi-fi ti zundu nabari ko zhin gbolo-yi nu n aza bwi-bwi-yi aba. Ama n eyi aza gni-gni-yi aba, ko zhin Shekwoyi iko nu.
Ntuge Shekwoyi wa cige, “miɓa ze aza zokwo gni-gni nya gboloyi, kwo ko ɓei bmiya n ɓa ba wuna, har ɓeda n na ɓo nubo-zhin a ɓeyekpei agbamgbam nya yi.”
To mi gye awyega da, aɓeyekpei n naza yi n ɓa mi n gbegyi tu na anyi nya tukwo nyi. Shekwoyi ku ɓa ze amama da, woi ku wu ge oɓa wyega zhin gboloyi nu.
Gama Shekwoyi dna n wa wyega, wa ku kpe ge anyi ta kpe wo ye dna naza wyegam. Amma wa zhin ntuge wa gni aza dna n waʼazi zhin mi, n nanyi gye ko ge gboloyi nyi.

Ko ze gboloyi nu na Yahudiyi aba ntuge ɓa ye tuze n ʼshe kwa wu ge oɓo na zhin ko waʼazi nyi, ko zhin gaiciya nu, kwoi ze gboloyi nu n na Heleniyi aba, ntuge ɓa bwa nya gaiciya nu ga n ko lodo nɓa ɓonubo-zhin yi, nɓa wyega yi jesun.
Ntu cenu sa ya zhin waʼazi ge Yesu wa fi Wa gni ɓa nu, Ayahudiyi ta ye ɓedayem ko fyewyi. N na Heleniyi aba kwa, ko zhin gboloyi nu.

Ama Shekwoyi la awye gu aza ya, na yi ɓa ga gni-gni nyi, a Yahudiyi dnado na Heleniyi yi, ɓa gye she Kristi nu zhin Shekwoyi iko kala Wa gni ɓa; Kristi n Wohin tukwo Wonu dna n Shekwoyi shiri ceceyi nya atasin, ntu ɓa gni-gni ɓo.
Gama Shekwoyi shiri ye na gye ko ge gboloyi nyi, ko du zanyikoci awyega lo n ceceyi. Shekwoyi a-kala-gba kuwa–Kristi fi-fi tu n zundu–ko du zanyikoci doho-dohoi lo n kala.
To ema zaje, fye dnawye n fya tasin fya gye, aza fyewyi nu bwasun nfye mi nfye vi Kristi nyi n ʼnaye dnagmai yi, ko iko, ko kuwa n duciya yi.
Gama Shekwoyi ɓei kni aza gbolo n zanyikoci awye ntuge wa dna aza ce-ce vinyiko. Njesun wa kni aza gba-gba yi ntuge wa dna akalada vinyiko.
Wa kni shiri n ʼnanyi ye ta gyeko ngye nya hom, ntuge wa ze anya gboloyi n nanyi ye gye ngye ɓa nu zhin anya dnagmayi.
N nabai ge ko knibwai na, to zaho-zahoyi wami wa gma gni n Shekwoyi abyem.

Ntuge n Shekwoyi aba nu gmanyi nfye wye-wyei yi lo dna Kristi Yesu. Owo na wuyi Shekwoyi shiri ntu gni-gni ɓo; Owo na zhin Shekwoyi Woi gwo yi: Owo na ze yi aza Gyi-gyi-yi, Wona ga Wohin tukwo Wa gni yi.
Ai littafi Gyi-gyi-yi ku da ge, “Zaho-zaho yi wo cei pma wa gma, to wo gma dna n ʼnya Dagayi ku zhin.”
Ema zado, esanu mi ɓei ɓe fya aba ma gna fye Shekwoyi nabari ceyi, mi to ɓei zhan pma na ɓeda dadai yi, ko ɓeyekpe dnagmaiyim.
Gama mi ɓei la tu ge miɓa bwa ɓeda tu n Yesu tukwo nu n Wo fiyi tu n zundu.
Ntucenu ma ɓe fya ba dna n kalagba, n dnawo yi, n vinvin yi.
Mi to ɓei zhin waʼazi n ɓeda dadai yi zanyikoci ɓeyekpe nyam, ama Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi ɓei dna n ma ɓeda Woi wu aza nɓa ɓa wo nyi ge, tnutnu ɓo gmi n Shekwoyi aba nu.
Nɓei zhin lonu n nabai efye gaiciyaga kwa kpema Shekwoyi nu, toge zanyikoci ho ɓeyekpem.
Ama mi daɓo ɓeyekpe nya n nazayi n ɓaku mwa dna zafun. Ɓeyekpe ye ta gmi nanyi ye num, kwoi ta daɓo ga aza-yako anyi ye nya nu nɓa zhi ɓai miya nyim.

Eyi aɓeda zhin ɓeyekpe nya nu, ntuge ɓa kun n Shekwoyi aba nu, ɓai wu Shekwoyi shiri ɓeyekpe nya kwa lo yi na gmada eshe nya. Shiri ye ɓei bwi shi n sapa, ko da shike aɓo zhin ko ntu ya pma bwa ɓo nu kafin ma a zhin anyi.
Ama aza-yako anyi nya to ɓei kpe ce yem, ntuge ɓa ɓei gna ɓa kpe koye nu, ɓa to ɓei ɓa zun Dagayi mwa-mwa nya du m.
Nya nu n Littafi Gyi-gyi-yi kwa da cei ge zaho-zahoi to shin gye, ko wa wo, ko wa zhin ɓo nubo cei, enya Shekwoyi ku zhin shiri ntu naza ɓo nɓa yewo nyi m.
Ama yi kpe aɓeye yelo ntuge Shekwoyi la tnu n Wo Zafun yi Wa gna yi, owo Zafun zhin wa bi aba ya vinya, Wa wuyi asiri shin-shin-yi Shekwoyi nya.
She zanyikoci zafun n ko dna womi nyi, oko gmanyi nu kpe wa ɓenubozhin ye, n lonu zaho-zahoi ta kpe Shekwoyi aɓo nubozhin yem, sai Owo Zafun gmanyi.
Yi to gwo zafun anyi ye nya num, ya gwo Zafun n Shekwoyi nu, Wa wu yi anyaga amanai alheri nya n Shekwoyi ku ga yi nyi.
Ntu cenu aɓeda nʼya da vinya, Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi nu na gayi ɓa, aɓeda nu to n zanyikoca knim. Ntu cenu yi zhin apma n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi aɓeda yi ɓa wu Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi aɓo n ɓahin yi.
Ama oza n wo to n Zafun yim, wo ta mi wa gwo anya n Shekwoyi Zafun gayim, ntuge wo ta kpe ɓa wyegam, ɓa zhin gboloyi nu n wa ba. Sai oza nwo Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi, wonu ɓa kpe Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi aɓo ye.
Oza wo n zafun yi wo zhin wa mwi aɓo vinya, wa ku ɓa kpeye. Oɓo nu kuwa nko dami nanyi da yi, ntuge wota kpe zafun-da ʼɓoyem – ko fyefye.

Wo ɓa mi wuna? Ntuge wo to zhin oza nu nwo shin Dagayi aɓonubozhin ye kpem ko wa daɓo Woyi, ko wa shin Shekwoyi bwa ashanje nwa duwa zhin mim. Ama eyi a Yesu viyi, yi n Kristi bugba yi shi lo n Wa ɓe nubo zhin yi.
Oma zaje, mi daɓo lo fyei ngye aɓi putu nu, dna Yesu vi zokwo, to fyei vi Dagayi m, sai ofya ɓeye, mi ta mi ma daɓo fyei ngye a Yesu viyi kalada nɓa nunuyi lo n Zafun yim.
Kwa zemi dole ma gafye madara to ge nyagyi kpakala yi m, ntuge fye to ɓei yi kunce fya gyi nyagyi kpakala yi m. Har saiye ma fye to kunce m, fye ɓo sin madara nu kpa.

Ntuge fyeye zhin a Yesu viyi-putu nu, fyei vi fya ɓeye, toge Shekwoyi nya m. Sanu fye wun aje nu fyei gnajeya ntu nanya wu ɓo, kwo ta wu nu ge fye zhin aɓi-putu nu fyei ye fyehin zokwo m? Ɓehin-hin, fye zhan ɓo lo ngye aza nɓa to zhin Dagayi nya num ko fye-fye.
Fye ku gye, fye wu-anya najei ge ko omi nu du Apollos lo, fyei gna aduwa nyakun aje. Kwo to wu nu she fye mwa-mwa ye gbagbai lo dna Dagayi yekpe mim?
Nyikanu mi-i, ko Apollos, nʼyi ɓa ku ze dalili ajegna nya? Ntu ge na, yi zhin Shekwoyi atnu-tnuyi nu kawai, zaho-zahoi nwo nyaga yi, nʼyi bmazhin yi nu, fyei ga gaiciya.
Omi tnu-tnu nu ɓei ma bye anya n fya bugba mi, Apollos kwa wa kpe nuwan, ama Shekwoyi nu na zhin anyai pa nfya bugba mi, toge eyim.
Eza n wa bye-bye nyi ɓedo n za yi nwa kpe nuwan kpe-kpe nyi, ɓa to zhin nyaho nu m, ama Shekwoyi nu zhin tukoda gama Owo nu zhin anya yi pa.
Apollos nʼmi-i, yi zhin tnu-tnu n ngye bwadodna nya, n ɓomwi yrgmanyi, ko shi ko nyi a ɓei ga zaho-zahoi nʼyi mi lada she wa zhin tnu-tnu n wohin yekpe sun.
Yi zhin Shekwoyi atnu-tnu loyi nu ngnisun kawai. Fye zhin Shekwoyi fwa nu, toge eyi nyam; fye zhin Shekwoyi nyakun nu, toge eyi nyam.
Dna n Shekwoyi alheri, Wo ku wu mi she mi ɓa ze nya-miyi ʼgbada. Mi la nyakun shi, Apollos la nya mi tu ko she. Ama zaho-zahoi wo ɓa mi nya tu ko, wo zhin peceiye.
Ntu ge zaho to lo wa shan nyakun hin-hin shishi ndu do yi la lu bwanyim wato Yesu Kristi nu.
Azaho ɓa mi tu nya shi-shiyi ye n zinariya yi, ko azurfa, ko a kuta a nabmiya yi. Azaho kwa ɓa mi na shinwan yi, ko agbe-gbe ko akpa-yi.
Zaho-zahoi tnu-tnu dai aɓei pmi ko gye nʼna nu. Wada wyi nu n Kristi ɓei pmi ko gye n wohin tukwo yi. Ena nu ɓei wu ko tnu-tnu yi bmiya lo, ko koto bmiya lo m.
Oza wa mi tu nya shishiyi ye, kwa gmi gni to kwa gyinam, wo ɓei gwo lada.
Ama n zaho-zahoi tnu-tnu ʼaku gyina, wa bwi nuwan. Ama wo ɓa pwo n wohin tukwo, sai dai ngye wa shegmi n ʼna nu.
Fye ta kpe lo ge fye zhin Shekwoyi nyakun nu, Shekwoyi Zafun yi sase lo dna fye mim?
Ntucenu zaho-zahoi nwa wun Shekwoyi nyakun ya, to Shekwoyi ɓa wun wo ya. Ntuge Shekwoyi nyakun gyi-gyi-yi lo. Ofye nu zhin anyakun yi.
To zaho-zahoi wa dna wohin tukwo kwoce ge wo zhin za cece nu she anyi-da gye fyem. Ndei zaho gye wohin tukwo lo lonu, wo la ze mama ntuge wa bwa cece eshe nya.
Ntuge nya n aʼnyi ye gye ge cece nu, ko zhin gboloyi nu n Shekwoyi abye. She Ayuba littafi da, Shekwoyi zhin wa wan aza-ce-ce dna ɓa ce-ce mi nu.
Littafiʼa jeda dna Zabura ge Shekwoyi kpelo sarai shi zanyikoci zhin aɓo nubo wu, ɓai zhin a gboloyi nu.
Ntucenu, zaho-zahoi to gyigbe ge wo vi aza cece anyi nyam. Ntuge Shekwoyi la nyaho-nyahoi ga fye.

Wo la Bulus, n Apollos yi, n Bitrus yi ga fye ɓa bma fye zhin. Wo la anyi vinya ga fye fya zhan-pma ceyi, wye-wyei ɓedo nʼfi yi ofya afyenu nu. Wo ku anya vinya ga fye nɓa lo n sayi ye ɓedo na nya yi nɓa ye ɓeɓelo. Ɓa zhin fyanya nu vinya
Fyehin fye zhin Kristi anya nu. Kristi kwa Wo zhin Shekwoyi nya nu.
Ntu cenu fye ku yi ze a tnu-tnu yi nu nɓa gna Shekwoyi anabarka mi, ɓai wu Shekwoyi asiri njesun.
Ɓo kpakalai nna ye n tnutnuyi aba okwo nu ge, wo zhin ɓo nna gna wo zhin, wato a sun wo dna n gaiciya.
Omi ma? Mi zhin bara manayi nu? Mi to damu lo nfya ɓo nubo zhin yi tu mi tukwo da cem, ko aɓo zaho-zahoi zhin nubo ce yim. Mi to n mihin tukwo yi ga gaiciya lo tu ce m.
Omi bugba ta zun mi kni lom, dudu lo nu ko to wu nu ge mi knikniyi lom. Shekwoyi nu zhin mi mwi yi.

Ntu cenu fye to zun-ɓo ya wolo wolo, to Dagayi yi zhim, tu n zahozahoi tukwo ko wo zhin bara manayi nu ko nukwoyi m. Shi Dagayi ɓei ɓe, wo ɓei kpe buzangna ya a gye shi zaho-zahoi wu lo har bugba mi. Zaho-zahoi ɓei kpe sayi nya ko zhin yi zhin Dagayi tnu-tnu. Dna sayi nu n Shekwoyi ɓei ga zahozahoi wo cici n ko zhin wo nya.
Ma zhan-pma n Apollos yi ɓedo mihin yi, ma si ɓo si n mi da nyi: nge fye to kni aza kni-knim. Fye to mwa fyehin tukwo n Shekwoyi tnu-tnu yi hoi ngye wo du azaje lom.
Ho zhin aɓoko kni ɓei na? Ho kninyi lo n Shekwoyi nu to ga ho ma? To kninu zhin hoi ci hohin ngye nya ho cei nyi ato gaho ga-ga nu ma?

Fye zhin aɓo lo ngye fye ku zafun nyagyi lu bwa vinya n fye cei pma. Nubo ku fye fu dna zafun har fye ku gyi abe n yi ceya. A wo mi ngye fye ye ku abe yi nu gyi nu, ntuge sa nʼsa ɓei si, fye ɓei gye yi gni abe gyi nfyei ce.

Nsa hoi kwa wumi ngye eyi n yi zhin Shekwoyi atnutnu yi nyi, Shekwoyi ku yi kma navun vinya. Yi wulo ngye aza nu nɓa zhin laifi dnagmai har aye awuɓa. Yi ku ze awye shi nya na za ba ɓedo na malaika yi.
Yi ku ze a ma-ma ntu Yesu ɓo, amma fye ku ze aza ce-ce ntu Yesu ɓo. Yi ku ze akala gbai, ama fye na kalayi lo. A kuyi ze aza gbolo, ama aku mwa-mwa gafye.
Har n saiye, mikun gnuyi lo, yi wo nuwan mikun, yi kpe aje sakun, ai lu yi, yi zan-zan laɓa ngye aza ɓa to na pi yim.
Yi zhin tnu-tnu nʼya bwa yi ntuge ya bwa nyagyi. Esa na za kpe ya gye, ya tuɓa anabarka, esanu ɓa ga yi wahala, ya bwami nɓai.
Esa na dayi ɓo nukoyi, ya dnaɓo gbe na ɓeda manai yi; yi ku ze findakulu, yi ku ze aza gbolo har naiye.
Mi ta ka fye ɓedaye ge mi ye ma dnafye vinyiko nu m, ama mi kun fye nu ntuge fye zhin ma ɓi ye-ye yi nu.
Ko fye bwa aza n lo dubu gun awo ɓa wu fye Yesu ɓo, fye pa ge mi nu bwa fye dada zhin gmanyi. Ntuge omi nu na gni fye ɓe cei n Yesu aba, esa n mi ɓo zhin fye waʼazi cei nyi.
Ntuce nu mi gyi fye wye, fye tumwi n mi, fya zhin she mi zhin.
Cenu zhin mi-i tnu n Timatawus yi n fya ba wa bma fye zhin, Wo zhin mi ɓi yeye yi nu dna Dagayi, gbenuyi nu njesun. Wo ɓa pa fye aɓo mi wu dna ekklesiya dohodohoi nma lo.
Azaho lo n fye mi ɓai mwa ɓahin tukwo, ɓa gye ge mi wo dna nu to mi-i ɓe fya bam.
N Shekwoyi aye yi, mi ɓe lo safyewyi. Dna n Sayi nu n mi ɓei kpe aɓokoda-yi ɓo ye, ngye ɓa to zhin aɓeda dayi nu kawai yim, ko ngye ɓa n Shekwoyi iko yi kusun lo.
Ntuge Shekwoyi bemi to zhin aɓoda nya nu kawai yim, ama iko nya.
Fye kni kni-dai na? Miɓe fya ba n gnakni yi, n busi yi pma lawu ɓedo, ko mi ɓe dna yeye n buga yami ya?
Zaho-zahoi da lo ge ɓenukwoi ku zhin nʼfya tasin, ɓenukwoi n na ɓenai ta zhin ce pyam. Oza lo n dna fya duwa nyakun n dna laifi nwo dadanyikwo yi.
To fya zhin aɓoko ge na, fye gye ge fye fi n zafun nu? Ai ko kamata lo bugba wunfye ɓedo vinyiko yi, har fya gye fye la zayi pya biya n fya tasin.

Ko da shike mi to gni lo nfya bam, mi zhin ɓeye nubo lo zin. Dna yi Dagayi Yesu ye, mi la ɓo zhin nubo n na ɓa zhin sai ho gna ngye mi gni lo ɓo. Fye yi yezhi aduwa nyakun nya-iko Dagayi Yesu nya ɓa kunsun fyei dna fye yezhi mi, omihin ce n kunsun lo nfyei dna zafun
a la zayi pya biya n na duwa nyakun, a gawo n shetan akun wa wu wo nayi, nna wyetu-yi ge owo wye-wyei ɓei po dna nyipyei nʼyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi ɓei jezeɓe ncei nyi.
Ko zhin ɓo nukwoyi nu fyei gma ntu fye gyi-gyi ɓo, ama fyei fa ɓeye pya koi gyabye. Fye ta kpe lo ge n na fa zaknayi dna wo laifi, sa fyewyi aɓa wan wo zokwo m?
Fye la ʼza nukwoi ye gmiya n fye tasin, n na bai fya ze aza gyi-gyi-yi. Aɓei la Kristi-Shekwoyi Kugya Ɓiyi-wu ntu yi ɓo.
Ntu cenu yi nya agmada tu Wo, ya dna kala dna Yesu-vi zokwo, ya zokwo kwokwoi ya nko nuwun yi viyan ɓedo n ko kpi zhin yi. Yi nya gmada tu bredi Gyi-gyi yi, mwa-mwa nya, n gaiciya nya yi.
Dna wasika n mi ɓei ka fye nyi, mʼɓei gna fye ge fye to ye ɓedo n na ɓenukwoi zhin-yi yim.
Mi to ɓei da a Shetan da nu ɓo n ɓa zhin anagbai nyi, ko aɓo wyedai, ko avi, ko ashan-gba yim. Ntuge fye ta kpefi n nanyi ye n tna aza deye pyam.

Nya mi ɓei zhin nufi cei ko nu nyi ge, fye to ye ɓedo n zayi nwo yi wohin ge wo zhin Yesu viyi, ama woi ce woi zhin anagbai, aɓowyeda, woi gba a shan, ko woi gyi azafi laɓa, ko woi wyi ʼvi, ko woi sin eje, ko woi kni aza akmi. Ko nyagyi, fye to gyi nʼza deye pya yim.
Eyi tnu-tnu nu to ya da abmida wam. Ama ɓehin-hin eyi tnu-tnu nu ya da aza wa, ya zhin ɓa ɓo dai-dai In ɓa lo aduwa nyakun ge a Yesu viyi, ɓai gwo alaifi ye pya zhin nyi.
Shekwoyi nwo gmanyi yi, Wo nu zhin abmida ʼwadayi. Ama ofye fyehin ce, fye zhin nʼzayi yi, fya gmi wo ya nfya duwa nyakun.
Ngye ɓo nzai dna-do lo n wo zado yi, kni nu zhin fyei lo a wadayi aba n ɓa zhin a shetan da, to fya lo cei n na Yesu viyi aba nu, a wu oza n wo zhin oza gaiciya-da nʼfya tasin ma?
Fye ta kpelo ge eyi a Yesu-viyi ɓei da anyi ye owa nʼwyiho yim? To kni ɓei nu zhin to fyei ɓa mi, fya ku aɓo a ɓi-ɓiyi aje nfya tasin ma?
Fye ta kpelo ge eyi a Yesu viyi ɓei da amalaika owa har ya ga ɓa lada nʼshe m? Ntu cenu ko bmiya lo fya mi fya ku aɓo aɓi-ɓiyi aje n nanyi ye n tna ɓo dna yi.
To esanu aɓoye pya ɓe, kni nu zhin fyei lo awadai aba nɓa to zhin a Yesu viyi ma?
Mi ye ma dna fye vinyiko nu. Ashe ɓeyekpei to lo ko gmanyi n na Yesu-viyi nwo ɓa mi wa gna a ɓena ajeyam?
Ama maimako deye, sai Yesu-viyi wa lo n wo Yesu-viyi doyi n na tna-viyi wada ɓokun.
Aje kara zhin, ko zhin knizun nu n fya ba a Yesu-viyi. Fye ta mi fya bwa bugba n ɓenukwoi yi n naɓa zhin fyem? Ko gna bmiya lo n Dagayi aba fya fwa a gyi fye fi.
Ama maimako deye, fye nu n laifi lo n fyehin tukwo, fyei gyi azaje fi, har ma nfya ʼjei ɓe.

Fye ta kpe lo ge aza n ɓa zhin aɓoi pya ɓa to n gado yi lo n Shekwoyi bemi m?
