Fye to dna fyehin tukwo wyi m, ntuge aza nɓa zhin anagbai, ko ɓai gba ashan, to ɓai zhin befyece m, ko kwa zanugbai woi wagye n zanugbai yi, nyikoza woi wagye n zanugbai yi, nyikoza woi wagye n nyikoza yi-ɓa ta lo Woʼbe mim.
Nlonu avi, ko afan-nada, a nyasin-yi, aza gyifi-yi, ko azaje-zaje-yi.
Esa lo n na zaho ɓei bwa wu lonu n fye mi, ama n sayi ala fya laifi zhan ya, a la fye kni ntu Shekwoyi ɓo. Wo la fye gwo ntu nya ɓo n Dagayi Yesu Kristi n Zafun Shekwoyi nya yi wa zhin nfye ɓo.

Miɓa mi ma zhin nyaho-nyahoi to Yesu yi na tu mi ko gbem, ama aɓo vinya nu to bmiya lo ntu mi ɓom, Ko ai ɓei la ye ge mi zhin aɓo vinya, mi ta ye ma zhin ɓo ko ɓa wan mi shi har to miyi mi ma fa ko zhin ɓo nʼsa mi ye ce yim.

Shekwoyi la nubo gayi ntu nyagyi ɓo, ama tuge ya gyi ndu ya nubo-fu yam. To zhin nubo ge nyagyi zhin ɓo yako num, ntuge Shekwoyi ɓa du a nubo ya ɓedo n nyagyi yi n wyiho yi. Ama anagbai zhin to bmiya lom ko fyefye: a to zhin ya nayi ga ce num, ama ntu Dagayi ɓo, woi cei pma lo wa nu ya nayi n wohin tukwo yi.
Shi Shekwoyi ɓei la Yesu kala n vingwo, elo nu Wo ɓei kuyi kala ce n wo iko yi.
Fye ta kpelo ge efye nayi zhin gmanyi nu n Yesu nya yim? To miɓa la Kristi nayi ma ɓe ko do n Karuwa nya yi? Ko fye-fye!
Ko fye ta kpe lo ge oza wo lo wa wangye n Karuwa yi wo la ze gmanyi n woi ma? Littafi ku da peipei, oɓa ngun-aba, ɓa ze gmanyi.
Ama oza n wa wohin ga Dagayi, wo la ɓedo n Kristi yi, ɓa ku ze ngye oza gmanyi.
Fye bui anagbai zhin si. Laifi daho-dohoi n za zhin, ko ta to nayi bwa m, oza wa zhin anagbai, wo zhin wo nayi nu laifi.
Fye ta kpe ge ofya nayi zhin Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi asese ba nu, n Shekwoyi ɓei ga fye nyi, Woi sase lo dna fye mim? Ofya nayi to zhin fya nya num.
Shekwoyi ɓei la fye si n kona ko-kwoyi. Ntu cenu fye ga Shekwoyi mwa-mwa n fya nayi-yi, ntuge owa nya nu ɓai.
Tu ɓenya tukwo, nfye ɓei nyami dna wasika nfye ɓo ka ga mi nyi, omi ɓe-gbedna nyi, ko bmiya lo nʼza to la nyikwo m.
Ama mulapa gna bmiya lo, zanugbai doho-dohoi nwo nyikwo yi, nyikwoza doho-dohoi ce nwo ɓa yi, sakun fya kaya fi n laifi.
Zanugbai ɓa ga wo nyikwo nyaho-nyahoi ko kunce dna mulapa nlonu ce nyikwoza nwo ɓa ʼba.
Ɓinyikwoi nwo la senu, wo to nwo nayi iko yi lo n, sai dai owo ɓa; Njesun lonu, zanugbai to n wo nayi iko yi lo m, sai dai owo nyikwo.

Ntucenu fye to wo aje nayi ɓi m. Sai dai n fysl zhin shiri deye ntuge fya zhin aduwa ntu esa fyewyi ɓo kawai. Ama n deye avun, fya je yeɓedo ntuge to fya kayafi n shetan jaraba ntu fyehin tna-wanshi ɓo.
Mita da ge ko zhin tile nu ʼza pa mulam, ama oza ɓa mi wa pa nwo bugba la tu nu.

A womi ngye zahozahoi fye mi wa gni ngye mi ntna mula pa yi. Ama yi to wu lo gmanyi-gmanyi num. Shekwoyi ga azaho nyaga mula-pa nya, ko mula-nyiko, azaho kuwa zhi-zhi lonu na gmada yi ntna mula-pa yi.
Ntu cenu mi gna aza n ɓa ta lo mulam, ɓedo na nyigbai yi ko gna bmiya lo fya gyi abye lonu ntna mula-pa yi nfye ɓa mi, ngye mi.
Ama ngye fye ta mi fya wan fyehin m, sai fya pa mula. Ntuge ko gna bmiya lo oza pa mula, ai ya gna wo gni woi fi da shakpe ɓo.
To, ga aza n ɓa ku mula-pa nyi, mi gbetu yi lo, tuge shaula kawai m. Gbetu ye konyi emi nya nu to m, ntuge nya nyi n Dagayi ku da nwohin tukwoi, nyikwoza ta ya wo ɓam kpe-kpe.
Amma n wa wo ya, to, wo la bwa gni lonu, to wa shan nu sen, akpe wa jeze lo da wo ɓa Zanugbai ce, wo ta ya wo nyikwo m kpe-kpe.

Mi ye ma ɓe a shaula ho emihin anya. Ɓa to zhin gbetu nu n Dagayi aba cewom, ama ɓa bmiva lo nʼmi wyegye. N Yesu-viyi n nyikwoi dna lo n wo to zhin Yesuviyi m, ama nyikwo-yi laye wa sase woi, to, woto gna wa mim.
Njesun ngye nyikwoza n ɓai lo n wo ta vi Yesu m, oɓa yi kwa wo la ye ntuge wa dna n woi, to, wo to gmi n wa ba m.

Ntuge oɓa n wo ta vi Yesu m, owo nyikwo zhin wa gni wo ɓe cei vivi n Shekwoyi aba; n lonu nyikwo n wo ta vi Yesu m, owo ɓa zhin wa gni wo ɓe cei vivi n Shekwoyi aba To ɓei lo nu, to, oɓa ɓi ɓe ve ku ze; ngye a shetan da-ama she ko wu zhi lai nyi, ɓa Gyi-gyi-yi lo.

To ama ngye oza nwo zhin tnaiviyi n cei pma lo na jegna yi, sai wa gnaje, ko to zhin abui num. Nkwa ze lonu, oho Yesu-viyi, to la gyitu ge sai oho puwada tnaviyi wa sase n ho yim; ntuge Shekwoyi ye Owa ɓi ɓa sase fi n bugba-fu nu n na gmada yi.
Oho nyikwoza, ha kpe nʼwuna ge ho ɓa mi ha gni ho ɓa woi ya sase n ho ya? N lonu ce oho zanugbai ntu ho nyikwo ɓo.

Zaho-zahoi wo gyi abye nwa sesei shi Shekwoyi cei pma, dna mula-pa ko tna-mula-pa, shi Shekwoyi wa wu zokwo n wo bma zhin yi, la gni aba doho-dohoi Shekwoyi wa yi ho gni. Deye konu zhin oɓo mi wu na ikklisiya vinya.
Oza wo ku a Yahudiyi knunu vi nu kpa kaciya zhin nya-kafin wo vi Yesu, ko to ze wo bugba kni nyam, oza wo to zhin kaciya yim, wo to shan zhin m.
Ntuge knunu kaciya zhin nya, ntna kaciya zhin yi, ɓa to zhin nyaho nu m. Ama oɓo dnagmai konu zhin oza vi Shekwoyi ɓeye woi shi Wa wyidna bwa. Oɓo kpakalai nu.
Kwo bmiya zaho-zahoi wa gyabye nwo tnu-tnu-yi n Shekwoyi ɓei yi wo, woi dna ko zhin mi.
Ho zhin fyenu nu? To ye kwa wun ho bugbam-to ama, n wyegye-a gu ho ya ha bwa hohin tukwo, zhan-pma kwoi.
N Dagayi wa yi ho hoi zhin fyenu tnu-tnu nu, pa ge Kristi la ho loya n iko laifi nya; oho na yi ho n pma loloi ya, pa ge ho la ze Kristi fyenu.
Kristi ɓei la fye si n konantuce nu fye la loya n nanyi ye tukwo-mwa nɓa dnawo yi.
Ntu cenu, oma-zaje yeye-yi, aba nʼza vi Yesu woi gni nɓa, wo la gni ɓo, ntuge n saiye Dagayi gni lo ɓo Wa bma wo zhin.

Nsaiye miɓa dna fye gbe tu ɓenya deyi tukwo. Aɓi anyikwoi n ɓa to sanu nyim ma? A fa ɓa ɓa sanu? Mi to n gbetu yi lo n ko gmi n Dagayi aba ntu ɓa ɓom. Ama Dagayi la awyega gami dna Wo sun-sun-gye nkwo kunce lo a gami gaiciya, ko ɓa damagma ma gna fye ɓo mi zhin nubo lo cei.
Wahala yi nu nyi; eyi a Yesuviyi eya wye-wyei fi lo na zhin gye mi n saiye. Dna saye pya kuwa mi gye lo ngye ko gna bmiya lo oza gni lonu ntna mula-pa yi.
To, ama, nho ku mula lupa, to gna-kwaje m. Nho to pan, to gya-wyeya da ce n saiye m.

Ofye anugbai, nfye cei pma lo fya gyabye na nyikwo kuyi nsaiye, ɓenukwoi nu tom; Ko ɓinyikwoi senu dna saye pya, abui nu ton. Ama ce, mula pa ɓa ɓe a wahala ɓeɓe nu n mi to ɓo cei pma fya sin ɓa n saiye m.
Oma-zaje nya mida nyi, esa ta shan sun lon n mwam, nlonu, esa yi gba kpekpe-gye lo ntu Shekwoyi tnu-tnu ɓo. N tuce nu, oza n wo nyikwoi dnalo, wo la ze ngye woto i cei lo m, ntu Dagayi tnu-tnu ɓo.
Agmada, ko bugba-wun, ko nyabwa, ɓa to go zaho-zahoi Shekwoyi tnu-tnu yam.
Aza nɓa zhin tnu-tnu na kaya anyi nya yi, ɓa zhanpma ɓai dna zokwo manayi, ɓai ye nʼsai bwa. Ntuge anyi nɓa shi n saiye nyi, esa fyewyi, ɓa ɓa duya.
Nyaho-nyahoi fye ɓa zhin, mi to cei pma lo zaha zhin ko dna na ɓesam. Oza wo to nyikwoi dnam, wo ɓa mi wa zhin apma nwo sayi woi zhin Dagayi tnu-tnu, she kwo ɓa da Dagayi.
Ama oza wo nyikwoi dna, wo ta mi wa zhin lonu dei-dei m, tile wa zhin anyiɓo-nubo i oɓo nwo ɓa zhin ntu ge kwa da wo nyikwo.

Owo aɓopuawo n gnaje lo. Ɓinyikwoi nwa senu ce, oɓo gmanyi-gmanyi nu bwa wo sun. Ɓinyikoi wo to senun, owo ɓo pua-wonu wa zhin ɓo nkwo ɓa da Dagayi-dna ɓeho-ɓehoi wo ɓa zhin. Ama nyikwo nusei tile nu wa zhin aɓo-aje nubo, shi wo ɓa zhin wo puwa aba, shi wo ɓa zhin oɓo nkwo ʼɓa da wo ɓa.
Mi gna fye ɓeye ntuge ma bmafye zhin nu, toge ma kma fye mula-pam. Ama mi cei pma fya ga fyehin tukwo dna Shekwoyi tnu-tnu vinya, ntna ɓo ko ɓa gna fya bugbajeya.
Oza wo ta mi lo n wohin wan m, woi gyelo wo ɓa pa mula nu, to wo gyabye pai, abui nu to m.
Ama n zanugbai ho lo nwo ɓa mi wa tu wohin gbe nge wo ta la nyikwo m, har wa ku mi wa gni lonu ntna nyikwo layi, woi go wohin wan-fi, wo ku shaula manayi zhin!
Ntucenu oza wa pa mula wo ku zhin bmiya, ama oza wo to pa mula m, wo ku zhin gna bmiya.
Nyikwo-nusei dna nwo ɓa akun nu, esa nwo ye n wye-wyei lo; ama sa nwo ʼɓa fi cei, to wo la loya nwa wun, wo ɓa mi wa senu do n wo cei pma, ama sai onu wo zhin Yesu viyi ce.
Ama wo ɓa gna agmada bwa woi ya gni lonu, n mi wyegye nu; ama mi gye lo ngye Shekwoyi Zafun kunsun lo miyi n mi shaula n mi gafye nyi.

Oɓo ko jesun lo sai ɓenya n fye ɓo nya tu n nyagyi tukwo na ku ashan gba cei nyi. Tu ɓenya ye tukwo zaho-zahoi gyelo ngye owo ɓegbe-dna nu gna bmiya lo. Ɓeye-kpe bmiya ʼza shi, ama oɓo na gna yelo ntu ikklisiya mimi ɓo ko nu zhin yeye.
Oza wo gye ge wo kpe aɓo ye lo vinya, to, wo bwa wo tnayekpe nu bmi zo wu.
Ama oza wo ye Shekwoyi ɓehin-hin nya, owo nu bmiya shi lo n Shekwoyi ɓa kpe wo ye.
To, yi ɓa gyi nya na ku shan gba cei? Yi kpelo ge oshan to ku Shekwoyi nu zhin m, yi-i kpelo ge Shekwoyi bwasun gmanyi nu.
Azaho zhin ɓa da ge a Shekwoyi lo mwa begye n ʼshe ɓedo n ʼkni yi.

Ama yi kpelo ge Shekwoyi bwasun lo gmanyi nu, Owo nu zhin Dada nwa zhin anya vinya, Wa zhin yi ya ze Wa nya. Njesun Dagayi bwasun gmanyi nu – Yesu Kristi – Wo nu na zhin anya vinya, Woi ga yi-wyewyeyi njesun.

Dudu lomu, a Yesu-viyi ho ta kpe ɓeye ye lon. Ntu ɓa mida ɓo na shan yi, oɓa ɓenubo-zhin gna ɓa ge ashan zhin anya awye-wyeyi nu, har ɓa ku gaiciya ga ge nyagyi na la ko ga ʼshan, a la ku Shekwoyi nu ga. Ntu cenu she ɓa gyi nyagyi-yipya, kwa lu ɓa n bugba.
Pa ge Shekwoyi to damu lo ko yi gyi, ko to yi gyim. Ko ta zhin ya gba-gba m, n yi to gyi m, kwoi ta ɓe yi mwa-mwa yi ya gyi m.
Ama fye zhin peceiye n iko yi fye cei lo ntu ko gyi ɓo, sakun fya zhin Yesu-viyi ho, nwo bugba to kalai lon, wa kaya dna laifi.

Oɓo nyi ko ɓa zhin; ngye zaho lo n wo to n bugba kalai lo dna na ɓeye pyam, hoi kpe honya lo ge nyagyi ye pya ta zhin ho nyahon, hoi gyi nyagyi na ʼshan nyakun, ai deye ɓa cewo bwa har wa lo o-shan nyakun ntuge wa gyi nyagyi, bugba yi gwo wo lu.
To, ntu ge ho “kpe lo ge ko to zhin nyaho nun hoya gyi m,” ho ɓa zhin Yesu-viyi do n wo bugba to kalai lon wa bwi dna zafun, oho zado n Yesu wa fi ntu wo ɓo.
Ko zhin laifi nu n Kristi abye ho ya ce ho zado bwa wa zhin ɓo n wo bugba zun wo kni da ce.
Nuce nu, ndai ashan-bu gyi ɓa zhin mi zado wa zhin laifi, mi ta shan ɓa gyim har nyalo-nyalo, ntuge mi ta ye lo ma zhin mi zado, wa zhin laifi m.
Mi zhin tnu-tnuyinu Shekwoyi nya, toge ndna n zanyikoci ho sintan. Mi ɓei ku gye Yesu eyi Dagayi nʼma wye yi. Omi tnu-tnu nu na ɓe nʼfya wye-wyei doshan yi.
Ndei na zaho wyegye mi to zhin tnu-tnuyi num, nʼfyaba mi zhin ko nu, ntuge fya kpe Yesu ye nʼma kun nu.
Omi begbe-dna nyi na za ba n ɓa nya ɓenya.
Mi to iko hoi lo ko fyewyim? Kwo mi ta mi, ngye a tnu-tnu-yi aje, ma zhin zhiɓei nʼfya puwa ma?
Mi ɓei nyikwoi lo, woi zhin Yesu-viyi nu, to mi ye zan-lo laɓa n woi ce, she a tnu-tnu-yi aje zhin nyi, she Dagayi-azaje zhin nyi, njesun she Bitrus zhin nyi m?
Kwo Barnaba nʼmi yi nu ɓa bwa tnu-tnu zhin nʼya bwa yi, ama fyei ga azaje anya?
Fye shin soja ho gye woi gba wohim tukwo agyiwye? Fye shin fwa-yi ho gye to woi gyi wo fwa kaya m? Kwo fye shin Bolo-lo ho gye to woi sin wa nakwo madara ma?
Mita gna fye zanyikoci ɓewyegye nu ge ko bmiya lon. Mi gna fye ɓo nu Shekwoyi wa da.
Dna nʼwa Shekwoyi ɓei ga Musa nyi, Wa cige, to pa nakwo gbe esa ko gni koi dna awyi ga ho nkwa pita yim. Fye gye ge Shekwoyi ɓo zhin nubo n nakwoi nu gmanyi, esa Wo ɓei da cei lo nu nyi?

Kwo woto ɓei zhin nubo nʼyi nu ma? Sosai kuwa. Wo ɓo da lonu Wa wu yi ge a Yesuviyi a tnu-tnuyi ɓa go lada n naza ba nɓa bma ɓa zhin. N fwa-nuyi yi, n nawyi luyi yi, ɓa na wyetu yi ɓa gyi ofwa ampanyi.
Yi ku nyabye manayi zafun nya bye, nfya bugba mi. Kwo duwyi lo nu yi-i ya nya nyagyi ɓo n na jeyi nfya ba?

Fye ga azaje ɓa, nɓa zhin fye waʼazi nyi, ko bmiya lo fya zhin lonu. Ama yi to gna bmiya zhilo n fya ba n ɓa yin? Dudu lonu yito zhan-pma n iko gna bmiya-zhi nya yim, ama ya zhin tnu-tnu nʼya bwa yi ntu na nya ɓo, n yi ɓa pmai lo, ntna fye bma-zhin. Yi to shin gna ge a gba yi tnu-tnu ta n nyaho-nyahoi yim, ntu dnaɓo ge sakun ya nya fya mawye-ya n Kristi ɓeda, nʼya ɓe fye cei nyi.
Fye ta kpe lo ge Shekowyi ɓei gna, a bmazhin-yi n na tnu-tnu zhinyi yi n na duwa nyakun ge, ɓa bwa ɓa lobo n ɓa nyagyi yi dna na nyagaga, n na nyagyi yi na ɓe wo cei na duwa nyakun nyin?
To ko wu lo nu, Shekwoyi ku da ge aza ɓa zhin waʼazi, ɓa bwa bmazhin n na za ba n ɓa gwo kwo nyi.

Ama mito shin fye kobo ɓo nyam. Mi-i ta ka fye ma gna fye ge miye ma ya gwo nu nʼsaiyem. Sai dai ma gyi fifi ko n mikun yi, ceya cece ge mi bwi agmada nuwan, nmi bwa dna waʼazi n mi zhin fye n tna nyaho gwoi nyi.
Waʼazi zhin to zhin ɓo gbegyi nya nu nʼmabam–mi ta mi ma fa ko zhin ɓo ko mi ya kni ge mʼba fam, Miɓa ze oɓo sun-sun nya. Aiya mʼma ba to-miya zhin waʼazi m.

Ndei ko ɓo lo ge omi bugba na la ma zhin tnu-tnu-ye Shekwoyi wo gami ko lada; ama ko to wulo lonu nun, ntuge Shekwoyi nu na kni mi Woi dna mi tnu-tnu ye n nakun mi-i to n mihin ɓo kni-yi lo n shan sun.
Knihi nu zhin mi lada koi wuzhi la ya? Konu zhin agmada nʼmi bwa dna waʼazi Nabari Manayi nya, nʼmi zhin to miyi tu zaho azhin, mi-i gna a gbami lada waʼazi zhin nyam.
Deye na pmai lo mwa; shi konyi mito dna lo nʼzaho sinta ma viwo ɓeye ge gye wo gba ma gyiwye lon, dudu lonu mila mihin ze aza vinya fyenu dna bugba-da n nabai ma gni ɓa ga Kristi.

Esa mi zhin tnu-tnu na Yahudiyi aba, ma ze ngye Yahudiyi n nabai ɓa wo Nabari manayi, ma gni ɓa ɓe cei n Kristi aba. Esa mi gni na aza ʼba nɓa vi a Yahudiyi knunu, mi ta gni aɓena nela yin, ko da ya ke omi bugba to cei yelo lonum, ntuge mi cei pma ma bma ɓa zhin.
Esa mi gni na ɓenai aba, mi zhin ma bugba ga ɓa she mi ɓa mi, ama dole ma zhin ɓo ko bmiya a Yesu-viyi aba. Omi bugba ga n mi ga ɓa nyi, ko ɓa zhin ma ka ɓa bugba wan shi, ma bma ɓa zhin.

Esa mi gni naza-ba nɓa to n kalai lo dna gaiciya gam, ma ze tnakala-da, nnabai ma bma ba zhin. Ntu cenu mi la mihin gbodo n zahozahoi yi ntuge ko wuso-wuso, oza ye ge mi gna wo Kristi ɓeda, n nabai Kristi wa gni wo.
Mi zhin aɓoye vinya ntuge ma si ɓa kpe n Nabari Manayi yi, njesun ntu na anabarka ɓo n mi bwa, sa ma gye ɓai ɓe da Kristi.
Lalle fye kpelo ge nna wyefan ba, asubui vinya nu zhin ɓa busi, ama zaknayi nu zhin wa bwa lada kmisun-yi gwo. Ntucenu fye bui si ntuge fya gwo lada-yi.

Zaho-zahoi wo zhin wyefan-yi wo zhin wa gawo nayi wahala, woi tu aɓomwi, woi wan aɓo fi. Wo zhin lo nu ntuge wa gwo lada nu nkwo ta mwa sa m. Ama yi zhin ntuge ya gwo lada eshe nya nu n koɓa mwasa har nyalonyalo.
Ntuce nu mi busi n na wyetu yi na bye. Sa mi zhin dambye, ma sha akun ma ku ɓa mwi kpa, to ma she ɓa fi nʼsem.

Cenu zhin mi-i ga mi nayi tata, kwa zhin ɓo na ye cei, toge ɓonu ko yem. N mi to zhin lonun, odna wo mi lo ge sakun ma ku waʼazi zhin azaje ɓa ku lofi n na gbegyi ba, ama aila miyi dai gmiya ge mi to kunce lom.
Oma-zaje mi ye ma pa fye nya ɓo nko ɓei zhin ya dada n zhabui nyi. Shekwoyi ɓei tu ɓa fun n ʼnyi yakwo yi, har Wa shi ɓa bwa ɓa pi ola yakwo ya, n na yi kwo ge Ola Byei nyi.
A zhin ɓa batisma vinya dna ola yakwo ye, ɓedo n ʼnyi ye yi ɓa ku ze Musa aviyi.
Oɓa vinya ɓa gyi nya-gyi zafun nya.
Oɓa vinya njesun ɓa sin nuwan zafun nya. Ntuge ɓa ɓei sin n Napma zafun nya nu nko ɓei gni lo ɓai nyi. Kristi nu ɓei zhin Apma yi.
Dudu lonu n mwa begye n ɓa mi, to ɓa zhin ɓo Shekwoyi ye ce yim. Ntucenu a wuɓa laɓa n zhabui.
To, aɓeye vinya kwa ɓa zhin pmagna nu n ya ba ge, yi to ye aɓo nukwoyi shi ɓa ɓei zhin nyin.
To ya gba ashan shi azaho n ɓa mi ɓei zhin nyi m. (Shi Littafi ku da “Aza ɓei sase zhi ɓa gyi ɓai sin, ɓa kuka ntuge ɓa nya-nya,” ɓai ga nakwo ɓiyi zhin-zhin mwa-mwa.)
Yi to zhin anagbayi m, shi azaho n ɓa mi ɓei zhin har aza dubu shibacei ata (23,000) ɓa fi n nyipyei gmanyi.
To ya mwi Shekwoyi hakuri gye m, shi azaho n ɓa mi ɓei zhin nyi m, awa saɓaya laɓa cei har efi.
To ya da gnunu-gnunu tu n, ʼnya Shekwoyi la ga yim. Ngye shi azaho n ɓa mi ɓei zhin, cenu ɓei zhin Shekwoyi wa tnu nwo malaika yi wa wu ɓa.
Aɓoye ɓei zhin ɓa vinya ntu ɓesisi ɓo nu. A ka ɓa fi n Littafi ntuge ɓa ceyi ɓepa, ntuge yi fi nʼsa nu n nanyi ku ga zo.
Ntuce nu zaho-zahoi nwo gye lo ge, wo migni lo woi zhin nubo ge, “Ai mita zhin lonun” ko la ze pmagna n ha ɓa. Ntuge kpekni hohin ɓa kaya dna n laifi ce.

Jaraba daho-dahoi n kwo ɓa ɓe haba, to oko pya nu ɓe azaje aba ce. Ama Shekwoyi zhin gbenu-yi nu. Wo ta ye ge a zhin ho jaraba n ko ɓa duho kala wyim. Esa n ha lo jarab ho, Wo ɓa gaho kala ha gni agni dako, har Wa wu ho zokwo n ho ɓa gmiya nkwo mi.
Ntucenu, oma nugundo, fye na ashan-gba dohodohoi pya ɓo.
Mi daɓo n fyei ngye a wyega da nu. Fye mwi mi ɓeda n fyehin tukwo yi fya gye.
N Dagayi tebur, esa yi tu nuwan byei anabarka, kwo to wu ge, yi gni anabarka bwa nu dna n Yesu amin? Esa yi sa bredi ya, ya gyi, kwo wu ge yi gni Yesu nayi apma bwa nu n najei.
Kwo shi kwo nyi bredi bwasun gmanyi nu nʼyi sagaje, eyi vinya kwa n mwa begye, yi zhin nayi gmanyi nu dna Kristi ntuge yi gyi bredi gmanyi nu.
Fye dna a Yahudiyi wye, aza ɓa gyi nya na lako zhin hadaya cei, ɓa ku ze gmanyi dna hadaya tnu-tnu yi mi.
Miye ma da gena na? Fye gye ge mi da nu ge ashan zhin anya awyewyei nu, ko anya na gba kpe ɓa nyi ge ɓa na ʼpma hoi lo? Aʼa, ko fyefye.
Oɓo nyi mi da ge enya na ku gba kpe nʼshan to a ga Shetan nu, toge Shekwoyi m. Mito cei pma lo kwa fya ze gmanyi n shetan yim.
Fye ta mi fya sin dna n Dagayi bwe, fyalo fyei je shetam nya sin m. Fye ta mi fya gyi Dagayi tebur fya lo fyei je shetan nya gyi m.
Yiye ya la Shekwoyi shewo ka nu? Yi duwolo n kala nu?

“Yi ɓa mi ya zhin nyaho-nyahoi,” ama nyaho-nyahoi nu to bmiya lo m. “Yi ɓa mi ya zhin nyaho-nyahoi,” ama nyaho-nyahoi nu to n bmiya lo m. “Yi ɓa mi ya zhin nyaho-nyahoi,” ama nyaho-nyahoi nu to n bmazhin yi lom.
Kwo to bmiya lo zaho zahoi, wa gna wohin ye wa zan wa gmada shin nwo gmanyi yi m. Pa ho zado ɓo nʼɓo yi nko bmiya lo n tu wo ɓo.
Fye ɓa mi fya gyi nyaho-nyahoi n na ʼbu-da kun n gnikwo ntna ɓo nya yi. Ntuge n ha nyaɓo, kpekni oɓo na ɓa dnaho ʼgbe cei nyi, ko ɓa zun ho bugba kni.
Ntuge ekni n nyaho-nyahoi ye nko dna ko, ko wun Dagayi nu.
Ndei shetan da wa yi ho nyagyigyi, oho bugba la ge ho ɓa lo, to, gyi nyaho-nyahoi nwa ɓeho cei n tna ɓo nyai, ntu bugba kni-zun ɓo.
Ama n zahoʼa gna ho ge, “Aku shan gba n nyagyi ye yi, to, to gyi nyagyi yi m,” ntu zayi ɓo nwa gnaho nyi, njesun ntu bugba knizun ɓo.
Zayi, bugba kni-zun nu nmi daɓo, to ge oho nya m. Kpekni ha nya ge, “Ntu kni ɓeyi nu zado bugba knizun kwa kma mi ɓo zhin n mi cei pma?”
Knihi nu ɓa zhin nyagyi miɓa sa Shekwoyi ami ma gyi ko na gmada yi, zaho wa ci ma ɓenya, shi ko nyi wo gye lo ge mi la bwa ba?
Ntucenu, nyaho-nyahoi n ho ɓa zhin, ko hoi gyi nu, ko hoi sin nu, zhin ko ntuge ha ga Shekwoyi mwamwa.
Fye to ze dalili bonyicenya n zaho-zahoi abam, ko a Yahudiyi Ko a Heleniyi, ko ekklesiya Shekwoyi nyam.

Oɓo nu mi zhin, Mi-i yi mihin ma zhin ɓo ko da aza vinya n ɓeho-ɓehoi zhin, toge mi-i vi ɓo nu nʼmi bugba ye ce yim, ko oɓo ko gna bmiya lo ntu mi ʼɓom, ama oɓo ko gna bmiya lo ntu na za ɓo, ntuge kpekni ɓa pwo.
To, fye vi ma pita bwi, ngye shi mi vi Yesu anya nyi.
Mi ci fye lo ntuge fye pa mi ɓo lo cici fyei zhin ɓoho-ɓohoi she ma wufye.
Ama mi cei pma fya kpe ge, Yesu nu zhin zanugbai doho-dohoi tukwo. Nyikwoza tukwo ce zanugbai nu; Shekwoyi nu zhin Yesu tukwo n kasun.
Ntuce nu zanugbai doho-dohoi nwa zhin aduwa ko waʼazi n tanjiyai kun n wo tukwo, to, wo ci Yesu nu wyegba.
Nyikwoza doho-dohoi kwa n wa zhin aduwa, ko wa zhin waʼazi gni nazaba to wa pui wo tukwo nya m, to, wo ci wo ɓa nu wyegba. Wo to shando lo n nyikwozai n wo la wo tukwo wun vinya n na pmi yim.
N nyikwoza ta pui wo tukwo nya m, to wola wo tukwoyi gbeya. Ngye ko zhin oɓo vinyikwo nya nu n nyikwoza ba wa kma wo tukwo ya, ko wa gbe ko ya, to, sai wa zhin wa ku ko wan nya.
Ko to bmiya lo zanugbai wa pui wo tukwo nyaho m, ntuge wo zhin Shekwoyi dogbei nu n wo latu yi ɓe. Ama nyikwoza zhin zanugbai latu nya nu.
Ntuge zanugbai kmisunyi to ɓei gmi n nyikwoza nun, ama aɓei gmi nyikwoza kmisunyi n zanugbai nu.
Njesun ato ɓo zhin zanugbai ntu nyikwoza ɓo nu m, ama aɓei zhin nyikwoza ntu zanugbai Bo nu.
Kwo bmiya lo nyikwoza zhin wa wu ge wo dnalo zanugbai sinta, njesun ge kwa da amalaika.
Ama pa ge dna n Dagayi shiri, nyikwoza n zanugbayi, ɓa ta mi n tna ajem.
Ntuge shi a ɓei gmi nyikwoza n zanugbai nyi, njesun lonu nyikwoza nu zhin wa ma zanugbai, ama anya vinya kun n Shekwoyi aba nu.
Fye mwi ko nfyehin tukwo fya gye, ko bmiya lo nyikwoza wa zhin aduwa gni naza ba n tna alufuta wan yi?
Kwo kunnu n kohin tukwo kwa wuyi ge, ko zhin oɓo vinyikwo nya nu n zanugbai aba, wa ya tukwo tu cim n tna wun yi.
Ama ko zhin nyikwoza mwa-mwa nu, n wo tukwo-yi mwakpa, ntuge a gawo ko lonu kwa ze wo nyapui nya nu.

Ama ngye zaho cei pma lo wa gni-aɓona da ce, to, enya miɓa da konu nyi; nge yi ta shan kunnu doho wulo gbo-om, sai dai ge nyikwoza ku wo tukwo wan alufuta esa nwo ɓa zhin waʼazi ko aduwa cei dna naza begye. A ikklisiya Shekwoyi anya vinya nkoi bwa shi lo lonu nu.
Ama enya mi ye mada n saiye nyi ko to zhin cici nu n fya ba m, ntuge ofye yezhin na duwa nyakun ta bma zhin lo m, sai koi wun-wun ya.
Oɓo kmisunyi, a gnami lo ge ajegna lo nfya tasin sanu fya yezhi cei. Ɓeye konyi, ma pwoko gaiciya ga.
Ama ko bmiya lo ajegna lo fya tasin, ntuge aza ɓa fi lo n gaiciya, a kpe ɓa ye pei-pei.
Esa nu fya ye-zhi n na ba gmanyi fya gyi, fye ta gyi Dagayi nyagyi num,
ama ofyehin nya. Ntu ge aku gna mige esa fya ɓe nyagyi cei, zaho-zahoi wo wo nyagyi ɓo nu wa ya safi wohin nce azaje-ya, har azaho ɓa tna nyagyi ɓai ci mikun, azahoi ce ɓai gyi ɓai sin n duwyi.

Fye to na puwai lo nfye ɓa gyi fyei sin? Ko fye gna ye lo fya ci Shekwoyi puwa wyegba, fyei dna aza vinyikwo n ɓa to cei lo nyi ma? Fye gye ge miɓa da ge na n ɓeye tukwoʼa? Mi ci fye nu? Ko fye-fye, mi ta ci fye lo m.
Ntuge n Dagayi aba nu n ma gwo wu-wu ye n mi kafye wu nyi. Nge dna sukwo nna ɓei kun Dagayi Yesu nyi, Wa la bredi,
Wa zhin Shekwoyi godiya, Wa sa ko ya, Wa Cige, “Omi nayi nu nyi, n na ga ntu fye ɓo. Fye zhin ko ntu Mi ɓopa ɓo.”
Njesun lo nu wa la kofi ai ku nyagyi gyi, wa cige, “Kofi ye, ko nu zhin Shekwoyi alkawali woi-woyi dna Maʼmi. Saho-sahoi nfye ɓa sin ko cei, fye zhin ko ntu mi ɓo pa ɓo.”
Ntuge saho-sahoi ya gyi bredi ye cei, yi sin n kofi ye, yi gna Dagayi efi nabari nu mi har Wa ɓe.
Ntuce nu, zaho-zahoi wa gyi Dagayi bredi ye, ko wa sin n wo kofi dna zokwo, kota gawo mwa-mwa m, wo zhin Dagayi nayi nu n Wa ʼmi yi laifi.
Ntuce nu, zaho-zahoi wo mwi wo-hin kpa wa kpe bredi ye gyi, woi sin n kofi ye njesun.
Ntuge ʼza wa gyi bredi yi, woi sin n kofi yi ntna wohin mwi yi, to woi pa Yesu nayi ɓo n kwa pma yin, to, wo gni Shekwoyi owa kpe wohin tukwo nu. Ntuge wo kpagye nu n Yesu fi ɓo yi.
Cenu zhin azaho n fye mi ɓa zhin anyasan-yi nu, a kala-gba-yi, har azahoi fi.
Ndei yi ɓa mwi yihin tukwo kpa, ata shan yi kni zun nʼwa yim.
Ama sa n Dagayi dayi ʼwa Woi ta yi, Wo zhin lonu n nabai to aɓei zun yi kni ɓedo na ʼnyi yi nun.
Ntucenu oma-zaje, sanu fya yezhi ntuge fya gyi Dagayi nyagyi, fye zhin fya ku pmi aje.
Ndei mikun gnu zaho lo, to, wo ku nyagyi pmagyi n wo puwa ntuge to wa lo Shekwoyi ʼwa esa fya yezhi ceyim. Aɓo ɓa celo, mʼɓei zhin ɓa zhi miyi la ɓe.
Nsaiye, omazaje, mi cei pma ma daɓo to na nyaga Zafun Gyigyi-yi nya ɓo. Mito cei pma lo fya fi nko wyegma m.
Fye kpelo ge, esa fye ɓei ye zhin a shetan-da nyi, fye ɓei zhin fyei vi ashan nu n ɓa ta kpe ɓedan, ɓai wu fye zokwo nukwoi.

Ama fye sun lo n na zai n ɓa yi ɓahin lo ge Shekwoyi Zafun nu wu ɓa ɓo nɓa da nyi. Fye ɓa kpe wuna ge ɓa zhin a Shekwoyi nya nu ko aza kata? Fye ɓa kpe ɓaye lainu. Zaho-zahoi n Shekwoyi Zafun kun-sun lo woi, wota mi wa cige, “Yesu zhin knitu yi nun.” Zahoi ta mi wa cige, “Yesu zhin Dagayi nu,” har koi kufi nwomi lonun, akpe ge Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi kunsun woi.
Anyaga lo gbo-gbo, ama Zafun gmanyi nu gaɓa.
Azokwo lo gbo-gbo, n na zhin bauta ama Dagayi gmanyi nu n na zhin Wo bauta.
Atnu-tnu lo gbo-gbo, ama Shekwoyi gmanyi nu lo tnu-tnu n naza mi vinya.
Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi zhin Wa wu Shekwoyi iko n zaho-zahoi mi ntu naza vinya a pma ɓo.
Zafun ga zaho ɓeda wyemwa nya (genyikpe), zaho kwa wa bwa nyaga ɓeyekpe, nya nu, du Zafun gmanyi nu ga ɓa.
Zafun gmanyi nu ga zaho gaiciya-ga zaho gaiciya-ga zaho kwa wa gawo iko wa ka anyasan gna.

Zafun ga zaho iko wa zhin aɓo wowoyi, zaho kwa wa bwa waʼazi zhin gba. Zaho wa bwa iko wa kpe ko a zafun nukwoi nu daɓo n naza gbe n ɓa yi ɓahin ge ɓa da Shekwoyi ɓeda nyi, ko kwa zafun Shekwoyi nya nu ku ɓeda n ɓa gbe. Zado jesun wa bwa iko ɓeda nya dna na nyitala gbo-gbo nʼwo to shin ɓa mwitu m zado kasun wa bwa iko anyitala bmapmi nya.
Ama Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi gmanyi nu zhin aɓoye vinya, Woi gna anyaga ye n naza ba shi Wo wyewyeyi cei pma.
Eyi anayi na gai lo mwa begye, ama n na ye agayi ɓedo vinya, ɓa zhin nayi gmanyi nu. Kristi wulo lonu nu.

Zaho-zahoi nʼyi mi wo zhin oga nu dna Kristi nayi. Azaho nʼyi mi a Yahudiyi nu, a zaho a Helleniyi, azaho zhin afyenu nu, a zaho kwa a loloiya nu. Ama Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi kuyi zhin batisma fi n Kristi nayi gmanyi, ai la Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi ho gayi n naba gmanyi.
E, ntuge nayi to bwasun nʼgai gmanyi nun, ama n na gai mwa begye.
N pita cige, “Shi konyi mi to zhin obwa nun, mi to dna lo n nayi mi m,” deye ta du kwa gmi koya n naga nayi nya m.
Ntnubua cige, “Mito zhin ewye num, mi bwa tnubua nu zhin, ntu cenu mi to dna lo n nayi mim.” Ashe deye ɓa zhin kwa gmiya n na ʼga nayi nya?
Ashe nayi vinya ɓo zhin ewye nu, atnubua ɓowo lo numa? Kwoi ɓo zhin tnubua yako ho nu vinya, a wo a bua-sin wuna?
Ama shi ko nyi, Shekwoyi ɓei fi a ga doho-dohoi n ɓa aba shi wo ye cei.
Ogye nayi wuwuna nu, Kwoi ɓei ngai bwasun lo gmanyi nu a?
To, ama wo ku aga zhin mwa begye, ama nayi gmanyi nu.
Ewye ta ci obwa ge, “Mi to ha pmai lom,” Tukwo ta ci apita ge, “Mi to fya pmai lom.”
Ɓehin-hin, aga nʼyi ci ɓa wyegba ntu ɓa kala gbaɓo, ɓa gna sun napmai mwa.
Ado yi gye ge ɓa to zhin nyaho nu m, oɓanu n yi wan kna du, ado kwa nɓa zhin a vinyikwo nya, ya ku ɓa so naza wyeba,
atna vinyikwo nya kwo n ɓa wu bmi pei-pei, yi to damu n ɓa knawan ɓeyim. Ama Shekwoyi la nayi ye ɓedo n ʼgbai n nabai ge aga n ɓa to kunce lo ɓa bwa aknawan daidai.
Kwo nu ɓe n bwa doloyi n naga nayi nya, ɓai wanje akna shi ega doho-dohoi wan kohin akna nyi.
N nyasan san oga gmanyi, aga je vinya ɓa gye azhin n gnisun kwoi. N ʼga gmanyi a bwa latu, aje ɓa ce nyi, ɓa dagma n kunsun kwoi.
Ofye vinya fye zhin Kristi nayi nu, zaho-zahoi zhin oga nu nko mi.

Dna ikklisiya kwa, Shekwoyi ku aza zhin fi nko mi, kmisunyi a Nabari tnutnu loyi, bayi a anabi-a waʼazi zhinyi, tahi n nyawuyi; sai ɓewowo zhin-yi, aza kagnayi, aza bmazhin-yi; aza n ɓa ɓa mi ɓa gyabye nazai ɓa zhin tnutnu nʼgbei lodo, n nazai n ɓa da anyitala gbo-gbo.
Zaho-zahoi zhin Nabari tnu-tnu loyi nu? Nge awo. Zahozahoi zhin waʼazi zhin-yi nu? Awo. A zhin anyawuyi nu vinya? Zaho-zahoi n ikoi lo wa zhin aɓo wowoyi?
Ko wa ka anyasan gna? Ko wa da abye gbo-gbo to woi tuɓa mwi n? Ko zaho-zahoi nu ɓa mi wa wo ʼza woi daɓo dna nyitala-woyi, har wa go ko gna ʼza to woi shin ko won?
Awo, ama fye yi fyehin fya zan nyaga Zafun nya duduyi nu shin. Ama dei, miɓa wu fye zokwo nko gnaɓa bmiya lo vinya!
Kwo mi-i mi, ma daɓo n nabyei gbo-gbo har n na malaika nya yi ɓe, ama mi-i to n yeyei lom, mi la ze ngye sugu wyiɓeyi, ko eshan bwiciyi kawai.

Ko mi-i iko yi ngye anabi mi-i kpe ɓeye nko ye ɓeɓelo kwa zhin, ko mi-i n yekpe anyi nyai vinya har mi-i kmi asiri anya-ya; ko mi-i n gaiciya ga yako yi har ma mi ma daɓo n ʼpe yi kwa shanba, ama ndei mito n yeyei lom, mi to zhin nyaho num.
Ko mi-i ku mi nyabwa yaga vinya agna awyekoyi, har ma ga mi nayi ntuge a gyi ko ʼna ɓedo, ama mi-i to n yeyei lom, ko la ze ɓo gbolo.
Yeye n bugba-bwa yi, kwoi na tnazhin-yi mwa. Yeye ta wo ʼshem, ko ta mwi kwohin ʼzayi, ko kwa la kwohin tum.
Yeye ta zhin ɓo ntna hankali m ko ta zan kwohin tukwo nya shin m; ko ta pye n minagyi gyi yim.
Yeye ta wo agmada ntu ɓenukoyi ɓom, ama ko zhin kwa nya agmada ntu gaiciya ɓo.
Nʼho ye za, ho ɓa viwo ɓeye komi nko nako yi; ho ɓa gawo gaiciya n naɓo vinya; oha wyetu lo nʼwo; hoi ɓa bwa atna n ʼwoi n ɓeho-ɓeho yi.
Yeye ta shan zon. Anabi ɓeda ɓa duya; ɓeda n na nyitalai gbo-gbo du ɓa ɓa diya; Ko ɓeyekpe nu, ko ɓa duya.
Ntuge nʼsaiye, yi kpeye lo kpe nʼshe-she nu, du na nyaga ɓeyekpe yi n na ɓeda kpeda nya yi, ɓa to shince lo n kni yim.
Ama shi aɓei ku yi ze nunuyi anya ga atna nuyi ye, ɓa ɓa duya.
Esanu mʼɓei zhin oɓi nyi, omi ɓeda, oma ɓenubozhin yi, nʼma ɓezhin-zhin yi vinya ɓa ɓei zhin ɓinai nya nu. Ama nsaiye mila zhin zadnagmai, ntuce nu mi ku ɓinai aɓo ya.

Nlonu, nya yi gyelo nʼsaiye, yi kpawyega tu n Shekwoyi tukwo nyi, ko wulo duru-duru ngye shi oza zhin wa gye wohin duru n maganyi cegyeda nyi; ama n wyihoi yi ɓa gye Wo pei-pei shi Wo nyi dna Wo nunu-ntuge Wo ɓei ce yawye yihin yi ce Wawye. Oɓo mi kpeye lo nsaiye, mi kpeyelo kpe nʼsheshe nu, ama n wyihoi, mʼɓei kpeye n shince nʼkni yi, n nunuyi njesun ngye shi Shekwoyi kpe miye lo n nunuyi nyi.
Nsaiye dei aɓo ngnu-ata nu mizhi lo-oɓa nuzhin; gaiciyaga, awyetu, n yeye yi; nya ko dulo vinya, ko nu zhin yeye.
Ntucenu, fye la bugba shi yeye nu; ama dudu lonu fye ɓa ntuge fya bwa anyagaga Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi nya tun ɓa ga Shekwoyi ɓeda kpeda ba.
Oza wo daɓo n nabyei gbo-gbo, wo ta daɓo n azai nu, ama n Shekwoyi yi. Ntuge zaho-zahoi ta wo nya wo dam ko da shike wo da aɓo nu nɓa bwi zhi dna n Zafun iko.
Ama oza wo gwo Shekwoyi ɓeda gna aza, wo bma ɓa zhin nu ɓa mwa dna n Dagayi, woi mi ɓa zhi n natna-zhin-yi ɓe.
Oza wo daɓo n nabyei gbo-gbo, wo mi wohin nu gni nʼwo gmanyi yi, ama oza wo go Shekwoyi ɓeda gna aza, wo mi ikklisiya nu gni vinya.

Miɓa ye ntuge ofye vinya fya daɓo na nyitalai gbo-gbo. Ama mi gna ye lo ofye vinya fya bwa nyaga n fye ɓa da Shekwoyi ɓeda. Ntuge oza wo da Shekwoyi ɓeda, wo gnasun napma yi nduʼza wo daɓo na nyitalai gbo-gbo. Akpe wa pmi wo ɓeda bma ga aza ʼn navun aɓo wa da nyi, ntuge kwa mi ikklisiya gni vinya.

Oma-zaje, ndei ma ɓe fyaba mi-i daɓo na nyitalai gbo-gbo nfye ta wo ɓa lon, kni-apmai nu nfye ɓa bwa? Ama nʼma gna fye pei-pei enya Shekwoyi la kpanyaya wu mi, ma gna fye ɓo mi kpeye lo, n ɓeyi nko ɓelo kwa zhin, n gaiciya Shekwoyi ɓeda nya yi-oɓo nu fye yelo, oɓo nu ko ɓa bma fye zhin.

Ko anyikonya nɓa to wyewyei yin–ngye mwayi ko gojegye-ɓa zhin dogbe nu ge ko kamata lo a daɓo n seseiya, a fwa ɓeda na nyitalai gbo-gbo. Ntuge nna bye mwayi, ko a san gojegye to a ze ɓa bwam, ɓa cibwi gbo-o, nyikado ɓa kpe ɓeye n ɓa da?
Njesun ndei oza wo bye okun mwayi n wo to byeko dai-dai m, nyikado ɓa kpe ge a ye a lo kun nu wa zhin shiriʼa?
To-ko wu lonu, aza ɓa kpe nya ho da n wuna ndei ho to da n byei n nazaje ɓa wo ma? Oho ɓeda ɓa zo fi nʼse.
Abye lo gbo-gbo n nanyimi, ama doho-dohoi to celo ntna kwa wyegam.
Ama n mi to wo nyitala n nada nyim, oza nwo dako nyi, wo ɓa ze ngye zhiɓeyi ebye do nya mʼma ba, omi ce ma ze zhiɓei ebyedo n wa ba.
Shikwonyi fye ye lo fya bwa nyaga zafun nya, to, sai fye ye fya bwa ado nfye ɓa zhin apma cei ntu ikklisiya migni ɓo.
Ntuce nu oza wo daɓo n nabyei gbo-gbo, ko bmiya wa zhin aduwa ntuge wa bwa iko bmapmi nya.
Ntuge n ma zhin aduwa n nyitala doyi, mʼmi ta kpe kwa wyegan, to, omi zafun nu bwa aduwa zhin, ama omi bugba ɓemwi nya to na pmai lo dna na duwa yi mim.

To, miɓa zhin wuna na? E, miɓa zhin aduwa n nyitala doyi, mii ɓa jezhin n nyitala yi n zaho-zahoi ɓa wo mi cei. Miɓa ko anyi n nyitala doyi, mi-i ɓa jeko n nyitalai n zahozahoi ɓa womi, miɓa kpe mihin ce she mi la Shekwoyi tu lo n wu.

Esanu ho zhin Shekwoyi godiya dna zafun kawai, hoi da nyitala woyi ho, aza ɓa gnifi hoi n nyakun nyi, ɓa ɓa wo wuna ɓa gni Shekwoyi godiya zhin nʼho ya? Ɓa ɓa kpe cige “Amin,” wuna to ɓai wo ɓo ho da ma?
Kwo oho godiya zhin yi bmiya n Shekwoyi aba, ko to mi azaje zhi n ɓa kunsun lo hoi n bugbam.
Ma gode n Shekwoyi yi ntuge mi daɓo na nyitala woyi yi ndu zaho-zahoi nʼfye mi.
Ama dna na duwa nyakun, mi gnaye lo ma da aɓeda ngun atnu, n naza ɓa wo mi nyawu ɓa bwa bmazhin, aiya gna ge mi da aɓeda dubu gun-awo dna nyitala woyi.
Omazaje, fye to ku wu ngye aɓi dna fye aɓenubozhinm, fye ku ze aɓi dna ɓenukwoi zhin mi, ama fye ku ze azayakwo dna nfya ɓe nubozhin mi.
Acei kafi lo n Littafi ge, “Miɓa daɓo nazaye yi n nabyei gbo-gbo, nna zhiɓeyi nyitalai jesun, ama dudu lonu, ɓata wo mi ɓedam,” Shekwoyi nu na gna lonu.
Ntucenu nyaga aɓeda nya na nyitalai gbo-gbo ko zhin tuze nu na tnaviyi aba toge a Yesu viyi m, Ama nyaga Shekwoyi ɓeda waʼazi nya ko zhin a Yesu viyi nya nu toge atna viyim.
To, ko n fya ye fi na duwa nyakun, ofye vinya fya ya ɓeda na nyitalai gbo-gbo, tna ɓeyekpei ho ko tna viyi ho wa loɓe aduwa nyakun, wo ta gna nyace nu gnu fyem?
Ama n fya zhin Shekwoyi ɓeda waʼazi efye vinya, esanu zaho ngye tnaviyi ho, ko tna-ɓeyekpei ho ɓa loɓe aduwa nyakun, waʼazi yi ɓa zun wo kni tu nwa laifi tukwo, kwa dawo bugba ʼwa njesun.
Owa ɓenubozhin ɓa kun zhi n bmi, har wo ɓa ce ako-ko wa ga Shekwoyi mwa-mwa woi cige, “Ɓehin-hin, Shekwoyi dnalo ya n fye atasin.”

To, emazaje, oɓo nyi mi gna fye; esanu fya yezhi na ba gmanyi, zaho ɓa ko-anyi, zaho ɓa wuʼnya, zaho wa da ɓo woyi n Shekwoyi a kpeya wuwo; zaho kwa, wa daɓo n nyitala woyi yi, zaho kwa wa pmi nyitala woyi ɓeda bma. Azhin a pma n ɓai vinya ntu ekklesiya migni ɓo.
Aza to du ngun aba ko ata yam n ɓa ɓa daɓo n nyitala woyi yim, ɓai ɓa bwada ɓai caba gaje nu; tile nu kwa a gye za gniɓo nwo ɓa pmi ɓeda bma.
Ama n zaho to gnilo n wo ɓa mi wa pmi ɓeda bmam, to zaho-zahoi to daɓo n nyitala woyi yi dna n begye m, sai dai wa da fi nwo mi san-san ga wohin tukwo n Shekwoyi aba yi njesun.
Aza ngun aba ko ngun ata n ɓa Shekwoyi ɓedai shi lo to sai ɓa da gmanyi-gmanyi, aza ɓa ce nyi kwa, Ba mwi nya nɓa da nyi.
Ama ngye zaho dnalo na duwa nyakun yi Shekwoyi ɓeda ɓe dawo dnaɓo, to oza kmisunyi nwo ɓo daɓo nyi, wa a ce pi n kasun.
Ofye vinya nfye nyaga yi pyai lo, fye ɓa mi fya da Shekwoyi ɓeda fye caba ga je, n nabai aza vinya ɓa bwa bmazhin n migni yi jesun.
Oza nwo nyaga Shekwoyi ɓeda da nyayi, wo ɓa mi wa wan wohin tukwo ko wa pmi owo ʼsa nwo ɓa daɓo ce yi.
Ntuge Shekwoyi to yi yi ntu naɓo ajegmi ɓo nu m, ama n bugbafu ɓo nu, ngye shi ko nyi n na ikklisiya aza Gyi-gyi-yi nya vinya.
Anyikwo ɓa ku ce pi fi na duwa nyakun. Ato ye ge ɓa daɓom, shi ko nyi ɓa fi n na nugbai sinta nu shi Littafi Gyi-gyi-yi ku da.
Ndei ɓa ɓenyahoi lo, sai ɓa nya ɓa ʼɓa n napi, ntuge ko zhin vinyiko ɓo nu nyikwoza wa daɓo dna na duwa nyakun.
Fye to ye cen? Fye gye ge Shekwoyi ɓeda yekpe kwa pa nfya ba nu, ko ko zozhi nfya ba na? Fye ku bwi aba.
Ndai zaho gyelo ge wo zhin Shekwoyi tnu-tnuyi nu, ko kwa ge wo n Zafun nyagai lo, to sai wo kpe ge ɓeda ye nmi kaga fye nyi ko zhin Shekwoyi gbetu nu.
Ama oza n woto shi ɓeda ye bwam, fye fawo dna nwo tnayekpe.
Ntucenu omazaje fye la bugba gna shi fya bwa nyaga Shekwoyi ɓeda da nya nu, ama fye to gna ɓeda n na nyitalai gbo-gbo zhin ɓenukoi num.
Ama fye zhin nyaho-nyahoi tu zokwo n bmiya bmiyai.
Nsaiye dei mi cei pma ma cefye ɓepa Nabari Manayi nya n mi ɓei zhin fye kwo waʼazi nyi, fya gwo ko, ofye gaiciya-gai mitu n konu nyi.
Nabari Manai ye nu ɓa gni fye, fyei ya gyi abye nko bwashi yi kam-kam, sai dai ngye fye to ɓo shin gaiciya manai nu ga n kmisunyim.
Nʼɓo ku gna fye pei-pei, tunyi n kmisunyi, ngye she mi ɓei gwo kwo nge Yesu ɓo lafi ntu yi alaifi ɓo, she littafi ceida
Aɓo lawo bi, ama dna nyipyei tahi wa laka n vingwo shi a cei kafi n Littafi nwo tukwo.
Wa wu wohin tukwo n Bitrus aba, n na vun nwa bara awo-cei-aba aba.
Wa pmi Wa wu wohin tukwo nwa viyi aba aza n du tagyi gnu-atnu (500) ya n sagmanyi yi, n mwa begye nɓami ye wyewyeyi lo, ama azaho ku wangye n ɓami.
Nsayi wa wu wohin n Yakubu aba, n navun deye nwo atnu-tnuyi aba vinya.
Nnavun kmasun vinya, Wa wu wohin tukwo n ma ba, sai ho gna oza n na mawo esai ye kwa duya.
Ntuge minu zhin oza gbagbayi dna na bara vinya, mii to kunce lo ayi mi ge owo baram, ntuge maku Shekwoyi ikklisiya dna na zhin gye n mwa.

Ama dna Shekwoyi alheri, mi la ze nya miɓa ze, alheri kuwa nwo ɓei gami nyi ko to ze gboloyim. Mi ku tnu-tnu zhin n mwa n du atnu-tnuyi aje vinya, kwo shi kwo nyi emi ɓo zhin nu tom, ama Shekwoyi alheri nu ɓei lo tnu-tnu dna mi mi.
To, kwo koi gmi n maba nu, kwo koi gmi n ɓa ba nu, waʼazi Nabari nya nu n ya zhin fye, fya ga ko gaiciya lonu.
Tunda yi zhin waʼazi lo ge Yesu ɓo la laka n vingwo, knihin nu zhin azaho nfye mi ɓai cige azafi ta kukala ma?
Ndei ɓedaye zhin gaiciya nu, to ko wu nu ge Yesu to laka n vingwom.
Ndei Yesu to ɓei lakalam to, eyi waʼazi zhin gbeloyinu, efye gaiciya ga ce ko zhin gbeloyi nu.
Ai eyi a waʼazi zhin-yi ku ze a zakata Shekwoyi anya, ntuge yi ku da ge Shekwoyi ɓola Yesu lakala n vingwo to woi gowo kalalalam, ndei ɓeda ye zhin gaiciya nu ge azafi ta kukalam.
Ai ngye ato ɓei ku azafi kalan, to agye Yesu to ɓei lakala nu m.
Ngye Yesu to ɓo laka lam, to ofye gaiciyaga la ze gbeloyi, har saiye fye ye zhin aza bwi-bwiyi nu fi nfya laifi mi.
Kwa wu nu ge azafi n ɓa ɓei zhin ɓai vi Yesu nyi, ɓa to n pwo-pwoi lo cen.
Ndei eya wyetu n Yesu bwasun lo n nanyi ye nu kawai, to yi zhin anya sunsun nya nu n mwa n naza ba n nanyi ye.
Ama gaiciya nu ge Yesu la lakala n ʼfi. Deye kwa wu nu ge wola ze kmisunyi n naza mi nɓa ɓa kukala n ʼfi nyi.
Ngye shi efi ɓei ɓe kwa vi zaknayi zokwo, n kasun lonu kalaku na vingwo ɓa bwa n zaknayi zokwo nu vi (wato Adamu n Yesu yi.)
Zaho-zahoi fi ntuge yi pa bye n Adamu nu vinya. Owo laifi ko vi zaho-zahoi. Ama zaho-zahoi nwa yeto Yesu, wo ɓa je kalala
Ama zaho-zahoi n wo sayi, Yesu nu ɓo ya kalala, she Yesu ɓei jezeɓe n sayi aza vinya nɓa vi wo ɓa ɓei je wyewyei bwa.
Nsayi esa kmaknayi ɓa ɓe, esa nu Yesu ɓei ga ebe n Dada Shekwoyi akun, woi ku nasara zo zhin tu na nuwunyi doho-dohoi pya.
Ntuge ko zhin tile nu Yesu gyi be, sai wo ku wa nuwunyi vinya zofi n wa pita sinta.
Nuwunyi kmaknayi nwo ɓei du ko ɓoya ko nu zhin efi.
Ntuge littafiʼa cige, “Shekwoyi ku anya fi vinya n wa pita sinta.” Yi kpe lo nu ge Shekwoyi to dna lo n kun m, ntuge Owo nu na fi anya vinya n Yesu apita sinta.
Ama esanu anya vinya ɓei kufi n Yesu ʼbe sinta, Owo n wohin tukwo Shekwoyi Nugun, wo ɓei dna wohin n Shekwoyi ye gyi ʼbe tu nanya vinya tukwo.
To, azayi na zhin ɓa batisma tu na zafi ɓo nyi ma? Ɓa cei pma ɓa bwa kninya? Ndei ko zhin gaiciya nu, shi ɓa da nyi, nge azafi ta kukalam, to knihi nu zhin ai zhin ɓa batisma ntu na zafi ɓoʼa?
Eyi nʼyihin ce, knihi nu ɓa zhin ya la ɓa yi zhin azhin n ʼYihin mafi lonu ci-ci a?
Oma-zaje, mi zhin ma gundo n ʼfiyi fyegyi-fyegyi. Mi daɓoye ntuge mi n ʼgbegyi yi lo n fye tukwo dna Yesu Kristi.

Kni-apmai nu lo dna n gusun na nyawannyawan yi shi anugbai zhin dna n Afisusu mi–nge gye za bwaye wa gmiye dna naʼnyi ye na? Ama ngye kalaku tolo n ʼfin, to, “Yi wu ya gyi yi sin, efyeagyi yi fi,” shi aza da.
Fye to ku ze aza gbolo m, “Anugundo nukwoi zhin ɓa wun aza manayi ya.”
Fye lo fyehin hankali, fya zhin ɓefyece, fya fa laifi. Mi da deye fya wo vinyiko nu, ntuge azaho nfye mi ta kpe Shekwoyi ye lom.
Zaho ɓa nyage, aza-fi ɓa mi ɓa bwa wye-wyei njesun wuna? Ɓa jezeɓe n kni nayi pya ya?
Oza gbolo, esanu ho bye nyabye dna nkni, woi-woyi ta gye bmim, sai kokoi la fi kpa.
Nya ho bye nyi kuwa ho ta pma nayi nu bye n ko zhin kwa pa nyim, sai nyabye kawai nu n ho yadna nʼkni, ko ewyi byegye, ko nyabye ho pya nu.
Shekwoyi zhin wa ga nyabye yi nayi shi wo cei pma, wo zhin wa ga nya bye doho-dohoi nayi gbo n nyabye do yi.
Anyawye-wyeyi nayi to wu gmanyi num. Azanyikwoci n nayi gmanyi anya-fanya n ɓanya yi, awyisala n ɓanya yi kasun.
Anayi eshe nyalo, anayi anyi nya lo jesun, bmiya-bmiya anayi eshe nya wu gbo n bmiya-bmiya anayi anyi nya yi.
Nyipyei nko nabmiya yi lo, epya ce nko nyayi wu gbo, akpasu nɓa nyai lo kasun; ko dna na akpasu mi, ɓa n nabmiyai du aje.
Kwo ɓei wu layi nu esa na zafi ɓei kuka n cei nyi, nayi na bi nyi, ko zhin boboi nu, she ko ɓei laka, efi ta shan ko gye aigna ko bom.
A bi ko dna n wyegbaci ntna kala jesun, ese ko ɓei lakala, ko ɓei laka dna latu nu n kalai jesun.
Esa na bi ko cei, ko zhin nayi abu nu. Esanu ko ɓei laka, ko ɓei laka dna n nayi zafun nya nu. Ngye shi nayi abu nya lo nyi tile nu abwa nayi zafun nya.
Ntuge Litafi ku da ge, oza kmisunyi Adamu ɓo ze wye-wyeyi da; ama Adamu kmaknayi wo nu ga wye-wyeyi zafun nya.
Zafun nya nu to ɓe na bye m, ama nayi nya nnavun nu zafun nya kma ɓe.
Adamu kmisunyi azhin wo nʼkni nu, butukun nya, ama Adamu bayi wo gmi nʼshe nu.
Zanyikoci doho-dohoi n nayi wu ngye Adamu nya n na zhin ko nʼkni butukun nya, ama oza n wa ze Kristi nya, wa bwa wo nayi pya nayi nko gmi nʼshe.
Ngye shi yi wu ngye oza na ɓei zhin wo nʼkni nyi nlo nu yi ɓei wu ngye oza n wo gmi n ʼshe nyi.
Oɓo mi gna fye, emazaje, nayi nami yi ko ta gye Shekwoyi bemi wyem. Eyi anayi aboboyi ye nu to zhin a nyalo-nyalo nyam.
Fye wo asiri ye, eyi vinya nu ta fim, ama aɓei shan yi do vinya.

Kwo ɓei wu para nu nʼwye kpata yi, ai ku mwayi kmaknayi bye. N mwayi ho byebyeyi, a Yesu viyi n ɓa kufi, ɓa ɓei kukala n na nayi shandoshan-shan yi n ɓa ta shan fim. Eyi ce nʼyi ɓei cezhi n wye-wyeyi nyi, aɓei shan yi anayi do n sagmanyi yi.
Ntuge eyi anayi nʼyi cei lo n saiye nyi, ɓa zhin afifiyi nu. Tile nu ɓa bwa doshan, nʼnayi eshe nya yi, nko ta shan fim.
She ko ɓei ku zhin lonu, dna nʼsayi nu n Littafi ɓeda ɓei nu nkwa cige, “Aku nasara gyi tu nʼfi tukwo.”
O efi, oho nasara gyi gni na? Efi, oho iko wu-wu nya gni na?
Efi bwa ko iko ʼzawu nya n laifi nu, laifi kwa ko bwa iko n owa nu.
Ama yi zhin Shekwoyi godiya n wo gayi nasara dna Yesu Kristi nyi.
Ntucenu, emazaje yeyeyi, fye ku gni mizhi dai-dai. Fye gyi abye n Shekwoyi tnu-tnu yi nʼwyei nyice, Shikonyi fye kpelo ge efye tnu-tnu dna Dagayi ta ze gboloyim.
Miɓa daɓo n saiye ntu agyi wye ɓo n fye ɓa yezhi fya ga Shekwoyi aza n ɓa fi n Yahudiya nyi. Tile nu fya zhin nya ma gna a ikklisiya Galatiya nya ge ɓa zhin nyi.
N Ladiwyi doho-dohoi yi, zaho-zahoi ɓa kni agyiwye shi wa bwa n sun, wa so ɓa zhi ntuge esa ma ɓe cei, fye ta shan zhi ge fye ye agyiwye ho zhi m.
Esa ma ɓe cei, mʼɓei tnu nazayi n fye ye cei, miye la wasika ma ɓa ɓa lo nfye nyaga yi n Urushelima.
Ndei ma gye ko bmiya lo ma lo ce to, sai ɓa gnilo n miyi.
Mʼɓei ɓe fya ba mi-i la zhi Makidoniya, ntuge mi ye ma vi Makidoniya bwa nu.
Mi gye lo ngye nʼɓei la mwasa fyewyi nfyaba, kpekni har ma zhin vinyiko vinya, ofye nu ɓei ka mi bma zhin har mi ye lo aba nʼɓei kalo.
Mi to cei pma lo ma gye fye mi-i duduyam, ama mi na wyetu yi lo ma sunsa fyewyi nfyaba, n Shekwoyi wa ye.
Ama mi ɓa dnaya n Afisus kpa har Pentikos sa.
Abokunmi guguyi yalo ya n mwa pata n maba ntu tnutnu ɓo, ama anuwunyi lo ce n mwa begye.
Ndei Timatiwus wa ɓe fye aba, to, sai fya gwo wo abwa-baba ntuge wo zhin tnu-tnu ga Shekwoyi nu shi mi gyi fye wye, omazaje,
fye zhin wyegbam, ama fye bma wo zhin ntuge wa gyi abye nwo zanyi har wa ɓe maba n bugbafuyi, ntuge mi shi wo ɓeɓe awye lo ɓedo nazaje yi.
To, ntu eyi zado ɓo ngye Apolos, ma ku wye gyi wo nmwa n nabai waɓe fyaba ngnisun nazaje yi, ama ko to lo wo do wa ɓe n saiye m. Ama esa wa bwa esa cei, wo ɓa ɓe.
Fye ku zhi gu, fye ku mizhi n gaiciya ga mi, fye ku edna ya, fye ku kala dna.
Fye zhin ɓoho-ɓohoi vinya dna ye-ye mi.
Fye kpelo ge Istifanus n wo puwa yi, ɓanu ɓei kmi Yesu vi nabye n Akaya, ɓai pmi ɓaku ɓahin tukwo ga ntu Shekwoyi aza bmazhin ɓo, mi gyi fye wye, mi azaje,
fye zhin ɓo nɓa gna fye ge fye zhin, fya vi azaje ɓo nɓa zhin tnu-tnu ngye ɓa.
Adamilo n mwa ntuge, Sitifanas, Fartinatus ɓedo n Akaikus ɓaku ɓe ma ba, ɓaku tnu-tnu zhin n fye ɓei ɓa zhin nyi.
Ɓala awyeko gyimi ɓai gami agmada she ɓa ɓei zhin fye nyi.
A ikklisiya vinya n Asiya kni ɓa safya milo. Akila n Biskila yi, ɓedo n ikklisiya yi n ko yezhi n ɓa puwa nyi, ɓa safya mi lo n mwa dna Dagayi.
Azaje vinya ɓa safye amilo. Fye ɓi azaje gna vinya n bwadodna gyi-gyi yi.
Mika deye n ma bwa yi nu. Omi, Bulus, mi ɓi fye gna lo.
Zaho-zahoi wo to ya Dagayi m, eknil tu lo n wo. Eyi Dagayi, ɓe.
Alheri Dagayi Yesu nya ko sase kunsun fye yi.
Omi ye-ye ko kun-sun nfyei vinya dna Yesu Kristi. Amin.
Wasika ye gmi n mi aba nu Bulus, oza kni-kniyi Shekwoyi nya, wa ze Yesu Kristi tnu-tnuyi, ɓedo n Timatawus yi eyi zado, kwoi lo a Yesu-viyi aba nɓa fi n Korinti nyi n Akaya yi vinya.
Shekwoyi eyi Dada n Yesu Kristi eyi Dagayi, wo tu zaho-zahoyi nfye anabarka, wa ga fye bugba fu njesun.
Yi zhin Shekwoyi godiya, owo nu n wo zhin eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi Dada nyi. Ntu ge bmazhin vinya gmi nwo aba nu.

Owo nu bma yi zhin woi fu yi bugba dna eyi wahala vinya, nabai n yi ɓa mi ce, ya bma aza zhin nɓa fi lo n wahala gbo-gbo nyi. Esa n ya wuɓa wahala pya n ya sin, njesun ngye shi ya kun zhi nkwo, n Shekwoyi akala yi.
Shi yi sin wahala ngnisun n Yesu yi dna nwo a wahala nyi, elonu yi ɓa bwa owo bmazhin ɓedo n bugba fu yi.
Ndei ya sin wahala, yi sin ntu fye bmazhin ɓo nu, nfye gni-gniyi, ndei yi n bmazhin lo fyehin fye cei lo, nkwo nu ɓa bma fye zhin, fya bwa hankuli n wahala yi n yihin ɓo sin nyi.
Ntuce nu eyi awyetu n fye, kwo ta sha-sha m. Yi kpelo ge shi fye sin wahala lo ngnisun n yi nyi, fye zhin fya bwa eyi atnazhin hi pya lo ce.
Omi-azaje mi cei pma ma pa fye n wahalai ya sin dna Asiya nyi. Wahala ɓei la yi mwa ɓo sosai, har to yi kpe ge yi ɓa pwom.
Yi ɓei gye ge yi ku pma aza fi-fiyi ze nu. Ama deye ɓei zhin ntuge to ya kpema eyihin tukwom, ama n Shekwoyi, n wo ku azafi kala nyi.
Dna efi wahala yi pya wa gni yi woi ɓo gniyi nabye. Yi na wyetu yi lo nge wo ɓa gyi abye wa gni yi.
Shi fye bma yi zhin n aduwa yi nyi. Har kwa ze ge aduwa nfye zhin laɓa ntu yi ɓo nyi, ɓa gyi nasara, Shekwoyi wa tuyi anabarka, har aza mwa kwa ɓa zhin wo godiya.

Eyi bugba bui-bui nyi, har eyi ɓemwi-i wu yi ge, eyi zan-zan dna nna anyi ye, tun ba ga eyi aɓozhinzhin nfyei, ɓa ku ze n Gyi-gyi-yi, n gaiciya yi, n Shekwoyi aba. Ya zhin lo nu, to ge dna n anyi ɓeyekpe nu m, ama alheri Shekwoyi nya nu.
Yi ka fye enya nu nfye ɓa ba fye bwa awyega njesun. Omi wyetu nu nge fya bwa kwo awyega vinya.
Nya fye kpeye n saiye nyi ko to nu-nuyi lo m. Ama, Esa Yesu ɓei ɓe n cei, fye ɓei kpe ɓeho-ɓehoyi ye vinya, fye ɓei gyigbe n yi-i ngye shi yihin ɓei gyigbe n fyei.
Mi ɓei kpe deye tunyi sapa, cenu na zhin ma ye ntuge, ma je fya ba ɓe, n nabai fye bwa anabarka zunɓa.
Gama mi ɓei ce pma ma ɓe fya ba, esa n mi ɓei lo Makidoniya nyi, njesun esa yi nma jeze ɓe, n nabai ma bwa bmazhin nfye har n kwo ba lo mi-i n Yahudiyaʼkni.
Ama esa mi zhin shiri deye pya ma, mi zhin ma vi omi ɓeye nu? Mi zhin ma mwi anya dai-dai? Har ma cige, E, ma jeci ge aʼa nsa gmanyi?
Shekwoyi kpelo ge mi to ɓo zhin fye alkawali, Eh nya nu ɓedo n aʼa yi m.

Ntuge Yesu Kristi Shekwoyi nugun n Sila ɓei zhin fye waʼazi n wo tukwo nyi. Har Timatawus ɓedo nmi yi ya kuje fye gna nyi, wo to zhin oza nu nwo ci ge, Eh, woi je ci ge aʼa m. Ama wo zhin wa ci ge Eh nu, deye kwa, ko gmi n Shekwoyi aba nu.
Gama owo nu zhin wa nu Shekwoyi alkawali vinya, cenu zhin yi ci ge, Amin dna Yesu, yi ci lonu dna Shekwoyi mwa-mwa nu.
Shekwoyi nu mi yi awye-wyeyi zhi, ɓedo n fye nya yi dna Yesu. Shekwoyi nu la yi kni zhi.
Woi la yi tu ze nge yi zhin owo nya nu. Woi la Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi gayi kwa wu ge lalle wo ɓa zhin nyaho ntu yi ɓo na bye.
Shekwoyi nu zhin omi saida da. Wo kpemi bugba lo, mi ɓei ye ntuge fya pwo nu, cenu ɓei zhin to ma ye ma ɓe Korinti m.
Yi ta tu fye dole nu ge fye vi nya yi da nyi m, gama fye gni-agni lo so-sai dna gaiciya, yi zhin tnu-tnu nfyei ntuge fya dagma.
Ntuce nu ma cige mi ta ɓe fya ba njesun ntu ge ma zhin fye fya wun bugba m.
Gama n ma zhin fye fya wun bugba, nyika nu ɓa gami agmada? Sai of ye n mi la fye wun bugba nyi.
Cenu ɓei zhin ma ka fye wasika hi, mi to ɓei cei pma ma ɓe fye aba fya zhimi ma wun bugba m. Gashi kwa ofye nu na gmadai lo.
Mi ɓei ka fye n bugba wun yi n gaiciyai har n bwi ci yi, ntuge to ma zhin fya wun bugbam, ama ma wu fye fya kpe shi mi ye fye lo vinya.
Ndei zaho la bugba wun zaho nfye, wo to zhin minum, wa zhin fye nu, ko kwa zaho nfye tun da shike mi to cei pma ma ga zaho-zahoi wahalam.
Kwo la kun ce wa bwa tata ye pya, nfye ku zhinwo nyi.
Ama sai fya zhin wo gafara, fya cewo bwa njesun, n nabai to wa godiya n bugba wun yi, har fya gye woi fa Yesu vi ɓom.
Mi gyi fye wye nu, fye zhin wo wa kpe ge fye yewo lo.
Cenu ɓei zhin ma ka fye wasikahi mi ɓei ce pma ma kpe shi fya gyi nasara n wu, njesun ko fye zhi lo n shiri zhin ntuge fya vi nya ma gna fye.

Esa nu fya zhin ʼza gafara n laifi wa zhin nyi, mihin mi ku wo zhin gafara ce, gama esa ma zhin wo gafara ncei ndai gye nyaho lo, ma zhin gafara ntu kwo ɓo, to mi zhin kwo ntu Yesu ɓo nu, ntu fye ɓo njesun.
Nna bai to shetan wa gyi nasara n yi m, ntu ge yi kpe wo shiri ye lo vinya.
Esanu mi ɓei si Taruwasa ntuge ma zhin waʼazi ɓo, ma gye Shekwo la zokwo guya ga mi.
Ama mi ɓei la damu n mwa, ntuge mi to ɓei gye Titus wye m. Ntucenu ma lakala ma lo Makidoniya.
Ama godiya ga Shekwoyi, ntu nasara ɓo, n Yesu Kristi ku zhin, tu n yi tukwo nyi, ngye shi wo zhin ampanyi n yi abaho-baho yi n ya lo, ntu ge ya da owo Nabari manayi n aza aba, ngye turare sundayi.
Gama yi zhin ngye turare sundayi nu, n Yesu zhin kwo hadaya ga Shekwoyi nyi. Kwoi laɓa n a Yesu-viyi aba ɓedo azayi nɓa to go wom.
Ga aza nɓa fi lo n bwi-bwi Turare ye zhin nya nukwoyi nu n kwo wu za. Ama ga aza ɓa filo n pwo-pwo kwo zhin nya manayi nu n kwo ɓe wye-wye yi. To, nyika nu ɓa mi n tnu-tnu ye pya?
Ai, yi to wu lo ngye aza nu, n ɓa la Shekwoyi ɓeda kwa ɓa ze gyiba nya m. Ama shi Shekwoyi nu na tnuyi, yi daɓo n gaiciya yi, ntuge yi zhin Kristi abara nu.
Fye gye lo ge yi ci yihin nu? Fye gye lo ge dole nu, ngye shi azaho zhin, ya ɓe n awasika yi shi ntuge ya wu yihin tukwo n naje aba?
Of ye nu zhin eya wasika, n yi ku ka fi n ya bugba mi, ntuge zaho-zahoi wa kpe woi ce woi ba.
Wasika ye wu lo pei-pei ge, Kristi na ka kwo, woi ga yi kwo ge ya lo n cei. Kwo to kakpe lo n allo kuta nya nu n inki yim, ama nna ʼza bugba, n Shekwoyi Zafun yi.
Yi da deye ntuge yi kalai lo n Shekwoyi dna Kristi.
Nyahonyahoi to lo, n yi ɓami ya cige ya zhin tnu-tnu ye n ya kalai nu m, Eya kala kun n Shekwoyi aba nu.
Owo nu na zhin yi mi har yi zhin alkawali woi-woi ye bauta, nkwo to nyi owa kakayi fi nyi m, ama n Zafun nya. Owa zhin kwa ɓe n fi-i ama Zafun zhin wa ga wye-wye yi.

A ɓei ka owa kpe n akuta nu, Shekwoyi mwa-mwa kwa ɓe esa n wo ɓei ga n cei nyi. Kwo shi ko nyi mwa-mwa n kwo ɓei kpe n Musa wyeba ɓei la duya, kwo ɓei mwa har to a Israilayi ɓa mi ɓai shi wa wyem, ndai Owa n kwo ɓe n fi nyi, ɓei ɓe aza ba n mwa-mwa yeyi.
To ai mwa-mwa n kwo lo n Zafun tnu-tnu nyi, kwo du deye lo.
Tnu-tnu n kwo wu aza kwo mwa-mwa yi belle tnu-tnu n kwo gni aza? Ai kwo mwa-mwa yi gnasun lo.
Yi ɓa mi ya ci ge mwa-mwa n saiye nya kwo mwalo, mwa-mwa nkwo ɓei nyi n sapai nyi kwo la duya.
Gama ndai mwa-mwa ɓei nyi n kwo to ɓei mwasa dai-dai m, to aɓa ka mwamwa deyi gye wuna n kwo lo har abada nyiʼa?
Shi yi n wyetu yei lo nyi, yi ku ze abugba kala da.
Yi to wulo ngye Musa nu, n kwo ɓei zewo dole wa pui eje, n wa wyeba nyi ntuge to a Israila yi ɓa gye shi mwa-mwa lo konya n wu m.
Oɓa ɓo-nubozhin ɓei gu-gu yi, Har n saiye ma oɓa ɓonubozhin kwo-o gu-gu yilo n eje yi, esa nu ɓa ba littafi alkawali kwo-kwo yi nya. Eje ye zhin kwa kpeya esa oza ga Yesu gaiciya n cei.
Kwo n saiye ma esa ɓa ba Musa owa ncei ejehin zhin kwa gu ɓa ɓonubozhin.
Ama a zhin a kpe kwo ya shi litafi ku dage, “Musa eje ɓei la kmaya esa wo ɓei lo Dagayi aba nyi.”
To Dagayi n ya wo nu zhin Zafun, aba Zafun Dagayi nya lo, to, pwo-pwo lo.
Ntu cenu, eyi vinya wu Dagayi mwa-mwa ntna awyeba pui, yi mwa-mwahin konu kwa, ko kun abanu, nwo nu zhin Zafun nyi, kwo zhin kwa yi ze n gye owo degbe, n latu yi mwa so-sai.
Shekwoyi nagayi tnu-tnu ye, dna nwo sun-sun-gye, ntuce nu yi ta gmi bugba yam,

Yi ta dna aza kwoce nu ge ɓa ga gaiciyam, yi to ce pma aza ɓa ga gaiciya nɓo n Shekwoyi ɓeda to dam. A vinyikwo ɓo yi, yi ta ye ɓam. Ama yi da gaiciya nu n Shekwoyi abye, ntuge oza nwa wo yi ɓeda wa gwo kwo.
Gama ndai waʼazi ye n yi zhin nyi, ko bwi shi nu, ko ɓei bwi shi n aza ba nu kawai, n ɓa to wye-wyeyi lo m.

Ɓa ta ga gaiciya lom, ntuge oɓa ɓo nubozhin fi lo a wyegma. Shetam nu nafi ɓa ɓo. Wo ta ye ge ɓa gye buzangna n kwo ɓe oɓa ʼba nyi m. Buzangna n kwo kun n nabari manayi aba n ko wu Yesu Kristi latu nyi, n wo nu zhin Shekwoyi degbe nyi.
Gama yi ta zhin eyi hin nu waʼazi m, yi zhin Yesu Kristi nu waʼazi, n wo zhin Dagayi nyi, eyihin ce yi zhin fye abara nu, ntu Yesu Kristi ɓo.
Shekwoyi n wa cige, “Buzangna ɓa knaya n wyegma aba nyi,” owo nu na zhin owo buzangna kwoi ɓe ya bugba, kwoi ɓe yi buzangna n Shekwoyi latu yekpe yi, nkwo nyi n Yesu awyeba nyi.
Kwo shiko nyi yi arziki zafun nya ye yi lo, yi wu lo ngye ozun shakun mi nya nu kurum. Kwa wu ge iko lo n Shekwoyi aba nu, toge n yi aba m.
Yi sin wahala ci-ci ama kwo taviyi yam, nsahoi ya zhin shakka, ama eyi wyetu ta zo m.
Anuwun yi lo n mwa, ama yi to tna nugundo lom, njesun nsahoyi, yi zhin ya bwa aci n mwa yi to fi ntu ce m.
Nsahoi yi zhin ya la Yesu fi-fi dna n yi anayi n nabai agye owo wye-wyeyi dna n yi anayi.
Dna yi wye-wyeyi vinya, yi fi wahala efi nya ntu Yesu ɓo, ntuge aza ɓa gye Yesu n yi anayi fi-fi-yi.
Deye kwa wu ge efi lo tnu-tnu lo n yi, ama wye-wye yi lo n fye.
Littafiʼa da ge, “Mi ɓei daɓo ntuge mi la gaiciya ga.” Dna zafun gaiciya nya ye yi daɓo ce, ntuge yi ku gaiciya ga.
Yi kpe lo ge Shekwoyi n wo ɓei la Yesu kala n vingwo nyi, woi ɓei kuyi kala n Yesu yi, har woi ɓe n yi ɓedo n fye yi n wo aba.
Deye vinya kwo nyi ntu fye ɓo nu kurum, gama shi Shekwoyi alheri ɓei si aza ba n mwa, ɓa zhin aduwa n mwa godiya nya ntu ge Shekwoyi wa bwa latu.
Ntucenu yi ta bwa bugba bmayam. Ko shi kwo nyi eyi nayi bwa konya lo-lonu, ama eyi zafun ɓe-ɓe nu ci-ci.
Wahala ɓiyi ye n yi sin kwo nyi kwa, kwo ta mwasa m. Amma kwo ɓaɓe yi mwa-mwa dnagmayi nyalo-nyalo nya, n du eyi wahala ye.
Gama yi zhin ya hankali dna, n anya nu n nata gyeɓa wyem. Nya aza gye kwo ta mwa sam, ama nya aza ta gyem, okwonu mwasa so-sai har nyalo-nyalo.
Gama yi kpelo ge, esa tent ye n yi fi nkwo nyi wato eyi nayi n anyimi ye, esa kwa miya Shekwoyi ɓei gayi puwa n she, puwa n wa mi n wohin tukwo yi, puwa n kwo ta shan miyam.
Nsaiye kwa aku yi ɓe, yi cei pma lo ya bwa puwa eshe nya ye.
Esa ya kpe puwa ho kwo nu kwa, a ta shan yi gye n nayi yem,
Esa yi ye filo n nayi ye, yi do mi lo n wahala yi, ko to nyi ge yi ta yelo n nayi yei num, ama ge yi ye puwa eshe nya nu. N nabai nya kwo zhin fifi yi, a kpekwo wye-wyeyi.
Shekwoyi nu layi zhin shiri, ntu doshan ye ɓo. Woi ga yi owo Zafun, n nabai kwa zeyi, ɓehin-hin ntu anya ɓo vinya n wo cei lo n tu yi ɓo nyi.
Ntu cenu yi wyepai lo, yi kpe lo gʼe esa yi fi nayi ye, yi to lo n Shekwoyi puwam.
Gama eyi zan-zan zhin gaiciya ga nya nu, to yi gye wye m.
Yi wyepai lo so-sai ama yi gna ye lo ya fa nayi ye, ya lo Shekwoyi puwa.
Ama nya kwo du lo vinya, yi cei pma ya gawo agmada, kwo yi-i fi anyi ye kwo kwa n wo aba nʼshe.
Gama kwo zhin tile nu, eyi vinya ya yezhi n Kristi ɓa, wa da yi owa. Zaho-zahoi ɓei gwo nya kwo kunce shi wa zhin n wu. Ko manayi kwo nukwoyi dna anyimi ye.
Yi kpelo ge kwo bmiya lo yawo Dagayi dna, ntu ce yi gna aza. Shekwoyi kpe yi ye lo. Ama mi zhin nubo lo ge, dna n fya bugba, fye kpe mi ye lo vinya.

Yi to cei pma ya wu eyihin tukwo n fya ba nu m, ama yi cei pma ya ga fye dalili n fye ɓa gma n yi, n nabai n fye ɓa mi fya dna aza ɓe gbe n ɓa gma nazaje bmiya-bmiya nyi ama to ɓai gma n wo hali yi m.
Yi ku ze anyacei nu? Ai ntu Shekwoyi ɓo nu. N yi zhin aza alafiya da nu, ofye nu na ampanyi lo.
Yesu ye-ye nu tulo n yi she vinya, she yi kpelo ge zaknayi nu ɓei fi n aza ɓo, vinya. Deye kwa wu ge aza vinya ɓa ku fi ngnisun woi.
Wa fi aza ɓo vinya, ntuge aza n ɓa wye-wyeyi, to ɓa laɓa ɓahin tukwom ɓom, ama ntu oza ɓo n wo ɓei fi wa laka n vingwo ntu ɓa ɓo nyi.
Ntu cenu yi ta da zaho-zahoi owa dna oza ɓemwi m, ko n sahoi ma ngye yi ɓei ku Yesu da owa dna aza ɓemwi, yi ta shan zhin lo lonu m.
Esanu oza la vi Yesu, wola ze oza woi-woyi, oza kwo-kwoyi la duya, hali woi-woyi la ɓe.
Deye vinya Shekwoyi nu zhin, gama ntu Yesu ɓo, wo ɓei la yi shan do. Eyi n yi ɓei zhin owa nuwunyi, yi ku ze owo anugundo. Woi ga yi tnu-tnu, n yi ɓa ɓe n nazajeyi ɓa ze owo anugundo.
Eyi ɓeda nu nyi ge, Shekwoyi ɓei ze aza owo anugundo.
To, yi zhi nyi, yi zhin Kristi atnu-tnuyi nu. Wato kwo wu lo ngye Shekwoyi nu gyi fye wye, ntu Yesu ɓo, yi gyi fye wye fye fa Shekwoyi wa shan fye do, fya ku ze owo anugundo
Yesu to ɓei zhin laifi da num, ama ntu yi ɓo Shekwoyi wa zhin wo, har wa ze laifi da, ntuge ya kuze aza manayi.
Ngye atnu-tnu kun zhin yi n She kwoyi yi gyi fye wye nu, alheri Shekwoyi nya nfye la gwo nyi fye to fa kwa ze banzan.
Fye wo ɓo n Shekwoyi da, “Mi ɓei wo fye bwichi, ntuge ma wu fye sun-sungye, Ma bma fye zhin ntuge ma gni fye.” Fye wo, Esa nyi n fye ɓa gwo Shekwoyi sun-sun-gye, Nnaiye zhin gni-gni nyipyeyi nu.
Yi to cei pma, zaho wa gye ge eyi tnu-tnu to bmiya lom, ntu cenu to yi ye, ya ɓe n wahalai n zaho-zahoi aba m.
Maimakon lo nu dna nyahonyahoi n ya zhin, yi wu ge yi zhin Shekwoyi abara nu, dna n hakuri bwa na wahala yi.
Esa mwa a kuyi lu, akuyi fi n kurkuku, avi ɓai wyiyi anya, tnu-tnu ku yi duwyi har ma nsahoi to yi mi n nyagyi m, balle a cige yi wangye.
Yi ku yihin tukwo wu ge, yi zhin Shekwoyi abara nu dna n yi zan-zan gyi-gyi-yi, n yeye gaiciya nya yi, n hakuri yi dna n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi.
Dna yi ɓeda gaiciya nya, njesun dna Shekwoyi iko, yi zhin wo nya nu Ɓefyece nu zhin eyi agu okun nya, yi ba sunkun n kwoi nu, ya kna yihin.
Nsahoi a gayi mwa-mwa, sahoi kwa a ciyi wyegba; Nsahoi a kpeya gye, nsahoi a layi tu. Kwo shi kwo nyi yi da gaiciya, a zhin a gye yi ngye aza kata.
Aza kpeyi ye vinya ɓa wu ngye ɓa ta kpe yi ye m. Nsahoi kwa wu ngye yi ku fi, ama shi fya gye nyi, yi n wyewyeyi lo, aku yi lu, ama yi to fi m.
Yi bugba wun yi lo, ama yi n agmada yi lo ci-ci, yi wu lo n gye yi to n nyaho yim, ama yi ga azaje arziki lo, ko yi to arzikim, yi n nyaho-nyahoi lo vinya.
Omi anugundo a Korintiyi, yi ku ɓo da cewo n fye yi, yi la eya bugba guya vinya ga fye.
Yi to so eya bugba n fya ba m. Ofye nu ku ofya bugba so yi.
Mi daɓo n fyei ngye omi aɓi nu, fye wu yi ye-ye pya, n yi cei lo n fye ɓo nyi. Fye gu ofya bugba ya vinya.
Fye to laɓa ngye fye wu gmanyi gmanyi n natna-viyi. Gama kwo to bmiya lo lonu m. Ɓemanayi nɓenukwoyi ɓa gyi nugundo n wuna? Buzangna n wyegma yi ɓa mi ɓa gni zan-zan?
Kristi n Shetan yi ɓa ye na jeyi n wuna? Yesu-viyi n kni nu lo n wo ɓa gni zhin n tna-viyi a?

Shekwoyi puwa ɓa gyi nugundo nwuna n ashan puwa yi a? Gama yi nabari manayi n wa ɓe yi n cei nfye zhin Shekwoyi aduwa-nyakun nu, shi Shekwoyi ku da n wohin, “Ma zhin emi puwa n ma azayi nu, ma sa-se nɓa mi, ma ze ʼɓa Shekwoyi ɓa ze ʼmi aza.”
Ntucenu Shekwoyi ku da, “Dole fya fa ɓa, fye la gnaje n ɓai, Fye to zhin nyaho-nyahoi n nyayi n kwo to gyi-gyi-yi m. Mi ɓa gwo fye.”
Miɓa ze of ye da-da, Fye ɓa ku ze omi aɓi, Shekwoyi nu na da lo nu.

Ntu n na alkawali dnagmayi ɓo n na a cei gayi nyi, omi a nugundo ye-ye-yi, yi la awye pmi ya n ɓonukwoyi doho-doho yi, Ko dna n zafun, ya ze yihin a gyi-gyi-yi, ya zan-zan n Shekwoyi dnawoyi, yi ga yihin tukwo n wo akun.
Yi gyi fye wye fye la abugba guya gayi njesun, ntuge yi to zhin zaho ɓenukwoyi nfyemin, yi to dna zaho zokwo nukwoyin, yi to gyi zaho fin nfyem.
Mi ta da ɓeye ntuge ma kpe fye agye num, ko ma zun fye knim, gama shi mi ku shinda nyi, fye filo n mi bugba har abada, ma pwo kwo ma fi ɓedo n fyei.
Mi n bugba kalayi lo nfye nmwa, mi gma nfyei n mwa, fye la bugba kala ga mi n mwa, fye la bugba buyi gami ko shi ko nyi mi ku wahala sin n mwa.
Esa n yi ɓei si Makidoniya, yi to ɓei shegun yi n bwa doho-doho yi, n yi mi eyi abugba ɓei nunuyi n vi-vin yi n dnayi.
Shekwoyi n wo fu abugba bma-bmayi ya nyi, wa fu yi bugba n Titus ɓe-ɓe-yi.

Owo ɓe-ɓe nu to gayi bugba buyi gmanyin, ama nabari manayi n wa ɓe yi n cei nfye tukwo nyi. Esa n wo ɓei gna mi ge fye ɓei shi omi ɓeɓe awye, shi bugba ɓei wun fye n tu nya ɓo n kwo ɓei zhin nyi. Nfye ɓovi, n ye-yeyi nfye n cei lo-lo n mi ɓo nyi, mi ɓei la nu n bugba buyi har koyi gyi ya.
Bugba ta wun mi lo nge mi ɓei tnu fye n wasika yin, kwo shi bugba ɓei la mi wun nsaho yi, mi yi pa shi kwo ɓa san fye, ama kwa san fye esa fyewyi nu kawai.

Nsayi ye a dami lo, shi mi ɓei tnu n koyi, to ge shi kwo ɓei kni fye bugban, ama ntu ge okwo san-san n la fye pmi awye wu n Shekwoyi bwa. Bugba wun manayi nu nfye ɓei zhin, bugba-wun pya n Shekwoyi n cei pma owo aza ɓa bwa, na bayi n mi ta shan fye aba ɓe n minagyi yim.

Gama nsahoyi Shekwoyi zhin apma, n bugba-wun yi n ya ba, n na bai kwa bma yi zhin, ya pmi awye ya n ɓenukwoyi, ya zan wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya shin. Bugba to wun yi, ngy shi wa tnu yi n kwoyi m. Ntu ge bugbawun tna-viyi nya to zhin abuye nya num, kwoi ta gni ʼza n efi nyalo-nyalo nya m.

Fye gye nya n bugba-wun nkwo gmi n Shekwoyi aba, nku zhin ga fye. Kowi zhin fye, fye ku ze aza gaiciya da, aɓefyece-viyi, fyei zhin atna fya fa laifi nma ka fye nkwo tukwo nyi. Fya wodna nɓei nkwo ɓei zhin nyi, ai wo fye ngye mi ɓe ma bma fye zhin. Fye la kni, fyei la fyehin kun n laifi, shi fya ye fyei ta laifi-da, fye ku ɓo zhin nkwo bmiya.
Mi to ka fye ntu ʼza ɓo nu nwa izhin laifi nyim, kwo oza nna zhin wo laifi nyim, ama ntu ge n Dagayi ɓa zhin fya gye, ngye shi fye pa yi ɓo lo n sun.
N bugba kalayi nfye ɓei ga yi, nfye ye-yeyi nyi, yi ɓei ku bugba bui-bui bwa n Titus ɓe-ɓeyi, shi fya gwo wo nna gmadayi.

To woi lakam, ma ku gna wo ge mi gyi ʼgbe nfyei nu, ofyehin kwa fye to ye ge omi gbegyi kwa ze gbeloyim, ngye shi mi zhin ma gna fye gaiciya ci-ci, Titus nwohin tukwo, wo ku gye ge, omi gbegyi nfyei, kwo zhin gaiciya nu.
Wo ye fye n mwa, saho-sahoi nwa pa shi fye ɓei wo owo ɓeda n bugba yi gmanyi fya gwo wo n pwawo-yi, n bugba manayi.
Deye da mi bugba lo, shi mi kpelo ge nyaho to dnalo n yi atasin, njesun mi n bugba kalayi lo n fye aba.
Nsayi mi ye ma gna fye ɓo, Shekwoyi ku zhin ga ikklisiya Makidoniya dna nwo alheri.
Kwo shi kwo nyi ɓa fi lo n wahala nsa nukwoyi, ɓa ku oɓa bugba buyi gmaje nɓa sangyi-yi, deye kwoi zhin ɓa, ɓai mi ɓa ga nyaga, ntu azaje ɓo nbugbayi gmanyi.
Ɓa to ga nyaga ye ngye shi oɓa nyabwa lo num, ama ɓa ga kwo ndutu, mi ga saida ge, ɓa zhin lo nu ntu ge oɓa bugba ɓeye nu, ɓa to zhin kwo ntu mi gna-gna ɓo num.
Har ma ɓai gyi yi wye ge, yi gwo agyiwye ye, ntuge ɓahin ɓa dnabwa n na Yesu-viyi bmazhin ɓo, dna Urushelima.
Ɓemanayi du-duyi nɓa zhin, har ndu ngye shi eyi awyetu ɓei nyi, kwo nu ge, ɓa ku ɓahin tukwo ga n Shekwoyi akun ɓedo n yi, ntu ge ya dna ɓa n zokwo ngye shi Shekwoyi ɓa wu yi.
Ɓa ɓei zhin kwo n bugba bui-buyi, har ya tnu n Titus yi, n wo ɓei gafye bugba kala dna n nyaga kmisunyi nyi, wa ɓe fye aba, wa ga fye bugba kala, n na bai fya nu fye rabo dna tnu-tnu nyaga nya ye.

Fye zhin aza dnagmayi nu na zokwoyi mwa begye, fye n gaiciya gai lo, a waʼazi zhin yi manayi, a ɓeye-kpeyi mwa, n pwawo bmazhin nya, n ye-yeyi mwa ntu yi ɓo. Nsayi ye mi ye fya ze aza dnagmayi dna n zafun nyaga nya.
Mita ga fye wyidna num, mita ci ge tilas fya zhin n lo num, ama a wo azaje pwa lo n zhin yi. Zokwo nyi n kwo ɓa wu ge ofye ye-ye zhin ɓehin-hin nya nu, kwo du ɓeda asan lo.
Fye kpe lo shi eyi Dagayi Yesu ɓei nu n ye-yeyi, n na aza bmazhin yi. Kwo shi kwo nyi wo zhin nyabwa-yi nu, ama wa ze wyekwoyi nabayi, dna n wo awyekwo wa ze fye a nyabwayi.
Mi ga fye shaula ge, fye zo oɓo zhin n fye ɓei ya zhin eye bwigyi n kwa duya nyi, gama ofye nu to zhin kmisunyi n fye ɓei ɓe n nubozhinye pya yin, ama ofye nu zhin aza kmisunyi n fye ɓei ya ce zhin.
Shi fya ya ɓeye n bugba pwawo yi nyi, fye zhin kwo har fya zo n bugba bui-buyi, fyei ga enya n fye ɓa mi, dna n nyaho-nyahoi n fye n cei lo, ofye yaya pwawo, kwa wu dai-dai n fye aɓe zhin yi.
Ngye a kufye pwawo lo, fya ga nya, to, kwo to zhin nyaho nu shi fya ga n sun, Shekwoyi ye fya ga enya nfye n ceilo nu, wo ta ye fya ga nya nu n fye to n cei lo n.
Mita da lonu ge, aza nɓa gwo fye nya ga, ɓa bwa sauki, atu fye da akaya num.
Ama gye ga ɓa, ngye shi fye cei lo nsayi ye nmwa nyi, nwyihoyi ɓahin ɓo gafye esa nɓa cei lo nmwa, n sa yi nfya fi nsangyi, kwo ɓa ze ngye fya gna dai-dai.
Ho pa aya ɓo lo nɓa ci ge, “Oza nwo ɓei yezhi nmwa, nya to ɓei ce wo shim, oza njesun nwo ɓei yezhi fyewyi wo to ɓei gyisan m?”
Mi zhin Shekwoyi godiya lo shi wa ga Titus bugba efye ɓopa nya, shi mi n cei lo nyi.
A da wo lo wa vi mi shaula zhin, nge wo ɓe fye aba njesun, ama mi gyelo n gye wo ɓei ɓa ɓe koto miyi a gnawon, gama awo wo pwalo ngye wo ɓe wa gye fye.
Mi tunlo n gnisun nwoyi zado, ye-yeyi, Nabari manayi waʼazi zhin dna n na ikklisiya vinya.
Ɓehin-hin, a ikklisiya nu ɓei kni zagye, wa zan ngnisun n mi yi, yalo n na nya gayi n Urushelima, deye ɓa la Shekwoyi tu, kwa wu eyi pwawo ntu azaje bmazhin ɓo.
Eyi zan-zan n kun-sun Ba wu eyi gaiciya, oza ta da ɓeda kasa tu n yi tukwon, gama yi to n cei pmalo zaho wa bwa laifi tu n yi tukwon, dna n zokwo n yi shi anyaga ye nyim.
Shekwoyi kpelo shi gaiciya sun. Mi n cei pmalo aza vinya ɓa kpece, cenu a zhin yi zhin shiri deye.
Mi tnu fye lo n eyi zado yi n yi kpewoyelo da ɓemana zhin ɓo nyi. A wo wo pwalo wa ɓe, gama mikun gnawo shi fye pwawoi lo ntu bmazhin ɓo.

N oza nya fye ge nyikadonu zhin Titusʼa? Fya gna ge, wo zhin omi zadonu, omi bmazhinyi dna nfye bmazhin, fya gna nge azaje ngun aba zhin wakili nu a ikklisiya nya, ɓai zhin misali nu aza nɓa zhin Dagayi anya.
Fyewu fye ye-ye n na aza deye aba ntu mi ɓo, fya zhin ɓa enya vinya n mi gma n fyei nyi, ntuge aza vinya ɓa gye.
Mi kpelo ge ko to zhin tile nu, ma ka ga fye ntu Shekwoyi aza bmazhin ɓo m.

Gama mi kpelo shi a wo fye pwa lo fya zhin ce, har ma gma n a nugundo aba n Makidoniya nge, fye ɓei n cei pma fya tnu a bmazhin tunyi ntna. Ɓehin-hin, efye bugba napye nu, na ga aza ɓe pwawo ɓa bmazhin.
Ama mi tnu n naza deyeyi ya kpe dei-dei ge fye n shiriyi zhin lo, shi ma gnaɓa fye n cei zhin lo, n fye agyi-wyei yezhi, mito n cei pmalo kwa ze n saye ngye mi la bwi aba n mi gma gma yi nfye ɓo m.
Vinyiko ɓa wo mi n mwa – nfyei ɓe, n na azan Makidoniya ɓe n gnisun n miyi, to ɓa gye fye nshiri yi zhin mi-i ku gna ɓan.
Ce na zhin mi-i tnu n na aza deye yi, n mi abye ɓa kpe dei-dei cauta ye n fye ɓei zhin alkawali nyi ala yezhin ai pmi yi. Mi n cei pma kwa wu n gye cauta hin-hin, toge ngye atufye tile nu fyei gam.
Ama fye pa ge n fya ga fyewyi, fye ɓei bwa fyewyi, Fwaiza n wa bye nyabye fyewyi wo zhin wa bwa ampanyi fyewyi, ama n wa bye n mwa wa bwa n mwa.
Ozaho-zahoi vinya wo ɓa dna nwo bugba shiwo ɓa ga n sun. Fye to tu oza kala wa ga, ndu shi wo ncei pma wa ga n sun, ntuge Shekwoyi ci azanu nɓa ga n bugbayi gmanyi.
Shekwoyi ɓami wa ga fye enya n fye to n cei lon, har ndu du ɓo, nnabai n fye ta gba o fye a bukata nu gmanyin, ama har n ko ɓa ce fya ga azaje n bugba bui-buyi.
Kwo wu shi littafi a danu, “Shekwoyi ʼza zhin wa ga awyekwoyi nya n bugbayi gmanyi. Owo ɓemana zhin ɓa ze owo mwa-mwa nyalo-nyalo.”
Gama Shekwoyi n wo ga fwaiza nyabye, wa bye nyi, n na avun wa do nyabye n mwa wa gyi nyi, wo ɓa ga fye ndudu fya bye wa zhin kwa pa n na bai fya ga nya ndudu dna nfye ampanyi.
E, Shekwoyi ɓa ga fye n mwa n nabai fya ga n mwa, esa n ya lo aza nfye nya gayi n na aza aba ɓei sa Shekwoyi ami, ɓai ciwo n tu nfye bmazhin ɓo.
Aɓo ngun aba na zhin ntu nfye bmazhin ɓo, aza n ɓa sangyi yi lo ɓa bwa bmazhin, ɓai ci Shekwoyi n jesun.
Aza nfya bma zhin aɓa daɓa, to n tukwoyi tu n fye bmazhin n fya zhin ɓa n na azajeyi nyin, ama ɓa ɓei ci Shekwoyi, ntuge ofye a ɓezhin wu lo dei-dei nfye wuwuyi.
Ba ɓe zhin adduʼa gafye n bugbayi gmanyi, ntu n Shekwoyi alheri ɓo n na wuɓa nfye aba nyi.
Yi sa Shekwoyi ami ntu wo Nugun ɓo, owo cauta n ko du ɓeda asan.
Omi Bulus, mi gyi fye wye pecei-ye shi Kristi n wohin tukwo ɓa zhin, ama azaho nfye mi cilo nge, “Bulus wasika woshan esa nwo gni n tagni, ama esa nwo si n ya, edna ɓawo wo wa daɓo nkalayi.”
Mi to cei pma lo ma wu fye, esa n mi ɓa ɓe fye aba n cei, shi mi gyi mina-gyi nwun, mi to n cei pma lo ma zhin omi ɓemwi n na aza aba n ɓa gye ge omi ɓeda zhin oza ɓeda nu kawai m.
Kwo zhin gaiciya nu ge, mi zhin zanyikwoci nu n kalagbayi, ama mita zhin apma n zanyikwoci shiri yi ko dabalai nu mi-i gyi nasaran.
Mi zhin apma n Shekwoyi akun kaya akalada, to ge ado n zanyikwoci wa zhin nwo abwa yin, mi-imi shetan aba anukwoyi akalada ya m.

Akun kaya ye zhin ɓa bma tukwo mwa doho-dohoi ya, nkwo zhin gaba n Shekwoyi n nyai nkwo ɓa pmi aza awye ya nwo. Nna akun kaya ye yi nu, mi wan a wyenakpeyi ya, mi-i jezeɓe n ɓai n Shekwoyi aba, ai shanɓa do ɓa ze aza nɓa bugba ɓeye nu ge, ɓa vi Kristi ɓo.
Mi ɓa zhin apma n na akun kaya ye yi, tu n tukwo gnanakwoi doho-doho, mi ɓei zhin apma nɓai nu nfye, fya ga fyehin tukwo n Kristi akun.
Oɓo gmanyi nfye aba, okonu fye shimi awye, mi wu n gba kala gbagba yi, ntna kala, ama fye ta shi awye n fmin. Ama ngye oza lo nwo ɓa gma n Kristi kalayi n ikoyi mi ɓa mi ma gma ndu wo.
Kwo wu lo n gye mi gmalo nmwa n mi ikoyi tu nfye tukwo, iko ma bmafye zhin, to ge ma tu fye ci, mi ɓa zhin apma manayi n mi gma gmayi.
Mi da deye, to fya gye nge mi ɓewyi nu, esa n ma lanu n fyei dna n mi wasikan.
Aza ho gna ge, “Fye to damu nwo wasikayin, wo da ɓo n mwa ama wo ɓewyinu. Esa n wa si n ya fye to ɓei bwa ɓeho manayi nwon, owo pwa to ɓei shan fye fin.”
Nsayi ye omi ɓeɓe ɓa du, omi awasika dudu n shanwo.
O, fye to wun bugban, mita ci ge mi du aza de ye lo, nɓa gna fye shi ɓa gma nsun, Oɓa wahala bwasun nge ɓa mwi ɓahin do n na ajeyinu. Ɓai mwi ɓahin do gaba nɓa ɓeye-kpeyi, Ɓo kasa.
Ama yi ta gma n ikoyi n yi to ncei lon, Eyi ɓemwi, ya nu Shekwoyi shiri n wo cei zhin n yiɓo, shiriye zhin eyi tnu-tnu zhin n gnisun n fyeyi.
Yi ta bwi aba nu, ya wu yi iko n yi cei lo tu nfye tukwon. Gama eyi nu ɓei kmi efye aba ɓe n Nabari manayi Kristi nya yi.
Kwo to wu ge yi ye ya gwo mwa-mwa n zado nku zhin m. Yi ye efye gaiciya ga kwa mwa n na bai eyi tnu-tnu nfye aba kwa mwa pata.
Ndeye avun yi ɓa mi ya zhin a zhido waʼazi n ɓa kpalo n fye yi, aba n zado ta zhin tnu-tnu lon. N lonu zaho ta shan ci ge yi fi n zado fwan.
Shi Shekwoyi ɓeda da, “Ndei oza ɓa gman, wo gma n nyayi n Shekwoyi n ku zhin, to ge nwohin tukwoyin.”
Esa n zaho a gma nwohin tukwoyi n ɓeyi nkwo ku zhin, ko to zhin nyaho nun, ama esa n Dagayi wa ciwo, kwo da wu lo gbo.
Mi ye fya bwa omi n miyi shi mi daɓo n gye mama. Fye bwa emi n miyi ma daɓo n ko n mi yi fi n bugba.
Mi n shewo yi lo nfyei, shewo Shekwoyi nya pya, wato of ye ye-ye kwa ze Krisiti nyanu gmanyi. Shi ɓinyinkwoyi gyi-gyi-yi zhin wa sewo ye-ye shi ntu n enu ɓo nu n woye nyi. Oza nwo ɓa zhin owo ɓa.
Ama mi wo dna lo n vinvin yi, mi-i wodna sakun zaho wa pmi fye awyeya n fye gaiciya ga dna n Dagayi, shi shetan ɓei dna Hawawu kwoce dna n Adini ofwa nyi.

Fye wu lo ngye fye to mi zhi lon, fyei ga nyaho-nyahoi gaiciya n na gna fye, ko oza woi zhin fye Kristi do n waʼazi gbo ndoyi n yi zhin nyi, ko zafun do ndu Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi nfye ɓei gwo nyi ko ai wu fye zokwo do n fye ɓa pwo, fya gwo ko lo abwa ʼba-ba.
Ama mi tagye lo ngye aza nɓa yi ɓahin ge Shekwoyi atnu-tnuyi nyi, ge ɓa du mi lon.
Ngye mi ta kpe waʼazi zhin, amma mi kpeɓeye lo n mida, shi mi gye fye ku awyega bwa nsa yi ntuge yi ku wu fye pei-pei.
Ma zhin ɓenukwoi nu, mi-i gba mihin nfye aba, shi ma zhin fye waʼazi Shekwoyi nabari manayi nya, to ma gna fye ge fye gba nya hon?

Ama ma gwo a ikklisiya je cauta n ɓa tnu mi n cei, n nabai ma zhin fye tnu-tnu to fye yi gba nyahon. Sa deye ɓei ku zo mikun kwa yami gun, ama to ma nya fye ɓehon, gama a-Yesu-viyi n Makidoniya ɓei ku ɓemi n nyaga yi. Mi to nya fye gyiwye ɓon, mi-i ta shan fye nyan.
Mi ku alkawali zhin, ngaiciya ga yi n mi ceilo dna n Yesu nyi, nge mi ɓa ku gna aza vinya n Helleni.
Ntu kniɓehiʼa? Ntu ge mi ta ye fye lon? Shekwoyi kpe lo ge mi ye fye lo.
Ama, mi ɓa zhin ma zun aza kni n ɓa gma ge ɓa zhin Shekwoyi tnu-tnu nu shi yi zhin nyin.
Shekwoyi nu to tnu n na aza ye pyayin. Kwo fyewyi, ɓa zhin akataceyi nu, ɓa dnafye kwoce n gye ɓa zhin Kristi atnu-tnu yi.
Ama ce ta wo mi lon! Shetan zhin wa pmi wohin bma ngye malaika buzangna nya.
Ntuce nu kwo to zhin oɓe wo-woyi nu, owo abara ɓami ɓa zhin lo nu ce, ɓa ze n gye a tnu-tnuyi, manayi. N navun ɓa ɓa gwo tata doho-dohoyi, nɓa atnu-tnu nukwoyi kunce lo n cei.
Mi gyi fye wye n jesun, fye to gye ngye mi zhin mama num, ko fyei gye lo nu, fye wo mi ɓeda nabai ma mwa mihin tukwo ngye ɓa.
Dagayi to ga mi iko ge mi mwa mihin tukwo lo num, ntu ge mi zhin aɓo lo ngye mama nwo ton na pwo yi m.
Ama aza deye ɓai gyi abye, ɓai gna fye, shi ɓa kpe ɓeye lo nsun, omihin ɓa mwa mihin tukwo.
(Fye gye ge fye cecei-lo, ama fyei kna a mamahi ɓeda tnubua n bugba buyi, fye ta damu lo, esa ɓa zefye oɓa fyenu, ɓai gwo anya vinya nfye n cei lon, ɓai gyi gyiba tu nfye tukwo, ɓai ci fye wyegba.
Vinyiko wo mi lo maci ge mi to n kalayi lo n migni yi n lonun, ama enya n ɓa mwa ɓahin tukwo n cei mi ɓami ma mwa mihin tukwo ce.)
Ɓa ta mwa ɓahin tukwo ge ɓa zhin Ibraniyi nun? Mi zhin kwo nu. Ɓa zhin a Israilayi nu? Mi zhin kwo nu. Ɓa zhin Ibrahim ayawyi nu? Mi zhin kwo nu.

Ɓai gna ɓa zhin Kristi nu bauta? Ama miku bauta zhin wo ndu ɓa. (Mila zenya nu mi-i gma nsun layi). Miku tnu-tnu zhin n duɓa. Ayi dnami n kurkuku n na bwai mwabegye. A zhin mi bulala n na abwayi mwa begye. Mi sun n fiyi ci-ci.
A Yahudiyi zhin mi bulala n ɓa knalufin n nukwoyi, shita-cei ciwagmanyi har abwa ngun atnu.
Abwa ta ai lumi n na abusiyi. A knimi akuta bwa zungmanyi. Abwa ta eya kwoi ɓaya nmiyi, bwa zun gmanyi mi yi dna n ela nsukwoyi vinya n kwo nyipyeyi ɓe.

Miku zan-zan n na abai mwa kpa, mi-i sin wahala anuwan yako nya. N na a viyi, n ma za akun Yahudiyi n naabyedo yi, miku wahala sin, n na azhi yakwo, n efiyi n bmana n na nuwan yi n na zakun nɓa yi ɓahin ge ɓa zhin Kristi aza.
A ɓe mi n nayi san yi, n tnagye-wan yi n sukwoyi, nsayi mwa-begye mi lo n mikunyi, nunwa mikunyi, mi-i zan n tna nyagyi, eseyi fumi mi-i vin, n tna aje nɓa bwi miʼse.
Ndeye avun mi n damuwa yi lolo shi ikklisiya zan-zan lo n wu.
Nyikadonu bwi aba to mi-i wun bugba n wo ɓon ma? Nkadonu miya to ai wo mi pwa n ge mi bmawo zhin ma? Nkadonu la gbidokunnu n zafun to minagyi yi gyi mi n zayi n wa zhin woi gbidokunnu nyin ma?
Ama ndei n mi ɓa gma, ma gma n na anyayi nu n ɓa wu emi kalagba.
Shekwoyi eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi dada n na ciwo nyalo-nyalo nyi, kpelo ge mi da gaiciya nu.
Ngye, gwamna n Dimaska, n Esu Aretas yi ɓa gu ezhi ntu ge ɓa wan mi.
Ama a kamishi n na awunyi dna n katakpa n ebwo nkwoɓei ce n ganuwan nyakun pa, ma lo minya!
Gmagma yepya zhin acije nu, ama fye fa ma gyi abye, ma gnafye aɓewyegye ɓo, n na ɓei n Dagayi ku wu mi.

Aye ngunawo-cei anyi n ɓa duya nyi aɓei lami lo cei n ʼshe mazhin ziyara. Fye to nyami ko dna n mi nayi kwo dna n mi zafun. Ntuge mita kpe genyi lon. Shekwoyi gmanyinu kpe ce lo. Ama mi ɓei la lo ʼshe.
Mawo aɓo wo-woyi n ɓa du zanyikwoci asan wa da (ama ato ɓei ye nge mi gna aza aɓeyem).
Beye-kpe ye pya kun ce lo oza gma, ama mita gman, miɓa bwa gma n mi kalagbai nu, njesun shi Shekwoyi n ikoyi wa zhin apma n zakala-gbai n tu nwo mwa-mwa ɓo.
Mi n na aɓeyi lo n mwa, n mi ɓa gma n ɓa ɓo, mi-i ta ze mama nge mi gma ntu nɓa ɓon, ama mito cei pmalo oza zhin nubo n mi tukwo ndu enya n wo gye n mi zan-zan, woi ce woi ce woi wo n mi waʼazin.

Miɓa da ɓeye, gama eɓeye zhin aɓo adnagmayi nu, Shekwoyi ɓei wodna sakun miɓa mwa mihin tukwo n ɓai nu, ntu cenu a gami kalagba dna n nayi, kola ze ekna dnami nayi, she tan tnu-tnuyi ko knimi kwoi gnami-gna-gna.
Abwa ngun ata mi-i gyi Shekwoyi wye, wa ga mi lafiya n jesun.

Ama wa gnami ge, “Awo, mikunsun lo nhoi, nyanu n ho n cei pma lo. Omi iko wu kohin n du, n na aza kala gbayi abaʼa.” Nsayi ye a damailo mi-i gna shi mi to n kalayin, adamilo mi sase ngye oza n wo wu Kristi iko maimakon mi wu emihin iko n ɓeye-kpeyi.
Shi mi kpelo ge ntu n Kristi ɓo nu nyi, bugba ta wun mi lo n ekna yi ɓon, n na agyeyi, n wahalayi, azhin n gmagma sin yi, gama esa n mi gba kala, n sahi nu n mi n kalayi.

Fye zhin mi, mi-i zhin aɓo ngye mama, mi-i gma n lanyi, ko ɓei kunce efye nu fya ci mi, to ge ma ci mihin tukwom. Ntu ge nyaho to lo nna aza deye ncei lo, n mi to cei lon ko shi kwo nyi mi to zhin nyaho num.
Esa nmi ɓei kunsun nfyei, mi ɓei ku wu fye pei-pei, nge mi zhin tnu-tnuyi nu, n Shekwoyi wa tnu n miyi n wohin tukwoyi, gama mi ɓei ku aɓo awo-woyi n na atnu-tnu yakwoyi zhin nfye aba.

Enya gmanyi n mito ɓei zhin fyen, n mi ɓei zhin n na a ikklisiya aje, ekwonu mi to ze akaya n fye aban. Mi to ɓei gnafye ge fye gami nyagyi magyi, n na abai n mi ɓa wangyen. Mi gyi fye wye fya zhin mi gafara, ntu laifi ye ɓo.

Nsaiye mi je fye aba ɓe lo, bwa tahi, mi-i ta nyafye nyaho ɓom, mi ta ye efye agyiwye lon, mi ye fyenu, nzokwo doho-dohoi fye zhin omi aɓinu, fye kpelo aɓi ta gba oɓa dada n oɓa ayayi nyagyi ɓa gyin. Aɓi danu ga aɓi nyagyi.
Mi nbugba bui lo, ma ga fye omihin tukwo n nyayi vinya n mi n cei, ntu n fye ɓo dna n zafun. Ko shikwo-nyi, ʼfye yeye to mwa lo n mi aba, ngye shi mi ye fye nsun nyim.
Azaho n fyemi ɓai gna ge “Ko zhin gaiciya nu yi ta wu nyaho n wo ɓeɓen, ama wo zhin oza ce-ceyi nu, woi dnayi kwoce, yi tabbata lo tilas wo ɓei la gyiwye go n yi n zokwo doho.”
Ama n wuna? Aza n mi ɓei tnu n cei nyi ɓa ɓei ku gyibaho gyi tu n fye tukwo?
Esa n mi ɓei gna Titus nge wo ɓe n eyi zado yi n jesun, ɓa ɓei ku gyi baho gyi tu n fyenu? Awo, gama yi n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi gmanyi yi nu, yi zan-zan gmanyi, yi zhin ɓo n zokwoyi gmanyi.

Mi zhin nubo fye gye ngye mi da aɓeye vinya, n nabai fya ye n mi-i nu, ko ngye ma bmiya mihin shi nfye aba. Ko to wu lo nu m. Mi da deye n Shekwoyi abye, ngye aza nɓa dna n Kristi, emi anugundo ye-ye-yi ntu ge ma mi fye zhi dna n zafun.

Gama edna wo mi lo esa n ma ɓe n cei, anya n mi ɓo gye ta damin, enya n mi ɓa zhin ceta da fyen, edna wo mi lo mi bei gye fye fi fyei wu anya. Fye wo aje ʼshe, fyei gyi minagyi n na ajeyi fyei mwa fyehin tukwo, fyei da ɓo a nukwoyi n na aje tukwo n nunuyi n tukwomwayi n na ajegna yi.

E, edna womi lo ntu ge n ma ɓe fye aba Shekwoyi ɓa gbami n fye abye, bugba wunmi ma ci bwi, ntuge n mwa-begye nfye, n ku laifi zhin ɓai ku ze alaifida to ɓai damu n ɓenukwoyi, aɓo cegye nya n fye ku zhin, n na aje anyikwo gwoyi.
Ebwa tahi nyi n mi ɓe fye aba, Littafi a gnayi nge n aza gun aba ko ngun ata nku ɓenukwoyi gye tilas atako, (To emi gnakni bwa tahi nu nyin.)

Mi ɓei la gnaknin aza n ɓa zhin laifi nyi, esa n mi ɓei ɓe fye aba cei nyi, nsayi mi gna kni ɓa njesun, shi mi ɓei shin gnaknin ɓa nyi, du n na azajeyi ɓe n ge n ma ɓe, miye ma ta ɓanu mi ta gye ɓa sun-sun m.
Mi ɓa wu fye enya n fye ye vinya fya kpe n ge Kristi daɓo n fyei dna nmi, Kristi to gba kala lo n wo aɓo zhin n fye yin, ama wo zhin iko yakwo nu dna n fye.

Ewo nayi kala gbayi ɓei lafi tu n zundu, ama nsayi ye wo n wye-wyeyi lo dna n Shekwoyi iko. Eyi n yi cenyi yi gba kala gba-gbayi lo dna n nayi, shi wo ɓei gbakala, ama nsayiye yi sase n kalayi shi wo ncei nyi, n Shekwoyi ikoyi vinya n wo aɓo zhin nfye yi.
Fye dna fyehin wye, Fye zhin a Yesu viyi nu? Fye gyi nasara lo? Fye wo Kristi aese lo nwo ikoyi n fye a bugbami? Ko fye dna fyehin kwoce nu ge fye zhin a Yesu viyi to fye yi zhin ma?
Mi zhin nubo nge fye ɓa ye, fya zhin saida nge miku nasara ho gyi, mi zhin Kristi nyanu.
Mi zhin aduwa nge fya se ase manayi, to ge ya bwa enya n yi ɓa gma n cei n, koi wu nge enya n yi wunyi ko zhin gaiciya nu. Awo, gama yi n cei pmalo fya zhin ɓemana kwo ai ci yi wyegba.
Eyi tnu-tnu nu ya ga ɓemana zhin bugba kala, to ge ya zhin nubo n ɓenukwoyin.
Adayi lo shi yi to n kalayi lon ai ciyi wyegba, ama fye n kalayi lo. Eyi ɓemwi n yi aduwa zhin yi, okwo nu zhin fya ku ze a Yesu vi yi kalada.
Mi ka deye ga fye n na awyetuyi, mi ta shanɓe ma ta fye esa n ma ɓe n cei n, gama mi cei pma lo ma zhin a pma n Dagayi ikoyi n wa gami nyi, to ge ma ta fyen, ama ma zhin fye fya ze a kalada.
Mi zo emi wasika n na ɓe da ye yi. Fye da gma fye mwa fi n Kristi fye kna aɓo tunbua n mi ku da nyi, Fye sase n bugba-doloyi, n bugba fuyi. Shekwoyi ye-ye nya, n bugbafu nyayi wo kunsun n fyei.
Fye ɓi aje gna dna n Dagayi.
A Yesu viyi n ya ɓa ɓi fye gna lo.
Alheri eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi nya ko kunsun nfyei vinya. Shekwoyi ye-ye n Zafun jedoɓe yi ko kunsun nfyei. Amin.

Wasika ye gmi n mi aba nu, omi Bulus waʼazi zhin yi, n na Yesu viyi ajeyi, n ɓa nyi n ya nyi. Kwoi lo a ikklisiya aba n ɓa nyi n Galatiya nyi. Aza nu to ɓei yi mi nge mi ɓe ma zhin waʼazi yen, Yesu Kristi nu ɓei yi mi n wohin, n Shekwoyi Dadayi n wo ɓei lawo kala n efi nyi.
Fa bugba fu, n anabarkai, n ɓa kun n Shekwoyi Dada aba nyi n Dagayi Yesu Kristi yi ɓa ze efye nya.
Wa fi ntu yi alaifi ɓo shi Shekwoyi Dada ɓei zhin shiri, wa gni yi n anyi nukwoyi ye n yi fi n ɓa nyi.
Mwa-mwa vinya kwo zhin Shekwoyi nya nu nyalo-nyalo. Amin.

Ce womi lo, shi fye pmi awye ya n Shekwoyi n pye, dna n wo yeye nu n sun-sun gyei, n wa yi fye fya vi, fya bwa wye-wyei nyalo-nyalo, n wo ga dna n Kristi nyi. Fye ce fyei vi zokwo do nkwo ta si fyei n she n.
Gama zokwo do to lo n du odo n ya wu fye nyi m, aza n ɓa shando ɓai pmi Kristi gaiciya bma, ɓanu dna fye kwo ce.

Fa Shekwoyi knitu kwa tu n zaho-zahoi, n mihin ɓe, n wo zhin gni-gni zokwodo waʼazi n du do n yi ɓei wu fye nyi, e, ko malaikai gmi n she wa zhin waʼazi do gbo n yi nya yi, fa Shekwoyi knitu kwa tu n wo.
