Miɓa je ce da. N za zhin Nabari manayi do waʼazi gbo n doyi n fya gwo nyi, fa Shekwoyi knitu kwa tu n wo tukwo.
Fye gye lo nfyehin, mita ye ma fu fye bugba nu n na ɓeda manayi yin. Miye ma zhin ɓonu n kwo da Shekwoyi. Ndei mi zhin atna ma fu aza bugba nu, ha gye mi to zhin Kristi fyenu nu m.

Omi anugundo ye-yei, mi si nyasi ɓehin-hin nya, nge zokwo n kwo lo ʼshe nyi, n mi ɓei zhin fye kwo waʼazi nyi, ko ta gmi n zaho aba nu, ndu Yesu Kristi n wohin tukwo, n wa wumi nya n mi ɓa da. Zaho nu to shan mi wun.
Fye kpe lo shi mi ɓei wu sanu n mi ɓei ye vi a Yahudiyi kunnu nyi, shi mi ɓei zan a Yesu viyi zanyi n tna sun-sun, ma wu ɓa to a shan ɓa ye won.
Omi nu ɓei zhin a Yahudiyi kunnu viyi hin-hin n yi kni n sahi yi, ma zhin atna shi mi ɓa mi ma vi akunnu n na ɓe kniyi eyi adini nya.
Ama nya ho a zhin. Gama tunyi to ai mamin Shekwoyi ɓo la mi kni ma ze wo nya, wa yimi, n ye-ye dnagmayi n alheri yi.
Wa wu owo ɓi n mi mi, n na bai ma lo a byedo aba, mi wu ɓa Nabari manayi Yesu nya. Sanu n ɓeye ɓei zhin lo nu n mi-i, mi to ɓei lo zaho-zahoi aba ma wu won.
Mito ɓei lo Urushelima ma wu aza lafiya, nɓa ɓei zhin abara n mi abye nyin.
Mi to ɓei lo Urushelima n, sai n aye ngun ata avun, ma gye Bitrus, ma dna nɓo n woi anyipyei n gun awo-cei-atnu.
Bara gmanyi n mi ɓei jegye n sahi, owo nu zhin Yakubu, Yesu mado.
(Fye wo oɓo n mi gna fye nyi gama mi gna fye ɓeye n Shekwoyi awyeba nu. Nyanyi n kwo ɓei zhin, mi ta ce akata nu fi fye n.)
N ziyaraye avun ma lo Suriya n Kilikiyayi.
Har nsayi a Yahudiya yi a Yesu viyi to ɓei kpe shi mi wun.
Nya nɓa ɓei bwa kpe gmanyi, kwonu ge ɓa ɓei wo aza ɓai cige, “Oza n wo ɓei zhin yi nuwun yi nyi. Wo zhin gaiciya ga hi nu waʼazi n sayi, n wo bei ye wa wunkwo ya nyi.”
Ɓa ga Shekwoyi mwa-mwa ntu mi ɓo.
N aye awo-cei-anyi avun, ma, jeze lo Urushelima n gnisun n Barnabas yi n Titus yi.

Mi ɓei lo nɓo n tnu-tnuyi nu n Shekwoyi ɓo tun mi, mi-i gna ema zaje nya n Shekwoyi zhin lo n abyedo aba. Mi ɓei ku ɓoda n na tukwoda yi n nya tukwo n mi zhin kwo waʼazi, mi zhin nubo ɓa ɓei ku kpe ɓeye n mi da ɓa.
Ɓa ku ye, ɓa to ɓei damu ko ɓa cige, Tutus emi tnu-tnu kun-zhin yi, a zhin wo kaciyan, ko da yake wo zhin ebyedo nu.

Ko ma, ɓenya deye pya to ɓei ɓa ɓen, sai dai aza n ɓa yi ɓahin ge a Yesu viyi, a Yesu viyi a katai n ɓa ɓe, ɓa pmi ɓe gye n yi zhin, ɓa gye a gmada pya n yi n cei dna n Yesu, ko yi shi a Yahudiyi awyidna bwa lo. Ɓa zhin atna ɓa payi gyi n ɓa wyidna n gye a fyenu pa zhi na gmayi.
Ama, yi to ɓei kna ɓa tnubuan kwo fyewyi, gama yi to ɓei n cei pma fya gye ge a bwa gni-gni dna n kaciya zhin mi nun, kwo a Yahudiyi awyidna bwa shin.

A ikklisiya tukwoda dnagmayi ɓei zhi ɓo, ama ɓa to ɓei bwa enya n ɓa ɓaɓe n mi waʼazin (Ko-dayake ɓa zhin a tukwoda dnagmayi nu ɓa to zhin nya ho nu n mi aban, gama eyi vinya yi zhin gmanyi-gmanyi nu n Shekwoyi aba).

Ɓehin-hin, sanu Bitrus, Yakubu n Yohanna yi n na kpeɓaye n ge ɓa zhin aza dnagmayi nu fi n ikklisiya, ɓei gye shi Shekwoyi wa zhin apma n miyi n na abyedo gni-gni, shi wo ɓei zhin apma n Bitrus yi wa zhin a Yahudiyi waʼazi nyi, ntuge Shekwoyi gmanyi nu ɓei gayi nyaga ye pya, ɓa ga yi bugba kala ge yi gyi abye n waʼazi zhin yi n na byedo aba. Ɓahin ce, ɓa gyi abye n cei n na Yahudiyi aba.
Enya gmanyi n ɓa ɓei gayi shaula tu kwo tukwo okonuge, yi pa awyekwoyi ɓo, emihin ce ai wo mi pwa lo nu.
Ama sa n Bitrus ɓei ɓe Antakiya, ma lanu n woi pei-pei, ntu nya ɓo n wo ɓei zhin ntuge kwo to ɓei bmiyan.

Ntuge sanu n wo ɓei kmi ɓe, wo ɓei gyi nyagyi n na abyedo yi a Yesu viyi nɓata zhin kaciya zhinyin ko na Yahudiyi awyidna m. Ama n navun sanu n a Yahudiyi Yakubu a nugundo ɓei ɓe, to wa shan nyagyi gyi n na abyedo yin, ntuge wo ɓei wo eɓo dna n na Yahudiyi aɓe kniyi ye ɓa da, n ɓa gna ge dole nu a zhin kaciya oza kpe gni-gni bwa.
Nnavun, a Yahudiyi a Yesu viyi ɓaku ze a munafici da har n Barnaba yi ɓe, ɓa zhin ɓo n Bitrus ɓei zhin nyi ko da yake ɓa kpe ɓeye lo n kwo bmiya.

Sanu n mi ɓei gye ɓo n ɓa zhin, maku gye ɓata zhin ɓelo n kwo kuncen, ko ɓa vi gaiciya Nabari manayi nyan, ma gna Bitrus n na aza bye, “Kwo da yake Yahudiyi nu na maho, sala mwa shi ho ɓei ya a Yahudiyi kunnu, ho zhin wuna na hoi zhin abyedo a Yesu viyi ɓai vi abeye njesun a?
A Yahudiyi nu na maho n miyi, yito zhin abyedo aɓo nukwoyi zhin yi nun.

Yi kpelo ge eyi a Yahudiyi a Yesu viyi, yi ta bwa gni-gni n Shekwoyi aba ntu n ɓa kni ɓon. Ama gaiciya ga gmanyi n Yesu Kristi, kwa zhan yi alaifi ya. Ntu cenu yi kpema Yesu Kristi n na bai Shekwoyi wa gwo yi ntu gaiciya ɓo, to ge ya shi a Yahudiyi awyidna bwan. Ntuge zaho to lo n wo ɓa pwo n tu ɓa bwa shi ɓon.

“Ama kni nu ɓa zhin eyi gaiciyaga, n Kristi to gni yin ma, sai a zhin yi kaciya ya shi a Yahudiyi awyidna bwa? Yi ta cige gaiciya ga n Yesu kuyi zhin agman? Shekwoyi to ye oza zhin nubo lonu, tu n yi Dagayi tukwon.
Ai, yi zhin a laifi da nu, yi ya je anya kwo-kwo yi mi n yi la ɓa laya nyi, ko ya zhin atna ge ya shan gni-gni bwa, ntu n na Yahudiyi awyidna bwashi ɓo.
Gama dna n Shekwoyi ɓeda ba nu, n ma kpe ge mita bwa Shekwoyi gni-gni dna n mi kukari zhin, n mi kalagbayi ge ma shi awyidna bwan. Ma kpe ge Shekwoyi go oza nu n wo ga Kristi gaiciya.

“Alami zundu n gnisun n Yesu yi, emi n mihin mito ye lon, ama Kristi nu dnalo n sayi ye n mi-mi. Wye-wyeyi hin-hin n mi ncei lo-lo dna n nayi ye n saiye nyi, kwa ɓe ntuge ma ga Shekwoyi Nugun gaiciya nu, n wa yemi wa gawo wyewyeyi ntu n mi ɓo nyi.
Mito dna lo, n na aza nɓa ta gye Kristi efi ngye nyaho nu nyin. Gama n gye yi ɓei ɓa pwo ntu n na awyidna bwa shi ɓo. Kristi to ɓei ɓa shan fin.”
O, a Galatiyayi, aza tna cei. Nyikadonu na dna fye kwoce ye, woi zhin fye ɓo n sun layiʼa? Gama fye ɓei zhin fyei gye Yesu Kristi efi pei-pei, n gye ma wufe hoto n Yesu yi tu woi fi tu n zundu.
Miye ma nya fye ɓo gmanyi, “Fye ɓei gwo Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi ntu n na awyidna bwashi ɓo nu?” Awo, gama Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi ɓei ɓe fye mi, fyei ku Kristi ɓo wo, fyei ku wo ga gaiciya ntu ge wa gni fye.

Fye ku je a cinu? Gama dnan na a tnazhin ge fya shi a Yuhudiyi awyidna bwa, fye to bwa wye-wyeyi Zafun nyan n kmisunyi n, fye zhin nubo n wuna nu ge oɓa bwashi nsaiye nu ɓa zhin fya ze a Yesu viyi a kalada?
Fye ku wahala sin n mwa ntu n Nabari manayi ɓo. Fye ye fya ya kwo nu nsayi? Kwo dnami ɓelo ma gace gaiciya.

Ma nya fye ɓo njesun, Shekwoyi wa ga fye Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi iko wa zhin aɓo a wo-woyi n fya ba ntuge fye shi a Yahudiyi awyidna nu bwa? Awo, ceto wolo nun, kwo nyi nsa nu fya ga Kristi gaiciya fya kpema wo.
Ibrahim ɓei bwa zhin n lonu. Shekwoyi ɓei gna ge wo kunce lo wa lo she ntuge wo ɓei ga Shekwoyi alkawali gaiciyanu.
Fye gye deye, nge Ibrahim aɓi a hin-hin vinya ɓa nu zhin aza nɓa ga Shekwoyi gaiciya ɓai kpema wo cewo.

Knido nu shan sun a? Littafi ɓei shi esa ye nu awye n Shekwoyi ɓa gni abyedo ntu ɓa gaiciya ga ɓo. Shekwoyi ɓei ku ce gna Ibrahim tunyi n sapai ge, “Miɓa tu aza anabarka nɓa fi n kni doho-doho n ɓa gami gaiciya, shi fye gami nyi.” Kwo wulonu, aza n ɓa ga Kristi gaiciya ɓa bwa anabarka shi Ibrahim ɓei bwa nyi.
E, Aza n ɓa kpema a Yahudiyi awyidna ɓa gni ɓa, ɓa filo n Shekwoyi knitu sinta gama litafi a ku da pei-pei, “Ekni n za tukwo n wa bma owa ye ya, n kwo kafi n Shekwoyi Littafi Owa nya nyi.”

A ku wuyi pei-pei ge, za to lo n wo ɓa bwa Shekwoyi alheri ntuge wo shi a Yahudiyi awyidna bwan, ntuge Shekwoyi ku luda ge zokwo n yi ɓa bwa gni-gni, konu zhin gaiciya ga. Shi Anabi Habaku ɓei da nge, “Oza n wa bwa wye-wyei, wo ɓa bwa ko dna n gaiciya ga nu n Shekwoyi.”
Gaiciya ga zokwo wulo gbo n na wyidna zokwoyi, n kwo gna nge a gni za n wa shi Shekwoyi awyidna bwa vinya, “to woi bma ko gmanyi yan.

Ama Kristi n la yi si, woi layi kunya n zokwo ɓednayi ye, woi la yi knitu ɓenukwoyi zhinya tu n wohin tukwo. Gama a cei kafi n littafi. Knitu n za ba n na zun wo du tu n shinwa.” Shi a ɓei zun Yesu du tu n zundu shinwa nya nyi.

Nsaiye, Shekwoyi ɓa tu abyedo anabarka, n anabarka yi n wo ɓei zhin Ibrahim alkawali nyi, Eyi vinya n yi zhin a Kristi viyi, yi ɓa bwa Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi n na zhin yi wo alkawali nyi, ntu gaiciya ga ye ɓo.
Emi azaje ye-yei kwo dna n yi asese mi, esa oza ku alkawali zhin zado aku kwo ka, a bwatu, wota shan kwo don, Wota shan nubo zhin n na vun wa shan kwo don.
Nsaiye, Shekwoyi ɓei ga Ibrahim alkawali o wo ɓiyi, waku kpe nge ato cige owo aɓin ngye a daɓo n wo aɓiyi vinyan – a Yahudiyi–ama aɓei daɓo ga wo Ɓi–Wato Kristi.

Nya nyi n mi da. Shekwoyi ɓei zhin alkawali nge wo ɓa gni aza n ɓa ga gaiciya, Waku kwo kakpe, wa bwa tu, ato ɓei ɓa mi a shan kwo do kwo a wun kwo ya n aye tagyi ngun anyi-cei-kpe shita avun, n Shekwoyi ɓei ga awyidna ngun awo nyin.
Ngye awyidna yi bwashi ɓei ɓa gni yi, kwa wunu ge zokwo do nu gbo n za ɓa bwa Shekwoyi alheri n Ibrahim nyayi. Ntuge wo ɓei gwo Shekwoyi alkawali nu kawai.

To, knihi ɓo zhin a ga awyidna yeʼa? A ɓei ɓe ɓa n na alkawali avun nu, kwa wu aza shi ɓa bma Shekwoyi awyidna ya. Ama zokwo ye ɓei ɓe har esanu n Kristi ɓa ɓe n cei, Eɓi n Shekwoyi ɓei zhin kwo alkawali (Ko kaka yi lo fyewyi, Shekwoyi ɓei ga wo amalaika nu owo awyidna ɓa ga Musa wa ka za ga.)
Ama esa n Shekwoyi ɓei ga Ibrahim owo alkawali wo ɓei ga wo n wo gmanyi nu, a malaika ko Musa to ɓei zhi ɓon. Zaho to ɓei dna n ɓa tasin.

To, Shekwoyi awyidna nwo alkawaliyi ɓa zhin gaba lo n na ajei nu? Awo, kwo to wolo nun. Yi ɓei gna yi ɓa bwa gni-gni n na awyidna bwashi ɓo, Shekwoyi to ɓei ɓa shan zokwo do ga n kwo ɓa gni yi n laifi akun. Ntuge littafi ku da ge, yi zhin laifi afyenu nu vinya. Zokwo gmanyi n yi ɓa kun nkwo, okwonu zhin gaiciya ga n Yesu Kristi. Zokwo pwo-pwo nya guya gni lo ntu oza ɓo n wo ɓa ga gaiciya.
Sai esa n Kristi ɓei ɓe, owa nu ɓei zhin yi guyi, kwoi kai wye har sa n yi ɓa ga anyi Gniyi gaiciya.
Mi ɓa dakwo lai, a Yahudiyi owa nu ɓei zhin yi nyawuyi kwoi wuyi zokwo sai sa n Kristi wa ɓe wa gayi agni-gni manayi n Shekwoyi abye dna n yi gaiciya ga.
Ama shi Kristi la ɓe nyi, yito n na pma yi lo n owa yin, kwa wu yi zokwo lo wo abam.
Gama nsaiye yi zhin Shekwoyi aɓi nu, dna n gaiciya ga n Yesu Kristi.
Eyi n na kuyi zhin baptisma fi n Kristi nyi, akuyi sofi n Kristi mi.
Yi to shan a Yahudiyi nu zhin, kwo a Heleniyi, kwo a fyenu, kwo a puwa dan, kwo a zanugbayi kwo anyikwozan, ama a Yesu viyi, yi zhin gmanyi nu dna n Kristi Yesu.
Nsaiye she yi ku zhin Kristi nya nyi, yi ku ze Ibrahim ayawyi. Shekwoyi alkawali n wo ɓei zhin wo nyi ɓa zhin yi nya nu n sayi.
Ama fye pa ge n za dada fi, wafa nyabwa dnagmayi ya zhi wo ɓi, n woto mwan, ɓihi to du fyenu lon, sai wola mwa koda-yake, anya vinya n wo dada ɓei fa nyi ɓa zhin wa nyanu.
Tile wa zhin ɓo n wa guyi a gna wo ge wo zhin, sai wo la si ʼye n wo dada ɓei da.
Kwo ɓei wu lonu n yi-i kafin Kristi wo ɓe, Yi ɓei zhin a Yahudiyi awyidna, n na ɓo kni yi afyenu nu, ntuge yi ɓei gye ge ɓa ɓa mi ɓa gni yi nu.
Ama sa n sa manayi ɓo la si, sa n Shekwoyi ɓei kni, wa tnu n wo Nugun yi n nyikwoza ba, n na Yahudiyi mi.
Wa si lo-loya gayi n yi ɓei zhin kwo afyenu nyi, n nabai wa zeyi wa ʼɓi.
Ntuge yi zhin wa ʼɓi nu, Shekwoyi la tnu n wo Nugun Zafun yi n yi abugba mi, ntu cenu yi ɓa mi ya yi Shekwoyi ge eyi Dada ye-ye yi.
Yito ye shan a bara nu zhin, ama Shekwoyi aɓi. Shi yi zhin wa ʼɓi nu nyi, nya wo cei vinya kwo zhin yi nya nu, gama nya nu Shekwoyi wa zhin shiri.
Kafin ofye abyedo fye kpe Shekwoyi ye, fye ɓei zhin ashan afyenu nu n ɓa to n wye-wyei nyin.

Ama nsaiye shi fyela Shekwoyi bwa nyi (ko miɓa cige Shekwoyi nku fye bwa) ko ɓa zhin wuna nu fya jeze n na vunyi, fya ze afyenu n jesun nya aba n kwo to n kalayin, wyekwoyi, adini n kwo to na pmayi n, fyei zhin a tna fya lo she ntu owa bwashi ɓo?
Fye zhin atna fya bwa Shekwoyi agmada n nya yi n fye zhin, kwo nfye ta zhin m, n na anyipyeyi hoyi, ko apya ho, ko ayeho yi m.
Edna wo mi lo ntu fye ɓo. Edna wo mi lo, kwo emi tnu-tnu vinya n fya ba ɓa ze gbeloyi.

Omi azaje ye-yeyi, a wo mi lo ngye fye ku ze ngye mi, fya wo shi a wo mi lo tu aɓeye tukwo, gama mi kni-kniyi lo n na agma ye shi fye ɓei kni-kniyi nyi. Fye to ɓei ci mi wyegba esa n mi ɓei kmi fye waʼazi zhin nyi m.
Ko dayake, nyasan ɓei san mi esa n mi ɓei kmi fye ɓe n Nabari manayi Kristi nya yi nyi.
Ko da shike emi nyasan ɓei dami n fyei fye to ɓei nami aɓo fya nya mi yan. Awo, fye ɓei lami fya zhin mi ɓo ngye Shekwoyi malaika ko ngye Yesu Kristi n wohin.
Zafun agmada nya gni na n yi i ɓei gni bwa nyi a? Gama mi kpe lo n na anyipyei hi fye ɓei ɓa kun fya wye n na agmadai fya ga mi–fye ɓei gna fya gye kwo n bmazhinyi n ma ba.
Nsaiye, mila ze fye nunɓayi nu, shi ma gna fye gaiciya.
A malami a katai n ɓa ye fye n tu n fye nyabwa ɓo nu nyi, ɓata zhin ce ntu fye bmazhin ɓo nun. Nya n ɓa zhin atna ɓa zhin nyi, ɓa ye ɓa ka fye ya n minu, n na bai fya wo ɓanu.
Kwo zhin ɓemana nu aza ye fye, n ɓa ye fye n na bugba manayi n bugbayi gmanyi, ngye ɓata ye fye ntuge mi kunsun lo nfyei nun.
O, emi aɓi, fye knimi cilo, mi gni miyi gye azhin shi gye n ɓiya zhi wa gye, woi pmi wa ma ɓi nyi. Mi-i pmi sa n na ɓei nu fye n Kristi yi nyi.
Awo mi lo ngye miye gnilo n fyei to ma shan ɓeda layin, ama ntu na ba kpa mwa ɓo layi, mita kpe ɓeye lo n mi ɓa zhin.
Fye wo mi ɓeda, efye a nugundo n fye zhin nubo ge, sai za shi awyidna bwanu za pwo nyi, knido nu zhin to fyei ɓa nya awyidna ye awyega ɓon ma?
Gama a cei kafi, Ibrahim ɓei n na ɓiyi ngun aba, gmanyi owo nyiko bara ɓi, gmanyi owo nyikwo la-layi ʼɓi.
Nyaho to lo n kwo zhin nukwoyi lo n owo nyikwo bara ɓiyin. Ama aɓo ma nyikwo la-layi ɓi n Shekwoyi alkawali avun nu ge wo ɓa tnu n woi.

Nsaiye, nabari gaiciya nya ye zhin yi misali nu n Shekwoyi a zokwoyi n gun aba n wo bma za zhin. Wo ɓei zhin ce n Sinai pe sanu n wo ɓei ga Musa awyidna ngun awo. A Larabawa yi Sinai pe nge Hajaratu pe; dna n mi misali, Ibrahim nyikwo bara ɓi zhin Urushelima nu, a Yahudiyi yi nɓa vi zokwoyi nyi ɓanu zhin bara ɓi.
Amaeyi zhimi zhin Urushelima eshe nya nu, kwoi to zhin a Yahudiyi aɓo kni fyenu nun.

Nyanu n Ishaya ɓei da sanu n wo ɓei zhin anabci ncei ge, “Nsaiye fye ɓa mi fya dagma. Lama, ho ɓa fi aku n na agmadai koda yake hoto shin ʼɓi man. Ntuge miye ma ga ho aɓi nu n mwa begye, ndu do n ho nyikwo-fyenu ɓei n cei.”
Efye n miyi, emi azaje, eyi nu zhin aɓi n Shekwoyi ɓei zhin alkawali, shi wo ɓei zhin Ishaku nya nyi.

Ntu cenu, eyi n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi la yi ma nyi, yi sin wahala n aza kun n ɓa ye ya shi a Yahudiyi awyidna bwa nyi. She Ishaku oɓi alkawali nya bei sin wahala n smailu akun n wo nu ɓo zhin fyenu nyikwo-ɓi nyi.
Ama littafi a da ge, Shekwoyi ɓei gna Ibrahim ge, wo la fyenu-nyikwo n wo eɓi yi nyaya, ntu ge fyenu-nyikwo ɓi ta gyi Ibrahim puwa gado n kni gado yi n gnisun n nyikwo la-layi ʼɓi yin.
Emi azaje, yito zhin afyenu aɓinun, n yi ɓa vi a Yahudiyi awyidnan, ama nyikwo la-layi aɓi nu, aza a gwo-gwoi n Shekwoyi aba ntu gaiciyaga ɓo.
Ntu cenu, Kristi la yi loya. Fye ku kpe ɓehin-hin, ge fye filo n yanci ye to fya je fyehin pa fi n na Yahudiyi aɓokni n na knunu yin.
Fye kna tnubua, ntuge ɓeye zhin ɓo dnagmai nu, ngye fye ye kpe lo n Kaciya zhin nu n na Yahudiyi awyidna bwa shi yi nu ɓa ze fya aza manayi n Shekwoyi abye, agye Kristi ta mi wa gni fyen.
Mi ɓa je ce da, oza n wa zhin atna wa bwa Shekwoyi bugba da ntu n kaciya ɓo n na Yahudiyi awyidna bwashi yi tile wa vi ɓa ɓo kni vinya kwo kuwa wa bwi.
Kristi to n na pmayi lo nfye aba n, ndei fye gye ge fye ɓa ku ta zo Shekwoyi gbanu kpa n na wyidna bwa-shi yin; fye ku bwi n Shekwoyi alheri aba.
Ama, dna n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi bma-zhin yi kpe ma Kristi ʼfi nu, wa kuyi alaifi ya, wa ze yi aza manayi n Shekwoyi aba.

Eyi, n Kristi la wye-wyei nyalo-nyalo nya gayi nyi, yi to n na apmai lo ya damu kwo yi kaciya yi zhin lon, ko yi shi a Yahudiyi awyidna bwa lon, ntuge nya n yi ye kwonu zhin gaiciya ga tnu-tnu dna n ye-ye.
Fye ɓei zan-zan cewo, nykado nu la ɓo dna fye do, to fyei ɓa shan gaiciya vi ma?
Shekwoyi nu to wu fye lonun, ntuge owo nu na yi fye woi lo fye ya dna Kristi.
“Ama zanukwoyi gmanyi nu, n fye mi n wa wun fye ya.”
Mi kpe ma Dagayi nu wa je fye ze ɓe cei, fya vi a ɓeye shi mi vnyi. Shekwoyi ɓa zhin n zahi yi, kwo nyikadona n wo dami n fyei woi dna fye kwoce nyi.

Azaho gnalo ge, mi zhin kaciya, n na Yahudiyi awyidna yi waʼazi lo, nge ɓa zhin ɓe shi-shi-yi nu n gni-gni zokwo. To, ngye mi zhin cenu waʼazi, ata shan mi wahala gan, ntuge waʼazi ye ta kni zaho-zahoi bugban. Wahala n na ga mi nyi kwa wu nu ge, mi zhin gni-gni dna n gaiciya ga n Kristi zundu gmanyi nu waʼazi.
Mi cei pma lo, a malami nɓa dami n fyei nge fye sa fye nayi ya n kaciya yi, ɓa ɓa ka n fye to ɓaye zhin dmi n fyei m.
Emazaje, ala loloya ga fye, to ge loloya fya zhin ɓenukwo yin, ama loloya fya ye na jei fya bma je zhin.
Gama owa vinya dna n wyidna gmanyi ye, “Fye ye na zajei, shi fye ye n fyehin tukwoyi,”
Ama ndei maimakon fye wu ye-ye, fye ce fyei wu anya n na jei, fyei wun aje nu, fye zhin peceiye. Fye zhin peceiye n na jebwi yi.
Mi ga fye shaula, fye vi Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi ɓowu nu, wo ɓa gna fye aba nfye ɓa lo n nyai n fye ɓa zhin, n lonu fye ta zhin ɓenukwoyi zhin nfye nayi nukwoyi ye fya zhin.

Gama yi gna ye ya zhin ɓo n yi nayi a gnayi ge yi zhin, gbo n nyai n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi ye ya zhin. Anya manayi n Zafun ye ya zhin ɓa wu gbo n nyai n nayi ye ya zhin. Anya deye ngun aba n ɓafi n yi nayi nyi, ɓa sunkun na jei n na bai ɓa gyi nasara n yi tukwo, ɓai gna ya ɓomwi gna-gna.
Sanu Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi wa wu fye zokwo fye to n apmai lo fyavi a Yahudiyi aɓeknin.
Ama nfya vi fyehin ɓeye, fye ɓa zhin aɓenukwoyi ye, aɓonubozhin nukwoyi, shakpe nukwoyi aɓo awyeda nya.
Shangba, alijanu bauta zhin, aza wyegbaci n ɓa to zhin honyan, nuwun n gusun yi, eshe n minagyi yi, n atnazhin yi.
Eshe anya pwawo nya, zawu, jesin, n na wyefan kasa yi, n na ɓe deye pyai vinya. Ma gna fye njesun shi mi ɓei shin fye gna, oza n wo zhin aɓeye vinya wo ta lo Shekwoyi bemin.
Ama, n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi nu gyi be tu n yi tukwo wo ɓa ɓe n na aɓeye pyai n yi mi. Yeye, bugba-buyi, bugba fu, hakuri azaye n cei ɓemana zhin.
Ɓefyece, zawanshi, peceiye. Aɓeye vinya ta zhin gaba lo na Yahudiyi aɓeknin yin.
Aza nɓa zhin Kristi nya ɓa ku nayi zundu n kwa shakpei vinyan kpe nwo zundu.
N yi sase lo nsaiyei n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi iko yi, yi vi Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi ɓowun n yi asese vinya.
Nnavun yi ta shan mwa-mwa zanshin akpeyiye na za ba nkwo ɓe nshewo yi nyim.
Omi azaje, ndei Yesu viyi wa zhin laifi ho, ofye nfye ce zhi n Gyi-gyi-yi nyi, fya bma wo zhin fya jeze ɓe n woi, n na atnayi n zokwo manayi, fyei pa nfyehin ge kpekni nsu fye ɓei ka laifi zhin.
Fye wo aje akaya, fya bma aje zhin dna n wahala, kwo damuwa, nlonu fye vi yi Dagayi owa.
N zaho gye ge wo du wyi lo wa zhin lonu, wo dna wohin kwoce nu, wo to zhin nyaho nun.
Zaho-zahoi la tabata ge wo zihn hakuri lo n ɓemana zhin, n na bai nu n wo ɓa bwa bugba da, to wa zhin atna wa mwi wohin do n zado yin.
Ozaho-zahoi n yi mi tile wa lawo alaifi kaya, ntuge zaho to lo n wo nu ngun awon.
Aza n na wuɓa Shekwoyi ɓeda kow bimya ɓa bma ʼɓa malami zhin ɓa gba wo.
Fye to ye a dna fye kwocen, fye pa, hota ya Shekwoyi na vun yi fya bwa lafiya n. Oza ɓa bwa nyanu do nwa bye.

Nwa bye ge wa fu wohin aɓo pwawo nukwoyi bugba nu, wo ɓo bye nyabye nukwoyi nu, woi ɓo do nya ɓwodo zafun nya n ʼfiyi. Ama nwa bye nyabye manayi Zafun nya wo ɓa do wye-wyei nyalo-nyalo nya. N Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi ɓa gawo.
Ato ɓeyi n ɓemana zhin yin, gma safyewyi yi ɓa do anabarka n yi to bma bugbaya ya fan.
Cenu zhin esa vinya n yi ɓami ya bma aza zhin, tun ba ga eyi a Yesu viyi aje.
Miɓa kma ɓedaye ka n mi abwayi fye gye shi mi kanya nsun-sun.
Ofye amalami hi nɓa zhin atna ɓa zhin fye fya zhin kaciya nyi, ɓa zhin lonu ntu n nya gmanyi ɓo nu: N na bai n na ɓa kpeɓa ye, to ɓa sin wahala ɓai ya ye ge Kristi zundu gmanyi nu gni azan.
A Malami hi nɓa vi kaciya nyi, ɓa ta shi a Yahudiyi awyidna bwan, ama, ɓaye fya zhin kaciya n nabai ɓa zhin aɓokwo nge fye zhin ɓa bara nu.
Nmi aba dai Shekwoyi kiyaye ma mwa mihin tukwo, sai dai dna Dagayi Yesu Kristi zundu mi. Ntu ge n zundu aba nu emi shakpe anyi da nya ɓei la duya tunyi n sapa, anyi ɓoda n kwo dna-mi nyi ɓola fi.
Kwo to shan do lo m, kwo ai ya zhin yi kaciya ko to ai zhin yin, oɓo dnagmayi gmanyi kwonu ge, kwo alai shan ma, yi ku ze aza woi-woi.
Shekwoyi sun-sungye n bugba fuyi ɓa kunsun n fyei, nfye wan zokwoye na zayi nɓa zhin Shekwoyi a nya na baho-bahoi vinya.
Nsaiye, fye to shan dami n miyi ntu n na ɓeye tukwon, gama mi n na aci gusayi kpelo n mi nayi n na Yesu anuwun yi ɓei lumi ntu n wo ɓo, kwa wunu ge mi zhin wo fyenu nu.
Omi azaje ye-yei, Eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi alheri ɓa kunsun n fyei vinya. Amin.
Eyi anugundo a Yesu viyi n fye fi n Afisusu, fyei vi Dagayi ɓo cici nyi, miɓi fye gna lo. Bulus nu ka ga fye, n Shekwoyi wa kniwo wa ze Yesu Kristi tnu-tnuyi nyi.
Fa owo anabarka n bugba fuyi ɓa ze fye nya, n Shekwoyi eyi Dada tnu n cei n Yesu Kristi eyi Dagayi nyi.
Yi ci Shekwoyi lo, eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi Dada n wa tuyi anabarka n anabarka doho-dohoi n shemi, ntuge yi zhin Kristi a nya nu.
Tunyi n sapa, to ai zhin anyi n, Shekwoyi wa kni yi n na bai ya ze wo nya, ntuge wa zeyi aza agyi-gyiyi n wo awyeba, ntna laifi, eyi n yi gni-agni zhi n wo abye n wo ye-yei pwi.
Owo shiri, tna do shanyi nu nyi wa ze yi owo aɓi, cenu a zhin wa tnu Yesu Kristi yi wafi ntu yi ɓo. Wa zhin ce ntuge wo ɓei n cei pma nu.
Mwa-mwa n Shekwoyi aba ntu n wo alheri ɓo n wo ye-yei nwa zeya puyi, ntuge yi zhin owo Nugun ye-ye yi aɓi nu.
Owo alheri mwa lo n yi aba har wa eyi alaifi kuya n wo Nugun ami yi, oza n wa gni yi nyi.
Woi la owo alheri mwa-mwayi ze kpeyi. Gama wo kpeyi ye lo sarai n nya yi n kwo gna bmiya ntu yi ɓo n sayi vinya.
Shekwoyi ku owo asiri wu yi nkwo ɓei so shi, dalili n wa tnu n Kristi yi, enya n wa zhin shiri dna n sun-sun gye tunyi n sapa.
Owo nufi nu nyi, nge sanu nsa lasi wo ɓa yei zhi n gnisun, aba n yi nyi vinya n eshe kwo n anyi, ya gnisun n woi dna Kristi nyalo-nyalo.
Ntu nya ɓo n Kristi n ku zhin, yi ku ze a cauta n Shekwoyi aba n ɓa da wo agma, gama dna n Shekwoyi shiri wo ɓei kni yi tunyi n sapa, aɓo vinya ɓei zhin shiwo ɓo zhin shiri nu.
Shekwoyi ɓeye vinya kwonu ge ya la Shekwoyi tu, ya gawo mwa-mwa ntu n na aɓo a yakwo ye nwa zhin yi nyi, n yi zhin aza kmisunyi n ɓa ga Kristi gaiciya nyi.

Ntu nya ɓo n Kristi wa zhin nyi, ofye vinya ce n fya wo nabari manayi shi oza ɓa pwo, fya ga Kristi gaiciya nyi, a tufye eze n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi ge fye zhin Kristi nya nu, oza n na ɓei zhin wo alkawali ga a Yesu viyi nyi.

Owo ase-se n yi mi zhin Shekwoyi tuze nu ge, wo ɓa gayi anya vinya n wa zhin yi alkawali, Zafun ase-se n yi mi wuyi ge Shekwoyi la yi lu si, wa ɓe yi n wohin tukwo aba, dalili nyi n jesun n kwo ɓa zhin ya ci yi Shekwoyi.
Cenu zhin, tunyi esa n mi ɓei wo fye gaiciya ga ɓo dna n Dagayi Yesu, n ye-yei nfye wu a Yesu viyi n nna aba vinya nyi.

Mito fa Shekwoyi godiya zhinɓo ntu fye ɓon. Mi zhin fye aduwa n esai vinya mi-i nya Shekwoyi, Dagayi Yesu Kristi Dada, wa ga fye ɓeyekpe, fya gye dei-dei, fya bwa awyega kwo nyikado nu zhin Kristi a, n na aɓei vinya n wo ku zhin fye nyi.

Mi zhin aduwa, n na bai of ye abugba ɓa bwa buzangna, n na bai nfye ɓa gye nya wye n na bye, n wo yi fye fya gni nya bwa n wo yi nyi. Miye fya kpe ge Shekwoyi la ze nyabwai, ntu ge eyi n yi zhin Kristi a nya nyi aku yi gawo.
Mi zhin aduwa ge fye ɓa ya awyega bwa, shi owo iko nyi ge kwa bma aza zhin nu nɓa gawo gaiciya.
Iko dnagmayi ye nu bwa jesun n kwo ɓei la Kristi kala n efi, kwa se wo ase tu n Shekwoyi bwai-zhe-bwa n eshe.
Ndu esu doho-dohoi, kwo abegyiyi doho-dohoi. E, owo mwamwa du zaho-zahoi nya lo, n na anyi ye kwo anyi do n ɓaye ɓeɓelo nyi.
Shekwoyi ku anya fi n wo apita sinta woi lawo ze Tukwoda ikklisiya nya vinya.
Nkwo zhin wo nayi nyi n nu-nuyi n wohin tukwoyi Tukwoda n Nyagayi doho-dohoi nya, abaho-bahoi.
Nsa dohoi fye ɓei fi n Shekwoyi knitu sinta, n zunkni zhi nyalonyalo ntu n fye alaifi ɓo.
Fye ɓei gni zan-zan n begye yi, n gye azaje, n nu-nuyi n na laifiyi, fyei zhin Satan ɓeye, esu dnagmayi anyi bmana nya, n wo zhin tnu-tnu lo n saiye n na aza bugba, n ɓa zhin gaba n Dagayi nyi.

Yi ɓei wu lo nu n sapai, eyi ase-se yi wu enya n kwo dna n yi mi, yi zhin aɓo nukwoyi doho-hohoyi shi eyi a shakpe, kwo eyi a nubo zhin nukwoyi gnayi. Yi ɓei ya n tna bmiya yi shi a ɓei mayi n nayi nukwoyi, nfi n Shekwoyi minagyi sinta ngye zaho-zahoi.
Ama Shekwoyi n sun-sun gye mwa, wa yeyi n mwa.
Kwo da yake, yi ɓei fi-fiyi n zafun, akni zun yi ntu eyi alaifi ɓo, wa ga yi eyi a wye-wyei n jesun esanu n wo ɓei la Kristi kala n efi, ntu n wo ye-ye ɓo nu yi ku gni-gni bwa.
Wa kuyi kala n vingwo fi n mwa-mwa n gnisun n Kristi yi. Aba n yi sase n gnisun n woi n eshe mi, ntu nya ɓo n Yesu Kristi ɓei zhin nyi.
Nsaiye Shekwoyi ɓa mi wa wuyi misali shi wo alheri mwa, n gye shi wa wuyi dna n nya n wa zhin gayi, dna n Yesu Kristi nyi.
Ntu n wo alheri ɓo ala fye gni, n tu gefya ga Kristi gaiciya, gaiciya ga n kwo nyi kwo to zhin efye nya nu n, kwo zhin Shekwoyi cauta nu n wa ga fye.
Gni-gni to zhin lada, ntu ɓemana zhin ɓo nun, n ya zhin n ntu cenu, zaho-zahoi to kunce lo a sawo ami da cen.
Shekwoyi nu na zhin yi, yi ze anya n yi ku ze n saiye nyi, woi gayi wye-wyeyi dna n Kristi Yesu. Tunyi n sapa nu n wa zhin shiri ye, ntu ge ya bma azaje zhin dna n wye-wyeyi ye, n yi la bwa nyi.

Fye to ze amwi n ge nsapai fye ɓei zhin aza nu n tna kaciya, a Yahudiyi ɓai yi fye ge aza nɓa ta wo Shekwoyi dnan, aza tna gyi-gyi (ama oɓa bugba ce, ɓei ye tu cegye koda yake ɓa ɓei zhin ɓai zhin aɓo ngye a Shekwoyi dnawo yi, gama ɓa ɓei zhin ɓai zhin kaciya, tuze nu nge ɓa zhin Shekwoyi anya.)
Fye pa ge nsapai fye ɓei nyi n tna Yesu, fye ɓei zhin Shekwoyi aɓi nuwunyin nu, woi to ɓei zhin fye alkawalin n wo ɓa bma fye zhin ma, fye ɓei ku bwi n tna Shekwoyi, n tna awyetu.
Ama nsaiye, fye zhin Yesu Kristi anya nu, kwo shi kwo nyi fye ɓei mwa kpa n Shekwoyi, n saiye aku ɓe n fyei vi-viyi n woi, ntu n nya ɓo n Yesu Kristi wa zhin ga yi n wo amiyi nyi.
Gama Kristi nu zhin zokwo eyi bugba fu nya. Wo la yi ga jedoɓe na Yahudiyi yi n fyei abyedo, woi zeyi zaknayi aɓi, ngye shi wa ɓa nyakunpa ya n kwo ɓei n yi gna aje nyi.

Owo fi la nuwun gmiya, n kwo ɓei dna n yi atasin nyi, n na Yahudiyi awyidna ɓei ɓe n cei n na byedo bwayi gmi-gmi ya nyi, gama wa fi n na bai wa zo zokwo yi nu, wa ku aza n gun abaye n ɓa ɓei zhin ɓai zhin gaba n na ajeyi nyi, wa zeɓa owohin nya. Wato wo la yi ye ɓedo ya ze oza woi-woi gmanyi, n sayi bugbafu yi la ɓe.
Shi yi ku ze aga nayi gmanyi nya nyi, minagyi n kwo ɓei dna n na tasin nyi kwo ku zo, wo la yi ga jedoɓe n Shekwoyi, ngye shi wa fi tu n zundu ntu yi ɓo.
Woi la ɓe fye n Nabari manayi bugbafu nya yi efye abyedo, nfye ɓei mwa kpa n woi nyi, eyi a Yahudiyi yi ɓei wo viviyi n woi.
Nsaiye eyi vinya, ko Yahudiyi kwo abyedo, ɓami wa ɓe Shekwoyi Dada aba, n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi bmazhin yi, ntu n nya ɓo n Kristi ku zhin ga yi nyi.
Nsaiye fye to zhin a zhiɓei nu n Shekwoyi aban, kwo a zhiɓei n; eshen, ama fye zhin Shekwoyi apuwa da nu, Shekwoyi-kni aɓi, fye zhin Shekwoyi puwa azanu, n gnisun n a Yesu viyi ajei.
Fye gni agni kpe n sayi n nyakun goro manayi nu, atnu-tnuyi n na nabiyi. Nyakun bwakwonu kuta ho, Yesu Kristi nu n wohin tukwo yi.
Eyi n ya ga gaiciya nyi akuyi ɓedo peceiye n Kristi yi, n gye nyakun manayi n kwo mwa cici ntu Shekwoyi ɓo.
Akuyi ɓedo n woi n yi azajei dna n Zafun, yi-i ku ze Shekwoyi ase-se ba.
Omi Bulus Yesu Kristi fyenu, mi dyna n kurkuku ntu n fye ɓo nu, ntuge mi zhin waʼazi ge efye abyedo fye zhin Shekwoyi nya nu ce.
Lale fye kpelo ge, Shekwoyi la tnu-tnu ye gami, ma wu fye Shekwoyi alheri n fye aba, shi mi ɓei gna fye n mi wasika ho, Shekwoyi nu ɓei wumi shiri ye asiri nge abyedo filo ce n wo alheri.
Mi da deye ntuge fya kpe ge mikpe aɓei yelo vinya.
Nsapai Shekwoyi to ɓei wu wo shiri ye nwo aza aban, ama nsaiye wola kwo guya wu owo atnu-tnuyi n anabi yi dna n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi.

Asiriyi honyi, nge abyedo ɓa bwa oɓa robo dna n wo nyabwa ngyisun n Shekwoyi aɓiyi, ala ɓa gni, yi ɓa ze owo ikklisiya. Shekwoyi alkawali adnagmayi vinya zhin ɓa nya nu ce, dna n Kristi, sanu nɓa gwo Nabari manayi Kristi nya, n ɓei nwa zhin ga ɓa nyi.
Shekwoyi la esa manayi gami, ma gna aza owo shiri ye ɓo, woi la ikwo gami n kpezhin yi ma zhin kwo n bmiya.

Fye dnawye fa gye kwo shi ko nyi mito ɓei zhin ɓeho nu a gami kwon, emi nu nmi zhin. Yesu viyi gbeloyi n wolo n na anyi, dudu lonu a ɓei kni mi nu n na agmada manayi ye ɓo, ma gna abyedo Nabari Dagayi nyabwa n kwota shan zon, n kwo lo ntu n ɓa ɓo dna n Kristi nyi.
Ma wu aza vinya nge Shekwoyi nu zhin abyedo gniyi ce, shi oza n wa zhin anya vinya nyi, wa zhin shiri tunyi n sapa.
Ntu kniɓeyi a? Ntu ge wa wu abegyi yi n anyi bmana shi wo cecei, esa nu n agye owo aɓi a Yahudiyi n abyedo yi n ɓedo fi n wo ikklisiya.
N zokwo n wa zhinkwo shiri dna n Yesu Kristi eyi Dagayi nyi.
Nsaiye yi ɓa mi ya ɓe Shekwoyi aba cewo n tna edna, ya ɓe ntna bugba ashan-shan, sanu n ya ɓe n gaiciya ga yi dna Kristi.
Ntucenu fye to bma bugba ya ntu nyaɓo n ɓa zhin mi n ya nyin, Mi sin wahala ntu fye ɓonu, kwo bmiya lo fya gma fya bwa bugba kala ntu ce.
Sanu mapa owo ɓeyekpe ɓo nwo shiri mwa-mwa yi, ma ce akwo-kwo ma zhin aduwa ga Dada Ikklisiya nya.
Ma zhin aduwa ge dna n wo nyabwa dnagmayi n kwo ta shan zo nyin wo ɓa ga fye awyega n fye bugbami owo Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi nya.
Mi zhin aduwa n na bai Kristi wa dna nfye a bugba mi n mwa cici, wa sase dna n fye mi, shi fye gawo gaiciya. Fa fya mi zhi dna n Shekwoyi ye-ye ɓo wo-wo nya.

Fya mi fyabwa awyega shi Shekwoyi aɓi kunce ɓa bwa, ngye shi wo ye-ye nyi nkwo kpayi, nkwo pata yi, n kwo lo-loyi, n kwo lawu yi, fya wo ye-ye shan n fyehin, kwo da yake kwo mwa lo, nfye ta gye okwo abwa yazhi ban, kwo fya kpe kwo ye vinyan, nna bai n fye ɓa ze anu-nuyi n Shekwoyi n wohin tukwo.

Nsaiye, mwa-mwa n Shekwoyi aba, n wa lo tnu-tnu n wo ikwo dnagmayi n yimi, wo ɓami wa zhin enya ndu ngye shi yi ɓa mi ya nya, kwo ya nuna n duyi aduwa dnagmayi zhin, eyi aɓo pwawo nubo zhin, n ya awyetu yi.
Fye gawo mwa-mwa nyalo-nyalo ntu n wo shiri gni-gni nya ɓo, ntu ikklisiya ɓo dna n Yesu Kristi.
Mi gyi fye wye, emi nmi dna n kurkuku ntu Dagayi bauta ɓo nyi, fye zan-zan fya zhin aɓo n kunce n na zayi n na la ɓa kni, ntu n anabarka wo-wo yi ye pya ɓo.
Fye gba fyehin tukwo fya zhin peceiye, fye zhin hakuri n na ajeyi, ntu ye-ye ɓo to fya gye aje laifin ngye nya ho nun.
Fye zhin atna fya fa Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi wa dna fye n zokwo nlonu fya sa-se n najei n bugbafu yi.
Yi zhin aga nanyi gmanyi nyanu, yi n Zafun gmanyi nu, ai la yi yi ntu n na aɓo a manayi ɓo.
N yi aba, yi n Dagayi gmanyi nu, gaiciya ga gmanyi, baptisma gmanyi.
Yi n Shekwoyi gmanyi nu, Oda nwo tu n na aza sin vinya, woi sase dna n yi vinya woi lo tnu-tnu n yi.
Kristi n la ɓe-kpezhin ga zaho-zahoi enya nwo n cei pma ya bwa dna n wo nyabwa gna.
Zabura kayi ɓei kuci ge sanu n Kristi ɓei jeze lo eshe dna n nasara n wo kalala avun n vingwo, n nasarayi n shetan tukwo, wa ga aza acauta n mwa begye.
Woi cige wo ɓei jeze lo eshe mi, kwa wu nuge wo ɓei gmi n eshe mi wa kashi ɓe anyi har anyi sinta.
Oza n wa kashi ɓenyi, owo nu na jeze lo, n na bai n wo ɓa nu anya vinya n wohin, n anyimi har n she yi ɓe.

Azaho n yimi a ku ɓe-kpezhin gaɓa, ngye atnu-tnuyi, aza ho wa gaba waʼazi kpe-zhin, azaho ɓami ɓa gni aza ɓe cei n Kristi aba, ɓai bma ɓa zhin ɓa kpema wo ngye oɓa Gniyi. Azaho ɓa shi Shekwoyi aza bwa, ngye a knikna yi ɓai wuɓa, ɓai dnaɓa n Shekwoyi zokwo.
Kni nu zhin woi gayi ɓe-kpezhin n nabai ya kpe aɓo zhin n bmiya? N na abai Shekwoyi aza ɓami ɓa zhin tnu-tnu manayi gawo, ɓa mi ikklisiya, Kristi nayi kwa mwa kwa bwa kala.
Har ya ga gaiciya gmanyi ntu n yi gni-gni ɓo, n yi Gniyi, Shekwoyi Nugun, ya mwa fi n Dagayi, E, har ya si aba n Kristi ɓa dna n yi mi dei-dei.
Nnavun yita shan ze ngye aɓin, yi shan abugba do na anya ɓo n yi ga gaiciya n, ntuge aza ɓe yi n wuwu akata nya yi, yi gye ngye gaiciya nu.

Nkwo apita yivi gaiciya dna n ye-ye nsai vinya, yida gaiciya, yi zhin aɓo dna n gaiciya, yi sase dna n gaiciya, n na bai ya ze ngye Kristi n wo zhin owo nayi tukwo danyi, wato Ikklisiya, Dna n wo ɓewu nayi vinya nku aje dei-dei, oga dohodohoi n kwo zokwoyi, kwoi bma do zhin, n na bai n nayi vinya ɓa bwa lafiya, kwa mwa n nu-nuyi n yeyi.

Mi daɓo n fyei dna n Dagayi, fyeto shan ase-se ngye a tna viyin, ntuge awye nku ɓa bua, aɓo ku ɓa gmi aje. Oɓa bugba gu-guyi lo n nunuyi n wyegmayi, ɓa mwa kpalo n wye-wyeyi Shekwoyi nya yi, ntuge ɓaku ɓa bugba gu, to ɓa wowon, ɓa ta kpewo a zokwo ye lon.
Ɓata damu lo n ɓe nukoyi kwo ɓemanayin, ɓa ku ɓahin ga a ɓenukwoyi zhin. Ɓata fa ɓeho zhin ɓo, nɓa bugba nukwoyi, nɓa shakpe yi gna ɓa ge ɓa zhin m.
Ama Kristi to ɓei wufye n lo nun.
Ngye fye ku owo begye wo, fyei ku owo fyei ku owo gaiciya tumwi,
To, fyeku a nayi kwo-kwoi ya, n kwo ɓei zhin aɓe a nukwoyi nyi, n kwo la bo vinya n nu-nuyi n shakpei.
Nsaiye efye hali n fye a nubo zhin yi, tilas ɓa shando cici ɓa ze amanayi.
E, tilas fya ze aza woi-woi, n gyi-gyi-yi n bmiya. Fye ku nayi woi-woi ye kpe.
Fye to zhin akata cefi ajen, fye da gaiciya, ntuge yi zhin aje aga nu, idan ya ce a kata fi aje yi kni aje bugba nu.
N ha gyi minagyi to zhin laifi ha fa minagyi yi fi n ho min, to fa nyipyeyi kwa shin hoi gyi minagyin, ku kwo ze amwi npye.
Gama n ha gyi minagyi, ho ga shetan apita tu ba nu.
Ndei oza wyivi lo, tilas wa fa evi wyiɓo, wa ya tnu-tnu zhin n wo abwayi, n nabai wa bma azaje zhin n ɓa gyi san lo.
To da ɓeda nukwoyin, bwa ɓedanu da n kwo ɓa bma aza zhin n ho daɓo n ɓai, enya n kwo ɓa gaba anabarka.
Fye to wun Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi bugba yan, ntu n fye zan-zan ɓon, Fye pa ge owonu na tufye ze har nyipyeyi n gni-gni n laifi ɓei nu ncei.
Fye kufa napye ɓo n minagyi yi, anyawu, ɓeda nukwoyi, fye to fa a tna ajeye kwa lo dna n fya tasin m.
Fye bwa bugba manayi n na jeyi, fyei ye n na jeyi, fyei zhin aje gafara shi Shekwoyi wa zhin fye gafara ntuge fye zhin Kristi nya nu nyi.
Fye vi Shekwoyi aɓozhin n na aɓo vinya n fye ɓa zhin, shi oɓi ye-yeyi zhin wa shan owo dada nyi.

Fye ku nu n ye-yei ga aje, fya shan Kristi nwa ye n fyei nyi, wa ga wohin n Shekwoyi akun ngye hadaya, wa ku fye alaifi ya nyi. Ce a da Shekwoyi, ntuge Kristi ye-ye nfve aba, kwo zhin ngye tulare sunda yi nu nwo aba.
A to sun anagbayin, kwo cegye kwo shakpe n fye min, fye to ye zaho wa sa fye ye n na ɓei pyan.
A nabari nukwoyi, ɓeda nukwoyi n na awyefan kasayi, ɓato zhin fye nyanun, fye pa aje Shekwoyi alheri ɓo, n wo zhin ga fye nyi fyei zhin godiya.
Mi ye fya kpe ge, Kristi ebemi, n Shekwoyi ebemiyi kwo to zhin oza nyanu nwo tu cegyen, kwo shakpe woyi gama shakpe woyi zhin eshan gbayi nu. Woi ye anyi nya woi ga ɓa mwa-mwa ndu Shekwoyi.
Fye to ku vi akwocednayin n ɓa fan ye n laifi nyin, ntuge Shekwoyi minagyi nukwoyi tulo n na aza tukwo nɓa zhin abeye.
To gyi anugundo n na azai pya yin.
Gama koda yake n sapai efya bugba ɓei nu-nuyi n wyegmai, n saiye kwonu-nuvi lo n Dagayi buzangna yi, efya ɓe zhin kunce lo ɓa wu lonu.
Ntu n buzagna ye ɓo n kwo dna n fye nyi fye bwa enya nu zhin n kwo bmiva, n nya yi n kwo zhin gaiciya.
Fye tumwi fya zhin ɓo n kwo da Dagayi.
Fye to dnabwa n anyi gmada nukwoyi n wyegmayin, ama fye gnakni ɓa, fya kpeɓa asiri ya.
Kwo zhin avinyikwo ɓo nu fya sa aɓei pya ye n ya, anyi gmada nukwoyi, n na a tna-ɓefyece zhin yi.
Ama esa n fya kpe ɓa asiri nya ya, buzagna kwa wu ɓa laifi bmi, sanu n ɓagye oɓa ababwi, azaho nɓa mi, kpekni ɓa ze buzangna aɓi.
Cenu zhin Shekwoyi woi daɓo, n wo ɓeda wa cige, “Fye kun agyewyi, o, gye-wanyi, fye kukala n efi, Kristi ɓa ga fye buzangna.”
Fye zhin peceiye shi fye zhin aɓo ntu ge anyipyei aɓodnai nu, fyeto ku ze aza ma-man, fye la ce, fye zhin apma n sai n fye n cei lo, ntu ɓemana zhin ɓo.
Fye to zhin ɓo n tna nubo zhin, ama fye zhin atna fya kpe enya n Dagayi ye fya zhin.
To sin eje n, ntuge aɓo nukwoyi lo n mwa n kwo ɓe n cei, ama fye nu-nu n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi wa dna fye n zokwo.
Fye ta aza n na ajeyi n Dagayi tukwo, fyei da zabura, fyei kwo anyi agyi-gyi-yi. Fyei kwo anyi ga Dagayi nfye abugbami.
Fye zhin godiya ntu anya ɓo vinya ga Shekwoyi eyi Dada, dna n eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi eye mi.
Fye ga Kristi mwa-mwa, fyei gba fyehin tukwo n na aje aba.
Efye anyikwoza fye ga fyehin n fye aɓa akun, shi fye ga fyehin n Dagayi akun nyi.
Gama nyi kwoza dna n wo ɓa akun nu, shi ikklisiya dna n Kristi akun nyi. (Wa gawo wye-wyeyi, wa shi kwo bwa, wa ze okwo gniyi.)
Ntu cenu efye anyikwoza tile fya vi efye aɓa ɓeda, shi ikklisiya zhin kwa vi Kristi ɓeda nyi.
Efye aɓa, fye ye nfye anyikwo yi, shi Kristi ɓei ye ikklisiya yi, wa fi ntu n kwo ɓo nyi.
Wa zekwo gyi-gyi yi ntna cegye, n zhan-zhan yi ya n batisma yi n Shekwoyi ɓeda yi.
Nna abai wa ga wohin tukwo kwo, ngye ikklisiya mwa-mwai ntna ɓenukwoi, kwo laifi ci gusa, n gyigyi yi n tna cegye.
Nlonu nu aɓa ɓaye nɓa anyikwoyi, ɓei ye n ɓai n gye ɓahin. Shi oza n wo nyikwoi ɓa ku ze gmanyi, ɓai oza ye nwohin nu woi zhin wohin ɓe mana, n wa ye n wo nyikwoyi.
Oza to lo n wo taye n wohin nayi n. Ama wo ye nkwoi woi zhin kwo ɓo n kwo bmiya. Shi Kristi lura n wo nayi, wato, ikklisiya n yi zhin kwo aganu nyi.

Shekwoyi ɓeda n la wu pei-pei nge zanugbayi nwo nyikwoyi ɓa zhin nayi gmanyi nu, sanu nkwa ci ncei ge, “Tilas zanugbai wa fa owo dada n owo ʼyai, sanu wa pa mula, n na bai wa nyima owo nyikwo, oɓa ngun aba ɓa ze gmanyi.”
Mi kpe lo ge kwo dnaɓolo n na awyega bwa ba, ama mi si ɓesi nu ngye shi yi zhin aga nu dna n Kristi nayi nyi.
Ngye shin ma cige, Tile oza ye n wo nyikwoyi ngye wohin tukwo nyikwoza ce tilas wa zhin atna wa ga owo oɓa mwa-mwa n mwa, woi vi wo ɓeda, woi ciwo, woi gawo mwamwa.
Aɓi fye vi efye a dada ɓeda, nya nu n kwo kunce fya zhin, gama Shekwoyi nku ɓa kpe n efye eshe.
Gaho dada mwa-mwa n ho yai, deye kwo nu zhin wyi-dna kmisunyi n Shekwoyi awyidna n gun awo, nkwo zo n alkawali yi nyi.
Alkawali yi nu nyi, nge nha gaho dada mwa-mwa n ho yai, oho wyewyei ɓa mwakpa n nu-nu yi n anabarka yi.
Efye aɓida ce fye wo, fye to zhin efye aɓi ɓa gyi minagyin, fyeto wan ɓa sun. Ama fye wuɓa zokwo ɓa mwa fi n Dagayi zokwo, dna n tata manayi fyei ga ɓa shawara manayi.
A fyenu fye vi fye a dagayi ɓeda, fye zhin ɓa tnu-tnu n pwawoyi dna, fye zhinɓa tnu-tnu shi fye ɓa zhin Kristi nya nyi.
Fye to zhin tnu-tnu n kalayi n fye dagayi awyeba nu kawai n, ama fye zhin tnu-tnu cewo n sai vinya a gye fye zhin Kristi nya, fya zhin Kristi nya, fye zhin Shekwoyi ɓeye n bugbayi gmanyi.
Fye pa ge Dagayi ɓa gba fye ta ntu fye a tnu-tnu amanayi ɓo, kwo hoi zhin fyenu nu, kwo to hoi zhin fyenu nun.
Efyehin ce a dagayi fye zhin efya fyenu ɓo n bmiya, shima gnaɓa ge ɓa zhin fye ɓo nyi, fye to fi ɓa edna n, fye pa nge fye zhin Kristi a fyenu nu, efye Dagayi gmanyi nu n ɓai, woi ta zhin taran.
Nkmasun miye ma gnafye ge, efye akala ɓakun n Dagayi aba nu n ikwoyi dna n fye mi.
Fye kpe Shekwoyi akun kaya vinya, n na bai nfye ɓami fya gni-agni n Shetan yi, n wa dabara yi.
Gama yita sunkun n na azai nu, n ɓa zhin nayi n na amiyin, ama n na azai nɓato n nayi n, esu a nukwoyi n awyegma nya, n ɓa gyibe n anyi deye n na aljanuyi n ɓa fi n na anyi bmana nyi.
Ntu cenu fye zhin apma n Shekwoyi a kun kaya doho-dohoi, fya sunkun n na anuwunyi n zokwo doho-dohoi nɓa kun da fye, sanu n na ku zo fyami zhi n na agni.
Ama ntuge fya mi fya zhin n lonu, tile fya pa shinpanya wao gaiciya n fye eshin, fya ku kpata wato ɓefyece kpe n na agu n Shekwoyi ɓoye nya.
Fye fi abuada n ɓa ɓa da fye zan-zan fyei lo Nabari Manayi da bugbafu nya n Shekwoyi.
Nkun doho-dohoi fye ɓa pma gaiciya ge, kwa ze fye kpata, kwa gwo fye aknawyi ya n shetan shefye nyi.
Fye ɓa kun kata gnigni-nya, n Zafun ebe yakwoyi, wato Shekwoyi ɓeda.
Fye zhin aduwa cici, fye nya Shekwoyi ɓeho-ɓehoi n kwo dna n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi ɓeye. Fye zhin atna n woi, fye pawo efya bukata ɓo, fye zhin aduwa ntu n na a Yesu viyi aje ɓo n na aba do.
Fye zhin mi aduwa fya nya Shekwoyi, wa gami aɓeda n ɓa kunce, shi mi gna aza Dagayi ɓeda n tna edna, mi-i wuɓa ge gni-gni zhin abyedo nyanu ce.
Mi dna n na awun nsaiye, ntu ge mi zhin Shekwoyi ɓeda ye waʼazi nu, ama fye zhin aduwa n na bai n mi ɓa gyi abye n ɓeda yi, n tna edna n kurkuku aba n mi dnanyi.
Tikikus, emi zado ye-yei gaiciya da, nwo bmami zhin dna n Dagayi tnu-tnu nyi, wo ɓa gna fye shi mi lo n ya.
Mi tnu n woi ntu n cenu wa gna fye eyi nabari, n na bai fya bwa bugba kala n ɓei n wa gna fye.
Shekwoyi wo ga fye bugbafu, emi a Yesu viyi aje, n ye-yei, n gaiciya gayi, n Shekwoyi Dada aba n Dagayi Yesu Kristi yi.
Shekwoyi alheri n anabarkayi, ɓa kunsun n na azai nɓa ye eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi n bugbai gmanyi.
Bulus n Timatawus yi, Yesu Kristi a fyenu, eyi nu ka ga fye a Pasto n na abyedo yi n na Yesu viyi vinya n fye fi n Filibi zhi mi nyi.

Shekwoyi anabarka ɓa kunsun n fyei vinya. E, mi zhin aduwa ge Shekwoyi eyi Dada, n Dagayi Yesu Kristi yi ɓa ga zaho-zahoi n fye mi owo anabarka nu-nuyi, n wo bugba fuyi nfye abugbami, n fye awye wyei n jesun.
Omi aduwa vinya ɓa nu-riuyi lo n Shekwoyi Latuyi.
Sanu n ma zhin aduwa ga fye, emi bugba nu-nuyi n na agmadai.
Ntu fye bmazhin ɓo, fyei zhin aza ɓai kpe Nabari manayi, Kristi nya ɓeye, tunyi esa n fye ɓei wo har nsai ye.
Mi tabata lo Shekwoyi n wa ya tnutnu manayi n fye mi nyi, wo ɓa gyi abye n fye bmazhin yi, fya mwa fi n wo alheri, sai esa n owo tnu-tnu n fye mi nku zo zhin, ewyi n Yesu Kristi ɓei jeze ɓe cei.

Kwo wulo cewo ma wo n mi mi ntu fye ɓo ngye shi mi wo nyi, ntuge, fye dnalo n mi bugba mwa. Yila gni bwa ngnisun Shekwoyi anabarka esa n mi ɓei dna n Kurkuku nyi, n esayi n mi ɓei la gmi nyi. Mi-i sunkun ntu gaiciya ɓo mi-i gna aza Kristi nabari.
Shekwoyi gmanyi nu kpe lo shi mi ye fye lo n sun, n Yesu Kristi bugba ye-ye nya pyai.
Emi aduwa zhin ga fye ekwo nu fya nu n Shekwoyi ye-yei na za aba, fya gyi abye n mwa-mwa yi dna n Zafun, n awyega yi.
Gama mi ye Ifya kpe ɓe nukwoyi ye n ɓemanayi cewo. Fye ku ze a gyi-gyi-yi n fye mi, to oza mi wa gye fye laifin har esa n Dagayi ɓa jeze ɓe n cei.
Fye zhin ɓemana nu ci-ci, aɓo n ɓa ɓa wu ge fye zhin Shekwoyi aɓi nu. Ntuge de ye ɓa ɓe n latu yi, n mwa-mwa yi n Shekwoyi aba.
Mi cei pma lo fya kpe, omi azaje, aɓo vinya n ɓa bwa mi ya, kwo la ze apma nya kwoi zhin aza ɓai wo Nabari manayi Kristi nya.
Ntuge aza vinya n ya, n na soja yi ɓe n ɓa kpe n ɓa abarki nyi, ɓa kpe lo ge mi dna n na awun, ntuge mr zhin Yesu viyi nu.
Ntu n mi dna-dna ɓo n kurkuku n ya a Yesu viyi n mwa ɓa ku agmada nya. Omi atna zhin, n ku bugba kala ga ɓa, har ɓai gna aza Kristi nabari ntna edna.
Azaho zhin waʼazi ntuge ɓa wo she, shi Shekwoyi zhin apma n miyi. Ɓaye a ciɓa nge ɓa zhin waʼazi n tna dna. Ama azaho zhin n bugba yi gmanyi.

Ɓai zhin waʼazi ntuge ɓa yemi, gama ɓa kpe lo ge Dagayi wa ɓe miyi n ya wa zhin apma n miyi ma kna gaiciya. Azaho zhin waʼazi ɓa zhin mi ma wo she, ɓai gye ge oɓa abye gyi ɓa ɓemi bugba zhizhiyi dna n Kurkuku ya.
Ama kwo ɓai zhin waʼazi n kni nufi yi nuʼa, nya gmanyi n mi kpelo, a zhin Nabari manayi Kristi nya waʼazi lo, ai da mi lo.
Mi ɓa dagma, gama mi kpe lo shi fye zhin mi aduwa Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi bmami zhin, deye vinya ɓa ze ɓemana n mi aba.

Gama mi zhin nubo n na awyetuyi, mi ta zhin ɓeho n kwo ɓa zhin mi ma wo mihin vinyikwon, ama ma gni n shiri yi zhin n saho-sahoi, ma da Kristi nabari n bugba kalayi, sa n mi dna n na a zhin gye n ya, shi mi shin gye n sapa n na abai ma ga Kristi mwa-mwa, kwo mi-i n wye-wyeyi kwo mi ya fi.
Gama n mi aba wye-wyeyi zhin esa bwa nu ntu n Kristi ɓo, efi kuwa, n gna bmiya lo.
Ama ngye n mi wye-wyei ɓa ga mi esa ma gni aza ga Kristi, to a gye mita kpe edo ye lo n kwo gna bmiya lon, Wye-wyeyi ko efi m.
Nsahoi mi n cei pmalo ma gni wye-wyeyi sahoi mi to n cei pmalo n. Gama mi n cei pma lo ma lo mi kunsun n Yesu yi, Kwo ɓa gna ma gmada n mwa ma ndu n mi wye-wyeyi lo ya.
Ama mi ɓa gnasun n na apmayi n fye aba mi-i ya gni n wye-wyeyi n ya.
E, aye n mi ɓo yi pmalo n ya n na anyi ye, mi kpelo mi ɓeye dna n na anyi ye n sa fyewyi kpa, ama ma bma fye zhin, fya mwa, fya bwa bugba buyi dna fye gaiciya ga.
Omi gni-gni n na anyi ɓa ga fye bugba buyi, kwoi ga fye dalili n fye ɓa la Kristi Yesu tu, n wo shi mi bwanyi, sanu n ma jeze ɓe efye aba n cei, ma zhin fye ziyara.
Ama kwo kni ɓe nu yi bwa miʼa, fye pa, fya zan-zan ngye a Yesu viyi n na bai kwo to mi-i shan fye gye n shasun, mi ɓa wo nabari manayi nge fye mi zhin lo n bugbai gmanyi, fyei da Nabari manayi.
Ntna edna, kwo ofye anuwunyi zhin fye n wuna na. Kwo ɓa wu ɓa nge ɓala kaya, ama n fye aba kwo ɓa wufye nge Shekwoyi kunsun lo n fyei. Woi la wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya ga fye n gnisun n woi.
Gama n fye aba ala esa ga fye, to ge fya kpema wo kawai m, ama fya gye azhin ntu wo ɓo.
Yi filo n okun ye n gnisun, fye ku gye mi-i sin wahala Intu wo ɓo n sapai, har sayi mi ye dna lo n wahala atan-tasin, ngye shi fye kpe lo.

Enya lo n na a Yesu viyi ai yi ge atna-zhin? Fye ye mi lo har fyei ye fya bmami zhin? Kwo zhin nyaho nu n fye aba nge yi zhin a zaje nu dna n Dagayi, yi n Zafun gmanyi lo? Ofye abugba n na atnazhin yi lo n bugba bwa yi?
To fye zhin mi ma dagma ɓehin-hin nya, fya ye n na jeyi n bugbai gmanyi, fyei zhin tnu-tnu n gnisun n bugbai ɓedo n ɓemwi gmanyi.
To ye hohin tukwon, to zhin ɓo n na bai aza ci hon, gba hohin tukwo, ha gye azaje ndu hohin.
To zhin hohin tukwo aɓonu nubo gmanyi n, ama zhin nubo n na zaje nyai ɓe, n ɓei n ɓa zhin.
Kwo bmiya efye hali kwa wu ngye odo n Yesu Kristi ɓei wu yi nyi.
Oza nu, kwo da yake wo ɓei zhin Shekwoyi nu, wo to ɓei gyima nge wo zhin Shekwoyi nu n.
Ama wa kma owo mwa-mwa ya zhi n ikoyi, wa gba wohin tukwo wa ze zanyikwoci ngye fyenu.
Wa gba wohin tukwo n du-du, wa fi ngye evi fi tu n zundu.
Ntu cenu Shekwoyi ɓei la wo kala tu n eshe wa ga wo eye ndu aye aje vinya.
Nnabai n Yesu ye nyikutukwo doho-doho n she mi, n anyi mi yi, n anyi sintai ɓei ca kwokwo.
Nyitala doho-dohoi ɓei cige, Yesu Kristi nu zhin Dagayi dna Shekwoyi Dada mwa-mwa.

Omi a nugundo yeye yi, sanu n mi ɓei gnisun n fyei, fye ɓei vi mi ɓo-wu peceiye. Shi mi to gni lo n saiye nyi n, fye zhin peceiye fya vi aɓo vinya n ɓa ɓe n gni-gni, avun Shekwoyi mwa-mwa ga, n dna yi, fyei ta na avun yi n nya n kwo ɓa wun wo bugba ya.
Ntuge Shekwoyi nu zhin tnu-tnu n fye mi, Woi bma fye zhin n nabai fya wowo ɓeda, fya zhin ɓo n wo cei pma fya zhin.
Nyaho-nyahoi n fye ɓa zhin, fye bui gunu-gunu da si na ɓena yi, na jeyi.
Nna bai n zaho ta bwa fye laifin. Fye sase n gyi-gyi-yi. Ntna cegye, Shekwoyi aɓi nfi n wyegma anyi ye nya n na za nukwoyi n ɓa ta wo ɓon. Fye bmiya na n ɓa mi ngye a fitila. Fya ku ze a buzangna.
Fyei wuɓa Nabari wye-wyeyi nya. Sanu n Kristi bei jeze ɓe ncei, aɓei da mi n mwa, nge emi tnu-tnu n fya ba to ze gbeloyin.
Ngye aɓa emi ami zeya nu ntu n fye gaiciya ga ɓo n mi ga Shekwoyi kwo ngye hadaya nyi, wato ngye mi ba fi ntu fye ɓo nu, aɓa dami n mwa, mabwa agmada ngnisun nfyei.
Gama kwo kunce lo fya bwa bugba bui-bui ntu n ce, fya dagma n mi yi ntu n esa ɓo n mi la bwa ma fi ntu fye ɓo nyi.
N Dagayi wa ye, mi ɓa tnu n Timatawus yi esa fyewyi wa gye fye wye. N wa jeze ɓe wo ɓa fu mi bugba wa wu mi efye lafiya, shi fye zhin lo.
Oza to lo woi ye mi ngye Timatawus n.
Zaho-zahoi ce woi wo wohin nu ɓo, to woi shan Yesu Kristi ɓo won.
Ama fye kpe Timatawus ye lo. Wo la ze n gye mi ɓinu, woi bma mi nabari manayi waʼazi zhin.
Mi ɓatnu n woi sa fyewyi, n ma ku kpe nya ye n kwo ɓa bwa mi ya.
Mi ga Shekwoyi gaiciya lo ge, esa fyewyi mi ɓa ɓe ma gye fye wye.
Nsaiye mi gye kwo bmiya lo matnu n Abafraditus yi nfya ba. Fye ɓei tnu woi wa bma mi zhin dna n mi bukata, to, owo n miyi, yi ku ze aya ɓi, yi ku ze yi zhin tnu-tnu, yi sunkun n gnisun.
Nsaiye mi tnu woi lo n na api n jesun, ntu ge api awye n lawo kwo, woi la damu shi fye ɓei ku wo ge nyasan ɓei ku san wo.
Nyasan ɓei ku san wo n mwa, har wo ɓei la wo viwyi n fiyi. Ama Shekwoyi ɓei ku gye wo sun-sun, n mi yi ɓe, to wa ye ge ma bwa bugba zhiyi tu n deye tukwo n.
Ntu cenu a gnami wolo n gye mi tnu n woi n fya ba njesun, gama mi kpelo shi aɓei da fye nsun fyei yagye wo. Ce ɓa da mi kwa cemi bugba wum bma.
Fye zhin wo amabe dna n Dagayi n bugba buyi, fya wu fye agmada.
Gama wo ɓeye wa fi ntu n Kristi tnu-tnu ɓo, sanu n wo ɓei zhin atna, wa zhin mi ɓo n fye to mi zhin ntu ge fye lo n kpai.
Ɓeho-ɓehoi n kwa zhin, emi anugundo fye dagma fi n Dagayi, ata ɓe mi n fye ce gna yi n. Kwo bmiya lo n fya ba fya wo ce ci.
Fye zhin peceiye n na za nukwoyi, amwi, nɓa gna ge sai oza zhin kaciya nu a kpe wo gni nyi.

Gama eyi nayi zunya nu ta ze yi Shekwoyi aɓin, mwa-mwa ga nu n yi Zafun yi, kaciya hin-hin nu, eyi a Yesu viyi, yi dagma fi n nya n Kristi Yesu ku zhin gayi, yi kpe ge yita mi n yihin bma-zhin ya gni yihin tukwon.
Ndei oza lo n wo gye ge wo ɓei ɓa mi wa gni wohin, emi nu, ngye aza ɓei ɓa pwo ntu n nya ɓo n wo n cei, mi ɓei ɓa mi ma pwo.

Gama nyipyei nyimwa-nyimwai nu n na ɓei zhin mi kaciya, a mami dna Yahudiyi hin-hin puwa, Banyami bye. Ntu cenu mi zhin Yahudiyi za hin-hin nu. Knido nu shasun, mi ɓei dna n na a Farisiyi fye nu, n ɓa vi a Yahudiyi awyidna n na akunu yi n kala yi nyi.
N wyenyi? E, har ma ma ga ikklisiya wahala ma zhin atna ma shi a Yahudiyi awyidna bwa vinya.
Ama anya deye vinya n mi ɓei gye ɓa n na pmai, nsaiye mi ku ɓa ya vinya n na bai ma kpema, ma tu awye n Kristi nu gmanyi.
E, anya vinya zhin gbeloyi nu, n na mwi ɓa do n gyibai nza ɓa bwa woi ya kpema Kristi Yesu emi Dagayi. Miku anya ya vinya, mito ze ɓa n gye nyahon n na abai ma bwa Kristi.

Maze gmanyi n woi, to a shan gna ge ma bwa gni-gni ntu n mi ɓe manayi zhin ɓo nu m, ko Shekwoyi awyidna bwa shin, ama ma ga Kristi gaiciya wa gni mi nu, gama Shekwoyi zokwo n wo zeyi aza ɓefyece da, ko nu zhin gaiciya ga dna n Kristi gmanyi.
Nsaiye mi ku anya vinya ya, miku gye okwonu zhin zokwo gmanyi n za ɓa kpe Kristi ye, oza kpe iko ye n kwo ɓo je wo wye-wyeyi ga nyi, ma bwa awyega wahala sin nya, n fi yi ngnisun n woi.
Nya n kwa zhin, emi nu ɓa zhin oza n wo bwa wyewyeyi woi-woyi dna na za n ɓa ku fi ɓa je wye-wyeyi bwa.
Mita ye ma ci ge mi la ze oza tna-laifi da nu n, mito tu aɓo mwi n kwo kunce ma tu mwi n. Ama mi zhin tnu-tnu lo abye har ewyi n mi ɓei ze enya n Kristi wa gni mi ntu ce, woi yemi ma ze nyi.
Omi azaje, har sayi mi to ze enya n mi ye ma zen, Awo, ama mi zhin atna n mi akala yi vinya ma zhin ɓeye gmanyi. Mi-i ze aɓo amwi n ko la diya, mi-i shi oɓo awye n kwo lo na bye.
Mi zhin atna masi asibui cezhi ba, ma gwo lada n Shekwoyi wa yi-yi ya lo she, ntu nya ɓo n Kristi Yesu wa zhin gayi nyi.
Mi n na wyetu yi lo efye n fye ku mwa fi n Yesu vi nyi, fye ɓa gye aɓeye n gnisun m miyi pei-pei. N fye to bwa awyega n na dohon, mi kpelo Shekwoyi ɓa ga fye awyegan n ɓa,
n fya vi gaiciya n fye n cei nyi.
Emi azaje, fye se ase n gye emi, n na ajeyi.
Gama miku gna fye n kmisunyi, ma je fye ce gna n saiye n na awye nyi yi, aza lo n ɓa zan-zan fi n a Yesu viyi zokwo, ama ɓa zhin Kristi zundu a nuɓayi nu.
Oɓa kpegni ba abwi nu, gama oɓa Shekwoyi kwo nu zhin ɓa shakpe, ɓai mwa ɓahin tukwo n ɓa kunce ɓa wo vinyikwo, enya nɓa zhin nubo vinya, okwo nu, zhin anyi ye n ɓa nyai vinya.
Ama eyi a-yi lo n ʼshemi, aba n yi gniyi, Dagayi Yesu Kristi nyi. Yiye zlii yi pmi wo nu, wa jeze zhi.
Sanu n wa jeze ɓe, wo ɓa la anayi fi-fi ye waga yi anayi mwamwa nya, ngye owo nya, woi zhin apma n iko dnagmayi, n wo ɓei zhin apma n cei wa gyi nasara n na ba vinya nyi.
Omi Yesu viyi aje, mi ye fye lo, ofye awye ko milo, ntuge ofyenu zhin mi bugba buyi, n mi tnu-tnu ladayi, Omi a nugundo yeyeyi, fye ku mi zhi dna Dagayi.
Mi cei pma lo ma tna Afodiya abwa n Sintikiyi, mi gyi fye wye dna n Dagayi fye to je anya wun. Fye ku ze anugundo n jesun.

Ma gna fye, emi a tnu-tnu kun-zhin yi n gaiciya yi, fye bma anyikwoza ye zhin. Ntu ge ɓa ɓei ku tnu-tnu kun zhin n miyi dna n Nabari manayi waʼazi zhin. Ɓa tnu-tnu ngnisun zhin Klement n mi azaje yi n ɓa aye kafi lo n lifafi wye-wyeyi nya nyi.
Fye nu-nu agmadai cici n Dagayi, ma jeci ge, fye dagma.
Fye fa aza ɓa kpe ge fye ta gna fyehin tukwo ye lon, fyei zhin ɓo n kwo kunce. Fye pa-ge Dagayi ɓelo esa fyewyi.
Fye to damu ntu n nyaho-nyahoi ɓon, fye gna Shekwoyi efye abukata, to fya ze amwi fya sawa mi ntu na amsa ɓo n.
Nfya zhin lo nu fye ɓa bwa Shekwoyi bugba fu, n kwo du gbagyiza bugba kala wa kpe kwo ye. Owo bugba fu ɓa wan fye anubo zhin shi, efye abugba ɓa bwa sunsun, fyei ya ga Kristi gaiciya.

Nsaiye emi azaje, shi mi zo wasika ye nyi, wuye ma gna fye ɓeye n kma-sun. Fye la wye dna n gaiciya, ni ɓoyi n kwo bmiya. Fye zhin aɓo nubo n ɓa gyi-gyi-yi n bmiya, anya n ɓa gyi-gyi-yi n fi n na azaje, fye zhin nubo n nyai n fye ɓa ci Shekwoyi, fyei dagma.
Fye gyi abye n na aɓe zhinyi n fye ɓei tumwi n mi, fya gye mi mi-i zhin.
Adami lo, mi-i ci Dagayi shi fye bmami zhin njesun, mi kpe lo a zhin a wo fye fwa fya tnu mi n nya yi n fye ɓa mi, ama n sadohoi fye to ɓei n sayin.
To ge mi ɓei dna n esan gyi n, gama mila tumwi ma sa se n bugba buyi kwo mi n nyai mwa ko to mi-i n cei n.
Mi kpe lo shi mi ɓa sa se n tnanya ho kwo mi-i n nyahoi. Mi la tumwi shi mi ɓa sase n nyahonyahoi, kwo nubo fu, ko mikun, kwo nyabwa ko sangyi.
Gama mi ɓa mi ma zhin nyaho-nyahoi n Shekwoyi a gnami dna n Kristi bmazhin n wo gami kala n iko yi nyi.
Ama dudu lo nu, fye ku zhin n bmiya n fya bma mi zhin dna n mi wahala n saiye nyi.
Shi fye kpe lo nyi, sanu n mi ɓei kmi fye ɓe n nabari manayi nyi, ma godiya ma fa Makidoniya, ofye a Filibiyi nu ɓei bwami a nugundo zhin n nyaga ngwo-gwo yi. Ikklisiya ho to ɓei shan deye pya zhin.
Har esa n mi ɓei dna n Tasaluniki fye ɓei tnu mi n bmazhin yi abwa ba.
Ama ko da yake adami lo n fye acautayi, enya n kwo gnami agmada lo okwonu zhin lada yakwo, n fye ɓei bwa n she ntu n fye alheri ɓo nyi.
Nsaiye, mi n na anya yi lo-lo n mi ye n mwa, anya n fye ɓei ga Abafraditus wa ɓemi n cei nyi, Ɓa zhin nyaga sundayi nu n kwo da Shekwoyi agma n mwa.
Owo nu ɓa ga fye anya vinya dna n wo nyabwa n mwa-mwa, ntu n nyaɓo n Kristi Yesu ku zhin gayi nyi.
Nsaiye mwa-mwa vinya kwo kunsun n Shekwoyi eyi Dadayi, nyalo-nyalo. Amin.
Fye ɓi a Yesu viyi gna vinya n ɓa nyi n ɓo nyi. Azaje n ɓa nyi n miyi nyi ɓa ɓi fye gna lo.
A Yesu viyi n ɓa nyi n ya nyi ɓa ɓi fye gna lo, tun baga aza n ɓa zhin tnu-tnu n Kaisar puwa nyi.
Eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi anabarka ɓa kunsun n fye zafun yi. Amin.
Wasika ye gmi n Bulus akun nu n Ti-matawus yi, aza n Shekwoyi wa kni ɓa, ɓa ze Yesu Kristi a tnutnuyi.
Kwoi lo eyi azaje aba a Yesu viyi, Shekwoyi aza n ɓa fi n Kolosi zhimi nyi. Fa Shekwoyi eyi Dada wa tu fye anabarka wa nu fye n wo bugba fu dnagmayi.
Esa vinya n ya zhin aduwa ntu fye ɓo, yi zhin ya zhin Shekwoyi eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi Dada godiya.
Gama yi ku wo, shi fye kpema Dagayi n jesun shi fye ye owo aza n sun.
Fye pmi agmada eshe nya nu, tunyi esa n na ɓei kmi fye waʼazi nabari manayi nya zhin nyi.
Nabari manayi n kwo ɓei ɓe fye abanyi, kwo laɓa lo n na anyi kwoi shan aza wye-wyeyi do. She ko ɓei shan fye nya do nyi, tunyi ewyi n fye ɓei wo, fya gane n Shekwoyi alheriyi n na alaifida aba.
Abafras, eyi za yeyei, tnu-tnu kunzhin yi, owo nu ɓei ɓe fye n Nabari manayi yei. Wo zhin Yesu Kristi fyenu gbenuyinu. Wo lo woi bma yi zhin n ya nfye maimako.
Owo nu na gnayi ye-ye dnagmayi ɓo, nfye cei lolo n na azaje aba nyi, n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi wa ga fye nyi.
Ntucenu, tunyi ewyi n yi ɓei wo of ye ɓo nyi, yi zhin aduwa ga fye lo, yi nya Shekwoyi nge wo bma fye zhin, fya kpe enya ye nwoln cei pma fya zhin, yi nyawo wa ga fye ce-ce dna n zafun zokwo.
Yi nya wo n na abai efye asese ɓa da Dagayi agma kwa la wo tu, n na bai nfye ɓa bwa ɓe manayi zhin, fyei zhin aza ɓe manayi, fya tumwi fya kpe Shekwoyi ye lo abye-abye.
Yi zhin aduwa n jesun, wa nu fye n wo kala yi n mwa-mwa n na bai fya gyi abye ko knidonu yi na zhiʼa. Fya ze nu-nu yi n Dagayi agmada yi cici.
Yi sa Dada ami n tu ge wa zhin yi, yi ku kunce ya bwa anya awo-woyi, n ɓa zhin aza nya n ɓa fi n buzangna ebemi nyi.
Gama wo la yi kun n wyegma n Shetan ebemi, woi fiyi n wo Nugun ye-yeyi ebemi.
Nwa siyi n wo amiyi, wa zhin yi alaifi gafara vinya.
Kristi nu zhin dogbe Shekwoyi nya, n na ata gyewye nyin. Wo ɓei nyi tun to Shekwoyi zhin nyahonyaho yin.

Ɓehin-hin, Kristi nu na zhin anya vinya n ɓa fi n ʼshe mi n anyi miyi, anya n yi gye n na anya yi n yi ta gyen. Anya, a zafun nya n kwo asuyi, n na abemi yi n kwa iko dayi. Vinya Kristi nu na zhin ɓa n tu wohin latu ɓo.
Wo nyi kafin nyaho-nyahoi ya, owo iko nu n na i nya vinya yi shi.
Owo nu zhin Tukwo, owo nayi nya, wato ikklisiya-nwo ɓei ya, owo nu zhin shugaba aza nya nɓa kukala n efi, n na abai wa zhin kmisunyi n na anya vinya.
Gama Shekwoyi ɓei ye owohin tukwo wa dna nwo Nugun.
Ntu n nya ɓo nu n wo Nugun a zhin, Shekwoyi wo fin zokwo ya nyaho-nyahoi kwa ɓeda wo. Anya vinya n esbe n ekni yi, gama Kristi efi tu zundu kwo na ɓe n jedoɓe yi n Shekwoyi.

Fye filo n ɓo n fye ɓei mwakpa n Shekwoyi nyi. Fye ɓei zhin owo anuɓayi nu to fyei ye won. Fye ɓei gnajegna-gna yi ya n wo. Ntu fye aɓo anubo zhin nukwoyi ɓo, n na aɓe zhin nukwoyi, ama nsaiye wo la fye jezeɓe n cei ngye owo anugundo.
Wa zhin ce dna n owo efi mi n wa fi dna n nayi tu n zundu nyi ntu n ce nu Kristi ku ɓe n fyei n Shekwoyi abye, fyei gni agni zhin wo abye n sayi ye n tna laifi, n kwo ɓa zhin n wo ɓa nya fye ya.

Nya gmanyi, okwo nu fye ku gaiciya ga, fya ku mi zhin kwo, n kalayi dna n Dagayi fya ku tabata Nabari manayi nge Yesu ɓela fi ntu n fye ɓo, to fya shan-shan, n wo gaiciya ga wa gni fyen, Nabari wowoyi n kwo ɓei ɓe fye aba, kwoi laɓa lo nsaiye n na anyi, emi Bulus, mi na agmadai lo ma gna azaje.
Ama emi tnu-tnu nu ma sin wahala ntu fye ɓo, ai dami lo, gama mi bmazhin lo ma nu Kristi azhingye n tu wo nayi ɓo, wato ikklisiya.
Shekwoyi, la tnu n mi yi ma bma ikklisiya zhin, ma wu abyedo owo asiri.

Wo ɓei nwo asiriyi soshi tunyi n sapa, ama kwa dawo wa gna aza n ɓa yewo ɓai se-ase ntu n owo ɓo, n mwa-mwa yi anabarkayi owo shiri nya ɓa zhin fye nya nu. Asiriyi nu nyi, Nge, Kristi n efyemi, owo nu zhin efye awyetu, n mwa-mwa yi.

Ntucenu aba vinya n ya lo ya gna aza Kristi nabari n ɓa ɓa wo, yi zhin ɓa gargadi, yi wu ɓa shiyi kpeye lo nsun, yi n cei pma yami ya ɓe n zaho-zahoi n Shekwoyi abye n Gyi-gyi-yi ntu n nya ɓo n Kristi ku zhin ga zaho-zahoi nyi.
Omi tnu-tnu nyi mami ma zhin kwo, ntuge Kristi iko dnagmayi gami kala lo nu n mi mi.
Awomilo ngye fye kpe shi mi sunkun lo, mi-i zhin aduwa ga fye ɓedo ikklisiya yi n kwo nyi n Lawudikiya nyi, n mi anugundo yi n ɓa ta shin mi ye kpe lon.

Nya nyi n mi nya Shekwoyi ntu fye ɓo, fya bwa kala fya nyimaje dna n ye-ye, fya kpe Kristi ye dei-dei, n tna wyegma. Gama Shekwoyi shiri asiri, n na ala guya wuyi nyi, okwo nu zhin Kristi n wohin tukwo yi.
Dna n wo nu a ɓeyekpe n cece yakwo yi sofi.
Mi da deye ntu ge mi wo dna kada zaho wa ɓe fye aba n ɓeda dadayi, wa dna fye kwoce.
Gama ko mi lo n kpai n fyei, omi bugba kunsun lo n fyei, ai dami ntu fye gaiciya ga kalada ɓo dna n Kristi.
Nsaiye shi fya kpema Kristi wa gnifye nyi, fye kpema wo lonu fyegyi-fyegyi, fyei nyima wo cici.

Fye fa efye agbegye ɓa mifi n wo, fya bwa nyagyi zafunya nwo. Fye gyi abye n mwa-mwa yi dna n Dagayi, fya ku dna kala n mizhi n gaiciya, n na ɓei wu fye nyi. Ofye awye-wyeyi ɓa nu na gmadayi n godiyayi ntu n nya ɓo n wo ku zhin.
Fyeto fa aza ɓa wunfye gaiciya ga ya n ye-ye yin, n na anyi ɓeyekpe yin, oɓa amsa nukwoyi, akpe-kpe gyei n na mi ɓa kpe n aza ɓeyekpe na ɓo mwi yi, mai-makon nya n Kristi wa da.
Gama dna Kristi Shekwoyi wa wu wohin tukwo dna n nayi.
Ntu cenu fye n na anya yi lo vinya n dei fye n Kristi yi lo, ai ku fye nu n Shekwoyi ntu n fye gmanyi ze ɓo n Kristiyi. O wo nu zhin Begyi yi dnagmayi ndu zaho-zahoi n wo n ikoyi.
Sanu n fya ɓe Kristi aba wa lo fyeya n fye ashakpe nukwoyi to ge n kaciya zhin ɓon, ama dna n zafun Baptisma ofya wye-wyeyi nya.

Gama dna n baptisma fye gye shi efya anayi akwo-kwoyi, anukwoyi ɓo ku fi n gnisun woi, aku fye bi n gnisun n woi, fya kun n ʼfi n woi, dna n wye-wyeyi woi-woyi ntu ge fye ɓei ga Shekwoyi ikoda ɓeda gaiciya n wo ɓei la Kristi kala n ʼfi nyi.
Fye ɓei ku fi fi n fye alaifi, ato ɓei zun fye a shakpe a laifi nya yan. Wa ga fye aba dna n Kristi wye wyeyi gama wo ɓei ku fye zhin gafara.
Wa zo of ye knizun vinya, owo awyidna vinya nfye to ɓei shi ɓa bwa nyin. Wa ku alaifi ye vinya wa zunɓadu tu n Kristi zundu.
Dna n zokwoye nu n Shekwoyi ɓei wun Shetan ikoya, n wo zan fye laifi zanyi nyi, Shekwoyi wa wu anyi vinya pei-pei Kristi nasara tu n zundu, aba n na aɓei lo n fye alaifi yi nyi.
Ntucenu fye to fa oza wa zan-fye laifi zanyi ntu n na anya ɓo n fye gyi ko nfye sin. Ko ntu ge fye ta shi a Yahudiyi anyipyei agyi-gyi yi bwa lon, ko epya woi ko asabar woyi m.
Gama adeye ɓei zhin awyidna ntu n esa fyewyi ɓonu, n ɓa ɓei zo esa n Kristi ɓei ɓe n cei nyi. Ɓa ɓei zhin ofun ɓehin-hin nyanu. N kwo ɓe lo, wato, Kristi n wohin tukwo.

Fye to ye zaho-zahoi wa ci fye ge fye ku bwi, ntu ge fye ta zhin a malaika sujada lon. Shi ɓa gna fye ge tilas fya zhin nyin, ɓai gna ge ɓaku gye ruya ɓai kpela nge ko kuncelo fya gye. Aza tukwo mwayi (koda yake ɓa gna nge ɓata mwa ɓahin tukwon.) Ɓa ce-ceyi lo dna n ɓa aɓemwi.
Ama ɓato ɓedolo n Kristi yin, tukwo n yi zhin okwo nayi nyin, gama yifi n wo nayi nu yi mwa, yi bwa nyagyi n kalayi n Shekwoyi aba.
Shi fye ku fi, n Kristiyi, deye la fye loya n anyi ɓemwi ngye shi oza ɓo pwo nwu, dna n ɓemana zhin n na wyidna bwashi-kninu zhin fye ye viɓa n pa payi n na awyidna yi ge,
to gyin, to towon, harma nge ato to anya gyiho pya bwan ma?
Aɓo kni ye pya ɓa zhin aza ɓowu nu kawai, ntuge aɓei zhin nya gyi agyi nu a zhin apma n cei.

Aɓo kni ye wulo ngye ɓa bmiya, gama aɓokni ye pya ye n na aɓo bwashi n kala yinu, ndna ɓo, ɓai ga ɓa nayi wahala. Ama ɓato n kalai ɓa gyi nasara tu n oza a nubo zhin n na shakpe nukwoyin. Ɓa bwa oza zhin wa zhin aɓokwo nu.
Shi fye ɓei bwa wye-wyei n jesun, esa n Kristi ɓei laka n efi nyi, fye la awyetu, nwo nyabwa yakwo, n na gmadayi eshe nya, aba n wo sase tu lo n Shekwoyi bwaizhebwa, n she n mwa-mwai n ikoyi nyi.
Fye zhin aɓo nubo nu n ɓa lo eshe, fyeto la esa n mwa n na anyiɓonubo zhin yin.
Anyiɓo to fi fye pwan, ngye oza n wo lafi. Ofye wyewyeyi hin-hin lo n eshe n Kristi yi ɓedo n Shekwoyi.
Esa n Kristi nwo zhin eyi wye-wyeyi hin-hin, wa jezeɓe fye ɓei bmiya na fyei bwa owo mwa-mwa.

Fyeku aɓo anukwoyi anyi nya ya, fye ku aɓo anukwoyi wu n ɓa fi n fyemi nyi, fye la abwa kun n na anagbai zhi, cegye, shakpe n na aɓo pwawo vinyikwo nya yi, fyeto gyi anya manayi anyi nya wyen, gama deye kwo zhin shangba nu.
Shekwoyi minagyi tulo n na aza, n ɓa zhin aɓeye pya nyi.
Fye ɓei zhin fyei zhin ɓa esa n fye ɓei zhin anyi nya nu nyi.
Ama nsaiye, esa la si n fye ɓa kma anya gye ya, fya kma jekpe kwo-kwoyi minagyi nya ya, nbmi-bmiyi, akmi, na ɓeda kasayi.
Fye to ce akata fi ajen, ofye wyewyeyi kwo-kwoyi nu ɓei zhin kwoi zhin lonu, nsaiye kwo la fi.
Nsaiye fye se ase woi-woi nu, kwoi tu ɓemana mwi ci-ci, kwoi zhin atna kwa wu ngye Kristi, n wa zhin wyewyeyi woi-woi n efye mi nyi.
Dna n wye-wyeyi woi-woi ye, oza ekni, ko ilimi, ko oza masei kwo to zhin nyaho nun, anya gye vinya to zhin nyaho nun, ndei oza n Kristi yi lo okwo nu zhin nyaho, woi gni n na aza ɓonu vinya.

Tunda Shekwoyi la fye kni, n wa ga fye wye-wyeyi woi-woi nyi, ntu n wo ye-ye lolo yi ɓo n fye aba, fye tu sun-sun-gye mwi, n bugbafuyi n na azaye n cei. Fye to damu n ɓei n ɓa ɓa dan, ama fye sin wahala dna n na atnazhin n hakuri yi.
Fye zhin peceye fyei zhin shiri fya zhin aza gafara. Fye to shi za n fye min, fye pa ge Dagayi n ku gafara zhin fye, ntucenu tilas fya zhin azaje gafara.
Nkwo sin vinya, fye fa ye-ye kwa gyi be n ofye awye-wyeyi nlonu ikklisiya vinya ɓa sase nbugbai gmanyi.
Fye fa bugbafu n kwo gmi n Kristi aba nyi, kwa dna n fye abugbami cici, gama efye tnu-tnu nyi n fye sai n fye zhin owo nayi aganyi. Fyei zhin godiya cici.
Fye pa enya ɓo n Kristi ɓei wu nyi, fye fa owo aɓeda kwa dna n fye abugba mi, kwa ce fye. Fye wu fye azaje, fyei kwo ɓa n zabura yi, n anyi zafun nyayi, fyei kwo anyi ga Dagayi n bugba dayi.
Enya vinya n fya zhin kwo fya da, fye fa kwa ze wakili Dagayi Yesu nya, fya ɓe n gnisun n woi n Shekwoyi Dada abye fya zhin wo godiya.
Ofye anyikwoza, fye vi efye aɓa ɓo gama nyanu n Shekwoyi wa zhin shiri ga fye.
Ofye azanugbayi tila fya ye n fye anyikwozayi, fyei wuɓa alheri, to fya gyi minagyi nɓai, ko fya wun bugba n ɓa yin.
Ofye aɓi tilas fya vi ofye azakwoyi ɓo–efye adada n efye ayai–gama deye kwo da Shekwoyi agma.
Adada, fye to wun efye aɓi bugba, har bugba bma ɓa ya m, ɓa fa kukari zhi ɓon.
Efye afyenu tilas fya vi efye adagayi anyi nya ɓo to fya zhin atna fya zhin oɓo n kwo daɓa ɓai zhi nu gmanyin, ama fye vi ɓa ɓo cici, ntu n fye Dagayi ye-ye ɓo n fye n cei pma fya dawo bugba nyi.
Fye zhin tnu-tnu n kalayi n bugba bui-buyi n esa yi vinya, n gye fye zhin Dagayi tnu-tnu nu to ge ngye efye adagayi nyan.
Fyei pa ge, Dagayi Kristi nu ɓa gba fye ta, woi ga fye anya vinya n wo cei. Owo nu nfye zhin wo tnutnu.
Nfye to la fyehin yin, wo ɓei gbafye n nya yi n fye to n cei pman, gama wo ta kni oza kni-kni n na awa daban, n oza ɓa laka ai dawon.
Ofye afyenu adagayi, fye zhin ofye afyenu ɓo cewo, fye pa n fyehin ge fye n Dagayi lolo n eshemi n wo kafye wyelo.
Ato ɓe fye n na aduwa zhin yin, fye pmi Shekwoyi amsa, fya pa fya zhin wo godiya esa n ɓa ɓe n cei.
Fye to ze amwi, fye zhin yi aduwa ntu yi ɓo n na ɓai Shekwoyi wa gayi aba n yi ɓa zhin Nabari manayi Kristi nya waʼazin n mi dna n Kurkuku n tu kwo ɓo nyi.
Fye zhin aduwa, n mi ɓa zhin waʼazi n bugba kalayi, n nu-nuyi n jesun, ma wu kwo pei-pei shi kwo kunce ma zhin.
Fye zhin apma n esa yi n fya bwa vinya, fya gna aza nabari manayi, fye la ce, shi fye daɓo n ɓai n wu.
Fye fa efye azata ɓa ze a manayi n tukwoyi gyi, n na ɓai fya bwa amsa manayi n fye ɓa ga aza.
Tikikus eyi zado ye-yei, wo ɓa gnafye shi mi wulo, wo zhin oza nu n wo zhin tnu-tnu n kalayi, woi zhin Dagayi tnu-tnu n gnisun n mi yi.
Mi tnu n woi n na bai wa gye she fye wu, wa fumi bugba wa gami bugba kala njesun.
Mi tnu n Onisimus yi, eyi za ye-yei ɓemanayi zhinyi, oza nfye mi, owo n Tikikus yi ɓa ga fye nabari vinya.
Aristarkus, n wo gnisun n miyi n ya nyi wo dnalo n kurkuku, wo tnu fye n wo gnaɓiyi n Markus yi Barnaba, zhalu shi ma gnafye nyi fye gwo Markus n na agmadayi n wa ɓe fye aba.
Yesu Yustus wo tnu fye lo nwo gna ɓiyi a deye zhin a Yahudiyi a Yesu-viyi nu, n ɓa kunsun lo n miyi, ɓai fumi bugba.

Abafras, n wo gmi n fye ayi nyi, Yesu Kristi fyenu, wo tnu fye n wo gnaɓiyi, wo zhin aduwa cici ntu fye ɓo, woi nya Shekwoyi wa ga fye kala, wa bma fye zhin fya kpe wo nufi ye n sai vinya n na aɓo vinya n fye ɓa zhin.
Mi gnafye ɓehin-hin, woku tnu-tnu zhin fye n mwa n wo aduwa yi, n na a Yesuviyi n ɓafi n Lawudikiya n Hiyarabokis nyi.
Likita Luka wo tnu fye n wo gnaɓi yi, n Dimas yi.
Fye ɓi a Yesu-viyi gna n ɓa fi n Lawudikiya nyi, n Nimfas yi n na azai n ɓa ye zhi n wo puwa nyi.
Sanu n fya wasikaye ɓa, fya tnu n kwoi n Lawudikiya. Efyehin fya ba wasika n ma ka gaɓa nyi.
Fya gna Arkibbus, “La tabata lalle ho zhin oɓo lo n Dagayi wa gnaho ge ho zhin.”
Emi gnaɓi nyi n mi rubutu yi n ma ka. Fye pami ɓo dna ya n kurkuku, Shekwoyi anabarka ɓa shekna fye, Amin.

Wasika ye gmi n Bulus aba nu, ɓedo n Silwanus yi, n Timatawus yi, kwoi lo ikklisiya aba n Tasaluniki, ofye nfye zhin Shekwoyi; Dada nya, n Dagayi Yesu Kristiyi nyi. Anabarka, n bugbafu yi, ɓa ze efye cauta dnagmayi nɓa kun n Shekwoyi eyi Dada aba n Yesu Kristi eyi Dagayi nyi.
Yi sa Shekwoyi ami lo cici ntu fye ɓo, yi zhin aduwa ga fye nsayi vinya.
Yi ta ze ofye atnu-tnu ye-ye nya amwi, esa n yi daɓo n Shekwoyi Dadayi, ntu fye ɓom, nfye gaiciya ga kalada yi, nfye awyetu yi nfye cei ntu Dagayi Yesu Kristi jezeɓe ɓo nna anyi nyin.
Yi kpelo ge Shekwoyi la fye kni, eyi azaje ye-yeyi n Shekwoyi ye fye n mwa nyi.

Gama esa n yi ɓei ɓe fye n Nabari manayi nyi, kwo to ɓei ze oɓo gbeloyi nu n fye aban, ama fye ɓei kna tnubua n na gmadayi. Enya n yi ɓei gna fye, kwo ɓei ku tnu-tnu yakwo lo nfye mi, ntu ge Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi ɓei ku buzangna ga fye, fya kpe lalei ge ɓeda n yi gna fye nyi kwo zhin gaiciya nu. Fyei kpe lo shi eyi ase-se ɓei ku wu fye nge eyi ɓeda zhin gaiciya nu.
Ntu ce nu fye ku ze eyi aviyi n Shekwoyi anya yi, ntu ge fye ɓei la eyi ɓeda gwo n bugba buibuyi n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi aba, to fyei gye efye anuwan n wahala yi nbugbawun yi n kwo ɓei ɓe fye n ce yin.
Ofye nfyehin fye ku ze ɓesisi n a Yesu-viyi aba, nɓa fi n Helleni kni nyi.
Nsaiye Dagayi ɓeda nla kun nfye aba, kwoi gnami lo azaje aba vinya, kwoi lo aknido, ntu ge abaho-bahoyi n ya lo ya wo aza ɓai gna yi efye gaiciya ga ɓo.
Ntu ge ɓa gnayi shi fye ɓei gwo yi nwu, shi fye ɓei pmi avun wu efye ashan-gba, fya vi Shekwoyi, n nabai nsayi ye Shekwoyi wye-wyeyi da n gaiciya da yi, wo nu gmanyi ɓa ze fye tukwoda.
Ɓai da lo ngye shi fye nawyetuyi lo ntu Shekwoyi Nugun jezeɓe n ʼshe, wato Yesu, n Shekwoyi ɓei la wo kala n vingwo nyi, wo nu zhin eyi Gniyi n Shekwoyi minagyi n kwo ɓe lo nyi.
Fye kpelo nfyehin, omi azaje, shi eyi ziyara ɓei ku zhin ampanyi.
Fye kpelo shi a ɓei zhin yi ɓo n tna bmiya yi n Filibi, kafin yi ɓe ofya ba, shi yi ɓei sin wahala n sun. Ama Shekwoyi wa gayi kala ya je fye waʼazi zhin, koda yake anuwun-yi ɓei sheyi gun.
Ntu cenu fye ku gye, yi to ɓei zhin waʼazi n nufi nukwoyi nu kwo shakpen, yi ɓei zhin fye n gaiciya yi nu ɓehinhin.

Gama yi daɓo n gye Shekwoyi a tnu-tnuyi nu, n wa ye n ɓai, woi gaɓa tnu-tnu nge ɓa da gaiciya, yi to shan ɓeda ye do ko fyewyin, n nabai kwa da aza n ɓa won, gama yi zhin Shekwoyi nu tnu-tnu gmanyi, n wo dna eyi abugba wyenyi, n ɓa aɓo nubo zhin yi.
Yi to zhin a tna kwo fyewyi ya wan fye hankali n ɓeda dadayin, shi fye kpelo, Shekwoyi kpelo, yi to ɓei dna fye kwoce nu n na bai fya ga yi agyiwye n.
Yi to shin ye n ge zaho ciyin, koda yake yi n iziniyi lo fya ga yi mwa-mwa ntu ge yi zhin atnu-tnuyi nu.
Ama yi ɓei zhin peceiye n efye aba, shi oɓi ya zhin wa gawo ɓi nyagyi peceiye nyi.
Yi ɓei ye fye n mwa har ya ga fye Shekwoyi ɓeda, n yi awye-wye yi ɓe.

Fye to ye palon, omi azaje, shi yi ɓei zhin tnu-tnu n fye aba n sun, Nsukwoyi n nyi-pyei, ye zhin tnu-tnu, ya bwa nyagyi n na abai to ya tu azaho akayan, yi zhin Shekwoyi Nabari manayi waʼazi nfye aban.
Fye zhin yi asaidada nu n fyehin, n Shekwoyi yi, nge yi to n laifiyi lo n zaho aba n fye min.
Yi ɓei daɓo n fyei ngye shi oɓidada zhin wa daɓo n wo aɓiyi. Fye to palon, shi yi ɓei tna fye abwa, yi gyifye wyen?
Nge, fye to ye, efye ase-se, kwa wun Shekwoyi bugban, ama fye gawo bugbabuiyi n wa yi fye fi n wo ebemi nyi, fya gwo wo mwa-mwa nyi.

Yi ta fa Shekwoyi ami sa ɓo n tu ce n, ngye esa n yi ɓei zhin fye waʼazi, fye to ɓei zhin nubwo nge eyi ɓeda nun, ama fye ɓei gwo eyi ɓeda ngye Shekwoyi ɓedanu, Okwoi nu ɓehinhin. Kwa shan fyedo esa n fye ɓei gakwo gaiciya cei nyi.
Njesun emi azaje fye ku wahala sin shi ikklisiya n Yahudiya ɓei sin nyi. Wahala nfye aza akun, shi ɓa ɓei sin wahala n na a Yahudiyi akun nyi.
Sanu n ɓa ɓei ku anabi wu, n na avun ɓa wu Dagayi Yesu, n saiye ɓa kuyi ga wahala n tna sun-sun gye, ɓa la yi nya ya. Ɓa zhin gaba n Shekwoyi n na azayi.
Ɓai zhin atna to ɓa ye ge yi zhin abyedo waʼazin, ɓai wo dna ge azaho ɓa pwo. Ntu cenu oɓa laifi ce kwoi mwa. Ama Shekwoyi minagyi n la ɓa wan.
Omi azaje, n na avun, yi ku fye fa yi to ye zhi lo n fye aban esa fyewyin (eyi abugba to fa fyem) ya zhin atna n mwa ya jezeɓe ya gye fye.
Yi ɓei n cei pma ya ɓe, emi, Bulus, mi zhin atna ci-ci ma ɓe, ama shetan to wa yen.

Gama yi sase, n kniɓei nua kwoi gayi awyetua, bugba bui, n yi lada yi n yi ɓa gma? Ofyenu, Eʼe fye ɓei ɓe yi n bugba buyi n mwa, yi gni-a-gni zhin n gnisun n Dagayi Yesu Kristi abye esa n wa jeze ɓe n jesun.
Gama efyenu zhin eyi arawani n bugba buyi.
Esa n yi to ɓei shan min, ya pmin ya zun shaula ya ge kwo bmiya lo ya ku cefi n Atina.

Ya tnu n Timatawus yi, eyi zado n tnutnu kunzhin-yi, Shekwoyi tnu-tnu yi wa ɓe efye aba, wa ɓe fye gaiciya ga kala n bugba kalai, n nabai to fya zun fi ko fya bma bugba ya ntu wahala ɓo n fye sin nyin. (Ama fye kpelo wahala ye pya dna n Shekwoyi shiri ntu n yi ɓo.)
Ko esa n yi ɓei kunsun n fyeyi nyi, yi ɓei ku gna fye ge safyewyi wahala ɓa ɓe, kwoi la ku ɓe.

Shimi ɓei danyi, esa n mi to ɓei shan mi to mi yi gye fye wyen, ma tnu n Timatawus yi wa kpe kwo efye gaiciya ga ye n kalayi lo, mi ɓo wodna kwo shetan ku nasara gyi tu n ofye tukwo, eyi tnu-tnu kwoi la ze gbeloyi.
Nsaiye Timatawus la jeze ɓe, woi gna mi ge, of ye gaiciya ga, n ye-ye yi ɓa gyi abye lo. Fyei pa eyi ziyara ɓo n bugba bui buyi shi fye n cei pma fya gye yi wye, shi yihin cei pma ya gye fye wye nyi.
Ntu cenu omi azaje bugba kuyi fu, dna n yi wahala n yi sin n ya nyi, tunda yi kpelo ge fye mi zhi lo n Dagayi nyi.
Yi ɓa mizhi dna nyaho-nyahoyi ndei yi kpelo ge fye kpema Dagayi lo.
Yi ta mi ya sa Shekwoyi ami n kunce, ntu fye ɓon! Ntu bugba buibui ɓo n fye gayi ngye shi Shekwoyi wo yi aduwa ntu fye ɓo nyin.
Nsukwoyi n nyipyei yi zhin aduwa ntu nfye ɓo, yi gyi Shekwoyi wye, ya gye fye njesun ya nu enya n kwo ce yalo n fye gaiciya ga.
Fa Shekwoyi eyi Dada nwohin tukwo, n yi Dagayi Yesu yi, wa tnu n yi, nfye aba njesun.
Fa Dagayi wa zhin ofye yeye kwa mwa lo abye-abye, kwa nu, kwoi gyiya ga efye azaje n na azayi vinya, shi eyi ye-ye ɓe fye aba nyi.

Deye ɓa zhin ofye abugba ɓa bwa kala, n tna laifi, n Gyi-gyi-yi n Shekwoyi eyi Dada yi. N na bai fya gni-gni zhi n wa abye n tna laifi, ewyi n eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi ɓei jezeɓe n gnisun n na azayi n ɓa zhin owo anya nyi.

Omi azaje fye kpelo, shi fye ɓa da Shekwoyi bugba, dna n fye asese fyegyi-fyegyi, gama fye kpe wyidna ye lo n yi ɓei ga fye dna n Dagayi Yesu, Nsaiye yi gyi fye wye dna n Dagayi Yesu, nge fye zan-zan shi ya wu fye.
Cama Shekwoyi n cei pmalo fya ze aza Gyi-gyi-yi, ntna cegye, Fya bui anagbayi si n na abai zaho-zahoi wa pa mula n gyi-gyi-yi.
To ge n shakpe yin, shi abyedo zhin nyin, ntu n tna Shekwoyi yekpe ɓo n wo azokwoyi nyin.
Deye kwonu zhin Shekwoyi ɓeye, nge fye to gyi efye zado fi fya a ezado nyikwon, ntuge Dagayi ɓa ta fye n mwa, shi yi ɓei shin fye gna nyi.
Gama Shekwoyi to yi yi, ya ze aza nu nɓa bugbayi nu-nuyi n cegye yi nun, n nu-nuyi n shakpe yin, ama ya ze aza agyi-gyi-yi.
Oza n wo to vi wyidna yen, wo ta zun aza ɓeda nu gnan, ama Shekwoyi nya n wo ga fye owo Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi nyi.
Ama ntu n na azaye n cei ɓo, n kwo kunce a bwa kwo n na Shekwoyi aza ba nyi, mi to n na apma yi lo ma da ɓeho tu n kwo tukwon, Gama Shekwoyi n wohin wo wu fye lo, shi fye ɓa ye najeyi.
Ɓehin-hin ofye ye-ye n kalai lo nfye a Yesu-viyi aba, n fye kni vinya. Har nsaiye yi gyi fye wye fye ye ɓa lo na bye.
Fye fa deye kwa ze fye ɓemwi, fya sase n lafiyai, fyei zhin fyehin tnu-tnu, shi yi ɓei shin fye gna nyi.
Nnabai aza nɓata vi Yesun ɓa ga fye gaiciya ɓa ga fye mwa-mwa, n fye ta zhin akma fya kpema aza ntu fye bukata ɓom.
Nsaiye, omi azaje, mi n cei pmalo fya kpe oɓo n kwo bwa Yesu viyi, esa n wa fi n cei. N na abai n kwa bwa fye, fyeta wun bugba n duwyin, ngye aza n ɓato n na awyetu yin.
Shi yi ku gaiciya ga nge Yesu la fi, wa lakala n vingwo n jesun nyi, yi ga gaiciya n jesun n ge esa n Yesu ɓa jezeɓe, Shekwoyi ɓei jezeɓe n na a Yesu-viyi, n ɓaku fi n gnisun n woi nyi.
Nɓa gna fye deye Dagayi wu-wu nu, nge eyi n yi n wye-wyeyi, esa n Dagayi ɓei jezeɓe nyi, yi to ɓei kukala ya gyi aza apye-apye n ɓa fi n vingwo nyin.
Gama Dagayi nu ɓei kashi ɓe n eshe, n wyisa kalai, wyisa a malayika esu ɓegye nya, n Shekwoyi mwayi yi. A Yesu-viyi n ɓa ku fi, ɓanu ɓei kukala n na abye ɓa sun n Dagayi.
N na avun, eyi n yi cezhi n wye-wyeyi n fi n na anyi nyi, a ɓei ku yi ya shegun Dagayi n ʼshe bmana, elonu yi ɓei kunsun n woi nyalo-nyalo.
Ntucenu fye fu aje bugba, fya ga aje kala n ɓeda ye yi.
Aɓeye vinya ɓei zhin n knisayi a? Kwo to zhin tilas nu ma da ɓeho tu n kwo tukwon, omi-zaje.
Gama fye kpelo sarai, nge zaho-zahoi ta kpeye lon, Dagayi nyipyei ɓei ɓe n tna esa dnai nu, ngye evi n sukwoyi.

Sanu n aza ɓei ci nge, “Lafiya lo sarai nyaho to wunya lon bugba fulo.” Nsa gmanyi yi wahala ɓa ɓeɓa tukwo, shi kagna zhin kwa ɓe nyikwoza aba to woi dna ce nyin. Aza deye to ɓei bwa asibui ban, gama abwi-ba to lo n.
Ama emi aza je, fye to filo n wyegma n na aɓeye tukwon, Dagayi nyipyeyi to ɓei ɓe efye aba ngye evin.
Gama fye zhin abuzangna ɓinu anyipyeyi aɓi njesun fye to zhin wyegma nyanu kwo sukwo nyan.
Ntucenu fye ku zhi fya pmi, fyeto wangye n gye azajen. Fye pmi owo zhi-zhi fya ku awye shi.
Sukwo zhin gyewan sanu, n esai n aza sin eje, kwo zhin ɓa.
Ama eyi n yi fi n buzangna nyi, yiku hankali bwa, n gu-gui n gaiciya ga yi, n ye-ye yi, ya kun kata eyi gni-gni nya.
Gama Shekwoyi to kni yi wa zewo minagyi yakpe yi nun, ama wa gni yi dna n eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi.
Wafi ntu nyi ɓo n na bai ya sase nwoi nyalo nyalo. Kwo yi kufi, kwo yi-i ye n wye-wyeyi, esa n wo ɓei jeze ɓe n cei.
Ntu cenu fye ga aje bugba kala, fye mi aje zhin shi fye shin zhin lo nyi.
Omi azaje, fye ga efye ikklisiya tukwoda mwa-mwa, nɓa zhin tnu-tnu n kalayi n fye aba nyi, ɓai daɓo n fyei tu na aɓo tukwo n ɓato bmiya lo nyin.
Fye gaɓa mwa-mwa fya ye ɓa nfye abugbai vinya ntuge ɓa bmafyenu zhin. Fye pa to fya wu anya n na jeyin.
Omi azaje, fye gnakni aza n ɓa wo bwato, fye fu aza bugba n ɓa bugba la wunya, Fya zhin aza atna nɓa to n kalai lon, fya zhin hakuri n na azai vinya.
Fye to ye nge oza wo gba ɓenukwoyi ta n ɓenukwoyi yin, ama fye zhin atna fya zhin aje ɓemana, n na azaje vinya.
Fye dagma cici.
Fye zhin aduwa cici.
Ɓeho-ɓehoi n kwa bwa fye, fye zhin Shekwoyi godiya, gama Shekwoyi nufi nyi n fye aba, n fye zhin Kristi Yesu nya nyi.
Fye to wo Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi tnu-tnu ɓi nfye abugba min.
Fye to ci aza wyegba n ɓa wu nyanyin
ama fye mwi ɓelo-ɓehoi n na da, fya kpe kwo gaiciya nu, ndei kwo zhin gaiciya nu fya gwo kwo.
Fye bui ɓenukwoyi doho-dohoi si.
Fa Shekwoyi bugbafu nya n wohin tukwo wa ze fye agyi-gyi-yi. Fa efye zafun, wye-wyeyi, n nayi ɓa bwa kala n tna laifi, har ewyi n eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi ɓei jezeɓe n cei.
Shekowyi n wa yi fye fya ze owo aɓi nyi, wo ɓa zhin fye aɓeye vinya shi wo ɓei zhin fye alkawali.
Omi azaje fye zhin aduwa ntu yi ɓo.
Fye dna abwa do gami n na a Yesu-viyi ajeyi n ɓo.
Mi gna fye, dna n Dagayi eye fye ba wasikaye ga a Yesu-viyi vinya.
Anabarka dnagmayi n ɓa kun n eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi aba nyi, ɓa kusun n zaho-zahoi n fye mi.
Wasika ye gmi n Bulus akun, n Silwanus yi, n Timatawus yi, Kwoi lo ikklisiya aba n Tasalunika, nfye zhin Shekwoyi eyi Dada n Dagayi Yesu Kristi nya nyi.
Shekwoyi Dada n Dagayi Yesu Kristi yi wo tu fye anabarka n mwa, n bugba fuyi nu nfye a bugba.
Omi azaje, Shekwoyi godiya zhin ntu fye ɓo kwo to zhin ɓe mana nu kawain, eyi tnu-tnu nu n Shekwoyi aba, ntu fye gaiciya ga mwa-mwa yi ɓo, ntu ofye ye-ye ɓo n kwo mwalo n na aje aba nyi.
Adayi lo n mwa har yi gna a ikklisiya aje ofye hakuri ɓo n gaiciya ga yi n Shekwoyi, dna n fye wahala n fye sin nyi.
Zokwo gmanyi nu nyi n Shekwoyi zhin tnu-tnu, gama wo zhin a pma n wahala yi, woi zhin fye shiri ntu wo bemi ɓo.
Njesun woi zhin owa shiri ɓedo n tatai, ntu n na aza ɓo nɓa ga fye wahala nyi.
Ntuce nu nɓa gnafye, nfye sin wahala nyi Shekwoyi ɓa gafye sunlsun n gnisun n yi, esa Dagayi Yesu ɓa ɓe, esa n Yesu ɓa kashi ɓe n eshe, to yi dna cem, ɓedo n wo amalaika iko nya yi.
Woi ɓe n owai, tu na aza tukwo n ɓata ye ɓa kpe Shekwoyi yen, ɓai to ye ɓa gwo wo shiri wa gni ɓa dna n eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi n.
Aɓei taɓa fi n anapr nyalo-nyalo nya, n gnajegna-gnayi ya n Dagayi, ɓa ta gye owo iko mwa-mwa wyen, har abada.
Sanu n wo ɓei ɓe, wa gwo latu n mwa mwayi n wo aza gyi-gyi-yi aba. Fyehin ɓo la wo tu ce, ntu ge fye ku gaiciya ga, n ɓeda n ya gnafye tu nwo tukwo nyi.
Ntu cenu yi zhin aduwa ntu fye ɓo cici, nna bai eyi Shekwoyi, dna nwo iko, wo ɓa zhin fye fya ze aɓi manayi, ngye shi wo ye fya ze, wa zhin fye fya nu ofye aɓomwi manayi, ntu fye gaici-ya ga ɓo.

N lonu aza vinya ɓa ci Dagayi Yesu Kristi eye, ntu n na aɓo ɓbo gye n nfye. Ofye mwa-mwa dnagmayi nunyi vinya, nge fye zhin Kristi nyanu. Sun-sun gye dnagmayi eyi Shekwoyi nya, n Dagayi Yesu Kristi yi nu na zhin deve kwoi si fye.

Nsaiye, Eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi ɓeɓe njesun, n yi yezhi yi n wo aba ma? Mi gyifye wye, agu to vin fyen, omi azaje, shi fye wo ai ce akata nge Dagayi nyipyei la lu ɓen. Nfya wo aza ɓai gna ge, ɓa gye ruya, kwo ge Shekwoyiwa tnu ɓa tnu-tnu, kwo wasika n fye zhin nubwo ge kwo gmi n mi aba, fye to ga gaiciyan.
Fye to ye zaho-zahoi wa dna fye kwoce kwo fyewyin. Gama nyipyei ta ɓen sai anya ngun aba nku zhin, kmisunyi esa n aza ɓei na Shekwoyi aɓo, n sayi oza kala kpeyi anapi ɓi wo ɓei ɓe.
Wo ɓei tu Shekwoyi cegye n nya doho-dohoi n na gakwo mwa-mwa, Wo ɓei lo wo sase tu n Shekwoyi nyakun ngye Shekwoyi, woi cige wo zhin Shekwoyi nu.
Fye to ye palo nge mi ɓei ku ce gna fye, esa n mi ɓei kunsun n fyei nyin?
Fye kpe enya ye lo n kwo ye n woi shi, to woi ɓe yan, wo ɓa bwa ɓe owo sai lasi nu.
Tnu-tnu n oza kala kpei n anapi nyayi ɓei zhin, esa n wa ɓe, kwo gyi abye lo n saiye, ama owo nwohin tukwo ta ɓen, sai oza n wo hana n woi nyi wola laka.
