Nsai oza nukwoyi ye ɓei ɓe, oza n Dagayi Yesu ɓei bmiwo na n wo gbe osun yi, woi wu wo, esa n wa jeze ɓe n cei.
Benukwoyi zhin-hi ye, wo ɓei ɓe ngye Shetan a tnu-tnu kaya, n nunuyi n Shetan ikoyi, woi dna aza kwoce n na aɓe wo-woyi n wo ɓei zhin.
Wo ɓei dna aza kwoce kpekpe n ɓa lo anapi nyi–gama ɓala gaiciya aɓo na, ɓato ye kwo, ɓa gakwo gaiciya, n na bai kwa gni ɓam.
Ntucenu Shekwoyi ɓei fa ɓa, ɓa ga akata gaiciya n ɓa bugbayi vinya.
Aɓei da ɓa owa dei-dei shi ɓa ga akata gaiciya, ɓai na gaiciya aɓo, ɓai gyi abye fi n ɓa a laifi.

Ama tilas ya zhin Shekwoyi godiya cici ntu fye ɓo, eyi aza je n Dagayi ye fye nyi, gama Shekwoyi a ɓei kni fye tunyi n sapa, wa ga fye gni-gni, woi zhan fye ya n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi ntu fye kpema ɓo n gaiciya.
Wo ɓei zhin apma n yi, wa gna fye Nabari manayi. Wa yi fye fya ɓe fya bwa mwa-mwa eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi nya.
Nna aɓeye vinyai fi n bugba, omi azaje, fye ku mi zhi fya ku gaiciya shi dei-dei, n yi ɓei wu fye nyi n doyi n yi ɓei ka fi fye n wasika nyi.
Eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi n wohin tukwo n Shekwoyi eyi Dada, n wa ye yi wa gayi atnazhin nyalo-nyalo nya n na awyetu yi n yi to kunce ya bwan.
Wo zhin fye bugba a tna, n na atnazhinyi vinya, wa bma fye zhin n ɓo manayi vinya, n fye ɓa zhin fyei da.

To, mi ye ma zo nu, mi azaje, shi mi zo n wasika ye nyi, mi, ye fya zhin aduwa ntu yi ɓo. Fya zhin aduwa n na abai Dagayi ɓeda ɓa gyi abye, kwoi gyi nasara abaho-bahoi n kwa lo. Kwoi gyi nasara aba vinya shi kwo ɓei zhin esa n kwo ɓei ɓe fye aba nyi.
Fye zhin aduwa, ya pwo n na aza nukwoyi akun, gama aza vinya nu taye Dagayin.
Ama Dagayi zhin egbe-nuyi nu, wo ɓa ga fye kala wa gu fye n Shetan agam.
Yi n gaiciya ga yi lo ge, fye zhin aɓolo n yi ɓei wu fye nyi, fya zhin ɓa cici.
Dagayi ɓa ga fye awyega fya gane n Shekwoyi ye-ye yi, n hakuri yi n kwo gmi n Kristi aba nyi.

Wyidna nyi n yi ga fye, omi azaje, dna n eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi eye n wo ikoyi. Fye to gyi nugundo n Yesu-viyi doho-doho yi n wo wo bwato, to woi ye wa vi tnu-tnu zhin zbo n kalai, ngye shi yi ɓei gna fye nyin.
Gama fye kpelo tilas fya vi eyi fye, n fye ɓei gye to yi ka nkwo nyin.
Yi to gwo nyagyi n zaho aba to yi-i gba won, ya zhin tnu-tnu mwa, n sukwoyi n nyipyei n na abai ya bwa agyiwye, n yi ɓei cei pma ya zhin apma n cei nyi, ntuge yi to ɓei cei pma ya tu fy akayan.
Kwo to wu ge yi to ɓei n izini yi nu ya nyafye fya gayi nyagyin, ama yi ɓei cei pma ya wu fye, shi fye ɓa zhin tnu-tnu n tu fye asese ɓo.
Esa n yi ɓei nyi n fye aba nyi, yi ɓei ga fye wyidna ye ge, “Oza n wo ta zhin tnu-tnun wo to gyi nyagyin.”
Ama yi wo lo ge, aza ho n fye mi ɓa wo bwato lo, to ɓai ye ba zhin tnu-tnun, ɓai wun esaya dna n na agnagba zhin nu.
Dna n Dagayi Yesu Kristi eye, yi gna aza ye pya, yi gaɓa wyidna, ɓaku zhi pi, ɓa zhin tnu-tnu ɓa bwa nyagyi.
Ofye nfye ce nyi, omi azaje, ato ɓe fye n ɓemanayi zhin yin.
Oza n wo to vi ɓeda n yi cei kafi n a wasika ye nyin, fya kawo wye, fya pmiya nwo aba, n na bai n vinyikwo ɓa wowo.
Fye to shi wo awye ngye efye nuɓaim, ama fye daɓo n woi ngye ozado n wo ye a wuwo zokwo n galgadiyi.
Dagayi bugba fu nya, wo ga fye owo bugbafu, kwo knidoi nu bwa fya, Dagayi wo kunsun n fyei vinya.
Nsaiye omi gnaɓi nyi nmi ka n mi abwayi, shi mi shin zhin n mi wasika, kwa wu nge emi nu na ka, emi abwa nu kakpe n ya.
Eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi anabarka ɓa kpe n fye tukwo vinya. Amin.
Wasika ye kwo gmi n Bulus akun nu, Waʼazi zhin yi Yesu Kristi nya, n Shekwoyi eyi gniyi n Yesu Kristi eyi Dagayi–eyi awyetu.

Kwoi lo Timatawus aba, Timatawus ɓei zhin ngye omi-ɓi nu dna n Dagayi. Fa Shekwoyi eyi Dada, N Yesu Kristi eyi Dagayi wa wu ho owo alheri n sun-sun gyei, wa ga ho bugba fu yakwo n ho bugba mi n ho nubo zhin yi.

Shi mi ɓei da esa n mi ɓei lo Makidoniya nyi, la dna n Afisus ha zhin atna ha kma aza n ɓa wu nya akata nya nyi. Ku oɓa asita n ɓa abyetnuyi ce n ɓa nubo-zhinyi n ge a ɓa gni aza dna n na aɓe a desi n na malaikai ɓei sido n Shekwoyi abye n ɓato n na akpegnin bayin. Anubozhin n na aɓe mwi deye pya zhin ɓa la aɓena kala. Maimakon ɓa bma aza zhin ɓa gwo Shekwoyi shiri gaiciya ga nya.
Enya n kwo womi pwa lo kwonu ge a Yesu-viyi n ɓo vinya ɓa ku nu n ye-yei n kwo gmi n na bugba gyi-gyi-yi oɓa bemwi n gyi-gyi-yi, oɓa gaiciya ga kwa bwa kala.
Ama a malami deye ɓa ku bwi zokwo, ɓai gyi ɓahin esa, ɓai na aɓo, ɓai daɓo n tna ce-ce.
Ɓa ye a kpe ɓaye nge Musa a wyidnayi wuyi, ama ɓa ta kpe ye lo kwo fyewyi enya n na awyidna ye wuyi n.
Awyidna ye bmiya lo, yi ya zhin apma n ɓai shi Shekwoyi ɓemwi nyi.

Ama ato zhin ɓa n yi ɓonu m, n Shekwoyi gni-gni yi n, ntu n na laifi da ɓonu n ɓata ye Shekwoyi nyi n, ɓa n na abugba kala kpenya yi, ɓai tu ekni, ɓai si nyasi, ɓai zhin gaba n ɓa dadayi, n ɓa ayai, aza wuyi.

E, awyidna ye a zhin ɓa ntuge ɓa wu a alaifi da nu, a cegye da aza tna gyi-gyi-yi, n azai n ɓa wangye n na azanugbayi, aɓi wanyi, akata ceyi n na azayi n ɓa zhin oɓo n kwo gni apapa n Shekwoyi anabarkada Nabari manayi, n mi zhin wo tnutnu yi nyi.
Mi zhin Kristi Yesu eyi Dagayi godiya n mwa, shi wa kni mi ma zhin wo tnu-tnu yi, woi gami kala ma zhin wo ɓefyece.
Koda-yake mi ɓei zhin mi-i kpe Kristi eye agye, mi-i zan ɓa fazan, mi-i zhin ɓa ɓo n mi ɓa mi. Ama Shekwoyi wa gyemi sun-sun, gama mito ɓei kpe ɓe ye n mi zhin ntuge mito ɓei kpe Kristi ye n sayin.
O, eyi Dagayi, zhin alheri danu gama wa wumi shimi ɓa kpema wo, ma nu n Kristi Yesu yeyeyi.
Kwo zhin gaiciya nu, mi n cei pma lo aza vinya ɓa kpe ce ye, n ge Kristi Yesu wa ɓe anyi mi wa gni alaifi da, omi yi nu zhin oɓa esu.

Ama Shekwoyi wa gye mi sun-sun, n na bai Kristi Yesu wa zhin apma n miyi, wa wu shi wo zhin hakuri n na alaifi dayi, har n ɓa dnagmayi yi, n na abai, n ɓa ɓa kpe nge ɓa ɓa mi ɓabwa wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya.
Latu n mwamwayi ɓa zhin Shekwoyi nya nu nyalo-nyalo Amin. Wo nu zhin Esu esa vinya nya, n na ta gye won, woi ta shan fin, owonu zhin Shekwoyi gmanyi, n nunuyi n ɓeyekpeyi. Amin.
Nsaiye, Timatawus, omi-ɓi, omi gbe ga nyi n ho aba. Sun okun n kalai Dagayi okun, shi Dagayi gna n na annabi egbe nge ho ɓa zhin nyi.

La gaiciya ga shi n kalai dna n Kristi ha anubo-zhin ze agyi-gyi-yi, ha zhin oɓo n kpe ge kwo zhin ɓemana nu. Gama azaho n la oɓa anubozhin zungna ɓai zhin oɓo n ɓa kpelo ge kwo to bmiya lon, kwo to zhin ɓe wo-woyi nu shi ɓa ya ɓa gaiciya ga dna n Kristi, ɓai la Shekwoyi eye aɓo na lo nun.
Himinayus n Iskandari yi ɓa zhin misali nu n kwo ɓei lami ze tilas ma gaɓa n Shetan akun wa ta ɓa, har esa n ɓa ɓa tumwi to ɓa zhin Kristi eye vinyikwo dna m.
Omi ɓeda nyi n ho aba, zhin aduwa n mwa ntu azaje ɓo, gyi Shekwoyi wye wa gye ɓa sun-sun. Zhin Shekwoyi godiya ntu nya ɓo nwo ɓa zhin ɓa nyi.
Zhin aduwa ntu asu ɓo, na za yi n ɓa zhin a iko da vinya tu n yi eshe, kwo n ɓa n na tnu-tnu yakwoi shi, n na abai n yi ɓa sase n lafiyai, n bugba-fuyi, ya se ase manayi yi zhin nubo n Dagayi ɓo.
Deye bmiya lo, kwoi da eyi Dagayi bugba.
Gama wo ye aza vinya ɓa pwo, ɓa bwa gaiciya ye awyega.
Nge Shekwoyi gni n sepa gmanyi, aza vinya zhin n sepa gmanyi, n Kristi Yesu n wohin tukwo zanyikwoci n dna n ɓa tasin wa ɓe n bai n na aba gmanyi.
Wa gawo wye-wyeyi ntu n na aza ɓo vinya. Ɓeda nyi n Shekwoyi wa tnu n cei dna n esa manayi n na lanyi.
Ai la mi kni gaiciya nu n mi da-ma zhin tnu-tnuyi n nabari da yi, Shekwoyi nya, ma wu gaiciya ye n na abyedo aba, ma wuɓa Shekwoyi shiri gni-gni nya dna n gaiciya ga.
Ntu cenu miye aza vinya ɓa zhin aduwa ɓai ku abwa a gyi-gyi-yi wu Shekwoyi n tna laifi, ntna minagyi, ntna nuwun.

Anyikwoza ce ɓaku ze lo nu, ɓaku ce pi ɓa zhin ɓo kwo bmiya, ɓai pa aje cewo. A Yesu-viyi anyikwo a kpeɓaye ntu n ɓa ɓemana zhin ɓo, to n zokwo shiɓa zhin ɓahin aba, kwo tukwo knin, kwo anya shi-shi, kwo aje anakwoyin.
Anyikwoza, ɓa kna tnubua ɓa tumwi peceiye n tukwo gbayi.
Mita ye anyikwoza ɓa wunya kwo ɓa ze a tukwoda n na azanugbai tukwon. Ɓaku cepi n na aduwa nyakun n yezhi sa.
Ntu kniɓei ya? Ntuge Shekwoyi ɓei zhin Adamu nu nabye wa kma Hawawu zhin.
Shetan to ɓei dna Adamu nu kwocen, ama Hawawu nu, laifi kwa ɓe.
Ntu cenu Shekwoyi wa tnu anyikwoza n na azhinyi, esa n ɓa ma aɓi n cei, ama woɓa gniɓa wyewyeyi ɓai ya kpema wo, ɓai se ase pi-pi-pi, n bmiya ɓai ye n na azai.
Ɓeda ye kwo zhin gaiciya nu nge ndei oza ye wa zhin pasto, wo ɓemwi manayi dnalo n bugba.

Gama tilas Pasto wa zhin oza manayi n na ta dawo ɓeda nukwoyi n, n nyikwoyi gmanyi. Woi zhin tnu-tnu n kalayi, woi zhin nubo, cewo n nu-nuyi n na aɓemana zhinyi. Wa bwa bugba bui a zhiɓeyi ɓai ya ɓe wo puwa, wa zhin malami manayi dna n Shekwoyi ɓeda.
Wo to zhin eje sin yin, kwo anya wu yin, amma wola ze hankali da, mi bwayi, to wa ze oza nu n wo ye agyiwyen.
Owo apuwa da ɓaku ze aza manayi, hankali da n na aɓiyi n ɓa vi ɓo n pye, n tna gnunu-gnunu dayi.
Gama ndei oza to mi n wo iyali bwashin, wo ɓa mi n wuna wa shi ikklisiya bwa vinya?
Pasto tola ze Yesu viyi woi-woi n, kada wo zhin aɓekwo nge alawo kni n pye aɓekwo gyi n kakaya abye. (Shetan ɓei kaya lonu).
A tna viyi ɓa zhin wo seida manayi, n na bai Shetan ta piwo a gam n na ɓeda nukwoyi n wo tukwon, wa fa wo n tna gbebwa n wo ɓa wu owo akni zokwon.
Abyeda, ɓaku ze aza manayi n gye a pasto. Ɓato ku ze aje sin yi yakwon, n na gyiwye ye yin.
Ɓaku ze aza gaiciya da, ɓai vi Kristi n bugbai gmanyi, n wo zhin yi gaiciya ga tukwo nyi.
Kafin a gaɓa abye, aku tnu-tnu gaɓa n ikklisiya amwiɓa gye n ɓa haliyi, n kpe zhinyi, n ɓa ɓa zhin bmiya, ami a kniɓa ɓa ze abyeda.
Oɓa anyikwo ɓaku ɓahin wan shi to ge a jesin yakwo yin, to ge a ɓo shanyi n, ama a gaiciya da dna na aɓo vinya n ɓa zhin.
Byeda wa bwasun n nyikwoyi gmanyi, n na aɓi aɓo viyi ɓai dagma n na ajei.
A byeda n ɓa zhin tnu-tnu n bmiya aza ɓa gaɓa mwa-mwa, njesun ɓa ɓa bwa bugba kala n Dagayi abye dna n gaiciya ga.
Mika aɓo deye gaho, koda-yake mi n na awyetu yi lo miɓa be ho aba esa fyewyi.
N na bai n mi to ɓe n pyen ha kpe a za pya ye n ho ɓa kni, ɓa zhin a tukwoda fi n ikklisiya, Shekwoyi wye-wyeyi da nya, n ɓa fi ɓai shi Shekwoyi gaiciya ɓai la kwo tu nyi.

Kwo zhin gaiciya nu asese manayi dna n Shekwoyi, kwo to zhin oɓo fafayi nun, amma amsa lo n Kristi, n wa ze zanyikwoci wa ɓe anyi, a gye wo n gyi-gyi n tna laifi dna n wo Zafun, amalaika ɓa zhin wo bauta, a zhin wo waʼazi n anyi vinya, aza gwowo n na aba vinya laɓa, a gwo wo njesun wo lo eshemi.
A Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi gnayi pei-pei n ge dna n sa pmaknayi azaho n ɓafi n ikklisiya ɓa ɓei na Kristi aɓo, ɓai vi a malami n ɓa lo tnu-tnu n Shetan ɓeye yi.
A malami ye ɓa ce akata n bugbai gmanyi, har oɓa Zafun nubo zhin nya to kwoi ceɓa ɓepan.
Ɓa ɓei ci ge kwo to bmiya a pa mulan, kwo to bmiya a gyi abun, koda-yake Shekwoyi wa ga anya gye vinya, n na Yesu viyi abanu ɓa gyi ɓa n bugba bui-bui ɓai zhin godiya.
Gama anya vinya n Shekwoyi wa zhin ɓa bmiya, yi ɓa mi ya gyi ɓa n bugbai gmanyi yi zhin godiya.
Ndei ya nya Shekwoyi wa tu kwo anabarka, gama aze kwo manayi n Shekwoyi ɓeda yi n aduwa yi nu.
Nha zhin azaje bayani ye pya, ho nu ho tnu-tnu nu n gye Pasto, n wo n nuboi fu n gaiciya gai n nyawu gaiciya nya yi n ho vi nyi.
To wun esaya hoi naɓo tu n aɓo nɓa to tukwoi n, kwo aɓeda a tna cei, gyi esa n ho kalayi tu aɓo nu nɓa ɓa zhin ho ha mwa dna n Zafun.
Nayi tnu-tnu n bmiya, amma Zafun tnu-tnu n du, kwoi bmaho zhin n nya n ho zhin. Ntu cenu tumwi ha ze Yesu viyi manayi, kwo ta bmaho zhin dna anyi ye nu gmanyin, ama har n doi n kwo ye ɓe-ɓelo.

Gaiciya nu nyi kwo bmiya lo ozahozahoi wa gwo kwo. Yi zhin tnu-tnu n mwa, yi sin wahala n mwa, ntuge aza ɓa ga kwo gaiciya. Gama eyi awyetu lo n Shekwoyi wye-wyeyi da nu, n wa fi ntu na za ɓo vinya nyi tun baga aza nɓa la wo gni-gni gwo.
Wu anya ye vinya ha tabata aza tu ɓa mwi lo dei-dei.
To ye zaho wa ci ho wyegba ntu ge hoye zhin ɓinuyin. La ze ɓa ɓemwi-tu nya. Fa ɓa vi ho nya wu n ho ase-sei, la ze ɓa efye dna n yeye, nho gaiciya gayi, nho aɓonubazhin manayi.
Sai mila ɓe, ba Shekwoyi ɓeda hoi zhin kwo bayani ga ikklisiya, zhin Shekwoyi ɓeda waʼazi.
Zhin apma n ho kpezhinyi, n Shekwoyi wa gaho dna n wo anabi esa n na ikklisiya tukwo da ɓei kpe ho abwa n tukwonyi.
Zhin apma n ho nyaga yi, la hohin ga n tnu-tnu ye, n na abai aza gye ho abye gyi.
Zhin peceiye n na aɓei n ho zhin, n ho anubo zhin yi n jesun. La kpema n ɓo n kwo zhin gaiciya, Shekwoyi ɓa tuho anabarka, wa zhin apma n hoi ha bma azaje zhin.
To daɓo n minagyi yi n zayi n wo kwo hon, ama daɓo n woi peceiye ngye oho dada, da ɓo n na za nawyi yi ngye oho azaje ye-ye yi.
Zhin anyikwoza anyigbakwoyi ɓo ngye oho aya, aɓi anyikwoyi n gye oho amapui, hoi zhin nubo manayi n ɓa tukwo.
Ikklisiya kwo shi anyikwoza bwa n oɓa aɓa n kufi, ndei ɓato n zayi lo n wo ɓa zhin.
Ama ngye ɓa n na ɓiyi lo kwo ayawyi, oɓanu ɓa bma ɓa zhin, gama kwo bmiya ɓemana zhin kwa ya na api nu. Hoi bma a zakwoyi awyekwoyi zhin. Ɓo nu n kwo da Shekwoyi n mwa.
Ikklisiya kwo bma a nyigbai zhin n ɓato n nyahoi n, ɓai to na zayi lon, ndei ɓa kmi awye shi Shekwoyi ɓai zhin aduwa n esai vinya.
Ama to ge ɓai gyi esa, ɓai zan laɓa, ɓai zhin agnagbain, kwo ɓai da aza ɓon, ɓai zan anyi gmada shin ga ɓahin, n lonu ɓai wu ɓahin wyewyeyi n.
Deye kwo la ze ofye ikklisiya wyidna n na bai aviyi ɓa kpe, ɓa zhin oɓo n kwo bmiya.
Ama oza n wo to kula n wo azai esa n ɓa gyi san, tun baga aza n ɓa fi n oza puwan, woto n iko yi lo wa ci ge wo zhin Yesu viyi nun. Oza deye pya wo du tna viyi lo n nukwoyi.
Nyigbayi n wo cei pma pma wa ze ikklisiya tnu-tnu-yi, wo to kasa n na aye shitnayi n, woi bwa mula pa bwa zun gmanyi.

Azai dawo ɓeda manayi ntu n wo atnu-tnu manayi ɓo n wo ku zhin, woku owo aɓi shi n bmiya? Woku ɓemana zhin a zhiɓei n na a Yesu viyi ajeyi? Wo ku bma a nyasan yi zhin n na bugba wunyi? Wo n cei pma n sai vinya wa zhin ɓemana?
Anyigbai n ɓa to kon, ɓato filo n ɓon, gama esa fyewyi sai ɓa pa mula n jesun ɓa na ɓa alkawali ɓo n ɓa zhin Kristi nyi.
Ntuce nu ɓaku zunkni ntuge ɓato shi ɓa alkawali kmisunyi bwan.
Nko avun, kwoi wulo ɓa wo bwato, ɓa gyi esa ɓai laɓa ɓai vi apuwa, ɓai zhin agnagbai, ɓai fi aza aɓo abwa.
Ntu cenu mi gye kwo bmiya lo anyigbayi a nawyi ɓa senu njesun, ɓa ma aɓi ɓa shi ɓahin puwa, n lonu ata da ɓeda nukwoyi tu ɓa tukwon.
Gama edna wo milo azaho n ɓami ɓala awye pmiya n ikklisiya, shetan n la ɓa dna kwoce.
Ma paho n jesun nge, nyigbai azanu ɓa shiwo bwa, ɓato fa deye n ikklisiya akun. Ikklisiya ɓa wu agyiwye kpe anyigbai tukwo nu nɓa to na zahoyi lon, kwo aɓa yi n ɓa ɓa kpe awye shi ɓan.
A Pasto nɓa zhin tnu-tnu cewo n bugbai gmanyi, a gbaɓa dei-dei, a ciɓa dei-dei, tun baga aza n ɓa nyi-wye da waʼazi zhin n nyawu yi.
Gama Shekwoyi ɓeda gna ge, “To pa jaki egbe esa n kwo gni kwoi dna awyi n cein, fakwo kwa gyi kwoi gwo tnu-tnu lo.” Nna abado njesun kwa ci ge, “Tnu-tnu yi gwo lo n wo ladayi.”
To wo gnunu-gnunu tu Pasto tukwon, sai dei n aseida da lo ngun aba kwo ngun ata ɓa zun wo kni.
Ndei wo ku laifi zhin, a gnakni wo n eklisiya abye vinya, n na abai n zaho ta viwo zokwon.
Mi ga ho wyidna ye n Shekwoyi abye n Dagayi Yesu Kristi yi, n wo a amalaika a Gyi-gyi-yi, fya zhin lonu kwo pasto yi zhin ho nungundo nu kwo to woi zhin ho nungundon. Fye zhin aza ɓo gmanyi.
Awyeto ya fye n Pasto kniyin, sakun fya ze owo alaifi pita, kwa ze ngye fya pui ɓa nya nu.
(Deye to ci ge ho to ye zhin eje to won nun, kwo bmiya lo ha towo nsahoi gama kwo zhin, shigbe nu n ho aba, shi nyasan ta faho nyin.)
Pa ge aza ho, har n na a Pastoyi ɓa se-ase fi n laifi azai kpe. Nna aɓeye pya ho ɓa mi ha zhin ɓoho. Ama n na a ɓoho, nyipyei wada nya nu ɓei kpe gaiciya anya ya.
Elonu zaho-zahoi kpe lo ngye shi a pasto ho zhin ɓemana, ama ata kpe oɓa ɓemanayi ɓo n saho yim, sai esa la mwa.
Afyenu a Yesu viyi ɓa zhin oɓa dagayi tnu-tnu ɓai gaɓa mwamwa, fye to fa a ci ge a Kristi aza zhin a bwatoyi nun, fyeto ye a ma Shekwoyi eye san kwo owo ɓeda ntu n deye ɓo m.

Ndei oɓa dagayi zhin Yesu viyi nu, kwo to wunu ge ɓa ɓa fa tnu-tnu zhin ɓon, kwo bmiya ɓa ɓahin yi nu ntuge zado dna gaiciya ga ɓa bwa bmazhin dna n ɓa tnu- tnu. Timatawus aɓeye nɓa zhin gaiciya nyi ha gna aza, ɓa vi ɓa.
Azaho ɓa na aɓeye ɓo, ama ɓanu zhin wuwu hin-hin Dagayi Yesu Kristi nya. Oɓa nu zhin tushi asese manayi nya.
Oza n wa da ɓedo gvo wo zhin aɓekwo nu, n za gbeloi, wo la pmiya n Kristi ɓeda, woi ze kwo aɓona n kwo ɓa zo fi n shewo, n minagyi yi n kwo ɓe n na agyekpei laifi zanshi n na aɓemwi nukwoyi.
Aɓenaiye n ɓa bugbai nunu yi n ɓenukwoyi, ɓa ta kpe gaiciya da m, n ɓa aba Nabari manayi zhin agyiwye bwa zokwo nu fye la bui ɓa si.
Ho cei pma ha zhin nyabwayi hin-hin? Ho la ze nyabwayi n gye ho zhin ɓemana lo hoi dagma.
Nshiinsun, yi to ɓei ɓe n na agyiwyei shin, esa n yi ɓei ɓe anyi n cei nyin. Yin to ɓei gmi n nyahoi shin esa n yi ɓa fin.
Ntu ce yiku eyi abugba zhin pi kwo to yi n na agyiwyei n, ndei yi n nyagyi yilo n na jekpeyi.
Ama aza nɓa ye ɓa bwa nya, sa fyewyi sai ɓa ya ɓenukwoyi zhin ntuge ɓa bwa agiwye, enya nkwo tuɓa eci, kwaze ɓa abugba nukwoyi zhin yi, kwa wu ɓa har ana pi.
Gama agyiwye ye nu zhin oza zhin a ɓenukwoyi aje. Azaho la avun pmi wu Shekwoyi ntu n na gyiwye ɓo, ntuce ɓaku ɓe ɓahin n bugba wun yi n mwa.
O, Timatawus, ho zhin Shekwoyi zanu, bu aɓo nukwoyi ye si vinya, ha zhin oɓo n kwo wu cewo n bmiya, hoi tumwi ha kpema wu, hoi ye azaje, ha zhin hankuri n mi bwai.
Shunkun ga Shekwoyi, la nyima wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya n Shekwoyi la gaho nyi. N ho ku kwo seida zhin n na za abye n mwa begye nyi.
Mi ga ho wyidna n Shekwoyi abye, n wo ga aza wye-wyeyi vinya nyi. N Yesu Kristi abye n wo ɓei ga seida manayi n tna dna n Bunti Bilatus abye nyi
nge ho nu aɓo vinya n wa gnaho ge ho zhin, n na abai to a bwa laifi n ho aban, har eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi wa jeze ɓe.
Gama esa fyewyi Shekwoyi anabarkada n ikoda yi gmanyi, woɓa wu Kristi nʼshe bmana asu aje Esu Dagayi a dagayi aje nya.
Owo nu gmanyi n wo ta shan fin, n wo dna n buzangna yakwo n zanyi-kwoci ta mi wa wu viyi n woyi m. Zanyikwoci to shin wo gyen, woi ta shan wo gyen. Nwo aba, mwa-mwa n iko nyalo-nyalo amin.

Gna aza n ɓa n nyabwai nyi nge ɓato mwa ɓahin tukwon, to ɓa kpema oɓa nyabwan. N kwo ɓa zo esa fyewyi nyin, ama ɓa gma ɓai kpema Shekwoyi wye-wyeyi da, n wo gayi anya vinya n yi n cei pma ntu n yi agmada ɓo nyi.
Gna ɓa ɓa zhin apma n ɓa agyiwyei dna n ɓemana zhin. Ɓa ku ze anyabwai dna n ɓemana zhin, ɓai ga aza n ɓa gyisan lo n bugba bui-buyi, n shiri yi zhin ɓa gni n na azai enya n Shekwoyi wa ga ɓa.
Nɓa zhin nlai ɓa so nya bwa hin-hin shi nu nshemi, nyaso shi manayi nu nyalo-nyalo nya. Ɓa se ase manayi n kwo kunce n na a Yesu viyi n na anyi deye.
O, Timatawus, to gba a kala na ɓeye zhin yi, n Shekwoyi wa fi ho n na akun nyin. To vi aɓenai, a cije nya n ɓa gma n ɓa ɓeyekpe yi nyin. Ɓai wu nu nge ɓa to n ɓeyekpe yi lon.
Aza deye pya n ku gyi nya manayi san n ɓa asese, ɓata kpe Shekwoyi yen. Shekwoyi sun-sun gye kwo kunsun n hoi.

Wasika ye kwo gmi n Bulus akun nu, Yesu Kristi waʼazi zhin yi, n Shekwoyi wa tnu n woi wa gna azanugbai n na anyikwozai n na aba vinya wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya ɓeda, nwa zhin kwo alkawali dna n gaiciya ga n Yesu Kristi nyi.
Kwoi lo Timatawus aba omi ɓi ye-ye yi. Shekwoyi Dada, Kristi Yesu eyi Dagayi wo gaho owo alheri, sun-sungye n bugba fuyi.

Mi zhin Shekwoyi godiya ntu ho ɓo, Timatawus nsukwoyi mi gyi emi Shekwoyi wye, nge wo tu ho anabarka n mwa, wonu zhin emi adada Shekwoyi, omi Shekwoyi nu n woi ce. Omi ɓomwi n mi asese vinya okwonu ma zhin ɓo n kwo dawo.
Awo mi pwa ma gye ho njesun, aɓei dami n mwa, gama mi paho awyenyi ɓe lo, esa n yi ɓei fa aje nyi.
Mi kpe lo shi ho kpema Dagayi n sun, shi oho ya Afniki n oho nyikwo-wyi yi Lois ɓei zhin, mi tabata lo ho ye kpemawo lo, shi ho ɓei kpema wo nsapai.
Miye ma paho ha hohin yi, dna n ho wyepa n na akalai n ho n cei lo, tunyi ewyi n mi ɓei tuho bwa n tukwo, ma tuho anabarka nyi.
Gama Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi, Shekwoyi cauta, to ncei pma lo ha wo aza dnan, ama ha ce, ha bwa kala, ha ye ɓa, ha dagma n ho asese n ɓai.

Ndei ha zhin apma n ikoyei n kwo dna n ho nyi, hota wo aza dnan, n Dagayi ɓeda gnayi n, kwo ɓai kpe ge mi zhin ho nugundo nu, koda-yake mi dnalo n kurkuku ntu n Kristi eye ɓo. Ho ɓa gni n shiri yi zhin-ha sin wahala n miyi ntu n Dagayi-ɓo, gama woɓa gaho kala dna n na azhingye.
Owonu na gni yi, wa kni yi, n tu n wo tnu-tnu gyi-gyi-yi ɓo, to ge yi kunce lo nun, ama ntuge owo shiri nu tunyi kafin asa anyi, n na bai wa wuyi owo alheri n ye-yeyi dna n Kristi.
Nsaiye wo ku wuyi pei-pei, sanu eyi gniyi Yesu Kristi wa ɓe n cei, n wa bma efi iko ya wa wuyi wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya zokwo, dna n gaiciya ga nyi.
Shekwoyi la mi kni ma zhin wo waʼazi zhin yi, ma zhin abyedo waʼazi mi-i wu ɓa.
Cenu zhin mi-i sin wahala dna n ya n kurkuku vinyikwoi ta wo mi lo n tu cen. Gama mi kpe ezaye lo n mi kpema wo, mi-i kpe lo nge wo ɓa mi wa gu enya n mi la gawo har ewyi n wo ɓa jeze ɓe n cei.
La gaiciya zokwo shi cewo, n mi ɓei wu ho nyi, tun baga gaiciya ga n ye-yei n Kristi bei ga ho nyi.
Mi ye ha gu kpezhin, cauta dnagmayi n Shekwoyi wa gaho nyi, n ho ɓei gwo n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi aba n wo dna n ho mi nyi.
Shi ho kpelo, a Yesu-viyi vinya n ɓa kun n Asiya, ɓala busi ɓa ku mi ya, har Fimallus n Harmojanis yi.
Dagayi wo tu Onisifurus anabarka nwo puwa yi vinya, gama wo zhin mi ziyara woi gami bugba kala. Owo ziyara gami kala n gye ese manayi, to wa wo vinyikwo ge mi dna n kurkuku n.
Ɓehin-hin esa n wo ɓei ɓe Roma wa zan mi shin la ɓa, wa kpe aba n mi dna, wa gye mi wye.
Dagayi wo tuwo anabarka ewyi n Kristi ɓei jeze ɓe n cei. Ho gna kpelo shi wo ɓei bmami zhin n Afisus.
O, Timatawus emi nugun, la dna kala dna n kala n Kristi Yesu wa gaho nyi.
Gama dole ha wu aza aɓo n hohin ɓedo na azajei ɓei wo mi-i da. Wu aza agaiciya da nɓa ɓami ɓa ka azaje wu.
La oho robo dna n wahala sin ngye soja manayi Yesu Kristi nya. Shi mi zhin nyi.
Ngye Krist soja to da hohin dna n anyi gmadan, gama ho ta mi ha zhin oɓo n kwo da oza n wa kni ho nyin.
Vi Dagayi awyidna owo tnu-tnu zhin nya, shi asibui zhin agbetu sibui nya kwo bai bwa lada kwo to ɓai bwa ladan nyin.
Zhin tnu-tnu n kalayi n gye fwaiza n wo bwa lada n mwa woi ya nufwa n mwa nyi.
Zhin nubo n na amisali yei n gun ata n mi gaho nyi, Dagayi wo wu ho shi ɓa n na apmai lo n ho aba.
To ze gaiciya amwi n ge Yesu Kristi ɓei zhin zanyikwocinun, a mawo dna n Esu Dawuda efyen, woi zhin Shekwoyi nu, shi owo kala la n efi kwo wu yi.
Ntuge ma zhin waʼazi gaiciya yakwo ye nya nu, cenu zhin mi-i dna gni n wahala n ya, ai lami dna n kurkuku ngye ɓenukwoyi zhin yi. Ama ato pa Shekwoyi ɓedan, kwo ai la mi pan.
Mi shiri lo ma sin wahala, ndei okwo nu ɓa ɓe n gni-gni yi, n mwamwa nyalo-nyalo nya yi, dna n Kristi Yesu ga aza n Shekwoyi n la ɓa kni nyi.
Gaiciya deye zhin kwa fu mi bugba, nge Esa n ya sin wahala ya fi ntu n Kristi ɓo, kwo wunu ge yi ɓa ya asese n woi n eshemi.
N ya zʼhin nubo nge owo tnu-tnu n yi zhin nyi kwo dna ɓelo, pa ge n wyi-hoi yi ɓei se ase n woi ya gyi ebe n woi. Ama n ya fa wahala sin ɓo ya pmi avun wu Kristi, wo ɓei pmi avun wu yi ce.
Kwo esa n yi gaiciya ga gba kala, wo zhin gaiciya da nu, woi bmayi zhin gama wo ta nayi aɓon, yi zhin wo aga nu, Wo ɓa nuwo alkawali.
Pa oho aza a gaiciya ye ɓo, ha gaɓa wyidna dna n Kristi eye ɓa to na aɓo tu n aɓo nba to na apma yin, aɓenaye pya to n na apmayin, ɓai dna aɓo wyegma har ɓai ɓe n wahalai.

Zhin tnu-tnu n kalai, n na bai Shekwoyi ɓa cihoge, “Sanu n tnu-tnu yi.” Ha ze tnu-gnu zhin yi manayi n vinyikwo ta wo won, esa n. Shekwoyi a dna wo a tnu-tnu wye n cei. Kpe nya n wo ɓeda da kwoi wu njesun.
La bui aɓeda kasa si n ɓa zhin aza ɓai gyi minagyi n na ajei nyi.
Aɓa da aɓo n ɓa ɓa san za har nsai mwa. Himinayus n Filitus yi zhin aza nu n ɓa ye n na ɓeye pya yi.
Ɓa ku gaiciya zokwo fa, ɓai zhin waʼazi akata nya nge kala ku n efi la diya, ɓai la azaho gaiciya ga shan-shan n ɓa gwo ɓa ɓeda nyi.

Ama Shekwoyi gaiciya gni agni lo ngye apma, nyaho ta shan kwo ashan. Fandashen kuta nyanu, n na aɓedaye yi ka kpe n kwo, “Dagayi kpe aza yi lo n ɓa zhin owo anya.” Njesun, “Oza n wo yi wohin nge Yesu viyi wo to zhin aɓo nukwoyi zhin.”
Nna anyabwayi puwa akwanu zinariya nya nyi n azurfa nya yi, adoho n shinwayi nzun yi, anakwoi a zhin azhiɓei dnagmai ɓo nu cei, a tna nakwoi azhin apma n cei n gace kwo a ya anya nukwoyi fi.
Ndei ha bui laifi si, hoɓa ze ngye kwanu n na zhin a zinariya manayi, kwanu manayi du-duyi vinya n puwa, n nabai Kristi n wohin wo ɓa zhin apma n hoi n wo ɓeye manayi ɓo.

Bui enya si nkwo ɓa ɓe ho n na nubo zhin nukwoyi, n kwo ɓe samari aba, ama la nyima enya vinya n kwo zhin ho ha wo ɓemana zhin pwa. Bwa gaiciya ga n ye-yei, ha gyi nugundo n na azayi n ɓa ye Dagayi, n na bugba manayi.
Njesun ma ci ge to lo dna n na aɓena n ɓa lo n azayi n minagyi n.
Shekwoyi aza ta ku ze anya wuyin, tilas ɓaku ze amishiyi, hakuri da, ɓai wu aza nɓa ku bwi aba.
Gba hohin tukwo esa n ho wu aza, n gaiciya nku ɓa gmi aje. Gama n ha daɓo n ɓai peceiye n na atnazhin yi, kpekni, dna n Shekwoyi bmazhin ɓa ɓa pmi ɓe ɓa vi gaiciya.
Nsayi ɓa kpe genyi, ɓa pwo shetan agam, fyenu laifi nya n wo zhin apma n cei woi wan ɓa nyi, nsayi ɓa ya Shekwoyi ɓeye zhin.
Kwo bmiya lo ha kpe deye n jesun, Timatawus nge dna n na anyipyei kmaknayi, Yesu vi ɓei la dna ɓo.
Gama aza ɓei ye ɓahin tukwo n ɓa agyiwyei, ɓa ɓei zhin aɓokwo ɓai gma, ɓai ci Shekwoyi wyegba, to ɓai wo oɓa zakwoyi ɓedan, to ɓai zhin godiyan, aɓi a nukwoyi.

Ɓa ɓei kwo atukwo agnana to ɓai wo aza ɓedan, ɓa ɓei ze aza kata, ɓai la wahala kala, ɓai zhin ɓenukwoyi doho-dohoi n tna nubo zhin. Ɓa to ɓei wo ɓon, n tna sun-sun gye, ɓai kpe aza agye n ɓa zhin ɓemana nyi.
Ɓa ɓei kun oɓa anugundo, a tukwo gnana-kwoyi n nu-nuyi n na aɓokwoyi, ɓai gna agmada ye ndu Shekwoyi mwa-mwa ga.
Ɓa ɓei lo aduwa nyakun, ama ɓato ɓei ga nya ho gaiciya n ɓa wo n ɓon. To ye ɓa dna ho kwocen.
Azayi pya nu lo aza puwa ɓai gyi nugundo n na anyikwo tna ceceyi, alaifi yi nu bugba, ɓa wu anyikwozaye oɓa zokwo woi-woyi.
Anyikwozaye pya vi a malami a woi-woi, ama ɓata ye ɓa kpe gaiciya ye m.
A malami ye pya gni apa-pa n gaiciya yi, shi Yinisu n Yambrisu yi ɓei gni apa-pa n Musa yi nyi. Ɓa n na abugbayi tu cegye, n pmi-pmi yi ya n Yesu viyi gaiciya.
Ama ɓa ta si n kpa yin, nwyihoi oɓa kwoce dna ɓei kpe anya ya aza gye vinya, shi Yinusi n Yanbrisu alaifi ɓei kpe anya ya nyi.
Ama ho kpelo shi ho kamiwye mito zhin aza yi pya nu m. Ho kpe nya yelo n mi ga gaiciya, n jesun shi mi sase n wu, n nyai n mi ye, Ho kpe mi gaiciya ga ye lo dna n Kristi, shi mi sin wahala n sun.
Ho kpelo shi mi sin wahala n sun n tuge mi zhin nabari manayi waʼazi. Ho kpe ɓe ye lo n na ɓei zhin mi esa n mi ɓei lo Antakiya nyi, n Ikoniya yi, n Listra yi, ama Dagayi ɓei lami gni.
E, aza n ɓaye ɓa zhin oɓo n kwo da Kristi Yesu, ɓa ɓa sin wahala n aza kun n ɓa wun wo nu nyi.
Ɓehinhin, a malami akatayi, n na aza nukwoyi ɓa ɓa gyi abye abye n ɓenukwoyi, ɓai dna aza kwoce n mwa, n ɓahin ce shetan n la ɓa dnakwoce.
Ama gyi abye n gaiciya gai, dna n na anya n ria wu ho, Ho kpe lo ɓazhin gaiciya nu, gama ho kpe lo ho ɓa mi ha kpema yi n ya wu ho nyi.
Ho kpelo shi, esa n ho ɓei zhin ɓinayi nyi, aɓo ki Shekwoyi ɓeda wu ho, okwonu la ho ce ha gwo Shekwoyi gni-gni dna n gaiciya ga n Kristi Yesu.

Rubutu ka vinya littafi gyi-gyi-yi nya Shekwoyi nu ɓei da nwoʼgbei, kwo n na apma yi n yi aba ntu n nya wu ɓo, n kwo zhin gaiciya, ya kpe enya ye n kwo to bmiyan, dna n yi asese, kwo gayi kala ya zhin oɓo n kwo bmiya.
Shekwoyi zokwo nu n wa zhin yi shiri zokwo doho-dohoi, ya zhin aza vinya ɓemana.
A Ntuce nu mi zhin ho gargadi n Shekwoyi abye, n Kristi Yesu yi, n wo ɓei da aza wye-wye yi n na azafiyi owa n wyihoi nyin. Esa n wo ɓei ɓe nwo begyi-yi.

Zhin Shewoyi ɓeda waʼazi n esayi vinya, Esa n ha bwa bednu n sayi vinya. Zhin eho aza aba, esa n bednu nyi kwo n tna bednu, ha gnakni ɓa esa vinya n kwo kunce, gaɓa kala ɓa zhin ɓemana n esai vinya, nu ɓa n Shekwoyi ɓedayi.
Ntu ge esa ɓelo n aza to ɓei shan gaiciya tnubua knan, ama ɓa ɓei zan laɓa ɓai zan a malami zanshi n ɓa ɓa gna ɓa oɓo n ɓaye ɓa wo.
Ɓato ɓei kna ɓeda tnubua n Shekwoyi ɓeda dan, ama ɓa ɓei vi oɓa anubo zhin zokwo bwi-bwi nya.
La mi gni to wo wahala dna n ho ɓa sin ntu n Dagayi ɓo m. Gni aza je ɓe n cei n Kristi aba. To fya ɓeho n tna zhinyi n kwo kunce ha zhin.
Mi da ɓeye gama mi to gnilo n mi ɓa bmaho zhin, Emisa la gasi, Esa fyewyi mi ɓa wan zokwo maloʼshe.
Miku okun sun n mwa ntu n emi Dagayi ɓo, Dna n kwo vinya miku ɓefyece zhin. Nsaiye esa lasi n mi ɓa fa kun sunɓo ma sun.
N Eshe mi rawani pmi milo n Dagayi Alkali gaiciya da ɓei gami ewyi n wo ɓei jezeɓe n cei. To ge emi n mi gmanyin ama har na zai ɓe n ɓa sase n wyetuyi ge ɓa pmi owo jezeɓe lo n Jesun.
Mi gyi ho wye ɓe npye.
Gama Dimas nla miya, wa wo anyi nya shakpe wa lo Tassalunika, Kiristis wo du Galatiya, Titus wa lo Dalmatiya.
Luka nu bwa ce gnilo n miyi, Gniɓe n Markus yi esa n ha ɓe n cei gama mi n wo apmayi lo.
Mila Tikiku tnu n Afisus.
Esa n ha ɓe, to ɓo ze amwi ha ɓemi n jekpeyi n mi ɓei ya zhi n Taruwasa nyi m N mi ɓei yazhi n Karbus emi zado aba nyi, njesun n mi a litafiyi, tun-baga a takarda opa nya.
Iskandari Epyada sinknabyeyi nya waku mi wu anyi n mwa. Dagayi ɓa tawo.
Ama zhin peceiye n woi, gama wo ɓei la gni apa-pa n nya yi n yi ɓei da.
Esa kmisunyi n na aɓei ɓe n mi na alkali abye ada mi owa ezaho-zahoi to ɓei gni n, aza vinya ɓola busi, mi n na awyetu yilo ata ba laifi ye n ɓa tukwon.
Ama Dagayi ɓei gnisun n miyi wa gna mi esa ma zhin waʼazi tna edna anyi vinya ɓa wo. Wa gni mi n na agaba ʼgbe.
E, Dagayi ɓa gni mi n na aɓo nukwoyi vinya, wa lo mi dna n wo ebemi eshe nya. Mwa-mwa kwo kunsun n Shekwoyi nyalo-nyalo. Amin.
Ɓi, Biskila gna n Aikla yi n na aai n ɓa fi n Onisifurus puwa nyi.
Arastus dnalo n Korintus, mafa Turufinus dna n Militus nyasayi sanwo.
Zhin atna ha ɓe n ya kafin vinyikwo, Afbulus saho ami lo ɓedo n Budis yi n Linus yi n Kalafidiya yi n na azayi vinya.
Dagayi Yesu Kristi wo kunsun nfye zafun yi.
Wasika ye kwo gmi n Bulus akun nu, Shekwoyi fyenu, Yesu Kristi tnu-tnuyi.

A tnu mi ma ɓe n gaiciya gai n aza ba nu n Shekwoyi la ɓa kni nyi, ma wu ɓa Shekwoyi gaiciya gaiciya n kwo shan aza wyewyeyi do nyi. N na bai ɓa bwa wyewyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya n Shekwoyi ɓei zhin ɓa alkawali tunyi kafin a sa anyi, woi ta ce a katan.
Dna n owo esa manayi, wa wu yi Nabari manayi, wa gami izini ma gna aza vinya. Dna n Shekwoyi eyi gniyi egbega, wo la ye ma zhin wo tnu-tnu ye ga wo.
Kwoi lo Titus aba n wo zhin emi oɓi dna n Dagayi zokwo nyi. Shekwoyi Dada n Kristi Yesu eyi gniyi, wo gaho anabarka n bugba fuyi.
Ma fa ho tu n muse Karita n na abai ha zhin ɓo n ho ɓa mi ha bma a ikklisiya zhin nu n ɓa nyi nɓo. Mi ye ha kni a pasto n ezhin doho-dohoyi ha vi ngye shi mi ɓei wu ho nyi.
Aza n ha kni a kpe ɓa ye ntu n ɓa asese manayi ɓo, nyikwoza gmanyi da oɓa ɓi ɓai ye Dagayi, to ge a tukwo gnana-kwoyin, nɓata vi oɓa azakwoyi ɓedan.

Tilas pasto wa ze oza nu n nata ciwo aɓenya n wo asesen, gama ɓa zhin Shekwoyi atnu-tnu zhinyi nu, ɓato zhin aɓekwo zhin yi, kwo a tna mi wanshi yi, to ɓa ze ajesin yin, agusun yin, kwo agyiwye shakpe; woyin.
Ɓa ze azhiɓeyi goyi n ɓa puwa, ɓa ye enya n kwo bmiya ɓa ze aza awyega da, ɓai zhin ɓo n kunce, ɓai zhin aɓo manayi nubo to ge a tukwo-gnana kwoyin.
Tile oɓa gaiciya ga kwa migni n kala yi, n na bai n ɓa ɓa mi ɓa wu azaje, ɓa wu aza n ɓa ta gwo oɓa ɓedan. Ɓa wu ɓa aba n ɓa bwi aba.

Gama aza lo n mwa begye n ɓa ta vi ɓon, Deye kwo zhin gaiciya nu tun ba ga na aza aba n ɓa gna nge tilas a shi a Yahudiyi awyidna bwa nyin. Ama deye zhin ɓeda gbeloyi nu, kwo bua za wye, to ɓa gye gaiciyan.
Tile a hana n kwoi, ala aza pmi awye ya n Shekwoyi alheri, amalami ye pya bwa agyiwye nu ye.
Zaho n ɓa mi, anabi n wo gmi n Karita wa ci ge, “A Karitayi zhin akataceyi nu, ɓa wu ngye anyafanya abwatoyi nu, n ɓa asese bwasun ɓa fu ɓahin nubo nu.”
Deye zhin gaciyanu, ntucenu daɓo n na Yesu-viyi n kala yi, shi kwo kunce kwa mi ɓa gaiciya gagni.
Ɓa fa tnubua kna ɓo n na a Yahudiyi esi n na aza ɓeyei n ɓa la avun pmin wu gaiciya nyi.

Oza n wo bugba gyi-gyi-yi wo gye anya vinya n gyi-gyi yi, ama oza n wo bugba tucegye n tna gaiciya, wo gye nyaho-nyahoi n tna bmiya yi nu, gama owo bugba cegye nya n bugba kala kpei nu zhin woi wo lonu, woi gye lo nu njesun.
Azayi pya ci ge ɓa kpe Shekwoyi ye, ama nha gye nya n ɓa zhin, ha ku kpe ge ɓata kpe wo ye lon. Ɓa wun-wun yi ya, to ɓai vi ɓom, n tna a pma dna n ɓe manayi zhin.
Ama ohohin, daɓo n kwo kunce n na asese manayi n ɓa kunce n Yesu-viyi gaiciya nyai.
Wu azakwoi ɓa ku ɓahin wanshi, ɓai zhin ɓe manayi, ɓai kpe gaiciya ye ɓai zhin ɓeho-ɓehoyi n ye-yei n bugba bwayi.
Wu anyigbakwowyi ɓa ku cepi ɓai ga mwa-mwa dna n na ɓo vinya n ɓa zhin. Ɓato zan laɓa ɓai zhin agnagba n na aza tukwon, to ɓa ze ajesinyi n mwan, ama ɓaku ze aɓo manayi wuyi.
Anyigbakwoyi ye ɓa wu anyikwo aza-zayi ɓa sase pi-pi ɓaye n ɓa ɓayi, ɓedo n ɓa ɓiyi.
Ɓa ku ze aza manayi, abugba manayi da, ɓai zefi n ɓa puwa, aza nunuyi, ɓai vi oɓa aɓa ɓeda n na abai to a sa a Yesu viyi eye nukwoyi, n aza aba n ɓa kpe ɓa ye m.
Elonu, gna aɓi-a-nuyi ɓa zhin peceiye ɓai wan ɓahin shi naɓo vinya.
N ya tilas ohohin ha ze efye manayi dna n na aɓo vinya. Fa nyaho-nyahoyi n ho ɓa zhin kwa wu n ge ho ye gaiciya lo n nwyeyi kana.
Oho azata la ze cewo n tukwo yi ku, n na abai oza n wo ye wa na aɓo n hoi vinyikwo a wowo, ntuge aɓenya-ci ɓa to lo dna n oɓo n ha dan.
Gna afyenu ɓa vi oɓa adagayi ɓo, ɓa zhin atna ɓa zhin atna ɓa zhin oɓo n kwo da ɓa. To ɓa da ɓeda kasam.
Kwo ɓa wyi evim, ama ɓa wu ge ɓa zhin azanu aɓa mi a kpema, Nlonu ɓaɓa zhin aza ɓaye ɓa ga eyi Gniyi n yi Shekwoyi gaiciya.
Gama cauta gni-gni nya ala ga aza vinya.
Ɓedo n na awyegayeyi yekpe n ge Shekwoyi ye ya pmi avun wu aɓo nukwoyi n na aɓo awyeda nukwoi, ya ze aza manayi, ya wo Shekwoyi dna fyegyi-fyegyi.
Yi shi esayi awye n yi pmi nyi, n na aɓei gyewo mwa-mwa wye n cei nyi, mwa-mwa eyi Shekwoyi dnagmayi n eyi Gniyi Yesu Kristi yi.

Wo ɓei fi Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi nya n yi abugbami dna n Shekwoyi owa ntu yi alaifi ɓo nu, n na bai wa gni yi to ya je kayafi n laifi ci-ci, wa ze yi owo aza, n na abugba manayi n pwa wo yi, ya zhin azaje ɓemana.
Tile ha wu aɓedye, ha ga oho aza kala ɓa zhin ɓa, hoi zhin ɓa fi n zokwo n sai nkwo kunce n gye oza n wo n ikoyi lo wa zhin lonu. To ye ozaho wa zhin nubo nge oɓo n ho da nyi kwo to kunce lon.
Pa oho aza ɓa vi abegyi yi ɓo n na atukwodayi vinya, ɓa zhin n shiri yi zhin ɓa zhin aɓo manayi.
Ɓa to da ɓeda nukwoyi n zaho-zahoi tukwon, kwo ɓa wu anyan ama ɓa zhin peceiye ɓai zhin ɓemana n aza ba vinya.
N sapa yi ɓei zhin aza mama n tna cei, yi kwo tukwo agnana. Aza ɓei dna yi woice ya ku ze afyenu aɓewyeda nya n shakpe nukwoyi nya yi, eyi awye-wyeyi ɓei wun azanu ɓahin ɓai wunyi nu.
Ama shi esa ɓe la si n Shekwoyi eyi Gniyi ɓei wuyi owo alheri n ye-yei.
Wa gniyi, tu ntuge n eyi ɓemana zhin ɓo nu wa gni yin, ama ntu n wo alheri ɓo n sun-sungye yi, wa zhan yi alaifiya, wa gayi agmada Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi nya n yi abugbami.
Nwa zeya kpe yi ntu nya ɓo n Yesu Kristi wa zhin nyi.
Nnabai n wo ɓa yi yi aza manayi n wo abye ntu n wo alheri ɓo, nsaiye yi n roboi lo dna n wo anyabwa wye-wyeyi nya n wa gayi nyi, n yi zhi yi pmi ya gwo nyi.
A nyaye n ma gnaho nyi ɓa zhin gaiciya nu, la nyimaɓa n na abai a Yesu viyi ɓa zhin peceiye, ɓa zhin ɓemana n sai vinya, gama kwo to bmiya lonu gmanyin, ama kwo zhin kwa ɓe n na ampanyi.
N oza ho ɓelo n ajegnayi nfye mi, fya gnakniwo a bwa aba, Ndeye avun fyeto shan efye anuwan gye n woi n.
Fye kpe ge oza deye wo la pmiya n gaiciya, wo zhin laifinu, woi kpe.
Mi zhin shiri lo ma tnu n Artimas yi kwo Tikikus, n ho aba. Esanu n Zaknayi n ɓa mi waɓe ha zhin atna ɓa ɓe dami n Nikobolos n pye, gama mi ku shaula zhin ma Izhin vinyikwo dna ɓo.
Zhin nya n ho ɓa mi ha bma Zinas zhin, Owa-yekpei-n Apolos yi n ɓa zan, to ɓa gyi nyaho san n zokwon.
Gama tilas eyi aza ɓa tumwi ɓa bma aza zhin n ɓa kunce a bma ɓa zhin, nɓa wye-wyeyi ɓa zhin ampanyi.
Aza vinya n ya tnu fyelo n ɓa gnaɓiyi. Ɓi a Yesu viyi gna gami n ɓo Shekwoyi anabarka ɓa kunsun n fyeyi.
Wasika ye gmi n mi aba nu Nabari manayi Yesu Kristi nya ɓo, ɓedo Omi zadoyi, Timatawus.
Kwoi lo Filimon aba, eyi tnu-tnu kun-zhinyi, oza ye-yeyi, n ikklisiya yi n kwo zhin kwa yezhi n eho puwa nyi, n Abfiya eyi mapui ɓedo n Arkibbusa yi n wo zhin Yesu soja n gye mi nyi.
Fa Shekwoyi eyi Dada n Dagayi Yesu Kristi yi wa ga fye owo anabarka n bugba-fuyi.
Mi zhin Shekwoyi godiya cici esa n ma zhin aduwa ntu ho ɓo, Filimon, omi ʼza ye-yeyi.
Gama mi wo oho ye-ye n kpemayi ɓo lo n Dagayi Yesu n wo aza yi.
Mi zhin aduwa mi gna aza oho gaiciya ga ɓo, kwo ɓa shi ɓa wye-wyeyi ce, shi ɓa gye anya a manayi n ho, n ɓa kun n Kristi Yesu aba nyi.
Omi n mihin mila gyiba bwa, bugba buyi nya n emi fuyi n ho ye-yeɓo, emi zado, ntuge oho ɓemana-zhin, bma Shekwoyi aza bugba zhin lo.

Nsaiye, miye ma nyaho bmazhin gmanyi. Mi ɓa mi ma nya ho ce dna n Kristi, gama nya manayi nu, n kwo kunce ha zhin. Ama mi ye ho lo, mi gnaye ma nya ho. Omi, Bulus, zakwoyi n saiye dna n kurkuku ntu Yesu Kristi ɓo.
Omi wyegyi, nge, ha wu Onisumus alheri, n na gniwo ga Yesu dna n ya, mi yi dna n na agmanyi.
Onisumus nwo maʼana ge, (“Apma”) wo to ɓei n na apma yin n sapain, ama nsaiye wo n na apma hin-hin yi lo, n yi aba vinya.
Mi tnu n woi n ho aba njesun, emi bugba gnisun lo n woi.
Mi ɓei n cei pma ma wo shi n ya, esa n mi dna n cei n ya n na agma, ntu Nabari manayi waʼazi zhin ɓo, owo bmazhin ɓei ɓa ze ngye oho nu bma mi zhin.
Ama mi to ɓei n cei pma ma zhin ce n tna ho ayen. Mi to ɓei n cei pma ha zhin ɓemana tilas nun, ama n ho bugba yei.
Kpekni ho ɓa zhin kwo nubo n lai, nge wa busi n ha aba esa fyewyi ntuge wa ze oho nya nyalonyalo.
Wo to ye zhin fyenu nu, ama nyaho n du ɓo, Madoyi ye-yei, tun baga n mi aba ba, nsaiye wo ɓa gna sun n na pmayi n ho aba, ntuge wo to zhin fyenu nun gmanyin, ama oho mado dna n Kristi.
Nmi zhin ho nugundo hin-hin yi nu, gwo wo n na agmadai, shi ho ɓa gwo mi nyi, emi yi nu a ɓe ho aba.
Ngye wo ku ɓenukwoyi nu zhin ho, kwo wa wyi ho vi nu, ɓi mi nu ta, mi ɓa gba ho.
Mi ɓa gba ho kwo ta, (“emi Bulus mi la ye mi ɓa gaho, cenu zhin mi yi kakwo fi n ya n mi abwayi,”) Mita wu ho shi ho n tayi shi mi lon, Ɓehin-hin ho n hohin wye-wyeyi tainu shi mi.
E, emi zado ye-yei, gami agmada dna n ye-ye n na bai emi bugba ɓa ci Dagayi.
Mika wasika ye ntuge mi kpelo ho ɓa zhin oɓo n ma gna ho, har n diya ɓo.
La a zhiɓei nyakun zhin aba gami, gama mi n na wyetuyi lo Shekwoyi ɓa wo fye aduwa ma ɓe fye aba esa fyewyi.
Abafros emi kurkuku kun zhinyi, n wo dnalo n ya, ntu n Kristi Yesu waʼazi zhin ɓo nyi, wo tnu fye lo n gnaviyi.
N Markus yi, Aristakus yi, n Dimas yi n Luka yi, emi atnu-tnu kun zhin yi.
Anabarka eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi nya ɓa kunsun n ho zafunyi.
Nsapai Shekwoyi ɓei daɓo n azokwoi mwabegye nsasai. Wa daɓo n ɓai n ruya yi, n-enayi, Njesun wa daɓo ga eyi adada n anabi ʼgbe.
Ama nsaiye Shekwoyi daɓo yi n wo Nugun ʼgbe Yesu. Anya vinya wo nu zhin ɓa gado gyiyi. Owo nu na zhin ɓa.
Yesu nu wu Shekwoyi buzangna ɓehin-hin nya, wonu zhin Shekwoyi degbe, Owo iko nu shi aɓo bwa vinya. She wo ɓei pwo ya laifi zhanya ɓo, n wo ami yi wa lo wa sase n Shekwoyi shinkpegye bwaizhe-bwa.
Aɓei la Yesu ze oza ndu a malaika. Aga wo eye ndu oɓa nya.
Shekwoyi shin malaika ho gna ge, “Ho zhin mi nugun nu, mi la ho ma n naiye n jesun ma ze ngye oho dada?” Awo.
Ama wa ci Yesu ge, “Ho zhin omi ʼɓi nu, amalaika vinya ɓa la hotu.”
Shekwoyi wa gna ge, a malaika wu ngye ese nu nkwo zhin kwa ci barkete nsaho-sahoyi nyi, ntu ge ɓa zhin Zafun nu. Owo a bara wu ngye ena yitala nu.
Ama wa ci oɓi ge, “Oho begyi ta shan zon, ko ɓa ze busi kwa wu ɓefyece. Oho busi tnu-tnu nya ɓefyece nu.”
Ho ye atnu-tnu manayi to haye alaifi m. Ntu ce nu oho Shekwoyi gmanyi, wa gaho agmada duduyi.
Ha zhin eshe, ha zhin ekni n ho ikoyi.
Eshe n ekni yi ɓaɓa diya, ama ho ta shan fi m. Ngye aje kokoyi oɓa asa ɓai zeye. (Wato eshe n ʼkni).
Ho ɓa ya ɓa ngye aje sakun, oɓa asa ɓa zeya, Amma ho ta shan don, oho anyipyei ɓa ɓeɓe nu.
Shekwoyi shin a malaika gna ge, “Fye sase nmi bwaizhe-bwa har ma ze fye nuwunyi efya abara?” Awo.
Ɓa zhin amalaika a tnu-tnu loi nu n na tnu n ɓai ɓa bma a Yesu viyi zhin. Njesun nazai n ɓa ɓe Shekwoyi aba nyi.
Ntu gaiciya ɓo n yi ku wo nyi yi zhin peceiye, Ntuge wada lo n ya jeze navun yi.
Anya amalaika ɓei da nyi, gaiciya nu. Owa gnanazun n tna ɓo vi ko ɓei la ɓe n tatai. Yesu kwa duduyi nu. (Wo du amalaika lo. Owo ɓeda du ɓa nya lo njesun).
Ntu cenu, yi ɓa po n wuna n ya na gni-gni dnagmayi ye a ɓoʼa? Gama Yesu ɓei da nabari manayi. Owo abara, n ɓa ɓo wo wo nyi, ɓa ka yi ɓe cei.
Aɓo wo-woi nwo abara ɓei zhin nyi: acauta zafun nya, gaiciya ga, aza ka gna ɓedo n waʼazi, ɓa ga seida ge Shekwoyi ɓo kunsun n ɓai.
Ya je kpe ge nabari manayi Yesu nya ko du amalaika nya lo ntu ge, Shekwoyi to ɓei ga ɓa nu begyi a nyi nya m, wo ɓo ga Yesu nu.
Ɓehinhin, Zabura gna ge, “gbaizanyikwoci, wo zhin kni nu ha zhin tunani ntu wo ɓo a? Owo ɓi zhin kni nu nho ɓa bmawo zhin a?”
Ho ɓo la woze n gna amalaika gba n sai fyewyi. Avun ha knu wo lowonyi latu nya n mwa-mwa nya yi, njesun ha tu wo n anya she vinya n ha zhin nyi.
Behin-hin, ho la iko ga wo, har owo nu shi anya bwa vinya. Shekwoyi to kni nya ho yan. Ama yi ta gye ce kpam sai Yesu la ɓe.
Ama yi gye Yesu lo n wo ɓo la ze ngna amalaika gba. Nsaiye dei Shekwoyi la wo latu, woi la wo ga mwa-mwa ntu ge wa fi ntu yi ɓo. E, ntu Shekwoyi yeye ɓo Yesu wa fi ntu zaho-zahoi ɓo n nanyi.
Deye kwa lo dei-dei n Shekwoyi nufiyi nwa zhin anya ntu wohin latu ɓo nyi. Wa zhin bezheyakwo ntu wo wahala ɓo. Ntu lo nu wa mi wa ɓe n nazai n mwabegye n gni-gni zokwo.
Yesu n wa zhan yi ya nyi, ɓedo n yi nna lai zhan ya nyi, Eyi dada (wato Shekwoyi) gmanyi nu, cenu zhin Yesu to woi wo vinyikwo n, wa yi-yi ge owo azaje m.
Zabura gna ge, “Nɓa ga emazaje oho ye. Nɓa kwo anyi ma la ho tu dna n na aduwa nyakun.”
N abado wa je da ge, “Nɓa wo ze omi akpe ma ba. Omi, n mi aɓi yi n Shekwoyi wa ga mi nyi, yi zhi nyi.”
She yi zhin nayi n nami yi nyi, wohin wa ze lo nu. Ntu ge wa wu Shetan n wo ikoyi, efi nya yi.
Wo ɓo ye ntu ge wa gni aza nɓa wo efi dna tunyi nɓa ma wyi. (Nna bai ɓa po har abada).
Wo ta bma amalaika nu zhin, ama wo bma Ibrahim ayawyi nu zhin.

Ntu lo nu wa ze ngye owo azaje, n anya vinya. Deye kwa ga wo iko wa zhin pirist dnagmayi. Wo kpe lo shi wo ɓa gye yi sun-sun wa zhin gaiciya n Shekwoyi abye. Ce na zhin wami wala aza laifi. Woi la yi ye ɓedo n Shekwoyi yi.
Wa sin wahala jaraba nya. Ntu lo nu, wo ɓa mi wa bma aza zhin n na zhin ɓa jaraba nyi.
Ntu deye ɓo, ema zaje Gyi-gyi-yi, yi zhin Shekwoyi aza kni-kni yi nu. Fye ku efya bugba ga Yesu na tnu nwoi nyi. Eyi pirist dnagmanyi gaiciya ga nya.
Yesu ɓei zhin gaiciya n Shekwoyi aba ngye shi Musa ɓei zhin nyi.
Ama Yesu ɓo du Musa n mwamwa. Ko wu ngye ozanu n wa mi nyakun wo du nyakun n mwa-mwa.
Gama yakun doho-dohoi oza nu na mi, ama Shekwoyi nu na mi anya vinya.
Musa ɓo zhin tnu-tnu n Shekwoyi azai sosai. Ama wo ɓei bwa fyenu nu zhin. Deye kwo ɓei zhin dogbe nu n anya yi n ɓa ɓelo n abye nyi.
Ama Yesu ɓei zhin gaiciya tu Shekwoyi puwa ntu ge wo zhin nugun nu. Yi zhin wo azanu n ya mi dna gaiciya, har nyalo-nyalo.
Ntu deye ɓo, she Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi ku da, “Kna tnubua n mi ɓeda n naiye,
to ha kpe bugba akala ngye a Israila yi m. Pa a Israila yi ɓo dna n jaraba sa n zhabui. Fye to kpe bugba a kala ngye shi fye azakwoyi ɓei zhin fi n zhabui nyi m.
Ofya dada ɓei tu mi mwi ɓa mwimi gye, ɓa gye a ɓo wowoi aye shinyi, ama ɓa dudu ɓa kpa kala.
Ntu deye ɓo ma gyi minagyi n ɓai. Ma ci ge ɓa zhin abugba nukwoyi danu. Balle ma ɓata kpe mi ‘zokwo ye lon.
“ ‘Ntu cenu ma si nya-si ge, Ɓata lo emi sun-sun m.’ ”
Omi-zaje fye zhin peceiye, n na ta bwa bugba nukwoyi da n fye m. Ko ɓa zhin fya ya gaiciya.
Fye zhin aje gargadi cici, esa ye nyi, to zaho wa kpe a kala m, woi zhin laifi cici m. Ko ɓa ɓe fye n fiyi n bugba wun yi n jesun.
Yi kuze agado gyiyi n Kristi yi, yi zhin wo aɓi ɓehin-hin nya nu, N ya mi zhi dna gaiciya ga har nyalo-nyalo.
Gama wa gna, “N naiye nha wo mi ɓeda, to ha kpe bugba a kala n gye aza n sapayi m.”
A nyikadonu ɓei wo to ɓa zhin biyaya ma? O ɓa nu n Musa ɓei kun ɓa n Masar kni.
Shekwoyi ɓei gyi minagyi na nyikayi nu har aye shinyi a? Wo ɓei gyi minagyi nazai nu n ɓa ɓei zhin laifi fi n zhabui nyi.
Shekwoyi ɓei si nyasi ga nyika nu ge ɓa ta lo wo sun-sun ma? Ɓanu bwa sun njesun.
Ntu lonu ɓato ɓei lo asun-sun ba m, (wato a Israila yi) ntu n ɓa tna gaiciya ga ɓo.
A Yila alkawali gwo pwo-pwo nya, ntu deye ɓo yi zhin peceiye, Ko ta bmiya to ya lo Shekwoyi ebemi m.
Nabari manayi ɓei la ɓe yi aba, ngye ɓa ɓaku wo ce, ama ko to ɓei zhin ampanyi m, ntu ge ɓa to wo n gaiciya gai m.

Ama eyi n yi ku gaiciya ga nyi yi ɓa lo wo sun-sun. Ama Shekwoyi ɓei gna atna gaiciya gayi. “Ma gyi minagyi ma si nyasi ge, ɓa ta lo mi sun-sun, ko da shike owo atnu-tnu ɓo ku zo zhin, tunyi anyi zhin sa.”
Shekwoyi Ɓeda gna ge Shekwoyi ɓei zhin anya vinya dna anyipyei ngun tnaba. Kwa gna ge, “N nyipyeyi tnaba yi Shekwoyi wa sun.” Nlo nu yi gye Shekwoyi la lo sun-sun.
Njesun, Shekwoyi wa da Ayahudiyayi ɓo, wa gna ge, “Ɓa ta lo mi sun-sun m.”
Asun-sun ba lo ntu aza ɓo har nsaye. Yi to ku ze n gye aza tna ɓoviyi da m. Oɓa tna gaiciya ga n laifi yi ɓa zhin ɓa, to ɓa lo Shekwoyi sun-sun aban.

Njesun n Dawuda sa, Shekwoyi wapa ɓa shi aza ɓei fi n zhabui nyi. Wa gna ɓa ge, “Kna emi ɓeda tnubua n saiye. To ha kpe bugba kala n gye aza n ɓa ɓei zhin ma gyi minagyi nyi m.” Wato aza n Dawuda sa ɓei ku Shekwoyi sun-sun ɓo wo nu.
Ko shi Joshua ɓei lo n ɓai nu alkawali kni, wo to ɓeimi wa lo n ɓai n Shekwoyi fun. Wo ɓei gna ge wa lo nɓai nu, to Shekwoyi je sun-sun ho ɓo dam.
Deye kwa wu ge sun-sun yelo ntu Shekwoyi aza ɓo.
Zaho-zahoi nwa lo Shekwoyi fun wo ɓa bwa sun-sun. Ko ɓa ze ngye Shekwoyi sun-sun nwo ɓei sun woi ku anya zo zhin nyi.
Ntu cenu, yi zhin atna ya lo ofun deye Kada tna gaiciya ga kwa hana n yi.
Gama Shekwoyi ɓeda zhin wyewyeyi nu. Ko gyi-gyi-yi sosai. Ɓehinhin, ko du beyakwo n gyi-gyi. Kwa fin za har bugba. Kwa wu asiri bmi peipei.
Shekwoyi kpe anya ye vinya. Nyaho-nyahoi to bwi shi n wa ba m. Dole ya ga bayani anya yi ku zhin.
Yesu eyi pirist dnagmayi wo du she. Wo nu zhin Yesu Shekwoyi nugun. Ntu cenu yi kpema wo dei-dei.
Gama Yesu eyi pirist wo kpe yi a kala gbaɓolo, ntu ge a ɓei ku jaraba zhin wo ngye yi. Ama wo to zhin laifi m.
Ntu cenu yi ku kala ya zhin aduwa, ga Shekwoyi. Yi ɓa bwa sun-sun gye. Yi ɓa bwa alheri kwa bma yi zhin esa nu ya gyisan ncei.
Pirist dnagmayi doho-dohoi a kni a za nu. Awoi tu, wa gni aza busi n Shekwoyi abye. Wa ga sadaka ntu n laifi gafara zhin ɓo.
Dole pirist dnagmayi wa zhin peceye n amamai ɓedo n atnaganyi-kpe yi. Dole wa gye aza sun-sun ntu ge wohin to zhin oza nunuyi nu m.
Ntu cenu dole wa ga sadaka ntu wohin a laifi ɓo. Kafin wo ga sadaka ntu aza ɓo.
Ozaho-zahoi ta mi wa dna wohin n tnu-tnu manayi ye m. Shekwoyi nu kni za Shekwoyi nu ɓei kni Haruna pirist kmisunyi.
Kristi nu to ɓei kni wohin, Shekwoyi nu ɓei kni wo?–?Shekwoyi wa ci wo ge, “Emi nugun, n naiye mi la ho kni.”
Zabura 110 kwa gna ge, “Ho wu gye Malkizedek.” Wo to ɓei gmi na pirist puwa nu m, ama wo ɓei zhin prist nyalo-nyalo nya nu. Shekwoyi nu ɓei yi wo.
Sanu Yesu ɓei dna n anyi nyi, wo ɓo zhin aduwa n gaiciyai. Owo zafun kwa damu. Aɓo ku aduwa wo wo ntu ge wo ɓei gba wohin na aduwa zhin. Wa gyi Shekwoyi wye nabai to wa fi woi ye bwasin ciwyi m.
Yesu nu zhin Shekwoyi nugun, ama wa dudu wa vi ɓo dna n wahala.
Ntu deye ɓo wo ɓei la ze oza nunuyi. Woi ga aza nɓa vi wo ɓo gni-gni nyalo-nyalo nya.
She Shekwoyi ɓei yi Malkizedek nyi, wo ɓei yi Yesu lonu wa zhin pirist dnagmayi.
Anya mwabegye lo n mi ɓa da n Yesu tukwo ama mi ta gnafye m, ntuge fye to n yekpei lo m.
Gama ko la kunce fya zhin amalemi. Ama fye ye zhi lo n fa gbe, fye cei pma ai wu fye Shekwoyi. Fye ku ze n gye aɓi-nawyi. Fye y madara. Fye ta mi fya gyi zafu nyagyi m.
Oza nu wo ye madara wo to mwa dna Zafun m.
Nyagyi kala da zhin aza dnagmayi nya nu dna Zafun. Wato aza nɓa ga ɓahin tata nyi, ɓa kpe ɓe manayi ye lo n ɓe nukwoyi. Ɓaku zhin ajigwo ntu ganyikpe ɓo.

Ntu cenu yi shi ɓeda bwa n yi ku wo nyi wato Yesu wuwu, to ya wu kwo nu cici m, ama yi gyi abye dna gni-gni zokwo har ya mwa. Atnu-tnu ta mi ɓa gni yi m, ntu cenu, yi mi zhi dna gaiciya ga. Yi ku atnu-tnu anayi nya fa. Ɓa ɓa lo yi na bwi-bwi ba.
Ko to kamata lon ya ye wufye batisma ɓo m. Abwa kpe ntukwo, n jesun n azafi kalaku n wadayi.
Ama yi gyi abye n Shekwoyi a kala yi.
Fye wo ɓo ko zhin mi gna fye ge fye gyi abye nyi. Awye la azaho knaya, ɓaku zafun gyiba gyi, Ɓaku owo tnu-tnu gye wye.
Ɓa kpe lo ge Shekwoyi ɓeda bmiya lo, ɓaku anyi dehi asin wo n kwo ikoyi.
Ndei ɓa fa vi ɓo ɓata mi ɓa je ze ɓe m. Ntu ge ɓa na zafun aɓo fyegyi-gyegyi. Ɓa zun Yesu du cici, ɓa gawo vinyikwo.
Ekni lo abye gun aba, Manayi lo. Kwo zhin kwa pa agbe-gbe manayi ntu fanu ɓo. Afayi ye kwo pya nu. Dagayi zhin watu kwo anabarka njesun.
Ama ekni do kasun lo, kwo nu zhin nukwoyi. Ko zhin kwa sin nuwan to koi ga ampanyi m. Ko zhin kwa pa aknawuyi n gbe-gbe nukwoyi. Ekni deye a zhin a tukwo kni, a fa kwo ntna nyaho, akpe ko ena.
Aza to lo n wu ngye ekni nukwoyi ye m? Alo, ama emi azaje fye to wu lo ngye ɓa m. Fye na tnu-tnu manayi lo. Njesun Shekwoyi zhin wa tu fye anabarka.
Shekwoyi ta gyi za fim wo ta gyi za atam. Wo ku yeye gye, n fye wu aza ntu wo ɓo nyi, wo ta ze ko amwim. Fye gyi abye lonu.
Ɓehin-hin, yi cei pma fya zhin lonu, fye la gni-gni shi bwa har Yesu wa ɓe.
Fye to wo bwato m. Fye vi anabawa kwo-kwoyi bwi. Gama ɓa dagma lo n sayi n Shekwoyi aba. Ɓala Shekwoyi alkawali gwo.
Esanu Shekwoyi ɓei zhin Ibrahim alkawali nyi, wo ɓei si nyasi n wohin nu ntu ge zado to du wo lo n wo ɓa si nyasi n woyi m.
Wo ɓei gna ge wo ɓa tu wo anabarka njesun. Wa ga wo ɓi, Owo bye kwa mwa begye.
Ibrahim ɓei bwa hankuri sosai, navun wa ma Ishaku.
Fye kpe lo ge yi zhin ya si nya si n ya zakwoyi nu n ɓa du yi nyi. Yi zhin ya zhin lonu, ntuge ɓa ko yi lo. Deye wu ge yi da gaiciya nu.
Shekwoyi ɓei zhin lonu nu. Wo ɓei si nyasi nwohin ntu ge wa wu gaiciya n kwo ta shan do nyi m.
Deye kwa wu ge Shekwoyi alkawali zhin gaiciya nu. Kmisunyi Shekwoyi la wo ɓeda ga, ko ta shando n. Bayi, Shekwoyi la nyasi si, Wo ta ce akata m. Aza nɓa ɓe Shekwoyi aba, ɓa bwa abwi ba n bmazhin yi.
Eyi gaiciya ga ta shan-shan, yi ku po sosai ngye nyakun nkwo tu n na pma. Yi ku mi zhi.
Yesu la lo eshe n ya bye. Wo zhin eyi pirist dnagmayi nu. Owo begyi pirist nya har nyalo-nyalo nya nu. Ko wu ngye Malkizedek nya nu.
Malkizedek ɓei gyibe dna Salima nu. Wo ɓei zhin Shekwoyi pirist nu, njesun wa shegun Ibrahim woi zhi kun-sun, n asuyi, wa tu Ibrahim anabarka.
Ibrahim wa ga Malkizedek zakka. Malkizedek awyega ge, “Ɓemanayi zhin yi.” Wo ɓei gyibe dna n Salima nu Salima awyega ge bugbafu nu. (Wato Esu bugbafu nya).
Malkizedek to ɓei n eya yi m. Eda ton, oɓi ma to nyin a takpe esa ye n na ɓei ma wo m, ko esa nwo ɓei fi m. Wo ɓei zhin ngye Shekwoyi nugun dogbe nu. Wo zhin pirist nu nyalo-nyalo.
Wo to ɓei zhin oza dnagmayi nu m? Ibrahim, Shekwoyi za kni-kniyi ɓei ga wo nu zakka.
A Levi hi ɓei zhin Shekwoyi a pirist nu. Ɓa ɓei zhin Levi a yawyi nu. Shekwoyi ɓei gna ɓaɓe ɓa gwo Sadaka n naza. Ɓa ɓei gwo n ɓa zaje nu kwa bma ɓa zhin. Shekwoyi nu ɓei gna ɓa ge ɓa zhin lonu.
Amma Malkizedek, to ɓei zhin Ibrahim za nu n Amma wo ɓei la sadaka gwo n Ibrahim. Wohin kwa wa tu Ibrahim anabarka. Ibrahim ɓei zhin ozanu n Shekwoyi anabarkai tu.
Yi kpe lo ge zadnagmayi nu zhin watu zanawyi anabarka.
A Israilayi pirist ɓa to ku fin, amma Malkizedek ɓei wu gbo, Wo nyi har nyalo-nyalo.
Levi, wonu ɓei zhin pirist dnagmayi dada, Wohin kwa wa ga Malkizedek sadaka dna n Ibrahim.
Ko a to ɓei ma Levi nyin, owo bye ɓei dna n Ibrahim mi sanu Ibrahim ɓei ga Malkizedek Zakka nyi.
Levi puwa ɓei zhin a pirist puwa nu, Kni nu ɓei zhin Yesu wa je pirist zhin a? Malkizedek wa ze degbeyi ama to Haruwa nu ma? Ai a pirist vinya ɓei kun n Levi puwa nu.
Da shike a pirist tnu-tnu ɓei la shando dole a shan wyidna do, Shekwoyi nu ɓei shando ce n wohin.
Yesu eyi pirist wo to ɓei gmi n Levi puwa nun.
Yesu ɓei gmi n Yahuda bye nu. A Yahuda yi to ɓei zhin a pirist nu m. Ntu ge Musa to ɓei kni ɓa nun.
Deye kwa wu yi ge Shekwoyi zokwo ɓei la shan do da shike pirist zokwo ɓei la shan do da shike pirist zokwo ɓei la shando. Ko laze ngye Malkizedek nya nu.
Yesu to ɓei zhin pirist nayi nya num. Amma wo ɓei ze pirist n iko yi n ko ta shan zo m.
Shekwoyi wa da n Zabura 110 ge, “Ho zhin mi pirist nu nyalo-nyalo, Ho zhin n gye Malkizedek nu.”
Deye kwa wu ge aɓei la pirist zokwo kwo-kwoyi zunya. Ko to ɓei n kalayi dei-dei m, Kwo to ɓei mi kwa gni za m.
Kwo to ɓei ga za n befyece m, Kwo to ɓei mi kwo lo n zai n Shekwoyi aba m. Amma Yesu ɓei la ɓe nu wyetu yi, Owonu na ɓe n yi vi-viyi n Shekwoyi aba.
Shekwoyi ɓei la nyasi si nge Yesu zhin pirist nyalo-nyalo nya nu.
Shekwoyi to ɓei zhin lonu n pirist a je yi m. Amma n Yesu tukwo, wo ɓei si nya si wa gna ge, “Ho zhin pirist nu nyalo-nyalo nya.”
Ntu deye ɓo Kristi ta gba kalam, ntuge Shekwoyi la nyasi si, Kristi ɓa gyi abye har nyalo-nyalo.
N sapai, a pirist ɓei mwa begye, n nabai n zaho wa fi, sai a dna do.
Amma Yesu ta shan fi m, ata mi a shan wo do m, ntu cenu ata ye zado lo m.
Gni-gni nwo ga nyi, kwo nu-nuyi lo njesun kwo zhin nyalo-nyalo nya nu. Yesu nyi nyalonyalo. Ntu cenu Yesu ɓa mi wa gni aza nɓa ɓe wa ba nyi. Wo zhin wa gyi Shekwoyi wye ntu yi ɓo.
Wo ɓei la ze ngye ʼyi kodashike wo to ɓei zhin laifi m, Oza gyi-gyi-yi nu, n tna zamba. A woi knaya n na alaifi da, a mwa-mwa gawo n eshemi.
Yesu to wu ngye a pirist a je nun, Wo to ɓei zhin sadaka ntu wa alaifi ɓom; amma ntu na za ɓo nu. Wo ɓei bwa fi zun gmanyi nu ntu ya laifi ɓo.

Wyidna wato Musa owa, kwo nu ɓei kni a gbaizanyikwoci dna a pirist tnu-tnu. Ɓa ɓei zhin a laifi da nu. Amma wyidna woi-woyi nu na kni Yesu, Shekwoyi nugun. Wo to ɓei zhin laifi da Shekwoyi nu na kni wo pirist nunuyi nyalo-nyalo.
Ɓedakpakalayi nu nyi. Yesu Kristi wo nu zhin pirist dnagmayi. Owo asese ba n lo n eshe mi nu n kun-sun n Shekwoyi, n wo bwaizhe bwa.
Owo nu zhin yi bmazhin yi n Shekwoyi abye, dna n tent n Shekwoyi wa mi n wohin, to ge n zanyikwoci abwa yim.
Pirist dnagmayi tnu-tnu nu wa zhin sadaka, ntu aza laifi ɓo. Wo dna n azanyikwoci a tan-tasin n Shekwoyi, ntu cenu dole wa ga sadaka.
N na alkawali kwo-kwo yi sa Yesu to ɓei ɓa bmiya dna ɓom, ntu ge wo to ɓei gmi n pirist bye nu m. Ntu cenu ato ɓei ɓa ye ge wo zhin tnu-tnu ye pya m.
Zokwo kwokwoyi nu ɓei zhin gnabye. Kwo nu ɓei zhin foto eshe nya. Ya gye shi na ɓei zhin lubui n wu. Wo ɓei gna Musa ge wo zhin lubui (tent) shi wo ɓo wu wo.
Amma Kristi pirist tnutnu ko du a pirist aje nya n daraja. Owo nu zhin bmazhin yi n Shekwoyi abye n saiye.
Shekwoyi awyidna kmisunyi ɓei dnaɓo na vi ba. Kwo to ɓo bma zhin. Ntu cenu wa je do ga.
Shekwoyi n wohin tukwo, wa cige, “dnawye esa ɓelo nɓa zhin alkawali n Israila yi ɓodo n Yahudiyi yi.
Mi ɓei la alkawali kwo-kwo yi wu ntu ge efya dada to ɓei shi kwo bwam-sanu ɓa ɓei kun n Masar nyi. Alkawali kwo-kwoyi ɓei wu gbo n woi-woyi.”
Dagayi wa gna ge mi ɓa zhin alkawali ye n na Israila yi, wyihoi nɓa dna ɓa emi awyidna nɓa bugba. Nɓa ze oɓa Shekwoyi ɓahin ɓa ze ema za.
Nsahi, ato ɓei je zaho-zahoi nya wun, ntucenu ato ɓei ye a malami nɓa ɓo wuza Dagayi m, “Zaho-zahoi ɓei kpe mi ye, ɓinayi n na zadnagmayi, Vinya aɓei kpe mi ye.
Mi ɓei gye ɓa sun-sun dna nɓa aba bwi, mi ɓei ku ɓa laifi zamwi.”
Shekwoyi wa gna ge wola awyidna kwo-kwoyi ga avun, woi la woi-woyi ga.
Nsaiyi fa ya da alkawali kwo kwoyi ɓo n Shekwoyi ɓei ga wa za nyi. Wo ɓei ku awyidna ga shi aɓa la wo tu nwu.
Tent (lubui) ɓo nyi ntu wo latu ɓo, ko ɓei safi n gun aba, Nyakun kmisunyi a yikwo ge aba gyi-gyi-yi.
Eje ɓei sa, Nkwo avun yakun do ɓonyi, kwo nu ɓei zhin aba gyi-gyi-yi du-duyi. (Shekwoyi zafun ɓei dna ɓo nu.)

N nyakun bayi bagadi ɓei shi n cei zhin n zinariya yi, aɓei zhin a gyi tulale na ɓo nu. Akwati zinariya nya ɓei nyi ko nu ɓei zhin akwati alkawali nya. Nkwo mi Musa awyidna ɓo ya dna n nyagyi yafi n ɓa ɓei zhin ɓai gyi n zhabui nyi. Wato mana nu. Haruna busi ɓei dna ɓo, n kwo ɓei kmi nyi.

Nkwo she ɓa ɓei n nazai zhin kpe, wato Shekwoyi amalaika. A yi ɓa ge Cherubim, ɓa ɓei n nabminayi laya kpe n na kwati yi Akwati she, a yi kwo ge Shinkpegye sun-sungye nya. Yi ta mi ya da shi kwo ɓei nyi vinya n.
Shi ɓa ku anya zo zhin vinya, sai pirist wa lo nyakun gyi-gyi-yi, wa ɓe n sadaka yi ntu n naza ɓo.

Amma pirist dnagmayi nu ɓei bwa mi wa lo dna n nyakun bayi. Wo ɓei zhin wa bwa lo zungmanyi nu n eye gmanyi. Wo ɓei zhin wa lo n nami shi wa zoya kpe n Shinkpegye sun-sungye nya, n Shekwoyi abye. Kwo ɓo zhin kwa bwi ɓa laifi n na babwi yi. Kwo ɓei nyi ntu piristi ɓo na zai vinya.

Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi cei pma wa wu yi nya nu n kwo mi. N zokwo kwokwoyi aza ɓei gnaje gna-gnayi n Shekwoyi, ɓa to ɓei mi ɓa lo fi n naba gyi-gyi-yi du-duyi ɓa lo da Shekwoyi m. Eje ɓo sa n kwo ɓei ɓa gnaje ya. Ntu ge zokwo woi-woyi to ɓei guya ai lo Shekwoyi aba m.

Deye kwo wu yi nya nu ɓo. N zokwo kwo-kwoyi, nyaga n sadaka yi ɓo zhin dole nu, amma deye to ɓei mi kwa zhan ɓa bugba ya m, oɓa bugba ɓei zhin laifi nya nu, ɓa ɓei gnaje-gnagnayi n Shekwoyi. Shekwoyi ta ye laifi m, wo ta ye ɓa ɓedo n laifi da yi m, aza n na to zhan ɓa laifi ya m.

Zokwo kwokwoyi ɓei wu aɓo nu nɓa ɓa zhin a da Shekwoyi. Awyidna ɓei nyi ntu nyasin ɓo, n nyagyi, nuwan fu ɓedo n na nyajei mwa begye. Dole owo mwa-mwa gayi ɓa nu aɓoye. Kwo ɓei zhin dole nu ɓa zhin aɓo deye ntu ge ɓa zhin shiri ntu Yesu ɓeɓe ɓo. Yesu la zokwo woi-woyi guya kwoi lo Shekwoyi aba.
Yesu nu zhin eyi pirist woi-woiyi duduyi. Womi woi ɓe n yi n Shekwoyi abye, wo du Shekwoyi puwa n eshe mi; Abwa nu to mi api ye m, kwo to nyi n na nyi ye nu m, ama n eshe mi.

Wo ɓei la wo ami nu wa lo n cei n naba gyi-gyi-yi. Wa ze ɓa kpe n shinkpegye sun-sungye nya, ena ami nu to n, Nyakpa dohodohoyi ami nu to n. Owo hin ami nu, owo ami ku yi ta-ta ta gba. Eyi gni-gni la nu, gni-gni tnu-tnu ku zo zhin.
N zokwo kwo-kwoyi, aɓei zhin ampanyi n na nakwoyi, ɓedo n anayi, oɓa mi ɓei zhin ɓa zhan za ya nɓa laifi nayi nya.

Amma Shekwoyi nugun ami gyi-gyi-yi du oɓa nyalo. Zafun ɓei zhin woi bma wo zhin, owo ami n kala yi lo. Kwo ɓa shan yi do kwapmi ya bugba bma, kwa zhan yi alaifi ya. Kwo la ednawo gmiyi ya ntu na awyindna ɓo, kwo ga yi kala ntu ge ya zhin wo atnu-tnu.

Yesu wo la ɓe n alkawali woi-woyi. Kwo nyi ntu naza ɓonu n Shekwoyi la ɓa yi nyi, n na byei gbogbo, ɓa gwo Shekwoyi anabarka. Yesu fi-fi la yi loya, gama wo ɓei ku ta-ta ta gba ntu ya laifi ɓo. Anabaraka ye cauta nu.
Nza fi, wo zhin wa gado ya shi n navun, ama ata mi a gna oza gado, to woi fi num.
Ntu cenu aɓa zhin ampanyi n wo ɓeda yi woi la fi nu. Zaho ta gwo nyaho sai wo la fi.
Shekwoyi alkawali ɓo ce hatimi n ami. Kwo ɓei wu kwotonci n Musa sa, owo fifi nya. Yesu wa fi, ntuge a gayi owo gado nu.
Musa ɓei ga aza Shekwoyi awyidna. Nsaiyi wa ze ami ya kpe n na wyidna yi ɓedo n na azayi. Wa zhin ampanyi n afintolo hoi ɓedo n lulu byei-byei yi n nabai wa ze ami ya kpe aza ɓedo n nuwan yi.
Wo ɓei gna ami ye, “ɓa zhin alkawali nya nu, Shekwoyi gbega nu, fye shi kwo bwa.”
Wo ɓei lakwo zeye kpe n tent ɓedo n nabayi n ɓa gyi-gyi-yi nyi.
N alkawali kwo-kwoyi ami nu ɓei zhin ɓa zhan nya ya vinya. Deye kwa wu ge, efi, kwo nu zhin laifi tagba nya. Gafara zhin to lo n tna ami zeyan.

Tent n Musa ɓei zhin n anyai vinya nkwo mi, aɓei laɓa degbe n she nu. Dole Musa zeɓa gyi-gyi-yi n anyakpa ami yi. Amma Tent nkwo lo n eshe nyi, aɓei zekwo Gyi-gyi-yi n enya yi nu n kwo du deye lo n daraja.
Yesu ɓei lo eshe nu n kwohin tukwo, to ge aba gyi-gyi-yi nna mi n nabwa yi m, Wo lo n she Woi wu wohin tukwo n Shekwoyi abye ntu yi ɓo.
Wo taga sadaka ntu yi ɓo cici m, Yesu sadaka zungmanyi nu. Ama pirist dnagmayi ɓei zhin wa ga a sadaka cici n na ba gyi-gyi-yi dudu yi eye doho-dohoyi.
Shekwoyi ta ye sadaka ye cici nu m. Dole nu Yesu wa ga wohin zun gmanyi. Owo sadaka ɓei la eyi tata goya.
Zaho-zahoi ɓa fi zungmanyi. Amma n fi avun Shekwoyi ɓei da zaho-zahoyi owa.
Ntu cenu Yesu ɓei fi ntu yi ɓo zungmanyi, wo ɓei fi eyi a laifi fi nu. Amma wo ɓei la laka n vingwo, wo je ze ɓe lo wa gni aza nɓa vi wo nyi.
A Yahudiyi awyidna ɓei bmiya amma kwo ɓei zhin foto nu, kwo ɓei zhin ofun nu anya manayi n Kristi ɓei zhin ntu yi ɓo. A ɓei zhin a ga sadaka cici, eye dohodohoi.
Sadaka yi ɓei gna ge kwo ɓa gni aza nu, to ai ɓei ga cici m. Kwo bmiya mwa-mwa ga yi wa ze gyigyiyi nyalo-nyalo, to wa zhin tunani laifi nya m.
Amma sadaka to ɓei mi kwa nya ɓa tunani nukwoyi ya m, kwo ɓei zhin kwa pa ɓa a laifi ɓo nu cici.
Kwo to ɓei zhan ɓa a laifi ya m. Anakwo ami, na ana miyi ta mi ɓa zhan za a laifi ya m, sai dai Yesu Kristi ami gmanyi.
Ntu cenu Yesu wa ɓe anyi mi, Yesu ɓei da ɓo nu anabi ho aba wa ci ge, “Anyakpa ami ta siho ebemi — O Shekwoyi, ntu cenu hoi ga mi nayi ye, Emi nayi nu n ho ye sadaka.
Sakada anyakpa nya to ga ho bugbafu m, kwo sadaka a pirist nya ɓata mi ɓaga ho bugba fu m.”
N deye avun, fye gye, “Mi la ɓe ma ga mi wye-wyeyi ntu naza laifi ɓo. Nyanu n littafi ku da ntu mi ɓo.”
She Kristi ɓei ku da ge, anyakpa ami ta mi kwa ga yi enya n Shekwoyi ye nyi m, njesun sadaka n na gyina ntu na laifi ɓo nyi ɓa ta fu wo bugbam, A Yahudaiyi awyidna ta dawo bugba m.
Yesu wa je ɓo da n jesun wa gna, “Mi la ɓe ma ga mi wye-wyeyi, Mi ga kwo ntu n naza laifi ɓo nu. Ala zokwo kwo-kwoyi gaya. Ala ɓe n woi-woyi.”
Shekwoyi wo ku gafara zhin yi n zokwo woi-woi. Wola ya laifi zhanya nyalo-nyalo. Yesu nu na zhin aɓo deye ntu yi ɓo, sanu wo ɓei fi ntu ya laifi ɓo nyi.
Nsa kwokwoyi sa, pirist ɓei zhin wa laka gni n nabye fyegyi-fyegyi, wo ɓei zhin wa ga sadaka ntu naza laifi ɓo, ama kwo ta mi kwo gni za m.
Ama Yesu ɓo ga wohin zun gmanyi ntu sadaka ɓo ga Shekwoyi, wa ga wo nayi ntu ya laifi ɓo. Wo tu lo naba duduyi vinya n iko yi n kun-sun Shekwoyi n shemi.
Wo tu lo naba iko nya n kun-sun Shekwoyi yi, Owo anuwun yi ɓo fi n wo sunta. Enya nu n wo pmi, wo ɓei gyibe tu ʼɓa tukwo nyalo-nyalo.
Wo ku yi ze aza gyi-gyi-yi n Shekwoyi aba. Owo ami layi alaifi zhanya har nyalo-nyalo.
Zafun nu zhin yi seida n ge yi gyi-gyi-yilo.
Zafun Shekwoyi nya gna ge, “Alkawali woi-woyi nyi nɓa zhin na Israila yi. Nɓa kami awyidna kpe nɓa bugba, nɓa ku awyidna ya fi ɓa n ɓami, deye ɓa zhin ɓa kpe mi nufi ye ɓa vi ma wyidna.”
Wo ɓei je da ge, “Mi ku ɓa zhin gafara. Mi ta je ɓa laifi ɓo pa m, kwo kwa oɓa ɓonukwoyi zhin.”
Mi ku fye zhin gafara, mi ku fye alaifi ze, amwi nyalo-nyalo, kwo zhin ɓo gboloyi nu fya ga sadaka ntu fya alaifi ɓo. Yesu ku deye zo zhin n wa mi yi.
Emi azaje, yi ɓa mi ya lo Shekwoyi aba, Yesu ami la zokwo guya gayi.
Yesu la zokwo woi-woyi guya gayi. Kwo zhin kwa ga wye-wyeyi, Wo la zokwo zhin yi kwoi lo Shekwoyi aba. Owo nayi ɓedo n wo ami yi nu ɓei zhin zokwo ye.
She Yesu Kristi wo nu zhin Pirist Dnagmayi, woi gyi ɓe tu n Shekwoyi puwa nyi.
Emi azaje, yi lo Shekwoyi aba n bugbayi guguyi ya. Yi ku gaiciya ga n ge wo ɓa gwo yi, ntu ge Yesu ami layi zhanya sarai. Zafun kwa woi zhan yi ya cici.
Yi zhin aza gniyi nu kuma yi wyewyeyi lo. Yi to zhin shakka, n yi gnigni yi m, gama eyi Gni yi zhin za gaiciya da nu wohin kwa wo ɓa nu owo alkawali.
Yi zhin godiya ntu nya ɓo Yesu ku zhin gayi nyi. Yi yenajeyi, yi bma aje zhin yi ce aje bwa. Deye ɓa wu ge yi zhin Yesu abara nu hin-hin.
Ema zaje yi to ci aduwa ɓo wyegba m, enya nu n na zaho zhin, amma yi ce aje bwa yi dna aje zokwo, Yesu jezeɓe ɓo kwo la wu viwyi.
Yi to gyi abye fi n na laifi m, ntu ge yi kpe gaiciya ye lo. Amma n ya gyi abye n laifi zhin, Shekwoyi ta zhin yi gafara m, ya zhin yi gwo kpe m.
Shekwoyi ɓa ta za nwa gyi abye n laifi zhin yi, Wo zhin Shekwoyi nuwun yi nu. Shekwoyi minagyi ɓo zopui nwo anuwun yi n nyipyeyi kmaknayi.
Aɓei tu aza dole ɓa vi Musa awyidna, aza n ɓa ɓei zungna nyi ɓaɓei ku fi n tna sun-sungye. Sa n za ɓei zhin laifi, sai a bwa aseda da ngun aba kwo ngun ata laifi kwa tabbata.

Aza ho lo ɓai kpe Shekwoyi ɓi apita, ɓai zhin aɓo ngye owo ami to ɓai gyi-gyi-yi m. Ɓa la Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi la minagyi ka. Oza n wo zhin aɓo deye pya, wo ɓa gwo tata dnagmayi, wo to ɓei lo Shekwoyi bemi m.
Shekwoyi ɓei da ge, “Tagba kwo zhin mi nya nu. Nɓa ga ɓa amsa.” Nɓa ka aɓei da ya. “Nɓa da aza owa, nɓa ta aɓenukwoyi zhin yi.”
Nkanu ɓa kpe Shekwoyi minagyi ɓo ye a? Kwo zhin ɓo dnawoyi nu oza lo Shekwoyi wada.

Ho kpe sa lo n ho ɓo ya Yesu vi ncei yi? Emazaje, fye to ze wyihi amwi m. Anyipyeyi gmada nya n naɓo wowoyi: Fye ku wahala sin ntu Yesu eye ɓo, amma fyehin kwa fye, ku hakuri bwa. Fyeto na wo aɓo m amma fye vi wo cici.
Mi pa salo naza ɓei zhin ɓai lu fye, ɓai ma fye san. Fye gye aza sun-sun nɓa ɓei zhin ɓai sin wahala n gye fye nyi, kwo zhin hali manayi nu. Shekwoyi kwa wo dagma lo n fyei.
Fye ɓei sin wahala ɓedo n naza yi n ɓafi n kurkuku. Fye to ɓei damu sa n na ɓei ku fye akaya m, fye ɓo ku Shekwoyi kpeye har fyei kpema wo. Fye kpe lo ge, gyiba dnagmayi lo kwoi pmi fye nʼshemi.
Fye to fa kpema Shekwoyi ɓo m, kwo n wuso-wuso, fye to fa m. Shekwoyi n lada yi shi fye lo n ʼshemi.
Fye zhin peceiye, fya zhin hankuri. Deye fye zhin Shekwoyi ɓeye nu. N fya zhin Shekwoyi ɓeye, fye ɓei gwo lada n mwa.
Sa fyewyi, Yesu jezeɓe lo, wo ta mwa sam. Fye zhin hankuri fya pmi wo.
A Yesu viyi zhin Shekwoyi aɓi nu vinya, dole ya zan-zan dna n gaiciya ga. Nna ɓo vinya la kpema wo fyeto fa Dagayi vi ɓom, Shekwoyi ta wo agmada n nazai n ɓa jeze n navun yi m.
Ama yi zhin wo aviyi nu ɓehin-hin nya. Yi to ye ya jeze navun yi m Eyi gaiciya ga kwo ci seda lo ge yi wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya yi lo.
Kni yi nu zhin gaiciya ga? Gaiciya ga kwo nu zhin bugba shi ge nya yi ye kwo ɓa zhin. Ko nu zhin gaiciya ga n bugba ge nya lo na bye kwo da shike yi ta mi ya to kwo bwa m, kwo kwa ya gye m.
N sapai aza ɓei nyi n gaiciya ga yi sosai. Aɓei zhin a kpe ɓa ye ntu ɓa gaiciya ga ɓo.
Dna gaiciya ga, yi kpe lo ge Shekwoyi nu ɓei zhin anyi n nanyai vinya n ɓa fi n ɓa nyi. Owo ɓeda nu ɓei zhin ɓa, nsasayi kwa zhin.

Gaiciya ga nu ɓei zhin Habila wa vi Shekwoyi ɓo. Wo ɓei ɓe n nyagayi n kwo ɓei da Shekwoyi ndu Kayinu nya. Shekwoyi ɓei la Habila gwo ɓedo n wo nyaga yi. Habila gwo ɓedo n wo nyaga yi. Habila lafi amma dole ya dna wo wye ya gye wo ɓei kpe ma Shekwoyi.
Enoch ɓei zhin zanu n gaiciya gayi. Wo ɓei la kpema Shekwoyi. Shekwoyi kwa wa dagma n wo gaiciya gai. Ntu cenu wo to ɓo fi m. Shekwoyi ɓei la wo la lo n cei n ʼshemi.
Shekwoyi ta wo ho agmada m ndei ho to n gaiciya ga yi m. Oza n wo ye wa ɓe wa ba dole wa ga wo gaiciya. Wa kpe ge Shekwoyi zhin wa ga aza lada n ɓa zan wo shin nyi.

Nuhu ɓei zhin ʼzanu n wo ɓei kpema Shekwoyi. Shekwoyi ɓo wu wo anya n ɓa ɓa zhin. Nuhu ɓei la gaiciya ga Shekwoyi wa zhin eya ntu ge kwa gni wo puwa. Aza je ɓei gyi abye ɓa zhin laifi. Ɓa to ɓo ga Shekwoyi gaiciya m. To ɓa viwo begye m, Shekwoyi ɓo gwo Nuhu ntu wo gaiciya ga ɓo, n wo ɓo vi yi.

Ibrahim kwa wo ɓei kpema Shekwoyi sosai. Dna n gaiciya ga wa wo Shekwoyi begye. Shekwoyi ɓo gna wo ge wo fa wa yi wa lo ekni do. Shekwoyi ɓo ku gna ge wo ɓa ga Ibrahim ekni yi. Wo ɓolo, to woi kpe aba n wo lo m.

Wo ɓei zhin zhiɓeyi nu dna ekni alkawali nya. Ama wo ɓei la kpema Shekwoyi. Wo ɓei dna n na lubui n wo puwa yi vinya Ishaku ɓedo n Yakubu yi ɓa ɓo fi n na lubui ce. Shekwoyi ɓei ga ɓa alkawali ngye Ibrahim.
Ibrahim ɓei pmi Shekwoyi wa ɓe n woyi n zhimi. Ezhi n Shekwoyi wa mi n wohin yi.
Saratu ɓei n gaiciya ga yi, Owo gaiciya ga ɓo zhin wo wa ma oɓi woi la kwo. Wa gaiciya ga ge Shekwoyi ɓa nuwo alkawali.
Ntu cenu, Israila yi bye ɓei pa n Ibrahim nu oza nwo ɓei la kwo sosai. Wonu zhin ebye dnagmayi ye dada. Owo aɓi n mwa begye n gye amwi kwo akpasu ayiwo ge oɓa dada. Wo ɓei la api mi ɓa n ʼshemi.

Aza ye vinya ɓaku kpe ma Shekwoyi. Nya wo ɓei zhin ɓa alkawali, ɓa ɓo la kwo ga gaiciya. Amma ɓa to ɓo gwo anya vinya n Shekwoyi ɓei zhin ɓa alkawali m. Ɓa ɓei la ye ɓa gwo alkawali, amma ɓa ku ɓa nya fi. Amma ɓa ɓei nagmadayi ntu ge ɓa ɓo kpe ge anyi ye to zhin ɓa nya num. Eyi puwa lo n ʼshemi nu.
Oɓa ɓeda kwo wu ɓa wyetu. Aza ɓei zhin ɓai shi awye n ʼshe nu, oɓa puwa nu.
Ɓa ɓei n sai nyi ɓa jeze lo anyi gmada. Ama ɓa to ɓe ye lo ɓo m.
Maimako ɓa ɓei kni agmada eshe nya nu, ntu cenu a da Shekwoyi lo.
Sanu Shekwoyi ɓeitu Ibrahim mwi cei nyi wo ɓo dudu wa kpema wo. Ntu cenu wa ga Ishaku owo ɓi. Har wa ku shiri zhin wa zun wo sha ntu sadaka ɓo.
Wo ɓei ku shiri zhin wawu Ishaku. Koda shike Shekwoyi ɓei ku gna wo ge Ishaku ɓa zhin obye tukwo da.
Wo ɓei ku kpe ge Shekwoyi ɓa je Ishaku wyewyeyi ga. Enya nu kuwa nkwo ɓo zhin, Ama n Ibrahim aba Ishaku ɓola fi ama wa jeze ɓe anyi.
Dna n gaiciya ga Ishaku ɓei tu Yakubu anabarka ɓedo n Isuwa yi ntu na bye ɓo.
Yakubu ɓei fi woi la kwo, ama kafin wo fi wo ɓei yi Yusufu aɓi vinya wa zhin aduwa kpe ɓa, wa tu ɓa anabarka. Duk dna n gaiciya ga nu n wo ɓo zhin aɓo ye.

Yusufu ɓei n gaiciya gayi, wo ɓo fi woi la kwo ce. Wo ɓei da a Israila gni-gni ɓo n Masar. Wo ɓei ku kpe ge kwo ɓa zhin lo nu. Ntu cenu wa gna ɓa ge ɓa ɓei la wo asunkun ku lo ncei dna n gaiciya ga nu n wo ɓo da ce.
Musa dada n woʼya yi ɓei n gaiciya ga ce. Ɓa ɓei la gaiciya ga ge Shekwoyi ɓa gni ɓa ɓi n fi. Cenu ɓo zhin ɓa sowo har apya ta. Amma ɓa to ɓei zhin ɓai wo Firauna dna m.
Musa wohin ɓei gaiciya ga. Wa mwa har wa zhin zayakwo dna Masar, to wa ye ayi wo ge Firʼauna nyigun nugun m.
Wa ye wa sun wahala n Shekwoyi azayi, wo to ɓei ye wa dagma dna n laifi m.
Wo ɓei gna wo ta ye wa zhin aɓo n gye a Masar yi aɓin, ama wo ɓo gye kwo ɓa wo du wa sun wahala ntu Shekwoyi alkawali ɓo, Wo ɓei la gaiciya ga ge Shekwoyi ɓaga wo lada n du Masar nya.
Dna gaiciya ga wa fa Masar, wo to ɓei wo dna ge esu ɓa gyi minagyi m, wo ɓei kpe ge Shekwoyi kunsun lo n woi, Wa kpe ma Shekwoyi iko.

Wo ɓei ku kpe ge Shekwoyi ɓa gni wo aza, ntu cenu wa gna aza ge ɓa wu kugya ɓa pmiya kwo ami n na bokunmi she, sanu malaika efi nya ɓei duya wo to ɓo wu ɓa ɓi kmisunyi m. Amma puwa doho-dohoi nkwo to ɓei ami yi kpem, wa wu aɓi kmisunyi.
A Israila yi ɓei la kpema Shekwoyi. Ɓa pi ola dnagmayi ya n gye ɓa piya n kni kawai. Ama sanu na Amasar yi ɓei tumwi ge ɓa lo, ɓa ku bwi nuwan.
Dna n gaiciya ga Jerikwo galu kwa ʼɓaya, A Israila yi ɓei she galu gun anyipyei tnaba. Shekwoyi gbega nu ɓei. Ɓavi gbega yi kwa.
Rahab ɓei zhin karuwanu. Ama wo ɓei la gaiciya ga Shekwoyi iko, wo to ɓei fi n kunsun nwo azaje yi m, ɓa ɓei fi ntu ge ɓa to ɓei vi Shekwoyi begye m. Amma Rahab ɓei la azhi-pmigye yi gwo.
To, mi ɓa shada gena? Esa lami gba, n mi ɓa da aza gaiciya ga ɓo n gye Gidion, Barak, Samson, Jepheta, Dauda ɓedo n Samuila yi.
Oɓa vinya ɓa ɓei kpema Shekwoyi, Ɓa ɓei gyi kun, ai ku asu ya n ɓa gyi nyi, ɓai gyi be, ɓa gwo anabarka. Har ɓa wu agagwo, to agaba mi nɓa nyaho zhin.
Ena to ɓei shin ɓa gyin. Abeyakwo to ɓei shin ɓa wu m, Azaho ɓei ku kala bwa. Aza ho ɓaku ze abezhe-yakwo dna soja. Ɓa nya a soja je ya har ɓai busi.
Azaho ɓai ku aza kala n vingwo, Azaho ɓa ye ge ɓa sun wahala ɓa vi Shekwoyi. Ɓa ɓei ku kpe ge Shekwoyi ɓei je ɓa kala ku ɓa bwa wye-wye yi nyalo-nyalo nya.
Aɓei zhin a ma azaho san, azaho a sa ɓa naiya n busi yi, azaho kwa a pa ɓa a ya ɓa fi n kurkuku.
Aɓei kni azaho akuta har ɓa fi. A sa azaho pisa n gun aba nʼbei. Ama aɓei ku ɓa wu n abe-yakwo yi, azahoi vi ana-pa na kugya pai. Mikun yi gun ɓa har nyai san ɓa a zhin ɓa ɓo ntna sun-sun gye.
Aza ho ɓei zhin aza manayi nu sosai, ama ɓa ɓei zan fi n Zhabui, n na pai. Ɓa fi n nabwo nkni.
Ɓa ɓei Ikpema Shekwoyi a zhin shiri ntu yi ye n ɓai, ama zaho-zahoi nɓa to ɓei gwo anya vinya n Shekwoyi ɓo zhin ɓa alkawali m.
Lada lo n du ɓa nya n Shekwoyi a zhin shiri ntu yi ɓo, ntu cenu Shekwoyi yelo ɓa pmi yi ya kun gna.

She azalo n mwa ɓai shi ya, wye nyi, yi ku akaya shanwoyi ya, yi ku a laifi fa nɓa shi yi nyi to ɓai ye ge ya gyi abye nyin. N nabai ya zan-zan dna n gaiciya n hakuri yi n Shekwoyi la shi n ya bye nyi.
Yi shi Yesu nu awye, wo nu zhin yi gnabye. Vinyikwo to ɓei wo wo wa fi ntu ya laifi ɓon. Wo ɓei kpe ge kwo ɓa ɓe wo n mwa-mwai. Nsaiye kuwa wo tu lo n naba duduyi n kunsun n Shekwoyi n ʼshemi.
Aza nukwoyi ɓei ga Yesu wahala, ama wa zhin hakuri. Yi dna wo wahala wye wa ze eyi gnabye. Deye ɓa bma yi zhin ya bwa kala.
Kwo dama yi to shi gusun n laifi yi kwo n jarabai har yi la amisa kpe ɓedo n ami yin.
Hola Shekwoyi ɓeda zamwi nu? Wo ɓei gna ge, “Omi nugun to gyi minagyi ʼsa Shekwoyi wa gaho tata. To bma bugba ya esa n wa wuho oho doknunu gbi m.
Shekwoyi zhin wa dna owo aɓi zokwo wa ga ɓa tata. Sanu wo ga yi tata, kwo wu gye yi zhin wa nya nu.”
Shekwoyi zhin yi-fi n zokwo shi aza je zhin oɓa ɓi fi n zokwo nyi. Zaho-zahoi ta mi wa shi n waɓi to wa dna wo zokwo m. Yi zhin wa ɓi nu, ntu cenu woi ga yi tata.
Dole ata aɓi, oɓa dada ɓa zhin Ba fi n zokwo. Amma n Shekwoyi to ga ho tata m, ho to zhin wo nya nu m.
Yi zhin ya ga ya dada mwa-mwa. Yi ta nya ɓa ɓo m, ɓai ya ga yi tatam. Ntu cenu yi gwo Shekwoyi tata n na gmadayi. Shekwoyi ye yi n du eya dada anyi nya. Wa ga yi tata ntu ge wo ye yi lo.
Eya dada anyi nya dna yi zokwo aye fyewyi nu kawai. Amma Shekwoyi zokwo dna, gaiciya nu n saho-sahoi. Wo ye ya gwo wo gyi-gyi, wo ta zhin wye m.
A tada oza sanu na ta won, sai dai ko la duya. Kwo zhin ha fa a zokwo nukwoyi ya vi zokwo do na gmada yi ɓedo lafiya yi.
Laka la kwo da shike a laho ɓe, ha bwa kala njesun.
Zhin ha pita zokwo manayi. Aza tna kala na nyasan yi n ɓa vi kwo ɓa ta miya ɓa wu ɓahin m. Amma ɓaɓa ku ze akala da dna n gaiciya ga.
To je zaho-zahoi m, ha zan-zan gyi-gyi-yi cici, Ntu ge aza n ɓa to gyi-gyi-yi m, ɓa ta gye Shekwoyi wye m.
Fye dna je wye n fye ɓa bwa Shekwoyi anabarka n fye to ye ge nuwun kwo lo fye a tasun. Ko zhin kwa ɓe n wahala yi, kwa to aza wye-wyeyi bwa.
To fya zhin anagbayi m, to fya shi Shekwoyi lafya-lafya, n gye Isuwa m. Wo ɓei kun wo gado ntu mikun ɓo. Kwo ɓei zhin ɓo gboloyi nu n wa ba.
Sanu awye ɓei kna wo ya, sai la duya, ko da shike wo ɓo ci bwi ntu wo laifi ɓo, ama duk gboloyi nu. Ato ɓei je woyem.

Ho to shin wahala sun n gye a Israila nya m. Ɓa ɓei ku lo ena, ɓa ku lo wyegma, ɓa ku lo ogma nukwoyi, aɓo deye ɓa ɓei gye ɓa n Sinai pe nu har ɓai wo edna njesun, Shekwoyi ɓei ga ɓa owo awyidna n ya nu.
N wyihi, ɓa wo ai bye a kna-knaci, ɓa wo Shekwoyi begye n gye ogma har kwoi shan ekni ashan. Har ɓa gna Shekwoyi ge wo la fa ɓeda ɓo, ntu dna ɓo kurum.
Ɓa to mi ɓa mizhi m, ntu nwa awyidna ɓo. Gama nyakpa doho-dohoi n kwo ɓei to epei, kwo ɓei la fi.
Kwo ɓei zhin oɓo dnawo nya nu, Musa nwohin wo ɓei ku dna wo, wa gna ge, “Mi vin lo mi-i wo dna.”
Amma fye ku ɓe Sihiyona pe, kwo nu zhin Urushelima eshe nya. Fye ku ɓe amalaika yezhi ba, agmada ʼba.
Fyehin kwa wato zaho-zaho n wo eye katu lo n Shemi, fye ɓe Shekwoyi-wada yi aba, fye ɓe azafun aza gni-gni yi nya aba. Ɓa lo n ʼshe, ɓa ku ze n nu-nuyi.
Fye ku ɓe Yesu aba n wo zhin yi viye yei n alkawali woi-woi aba nyi. Fye ku ɓe Yesu ami aba n ɓa zhin za gafara nyi. Owo ami du Habila nya lo. Habila ami ɓei zhin nya nu n na ɓa gbata.
Kna wo ɓeda tnubua n wo daɓo n hoi nyi. Abei ga a Israila yi tata ntu ge ɓa ɓei zun Shekwoyi ɓeda gna-na n Musa ʼgbe, oza n wo zun wo ɓeda gna-na n Yesu gbe wo ɓa gna fifi nu.
Shekwoyi begye nu kawai ɓei zhin anyi ɓa shan-shan, sanu wo ɓei da ɓo tu n Sinai pe nyi. Sanu wa je ɓo da duk ɓedo n ʼshe yi kwo ɓei shan-shan.
Shekwoyi ɓei shi nya ya nkwo to na gbegye yi lon, anya n ɓa mi zhi lo ɓa nu ɓei ce zhi kawai.
Shi yi nbegyi lo, n zaho ta mi nkwo gwoya nyin, yi zhin ɓo nkwo ɓa da Shekwoyi, yi zhin wo bauta, nbugba godiya nya yi, yi ga wo mwa-mwa ndanwoyi.
Ntu ge eyi Shekwoyi zhin ona nu, nkwo gyi aba nyi.
Yi ye najeyi ntu ge yi zhin gmanyi-gmanyi nu.
Yi ye na zhiɓeiyi Aza ho ɓei ku zhin lo nu na malaikayi amma ɓa to ɓei kpe m.
Pa za ɓo nɓa fi n kurkuku nyi, gye she a ga aza wahala. Sun wahala n kun-sun ɓai. Sun wahala yi n gye kwo zhin ho nya nu.
Fye la mula ɓo shi dei-dei. Kada a zhin fye agma fya wunya. N fya wunya Shekwoyi ɓei dafye wa.
Fye to ku ze agyiwye ye yi m. Zhin godiya n nya yi n ho cei lo. Shekwoyi ɓei gna ge wo ta ya yi m. Mi kun-sun lo n fyei nyalo-nyalo. Nɓa ga fye nyagyi cici.
Ntu na alkawali ye ɓo yi ɓa da ɓo ntna edna, “Shekwoyi nu zhin mi bmazhin yi mi ta wo oza dna m.”
To fya ze ofye azakowyi amwi dna n Yesu ye m, Ɓa ɓei kpema Shekwoyi ɓa zan-zan n dna woyi. Fye vi ɓa pita bwi.
Yesu ta shan do n, Nya wo ɓei nyi n su nyi, wo zhin kwo nu n naiye kuma har nyalo-nyalo.

Shi Shekwoyi ta shan do nyin, to ye a malami doho-doho ɓa dna fye kwoce n nyawu nukwoyi m. Fa Shekwoyi alheri kwa ga fye kala. To ge anyagyi ho pya awyidna ko kwa zhibaje m, ɓa zhin banza nu-nnaza ba nɓa gyi ɓa nyi.
Eyi nyagyi gyi zafun nya kwo zhin zundu nu oza n wo dna awyidna kwo-kwoyi sunta wo to deye anabarka yi lo m.
A Yahudiyi ɓei zhin apma n na nyakpa yi nu ntu sadaka ɓo, ɓa ɓei zhin ɓa wu nyap-kpa ɓa lo ɓa gyi kona n zhimi avun. A mi da ɓa ɓe n cei n Shekwoyi nyakun. Deye ɓei zhin sadaka ntu alaifi ɓo nu.
Cenu ɓei zhin a wu Yesu n pifun, wa ga sadaka owo nyai nya ntu yi a laifi ɓo.
Yi shegun Yesu n zhimi avun. Wato to ge nanyi ye mi m. Yi sun wahala ɓedo n vinyikwo yi n kun-sun woi.
Anyi ye to zhin yi nya nun, yi pmi eya ʼpa, nyalo-nyalo nya nu, wato eshe.
Yi ga Shekwoyi mwa-mwa, kwo nu zhin yi sadaka ga. Yi zhin dna n Yesu ye. Yi gna azaje owo eye mwa-mwa ɓo, yi ci wo.
To ze ɓemana zhin amwi m, zhin aɓo manayi. Ce nya ga aza n ɓa to cei lon. Nyaga nu Shekwoyi ye n cei.
Ga aza mwa-mwa n ɓa du ho, nwyihoi ɓa ɓei wu Shekwoyi oɓa tnu-tnu. Ndei fya ga ɓa mwa-mwa tnu-tnu ɓa da ɓa zhin. Ko ɓa bma fyehin zhin ce.
Fye zhin aduwa ntu yi ɓo, yi ye ya zhin tnu-tnu ɓehinhin nya nu n ɓefyece yi.
Ntu cenu fye zhin aduwa ntu mi ɓo, ko n naiye ma fye ya zhin, mi cei pma ma ɓe fya ba sa fyewyi.
Shekwoyi wo tu fye anabarka, wonu ɓei la Yesu ka. Yesu kwa wo nu zhin knikna yi, wotu fye anabarka ntu owo ami zeya ɓo, dna n na alkawali woi-woyi.
Shekwoyi wo gba fya bukata ntu ge fya zhin wo ɓeye. Wo zhin ɓo n yi-i, nwo cei pma, wo zhin ntu Yesu ɓo. A ga Yesu mwa-mwa nyalo-nyalo.
Omi-azaje, kna tnubua n ɓo mi ku da dna n wasika ye mi.
Ala Timatawus loya n kurkuku, yi ɓa kun ɓe n woi. Kpekni sa fyewyi wo ɓa ɓe ma ba.
Fye ɓi fya atukwo da gna ga mi, a Yesu viyi dna nu Italiya, ɓa ɓi fye gna lo.
Shekwoyi alheri ɓa kun-sun n fyei nyalonyalo. Amin.
Wasika ye gmi n Yakubu akun nu, Shekwoyi bara n Dagayi Yesu Kristi nya yi. Kwoi lo a Yahudiyi a Yesu-viyi aba, n ɓa busi yafi laɓa nyi, mi tnu fye lo n gnaɓiyi.
Omi azaje ye-yeyi, fye sin wahala lo, fyei gye azhin? Fye dagma.
Ntu ge esa wahala nyi, efye bugba-bwa zhin kwa mwa.
Fa efye bugba bwa kwa mwa har fya ze aza hin-hin, nfye ta gyi nyaho san.
Nfye n cei pma fya kpe enya n Shekwoyi ye fya zhin, fye nya wo, wo ɓa wu fye n ɓugbai gmanyi, gama wo n shiri yi zhin lo wa ga oza ɓeyekpe n bugbai gmanyi, oza nwa nya wo, wo ta na ɓon.
Ama n ha nya wo, la awyetu n ge woɓa gaho, gama bugba shaka zhinyi wu ngye anuwan dokwo nu n ese zhin kwa cekwo abwaya nyi.
Shaula doho-dohoi nha zhin, hoi to n bugbai shi lo pin, shi ho pmi lo bwaye ha pmilo bwaye. Nhoto nya n gaiciya gayin, to gye ge Dagayi ɓaga ho amsan.
Yesu-viyi nwo to zhin nyaho nu dna n na nyin, a dawo, gama wo zhin nyaho nu n Dagayi abye.

Ama nyabwayi dagma n tuge owo nyabwa to zhin nyaho nu n Dagayi aban, gama esa fyewyi wo ɓa duya ngye mamawyi n kwo bmiya-bmiya la duya kwoi la bwa, kwo la fi ntu n nyipyei wo-wo ɓo. Anyabwai wulo, nu Safyewyi ɓa ɓa fi ɓa fa ɓa nyabwa n ɓa avun.
Bugba bui-da nu oza n wo wan wohin shi, to wa kaya dna n jaraban, gama n na avun wo ɓa bwa rawani wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya, n Dagayi a zhin aza alkawali nɓa ye wo nyi.
Pa esa n oza ye wa zhin ɓenukwoyi, Shekwoyi nu ta zhin wo jaraban, gama Shekwoyi ta zhin ɓenukwoyin, woi ta zhin aza jaraba n ɓenukwoyin.
Jaraba kun n oza bugba nu, oza n wo n shakpei fi n wo mi.
Aɓonubo-zhin nukwoyi ye zhin oza wa zhin aɓo nukwoyi, n na avun kwa zhin oza wa gwo tata efi nya n Shekwoyi aba.
Ntucenu fye to bwi zokwon, emi azaje.
Ama enya manayi doho-dohoyi nkwo bmiya kwo gmi n Shekwoyi aba nu, Owo na zhin buzangna, woi bmiyana nyalo-nyalo, n tna jejelu kwo kuwa wyegma.
Njesun nyipyei a gmadanya nu n wo aba ewyi n wo ɓei gayi awye-wyeyi woi-woi n cei nyi, ntu gaiciya owo ɓeda nya ɓo, ya ku ze, aɓo kmisunyi, Owo puwa woi-woi nya.
Omi azaje ye-yeyi fye to ze amwi ge, kwo gna bmiya oza kna ɓeda tnubuan n mwa, ama oza daɓo cewyi, to oza gyi minagyin.
Gama minagyi ta zhin yi ya ze aza manayin, shi Shekwoyi ye ya zen.

Ntu cenu fye la anya nukwoyi kunya nfye awye-wyeyi nɓa to bmiyan, n na ɓo yi n ɓa she fye kna, fya gba fyehin tukwo fya dagma shi fye la nabari manayi woi-woi gwo, gama kwo ɓami kwa gni yi awyewyeyi, ngye shi kwo shi yi abugba bwa nyi.
Fye pa ge ɓeda nu n oza ɓa zhinkwo, to ge oza knatun-bua kawai n, Ntu cenu fye to dna fyehin kwocen.
Gama n oza wo, to wa zhin, wo wu ngye ozanu n wo shi wohin awye n maganyi.
Shi wo la kala wo ta shan wohin awyeshi wa shan pa ngye shi wo wun.
