Ama n oza shi wohin awye biwu n Shekwoyi owa, nkwo zai lo-lo yi ya nyi, wo ta pa kwo ɓonu gmanyin, ama wo ɓa zhin oɓo n kwa da. Shekwoyi ɓa tu wo anabarka dna n ɓeho-ɓehoyi n wo ɓa zhin.
Oza nwa ci ge wo zhin Yesu-viyi nu, to wa wan wo nyitala shi nkwo gyi-gyi-yi ngye ebe nyin, wo dna wohin kwoce nu, owo knunnu zhin gbeloyi nu.
Yesu-viyi nwo gyi-gyi-yi ntna aɓe nya n Shekwoyi Dada awyeba, ozanu n wo shi a kuwyi bwa, n na anyigbayi, n zayi n wo kpema Dagayi n gaiciya yi, to wun-wun yi ya, kwo n tucegye n na anyi nya yin.
Omi aza ye-yeyi fye ɓa gna n wuna nu ge fye zhin Dagayi Yesu Kristi nya nu, Dagayi latu nya, fye gna ye n na anyabwayi nu fyei zhin awyekwoyi nukwoyia?
N oza loɓe efye aduwa nyakun, n na aje nakwoyi kpe, n zinariya abwanyayifi, njesun ozado wa loɓe n wo naje sakunyi kpe.
Fya gnaye n nyabwayi nu, fya ga wo aseseba manayi fya gna wyekwoyi ge, “La gni n bwai kwo ha sase.”
To, fye ye n zayi n tu n wo nyabwa ɓo kwa wanu ge fye kni aza kni-kni le nu.
Fye wo, emi azaje, Shekwoyi nla awyekwoyi kni ɓa ze anyabwayi dna n gaiciya ga, Eshebemi zhin ɓa nya nu, gama cauta nu n Shekwoyi zhin aza alkawali nɓa ye Wo.
Ama dna n na aza ngun abahi fye la wyekwoyi ci wyegba, fyei dnawo vinyikwo. Fye ta palo ge anyabwayi nu lo n fyei n na awada ban, ai gyi fye tara ai gu fye fi n wyegma nyakun.
Nsai mwa begye oɓanu ma Yesu Kristi esan. Oza n na yi fye n woye manayi nyi.
E, ɓehin-hin, kwo bmiya fya shi Dagayi wyidna bwa, “Tilas ha ye nho kunzhinyi ha bmawo zhin shi ho ye hohin tukwo.”
Ama fye ta shi Dagayi owa ye bwa lon, nfya gnaye n na anyabwayi fya laɓatu, kwo zhin ɓenukwoyi nu.
Oza n wa shi awyidna bwa vinya wa fa gmanyi wo n iaifiyi lo ngye oza nwo to shiɓa bwan vinya.

Gama Shekwoyi n wa ci ge hota la nyikwo n wo eɓayilon, wo na ci ge hota wu zan, ntucenu kwo ho to zun mula owa gnanan ha zhin anagbayin, ama ho la oza wu, ho la Shekwoyi owa zungna-na vinya, hola ze owa gnazunyi, laifida nu nwa bye.
Aɓei da fye owa, kwo fya zhin kwo to fya zhin oɓo n Kristi yen. Ntucenu fye zhin peceye n nyayi n Ifye zhin n nyayi n fye da.
Gama ato ɓei gye aza sun-sun n ɓa to gye aza sun-sun. Ama nha gye oza sun-sun Shekwoyi ɓei gye ho sun-sun esa n wo ɓei da ho wa cei.
Emi azaje ye-yeyi, mi gye kwo apma, nfye cige fye n gaiciya gailo, fyei zhin a Yesu-viyi nu, ama to fyei bma azaje zhin. Gaiciya-ga yi pya ɓa gni oza?
Ndei ho nugundo yilo n wo to n nyagyi yi lo na jekpeyin.
Ha gna wo ge, “To, lohonya Shekwoyi tu ho anabarka, ha bwa jekpe, ha gyi nyagyi n bugbai gmanyi,” To ha gawo ajekpe kwo nyagyin, mi gye kwo ampanyi?

Ntucenu fye gye, gaiciyaga to kunlo n kwo gmanyin, Tilas ha zhin bemana ha wu ge ho n gaiciya gailo. Gaiciya ga n kwo to wu kwohin n na tnu-tnu manayin, kwo to zhin gaiciya ga nun, kwo zhin gbeloyi nu, fi-fiyi njesun.

Ama zaho ɓa naɓo ge “Fye gna, zokwo n kwo lo Shekwoyi aba gaiciya ga nu gmanyi, to ma cige atnu-tnu n na pmailo n mwa, gama n tna atnu-tnu manayi, ho takpe kwo ho n gaiciya gai lo, kwo ho to n cei lon. Ama zaho-zahoi ɓakpe ge mi n gaiciya gai lo ngye shi mi zhin aɓo n wu.”
Aza lo n fyemi n ɓa ye n cei shilo ge gaiciya ga gmanyi nu kun lo? Gaiciya ga n Shekwoyi gmanyi, To, pa ge aljanu ga gaiciya lo nu ce, n kalayi, har ɓei vin n dnayi.
Azacije, fye ɓei tumwi n kniwyiyi nu ge, gaiciya ga to n na pmayi lo ntna aɓe zhin n Shekwoyi yen ma? Gaiciya ga n kwo ta wu kwohin n na tnu-tnu manayin kwo to zhin gaiciya ga nun.

Fye to ye palo ge kwo Ibrahim eyi dada aɓei yiwo oza manayi ntu n wa tnu-tnu manayi ɓo nu n wo ɓei zhin nyin, n wo ɓei ye wa zhin Shekwoyi ɓeye, har wa ga owo nugun Ishaku ɓigba gmanyi, wa fi tu n bagadi n?
Ho ku gye, wo ɓei kpema Shekwoyi, n mwa har woi cei pma wa zhin oɓo n Shekwoyi wa gna wo ge wo zhin, owo gaiciya ga ɓei nunuyi ntu n wo atnu-tnu manayi ɓo n wo ɓei zhin n Yi
Ntucenu kwo ɓei zhin shi Shekwoyi ɓeda da n ge Ibrahim ɓei kpema Shekwoyi. Dagayi wa yiwo oza manayi n Shekwoyi abye, har ayiwo nge, “Shekwoyi nugundo.”
Ntucenu ho ku gye, agni oza ntu n nya bo nu n wa zhin, n nyayi n wo ga gaiciya.
Rahab Karuwa zhin misali deye nya nu. Aɓei gniwo ntu nyaɓonu n wo ɓei zhinyi, oza n wo ɓei so atnutnuyi fi, wa tnu n ɓai n zokwo do gbo.
Shi nayi n kwo to n zafun yi n zhin fi-fiyi nu nyi, elonu gaiciya ga n kwo to n na atnu-tnu manayin, zhin fi-fiyi nu.

Omi azaje ye-yei, fye to gna ye, fya ze anya-wuyi num, gama yi zhin ya bwi aba nsayi mwa begye. Esa yi adini wuyi, n yi kpe ɓemanayi ye nyi, n ya zhin ɓenukwoyi eyi tata ɓei la du azaje nya. Nʼza mi wa wan wo nyitala, kwo wunu wo ɓa mi wa wan wo nayi shi vinya, n zokwo doho-dohoyi.
Yi ɓami ya pmi doko awye, shiyi ncei pma ntu na luzami ɓo n yi dna n kwo gbe nyi.
Eya busi nawyi kwo zhin kwa pmi eya awye lo, aba vinya n eyada n cei pma kwo lo, kwo esayi dnakala.
Nlonu nyitla zhin enya ɓiyinu, ama kwo wun anya ya n mwa, nakna ɓiyi zhin kwa kuci yakwo dnana.
Nyitala zhin ena gwo-gwoi nu. Kwo nunuyi n na anya nukwoyi, kwa du nayi vinya n mui, anapinu ku kwo ena n kwohin, kwa zeyi awye-wyeyi ena gwo-gwoyi bwi-bwi nya n wahalayi.
Aza ɓami ɓa kpa, kwo ɓa wu anyafanya n na luyi n na awyisala yi.
Ama zanyikwoci ho to lon n wo ɓa mi wa wu nyitalan, kwo n shiri yi zhin kwa da ɓeda kasa.
Nsahoi kwa ci eyi Dada n wo dna n ʼshe nyi, nsahoi kwa tu aza kni nna zhin ɓa dna n Shekwoyi dogbe nyi.
Nlonu ɓeda nukwoyi n anabarkayi ɓai kun ngbe gmanyi. Omi azaje ye-yei kwo to bmiya lo lonun.
Nuwan manayi n nuwan nukwoyi, zhin kwapi n obwo gmanyi?
Ho ɓa ka zaitun n gbayi shinwan? Awo, ho ta bwa nuwan manayi n snakpegye nuwan.
Ngye hoce-ceyi lo, zan-zan cewo n bmiya ntuge ɓe manayi zhin, n hohin tukwo-gbayi nu ɓa zhin akpe ge ho ce-cei lo.
Dna n zokwo doho-dohoi to gna ge ho cei-cei lon, ndei ho gyi minagyi lo, hoi woshe, hoi ye hohin tukwom, deye kwo zhin akata nu.
Gama shewo n hohin tukwoye yi, ɓa to zhin Shekwoyi ce-ce pya nun. Aɓeye pya zhin anyi nyanu n tna zafun, shetan nu ce aɓeye pya bwa.
Gama aba n Shewo nyi, n tukwoye yi, aɓa bwa ɓenukwoyi doho-dohoi n ɓo.

Ama wyemwa n kwo gmi n ʼshe, kwo gyi-gyi-yi, n nasuwayi, kwo ye bugba fu n ɓemanazhin yi, kwo ye n na aza tayi, kwo ga kwohin n na aza ba, kwo nunuyi n sun-sun-gyeyi, n na ɓemana-zhinyi, kwo n bugbayi gmanyi, n lo cewo n tna kata.
Aza n ɓa ga bugba-fu, ɓa ɓa bye nyabye bugbafu nya, ɓa do ɓemana.
A Kni donu ɓe fye n na anyawuyi n guyia? Aɓo pwawo n na shakpe nukwoyi nu n ɓa fi fyemi ɓai sunkun n fyei nyi?

Fye ye nya n fye to n cei lon, ntu cenu fyei wu aza ntuge fya bwa. Fyei wo anya she nʼza cei lo, to fyei bwan, ntuce fya Iya anya n guyi ntuge fya gwo ɓa kwo, Duk dalili n kwo zhin fyei to n nyayilo n fye ye nyin ntuge fye ta nya Shekwoyi ɓon.
Kwo n fya nya fye ta bwan, ntuge fye nya n na bugba nukwoyi nu, fye ye nya nu n kwo ɓa ga fye agmada n fye nayi.

Fye wu ngye nyikwoza nu nwo to gaiciya yi nwo ɓa aban, woi ye nwo ɓa anuwuyi. Fye ta kpe lo ge nfya gyi nugundo n anyi yi, kwo ɓa zhin fye fya ze Shekwoyi anubayi n? Ma gna fye ndei fye ye anyig-mada lo, fye ta mi fya zhin Shekwoyi anugundon sai owo anuwuyi.
Kwo fye gye ge litafi a gna ge na na, esa n kwa ci ncei ge Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi, n Shekwoyi wa dna wo n yi mi nyi, wo dna yi wye n Shewo manayiʼa?
Ama wo gayi kala ci-ci n na bai ya gyi nasara, n na ɓo pwawo nukwoyi yi, shi littafi a da, Shekwoyi ga za nu kala n wo gba wohin tukwo, ama wo gyi minagyi n ʼzayi n wo zhin aɓokwo, woi gma.
Ntucenu fye ga fyehin n Shekwoyi a kun ntna tukwo mwa.
Esa n ha ɓe viwyi n Shekwoyi, Shekwoyi ɓa wo viwyi n hoi. Fye la abwana nfye a laifi, fya fa Shekwoyi wa nu fye abugba, wa ze ɓa agyi-gyi-yi, agaiciya da n wo aba.
Fye ci bwi ntu na ɓonukwoyi ɓo n fye ku zhin, Fye wun bugba, fya wunwye, fye wun bugba to fya masan, maimakon a gmada, fye zhin bugba zhi-zhiyi.
Nnavun, n ha gye ho akalagba n Dagayi aba, wo ɓa la hotu, wa gaho kala, wa bma ho zhin.

Fye to ci aje wyegba, fya zan aje laifi zanshin, fya da aje ɓon, emi azaje. Nfya zhin lonu, fye sunkun n Shekwoyi wayi nu n kwo gna ge, fye ye n na jeyi nyi, fyei gna kwo to bmiya lon, ama, of ye tnu-tnu nu to fya kni, kwo owa ye bmiya lo kwo kwo to bmiya lon, ama fye vi kwo.
Oza n wa zhin owaye nyi wonu ɓa mi wa da owa n yi atasin. Owo nu ɓa mi wa kni kwo wa wuyi kwo wo gniyi. Ntu cenu kni ikoyi nu n ho cei lo ha da owa, kwo ha zan za laifi zanshin a?
Fye gye wye, ofye nfye cige, “Nna ye kwo n su yi ɓei lo ʼzhi deye, kwo ʼzhi dehi ya fi ɓo eye bwugyi, ya ze abwa ya gyi gyiba.”
Ho kpe ɓeye lo n kwo ɓei zhin n su? Gama oho wye-wyeyi kpamwa wu ngye bwigye nu, hagye kwo nsaiye esa fyewyi kwo la duya.
Nya n kwo kunce ha da okwonu nyi, “N Dagayi wa ye, yiɓa sase ya zhin deye kwo dehi.”
Nto lonu, fye mwa fyehin tukwo nu, tukwo-mwa ye pya ta da Shekwoyi n.
Fye pa ge, oza nwo kpe ɓemanayi ye to wa zhin kwon, kwo zhin laifi nu nwa ba.
Dnawye, ofye anyabwayi, esa nyi nfye ɓa cibwi fyei do mi, nbugbawun yi ntu n wahala ɓo n kwo ɓelo nfye abye nyi.
Ofye nyabwa nkubo ofye aje manayi anya ku gyi, ɓaku ze aje sakun.
Ofye zinariya n azurfayi ampanyi nla kniya, kwo zhin efye ɓenukwoyi saida. Kwa gyifye abu ngye na, Nyanu n fye ku sozhi fyehin, fya ɓei gwo n wada nyipyei n kwo ɓelo nyi.
Fye kna tnubua fya wo atnu-tnuyi bwici, nfye la ɓa gyifi to fyei gba ɓa nyin. Oɓa bwici kusi Dagayi azabegye nya atnubua.
Fye ku sun fi n na anyi, dna n anyida, fyei fu fyehin bugba, nsaiye efye abugba awye-wyeyi zhin ɓa pmi shazun nyipyeyi nu.
Fye ku aɓo manayi-zhin-yi zun kni, fyei ku aza wu n ɓa to n kalayi lo ɓa gni ɓahin n fye akun.
Nsaiye n fye aba omi azaje, nfye zhi fyei pmi Dagayi jezeɓe nyi, fye zhin hakuri, ngye shi fwai-za zhin wa pmi har mikegye wa do wo ofwa ampanyi nyi.
E, fye zhin hakuri, fya bwa bugba kala gama Dagayi la ga ɓe.
Fye to da gunnu-gunnu tu n na je tukwon, omi azaje, Ho du laifi akpeya lo nu? Gama gye, Owadayi dnagmayi ɓelo, wo la gaɓe, (Fye fa wa wan wyebwo doho-dohoyi n kwo kunce.)
Ntu hakuri ɓo dna n wahala, fye shi Dagayi anabi wye kwa ze fye ɓesisi.

Yi kpelo shi ɓa dagma lo n saiye, ntu ge ɓa bei la kpema wo nsahi yi, kwo dayake ɓa bei ku wahala sin n mwa. Ayuba zhin misalinu oza n wo ɓei kpema Dagayi dna n wo azhin-gye, dna n wo wahala, yi ku gye shi Dagayi shiri bei zofi n ɓemana, gama wo nu-nuyi n sun-sungye yi.
Ama dna aɓo vinya omi azaje, fye to si nyasi n ʼshe yi kwo anyin, bwaci ge e, kwo aʼa nnabai n ho ta zhin laifi a zun ho kni n.
Zaholo n fyemi woi sin wahala? Wo zhin aduwa ntuce, Aza n ɓa n ɓei lo n ɓa ɓa sa Shekwoyi ami ɓa gyi abye ɓai kwo anyi ga Dagayi, bai la Wo tu.
Nyasan san Zaho lo? Wo yi a ikklisiya atukwoda ɓa zhin aduwa gawo, ɓa shin wo emi, ɓai yi Dagayi wa kawo gna.
Oɓa aduwa nɓa zhin n gaiciya yli ga, ɓa ɓa kawo gna, gama Dagayi ɓa ka wo gna, ndei nyasan n kwo sanwo nyi laifi nu na bewo n kwoi, Dagayi ɓa zhin wo gafara.
Fye zhin aje gafara fyei zhin aduwa ga je, n na bai fya bwa lafiya Ɓefyece zhinyi aduwa ɓa zhin ikoyi mwa, kwa ɓe n amsa manayi.
Iliya ɓei zhin oza nu n gye yi, ama wa mi wa zhin aduwa nge ogma to zhin, to kwa zhin har eye ngun ata n na pyai kpe ngun tnanyi.
N navun wa je aduwa zhin ge ogma kwo zhi, agbe-gbe ɓa je ya pa, anya ya pa njesun n na fwa.
Omi azaje, ndei zaho la bma n Shekwoyi zokwo to woi ye kpema Dagayin, oza ho wa bma wo zhin wa gye Gaiciya.
Ozahi n wa jezeɓe n woi n Shekwoyi aba nyi, wo la wyewyeyi bwi-bwiyi gni n efi, kwoi ɓe n owo a laifi gafara zhin yi n mwa.
Wasika yi gmi n Bitrus akun, Yesu Kristi tnu-tnuyi, Kwoi lo a Yahudiyi a Yesu viyi aba n na nya ɓa ya n Urushelima, ɓai gnami fi laɓa n Buntus, Galatiya, Kapadokiya, Asiya, n Bitniya yi nyi.

Oma nugundo, Shekwoyi Dada ɓei kni fye tunyi n sapa, Wa ku pma kpe ge fye ɓa ze owo aɓi, Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi lo tnu-tnu lo n fya bugba mi woi zhan fye ya n Yesu Kristi ami yi, woi zhin fye fyei zhin oɓo kwo dawo, alheri n bugba-fuyi ɓa la lakpe nfya ba.

Mwa-mwa vinya Shekwoyi nya nu n Dadayi, eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi nya, ntuge owo sun-sungye tnazoyi nu na gayi esa a shan yi ma. Nsaiye yi sase n na awyetu wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya yi, ntuge Kristi ɓei la laka n efi.
Shekwoyi n cauta dnagmayi so shi owo aɓi lo n ʼshe; kwo gyi-gyi-yi lo, kwoi ta shando aigna kwo bom kwoi ta shan zom.

Shekwoyi, dna n wo iko yakwo, wo ɓa shi fye bwa fya si ɓo n lafiyai n nabai fya bwa fya si ɓo n lafiyai n nabai fya bwa kwo, ntuge fye kpema wo lo. Kwo ɓei ze ofye nya dna n nyipyei kmaknayi n kwo ɓelo nyi zaho-zahoi wo gye.
Ntu cenu a da fye n mwa, a gmada yakwo lo n fya bye, kwoda shike ezan dna ɓo lo n saiye kpa ntu mu-mugye ɓo nɓa ɓe fya ba nyi.

A wahala ye ɓe da fye ntuge, a mwi fye gaiciya ga gye nu, agye kwo kwo n kalayi lo, n gyi-gyi-yi, a mwi kwo gye shi ena zhin kwo mwi zinariya gye nyi kwa zhan kwo ya, ofye gaiciya ga du zinariya lo n latu n Shekwoyi aba, ntu cenu n fye gaiciya ga migni n kalayi n kwo mutu, avun, dna n wahala abednai, kwo ɓa ɓe fye n ci-ci yi, n mwa-mwayi, n latuyi ewyi n Yesu Kristi ɓei jezeɓe nyi.
Fye yewo lo, kwo da yake fye to shin wo gyen. Fye ta gye wo lon, ama fye kpma wo lo, kwo nsaiye a da fye lo n na gmadayi n na ta shin kwo ɓedan,
Efye lada n na bye deye ntu fye gaiciya ga ɓo, okwonu zhin efya wye-wyeyi gni-gni.
Gni-gni ye zhin enya nu n na anabi to ɓei n kwo awyega yin, kwo da yake ɓa ɓei ku ka nkwo tukwo, ɓa ɓei n na ɓenya-nyai mwa n kwo awyega tukwo.
Ɓa ɓei ye ɓa kpe esa ye n ʼza yi n Kristi Zafun, nkwo ɓei dna ɓami nyi, ɓai daɓo tu n ɓa tukwo, esa wo ɓei gna ɓa ge ɓaka nya tu n Kristi azhingye tukwo n latu yi nkwo ɓa vi azhingye yi nyi.

Aku gna ɓa ge aɓeye ta zhin n ɓa wye-wyeyi sa nun, ama nna aye begye avun nu. Nsaiye aku Nabari Manayi ye wuyi pei-pei, Aɓei zhinyi kwo waʼazi dna n iko Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi nya n wo gmi n ʼshe, n wo ɓei da ɓo n ɓai nyi kwo zhin oɓo wo-woyi nu, oɓo agmada nya njesun, ntuge har amalaika ma ɓa cei pma lo ɓa kpe ɓeye awyega.
Ntucenu fye ku fyehin wan shi, fya pmi n na wye tuyi tu n Shekwoyi alheri nkwo ɓe fya ba lo, esa n Yesu Kristi ɓa jezeɓe cei nyi.
Fye vi Shekwoyi ɓo, ntu ge fye zhin owo aɓi nu, fye to jezelo fya zokwo kwokwoyi ɓenukwoyi zhin nyam, ntuge fye to ɓei zhin fyei kpe ɓemanai ye num.
Ama fye ku ze agyi-gyiyi n ɓeho-ɓehoi nfye zhin, ngye shi Dagayi zhin gyi-gyi-yi nu n wa yi fye nyi.
A cei kafi lo n Littafi ge, “Fye ku ze a gyi-gyi-yi, ntuge Mi gyi-gyi-yi lo.”

Fye pa ge, ofye Dada nfye zhin aduwa ga wo dna n ʼshe nyi, wo ta kni za kni-kni, esa n wa da owa cei n. Wo ɓei daho wa cewo n tna gyifi tu n nyaho-nyahoi tukwo n ha zhin, ntucenu zhin ɓeho-ɓehoi n wo dna woi ɓe kafin ho si eshe.
Shekwoyi ɓei gba efye shan-shan agyiwye ntuge wa gni fye n zokwo n kwo to ɓei ɓa lo fyei n ʼshen n fye azakwoi ɓei wan nyi, tagba n wo ɓei gbani zinarya nu ton kwo azurfa shi fye shin fye nya kpelo.
Ama wo ɓei gba n Kristi ami gyi-gyiyi nu, Shekwoyi kugya n tna laifi n tna ecigusa.
Shekwoyi ɓei kni wo tunyi n sapa to ai zhin anyin, ama n na anyipyei kmaknayi ye kwa ze anabarka n fya ba.
Ntu cenu efye gaiciya ga nyi n Shekwoyi nu n wo ɓei la Kristi kala n efi, wa gawo mwa-mwa n jesun nyi. Nsaiye efye gaiciya ga n na wyetui ɓa bwa kpema n wo nu gmanyi.
Nsaiye fye ɓa mi fya ye n na zai n tuge ala fya bugba zhan ya n tukwo ye yi, n nuwun yi, esa n fye ɓei kpema Kristi wa gni fye nyi, ntucenu fye ku kpe lalei ge fye ku yelo n jei, n bugbai gmanyi.

Ntuge fye n wye-wyeyi woi-woyi lo, fye to ɓei bwakwo n fya zakwoyi nun, ntuge wye-wyeyi n ɓa ɓei ga fye nyi kwo ɓa zo, woi-woyi deye ta shan zon, ntuge kwo gmi n Kristi nu - Shekwoyi Ɓeda wye-wyeyi n na za aba.
E, eya wye-wyeyi anyinya ɓa zo, she a gbe-gbe zhin ɓa bmi ɓa wo akawu nyi. Zanyikwoci latu bwa wu ngye ama-mawyi nu n ɓa bwa ɓa kaya nyi.
Ama Shekwoyi ɓeda ɓa gni-gni har nyalo-nyalo. Owo ɓeda ye nu zhin Nabari Manayi n na ɓei zhin fye kwo waʼazi nyi.
Ntu cenu fye la nuwun gmiya n bugba. Fye to zhin aɓo n gye fye zhin aza manayi n munaficiyi gwo dna n mim, Fye ku tna-gaiciya ya, n eshei, n na za ɓedai n ɓa vun.

Nsaiye shi fye kpelo shi Dagayi ye fye nsunyi, fye ku ɓenukwoyi ya vinya, kwocedna, eshe, n na katai. Fye zhin atna fya mwa fi n fye gnigni, fyei zan madara zafun nya shi n bwi-ci yi, she oɓi zhin wa cibwi woi zan ɓeɓe shin nyi.
Fye ɓe Kristi aba, owo nu zhin Nyakun shishiyi Apma nya n Shekwoyi mi nya tu nyi. Koda shike aza la wo ciwyegba wo na pmailo n latui njesun n Shekwoyi aba n wa kni wo tu naza she nyi.
Nsaiye fye ku ze akuta awyewyeyi, Shekwoyi wa zhin apma cei wa mi nyakun, kniyi du lo ɓoʼa? Fye ɓe Wa ba, (ofye n fye ku zhin anya go-go yi nwa ba ntu Yesu Kristi ɓo nyi,) fya ga wo anya n ɓa dawo.
Shi littafi ada, “Shawye, mi tnu n Kristi yi wa ze kuta kni-kniyi nyakun-bwakonu nya omi ikklisiya nya, mi ta dna aza vinyikwo n ɓa kpema won.”

E, wo n latu yi lo n fya ba n fye ku gaiciya ga nyi, n na zaba n ɓa la wa ɓo na nyi, To, “Kuta ho n na a nyakunmiyi la kwa ɓo nanyi, kwo la ze kuta nyakun-bwakonu nya nkwo du n mwa-mwa n na pmai dna nyakun mi nyi.”

Littafi a je ci ge, “Wo zhin kuta bonyi-ce nya nu n na zaho aba. Apma n kwo ɓei zhin ɓa miya.” Ɓa ɓei kni a bonyi ntuge ɓata ye ɓa wo Shekwoyi Ɓeda, kwo ɓa vi wo ɓeyem, ntu cenu tata ye mimiya nya, ɓei vi ɓa.

Ama fye to wulo lonun, ntuge Shekwoyi la fye kni n wohin yi, fye zhin Esu a pirist nu, fye gyi-gyiyi lo n bmiya, fye zhin Shekwoyi anyanu, aɓeye vinya ntu ge fya wu aza shi Shekwoyi wa yi fye n wyegmaa mi woi lo fye fi n wo buzangna ɓewowoyi nya.
Nsapai fye to ɓei zhin nyaho nun, nsaiye fye zhin Shekwoyi anya nu, nsapai fye to ɓei kpe Shekwoyi alheri ye n mwan, nsaiye okwo nu la fya wye-wyeyi shando.
Oma zaje, fye zhin azhiɓeyi nu ya. Shikwonyi ofya yi hin-hin lo n ʼshe mi nu, mi gyi fye wye fya bui anyi dada nukwoyi ye nya si, ɓa to zhin ofye nun, ntuge ɓa sunkun n ʼfya wye-wyeyi.

Fye zhin peceiye shi fye sase n fya knuzhiyi n ɓa zhin atnaviyi nyi, ntuge ɓa gye fye ngye aɓo nukwoyi zhin yi, shi ɓa gye fye ɓemana ɓa ɓei ci Shekwoyi ntu fya tnu-tnu manayi ɓo esa n Kristi ɓa jezeɓe cei.
Ntu Dagayi ɓo, fye vi gwannati doka doho-dohoyi ɓo kwo esu anya nu ngye ekni tukwoda.
N esu abmazhinyi yi, ntuge wa tnu n ɓai ɓata abenukwoi zhinyi yi nu, ɓa ci aza n ɓa zhi ɓemanai ce.
Shekwoyi nufi nu efya sese manayi ɓa kun aza gbe n ɓa ci Nabari Manayi aɓenya to ɓai kpe oɓoye n kwo ɓa mi kwa zhin ɓa nyim, ntuge ɓa to shin kwo iko towom.
Fye ku pwo owa, ama kwo to wu nu ge fye zhin ɓenukwoyim, fye sase n gye aza nɓa ku pwo, ɓa zhin Shekwoyi ɓeye nu gmanyi n saho-sahoi yi.
Ga zaho-zahoi mwa-mwa, Ye n na Yesu-viyi yi nbwaho-bwahoi vinya, wo Shekwoyi dna, ha ga gwamnati mwa-mwa.
Afyenu, fye ga fya dagayi mwamwa fya zhin oɓo ɓa gna fye vinya to ge sai ɓai nsunsun gyei nu kwo ye-yem, ama kwo ɓai zhin aza nukwoyi nu.
Fye zhin Shekwoyi godiya n na ga fye wahala ntu ɓemanai zhin ɓo.
Gaiciya, gyiba to lon, n na ga fye wahala ntu ɓe nukwoyi zhin ɓom, ama n fya zhin ɓemanayi fya sin wahala ntu ce har fya zhin hakuri dna n na zhin-hi mi, kwo zhin kwa da Shekwoyi n mwa.
Wahala ye pya dna lo n tnu-tnu mi n Shekwoyi wa ga fye. Kristi nwo ɓei sin wahala n fye ɓo nyi, wonu zhin fye e-fye, fye vi wa pita ʼbwi.
Wo to ɓei zhin laifim, to wa ca katam.
A kni wo akmi, to wa gba akmi tam, esa na ɓei gawo wahala wo to ɓei kun akalam, ama wa wohin fa dna n Shekwoyi akun n wo da owa ntna awyekwo nyi.
Wonu ɓei la eyi alaifi kaya n wohin nayi, esa n wo ɓei fi tu n zundu nyi, n na bai ya ze afifiyi n laifi aba, ya se ase gyi-gyi-yi nsayi. Ntuge ntu wo aci ɓonu yi-i bwa kagna.
Ngye akni fye ɓei ku bwi Shekwoyi zokwo, ama nsaiye fye la jezeɓe da fye ʼkniknayi ofye awye-wyeyi guyi n wo gu fye n nanya kasayi nyi.
Anyikwoza, fye vi fyaɓa ɓo, n nabai kwo to ɓai kna tnubua n Dagayi ɓeda nfye gnaɓa nyin, ɓa ye abui ntu fye ɓovi ɓo n hali manayi. Ofye hali manai ɓa gna ɓeda nɓai afa ɓeda n ʼgbeyi.
Fye to gye fya huwan n bmiya-bmiya yi n kwo ɓe ntu nyigun zhin; ɓo, n na kaya nabmiyai anyi nya yin ko aje manayi, kwo tukwokni manayin.
Ama fye ku bmiya n mi nfye abugba mi, n bmiya-bmiya yi n kwo mwasa dna n zafun, konu zhin nya manayi n Shekwoyi abye.
Ntuge anyikwoza agyi-gyiyi sapa-nya, nɓa ɓei na wyetu yi n Shekwoyi aba nyi, ɓei zhin ɓahin nyigun lainu–ɓa ku ze oɓa ʼɓa ɓeda-viyi.

Fye la dogbe n Saratu yi. Wo ɓei vi wo ɓa Ibrahim ɓo, wo gawo mwa-mwa ntuge wonu ɓei zhin puwa tukwoda, har woi yiwo ge, “Omi dagayi.” Fye vi owo fye, fya zhin oɓo manai ngye wo, ntuge efyenu zhin wa nyigun n saiye; oɓo edna nya ta shan shi nfya byem (ko misali ge fye ɓa wun ofyaɓa bugba yam.)

Ofye aɓa, fye zhin peceiye nfye anyikwoyi fye zhin nubo n ɓa bukatayi, fyei gaɓa mwa-mwa ngye aza nɓa to n kalayin, pa ge oho nho nyikwoyi, fye kun Shekwoyi anabarka gwonu, ntu cenu, n ho to zhin wo shikwo kuncen, ata wo fye aduwam.
Nsaiye ɓeda ye kwo ɓe fye abanu vinya. Fyeku ze ngye puwa yakwo ɓai dagma, fyei gye aje sun-sun fyei ye najei n bugba manayi n tukwo-gba yi.
Fye to gba ɓenukwoi ta n ɓenukwoyi yin. To gba aza ta n ɓa da ɓeda nukwoi tu n fye tukwon. Ama zhin aduwa Shekwoyi wa bmaɓa zhin, ntuge kwo bmiya ya zhin aza alheri, Shekwoyi ɓa tuyi anabarka ntu ce.
Nho cei pma ha bwa agmada, ha gye anyipyei manai jesun, to laho nyitala wanshi, ha gu ho gbe n na katace.
La bui ɓenukwoi si ha zhin ɓemanai. Zan bugbafu shin kwo hoi ɓa nyakwo na sipitai nu, ha vi ko dei-dei.
Ntuge Dagayi shiwo aɓi awyelo, woi wo oɓa aduwa njesun. Ama Dagayi awyeba gyi minagyi nnaza yi n ɓa zhin ɓenukwoyi.
Nshinsun-sun zaho tolo n wo ɓa zhin fye ɓenukwoyi n tu ge fye zhin ɓemanayim.
Ama kwo kola ze ge fye ɓa sin wahala ntu befyece zhin ɓo, anabarkada nu fyei. Fye to wo ɓa dnam, to efya bugba kukalam.
La Kristi shi nho bugba mi n gyi-gyi-yi ngye Dagayi. N zaha nyaɓo nko zhin hoi kpema wo lonu, ha gni n shiri yi zhin n saho-sahoi yi ha gna wo dna na tna n mwa-mwa gai ɓe.
Fye zhin oɓo kwo bmiya, n naza daɓo tu fye tukwo, ɓai yi fye n naye nukwoi yi she fye vi Yesu, vinyikwo a woɓa ntu ɓa ɓeda nukwoi ɓo.
Pa, n Shekwoyi cei pma fya sin wahala, kwo gna bmiya oza sin wahala ntu ɓemanai zhin ɓo, afa wahala sin ntu ɓenukwoi zhin ɓo.

Kristi ɓei ku wahala sin, wo ɓei fi bwa zungmanyi ntu eyi vinya alaifi ɓo. Koda-yake owo wohin tukwo wo to ɓei n laifiyi kwo gmanyi n, nnabai wa ɓe yi n Shekwoyi aba n tna Benukwoi. Koda-yake owo nayi ɓolafi, owo zafun ye n wye-wyeyi lo.
Dna n zafun ye nu n wo ɓei lo a zafun aba nɓa fi n kurkuku, wa zhin ɓa waʼazi —

a zafun aza nya nu tunyi dna n Nuhu anyipyei, n ɓa to ɓei wo Shekwoyi nyin ko da yake wo ɓela pmi ɓa dna bugbabwa esa n Nuhu ɓei ji eya nyi. Ama aza ngun nyimwa-nyimwa nu ɓei bwa pwo, to ɓa bwi nuwan yakwo yim.

(Nlonu batisma zhin dogbe, dna n batisma, yi wu ge alayi gni n efi n bwi-bwi yi dna n Kristi kalala n vingwo; to ntuge ala nayi cegye shinya n, ama ntuge dna n batisma zhin, yi pmi awye wu Shekwoyi nu, yi ɓa wo wa zhan ya bugba ya n laifi.)
Nsaiye Kristi dnalo n ʼshe, n sase tu n mwa, mwa aba n Shekwoyi bwai-zhe-bwa, amalaika, n na iko yi n ʼshe mi ɓa yazhi lo n wa bye ɓai vi wo ɓeda.
Shikonyi Kristi ɓei ku wahala sin wa dna n na zhin gye, fye ku wo bugba pya fi, fya ku zhi n shiriyi fya sin wahala ce. Ntuge fye pa ge, esa n nayi kwa sin wahala laifi kala kwa gba.
Fye ta shan asese fyei vi aɓepwawo nayi nyam, ama aɓa wo fye pwa ngye fye zhin Shekwoyi ɓeye nu.

Aɓo anukwoyi ye ku fye kun, n fye ɓei zhin fyei zhin n sapa, n na a tna Shekwoyi yekpei zhin ɓa dagma fi n ɓa nyi, ajesin ajeshin, shakpe, jesin, awye-fan kasa ngye a nyacei shangba, n na ɓenukwoi aje yi.
Ai ceɓa wo of ye nugundo kwokwoi, shi fye to ye-yelo fya zhin aɓo nukwoi n gnisun ɓai, shi fye ɓei zhin fyei shin zhin nyim, ntucenu, ɓa ɓa mafye san ɓai kpe fya gye.
Ama fye pa ge tilas ɓa zhi n Wadayi vinya abye, awye-wyeyi da n na zafi yi, aɓei taɓa ngye shi ɓa sase wu.
Ntucenu a zhin azafi Nabari Manayi waʼazi n nuwan ɓei wan ɓa nyi, ntuge koda-yake aɓei taɓa nayi n efiyi ɓa mi ɓa sase fi nɓa azafun ngye Shekwoyi.
Anyi zo ɓelo esa fyewyi, ntucenu fye lace, fya zhin aduwa nubo cici.
Nya kwo du vinya, fye gyi abye fyei wu aje ye-ye dnagmai ntuge yeye zhin kwa pui alaifi nya mwa begye.
Fye ye n najei, fyei gaza nyagyi n na gyewanba yi, nɓa filo n ʼsan ntna awyice.
Shekwoyi la aɓozhin-zhinyi ga zaho-zahoi n, fyemi, fye zhin apma ɓai, ntu naza bmazhin ɓo, fye ce Shekwoyi anabarka ga azaje nwo ga fye nyi.

Ala ho yi ha zhin waʼazi? To zhin waʼazi ngye Shekwoyi nu daɓo nho ʼgbe yi. Ayiho ha bma aza zhin nu? Zhin kwo n kalayi vinya n Shekwoyi wa gaho, n nabai a la Shekwoyi tu dna n Yesu Kristi, mwa-mwa n ikoyi owo nya nu har nyalonyalo. Amin.
Oma nugundo, ceto wofye fye ya sin wahala napyei n na bye deyen, ntuge oɓo woyi honu toye kwa bwa fyen.
Ama ada fye dada nu ntuge awahalaye ɓa ze fye gmanyi n Kristi yi dna n wo wahala, n na vun fye ɓei bwa agmada yakwo dna nwo latu n kwo ɓelo nyi.
Fye dagma n na kni fye akmi ai tu fye ʼkni she fye vi Yesu, ntuge n kwa bwa fye lonu Shekwoyi Zafun ɓa ɓe fye aba n mwa-mwa yakwoyi.
Fye to ye mawo fye wahala sin ɓo ntuge fya wu oza kwo fya wyi ʼvim, kwo ɓenukwoi zhin, kwo ge fye laɓa fyei fi azaɓo abwam.
Ama kwo to zhin vinyiko ɓonu oza sin wahala she wo vi Yesun, ci Shekwoyi she ho zhin Yesu nya nu, har ai yi ho n wo ʼye latu nya yi.
Ntuge esalasi wada nya, tilas kwa ya n Shekwoyi aɓiyi nu. Tunda aɓa da a Yesu viyi owa, aza n ɓa to ga Dagayi gaiciya nyi ma, a ɓei ka zozo nɓai wuna?
N na a-ɓe-fyece-zhin-yi a pwo deca, atna Shekwoyi-viyi nna ɓenukwoyi zhin yi ma, aɓei papa agye ɓa da ma?
Ntuce nu fye sin wahal a ntu Shekwoyi ɓeye zhin ɓo, gyi abye n ɓe-manai-zhin-yi, fya kpema Shekwoyi n wa zhin fye nyi, ntuge wota yafyen.

Nsaiye ofye a eklisiya tukwoda, omi n mihin mi zhin tukwoda nu, n ma wyei mʼɓei ku gye Kristi woi fi tu n zundu, n mihin mʼɓei bwa wo mwa-mwa, n wo latu yi esa n wa jeze ɓe cei, Oma tukwodaje, emi wyegyi nfya ba ge:
Fye ga Shekwoyi akni nyagyi, fyei shi ɓa bwa n bugbai gmanyi ntna wyice, to tu enya ɓo nfye ɓa bwa dna ko mim, ama ntuge awo fye pwa lo fya zhin Dagayi tnu-tnu.
Fye toku ze abegyi yin, ama fye ku ze e-fye n nakni ɓa mi ɓa vi.
Esa n Kniknayi tukwoda ɓei jeze ɓe fye ɓei gwo lowonyi nkwo bmiya-bmiya ta shando nyin.
Ofye aɓi kasa, fye vi aza ɓeda n ɓa gyilo nfya bye. Ofye vinya fye zhin aje bauta dna tukwo gba, ntuge Shekwoyi tu aza anabarka nɓa gba ɓahin tukwo, ama wo zhin gaba n nazai n ɓa mwa ɓahin tukwo.
Nfya gba fyehin tukwo fi n Shekwoyi ikoda akun, wo ɓa ku fye wu n sayi nkwo wu dei-dei.
Fye ku efya ɓesasa yakpe Wo vinya, ntuge wo pa fye ɓelo woi dna fye wye cici.
Fye zhin peceiye fya ku zhigu, ntuge shetan, ofye nuwun-yi yakwo, wo zan laɓa ngye gaba mikunyi nu woi boh, woi ye oza n wo ɓa wan wa saya.
Lami-gni esa n wo aɓeda ho, lakpe ma Dagayi, ha pa ge a Yesu viyi-aje n na nyiye vinya ce, sin wahala lo n ho sin nyi.

Esa n fya ku wahala sin esa fyewyi, eyi Shekwoyi, n wo nu-nuyi n sun-sun gyei dna n Kristi nyi, wo ɓa ga fye mwa-mwa nyalo-nyalo nya. Owo n wohin tukwo wo ɓaɓe wo ku fye, wa mi fye zhi, wa ze fye akala-da ndu sapa.
Iko zhin wonya nu har nyalo-nyalo. Amin.

Mi ka fye wasikaye n Sivanus bmazhin yinu, n mi wyegye, wo zhin eyi zado gbenu-yi nu. Mi nna wyetu yi lo mi la bugba kala ga fye dna n wasikaye, ntuge mika seida gaiciya nya ga shi Shekwoyi tu anabarka wu. Nya ma gna fye dna ya nyi kwo kunce lo kwa bma fye zhin fya mi zhin dna wo ye-ye.
Ikklisiya n kolo ya dna n Roma – kwo zhin fye mapuinu dna n Dagayi, - kwo tnu fye lo n kwo gnaɓiyi, n Markus yi ɓe emi nugun.
Fye dna aje bwa-do n na a Yesu viyi ye-ye yi. Bugba fu kwo kun-sun nfyei n fye zhin Kristi nya nyi.
Wasika nkwo gmi n Siman Bitrus aba, Yesu Kristi fyenu n tnu-tnuyi. Kwoi lo aza ba vinya n ɓa ku gaiciya ga latu nya bwa eyi-nya pya nyi, dna n ɓefyece eyi Shekwoyi, n eyi Gniyi Yesu Kristi nya yi.
Fye ye Shekwoyi alheri lo woye ga fye lo abye? To, fye tumwi fya kpe woye lo abye-abye.
Ntuge n fye kpewoye labye, wo ɓa ga fye, dna nwo iko yakwo, anya vinya n fye ɓa pmai, ntu na sase manai ɓo: har wo zhin wa gayi owo latu n ɓemanai yi.
Dna wo iko yakwo, woku anyabwaje gayi n anabarka manai yi nwa zhin yi alkawali nyi. Wato woku alkawali zhin ge woɓa gniyiya n shakpe, n cegyeyi nkwo sheyigun ɓa nyi, wa pmi wa gayi owo ɓefyece.

Ama kafin fye gwo anabarka ye, fye n na pmailo n nyai n kwo du gaiciya ga, tilas fya zhin atna fya ze aza manayi; har ma kwo to zotu lo ɓon, ntuge fye na pmailo fya kpe Shekwoyi ye lo abye-abye, fya kpe enya ye n wo cei pma fya zhin.
Nnavun fye tumwi fya ga ofye ɓopwawo nnabai fya ze amizhiyi nna Shekwoyi zokwo viyi yi, fyei fa Shekwoyi wa wu fye zokwo dna na gmada.
Deye nu ɓa zhin fya wo azaje agmada, fya yeɓa ce har n shince n ʼkni yj.
Nfya gyabye lonu, fye ɓa gna kala bwa-bwa dna zafun har fya ze aza apmada n yi Dagayi Yesu Kristi aba.
Ama oza nwo to vi aɓeye n gaiciya ga avun, wo zhin wyebuai nu, kwo wo ta gye wyeba cewon, woi la zamwi ge wa bwa kala wa sase manai ga Dagayi.
Ntucenu, oma zaje, fye zhin tnu-tnu fya fyehin yi, fya wu ge fye filo n naza n Shekwoyi wa yi, woi kni. Nlonu fye ta ce bwonyin, kwo fya miyan.
Shekwoyi ɓa gu fye eshe abwokun-mi ya bmam, ntuge fya lo owo ebemi nyalo-nyalo nya eyi Dagayi nya, n ʼyi gniyi yi, Yesu Kristi.
Miye ma ce fye ɓepa cici n na ɓeye tukwo, kwo shikwo nyi fye kpeɓa yelo, fyei viɓa lo cewo.
Ama Dagayi Yesu Kristi ku wumi ge ema nyipyei n na nyiye, ɓaku ga nu, miɓa fi esa fyewyi sa n mi ye wye-wyeyi lo kpa, miɓa tnu fye na ɓepayei cici,
nna wyetui ge ɓa lo fye mi dei-dei n nabai fye-e paɓa ɓo mi yi la-laka n nanyi.
Ntuge yi to ɓei zhin yi ta fye aza cece osi nun, esa yi ɓei wufye iko eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi nya nwo jeze-ɓei nyin. Oma wye ku gye owo mwamwa n wo latu yi.

Mʼɓei tu n epe Gyi-gyi-yi sanu wo ɓei bmiyana n mwa n Shekwoyi owo Dada ɓei gawo nyi. Mʼɓei ku wo, begye yakwo, ikoda, latu nya, kwoi gmi n ʼshe kwoi ci ge, “omi Nugun ye-yei nu nyi. Owo ɓo dami n mwa.”

Ntu cenu yiku gye yi-i ku kpe ge oɓo na anabi ɓei danyi kwo laze gaiciya. Kwo ɓa bma fye zhin, fya ku bugba ga enya ɓa ɓei kanyi, ntuge she buzangna zhin kwa bmiyana fi n na wyegma ba nyi, oɓa ɓeda bmayi zhin yi kpe aɓo ye n ɓa ɓei ɓa dna yi wyegma n dnaɓo. Ama esa nfya dna gaiciya manai a anabi nya wye, buzangna bmiya fi n fya bugba n sayi Kristi-Kpasu Labmi nya-wa bmiya fi fye n fya bugba mi.

Ama fye ku kpe ge a anabi ɓeda doho-dohoi to lo n kwo kadna n litafi n ɓa ɓei zhin ko nubo nɓahin tukwo yim. Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi nu ɓei dna n na ɓefyecei-ye mi, woi ga ɓa nabari gaiciya nya n kwo gmi n Shekwoyi aba.

Ama a anabi akatai ɓei nyi nna nyipyei avun nyace, ngye shi amalami akatai ɓa kun nfye mi nyi. Ɓa ɓei ce akata nʼgbai tu n Shekwoyi tukwo, ɓai pmi avun wu ɓa Dagayi nwo ɓei si ɓa nyi; ama wahala bwi-bwi nya ɓelo tu nɓa jtukwo npye-pyei.
Aza n mwa begye ɓei vi oɓa kata, nge anagbai zhin to zhin ɓenukwoi nun. Ntu ɓa ɓo, aɓei kpe Kristi n wo zokwoi agye.
Amalami ye, ntu ɓa shakpe ɓo, ɓa ɓei gna fye ɓeho-ɓehoi ntuge ɓa bwa fye agyiwye. Ama Shekwoyi ɓei laɓa zunkni tunyi n sapa, oɓa bwi-bwi tulo n zokwo.
Gama Shekwoyi to ɓei fa amalaika n ɓa ɓei zhin laifi nyin, ama wa sheɓa yafi n anapi, nfi agma fifiyi fi nabmi awyegmanya ɓa pmi wadawyi.
To wa fa aza a sapa yim akpe Nuhu, oza n wo ɓei daɓo ga Shekwoyi, n wo puwayi aza ngun tnaba, ama Shekwoyi wa wu anyi vinya n nuwan yakwo yi.
Nnavun wa ze Sodom n Gomora azhiyi otnu, wa wun ɓaya nanyi wyeba, wa zeɓa mutu nya na tna?-?Shekwoyi viyi aba n nabye, ɓa pa ɓa wodna.
Ama dna n esa gmanyi Dagayi wa gni Lutu, n Sodom ntuge wo ɓei zhin oza manayi nu, aɓo nukwoi n wo ɓei zhin woi gye laɓa fyegyi-fyegyi nyi, ɓa ɓo zhin ɓai san wo nya.
Ntu cenu, Dagayi ɓami wa gni yi n na jaraba n ɓa shegun yi laɓa nyi, wa gyi abye n na aɓo nukwoi tayi har owa da nyipyei-a ɓe.
Wo gna minagyi gyi n na zai n ɓa vi ɓa aɓo nukwoi, aɓo pwawo shakpenya, n na zai n ɓa mwa ɓahin ttukwo, ɓai kpe Shekwoyi aza agye ntna edna.
Koda-yake amalaika n ɓa zhi n Dagayi abye nyi, ɓa iko yi lo n kala yi ndu a malami a katai ye, ɓata da ɓa ɓenukwoyi n Shekwoyi abam.

Ama a malami a katai ye zhin aza mama nu, ɓa wu gmanyi-gmanyi n na nyakpai nu, ɓai zhin aɓo ɓa cei pma; ngye anyakpa nna maɓa a wan ai wu nyi. Ɓa zhin ɓa ma iko wyegma nya esan nɓa ta kpe kwo yem; ai aɓa duɓa ɓoya ɓedo na aljanu yi viyan n iko anapi nyai ɓe.

Lada nyi n na malami ye ɓei gwo ntu ɓa laifi ɓo. Ntuge ɓa sase fi nanyi da nukwoi fyegyi-fyegyi, ɓa zhin a vinyikwo nya nu n na aci gusai n fyaba, ɓa dna fye kwoce, ɓai sasefi n na laifi nukwoi n sahoi, har ɓai lofi nfya gmada ye-ye nya ngyeɓa zhin aza manayi.
Nyikwoza to lo n ɓa ta shi wo ashakpe wyem, anagbai zhin yi ta kun ɓam, ɓai dna aza kwoce n ɓa to mizhi m, ɓai tu ɓahin mwi ɓa ze ashakpewoyi, aɓi bwi-bwi-yi nu aknituyi.
Ɓaku bwi zokwo ɓaku ze ngye Balamu Basura nugun, nwo ɓei kayadna n ye-ye n na gyiwyei, n wo ɓei ye wa bwa dna n ɓenukwoi zhin nyi.
Ama aɓo la wo kun ntu wo laifi ɓo, esa nu zhagawyi ɓei daɓo n woi n zanyi-kwoci begye yi, kwa kma anabi ɓenukwoyi-zhin.
Aza deye pya to na pma yin ngye adnabminu nɓaku wo, nwu gye a ɓa bwa nyaho-manai nɓa, ama awo, ɓato mizhim ngye ogma gyesa, n ese ku kwo ya nyi. Aku ɓa zunkni lo cei ʼbwo tna ceyi wyegmaanya.
Ɓai gma n ɓa laifi yi n gbegyi yi, ɓai zhin apma n nayi shakpe yi, ɓai je aza gnifi n ɓenukwoi zhin n sato mwa shi ɓa pwo cem.

Ɓai ci ge, “Ata gnifye ntu ɓemanai zhin ɓo nun, ntu cenu fye ɓa mi fya zhin ɓenukwoi ɓedo, fye zhin ɓo kwo dafye, fye la bugba leya.” Ama a malamiye n ɓa ga fye loloya n owa nyi, n ɓahin tukwo ɓa pa-pai lo n zhin alaifi fyenu, n bwibwi. Ntuge oza zhin enya fyenu nu nkwo woi wan shi.
Esanu oza la pwo n aɓenukwoyi anyi nya zokwo, ntu yi Dagayi n Gniyi yi Yesu Kristi yekpe ɓo, wa je lodna n laifi wa ze kwo fyenu njesun, wo zhin wa gna sapa wunya.
Kwo ɓei ɓa gna bmiya ngye to wo ye kpe Kristi zokwo yem, afa odo n wo ku kpeye, wa pmi avun wu owa wyidna gyigyi-yi n na ɓei ku gawo nyi.
Anyi ɓesi-si kwo-kwoi lo ai cige, “Omui zhin kwa jeze ɓe da okwatu, a fu burutu nuwan kwa jezeɓe kwa nya kma-kma dna na denbi nu.” Kwo wu lonu, n naza ba n ɓa jeze ɓeda ɓa laifi.

Omi wasika bayi nyi nfyaba, oma zaje, n ɓa gun aba mi, mi zhin atna ma cefye ɓe pa n fya yemi, nna nyaɓo n fye shin ye kpelo, aɓo n fye ɓei tumwi n na anabi agyi-gyi-yi aba n ʼyi ɓedo atnutnu-yi, n ʼyi ɓei ɓe fye n ɓeda eyi Dagayi, n Gniyi nyai nyi.
Kmisunyi, miye ma pa fye ge dna n na nyi-pyei kmaknayi, agyekpei ɓei ɓe nɓa ɓei zhin aɓo nukwoi doho-dohoi nɓa kpelo, ɓai ma gaiciya ʼsan.
Ɓa ɓei caɓo n layinu ge, “Ce Kristi ɓei ku gna ge wo jeze ɓelo ko? Woi gnina? Wota shan ɓem. Tunyi n sapa shi zaho-zahoi pa ɓelo sun, anya to shando shiɓa ɓei wun esa n na ɓei zhin anyi nyim.”

Ɓa yi ɓahin ge ɓa zamwi ɓai gwokpe ge Shekwoyi ɓei ku anyi zo n nuwan yakwo yi, n na anyi zhin avun, n wo ɓeda egbe nyai, woi ɓo bwa apma zhin n nuwan yi nu wa gmi anyi shi n nuwan yi shekwo-gun njesun.
Shekwoyi la gbetu ga njesun ge ala anyi ye n eshe yi pmi shi n tu ena ɓo, n wada nyipyei wyiyi, wyi yi naza nukwoi ɓei bwi cei nyi.
Ama fye to ze deye amwin, oma nugundo yeyeyi, nge aye dubu, kwo nyipyei gmanyi ɓa wu ngye nsu nu n Dagayi abam.
Wota zhin kalala nu n tu wo alkawali jezeɓenya ɓon, kwo da yake ko wu lonu n saho. Ama wo pminu, n dalili manai-ge woto cei pmalo zaho-zaho ya bwim, wo ye ga a ɓenukwoi zhinyi esa nu ɓa ye abui.
Dagayi nyipyei ɓelo ntna kmakma, ntna esa dnayi ngye evi, nsayi eshe ɓei kmi kwoi duya wyeɓo yakwo yi, anya ɓa kpe na nyibmana ena ɓei gyi ɓa, ekni nna nyai ɓa kpe kwo, ena ɓei gyiɓa vinya.
Tunda anya vinya n shegunyi laɓa ɓa ɓei wuya, ashe ko to bmiya lo ya se ase gyi-gyi yin?
Fye shi nyipyei yi awye, okwo ɓe-ɓe pwai wo fye, ewyi n Shekwoyi ɓei dna eshe cei nyi anya ɓa kpe nanyi bmana vinya ɓa ɓei wuya fi nna nyitala.

Ama yi pmi Shekwoyi ɓahin ɓeye, ɓai ye ɓeda bmapmi kasa-ɓala wo a wasika pmibwa ɓai da aɓo n wo to ɓei zhin nufin, shi ɓa shin zhin n na littafi ajeyi-oɓa gyiba kuwa bwi-bwinu alkawalinu, eshe woyi nya, n nanyi woyi yi, aba n ɓefyece nu bwa sese.
Oma nugundo ye-yeyi, sa fye zhilo fyei pmi nyipyei ye, Owo ɓeɓe nya, fye zhin kukari fya sase ntna ɓenukwoi zhin yi, fya sase n gyi-gyi-yi, n bugba fuyi n wa bye.

Fye pa nya kwo zhin woyi pmi. Wo ga yi ʼsa nu, yi lo azaje n gni-gni ɓeda yi. Eyi zado ce-cei, n ye-yei da yi Bulus, woku aɓeye kafi n wo a wasika homi. Owa ɓeda ho dnaɓo lo a kpeɓa awyeɓa, aza lo kuwa n ɓa ku ze a acijeyi dna n ɓahin ɓeye, ɓai ye ɓeda bmapmi kasa, ɓa la wo wasika pmibwa ɓai da aɓo n wo to ɓei zhin nufin, shi ɓa shin zhin n na littafi ajei oɓa gyiba kuwa bwi-bwi nu.
Mila atnubua pmafye gni to esayi ɓem, ema-zaje-ye-yei, n nabai nfye ɓa kawye to aza nukwoi ye pya ɓa dna fye kwoce har fya miya nfye mizhi mim.
Ama fye mwa fi n alheri, n yekpe yi eyi Dagayi n Gniyi yi Yesu Kristi nya. Mwamwa vinya n latu yakwo yi, ɓa kunsun woi nyalo-nyalo. Amin. Sai wyihoi.
Kristi ɓei n wye-wyeyi kafin a zhin anyi, har emi n mihin tukwo maku gyewo nmi awyei, maku wo wo woi daɓo, ma wo to bwa nmi abwai, Wo zhin Shekwoyi ɓeda wye-wyeyi nya nu.
Oza deye n wo zhin wye-wyeyi nyi, woi gmi n Shekwoyi aba nyi, aku wo wuyi, yi zhin seida ge yiku gye wo. Mi da Kristi nu ɓo, n wo zhin wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya nyi, wo ɓei kunsun n Dadayi a wuyi wo.
Ma gnafye njesun, yi gnafye oɓo nu n yi ku gye yi ku to bwa, nna abai fya bwa jedoɓe n na gmadai n yi cei lo n Dadayi n Yesu Kristi owo Nugun.
Nfya zhin shi ma kafi n wasika ye, efyehince fya ku nu n bugba buyi, n yihinɓe.
Ɓeda nyi n Shekwoyi wa da nge yi gnafye, nge Shekwoyi zhin buzangna nu wyegma to nyi n wo aban.
Ntucenu n ya ci ge yi zhin owo anugundo nu, ama ya gyi abye n zan-zan yi fi n wyegma n laifi yi, yi ce akatanu.
Ama n yi zan-zan fi n buzangna Shekwoyi nya, shi Kristi ɓei zhin nyi, yi n jedoɓe yi lo n bugba buyi n na ajei, Yesu owo Nugun ami ɓa zhanyi ya na laifi vinya.
Nyacige yi to n laifi yi lon, yi dna yihin kwoce nu, yi na gaiciya aɓo.
Ama n ya da eyi alaifi nwo aba, yi ɓa mi ya kpema wo wa zhin yi gafara. Wa zhanyi ya n ɓenukwoyi vinya. Kwo wulo cewo n Shekwoyi aba, wa zhinyi lonu ntuge Kristi ɓei lafi ntuge wa zhanyi alaifiya.
N ya gna yi to zhin laifin, yi ce akata nu yi-yi Shekwoyi ge zakata, gama wa ci ge, yi ku laifi zhin.
Omi aɓi, mi gna fye aɓo deye ntuge fya bui laifi si, ama nfya zhin laifi, oza lo n wo ɓa gyiwye ga fye n Dada aba. Ayi woye ge, Yesu Kristi oza n wo zhin ɓefyece yi, woi da Shekwoyi agma.
Owo nu ɓei shin Shekwoyi minagyi n yi tukwo wa tu wohin, wa ga yi jedoɓe n Shekwoyi, owo nu zhinyi alaifi gafara, to ge eyi anya gmanyin ama har anyi nya vinya.
Yi ɓa kpe nwuna nu ge yi zhin owo anya nua? N ya shi yihin awye, yi zhin atna lo ya zhin oɓo n wo ye?
Ozaho ɓaci ge, “Mi zhin Yesu viyi nu, mi tu lo n zokwo mi-i lo eshe, mi zhin Kristi nyanu.” Ama nwo ta zhin oɓo lo n Kristi a gna won, wo zhin zakata nu.
Ama aza n ɓa zhin oɓo n Kristi a gna ɓa ge ɓa zhin, ɓa ɓa tumwi ɓa ye Shekwoyi ndudu, nlonu yi kpe kwo yi zhin a Yesu-viyi nu.
Oza n wo ci ge wo zhin Yesu-viyi nu, wo zan-zan shi Kristi ɓei zan.
Omi azaje, mi ta ka wyidna woiwoi nu ga fye fya shibwan, ama kwo-kwoyi nu nfye ɓei ncei shinsun tunyi n kmisunyi. Fye ku kwo shinwo.

Ama kwo zhin woi-woi nu, kwoi zhin fye apma shi kwo ɓei zhin Kristi nyi, n yaa shi wyidna ye bwa, fye ye n na ajei, wyegma n yi a wye-wyeyi ɓa busi, Kristi buzangna, wye-wyeyi nya ɓa bmiyana fi n yi mi.
Oza n wa ci ge wo zan-zan dna lo n Kristi buzangna, ama woi wun owo zado nu, woye dna lo n wyegmaa.
Ama zaho-zahoyi n wo ye nwo zadoyi, wo zan-zan dna lo n buzangna, woi gyewo zokwo ntna bonyi-ce dna n wyegma ko laifi.
Gama oza nwo ta ye nwo zadoyin, woye dnalo n wyegma zafun nya, to woi kpe aba nwo lon, gama wyegma n ku wo bwi awye to woi gye wyebam.
Mi ka aɓeye ga fye nu efye vinya, emi aɓi, gama aku fye a laifi zhin gafara dna n Yesu eyi Gniyi.

Mi gna fye aɓeye azakwoyi ntuge fye kpe Kristi ye lo. Oza n wo wyewyeyi tunyi n Kmisunyi. Efye aɓi anuyi, mi daɓo n fyei, ntuge fye ku nasara gyi n Shetan tukwo, mika ga gye aɓi anuyi n abi anyikwoyi, ntuge fye ku tumwi ce, fya kpe Shekwoyi eyi Dada ye.
Ntucenu, mi daɓo n fyei a dada n fye kpe Shekwoyi nyalo-nyalo nya ye lo nyi, nfyei abi-anuyi nfye na kalayi lo n Shekwoyi Ɓeda yi nfye abugba nyi, fyei ku nasara gyi n Shetan yi.
Fye ku fa anyi ye ɓo, na nya yi n anyi ga fye vinya, gama n fye ye anya ye, fye wunu ge fye ta ye Shekwoyi lon.
Gama anyi nya ye vinya, anyikwo shakpe aɓo awyeda, anya si n ɓa lo ha wye, ntukwo mwayi n kwo ɓe n nyabwa aba nyi, aɓeye vinya to zhin Shekwoyi nya nun. Ɓa kun n anyi nukwoyi ye nu.
Anyi ye duyalo, nna anya nukwoyi yei vinya ɓa ɓeilo n gnisun nɓai, ama oza n wa gyi abye n Shekwoyi ɓeye-zhinyi wo ɓa bwa wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya.
Emi aɓi, anyi ye esa kmaknayi nla ɓe, Fye ku Kristi Nuɓayi ɓo wo, oza n wo zhin gaba n Kristi nyin-saiye azahi pya n mwa begye nku ɓe, deye wuyi ge anyi zo sa la ga si.
Aza n ɓa zhin gaba n Kristi yi nyi, ɓei fi n yi aduwa nyakun, ama ɓa to ɓei kunsun n yin to ɓaye kun, esa nɓa ɓei fa yi nyi kwo ku wuyi ɓa to ɓei zhin eyi anya num.
Ama fye to wu lo nlonun, gama Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi la ɓe nfye tukwo, fyei kpe gaiciya yelo.
Ntu cenu, mi taka fye ngye aza nu, n ɓa cei pma ɓa kpe gaiciya yen. Ama mi pma fye gna nu, ngye aza n ɓa kpe gaiciya ye, n na akatayi.
Nyikadonu zhin akata esua? Oza n wo ci ge Yesu to zhin Kristi nun. Ozahi pya zhin Kristi nuɓayi nu, ntuge wo to ga Shekwoyi gaiciya n wo Nugun yin.
Gama oza nwo ta ga Kristi Shekwoyi Nugun gaiciyan, wo ta bwa Shekwoyi Dadan, ama oza nwo n Kristi Shekwoyi Nugun yi lo, wo n Shekwoyi Dada yi lo.
Ntucenu fye gyi abye n gaiciya gai n nya n na ku wu fye, tunyi n sapa. Nfya zhin lonu fye ɓa bwa jedoɓe n Shekwoyi n owo Nugunyi.
Nwohin tukwo wo ku deye alkawali zhin yi wato wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya.
Omi ɓeda tu n Kristi nuɓai ɓo, mi da aza nu ɓo n ɓa ɓa ye ɓa bwi fye awye, ɓa dna fye n zokwo kasa.

Ama fye la Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi gwo, wo dnalo n fyemi, n fya bugba mi, nna bai n fye ta sun nzaho apmai wa wu fye nyahon n kwo bmiyan. Gama wo wu fye anya vinya, owo nu zhin Gaiciya, ntu cenu, shi wo ku da, tilas fye sase fi n Kristi, to fya shan ka n won.
Nsaiye emi aɓi, fye ku fi n zumunta agmada n Dagayi n na bai n wa ɓe fye ku kpe nge ɓeho to lon, vinyikwo to ɓei wo fye, fyei ta n na avun yin esa n wa ɓe n cei n.
Shi yi kpelo ge Shekwoyi zhin oza manayi nu, woi zhin ɓemana n esai vinya, yi ɓa mi ya ci ge, aza nɓa zhin ɓe mana, ɓa zhin owo aɓinu.
Fye gye shi eyi Dada eshe nya yeyi nsun, har woi ye ge a yi yi ge owo aɓi–gaiciyai nu yi zhin wo aɓinu, ama aza n mwa begye nɓa ta kpe Shekwoyi yen, ɓata kpe lo ge yi zhin owo aɓi nun,
E, omi anugundo, yi zhin Shekwoyi aɓinu nsaiye, yi ta mi ya kpe enya ye nkwo ɓe lon, ama yi kpe lo ge, esa, n wa ɓe n cei yi ɓa wu ngye wo, ntuge yi ɓei gyewo shi wo wu.
Oza n wo ga ɓeye gaiciya wo ɓa shi wohin n gyi-gyi-yi, shi Kristi nwohin gyi-gyi-yi nyi.
Ama aza n ɓa gyi abye n laiti zhinyi, ɓa zhin Shekwoyi nuwunyi nu, gama ata zhin alaifi doho-dohoyi n Shekwoyi ɓeye yi nun.
Fyei kpe lo ge wo ɓei la ze zanyikwoci n na bai wa ku yi alaifi ya, woi to n laifi owohin nyan, wo to na Shekwoyi ɓeye zhin ɓo nsaho-sahoyi n, n zokwo doho-dohoyin,

Ntu cenu n yi wo vivi-wyi n woi, yi vi wo ɓo, yi ta gyi abye n laifi zhinyin, ama aza nɓa gyi abye n laifi zhin yi nyi, kwo kunce ɓa kpe ge, Ɓa zhin alaifi ntu ge ɓa to shin woye kpe nun, kwo ɓa to ze owo anyan.
O, Omi aɓi, fye toye zaha wa dna fye kwoce n, nfya zhin ɓemana n esai vinya, kwo wunu ge fye zhin aza manayi nu ngye wohin.
Ama n fya gyi abye n ɓenukwoyi zhinyi, kwo wunu ge fye zhin Shetan nyanu, oza n wo ɓei ya laifi zhin to wa shan ka nkwon, ama Shekwoyi Nugun ɓei ɓe ntuge wa wun shetan atnu-tnu ya nu.

Oza n na la wo ma dna n Shekwoyi aɓi wo ta gyi abye n laifi zhin yin, ntuge nsaiye Shekwoyi wye-wyeyi dnalo n wo, ntuce wo ta gyi abye n laifi zhin yin, ntuge ala wye-wyeyi woi-woyi ye ma dna nwo, kwoi wanwo shi, alawo shanma.
Nlonu yi ɓa mi ya wu oza n wo zhin Shekwoyi ɓi, n zayi n wo zhin shetan nya. Oza nwo sase dnalo n laifi to woi ye nwo azaje yin, wa wunu ge woto dnalo n Shekwoyi aɓin.
Gama nabari n yi ɓei wo tunyi n kmisunyi, okwonu ge yi ye n na ajeyi.
Yi to ku ze ngye Kayinu, nwo ɓei zhin shetan nya, wa wu owo mado nyin. Kninu ɓei zhin wa wu woa? Ntuge Kayinu ɓei zhin woi zhin ɓenukwoyi, wo ɓei n cei kpe n ge owo mado zan-zan ɓei gna wo nya bmiya.
Ntucenu ce to wo fye n, emi anugundo ndei anyi wun yi nun.
N ya ye n na a Yesu-viyi ajeyi kwa wunu ge alayi gni n na anapi, ai la wye wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya gayi. Ama oza n wo taye n wo aje yin wo lo efi nyalo-nyalo nya.
Oza n wa wun owo Yesu-viyi do nu, wo zhin zawuyi nu. Fye kpelo ge oza to lo n wo wu oza nwo wye-wyeyi nyalonyalo nyayi lo-lo nwo min.
Yi kpelo ge ye-ye hin-hin kun n Kristi aba nu, ngye shi wa fi ntu nyi ɓo nyi, ntu cenu kwo kunce lo ya gayi awye-wyeyi ntu n yi a Yesu-viyi aje ɓo.
Ama ndei oza n wo zhin Yesu-viyi wo n na agyiwyeyi lo nwo ɓa sase n dagma, wa gye zado n na awyekwoyi to wa bmawo zhin, Shekwoyi ye-ye dnalo n wuna nu nwo miʼa?
Omi aɓi, yi fa ɓeda ɓo n gbeyi ge yi ye eyi azaje lo, yi ye ɓa cewo ya wu ɓa n yi aɓo zhin-zhin.
Nnavun yi ɓe kpe dei-dei n yi aɓezhin, nge yi malo n Shekwoyi bwa, nsai eyi abugba ɓe bwa lafiya, kwo esa n ya gni-agni zhin n Dagayi abye.
Ama n yi n na abugba anukwoyi, kwa gnayi ge yi ku ɓenukwoyi zhin, Dagayi ɓa gna kwo wo, gama wo kpe ɓeye lo vinya n yi zhin.
Ama emi a nugundo ye-yeyi ndei eyi abugba gyi-gyi-yi lo, yi ɓa mi ya ɓe Dagayi aba n bugba kalayi n tna edna.
Ya bwa enya n yi nya, ntuge yi vi wo ɓo lo, yi zhin oɓo n wo ye.
Enya nyi n Shekwoyi wa gna ge yi zhin, Yi ga gaiciya n Yesu Kristi owo Nugun eye, ya ye n na jeyi.
Aza n ɓa zhin enya n Shekwoyi wa da ɓa sease lo fi n Shekwoyi owohin nɓa mi, Yi kpelo deye kwo zhin gaiciya nu, n tuge Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi n wa gayi nyi wo gna yi nlonu.
Omi a nugundo ye-yeyi fye to ga aɓo vinya gaiciya nfye won, ntuge aza gna fye ge Shekwoyi ɓeda nun fye mwi kwo kpa fya gye kwo Shekwoyi ɓeda nu. Gama anya wuyi a katayi lo.

Zokwo nfye ɓa kpe ge ɓeda ye zhin Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi nya nu, okwo nu ge fya nyaɓo ge ɓeda ye da lo ge Yesu Kristi, Shekwoyi Nugun ɓo la ze Zanyikwoci wa ɓe dna na anyi n nayi ku ngye za? Nkwo wu lonu agye ɓedahi gmi n Shekwoyi aba nu.
Nkwo to wo lonun, to ɓedahi ta gmi n Shekwoyi aba nun, ama n Kristi nuɓayi aba, Kristi Nuɓayi n fye ku owo ɓo shinwo nge wo ɓelo nyi, owo a tnutnu nukwoyi n ɓa zhin gaba Kristi nyi, ɓa fi lo anyi.

Omi anugundo ye-yeyi fye zhin Shekwoyi anyanu, fyei ku nasara gyi n na azayi n ɓa wun Kristi nu, Ntuge oza dnalo n efye abugbami n wo du amalami akatayi ye lo n kala, n ɓa fi n na anyi nukwoyi ye nyi.
Aza deye zhin anyi nya nu, ntu cenu ɓai vi anyi nya, anyi yi kna ɓa tnubua lo.
Ama yi zhin Shekwoyi aɓinu, ntu cenu aza n ɓa kpe Shekwoyi ye ɓa nu knayi ɓeda tunbua. Azado ta won, Zokwonu njesun n yi ɓa kpe kwo ɓeda gmi n Shekwoyi aba nu, ntuge n kwo gmi nwoabanuanyitawon.
Emi anugundo, yi tumwi ya ye n na ajeyi, gama ye-ye gmi n Shekwoyi abanu, aza nɓa ye n na zayi, ɓai zhin ɓemana ɓa wunu ge ɓa zhin Shekwoyi aɓi nu, ɓai zhin atnalo ɓaye kpewo ye lo na bye.
Ama ndei oza to n ye-yei lo woi zhin ɓemanan, kwo wu nu ge wo ta kpe Shekwoyi ye lon gama Shekwoyi zhin ye-yenu.
Shekwoyi ɓei wu shi wo ye yi nsun esa n wo ɓei tnu n wo Nugun, ɓigba gmanyi yi dna n na nyi nukwoyi ye, wa ɓe yi n wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya yi, dna n wo fi.
Dna n tnu-tnuye yi ku gye shi yeye hin-hin wu, kwo to zhin eyi yeye nu n Shekwoyi aban, ama, owo yeye nu n yi aba, esa n wo ɓei tnu n wo Nugun yi wa ya Shekwoyi minagyi zhi n yi alaifi tukwo.
Emi anugundo, shi Shekwoyi ye yi lo n sun lonu nyi, kwo kunce lo ya ye n na ajeyi ce.
Gama kwo da yake yi to shin Shekwoyi gyen, esa n ya ye n na ajeyi, Shekwoyi dnalo n yi, owo ye-ye n yi mi kwa dnakala lo abye-bye.
Wo la owo Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi dna n yi abugba mi, seida nu ge yi sase fi lo nwo, owohin n yi mi.
Har sahi, yiku gye n yihin awyeyi, yi gna anyi, nge Shekwoyi la tnu n wo Nugun yi wa ze anyi Gniyi.
Zaho-zahoyi n wa ga gaiciya wa ci ge Yesu nu zhin Shekwoyi Nugun, Shekwoyi dnalo n owo mi, owohin ce dna n Shekwoyi mi.

Yi kpelo shi Shekwoyi ye yi nsun, ntuge yi ku owo ye-ye woshan, ntu ge yi ku gaiciya gawo esa n wa gnayi nge wo ye yi lo n mwa. Shekwoyi zhin ye-ye nu, zahozaho yi nwo dnalo n ye-ye, wo dnalo n Shekwoyi, Shekwoyi dnalo n wo.
Shi yi sase fi n Kristi, eyi ye-ye kwa mwa lo abye kwa nu, nlonu vinyikwo n ednayi to ɓei woyin, nwada-wyiyin, ama yi ɓei gye wo n bugba kalayi n na agmadayi, ntuge wo ye yi lo, yihin yewo lo ce.

Yi to n dna apma yi lo n za aba nwo ye yi lo cewon, owo ye-ye n yi aba n la aɓo dna nya nyayi ya, n woɓa zhin yi nyi. N ya wo edna, yiwo oɓo dna nu n wo ɓa zhinyi, kwa wu nu ge yita kpelo shi wo ye yi nsun.
Ntu cenu, yi yewo ntuge wona ye yi n na bye.
Ndei oza gna ge, “mi ye Shekwoyi lo” ama woi wun owo zado nun, wo zhin za kata nu, woɓa ye Shekwoyi n wuna n wo to shin wo gye-nyin, ndei wo ta ye wo zado lo n wo gyewo wye nyin ma?
Shekwoyi, n wohin tukwo wo ku ci ge oza taye Shekwoyi nu gmanyin ama wo ye nwo zadoyi.
Nza ga gaiciya ge Yesu nu zhin Kristi, woi zhin Shekwoyi Nugun nu n ho Gniyi, agye ho zhin Shekwoyi ɓinu. Oza n wo ye n Dadayi, wo ye lo nu n wo Nugun yi.
Ntu cenu fye ɓa kpe shi fye ye Shekwoyi aɓi n sun wato efye azaje n na amapwi dna n Dagayi, shi fye ye Shekwoyi fyei vi wo ɓo nsun nyi.
Shekwoyi yeye nwu ge ha zhin oɓo nwo ye, ɓehin-hin kwo to dnaɓon.
Gama Shekwoyi ʼɓi doho-dohoyi ɓami wa vi wo, woi gyi nasara n laifiyi, n na shakpe nukwoyi anyi nya yi, n wa kpema Kristi ntu ge wa bma wo zhin.
Ama nyikado ɓami wa sunkun wa gyi nasara n okun ye yi, to oza ga gaiciya nu ge, Kristi zhin. Shekwoyi Nugun nu ma?

Yi kpelo ge - wo zhin wo Nugun nu, ntuge Shekwoyi ɓei ku da lonu n begye yi nkwo ɓei gmi n eshe, esa n na ɓei zhin Yesu baptisma, n esai n wo ɓei ye wa fi nyi. E, to ge esa n na ɓei zhin wo baptisma gmanyim, ama n esayi n wo ɓei ye wafi nyi. Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi gaiciyada vinya ɓei ku da lonu ce. Ntu cenu yi n na seidada yi lo ngun ata, Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi begye n yi abugbami, begye nkwo ɓei gmi n eshe, esa n na ɓei zhin wo baptisma nyi, n begyeyi kafin wofi, Ɓa ɓei da ɓo gmanyi nu, nge Yesu Kristi zhin Shekwoyi Nugun nu.
Yi zhin ya ga aza gaiciya n ɓa gmi seida n na awadaba nyi, ntu cenu yi ɓa mi ya ga oɓo gaiciya n Shekwoyiʼa da. Shekwoyi wo gna ge Yesu zhin owo Nugun nu.

Aza vinya n ɓa ga ɓeye gaiciya nɓa bugba, ɓa kpelo ge kwo zhin gaiciya nu. Zaho-zahoyi n wo to ga ɓeye gaiciyan wo yi Shekwoyi nu ge za kata. Ntuge wo ta ga gaiciya lo tu oɓo n Shekwoyi ku da n wo Nugun tukwon.
Knido nu n Shekwoyi n kuda? Nge wo la wyewyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya gayi, wyewyeyi ye kwo dna lo n owo Nugun nu.
Ntu cenu oza n wo n Shekwoyi Nugun yilo, wo n wye-wyeyi lo, oza n wo to n Nugun yi lon woto n wyewyeyi n lon.
Mi ka deye ga fye n fye ku gaiciya ga n Shekwoyi Nugun nyi, n na abai fya kpe ge fye n wyewyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya yi lo.
Yi kpelo lallei, nge woɓa wo yi, wa gayi nyaho-nyahoyi n ya nyawo n lodo n wo ɓeye yi.
N yi kpelo ge wo wo yilo, esa n ya daɓo n owoyi, yi gyi wo wye yi kpelo nu nge wo ɓa ga yi amsa.

Nha gye Yesu-viyi woi zhin laifi n kwo ta ɓe n efiyin, ha gyi Shekwoyi wye wa zhin wo gafara, Shekwoyi wa gawo wye-wyeyi, saidai woku laifi zhin nkwo kunce n efiyi. Ama laifi lo n kwo ɓe n efi yi nwo ku kwo nu zhin, apma to lo a zhin aduwan.
Ɓenukwoyi dohodohoyi zhin laifinu. Mita da alaifi fafayi nu ɓon, mi da laifinu ɓo n kwo ɓe nfi yi.
Oza to lo n wo la zhin Shekwoyi oɓi n wo ɓa gyi abye n laifi zhin, gama Kristi, Shekwoyi Nugun, wo yi shilo n kalayi, shetan ta mi wa to wo bwan.
Yi kpelo ge yi zhin Shekwoyi aɓi nu, anyi vinya n ɓa cenyi ɓafi n shetan sinta nu nwo ikoyi.

Yi kpelo ge Kristi, Shekwoyi Nugun, nla ɓe wa bmayi zhin, yakpe, ya bwa Shekwoyi hinhin ye, Nsayiye yi filo n Shekwoyi ntuge yi fi lo n Yesu Kristi owo Nugun. Nwonu zhin Shekwoyi gaiciyada gmanyi, owonu zhin wyewyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya.
Omi aɓi, fye bui enya si n kwo ɓa gwo Shekwoyi aba dna nfye abugbami.
Wasika ye gmi n Yohanna byeda, zakwoyi ikklisiya nya aba nu, kwoi lo nyikwoza ye-yeyi aba n Shekwoyi wa kni nyi, n wo aɓiyi n mi ye n mwa nyi shi azaje ye wo dna ekilisiya nyi.
Shi Gaiciya dnalo n yi mi nyalo-nyalo nyi.
Shekwoyi Dada n wo Nugunyi Yesu Kristi, ɓa tu yi anabarka n sun-sungye dnagmayi n bugba fuyi, n gaiciya yi n ye-yeyi.
A damilo n mwa shi ma gye oho aɓiho n ya, ɓai zan-zan shi kwo kunce, ɓai vi gaiciya, ɓai vi Shekwoyi gbega.
Nsaiye mi cei pma lo ma ce fye ɓepa, emi, anugundo, wyidna kwokwoyi n Shekwoyi ɓei ga tunyi n kmisunyi nyi, nge kwo bmiya a Yesu-viyi ɓa ye n najei.
N yi ye Shekwoyi, ye ɓa zhin oɓo n wo ye ya zhin, wa ku gnayi tunyi nsapa nge yi ye najei.
Fye ka atukwoda akatai wye, n ɓa sheyi gun laɓa nyi, n ɓata ga gaiciya nge Kristi ɓei la ɓe anyi dna n nayi ngye eyi nya pyan. Aza deye pya gni apapa n gaiciya yi, n Kristi yi.
Fye zhin peceiye to fya ze ngye ɓan, fya bwi lada nuwan, n fyehin, nmihin zhin tnu-tnu n kalayi ya bwa nyin. Fye la fyehin yi fya bwa lada nu-nuyi n Dagayi aba.
Gama nfye to kpetu Kristi wuwun, fye la Shekwoyi fa nu n na avun. Ama n fya vi Kristi nyawu, fye ɓa bwa Shekwoyi. Fya bwa Dada n Nugun yi.
N za ɓe wa wu fye, to woi ga gaiciya n nya n Kristi ɓei wun, fye to yi wo ma wa ɓe fye puwan, fye to gawo bugba kala n zokwo dohodohoyin.
Nfya ye, fya ku ze aza nukwoyi nu ɓedo nwoi, dna n wo aɓe nukwoyi zhin-zhin.
To, mi n cei pmalo maye daɓo ɓe ama mito n cei pmalo ma dakwo fi n wasikayen, gama mi n bugbayi dnalo ma ɓe ma gye fye esa fyewyi, nsahi yi ɓei da aɓeye n gnisun, yi dagma.
Oho mapui, Shekwoyi oɓi knikniyi, owo aɓi ɓi ho gna lo.
Wasika ye gmi Yohanna byeda aba nu kwoi lo Gayus emi za yeyeyi aba, n mi ye wo n gaiciya nyi.
Emi nugundo, mi zhin aduwa lo ge oho nayi n lafiya yi lo shi oho wye-wyeyi n ceilo nyi.
Eyi azado-hon ɓa zan-zan ɓai wan zokwo n ya ɓaku bugba bui-bui gami, shi ɓa gnami ge ho zan-zan lo bmiya n gaiciya yi, hoi sase lo shi nabari manayi da.
Bugba buyi do to lo nkwo ɓa du deye ngye shi mi wo aɓeye pya n mi aɓi aban.
Omi nugundo ho zhin Shekwoyi tnu-tnu manayi lo, nha bma, a malami zhin n na a waʼazi zhinyi, n ɓa diya n ho aba nyi.
Ɓaku oho alheri ɓo gna eklisiya n ya, nho yeye atnu-tnu yi. A dami lo shi ho ɓei tnu n na a cauta yi n aza kun nɓa diya nyi.
Gama a zan Dagayi ezan nu to ɓai go, kwo nyagyin, ajekpe, agye wanba kwo agyiwye n na azaba n ɓa ta vi Yesun, kwo da yake ɓaku waʼazi zhin ɓa.
Ntucenu eyi n yi hin tukwo yi bma ɓa zhin n na bai yaku ze a Dagayi tnu-tnu kun-zhin yi n ɓai.
Mi tnu ikklisiya n wasika ɓiyi yei ntu ce nu, ama Diyoturifus, tu kwomwayi, n wo ye wa duwohin gyi n na abye, ngye a Yesu-viyi tukwoda nyi, wo ta gwo mi iko tulo n wo tukwon to woi ye wa womin.

Esa n ma ɓe n ɓa gnaho aɓo n wo zhin lo, n na aɓo a nukwoyi n wo dalo n mi tukwo, n ɓeda nukwoyi n wo da. Wo ta na awaʼazi zhinyi gwoɓo nu gmanyin, ama wo ta ye ge azaje ɓa gwon, n ɓa gwo wa kunɓa ya n na aduwa nyakun.
Omi nugundo, to gwo zokwo nukwoi yen, vi oɓo n kwo bmiya hapa ge, aza nɓa zhin ɓo mana, ɓa wunu ge ɓa zhin Shekwoyi aɓinu, aza n ɓa gyi abye n ɓenukwoyi zhinyi, ɓa wu nu ge ɓa mwakpalo n Shekwoyi.
Ozaho-zahoyi ɓedo n Gaiciya yi n kwohin tukwo ɓei zhin Dimitriyus seida, emi n mihin tukwo mi ɓa da ɓo gmanyi nu, hoi kpelo ge mi da gaiciya nu.
Mi n na ɓei lo n mi n cei pma ma gnaho, ama mita kafi n yan.
Gama mi na awyetu yilo mi ɓaɓe daho, yi ɓei daɓo n mwa n gnisun.
Ntucenu sai esahoi. Anugundo n ya ɓa tnu ho lo nɓa gnaɓiyi, ɓi aza vinya gna gami.
Omi Yahuda Yesu Kristi bara n Yakubu madoyi. Kwoi lo a Yesu-viyi n na aba vinya a za ye-yeyi n Shekwoyi wa kni.
Fa Shekwoyi alheri, bugbafu n sun-sungyei, ɓa mwa nfye aba lo abye abye.

Omi anugundo ye-yeyi mi zhin shiri maka ga fye ntu n gni-gni ɓo n Shekwoyi la gayi, Ama nsaiye kwo la ze dole ma ka fye n nyaho tukwo gbo, ma gna ge fye sunkun n wyei bmi ntu n gaiciya ɓo n Shekwoyi ɓei ga owo aza, bwa sun gmanyi, ɓa shikwo ntna doshanyi, aye yi mwa begye.

Mi da deye ntu ge amalami ho a tna Shekwoyi yekpeyi, ɓaku lofi n fye mi, ɓai ci ge n ya ku vi Yesu, na avun, yi ɓami ya zan-zan shi yi n cei pma n tna Shekwoyi ta ta dnawo. Aɓei ka oɓa knizun tun-yin sapa, ntu ge ɓala pmi da eyi Tukwoda, wato Dagayi Yesu Kristi.
Omi amsa n ɓa aba okwonu nyi ge, Fye pa gaiciya ye ɓo nfye shin kpeye lo nyi nge, Shekwoyi ɓola wo aza gni n Masar kni, n na avun wa wu, aza vinya n ɓato ɓei gawo gaiciya ɓa zhin owo ɓe yen.
Ma pa fye njesun, amalaikayi ɓo, n ɓa ɓei gyi-gyi-yi n tna cegye nyi, ama ɓa pmi da ɓenukwoyi zhin. Nsaiye Shekwoyi nɓai fi agma filo n kurkuku wyegmanya ɓai pmi wada nyipyei.

Fyeto ze Sodom kni n Gomara yi amwi m, n na azhiyi nɓa ɓei shegun ɓa nyin, vinya n nu-nuyi n shakpe doho-dohoyi. Azanugbayi ɓai wo aje shakpe, Azhihi aɓei ku ɓa kpe ena, ɓaku ze misali n yi aba nge anapi lo aba n na ta, aɓenukwoyi zhinyi.
Ama amalami a katayi ye ɓai gyiabye n na zan-zan nukwoyi, ɓai zhin laifi, ɓa gba ɓahin nayi, ɓai kpe aza agye n ba gyi abe tu n ɓa tukwo nyi, har ɓai kpe a malaika a gye.
Ama mikailu, amalaika esu, esa n wo ɓei gni Musa nayin n Shetan yi, wo to ɓei zhin atna wa gnawo ɓeda kasan, ko wa kpewo agyen, ama wa ciwo ge, “Dagayi wo gnakniho.”
Ama aza deye, ɓa kpe anya agye, ɓai kni anya akmi n ɓa to nɓa awyegayin, ngye anya fanya ɓai zhin aɓo n ɓa gye dama, ɓai lo n ɓa awye-wyeyi n na abwi.
Aiya n ɓa aba, gama ɓaku vi Kayinu fye, n wo ɓei wu owo mado nyi, ngye Balamu ɓei zhin ɓehoɓehoi ntu agyiwye ɓo, n gye Kuraha ɓo la Shekwoyi beda zungna, ɓa fifi n owo knitu.

Esanu n na aza deye ye ɓedo n nfyei n na abuki aba n na aduwa nyakun yi, ɓa zhin aza nukwoyi fi n fyemi, ɓai masan ɓai gyi abye, ɓai kna ɓahin, to ɓai pa azaje ɓon, ɓawu ngye alkawali to ɓai nun, ɓawu ngye ashinwa a gyi-gyi-yi n ɓa ta gyi nɓa sayin. Ɓato fifi yi nu gmayin ama ɓa fifi yi abwa aba: Ntu ge ala ɓa shiya n na agbegyei vinya a kpe ɓa eria.

Enya nɓa fa n ɓa avun, okwo nu zhin vinyikwo, ngye alazhenya n nuwan kma kwa yaɓa zhi n edna gbe nyi. Ɓai zan laɓa ngye akpasu, buzangna nya, ama nɓa abye wyegmaa nyalo-nyalo nya n bugba wunyi n Shekwoyi nla zhin shiri gaɓa.
Inok n wo ɓei zhin oza tnabayi n Adamu avun, ɓei kpe aza deye ɓo wa ci ge, “Gye, Dagayi ɓelo n wo azagyi-gyiyin mwa begye.
Wo ɓei ɓe n na azanyikwoci yi n owada abye, ɓo gwo tata cewo ai wu aɓo anukwoyi n ɓa ku zhin gaba n Shekwoyi, woi wu oɓo n ɓa zhin nwo tukwo.”
Aza deye zhin anya abwa shiyi nu nyaho ta kunɓa, bai zhin ɓenukwoyi doho-dohoi n ɓa gye, ɓai mwa ɓahin n gbeyi, n ɓa ga aza mwa-mwa ɓa ga ntuge ɓa ye nyaho nu.
Emi a nugundo, fye pa aɓo n eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi abara ɓei gna fye.
Nge n na anyipyei kmazoyi agyekpe yi ɓei ɓe, oɓa nufi vinya ɓa dabahin agma dna n zokwo nukwoyi doho-dohoi.
Ɓai ɓe na jegnayi ɓai ye anya nukwoyi anyinya, ɓato n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi dna n ɓa emin.
Ama efye, emi a nugundo, fye mi fyehin fi n tushi eyi gaiciya ga gyi-gyi nya, fyei tumwi fyei zhin aduwa dna n Zafun Gyi-gyi-yi iko, n kalayi.
Fye ku fi aba n Shekwoyi ye-ye nyi, Wa tu fye anabarka, fye pmi n hakuri yi, wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nya n eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi dna n wo sun-sun gye ye wo ga fye nyi.
Fye bma aza zhin nɓa naɓo n fye mi nyi, fye gye aza sun-sun nɓa zhin shaka nyi.

Gni aza ho ngye ho kun ɓa, n anapi, Azaho kuwa, bma ɓa zhin ɓa bwa Dagayi, ama fya zhin peceiye n na abai n fye ta bwi fi n ɓa laifin, fye na ɓa alaifi ɓo, ama fya gye ɓa sun-sun n ɓahin tukwo nɓa zhin alaifida nyi.

Nsaiye, mwa-mwa vinya n wo aba n wo zhin Shekwoyi gmanyi nyi, n wa gni yi ntu Yesu Kristi ɓonyi, e, mwa-mwa n kalayi vinya, iko vinya n ebe yi owo nya nu tunyi n kmisunyi, ɓa zhin owo nya nu tunyi n kmisunyi, ɓa zhin owo nya nu ɓai ɓo zhin owo nya nyalo-nyalo. Wo n ikoyi lo wa shifye bwa to fya taya fya miya, waɓe n fye yi ntna laifi n gyi-gyi-yi, n wo abye, mwa-mwa n kasun ci agmada nya yi, nyalo-nyalo. Amin.
Littafi ye kpe anya, anyaya n ɓa ɓa zhin esa fyewyi, n Yesu Kristi asesemi, Shekwoyi ɓei ga wo Izini ge wo kpe ɓa nya ya wu Yohanna owo bara. A tnu n Malaikayi n eshe wa ɓe wa wu wo oɓa awyega.
Yohanna wa kaɓa kpe vinya, Shekwoyi ɓeda, n Yesu Kristi yi n na aɓei vinya n wo ɓei wo, woi ce woi gye.
Nha ba anabci ye dna ikklisiya ai wo, ho ɓa gwo anabarka n Dagayi. Aza nɓa wo ɓa knatunbua ɓa zhin oɓo n kwa da ɓa bwa anabarka. Gama esa la wo viwyi n na aɓeye vinya ɓa zhin.

Daga Yohanna, zuwa a ekilisiya n gun tnaba n ɓa fi n Asiya nyi, Turki. Omi anugundo, Alheri, n bugbafuyi, nɓa kun n Shekwoyi aba, nwo nyi nyi, n wo ɓei nyi, woi ye wa ɓe, n na zafun ngun tnabayi nɓa zhi n wo abye nyi.

N Yesu Kristi yi n wa nu egbe woi wuyi gaiciya vinya nyi. Owo nu zhin Kmisunyi n wo ɓei lakala n efi, to wa shan fin. Wo du esu dohodohoyilo n esayi vinya, n wa loyiya, n yi alaifi, shi wa ze owo ami ya ntu yi ɓo nyi.
Wola yi yezhi fi n owo ebemi, wa zeyi a pirist Shekwoyi owo Dada anya. Fye gawo mwa-mwa nyalo-nyal-o nya, wo gyi ebe nyalonyalo Amin.
Gyewye, wo zhilo, n na anyi yi shewo gun, awye vinya ɓa gyewo, e, aza nɓa ɓei fin wo eshanyi, Akni vinya ɓei cibwi ɓai wun bugba esa nwa ɓe ncei. E, Amin, ko ze nlonu.
Ominu zhin A n Z yi, kmisunyi n kmaknayi, anya vinya n ya Shekwoyi na dace n wo zhin Dagayi nyi, oza nwo ikoyi vinya nyi, n wo nyin, woi ɓei nyi, woi ɓelo njesun.

Ominu, efye zado, Yohanna, wahala kun-sunyi ntu n Yesu ɓo, n wo ka fye wasika ye, emihin ce, mila hakuri bwa n Yesu ga, yi ɓei gyi ebe n woyi. Mi ɓei tu n muse n na yi kwo ge Batmus, n na ɓei nyami ya ntu ge mi zhin Shekwoyi ɓeda waʼazi, mi-i da oɓo n mi kpeyolo n Yesu Kristi tukwo.
Dagayi nyipyeyi nu ɓei, mi-i gawo mwa-mwa, esa fyewyi mawo begye yakwo n mi avun, begye n wo n gye a bye kna-knaci.

Kwoi ci ge, “Ominu zhin A n Z yi. Kmisunyi n kmazoyi,” Nna vun ma wowo woi cige, “Ka anya vinya n ha gye, ha tnun n ho wasika yi n na ikklisiya ngun tnaba aba, n ɓa fi n Turki nyi. Ikklisiya n Afisus, n doi n kwo dna n Simiruna nyi, n na adoyi n ɓa fi n Pargamus, Thiatira, Sardisu, Filadalfiya, n Lawudikiya yi nyi.”
Esa n mi ɓei kpe awye ma gye oza n wo daɓo n miyi, nɓo n mi avun ma gye a kandle busi ngun tnaba zinariya nya, n gni agni zhin.
Ma gye zaho gni agni dna n ɓa atasin, ngye Yesu nwo yi wohin ge, Oza nugun, n eje Yakwoyi kpe n cei pa n na agu n zinariya belt yi.
Owo apita nwu n bui-bui ngye lulu kwo snow, owo awye wu ngye ena gwogwoyi.
Owo apita ɓai bmiyana n gye sinkna byei prnia-pmiaiya. Owo begye kwoi Sawyi ngye a nuwandokwo n ɓa luya n na akuta.
Wo n na a kpasi tnabayi shi n wo bwai-zhe bwa, n ebe yakwoi shi n Gyi-gyi-yi asepa aba-ba n owo gbe, owo awyeba ɓai bmiyana ngye nyi-pyei n kwo wo n tna anyi n ɓa ɓa gwo kwo ya.

Esa n mi ɓei gyewo ncei. Ma miya shi n wo apita ba ngye zafi, amma wa tomi bwa n wo bwaizhebwai wa cimi ge, To wo ednan, kwoda yake emi nu zhin, Kmisunyi n kmaknayi. Wye-wyeyi da n wo ɓei fi, woi wye-wyeyi lo nsai ye nyalonyalo, n wo n na a mabudi anapi nya yi n efi nyai nyi–to wo ednan.
Ka enya n ho ye bwagye nyi, n na anyai n na ɓa wuho esafyewyi.

Akpasu tnaba n ha gye n mi bwai-zhe bwa nyi, n na kandle busiyi ngun tnaba nyi, oɓa awyega nu nyi. Akpasu ngun tnaba oɓanu zhin a ikklisiya tukwoda ngun tnaba, a kandle busi ngun tnaba, oɓa nu zhin a ikklisiya.
Ka wasika ga ikklisiya tukwoda n Afisus ha gnawo ge: “Mika ma gna ho tnu-tnu n kwo gmi n wo aba n wo zan-zan dna n na ikklisiya nyi, nɓa tukwo-dai shi n wo bwai-zhe bwa nyi.

“Wo ciho ge, Mikpe lo shiho zhin aɓo manayi nsun, miku gye oho kukari n hakuri yi, mi kpelo hota ye n laifiyi n ho aza aban, hoi la aza pmi nɓa ci ge ɓa zhin atnu-tnu-yi ɓai to zhinɓa nun, Ho ku kpe n gye shiɓa ce a kata.
Hoku wahala sin ntu mi ɓo, to hoi fa min.
“Amma enya lo gmanyi n kwo wunya lo, ho ye milo ngye kmisunyin.
Zhin nubo n esai n ho ɓei kmi mi ye nyi, kwo shandolo nsai ye, ha je zeɓe dami, ha zhin tnu-tnu shi ho ɓei shin zhin, kwo maɓe ma gni ho kandle busiya n na a eklisiya aje.
“Amma oɓo lo n ho aba n kwo bmiyalo: Hota ye n Nikolawuya ashakpe yin, shi mi ta ye nyin.
“Fa ɓedaye kwa lo zaho-zahoi tnubua n wo kna tunbua woi wo oɓo n Zafun gna a ikklisiya. Oza n wa gyi nasara, miɓa gawo, shinwa wye-wyeyi nya n kwo dna n Shekwoyi paradise wagyi.”
Kwo lo ikklisiya tukwoda aba n Simiruna: “Tnu-tnuye gmi n o-wo aba nu nwo zhin Kmisunyi n kmazoyi, n wo ɓei la fi wa lakala n wye-wyeyi nyi.

“Mikpelo shi ho sin wahala ntu Dagayi ɓo nsun, mikpe oho awye kwoye lo, (amma ho n nabwa eshe nyayi lo.) Mi kpe aza kwoce dnai yelo n ɓa gni apa-pa n hoi nyi, nɓa gna ge ɓa zhin a Yahudiyi nyi Shekwoyi aɓi, ɓai to zhin owo aɓi nun, gama ɓa ce Shetan zokwo golo.

To zhin wahala dnawo n ho ye ha sin nyin, gama esa fyewyi shetan ɓa she a zaho yafi n kurkuku wa mwi fye gye. Aɓa ga fye wahala anyi-pyei ngun awo. La mi gni, ha nu egbe kwo efiyi nu, mihin ce mi ɓa gaho rawani wye-wyeyi nya. Abye, mwa-mwa tna zo yi.
Fa zahozahoi n wo wo atnubua ɓo wa wo oɓo n Zafun gna a ikklisiya. Oza n wo gyi nasara. Efi Bayi ta gye wo wyen.”
Ka wasikaye ga ikklisiya tukwoda n Pargamus: “Tnu-tnuye gmi n oza banu nwo ebeyakwoyi shi ngyi-gyi yi abwa aba-ba nyi.
Mi kpelo ge ho dna n ezhi nu n shetan n gyi ebe, shetan mwa-mwa ga aba a tasin, har hoi vimi, to hoi ye ha nami aɓo m, kwo esa n Antibas, emi seida zhinyi, gbenuyi ɓei fi n na shetan a viyi akun.
“Ama mi na ɓei shilo n hoi, Ho fa aza ho nɓa wu aza ge ɓa zhin shi Bilamu ɓei zhin, wa wu Balak shi wo ɓa bwi a Israilayi aɓi dna n na anagbayi zokwo, wa ga ɓa bugba kala nge ɓa lo ashangba ba.
E, ho n na azayi filo n ɓa vi Balamu efye.
“Shan oho bugbado n ho aɓezhin yi, kwo kuwa maɓe oho aba ntna esa dnayi, ma sunkun n ɓai n ebeyakwo emi egbe nyai.

“Fa oza nwo wo atnubua ɓo wa wo oɓo n Zafun gna a ikklisiya. Oza nwa gyi nasara, wo ɓa gyi n manna n kwo so shinyi. Asiri lafiya ganya n kwo soshi n eshe mi nyi, ma ga zaho-zahoi kuta buyi, n kuta yi mi ɓei ka eye tu n zahota kpe kwo yen, sai: oza n wa bwa kwo.”
Ka wasikaye ga ikklisiya tukwoda n Tiyatara: “Tnu-tnuye gmi n Shekwoyi Nugun abanu, n wo awye gye wyeba ngye ena nyintala nyi, nwo apita wu ngye sinkna byei nagyi yi.

“Mi kpeho atnu-tnu amanayi yelo. Oho bmazhin n na awyekwoi aba. Oho cauta n tnull-tnu yi n ɓa aba, njesun mikpeho, ye-ye yelo, n gaiciya gayi n hankuriyi, mi gye she abye gyilo dna n na aɓeye n ho zhinyi.

“Amma mi n na aɓeyi shilo game n hoyi, Ho fa nyikwozayi Jezebe, n wo yi wohin ge anabi woi wu emi abara nge anagbai to zhin ɓenukwoyi nun, woi ye ena fiɓa nge ɓa zhin cegye tnu-tnu, nge ɓagyi enya n na ala zunsha ga ashan.
Ma gawo esa nge wo shan owo bugba do n wo aɓe zhin-zhin yi
Gye ho anuwan n eɓei n mi danyi, mi ɓa wan wo gye tu n gado n nyasan nukwoi, ngnisun n wo aviyi, akpe ɓa pmi ɓe dami njesun, ɓa ye abwi alaifi n ɓaku zhin n woi nyi.
Mi ɓa wu wo aɓi eklisiya vinya ɓa kpe ge emi nu dna aza abugba wye n ɓa anubo-zhinya, miɓa ga zaho-zahoi n fye mi nya n kwo kunce.
“Ofye nfye ce fi n Tiyatara nyi, fyei to vi ababwi ye pyanyin, (a gaiciya loloyi, shiɓa yiɓa nwu, ama shetan aɓo aloloyi nu) mita shan-fye ɓeho nyan fye ku enya shi n kalai nfye cei, kafin mi ɓe.
“Oza-n wa gyi nasara, wa zhin oɓo n kwo dami har nyipyei kmaknayi, miɓa ga wo iko tu n na akni tukwo.
Wo ɓei gyi ebe tu n ɓa tukwo n sinknanya bwai, shi emi dada gami iko tu n ɓa tukwo, aɓei ɓa ɓaya ngye shakun, n na ɓakwo ya wyiwo-wyiwo nyi.
Miɓa gawo kpasu labminya!
“Fa ozaho-zahoyi nwo wo atnubua ɓo, wa wo oɓo n Zafun gna a ikklisiya.”

Zuwa ikklisiya tukwoda n Sardisu: Tnu-tnuye gmi n oza aba nu nwo n na Zafun Shekwoyi nyai n gun tnabai shi, n na a kpasu yi n gun tnaba. Mi kpe hoye lo n ge ikklisiya wye-wyeyi n tnutnu-zhinyi, amma ho fifi yilo.
Nsaiye kun agyewyi la enya n kwo ce gnilo nyi kwo la gafi. Oho atnutnu mwakpalo n ɓemanayi n Shekwoyi awyeba.
Jeze lo da enya n ho ɓei wo ha ga gaiciya n kmisunyi, la kwo shi deidei ha jeze ɓe da mi n jesun, mi ɓa, ɓe daho n tna esa dnai ngye evi, ma taho.
“E, har nsai ye azaho n Sardisu ɓato gmi oɓa aje amwi n anyi cegye yi n, ɓa ɓa zan-zan n mi yi n na aje abuyi ntuge ɓa kunce lo.
Ozahozahoyi n wa gyi nasara, aɓei kpewo aje abuyi, mi to ɓei wun owo eye ya n Littafi wye-wyeyi nyan, amma mi ɓei zhin wo se-ida n emi Dada abye n wo a malaikayi nge wo zhin emi nya nu.
Fa aza vinya n ɓa wo atnubua ɓo ɓa wo oɓo n Zafun gna a ikklisiya.

“Ka wasikaye ge tukwoda nwo dna n eklisiya n Filadalfiya nyi: ‘Tnu-tnu ye nkwo nyi oza n wo Gyi-gyi-yi, n gaiciya yi n Dawuda makuliyi shi, wa gu enya ya n zaho ta mi n gun, wa gu enya n zaho ta mi n guyan, wonu na tnu.’
“Mikpeho yelo sarai, hoto n kalayi lon, ama hoku kukari zhin ha zhin oɓo n mi da, hoi to na emi eye aɓon, Ntucenu mila abokun-mi guho ya n zaho ta gun.
“Wo ga, miɓa tu azayi tile n ɓa ce shetan zokwo gwolo ɓai gwo gna ge ɓa zhin emi nya nu nyi (amma ɓato zhin emi anya nun – ɓace akatanu,) ɓa ya zhi n ho a pita ba ɓakpe nge oho nu zhin oza n mi ye.
“Ntuge hoku ɓo vi n hakuriyi ko da yace ho sin wahala lo ntucenu mi ɓa guho n wahala yakwo esa n jarabai nkwo ɓaɓe n na anyi tukwo a mwi zaho-zahoi gye n wo n wyewyeyi.
Shi wye, mi ɓelo esa fyewyi, kushi dei-dei enya nho n cei lo n hakalayi n na bai n zaho ta gwoho oho rawanin.
“Oza n wa gyi nasara, miɓa ze wo jigo n mi Shekwoyi yakun, nyaho ta bwawon wo ta shagmin nyalo-nyalo miɓa ka emi Shekwoyi eye tu n wo, wa ze ekni ɓi n emi Shekwoyi aba. Woɓei bwa emi eye n katu n wo.
“Fa oza n wo n na atnubuai wa wo oɓo n Zafun gna a Ikklisiya.”

Ka wasikaye ga ikklisiya tukwoda n Lawudikiya: “Tnu-tnuye gmi n oza aba nu n wo gni agni n kalayi, Seida zhinyi egbe nuyi, gaiciya dayi (n na anya vinya nɓa nyi, kwo ɓei nyi, kwo n kwoye ɓeɓe lo) Shekwoyi nyazhin yi kmisunyi.
“Mi kpe hoyelo sarai, hoto pyena lon, hoi to fu-fui lon. Awo mi pwa ngye ho ye gunna lo kwo n fufuyi.
Amma shi ho wolo bwala-bwala n u nyi, mi ɓa kunho ya n emi egbe.
‘Ha cige, ʼmin nyabwayilo, n na anya, vinya n mi n cei pma.’ Hota kpelo ge dna n Zafun ho zhin wyekwoyi nu, enya sun-sun nyan, wyebuai, bwotoloi n.

“Omi shaula nho aba okwonu ha si zinariya hin-hin n mi, n na alakwo pmiaya n ena yi, nsayi nu nho ɓa ze nyabwayi, hi-hin, Hasi n mi, a je abui n gyi-gyi-yi, n nabai n hota gni n bwotolo yin, n vinyikwo yin, ha bwa shigbe n mi kwa kaho awyesan gna, kwa jeze ɓeho n wyeba gyei.
Mi zhin ma ta ozaho-zho yi nmi ye, ntu ce nu nɓa ta ho, akpe ha je ze n ɓenukwoyi zokwo, ha zan aɓo shin nɓa zhin Shekwoyi nya.
“Shiwye esa la mi sun gni n na abokun mi, mi-i lu, oza-ho-zaho-yi n wa wo mi yiwo wa gu abaya, mi ɓa ɓe dawo ya zhin zumunta n woi, owo n miyi.
Mi ɓa ye zaho-zahoi n wa gyi nasara wa sasetu n miyi n mi akujara-ebenya shi mi ɓei sase tu n gnisun n mi Dada nyi n mi ɓei gyi nasara nyi.
Fa zaho-zahoyi n wo wo atnubua ɓo wa wo oɓo n Zafun gna a eklisiya.”
A Shi mi ɓei shi awye ma gye abokunmi n guya gni n she, mawo begye n mi ɓei shinwo nyi, kwo ɓei wo n gye abye knaknaci yakwo, kwa daɓo n miyi kwa ci ge, “Ɓe ya ma wu ho aɓo nɓa ɓa zhin n na abye.”
Nsayi-sayi, mi dna n zafun, n ɓo n eshe ma gye, okwo mwa-mwa, esushikpe-gye n zahoi sasetu nkwo.
Ena buzangna yakwo ɓei kun n owo n gye ɓa kun n diamond na bmiya yi, n Shanyin-pmana yi kwoi bmiyana n shewo shinkpegye gun.
Esu ashinkpegye a ɓiyi n gun shiba cei anyi n she Esu Shinkpegye dnagmayi gun, n na atukwodai ʼshiba-cei-anyi n sase kpe n ɓa, n na ajei kpe n bui-bui n rawani zinariya nya yi wan n ɓa tukwo.
O gma-na bmiya n ogma-wyisai ɓei kun n wo Shinkpegye, a begye ɓei fi n ogmawyisai. Nwo shikpegye abye, afitila n gun tnaba n wan enazhi, ɓa zhin misali Zafun ngun tnaba Shekwoyi anya.
N nuwan yakwoyi n wu ngye cristal kwoyi kun n shinkpegye-esu nya. Anya awye-wyeyi n gun anyi n zhi n wo shinkpegye aba, n na aba ngun anyi, ɓai ɓe n na awyei, avun n abye yi.
Nya wye-wyeyi kmisunyi ɓei wu ngye gaba, bayi ɓei wu n gye nakwo ɓiyi, tayi ɓei n na awyebai n gye gbagyiza. Nyiyi n wu n gye zunkwo n na abminai laya ngye kwo gye afu.

Doho-dohoi n na anya a wye-wyeyi ye n na abminai gyi ngun tnanyi, oɓa abmina atasinya n fuya n na awyei, sukwo n nyipyei ɓai ci ge Gyi-gyi-yi, gyi-gyi-yi, gyi-gyi-yi Dagayi Shekwoyi ikoda, oza n wo ɓei nyi, n wo lo, owoi nu zhin ɓeɓeyi.
Esa n na Anya a wye-wyeyi a ga mwa-mwa, latu n godiyai n oza aba nwo tu n esu-shinkpegye, n wo n wye-wyeyi nyalo-nyalo nyi.
A tukwoda shiba cei anyi ye, ɓa miya zhi n wo abye ɓa gawo mwa-mwa, wye-wyeida nyalo-nyalo nya ɓa ya oɓa a rawani zhi n wo abye, ɓai kwo anyi ɓai cige.
O, Dagayi ho k uncelo ha gwo mwa-mwa n latuyi n ikoyi, gama ohonu na zhin anya vinya. Aɓei zhin ɓa ɓa bwa wye-wyeyi dna n ho ɓeye nu.
Ma gye takarda n kmishi n za bwaizhe nwo sase tu n esul shinkpegye nyi, takarda n kmishi nya yi kafi n mi n ebmi yi, n cei gugui n na hatimiyi ngun tnaba.
Malaʼika kalada wa sawyi n begye lyakwoyi wa nyaɓo ge, “Nyikado nu kuncelo wa sa hatumi ye ya n takarda kmi-kmiyi, wa lokwoya?”
Ama to a bwa zaknayi n eshemi vinya, kwo dna n na anyi n wo kuncen, kwo dna n na a zafi n woɓa gu kwoya wa ba kwon.
Ma ci bwi n bugba wunyi, ntuge zaho to lo n bwaho nwo kuncen wa gnayi oɓo n kwo kafin.

Ama zaknayi n na a Tukwoda shiba cei anyi yi, wa gna mi ge, “Mila bwi fa gama gyewye! Gaba Yahuda ebye nya, Dawuda Gbegye, nku nasara gyi, woi ku wu ngye wo kun celo wa gu takarda kmi-kmiyi ye ya, wa bma kwo a hatimi tnabaye ya.”

Ma shi awye magye, Kugya n gni-agni-gni n a tukwoda shiba cei anyi yi abye, n esu shinkpegye n a nya awye-wyeyi abye, kugya yi n na acigusai kpe n ɓa ɓei wu wo n sadohoi. Wo n na amwai tnaba, n na awyeyi tnaba, n ɓa zhin misali n na Zafun ngun tnabai Shekwoyi anya, n na tnu n cei n sepa dohodohoyi n na anyi.
Wa lakala ɓe abye wa gwo takarda kmi-kmiyi n za akun n wo ɓei sase tu n esu-shinkpegye nyi.
Shi wo ɓei gwo takarda kmi-kmiyi a tukwoda shiba cei anyi ho, ɓa yazhi n kugya yi abye, zaho-zahoi n ɓa mi n molo yi shi n Zinariya papai n tulare yifi, Shekwoyi aza aduwa.
Ɓa kwo anyi woi ge, “ho kuncelo I hala takarda kmi-kmiyi. Ha lo hatimi ya ha gu kwo ya. Gama aɓei la ho zun sha, oho ami n la aza si gaho n na abye vinya, ngye nyaga ntu n Shekwoyi ɓo.
Hoi la ɓa yezhi n ebemi, hoi ku ɓa ze a pristi ieyi Shekwoyi anya, ɓa ɓei gyi ebe tu n na anyi tukwo.”
Dna n mi ɓewyegye, mawo amalaika n mwa-begye n na wye! Wyeyi dayi n na Tukwodayi, ɓai kwo anyi.
“Kugya n na aɓei zunsha. Wo kuncelo wa gwo iko, n kalai, n latuyi, n mwa-mwai n anabarka yi.

“Nna vun mawo aza vinya n eshe nanyi yi, n na a zafiyi n ekni mi, n na anuwan yakwoyi ɓai gna, Anabarka, n mwa-mwai, n latu yi, n ikoi, zhin oza nya nu n wo sase tu n esu-shinkpegye nyi, n kugyai nyalonyaloi.”
Awye-wyeyi da ɓai ci ge, Amin. A tukwodayi shiba cei anyi ɓai yazhi nwo abye ɓai ga wo mwamwa.
Shi mi ɓei shi awye, ma gye kugyai lo hatimiyi kmisunyi ya. Wa ya takarda kmikmiyi leya, zaknayi n na awye-wyeyi da n gun anyi yi mi. Wa sa ewyi n begye yi wo ngye ogma wyisa, wa ci ge, “Ɓe.”
Ma shi awye magye dokwo buyi gni n mi abye, okwo gunyi n taishi, n rawani yi wan n owo tukwo, wa gun wa gmiyalo, wo sun a kun, woi gyi nasara n akun yi mwa begye.
Nna vun wa lo hatimi bayi takarda kmi-kmiyi nya ya, wa lokwoya. Mawo wye-wyeyi da bayi woi cige, “Be.”
Nsa deye dokwo byei nu ɓei gmi ɓe. Aga kwo gunyi ebe yakwo n mwakpa, n ikoi wa bugbafu n na anyi la ya wa ɓe n bugba zhiyi, okun n azawuyi ɓa cepwo n na aba vinya.
Esa nwo ɓei la hatimi tayi ɓaya mawo wye-wyeyi da tayi woi ci ge “Be.” Ma gye Dokwo zhiyi, okwo gunyi n na anya mwiyai shi n owo akun.
Begye kwa gmi n na awyewyeyi dayi mi kwa ci ge, “Bredi sule gmanyi nu, mudu ngun ata barley nya sule gmanyi nu, amma olive emi n anab-nuwan yi to lon.”
She aɓei lo hatimi nyiyi ya, mawo wye-wyeyi da nyiyi woi gna, “Be.”

Nsa deye ma gye dokwo sawyi-sawyi yi, okwo gunyi eye efinu, n dokwo doi viwo n na avun ai yi ge Anapi a gaɓa ikwo tu n na anyi sopa ngun anyi wa wu n okunyi, n mikun yi, n nyasan yi n na anya fwanyai.
Shiwo ɓei lo hatimi tnuyi ya, ma gye bagadi, n kwo sinta magye awye-wyeyi azanya n na ɓei wu ɓa ntu Shekwoyi Ɓeda waʼazi zhin ɓo, ntu n oɓa gbenu ɓo dna n seida zhin.

Ɓai yi Dagayi n begye kalayi ɓai gna, “O Dagayi ikoda vinya, gyi-gyi-yi, gaiciya da, ho ɓei da anyi da owa n kni wyiyi nu, tu aɓo tukwo n ɓa ɓei zhin yi nyiʼa? Ho gba efi ami ta ga yi n kniwyi yiʼa, n na aza n ɓa fi n anyi nyiʼa?”
Aga zahozahoi n ɓami aje abui-bui, a gna ɓa ge, ɓa sun esa fyewyi, sai aku oɓa azaje wu n anyi, nɓa zhin Yesu afyenu nyi, ɓa ku ɓe da ɓa.
Ma shi awye shi wo lo hatimi tnanyi yi ya, ekni kwa shan-shan n mwa, nyipyeyi kwa dna wyegma zhiyi, ngye eje zhiyi, epya kwa wu n byei-byei ngye ami.
Nsai akpasu n eshe ɓawu ngye ɓa kaya n gye shi ese yakwo zhin kwa, ka gbayi tna ɓiyi ya nyi.
Eshe bmana kwa duya ngye a kmi pece, Epe doho-doho n na museyi vinya ɓa shan-shan ɓa cetala.
Asu vinya n na anyi, n na a tukwoda yi, n na anyabwayi, n na aza yakwoi n soja, n na azayi vinya, a yakwo n na aɓiyi, a fyenu n na dagayi, ɓa so ɓahin fi n na a kuta bmi n na ape bmi yi,
Ɓai ci bwi kpe ape ge ɓa wu ɓa, ɓai gyiwye ɓai ci ge, “Kaya kpe yi, fya soyi n oza awyeba nwo tu n esu-shinkpegye nyi, n kugya minagyi yi.
Ntuge nyipyeyi yakwo oɓa minagyi nya n la ɓe, nyikadonu ɓa pwo kwoʼa?”
Ma gye a Malaika ngun anyi n gni agni zhin n anyi abwakwonu n gun anyi, ɓai hana n esei ge kwo to cin n na anyi, n na bai kwo fintolo ta shan-shan, a nuwanyi to ɓei ci aɓon, ɓa ku wo pi-pi-pi.
Ma gye malaika do woi gmi n nyipyeyi kpe bwa, n Hatimi Yakwo Shekwoyi wye-wyeyi danya yi shi. Wa sawyi dna a malaika yi ngun anyi n na ɓei gaba iko ɓa ga anyi n na anuwan yakwoi nyasan nyi.
“Lakmi, to zhin nyaho kpan, to ga ekni, kwo anuwan yakwo, kwo a shinwan nyasa, sai yila Shekwoyi Hatimi tu n wo abara nyikunmi.”
Aza ngun a kniyi nu ɓei bwa hatimi yeʼa? Mawo oɓa begye, 144,000 n Israila abye awo cei aba vinya.
Yahuda 12,000 dubu awocei aba,
Reuben 12,000 dubu awocei aba,
Gad 12,000 dubu awocei aba,
Asher 12,000 dubu awocei aba,
Naftali 12,000 dubu awocei aba,
Manase 12,000 dubu awocei aba,
Simeon 12,000 dubu awocei aba,
Lawi 12,000 dubu awocei aba,
Issakari 12,000 dubu awocei aba,
Zebulun 12,000 dubu awocei aba,
Yusufu 12,000 awocei aba,
Banyami 12,000 dubu awocei aba.
Ndeye avun ma gye aza begye, n na ata mi aba ɓan n na abye vinya, n akniyi, n na nyitalai n gni agni zhin n esu-shinkpegye abye n kugyai, n na aje buyi kpe, n na a zunyi bwala yi shi n ɓa akun.
Ɓai sa ewyi n kalai, “Gni-gni gmi n eyi Shekwoyi abanu n wo tu n esu shinkpegye nyi n kugyayi.”
Nsai amalaika vinya ɓa yezhi ɓai shegun esu-shinkpegye n na a tukwodayi n awye-wyeyi dayi ɓai yazhi ɓai ga Shekwoyi mwa-mwa.
Ɓai ci ge, “Amin, anabarka, mwa-mwa, ɓeyekpe, godiya, latu, Ikoyi, n kalayi zhin eyi Shekwoyi nyanu Nyalo-nyalo. Amin.”
Nnavun zaknayi n na a Tukwodayi shiba cei anyi ho, wa nyami ge, “Ho kpe azayelo nɓanyi nɓa n na aje bui kpenyi, n na abai nɓa kun?”
Maci ge, Awo, Shekwo Mwasa, mi gyiho wye, ha gnami. “Aza nyi n ɓa kun n wahala Dnagmayi, ɓala oɓa aje zhanya n bui-bui fi n kugya ami.
Cenu zhin ɓai zhi n Shekwoyi Esu-shinkpegye abye, ɓai zhinwo tnu-tnu n sukwoyi n nyipye dna n wo aduwa-nyakun. Oza nwo sasetu n Esu-shinkpeye nyi woɓa tuɓa ofun.
Mikun ta shan ɓa gun, kwo nuwan mikun, nyipyeyi ta shan ɓa won.
Gama kugya n wo gni n esushinkpegye abye nyi, wo ɓa gaɓa nyagyi, wa knaɓa wa lo nɓai n Nuwan wye-wyeyi nya aba. Shekwoyi ɓa wunɓa awyenyi ya vinya.”
Esa n kugya ɓei lo hatimi tnabai ya, aku ce pi fi n eshe mi ngye minti shita.
Ma gye amalaika tnaba nɓa zhi Shekwoyi abye nyi, a ga ɓa a mwayi ngun tnaba.
Nnavun malaika nwo n Zinariya shapai shinyi wa ɓe wa gni n bagadi I aba a gawo a tulare ge wa gmi kwo aje n Shekwoyi aza aduwa yi, wa ze kpe n bagadi zinariya nya n esushinkpegye abye.
Tulare yiho ashin kwo ɓedo n Shekwoyi aza wyegyi yi nyi, kwa gunlo Shekwoyi aba daga bagadi aba n malaika ɓei zekwoya kpe.
Nna vun malaika wa ce ena n bagadi wa fi kwo n shanpa wa zekwoya kpe n anyi ogma bmiya, anyi ɓa shan-shan.
Nnavun, amalaika ngun tnaba n ɓa n na a mwayi tnabai shinyi ɓa zhin shiri ɓa bye a mwayi.
Malaika kmisunyi wa bye owo mwayi aze agma-kuta ya n enayi, n gmi aje n amiyi fi n anyi. Anyi ajegna ngun ata. Kwa gwo ena shinwan ajegna ngun ata ena gyi ɓa n na agbe-gbe putuyi vinya.
Malaika bayi wa bye wo mwayi, a she nyaho ya dna n ela ngye epe yakwo nagyiyi, kwa wun aya nuwan ajegna ngun ata ya, ela ajegna ngun ata kwa wu ngye ami, awyesala ajegna ngun ata ɓafi.
Malaika tayi wa bye mwayi Kpasu yakwo nagyi yi kwa kaya n eshe tu anuwan n adnayi ajegna ngun ata.
Ayi kpasuyi ge, “Bedobedoyi,” ntuge kwo ɓei fi emwi a nuwan ajegna ngun ata, aza n mwa begye ɓafi.
Malaika nyiyi wa bye owo mwai, n sai-sai yi, nyipyeyi ajegna ngun ata kwa dnawye-gma n epya yi n na akpasu ajegnayi ngun ata, n na abai nyipyei a dna wyegma sukwo kwa gna wyegma dna-dna.

Shi mi ɓei shi awye magye zunkwo, nkwo gmanyi n na anyi bmana, kwoi sa ewyi n begye kalai ge, “owyi-owyi, owyi n na aza aba nɓa fi n na anyi nyin, ntu a na aɓo a nukwoyi ɓo n ɓa ɓelo esa fyewyi nyi, esa n na amalaika ngun ata-ka ɓa amwayi bye n ɓa cenyi.”
N navun malaika tnuyi wa bye owo mwayi, ma gye oza woi kaya n eshe dna n na anyi a gawo makuli obwo dnagmayi tna cei nya.
