Shiwo ɓei gu kwoya, awu ɓa kun ya ngye apinagyi yakwo ho, nyipyeyi n eseyi ɓa dna wyegma ntu n awui ɓo.
Aɓo ɓa kun ɓe n awu yi a ga ɓa iko ɓa kni aza ngye anapisi.
A gna ɓa ge ɓato kni agbe-gben, kwo shinwan doho-dohoyin, amma ɓa kni aza nɓa to n Shekwoyi hatimi yi tulo n ɓa nyikunmin.
Ato ɓei ye ge ɓa wu ɓan, amma ɓa wuɓa anyi apya ngun atnu shi napisin san n wu nyi.
Dna anyipyeyihi mi, aza ɓei zhin atna ɓa wu ɓahin, ama ɓato ɓei min efi to ɓei ɓen. Ɓa ɓei ye ɓa fi, amma efi ɓo la busi.
Aɓo hi ɓo wu ngye a dokwo n na zhin-zhinyi n gye ɓa lo kun, N na anya hoi kpe n ɓa tukwo n gye rawani zinariya nya, oɓa awyeba wu ngye aza nyikwoci nya.
Oɓa oyi n mwakpa ngye anyi-kwoza nya, oɓa anyikna n wu ngye a gaba nya.
Ɓa n na akpata yi shi ngye asunkna, oɓa abmina yi ci aɓo ngye a karusa kunsun nya lo okun.
Ɓa n na a zhin-zhin yi gyi ngye anapisi n ɓa sesiyi, oɓa kala ɓa ce oza apya ngun atnu fi n ɓa sesi yi nu.
Oɓa esu nu zhin Esu obwo tnacei nya n na yiwo Ibranaciyi nge, Abaddon, n Helenanciyi Apollyo n, (n Nasara gbei Nyawunya yi.)
Azhin gmanyi nku zo nu, acelo n gun aba.
Malaika tnanyi yi wa bye owo mwayi, ma wo begye kwoi daɓo n na amwayi ngun anyi n ɓa gyi n bagadi zinariya nya n kwo gmi n Shekwoyi esu-shinkpegye abye nyin.
Woi gna malaika tnayi yi, “Lo aljanu yakwoya n gun anyi n na ɓai pa kpe n ola yakwo Affaratis nyi.”
Aɓei zhin shiri zhi ntu n eye ye ɓo nu, n epya yi n nyipyeyi n esayi. Nsai ye, a loɓaya ɓa wu azanyi kwoci ajegna ngun ata nu anyi.
Ɓa ye a soja zhi miliyan tagyi n gun aba, (200,000,000) mi ɓei ku wo shi ɓaɓei nyi n sun.

Magye oɓa adokwo ɓai gnami, dna n mi begye, oɓa gunyi n na akpata byei shi adoho wu ngye anyi – a doho wu ngye bmina-bmina, ena n adokwo tukwo nwu ngye agaba nya, awu n ena yi, n sulfa nagyi ɓai kun n ɓa egbe, ɓa wu aza ajegna gun ata vinya.
Oɓa iko efi nya to ɓei nyi n ɓa egbe nu gmanyin, ama n ɓa sesiyi, gama oɓa asesi yi ɓei wu ngye awa tukwo nu kpewu, kwoi sa aza har efi.

Amma aza nɓa ɓei ce zhin n wye-wyeyi n nato wuɓa n nɓa anyasan dna-gmai yin, to ɓa ye ɓa ga Shekwoyi mwa-mwan. To ɓa na alijanu bauta zhin ɓon, kwo oɓa ashan n ɓa zhin n zinariya yi n azurfa yin, n sinkna byei, n na akutayi, n na ashinwan yin, n ɓa ta mi n zan-zan kwo ɓa daɓon.
To ɓa shan oɓa bugba do tu nɓa azokwo azawu nya, n aguzhenyi yi, anagbai n aviwyi yin.
Nnavun ma gye malaika yakwo woi kashi n eshe, enyi yi Shegunwo, n Shanyi-pmanayi shegun n wo tukwo, owo awyeba ɓai bmana n gye nyipyeyi, owo apita ɓai gwo ena.
Wo ɓei n takarda ɓiyi shi n kmi-kmiyi, wa tu owo pita bwaizhe nya n ola, wa tu owo pita bwai-pmi nya n anyi,
Wa sa wyi n kalayi ngye gaba bwi-ogma sawyi har abwa ngun tnaba.
Esa n mi ɓei ye maka enya n ogma wyisayia da, mawo begye n eshe kwoi yi mi n ge, “To ka kwon”, Ata wu oɓa aɓeda ebmin.
Malaika dnagmayi n wo gni agni-gni tu n nuwan n ekni yi nyi, wa la wo bwaizhe bwa wu n she.
Wa si nyasi, n ozai n wo n wyewyeyi nyalo-nyalo n wo ɓei zhin eshe n nyai n kwo dna n kwo nyin, n anyi yi n anya yi n ɓa fi n kwo vinya, n ola yi anyayi n ɓa fi kwo vinya, “Nge ato shan esa wun-yan.
Ama shi malaika tnabayi ɓei bye mwayi, n sayinu n Shekwoyi shiri-n kwo ɓei so shi tunyi n sapai kafin owo a bara anabi ɓei da kwo, kwo ɓa nu.”
Njesun begye kwa gmi n eshe kwa daɓo n mi yi kwa cige, “Lo ho gwo takarda kmi-kmi yi n malaika dnagmayi akun, nwo gni a gni tu n nuwan n ekni yi nyi.”
Malo owo aba wa gami takarda yi. Wa gna mi ge, “E, gwo kwo ha gyi kwo.” “Nkmisun yi kwo ɓa wo ngye osunu, amma esa n hami kwo, kwo ɓa pmiho nubo.”
Ma gwo kwo n wo akun, shiwo ɓei gnami, kwo ɓei da n mi egbe, ama kwa pmi mi nubo esa n mi ɓei mikwo n cei.
Nnavun wa gnami, “Tile ha ye zhin anabci ɓe n na aza tukwo n mwa begye, n na akniyi, n abyeyi, n na asuyi.”
A gami busi nyamwi nya, a gnami ge milo mi mwi aduwa nyakun, wato Shekwoyi nyakun. “N nyakun omi nya yi n bagadi dnanyi, ma ba a sujada zhinyi.
Ama a gnami ge ato mwi akpeda ebmi nyan. Gama ala kwo ga abye do. Ɓa ɓei dna ezhi gyi-gyi-yi har apya shinyi-cei-aba.
Mi ɓei ga emi aseida-da ngun aba ɓa zhin anabci, anyipyei, dubu gmanyi n tagyi yi ngun aba n cei kpe shi tnanyi. (1,260) n na aje sakunyi kpe.”
Anabi ngun aba ye nu zhin a zaitun ashinwan ngun aba, nna kandle busiyi ngun aba nɓa gni agni zhi n Shekwoyi anyi vinya nya abye nyi.
Oza n wa zhin atna wa wuba, ena ɓa kun n ɓa egbe kwa wu wo.
Ɓa n ikoyilo ɓa gu eshe to ogma zhin har aye ngun ata n tokunyi (3.5) shi ɓa ɓei zhin anabci. A pmi, ara n na anuwan yakwoyi ɓa ze ami, ɓa tnu n na anyasan a dnagmayi cici shi ɓa n cei pma.
Esa n ɓa ɓei ku zo n ba seida yi aye ngun ata n tokunyi, oza nukwoyi n wo gmiɓe n obwotnanceyi nyi, wo ɓei ya okun n ɓayi, woi gyi nasara n ɓa tukwo woi wuɓa.

Oɓa anayi ɓei yakpe n Urushelima azokwo yakwo har anyipyeyi ngun ata n tokunyi (deidei nu n na yikwo ge Sodon kwo Masar) aba n na aɓei zun ɓa Dagayi dunyi. Ato ɓei ye ge zaho-zahoi wo bi ɓan, aza n mwa begye n na akni do, n ɓa ɓei ɓe ɓai gye ɓa nayi.
Aɓei sun n na anyi vinya, aɓei da aza n na ba vinya ɓai zhin aje cauta, ɓai yi aje ɓa yezhi ɓai dagma n tu n na anabi n gun abaye efi ɓo, gama ɓaku wahala gaɓa n mwa.
Ama n anyipyeyi ngun ata n tokunyi avun, Zafun wye-wyeyi nya n kwo gmi n Shekwoyi aba nyi, kwo ɓei lo ɓa mi, ɓa kuka zhin n na agni aza ɓai wo edna n mwa.
N avun begye yakwo ɓei sawyi n eshe, nge, “Gunzhi ɓe,” ɓai kukala gun eshe oɓa nuwunyi gye.
N esa gmanyi-i, anyi ɓei shan-shan ɓai wu ezhi yi ajegna ngun awo, kwoi wu aza dubu tnaba (7,000), n na vun aza nɓa ce zhi n wye-wyeyi ɓa ɓei wodna n mwa, ɓa ga Shekwoyi mwa-mwa, n wo dna n Eshe nyi.
Owyi, bayi nla duya, ama tayi to shan zegnin.
Gama n sayi nu n malaika tnabayi ɓei bye mwayi abegye yakwo ɓai da ɓo n eshe, nge, “Ebe anyi nya nsai ye zhin, eyi Dagayi nyanu n wo Kristi yi wa gyi ebe nyalo-nyalo.”
A tukwoda shiba cei anyi nɓa sase kpe n ashinkpegye-esu nya n Shekwoyi abye nyi, ɓa yazhi ɓa ga wo mwa-mwa ɓai gna.
Yi zhin godiya, Dagayi Shekwoyi ikoda nwo nyi, n wo ɓei nyi, nsaye ho la ya ɓebegyi, n ho iko yakwo yi.

Akni vinya ɓa gyi minagyi n hoi, ama oho esa nyi n ho ɓa gyi minagyi nɓai, esa la si n ho ɓa da azafi owa, ha ga oho abara lada anabi n na azajei nɓa wo ho Eye dna, – dnagmayi n nawyi yi vinya, wa wu aza n ɓa ɓe n bwi-bwi yi n na anyi.
N navum dna n eshe, a gu Shekwoyi aduwa nyakun ya, n na ɓa gyewo akwati alkawali nya. Ogma bmiya, kwoi sawyi agmakuta yakwoi ɓe, anyi ɓa shan-shan n asha-sha dnagmayi.
A gye oɓo wo-woyi n eshe n kwo wu aɓo n ɓa ɓa zhin, Magye nyikwoza n nyipyeyi kpe, n epyai zhi n wo apita sinta, n na a kpasu rawani yi kun ngun awo cei aba. N wo tukwo.
Woi gni n nuboi woi fi aku, nyasan kagna nyai sanwo, woi pmi owo kagna.
Esa fyewyei Dragon byei-byei kwa gmiɓe n na tukwo yi gyi ngun tnaba, n na amwayi gyi ngun awo, n na a rawani yi kun n kwo atukwo agun tnaba.
Owo sesi kwa gni akpasu ajegna ngun ata wa yaɓa fi n anyi, wa gni agni n nyikwozayi abye, woi laga oɓi ma, n shiri yi zhin wa gyi oɓi yi n sahoi-sahoi n na mawo n cei.
Wa ma oɓi nugbayi n wo ɓa gyi ebe tu n na aza tukwo vinya, n ebwa kalayi a cewo pa, ga Shekwoyi n wo esu-shinkpegye yi.
Nyikwoza yi wa busi lo bmana, aba n Shekwoyi n cei zhiwo, wa shiwo bwa har anyi-pyeyi dubu gmanyi n tagyi gun aba n cei kpe shi tnanyi (1,260).
Asun okun n eshemi, Mikaʼilu n na a malaikayi nɓa fi n owo sinta ɓa sun kun n Dragon yi n wo amalaika anukwoyi.
A gyi Dragon n okun yi, a nyawo ya n eshemi.
Dragon yakwoye, owa kwo-kwoi n na yiwo Guzhenyi n satan yi nyi, n wo dna anyi vinya kwoce nyi, a shewo ya dna n anyi ɓedo n wo amalaika yi.

Navun, mawo begye kwoi sawyi dna n eshe, kwo-ku kma zhin, “Shekwoyi gni-gni, n ikoi, n ebei, n fukunci Kristi nyayi la ɓe n ya, gama owo n wo zhin ɓa sara n Shekwoyi abye n sukwoyi n nyipyeyi, alawo sheya dna n anyi.
Ɓa gyi nasara n wo tukwo n kugya ami yi nu, n ɓa seidayi gama ɓato ye ɓa wye-wyeyi m, ɓa gakwo ntu wo ɓo.
Fye dagma o, eshemi, ofye n fye zhin eshe aɓinyi. Ama aiya n fye aba aza nfye fi n anyi nyi, gama shetan n la ɓe dafye n minagyi yakwoi, Ntuge wo kpelo owo esa to ye kun lon.”
Esa n shetan ɓei gye alawo sheya dna n anyi, wa nya nyikwozayi n wa ma oɓi nyi.
Ama a gawo a bwase n gun aba ngye zunkwo, wa gye afu lo bmana, aba n na cei zhin gni wo, aba n na ɓei shiwo bwa, ai guwo n owayi, Dragon, aye ngun ata n tokunyi.
Nuwan yakwo kwa kun n owa yi egbe, kwa zhe yalo nge kwo wan nyikwozayi, n na abai kwa wu wo.
Ama ekni kwa bma wo zhin kwa lo egbeya kwa sin nuwan yakwoyi.
Nnavun Dragon kwa gyiminagyi kwa nya owo aɓi-aje vinya n ɓa vi Shekwoyi owa ɓai gna ɓa zhin Yesu anya nu. Wa gni woi pmi n ola gbe.

Ma gye nyawan-nyawan ho kwoi gmi ɓe n nuwan-yakwo, n Ina aye awyebwo nyayi kakpe n amwayi ngun awo n a rawani n gun awoyi kun n kwo amwayi ngun awo, N na bara kugya nya aye yi kakpe n kwo atukwo doho-dohoi n ɓa mi kwoi sa Shekwoyi ye n cegyei n na akmiyi.
Nyawan-nyawanye wu ngye nakmi, ama n apitai wu ngye bear nya, n gaba, egbe yi gyi, Dragon kwa gawo wo iko, n esushinkpegye yi, n begyi dnagmayi.
Ma gye owo tukwo gmanyi n ciyitu, nkwo ta shan ɓin, ama, eciyi ho kwa ɓi. Ceʼa wo anyi vinya ntu n wo a tnu-tnu awo-woi ɓo n wo zhin nyi aza ɓa vi Nyawan-nyawan yi n dnai.
Ɓa ga Dragon mwa-mwa, ntuge wa gawo ikoyi pya, ɓai ga nyawan-nyawanyi mwa-mwa, ɓai gna, “Oza lo n kni bwa yi nu ngye owoʼa? Nkado ɓa mi wa sunkun n owo yiʼa?”
Nna vun Dragon ho wa ga nyawan-nyawan kala n ge wo sa Dagayi eye n wyebwoyi, wa gawo iko wa gyi ebe tu n anyi tukwo apya shinyi cei aba.
N sai vinya wa tu Shekwoyi eye cegye n wo aduwa nyakunyi n azayi vinya nɓafi n eshe.
Dragon wa gawo iko wa sunkun n Shekwoyi azayi, wa gyi nasara nɓa tukwo, wa gyi ebe tu n na anyi tukwo vinya, n na abyei vinya, n na anyi.
A zanyikwoci vinya, na ato n ɓa aye yi kafi n kugya wu-wuyi Littafi wye-wyeyi nya kafin anyi zhi san, ɓa ga Nyawan-nyawan nukwoyi mwa-mwa.
Ozaho-zahoyi n wo n na atnubua yi, wo la tnubua kna peceye.
Shekwoyi aza n na ɓai zhi n kurkuku ɓo, aɓei wanɓa, ai lo n ɓai, aza n na n ɓai zhi n efi ɓo aɓei wuɓa, Amma fyeto wo ednan, gama efye sa nyi hankuri nya n bugba kalayi.
Nnavun magye nyafanya ho, kwoyi gmi n ekni, n na amwayi ɓiyi ngun aba, ngye kugya, n begye yakwoi ngye Dragon.
Wa lo tnu-tnu n nyawan-nyawan ikoyi n eci n lawo ɓinyi, n wo ye anyi vinya ɓa ga wo mwa-mwa nyi.
Wo ɓei zhin aɓo wo-woyi, woi zhin ena kwoi kaya ɓe nshe zaho-zahoi woi gye.

Wa zhin aɓo awo-woyi ye wo ɓei mi wa dna aza kwoce n na aba vinya, wo ɓei mi woi zhin aɓo a wowoi ye esa vinya n Nyawan-nyawan kmisunyi gni woi gye wo. Waga aza wyidna n na anyi nge ɓa zhin Nyawan-nyawan kmisunyi dogbe, n na ɓei la wo wu waje lakala nyi.
A gawo izini nge wo ga zazhi-zhinye esun wa zhinkwo kwa da ɓeda. Nnavun nya zhin-zhinye kwa ga wyidna ge oza n wo to ga kwo mwamwan wafi.
Wa ga gbe, dnagmayi n nawyi yi, nyabwayi n sanyi, fyenu n dagayi vinya ge aku eze tu zaho-zahoi n bwaizhe, kwo n nyikunmi.
Zahozahoyi ta bwa tnu-tnu, kwo wa si nyaho-nyahoyi n gni kwoho n tna tuze yin, n kwo nu zhin Nyawan-nyawan yi eye, kwo owo eye tuze.
Oɓo ɓednayi nyi sai oza zhin nubo nu kpa oza kpekwoye. Aza n ɓaɓa mi ɓa zhinkwo awyega okwo nu zhin tnanyi-tnanyi a ku ngun ata (666) wato tagyi tnanyi n cei kpe shi tnanyi cei tnanyi.
Nnavun magye kugya gni agni tu, n Sihiyona epe n gnisun n na azayi dubu tagyi n cei kpe shinyi cei anyi (144,000) nɓa ɓei nwo eye n wo Dada eye yi kakpe n ɓa anyikunmi nyi.
Ma wo kasun kwoi ci she, ngye anuwan yakwo kwo ngye ogma wyisa. Kwaya nu ɓei ko anyi ɓedo n na muloyi.

Kwaya dnagmayi ye-aza dubu tagyi n cei kpe shinyi cei anyi, (144,000) ɓa kwo anyi woi-woyi, n Shekwoyi shinkpegye aba n na anya wye-wyeyi dai ngun anyi, n na tukwo dai shiba cei anyi, zaho to ɓei kpe anyi yen, sai aza dubu tagyi ncei kpe shinyi cei anyi yi ho (144,000). N na gni ɓa n na anyi nyi.
Gama ɓato tucegye lo dna n Zafun n gyigyi yi ngye aɓianyi-kwoyi n nato shin gyewan n ɓai n, ɓai vi kugya aba vinya n walo. Ala ɓa si n na aza mi n na anyi nge hadaya kni-kniyi Shekwoyi nya n Kugyai.
Ata ce akata fi ɓan, ɓato n laifi yi lon.
Magye malaika doho woi gye afu n na anyi bmana, n Nabari manayi shi, wa zhin aza waʼazi ba akni doho-doho, n na abyei, n na anyitalayi.
Woi sawyi woi gna, “Wo Shekwoyi dna, ha lawo mwa: mwa tu, gama esa lasi nwo ɓa sase tu ngye Alkali, ga wo mwa-mwa nwa zhin eshe n na anyi-i nyi, anuwan yakwo n na anyayi vinya nɓa fi n ɓa nyi.”
Malaika doho wa viwo n na avun, n na anyi bmana woi gna, “Babila n la miya, kwola miya, ezhinyakwoyi gama kwo dna akni anyi nya kwoce, kwa dnaɓa asisi ɓo zhin n laifi yi n mwa.”
Malaika tayi wa viɓa woi sawyi nge, “Ozaho-zahoyi n wo ga Nyawan-nyawan mwa-mwa nkwo gmi n nuwanyi, n wo nya zhin-zhin yi, wa gwo owo zetu, nwo nyikunmi kwo obwa.
Tile wa sin nuwan nukwoyi Shekwoyi minagyi nya, azekwo fi n tna buyi Shekwoyi kop minagyi nya, a ɓei gyi ɓa ena n sulfa yi, n wo amalaika gyi-gyi-yi abye n kugya yi.
Awu oɓa azhinya ɓa gun lo eshe nyalo-nyalo, ɓato ɓei shan sun n sukwoyi n nyipyeyi-gama ɓa ga Nyawan-nyawan mwa-mwa n wo nya zhin-zhin yi, ɓai la owo eye tuze gwo.”
Fa deye kwa ga Shekwoyi aza kala, ɓa zhin hakuri dna n wahala doho-dohoyi n nazhinyi, gama aza n ɓa mi zhi n kalayi dna n wo awyi-dnai vi, ɓai kpema Yesu, ɓa zhin aza gyi-gyi-yi nu.

Mawo begye n eshe bmana, n mi eshe kwoi cige, “Ka aɓeye kpe, esa n la si nsai n awo aza a fifiyi ɓa lo oɓa sun-sun, E, Zafun nu na da, ɓazhin anabarkada nu, gama nsaiye ɓaɓa sun n ɓa azhin, ntnu-tnuyi, gama oɓa atnu-tnu manayi viɓa lo har eshemi.”
Aɓo ɓa shando, magye a nyin bui-buyi n Zahoi sase tu n ɓa n wu ngye Yesu, n na ɓei yiwo ge, “Oza Nugun.” N Rawa ni Zinariya, nya yi kun n wo tukwo, n Limizhegye gyi-gyi-yi shi n wo akun.
Nnavun Malaika gmiɓe n Aduwa nyakun wa yi wo, “Ya apma zhin n Limzhegye yi, gama esa n laho si ha ya do, gama ampanyi anyi nya n la ɓi.”
Nsai oza nwo sase tu n na anyi nyi wa dna limzhegye anyi, wa ye ampanyi zhi.
Ndeye avun malaika ho woi gmi n aduwanyakun n eshe n Limzhegye gyi-gyi-yi shi ce.
Dna n sayi malaika, n wo n ikoi wa zo anyi n enai nyi, wa sawyi dna malaika nwo n Limizhegye shi nyi “Zhin akma n ho Limzhegye yi nsaiye, ha do anab shinwa anyi nya gama ɓa ku ɓi ntu n owa daɓo.”
Malaika ya limzhegye dna wa do anab wa yezhi n anab abazhinba, n Shekwoyi minagyi aba.
A dna anab n kwo aba zhinba nzhi yakwo avun, ami ɓa zeya ngye edna mile tagyi ngun aba (200) n lo-loyi n kwo ɓa si dokwo lunzami.
Ma gye n eshe oɓo wowoyi, ai wu oɓo n kwo ɓelo. A tnu n na a Malaika yi ngun tnaba, ɓa ɓe anyi n anyasan a nukwoyi n kma-sun ngun tnaba. N na vun Shekwoyi minagyi kwa zo.

Ma gye nyaho tazhi nmi abye n wu ngye ena n maganyi yi, n na azayi gni agni kpe, nɓa ɓo gyi nasara n Nyawan-nyawan nukwoyi n owo nya zhin-zhin yi, n wo tuzei n lambai, oɓa vinya n Shekwoyi amuloyi shi.

Ɓai kwo Musa anyi, Shekwoyi fyenu n kugya anyi yi, “Oho aɓo zhin-zhin Shekwoyi ikoda, oho azokwo vinya zhin ɓefyece nu n gaiciya yi, O, Esu esa vinya nya, nyikado nu tawo edna n ma, O Dagayi, wa la oho eye tun ma? Gama oho nu zhin gyi-gyiyi n ho gmanyi yi. Akni vinya ɓaɓe ɓa ga ho mwa-mwa, gama aku oho aɓo zhin manayi wu.”
N na avun mashi awye ma gye aba gyi-gyi-yi vinya, n na aduwanyakun n eshe mi, n guya gni.

A malaika ngun tnaba n na ɓei kniɓa ɓa ze anyasan anukwoi ya fi n na anyi ngun tnaba nyi, ɓa kunɓe n aduwa-nyakun yi, n na aje abuyi kpe lonen n (fan-fan yi) n tna cegye, n na a belt zinariya nyai pa n na agu.
Zaknayi n na a wye-wyeyi da n gun anyi yi ho, wa ga zaho-zahoi nɓa mi papa Zinariya nya n nu-nuyi n Shekwoyi wye-wyeyi da minagyi yakwoyi, n wo nyi nyalo-nyalo nyi.
Aduwanyakun n nung-ni n na wuyi n wo-ikoyi n mwa-mwayi, to zahozahoi wa mi wa lo ɓon, sai a malaika ngun tnaba yi, nku a nyasan nukwoyi ngun tnaba sheya fi n anyi.
Mawo begye yakwo kwoi gmi n aduwa-nyakun kwoi daɓo n na amalaika tnabayi, “Fyelo n saiye fye ze a papa tnaba Shekwoyi minagyi nya ya fi n na anyi.”

Nlonu malaika kmisunyi wafa aduwa-nyakun wa ze papa kmisunyi yafi n anyi, a gbago, a cisa nukwoyi a sansanyi, ɓa kunkpe n na aza vinya, nɓa n Nyawan-nyawan lambayi lo ɓai ga wo mwa-mwa nwo nya zhin zhinyi.
Malaika bayi wa zewo papa yafi n anuwan yako, ɓaku ze ngye oza fifiyi ami, anya vinya nɓa fi n na nuwan yakwo ɓaku fi.
Malaika tayiwa ze owo papa yafi n na ala, n na adna ɓiyi vinya, ɓaku ze ami.
Mawo malaika a nuwanya woi gna, “Kwo wulo cewo shi ho tnu n wadaye pya yi, O, Oza Gyi-gyi-yi, nwo nyi wo ɓei nyi.
Gama aku ho aza gyi-gyi-yi n anabi yi wu ai ze oɓa ami ya fi n anyi, nsaiye, n kasun ho ka aza ami zeya nɓa ɓei wu Banyi, oɓa lada nu n kwo kunce n ɓai”.
Mawo malaika nwo gni n bagadi aba nyi woi gna, “E Dagayi, Shekwoyi ikoda oho tata wulo cewo dei-dei.”
Nnavun malaika nyiyi wa ze owo papa ya kpe n nyipyeyi, kwa gyi aza ena n kwo ena yi.
Zaho-zahoi vinya okwo ena aku gyiwo, ɓa tu Shekwoyi eye ekni n wa tnu n na anyasan dnagmayi nyi, to ɓa shan oɓa bugba don n ɓa aɓe zhin yin, ɓa gawo mwa-mwan.
Nna vun malaika tnuyi wa ze owo papa ya kpe n Nyawan-nyawan nkwo gmi n nuwanyi, a yakwo ebemi dna n wyegma, owo aviyi vinya ɓai gyi oɓa anyitala ntu n sansan ɓo.
Ɓa tu Shekwoyi eshe nya ekni ntu nɓa aci ɓo n nyasanyi, ama to ɓa ye abwi n ɓa aɓe nukwoyi zhin ɓon.
Malaika tnanyi wa ze owo papa yakpe n ela dnagmanyi. Affratis kwo wo n na bai asu n ɓa nyin n gabas ɓa bwa zokwo ɓa duya n ɓa asojayi ɓa lo nyipyeyi shin bwa ntna wahala.
Ma gye azafun nukwoyi ngun ata n wu ngye adug-ba ɓai kun n Dragon egbe, n Nyawan-nyawan egbeyi, n owo Anabi Katayi egbei.
A zafun, aɓo wowoyi zhinyi ye, ɓa si egbe do n asu anyi nyayi vinya, ɓa yeba zhi ɓa sunkun n Dagayi n nyipyeyi yakwoyi owadawyi, Shekwoyi ikoda nya.
“Fye wo, mi ɓei ɓe ntna esa; dnayi ngy evi, anabarkada nu aza vinya n ɓa kmimilo n ɓa nu ajei zhin shiri lo, ɓato n na a pmayi lo ɓai zan-zan n na bwotolo yin n vinyikwoyin.”
Ɓa ye a soja anyi nya zhi vinya n aba n na yi Ibrananciyi nge, Arma-giddon, Magiddo Epe.
Nnavun malaika tnabayi waze wo papa ya fi n ese, wyisa yakwo kwa gmi n aduwa-nyakun n eshe mi kwoi gna, “Aku zo zhin.”
Ogma sawyi kwa ci aɓo, kwa bmiyana, eknia shan-shan n nato shin kwo pya zhin dna n zanyi-kwoci asesemi n na anyin.
Ezhi yakwo Babila kwa gna aje ngun ata, azhi yakwo nɓa shegun ɓa miya laɓa n na anyi, nlo nu Shekwoyi wa pa Babila alaifi ɓo vinya n wo bugba mi, a tawo to a ce minagyi wan har owo minagyi kwa zo.
A muse vinya ɓa busiya laɓa, Ape vinya ɓa ɓaya.
A gma kuta a yakwo ɓakun n eshe, agma kuta n woshan, har laba tagyi ɓa kaya kpe aza n anyi, ɓa tu Shekwoyi ekni ntu n na agmakuta a nukwoyi ye ɓo.

Zaknayi n na amalaika n ɓa ɓei ze anyasan anukwoyi ya nyi, wa ɓe wa daɓo n mi yi, wa gna, “Ɓe ngnisum n miyi, ma wuho oɓo n kwo ye kwa bwa Karuwa Tawoɓo ye, n wo sase tu n na anuwan yakwo anyi nya nyi.
Asu anyi nya nku aɓo a nukwoyi zhin n woi. Aza n ɓafi n anyi nyi n ku wo nuwan nukwoyi sin, a ɓenukwoyi nya.”

Malaika wa lami dna n Zafun, yalo bmana. Nɓo magye nyikwoza n sasetu n Nyawan-nyawan, n wu n byei-byei ciwu, n na atukwoyi ngun tnaba, n na amwayi gyi ngun awo, n nya yi kakpe nɓa, n ɓa tu Shekwoyi eye cegye.

Nyikwozai n jekpei kpe bmina-bmina ndohoi kpe ciwu, n nyigunyi zhin n Zinariya yi, n lu-lu manayi, n na akutabmiya-bmiya yi, n ebwe yi shi zinariya nya, n nunuyi n wye bwo yi, asisi nya, a cegye owo anagbai nya.
A na a sigyi eye yi kakpe n wo nyikunmi, “Babila Dnagmayi, a karuwa ʼya n na Ashan yi n na gba vinya n na anyi mi.”
Magye eje kwoi zhin nyikwozayi, eje aza gyi-gyi-yi ami nya, azafi Yesu anya n wa wu. Ma shiwo awye, ednayi womi.
Malaika wa nyami ge, “Kninu zhin cei wo hoa? Miɓa wuho owo, ma wuho nyawan-nyawan n wo gun nyi, nya n wo zhin kwo dogbe.

Wo ɓei n wye-wyeyi ama nsaiye woto lon. Ama esafyewyi woɓa gmiɓe n bwokun tna cei, walo bwi-bwi nyalo-nyalo nya. N azai nɓa fi n anyi n ɓa aye to kafi lo n Littafi wye-wyeyi nya nyin, kafin a zhin anyi, ce ɓei woɓa nɓa ɓei gyewo n wo efi avun.
“Nsaiye, zhin nubo n mwa, owo amwayi ngun tnaba zhin ezhi yakwoho nu, n mitu n ape ngun tnaba, aba n nyikwozaye sase nyi.
Ɓa zhin dogbe asu ngun tnabanu, ngun atnu nla miya, tnanyi yi gyi ebelo nsa ye, tnabayi to ɓe kpan, ama woto ɓei gyi ebe n mwasan.
Nyawan-nyawan ciwuyi ye n wa finyi, owo nu zhin esu nyimwanymwayi, woku ebe shin gyi ngnisun n na asu tnabai, woɓei gyi ebe n jesun n wo begyi bwabayi ye, avun woi lo a bwi.
Owo amwayi ngun awo zhin asu ngun awo nu, n ɓa to gyi ebe kpan, aɓei kni ɓa, ɓai gyi ebe esa fyewyi, ngnisun n woi.
Oɓa vinya ɓei tu obwa n takarda ɓoi gawo oɓa kala vinya n ikoi.
Ngnisun, ɓa ɓei sun okun n Kugyai. Kugya ɓei gyi nasara nɓa tukwo, gama owo nu zhin a dagayi Dagayi. Esu aje Esu, owo aza nu zhin ayi-yi-i a kni-kniyi, a gbenuyi.”
Anuwan yakwo, ala, n na adnai n nyikwozai sase tu nyi, ɓanu zhin aza vinya n na abyei vinya n na akniyi.
Nyawan-nyawan byei-byei n wo amwayi ngun awo, zhin dogbe n na asu yi ngun awo n ɓa ɓei gyi ebe ngnisun n woyi – ɓa wun nyikwozai nu, ai cewo okun ai fawo n bwotoloyi ena kwoi gyi wo.
Gama Shekwoyi ɓei dnaɓa shiri nɓa nubo zhimi, shiri n kwo ɓanu wo beye. Ɓa ɓei gun egbe ɓa ga nyawan-nyawan byei oɓa ebegyi, n na abai Shekwoyi ɓeda kwa nu.
Nyikwoza yi n ha gye n ho ruya nyi, owonu zhin ezhi dnagmayi n kwo gyi ebe tu n asu anyi nya tukwo nyi.
N deye avun vinya, ma gye malaika woi ɓe n She n begyi yakwoi, anyi ɓa bmiyana nwo mwamwayi.
Wa sawyi n kalai, “Babila Dnagmayi nla miya, kwola miya, wola ze alijanu fiba, a guzhenyi a fazan zan ba, n zafun nukwoi dohodohoi.
Gama abye vinya n ku nuwan nukwoyi efinya owo aɓo nukwoi nya sin. Asu anyi nya n ku ɓahin dagma n woi, anyakunyi n ku ze anyanbwai ntu n wo nayida kala ɓo.”
Mawo begye kwoi gmi n eshe kwoi gna, “Fye la kun n wo aba emi aza, fyeto ye ɓedo n wo alaifiyin, kada a tafe ɓedo n woi.
Gama owo alaifi n la tugbaga n lawu n eshe, Shekwoyi nku shiri zhin wa tawo ntu wo aɓe nukwoyi ɓo.
Zhin wo shi wa zhin ho, nduɓo, gbawo aɓe zhin-zhin nukwoyi ta zun ɓa. Wa ga aza ebwe bugba wunya, gawo lonu zunɓa.
Wola sase dna n nanyi do n agmadai, mwi kwo do n kasu n ibugbawunyi n anyi. Nsayi woi gma nge, ‘Mi zhin Sarauniya nu tu n mi esu-shinkpegye, mito zhin anyigbai banzanya nun, mi ta kpe bugba wun yen.’
Ntuce nu bugba wun efi nya n bwiciyi, n mikunyi ɓei ɓefye aba n nyipyeyi gmanyi nu, ena yi gyiwo n sagmanyi yi, gama Dagayi zhin iko da nu n wo dawo owa nyi.
“Anyi tukwoda nɓa dnabwa n wo aɓo nukwoyi a wyebwo nya zhinyi, ɓai dagma n wo alheri nyi, ɓa ɓei ciwo ebwi shi ɓa ɓei gye awu ɓai gmi n wo agusa.
Ɓa ɓei zhi n kpayi, ɓai vin n ednai, ɓai cibwi ge, ‘Owyi, Babila ezhi dnagmai n esa gmanyi nu n kwo kni zun aɓe.’
“Anya siyi anyi nya ɓei cibwi, ɓai wun bugba ntu nwo ɓo, gama zaho to cegni lo wa si oɓa akayan.

Owonu ɓei zhinɓa anya siyi dnagmayi n zinariya, azurfa, akuta manayi, luʼu-luʼu yi, linen manayi, siliki, n eje byei-byei yi, n na shinwan sundayi, n na akaya yi n na zhin n dagba nyi-kna yi, n na shinwan nakwoyi, akaya yi n sinkna byei-byei yi, n sunkna zhiyi-zhiyi, n kuta manayi yi.
N yaji yi, ntulare yi, n emi yi, n luban yi, n anab nuwan yi, zaitun emi yi, n wyiluku luku-luku yi, n alkama yi, anakwo, na adoko, karusai n na afyenuyi, har ɓedo n na a zanyikwoci wyewyeyi.
“Anya amanayi vinya n ɓa ɓo daho ɓa du, anyida n mwa-mwai n ɓa daho nyi ɓa ta jeho aba ɓen, ɓa du nyalo-nyalo.
“Ntucenu anyakunyi, nɓa ze a nyabwai ntu n na anya deye kun ɓo nyi, ɓa ɓei zhi n kpai, ɓai wo wahala dna n ɓahin tukwo, ɓai cibwi ɓai fi aku.
‘Aiya, ezhi dnagmai, n bmiya ngye nyikwoza, n zhi-zhinyi n linen putu-putu yi, n eje bye-byei ciwu, n zhin-zhin yi n zinariya yi, n na a kuta manayi, n luʼu-lu-uyi.
N esa gmanyi yi ezhi yi nyabwa vinya n la wunya.’ Ayada vinya n aya tukwodai, n aya dnayi ɓa ɓei zhi n tagni.
Ɓai cibwi shi ɓa gye awu ɓai gmiya gun eshe, nge, ‘Nknibwayi nu n ezhi dnagmayi lo ngye deye pya?’
Ɓa kpe abwitukun n ɓa tukwo, dna nɓa bugba wun, ɓai gna, ‘Ewyi, Ewyi, n ezhi dnagmayi aba, kwa zhinyi yi ze anyabwayi ntu n kwo nyabwa ɓo. Nʼsaiye n esa gmanyi yi ɓa ku bwi vinya.
“ ‘Amma oho, O eshe, dagma n owo bwi-bwi, efye Shekwoyi aɓi, n na anabiyi n na amanzaniyi, gama Shekwoyi ku owa dawo gafye n sayi.’ ”
Navun malaika yakwo, wala, kuta n wu n gye ata wyigwonya, wa shekwoya dna n nuwan yakwo, wa sawyi, “Babila ezhi dnagmai aɓa she kwoya, shi ma she kuta ye ya nyi. Kwa bwi n awyeba nyalo-nyalo.
Ata shan anyi begye wo n kwon, kwo amolo kwo amwayin, ata shan abwa ze doho-dohoi ze n ezhi yin, ata shan ewyi gwon.

Wyegma, wyegma okwo asukwo vinyal kwo fitila ato ɓei gye n kwo atagan n I jesun ato ɓei je amula a shan won, n na amula ɓa n na amula anyikwoyi begye dadayin. A kpe owo anyansiyi ye vinya n anyi, n wa dna anyi kwoce n wo aɓeyi-sunyi
Anabi n aza gyi-gyi-yi vinya n na aɓei wu ɓanyi, oɓa ami tulo n wo tukwo.”
Ndeye avun mawo deji kwoi ɓewyi n eshe, “Haliluya, la Dagayi tu, Gnigni gmi n Shekwoyi aba nu. Mwa-mwa n begyi zhin owo nya nu gmanyi.
Gama owo wada zhin ɓefyece nu n gaiciya yi. Wola karuwa yakwoi ta n wo ɓei tu anyi cegye n wo alaifi nyi, woi gba ta ga wo afyenu n na ɓei wu nyi.”
Oɓa begye aiwo njesun cici, ɓei kwo anyi ge, “La Dagayi tu! Awu owo nagyi nya ɓa gunlo eshe nyalo-nyalo.”
Atukwoda shiba cei anyi, n awyewyeyi dayi ngun anyi ɓa yazhi n kni ɓai ga Shekwoyi mwa-mwa, n wo sasetu n Esu-shinkpegye ɓai gna, Amin, Haliluya la Dagayi tu.
Begye a gmi n Esu-shinkpegye kwa gna, “La eyi Shekwoyi tu, ofye owo abara vinya, dnagmayi n nawyi yi, n fye wowo edna nyi.”
Mawo aɓoci n jesun ngye aza begye ɓeda, kwo n gye anuwan yakwo n ɓaluya n na adnagbe, kwo ngye ogma wyisa yakwo, “La Dagayi tu. Gama Dagayi eyi Shekwoyi iko da vinya gyi ebe lo.”
Yi dagma ya nya agmada, ya gawo mwa-mwa, gama esa n lasi n na ɓa zhin buki kugya nya, owo mula nyikwo n la wohin zhin shiri.
Ala ye wo wa kpe linen n kwo du n gyi-gyi n bui-buyi n bmiya-bmiya yi. (Linen manayi zhin aɓe mana nu n Shekwoyi aza zhin).
Malaika wa ba ɓeda ye gami, “An, abarka da nu aza n na la ɓa yi ɓa ɓe kugya a buki aba.” Wa kma ɓeda ɓe nge, “Shekwoyi nu na dace.”

Ma yashi nwo apita ma ga wo mwa-mwa, ama wa gna, lafa to zhin. “Gama mi zhin Shekwoyi fyenu nu n gye ho ce, n ho azajei a Yesu viyi, n ɓa zhin seida n ɓa gaiciya gayi n Yesu nyi.” Delili anabci ye nya vinya, n na ɓoi n ma wu ho nyi, ɓa zhin seida nu tu n Yesu tukwo.
Nnavun ma gye eshe n guya gni n dokwo buyi gni agni gni n ɓo, ayi oza n wo ɓei sase tu n dokwo yi nyi ge, “Gbenuyi n Gaiciya yi” Oza nwo ta aza nyi, woi sun okun.
Owo awye wu ngye ena go-goyi n na rawani yi kpe nwo tukwo n mwa, n wo yei katu n nyikunmi n zaho ta kpe kwo yelon sai owo.
Wo n na ajei kpe n dafi n ami, ayiwo ge, “Shekwoyi Ɓeda.”
Akun sunyi n eshe vinya n na linen manayi kpe bmiya-bmiya yi vinya, ɓai viwo n kpe n adokwo buyi.
Wo n ebe yakwo gyi-gyi-yi shi nwo egbe wa zun abye kni n cei, wa gyi ebe tu nɓa tukwo n sinkna bwayi, wa dna anab nuwan-piba Shekwoyi ikoda minagyi nya.
Nwo eye yi kakpe n wo jekpe n buzhi-kwo nge, “Esu aje Esu, Dagayi a dagayi aje nya.”
Magye malaika gni agni gni n nyipyeyi za-za, woi sawyi ga alu vinya nge, “Fye ɓe, fya yezhi ntu Shekwoyi Dnagmayi buki ɓo!
Fye ɓe fya gyi asu abu, n na akun atukwoda abuyi n na bezhe yakwo yi, n na adokwo yi, n ɓa gunyi-i, n na azanyi-kwoci yi, adnagmayi n na ɓiyi-i alo-loi ya n na apapayi.”
Nnavun magye, Nyawye-wyei Nukwoi, woi ye a gwomnati anyi nya zhi nɓa asojayi, ɓa sunkun n zai nwo tu n dokwo buyi nyi n wo akunsun yi.

A wan Nyawye-wyei n Anabi Katayi, n wo zhin aɓo wowoi esa n Nyawye wyei nukwoyi gni n cei nyi, aɓo a wo-woi nɓa dna aza kwoce n ɓa ɓei gwo Nyawye-wyei Nukwoyi zetu, n ɓa ga owo nya zhin-zhin mwa-mwa nyi, Oɓa ba Nyawye-wyeyi nukwoyi n wo anabi Katayi a sheɓa yafi n wye-wyeyi yi n ena zundna n kwo gyina n suffa yi nyi.
A wu ɓa akun sunyi vinya, n ebe yakwoyi n kwo dna n oza egbe n wo tu n dokwo buyi nyi. Alu anyi bmanaya vinya ɓa gyi ɓa abu nuboʼa kuɓa fu har eshakpi.
Nnavun magye malaika woi kashi n eshe n mabudi obwo tnacei nyai shi n na agma yakwoyi shi n wo akun.
Wa wan Dragon, owa kwo-kwoi, oza nukwoyi, Shetan, wa pawo n na agma yi har eye tagyi ngun awo, (1,000).
Wa shewo ya dna n obwo tnacei wa gu wa makuli dna, n na bai n wota dna abye kwocen sai aye tagyi ngun awo n la duya. Nnavun ai lowoya esafyewyi.

Nnavun magye esushinkpegye n na azai sase kpe n ɓai n na la izini ga ɓa ɓa dawa, ma gye a wye-wyeyi aza nya n na ɓei kmiɓa tukwo ya ntu nɓa seida Yesu nya ɓo, ntu n Shekwoyi ɓeda waʼazi zhin ɓo, n na azai n ɓato ga Nyawye-wyeyi mwa-mwa n owo nya zhin-zhin yin, to ɓa gwo owo zetu nɓa nyikunmi ko abwan. Ɓai ku wye-wyeyi jebwa ɓai gyi ebe ngnisun n Kristi yi har aye tagyi ngun awo (1,000).
Kalaku n efi kmisunyi nu nyi, (azafi nɓa ce nyi ɓa to kukala kpan sai aye tagyi ngun awo n la duya).
Anabarkada nu n agyi-gyi yi aza nɓa bwa lo-lo dna n kalaku kmisunyi. Gama Efi Bayi to n ikoyi lo n ɓa tukwon gama ɓaɓa zhin a prist Shekwoyi anya n Kristi yi ɓai gyi ebe n woi har aye tagyi ngun awo.
Shi aye tagyi ngun awo ɓei la duya ai lo shetan ya n wo kurkuku.
Wo; gmilo wo dna abye kwoce n na anyi wa yeɓa zhi gnisun, Gog n Magog yi, ɓa sun okun, aza begye, to ai shin ban, ngye amwi n ɓa kpe n ela gbe.
Ɓa ɓei gunlo ɓa duyalo bmana yakwo anyi nya ɓai she Shekwoyi aza gun, n ezhi ye-yei Urushelima nya, ama ena ɓei gmi n Shekwoyi aba kwoi gyi akunsunyi vinya kwoi wuɓa.
Nnavun, Shetan nwa dnaɓa kwoce nyi ai shewo yadna n ena zundna n kwo gyi n sulfa yi nyi, aba n Nyawan-nyawan n Anabi katayi fi nyi, ai wu ɓa anyi n nyipyeyi n sukwoyi nyalo-nyalo.
Magye esu-shinkpegye bui-bui, n zayi nwo sase tu n kwo, Anyi n eshe bmana yi ɓa busi n wo awyeba, ama to ɓa bwa abwi ban.
Ma gye azafi, adnagmayi n aɓiyi n gni a gni zhi n Shekwoyi abye, a gu a Littafi ya, n littafi wye-wyeyi nyai ɓe. A da azafi owa n nya yi nkwo kafi n na a Littafi yi mi, zaho-zahoi shiwa zhin n wu.
Anuwan-yakwo ɓa ga oɓa aza n ɓa ɓo wan, ekni n kwo azai n kwo gyi, A da zaho-zahoi owa shi wa zhin n wu.
Ashe efi n Hades yi ya dna n Anapi deye kwonu zhin Efi Bayi–Anapi Ena zundna.
Oza n na to gye owo eye kadna n litafi wye-wyeyi nyan a shewo ya dna n anapi–Ena zun–dna.
N navun magye, anyi woi woyi (n tna ala) n eshe woi-woyi, gama anyi nsaiye nya n duya.
Omi Yohanna, magye, Ezhi Gyi-gyi-yi, Urushelima woi-woyi kwoi gmi n Shekwoyi aba n eshe kwoi shin zhi ɓe, nya bmiya-bmiya yi, ngye mula anyikwo n wo mula pa aba.
Ma wo begye yakwo, kwoi gmi n esu-shinkpegye kwoi gna, “Shi awye Shekwoyi puwa lo n kunsun n na azai nsayi, wa sase n kunsun nɓai ɓa zhin owo aza, E, Shekwoyi nwohin tukwo wa sase dna nɓa atasin.
Wa wunɓa awyenyi ya n na awyeba vinya, efi ta shan sun, kwo bugba wun, kwo ebwi cin, kwo nayi, san. Aɓeye vinya nla duya nyalonyalo.”
Oza nwo sase tu n esushinkpegye nyi wa gna, “Gyewye, mi zhin anya woi-woyi nu,” wa gnami nsai ge, “Ka aɓeye kpe, gama oɓo n mi gnaho nyi kwo zhin oɓo hin-hin nu n gaiciya yi.”
Aku zo zhin, Eminu zhin A n Z yi, Kmisunyi n Kmazoyi, mi ɓa ga oza n nuwan mikun wowo a nuwan kpeba, nuwan wye-wyeyi nya, cauta.
Ozaho-zahoi n wa gyi nasara, wo ɓa bwa anyi gye vinya gado, ma ze wo Shekwoyi wa ze mi oɓi.

Ama aɓiɓi n ɓa fa mi viɓo ɓai jeze n na avun yi, n na azayi nɓa ta nu egben, n na cegye dayi, azawuyi, n na aɓenukwoyi-zhinyi, n na aza yi n ɓa daɓo n alijanu yi, n na shangbayi, n na a kataceyi vinya, oɓa abwiba nyi n anapi ena zundna n kwo gyi ena n sulfa yi. Efi bayi nu.
Malaika gmanyi n na amalaika tnaba mi nɓa n ɓo ze a papa anyasan dnagmayi nya nyi, wa ɓe wa gna mi ge, “Gni ɓe n miyi ma wuho mula-nyikwo, kugya nyikwo.”
Wa la mi dna n ruya wa lomi yi n epe nshe, ma gye ezhi manayi-i, Urushelima gyi-gyi-yi kwoi gmi n na anyi bmana n Shekwoyi aba.
Kwo ɓei nunuyi n Shekwoyi mwa-mwa yi, kwoi bmiyana ngye luʼu-luʼu na bmiyayi n wu pyanyi n gye jasper.
Okwo a galu n mwakpa n mwapata n na abwokumiyi fi n gun awocei aba, a malaika ngun awocei-aba ɓai gu abwokunmi yi, n na a Israilai bye ngun awo-cei-aba aye yi kakpe n abwokunmi awocei-aba yi.
Abwokunmi fi n sepa dohodohoyi, n arewa abwokunmi ngun ata, n kudu abwokunmi ngun ata n yamma, abowkunmi ngun ata, n gabas abwokunmi ngun ata.
A galu yi n na agoro yi awocei-aba n na bara kugya nya aye yi kakpe n kwo agoro awo-cei-aba yi.
Malaikayi n Zinariya busi nyamwinyai shi n wo akun, wa mwi ezhi yi n kwa abwokunmiyi n kwa agaluyi.
Shi wo ɓei mwi kwo wa gye kwo n na abwakwonu yi ngun anyi n mwi awye. Ekpa n pata yi sun dei-dei mile dubu gmanyi ncei kpe tagyi ngun atnun. (1,500)
N navun wa mwi galu shin-shin wa gye kwo apita tagyi ngun aba ncei-kpe awocei tnanyi (216). N zunduya Malaika yi wa wumi mwi-mwi yi aye n nyamwi ye hin-hinyi.
Ezhi n kwohin tukwo, nwu serai n gyi-gyi-yi zinariya nabmiya yi ngye maganyi. A zhin kwo agalu n jaspa yi nu, amikwo kpe n agoro awo-ceiaba n na akuta a nakwoyi – luʼu-luʼu yi
goro kmisunyi n jaspa yi
bayi n Sapphire yi
tayi n chalcedonyi yi
nyiyi n emaraod yi
tunyi n Sardonyi yi
tnanyi yi n Sardus yi
tnaba yi n Crysolite yi
nyimwa-nyimwa yi n beryl yi
ciwa-gmanyi yi n topaz yi
nwo yi n Chrysoprase yi
awocei-gmanyi yi n jecinth yi
awo-cei-aba yi n amethyst yi.
A zhin abwokunmi awo cei aba yi n luʼu-luʼu yi nu, luʼu-luʼu dohodohoi n kwo bwai. Okwo azokwo n gyi-gyi-yi zinariya na bmiya yi, n gye maganyi.
Aduwa-nyakun to ɓei nyi n ezhi yin gama Dagayi Shekwoyi ikoda n Kugya yi a ga ɓa nu mwa-mwa n na aba vinya.
Ezhiyi to n nyipyei ɓeyi pman kwo epyan, ɓa gakwo buzagnan, gama Shekwoyi n kugya mwa-mwai nu gakwo buzangna.
Okwo buzangna ɓei ga abye buzangna n anyi, abegyi yi n anyi vinya ɓei ɓe nɓa mwa-mwayi n kwo.
Ata gu okwo abagu-nyan, ɓaguya zhi nylo-nyalo, sukwo to lon ɓom.
Aɓei ɓe n abye-mwa-mwai n ɓa latuyi n kwo mi.
Ato ɓei ye n nyaho-nyahoi n kwo zhin nukwoyi nɓon, ɓenukwoyi-zhinyi kwo tnagaiciya da to ɓei lo ɓon sai aza nɓa aye kafi n Kugya Litafi wye-wyeyi nya.
Wa wu mi ola gyi-gyi-yi Nuwan wye-wyeyi nya, n tna cegye dnayi n gye crystal, kwoi zhe n Shekwoyi shinkpegye, n Kugyayi.

Kwoi diya n zokwo yakwo a tasin, N ola kma a sepa aba-aba shinwan wye-wyeyi nya n pazhi kwoi gyi abye awo-cei-aba, kwoi gyi woiwoyi epya doho-dohoi, okwo afintolo ai zhin apma n cei ntu n na abye kagna ɓo.
Nya nukwoyi doho-doho yi to ɓei lo ezhi yin, gama Shekwoyi shinkpegye n kugya nyai ɓei fi n ɓo, Owo abara ɓei ga wo mwa-mwa.
Ɓa ɓei gyewo awyeba, ai ka wo eye kpe n ɓa anyikunmi.
Sukwo tolo n ɓom, ato n fitila apmayi lo n ɓom, kwo nyipyei m. Gama Dagayi Shekwoyi nu zhin buzangna nɓo wo ɓei gyi ebe nyalo-nyalo.

Malaika wa gnami ge, ɓeda ye zhin gbenu yi nu n gaiciya yi. “Mi ɓelo esa fyewyi.” Shekwoyi n wo gna owo anabi oɓo nkwo ɓelo n na abye nyi, wo na tnu n-wo malaika yi wagnaho ge abyeye ɓelo esafyewyi. Anabarka da nu oza n wa gakwo gaiciya, n na anya yi vinya n ɓa kafi littafi.
Omi Yohanna, magye ma wo aɓeye vinya, ma yashi ma ga malaika mwa-mwa n wa wumi ɓa nyi.
Ama wa gna, “Awo, to zhin oɓo n wu lo nun, emihin ce, mi zhin Yesu bara nu n gye ho, n ho azajei anabi, n na azai n ɓa wo ɓeda n na cei kafi n littafi, ga Shekwoyi nu mwa-mwa n wo gmanyi yi.”
Wa gnami, To gu enya n ha kan, gama okwo anusa nla wo viwyi.
Nsa si, aɓenukwoyi zhinyi ɓei gyi abye n ɓenukwoyi zhin yi. Cegye da ɓei gna cegye tu-tu nu. Aɓo manayi zhinyi ɓei gyi abye n ɓemana zhinyi aza n ɓa gyi-gyi-yi ɓa ɓei gyi abye n gyi-gyi-yi.
“Shi awye, miɓelo esa fyewyi, emi lada n kunsun lo n miyi magba ozaho-zahoi shiwa zhin n wu.
Ominu zhin A n Z yi, ayaba n azo bayi, kmisunyi n kmaknayi.
Anabaraka da nu nyalo-nyalo aza nɓa zhan oɓa ajekpe, n na bai ɓa bwa Izini, ɓa lo ezhi yi n na abwokunmi, ɓa gyi shinwa wye wyeyi nya nɓo.
“Aza nɓa bma Shekwoyi zokwo ya to ɓai vi won, n na aɓeyi, n na a shan-gbayi, n na azai n ɓa ye akata, ɓai ce ɓa.
Omi Yesu, mi la tnu n mi malaika yi, wa gna a eklisiya aɓeye, e mi nu zhin Dauda abye tukwo n wo yawyi. Ominu zhin kpasu labmi nya.”
Zafun n mulaɓayi ɓa gna ge, “Be” Fa azaho-zahoi n wa wo wa gna ɓe, oza ho-zahoi nwo n cei pma wo ɓe wa sin nuwan Wyewyeyi nya cauta.
Mi gna ozaho-zahoi n wo ba Litafiye, ezaho-zahoi n wa ɓe nyado ndu odo nkwo kafi n ya nyi, Shekwoyi ɓa ɓewo azhin n ɓa kafi n ya nyi.
Ozaho-zahoi n wa ce enya kniya n kwo kafi n anabci ye Shekwoyi ɓa gmi wo robo ya n shinwa wye-wyeyi nya, n Ezhi Gyi-gyi-yi n na dakwo ɓo n ya nyi.
“Oza n wa da aɓeye vinya nyi wa gna, E, Mi ɓelo esa fyewyi!” Amin Ɓe, Dagayi Yesu.
Alheri eyi Dagayi Yesu Kristi nya ɓa kunsun n fyei vinya. Amin.
